1b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kan/ bod skad du/
1b2(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma
1b3(rgyud 'bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi// rgyal ba
2a1(rgyud 'bum): gang lags de kun gyi// yum ni dge ma khyod lags te// khyod ni lha mo rgyal ba'i
2a2(rgyud 'bum): sras/ / rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin can// sangs rgyas yum gyur de yi mtshan// dge ma bdag
2a3(rgyud 'bum): gis brjod par bya/ / 'byor par 'dod pas mnyan par gyis// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
2a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams
2b1(rgyud 'bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin
2b2(rgyud 'bum): pa de bzhin nyid dang / bden pa dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
2b3(rgyud 'bum): ma med pa nyid dang / smon pa med pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang / dngos po
2b4(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos mi 'gyur ba nyid
2b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid dang / chos bdag med pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid med pa
3a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid dang / sems can med pa nyid dang / srog med pa nyid dang / gso ba med pa nyid dang / gang zag med pa nyid dang / brjod
3a2(rgyud 'bum): du med pa nyid dang / brjod par bya ba ma yin pa dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi
3a3(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa dang / bdag gi med pa dang / rgyags pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / spros pa dang bral ba dang / spros pa
3a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa dang / nyan thos
3a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'dzin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad bskrun pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs zad mi shes
3a6(rgyud 'bum): pa bsags pa dang / ye shes 'bab pa dang / rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa dang / lha'i mig rnam par sbyong bar mdzad pa dang / lha'i rna ba rab tu dang bar
3b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes par mdzad pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par mdzad pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par mdzad pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad zad
3b2(rgyud 'bum): pa mdzad pa dang / 'phags pa dang / gtsang ba dang / bsangs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i
3b3(rgyud 'bum): shugs dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs dang ldan pa dang / dbang po sbyong bar mdzad pa dang / stobs mdzad pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi
3b4(rgyud 'bum): rin po ches mdzes par byas pa dang / nor bdun sbyin par mdzad pa dang / 'phags pa'i lamo yan lag brgyad pa ston pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ston par mdzad pa dang /
3b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang bcu sgrub pa dang / sa bcu gnas par mdzad pa dang / stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / zad par gyi skye mched bcus mdzes par byas pa dang / shes pa bcu 'bab pa dang / bag la nyal
3b6(rgyud 'bum): bcu'i dgra 'jig par mdzad pa dang / bsam gtan rnams sgrub par mdzad pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar mdzad pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams
3b7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis bstod pa dang shes pa thams cad mdzad pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa
4a1(rgyud 'bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
4a2(rgyud 'bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo ba
4a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don
4a4(rgyud 'bum): tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / rten cing 'grel bar 'byung ba rnam par sgom pa dang / rab tu brtag par bya ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa dang / gzhi med
4a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / brtag par bya ba ma yin pa dang / rig par bya ba ma yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma 'jig pa med par mdzad pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / gnyis med pa dang / gnyis med pa ma
4a6(rgyud 'bum): yin pa dang / zhi ba dang blo 'jug pa rnam par spangs pa dang / gnyen po me pa dang / ma gos pa dang / nam mkha'i lam dang 'dra ba dang / yod pa dang med par brjod pa ma yin pa dang / zhi ba dang rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid
4a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i chos nyid dang / mgal me bskor ba dang 'dra bar chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid do// su zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'don pa de ngan song thams cad las rab tu
4b1(rgyud 'bum): thar par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro// de'i gsang sngags kyi
4b2(rgyud 'bum): tshig 'di dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dran par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mos pa la byams ma yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
4b3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi ye shes kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bzhes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di lta ste/ oM pradz+nye pradz+nye/ ma hA badz+nye/ pradz+nyA a wa b+hA se
4b4(rgyud 'bum): pradz+nyA A ba lo ka ka ri/ A dz+nyA na ba do ma ni/ sid d+hi su sid d+hi/ si ta man b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba ga sun dA ri/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ba ta sa li/ pra sa ri ha ta se/ sa ma sha sa ka ri/ tid+b+ha tiSh+ThA/ kam+ba kam+ma/ tsa la tsa la
4b5(rgyud 'bum): ra ba ra ba gardza gardza/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ma na mA bi lam+ba swA hA/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum bzung bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas
4b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas shi 'phos nas kyang skye ba dran pa dang / yid gzhungs shing shes rab mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs
4b7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi chos ma lus par bzung bar 'gyur ro/ / gsang sngags dang rig sngags thams cad kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang skye ba dran pa dang / yid gzhung shing shes rab
5a1(rgyud 'bum): chen por 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du
5a2(rgyud 'bum): Ar+ya ko'u shi ka madz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ko'u shi ka zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
5a3(rgyud 'bum): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzhon nur gyur pa sha stag
5a4(rgyud 'bum): dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
5a5(rgyud 'bum): pa ni gnyis su blta bar mi bya/ gnyis ma yin par yang ma yin/ mtshan mar ma yin/ mtshan ma ma yin par yang ma yin/ blang bar ma yin/ dor bar ma yin/ bsnan par ma yin/ bsnan pa med par
5a6(rgyud 'bum): ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin par yang ma yini/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin par yang ma yin/ spang bar ma yin/ spang bar ma yin par yang ma yin// gnas su
5a7(rgyud 'bum): ma yin/ gnas su ma yin par yang ma yin/ sbyor bar ma yin/ sbyor bar ma yin par yang ma yin/ 'brel par ma yin/ 'brel par ma yin par yang ma yin/ rkyen du ma yin/ rkyen du ma yin par yang ma yin/ chos su
5b1(rgyud 'bum): ma yin/ chos ma yin par yang ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ma yin par yang ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par yang ma yin/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du
5b2(rgyud 'bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid mnyam mo// chos thams cad zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//
5b3(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben no// chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa'o// chos thams cad rlom sems med pa'i
5b4(rgyud 'bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med do/ / chos thams cad 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jigs pa med do// chos thams cad bag tsha ba med pa'i phyir shes rab
5b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bag tshwa med do/ / chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig go// chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do//
5b6(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med do// chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bu'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' lta bu'o// gzugs mu med pa'i
5b7(rgyud 'bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do// sa'i khams mu med pa'i
6a1(rgyud 'bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/ / de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med/
6a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do// rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do// rdo rje mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam mo// chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i
6a3(rgyud 'bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbyer med do/ / chos thams cad ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do// chos thams cad gsal ba med par mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab
6a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsal ba med par mnyam mo/ / chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med do// chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
6a5(rgyud 'bum): khasam gyis mi khyab bo/ / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
6a6(rgyud 'bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'khor gsum longs
6a7(rgyud 'bum): su dag pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su med do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di skar stong pa nyid bco brgyad 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang
6b1(rgyud 'bum): byi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
6b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
6b3(rgyud 'bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / mdor na stong pa nyid 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// skar ma rab rib mar me dang /
6b4(rgyud 'bum): sgyu ma zil pa chur bur dang / rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bur// 'dus byas de ltar blta bar bya// na mo b+ha ga ba te/ Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA ye/ oM d+hIHhriH/ shr-i shru ti smr-i ti ma ti ga ti dza ye swAhA/ 'gag pa med cing skye
6b5(rgyud 'bum): mid la/ / chad pa med cing rtag pa med// tha dad don med don gcig mo ni/ 'ong ba med cing 'gro med la/ spros pa zhi bas zhi ba yi// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ston pa// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa// smra
6b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang
6b7(rgyud 'bum): mi dang / lha ba yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod ngo // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ko'u shi ka zhes bya ba
7a1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / rgya'i skad du/ de'i shing ki ma kAng meng dzA'i shing wad kyang / bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser 'o/
7a2(rgyud 'bum): dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/
7a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri'i rtse mo mchog tu rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings shin tu zab pa/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul
7a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dgu khri brgyad stong dang thabs cig tu bzhug te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ glang po che'i rgyal po ltar shin tu dul ba/ zag pa
7a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams yongs su bsal ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ bya ba byas pa/ khur lci ba rnam par spangs pa/ bdag gi don thob pa
7a6(rgyud 'bum): srid par kun tu sbyor ba zad pa/ rang dbang chen po thob pa/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa la gnas pa/ thabs mkhas pa dang shes rab kyis yongs su brgyan pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad mngon sum du
7a7(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa/ pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang
7b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srungs
7b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'ba' zhig slob pa'i sa la gnas pa ni ma gtogs te/ 'di ltar nyan thos chen po de dag so so
7b3(rgyud 'bum): nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ snyoms par 'jug par zhugs pa las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ g.yas phyog
7b4(rgyud 'bum): nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag brgya stong du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad
7b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang gzi byin dang po'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ klu'i rgyal po chen po ltar gyur pa/ thams cad kun tu grags pa/ thams cad cang shes par gyur pa/ sbyin pa dang tshul khrims yongs su dag par gyur pa/ rtag par
7b6(rgyud 'bum): bzod pa dang brtson 'grus kyi spyod pa spyod par mngon par dga' ba/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas bsam gtan rnams las yang dag par 'das pa/ dran pa rtse gcig pa nyid mngon du gyur pa/ shes rab kyi sgo
7b7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu rnam par 'byed pa/ thabs mkhas pas shin tu bsgoms pa/ shin tu gya nom pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par rtsen pa'i dbang du gyur pa/ gzungs rab tu thob pa/ spobs pa zad pa med pa/ nyon mongs pa rnam
8a1(rgyud 'bum): spangs pa/ nye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams nye bar zhi bar gyur pa/ ring por mi thogs par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba/ bdud kyi dbungs rab tu
8a2(rgyud 'bum): 'joms pa/ chos kyi rnga shin tu rdung ba/ mu stegs can du ma btul nas yongs su dga' ba'i bsam pa bskyed pa la 'god pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa yongs su bskor nas lha dang mi rnams sgrol bar byed pa/
8a3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rab tu brgyan pa/ 'gro ba drug pa'i sems can dag la phan 'dogs pa/ ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs pa/ bzod pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa/ byams pa
8a4(rgyud 'bum): dang snying rje chen po'o sems la rab tu gnas pa/ shin tu brtan pa'o stobs chen po dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing phyi ma'i mtha' ji srid par yi
8a5(rgyud 'bum): dam chen po'i bsam pa yang dag par bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas rnams las rnam par dag pa'i rgyu rgya cher rab tu bskyed pa/ dus gsum gyi chos rnams las mi skye ba'i bzod pa rtogs par gyur pa/ theg pa gnyis po dag
8a6(rgyud 'bum): gi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ thabs mkhas pa chen pos 'jig rten pa rnams 'dul bar byed pa/ ston pa chen po'i bstan pa rnams yang dag par sgrogs pa/ gsang ba'i chos dang shin tu zab pa'i
8a7(rgyud 'bum): stong pa nyid rtogs shing khong du chud pas the tshom dang som nyi med par gyur pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag par
8b1(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag par brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
8b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la rang dbang du gyur pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa chen po bkod pa'i rgyal po dang
8b3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' ri rab mchog gi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu zab pa'i rgya mtsho'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog chen po dang /
8b4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che lag gi dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa
8b5(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi stobs chen dang / byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i 'od chen dang / byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag tshul
8b6(rgyud 'bum): khrims dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros shin tu rnam dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
8b7(rgyud 'bum): dang mtshungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' smon lam chen po mi gcod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i nad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman pa'i
9a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa dga' ba'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan mchog thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rnam dag 'od zer dang / byang chub
9a2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sprin chen chos 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen grags pa'i dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen grags pa mtha' yas ston dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen seng ge'i
9a3(rgyud 'bum): nga ro dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen glang po che'i rgyal po'i nga ro dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen bkra shis dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen yon tan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen
9a4(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen zla ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen skar ma'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen me'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen glog
9a5(rgyud 'bum): 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin che 'brug dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen shes rab kyi char gyis kun tu khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rnam dag char rgyal dang / byang chub sems
9a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sprin chen me tog ljon shing rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen pad+ma sngon po'i bsung dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rin po che'i tsan dan gyi dris lus bsil bar byed pa dang / byang chub
9a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sprin chen mun sel dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rab rib 'joms la sogs pa/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshogs chen po tshad med pa de dag kyang / so so nas phyi dro'i dus
9b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu
9b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khod par gyur to/ / gzhan yang li tsa byi gzhon nu lnga 'bum phrag brgya stong du ma 'dus par gyur pa la/ 'di lta ste/ gzhon nu seng ge'i 'od dang / gzhon nu seng ge'i blo gros dang / gzhon nu chos kyis byin
9b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / gzhon nu dbang pos byin dang / gzhon nu 'od chen dang / gzhon nu dpal chen dang / gzhon nu sangs rgyas skyong dang / gzhon nu chos kyi skyong dang / gzhon nu dge 'dun skyong dang / gzhon nu rdo rje skyong
9b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / gzhon nu nam mkha' skyong dang / gzhon nu nam mkha' sgra sgrogs dang / gzhon nu rin po che'i snying po dang / gzhon nu bkra shis mchog gi snying po la sogs pa ni gtso bor gyur te/ thams cad kyang bla na
9b5(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas pa dang / theg pa chen po la mngon par yid ches shing dga' bar gyur pas/ so so nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das
9b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// gzhan yang lha'i bu bzhi khri nyis stong 'dus pa la/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i bu mthong
9b7(rgyud 'bum): dga' dang / lha'i bu yid dga' dang / lha'i bu nyi ma'i 'od dang / lha'i bu zla ba'i gtsug pud dang / lha'i bu gsal ba'i blo gros dang / lha'i bu nam mkha' rnam dag blo gros dang / lha'i bu nyon mongs sel dang /
10a1(rgyud 'bum): lha'i bu bkra shis la sogs pa ni gtso bor gyur te/ thams cad kyis yi dam chen po'i sems bskyed nas theg pa chen po yongs su srung ba dang / dam pa'i chos rgyun mi 'chad par sbyor bar byed pas
10a2(rgyud 'bum): so so nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod
10a3(rgyud 'bum): par gyur to/ / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po nyi khri brgyad stong 'dus par gyur pa la/ 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po pad+ma dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i lo ma dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs chen dang / klu'i rgyal po cher
10a4(rgyud 'bum): sgrogs dang / klu'i rgyal po rlabs chung dang / klu'i rgyal po chu rgyun 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po gser gdong dang / klu'i rgyal po yid bzhin la sogs pa ni gtso bor gyur te/ 'di ltar klu'i rgyal po de
10a5(rgyud 'bum): dag kyang theg pa chen po'i chos la rtag par mos shing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / shin tu dang ba'i bsam pa bskyed nas yang dag par sgrogs pa dang / yongs su skyong bar byed pas/ so so nas phyi dro'i dus
10a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to//
10a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi 'khor sum khri drug stong 'dus par gyur te/ lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu gtso bor gyur pa dang / 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin a mra dang / gnod sbyin a mra thog dang / gnod sbyin pad+ma 'od kyi snying po dang /
10b1(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin pad+ma'i gdong dang / gnod sbyin khro gnyer can dang / gnod sbyin 'jigs chen ston dang / gnod sbyin sa sbrul dang / gnod sbyin zas zil ming la sogs pa gnod sbyin de dag thams cad kyang
10b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i chos la mos shing gus pa'i sems kyis yongs su skyob mi bskyed pas/ so so nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su dong ste/ bcom ldan
10b3(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// gzhan yang nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po bzhi khri dgu stong 'dus par gyur to//
10b4(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po spos kyi glang po che'i mthu dang ldan pa ni gtso bor gyur to// gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa dang / ri dang / nags tshal dang /
10b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho thams cad kyi lha dang / drang srong dang / yul khams chen po'i rgyal po dang / pho brang 'khor dang / btsun mo dang / sbas dang / shin tu dad pa dang ldan pa'i khye'u dang / bu mo dang / lha dang / mi'i tshigs chen po
10b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dus shing lhags pa thams cad kyang / bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po yongs su srung zhing klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / kun tu spel bar mos
10b7(rgyud 'bum): par gyur pas/ so so nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs
11a1(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu 'khor bar gyur to/ / de ltar nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / lga dang / tsha'i 'khor 'dus pa chen po dang / klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa sde brgyad po rnams 'dus par
11a2(rgyud 'bum): gyur nas/ so so nas sems rtse gcig tu thal mo sbyar te gus pas mig mi 'dzum par/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas/ shin tu gya nom zhing khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos thos par gyur to snyam mo//
11a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gser 'od dam pa gya nom chos// mdo sde
11a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas spyod yul zab mo 'di// shin tu thos par dka' bas na/ ngas deng 'khor 'dus chen po la/ 'di ltar mdo 'di bstan pa na// phyogs bzhi'i sangs rgyas bzhi po dag
11a5(rgyud 'bum): byin gyi rlabs kyis rlob par mdzad/ / shar phyogs na ni mi 'khrugs gtso// lho phyogs sangs rgyas rin chen mtshan// nub phyogs na ni tshe dpag med// byang phyogs na ni rje sgra dbyangs// ngas deng yang dag dam pa'i
11a6(rgyud 'bum): chos/ / bkra shis gshegs pa'i mchog gyur pa// sdig pa thams cang zhi ba dang // las ngan rnams ni spong sel dang // sdug bsngal mang po nad 'byang zhing // bde ba tshad med rtag sbyin dang // ye shes thams
11a7(rgyud 'bum): cad rtsa ba dang / / yon tan kun rgyan bshad par bya// sems can dbang po ma tshang dang // tshe zad dang ni che nyams dang // sdig pa'i mtshan ma mngon snang dang // lha rnams kyis ni spangs pa dang // gnyen bshes
11b1(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis sdang ba dang / / 'khor rnams dang ni 'bral ba dang // phan tshun mi mthun rtsod pa dang // nor rnams 'thor zhing stor ba dang // gza' skar ma rungs gnod byas shing // byad stems log pas zin pa dang //
11b2(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan mang pos nyon mongs shing // sdug bsngal mang pos gzir ba dang // rmi lam ltas ngan mthong ba'i rgyus// mya ngan dag ni skyed gyur na// de yis khrus ni rab 'byor la// gos gtsang gsar pa bgos nas ni//
11b3(rgyud 'bum): zab mo sangs rgyas sgrub mdzad pa// mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di// rtse gcig sems ni mi g.yeng bar// bklags mnyan yongs su gzung bar bya// mdo sde 'di yi byin rlabs mthus// ye 'drog mang po med byed
11b4(rgyud 'bum): cing / / gzhan yang sdug bsngal sna tshogs bgegs// thams cad ma lus sel bar byed// 'jig rten skyong dang rgyal chen bzhi// blon po chen po 'khor rnams dang / gnod sbyin mang po tshad med rnams// rtse gcig
11b5(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis skyob par byed/ / spobs pa che ba'i lha mo dang // nai rany+dza nar gnas pa'i lha// lha mo 'phrog ma 'byung po'i ma// sra brtan sa yi lha mo dang // tshangs pa dbang po brgya byin dang // klu yi rgyal po mi 'am
11b6(rgyud 'bum): ci/ gser 'dab bya yi rgyal po dang // lha ma yin gyi 'khor rnams dang // 'di la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis// rang gi 'khor rnams khrid nas ni// nyin mtshan rtag tu mi 'bral bar// gang zag de la srung bar byed/
11b7(rgyud 'bum): zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul dang // sangs rgyas dgongs te gsungs pa'i bka'// mdo sde gang yin ngas bshad pa// bskal pa bye bar phrad dka' bas// gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas// gzhan la
12a1(rgyud 'bum): rgya cher ston pa dang / / gal te sems kyis yi rang dang // mchod pa bshams nas mchod byed na// de 'dra'i gang zag de dag ni// bskal pa tshad med snyed du yang // rtag par lha dang ma
12a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / klu la sogs pas mchod bkur 'gyur// 'di yi bsod nams tshad med pas// gang+gA 'iri bye snyed grangs las 'das// mdo sde 'di ni gang klog pa// yon tan 'di dag thob par 'gyur// phyogs
12a3(rgyud 'bum): bcu'i bcom ldan 'das rnam dang / / spyod zab byang chub sems dpa' rnams// mdo sde 'dzin la yongs bsrungs nas// sdug bsngal bgegs dang bral bar mdzad// mdo sde 'di ni gang mchod pas// snga ma bzhin du
12a4(rgyud 'bum): lus bkrus nas/ / zas dang me tog spos mchod cing // byams dang snying rje'i sems skyed cig/ mdo sde 'di ni nyan 'dod pas// sems gtsang dri ma med byas te// rtag par dga' ba'i sems bskyed na// yon tan
12a5(rgyud 'bum): mang po skye bar 'gyur/ / gang zhig gus pa'i sems dag gis// mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na// legs par mi yi 'gror skye zhing // sdug bsngal bgegs dang 'bral bar 'gyur// de ni dge ba'i rtsa sbyin pas//
12a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi// mdo sde 'di ni thos pa dang // 'gyod tshangs chos ni thos pa yin// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste
12a7(rgyud 'bum): dang po'o/ / / de nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba brgya
12b1(rgyud 'bum): tshad med pa rnams pa bsnyen bkur ba dang rim gro byas nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa zhig yod de/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba gcig tu dben par gnas pa de 'di snyam du/ rgyu gang da
12b2(rgyud 'bum): rkyen gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa sku tshe thung ste lo brgyad cur gyur snyam mo/ / gzhan yang 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa ltar na/ rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa gnyis kyis tshe ring po 'gyur ro zhes
12b3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ sems can gyi srog mi gcod pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang bza' ba dang btung ba yongasu btang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ni 'das pa'i bskal pa chen po bye ba khrag
12b4(rgyud 'bum): khrig brgya stong grangs med pa snyed du sems can gyi srog ma bcad cing / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam spyad pa dang / rtag par bza' ba dang btung bdag bkres pa'i sems can thams cad la sbyin pa btang ste/
12b5(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi sha dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang la sogs pa'ang yongs su btang nas rab tu tshim par mdzad na/ bza' ba dang btung ba gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo// byang chub sems dpa' des
12b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la de snyam du bsams pa'i tshe/ bcom lnga 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus/ de'i khang khyim de ma thag tu yangs shing rgya che ba dang / bkod pa dang ldan zhing yongs su gtsang ba dang / bai DUR+Ya
12b7(rgyud 'bum): sngon po dang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta ba bzhin du spos mchog dam pa'i dri lnga'i spos las 'das pa dag 'thul zhing gang ba dang / phyogs bzhin seng ge'i gdan
13a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog dam pa rin po che sna bzhi las mngon par grub pa/ lha'i rin pa cha'i gos kyis g.yogs pa dang / gzhan yang gangan de la pad+ma ngas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ tshad
13a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa dag rang gi ngang gis snang bar gyur te/ pad+ma de dag gi steng na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po shar phyogs kyi mi 'khrugs pa dang / lho phyogs kyi rin chen mtshan dang / nub phyogs kyi tshe
13a3(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa dang / byang phyogs kyi lha'i rnga sgra dbyangs bzhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po de dag so so nas gdan de la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs nas/ 'od zer chen po bkye bas
13a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa snyed kyi bar du'ang snang bas kun tu khyab
13a5(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad de/ lha'i me tog gi char yang mngon par phab/ lha'i rol mo'i sil snyan rnams kyang dkrol bar gyur te/ de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i glong 'di dang // stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni sem
13a6(rgyud 'bum): can ji snyed yod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus/ bde ba mchog dam pa myong bar gyur pas 'phongs pa ci'ang med par gyur to// lus kyi yan lag ma tshang ba dag ni tshang bar gyur/ long ba dag ni mthong
13a7(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur/ 'on pa rnams ni thos par gyur/ lkug pa dag ni smra bar gyur/ glen pa dag ni shes pa dang ldan par gyur/ sems 'khrugs bdag ni sem nyid thob par gyur/ bgo ba med pa dag ni gos dang ldan par gyur/ rab tu smad cing
13b1(rgyud 'bum): gshungs pa dag ni gzhan gyis bkur bar gyur/ dri ma dang bcas pa dag ni lus gtsang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phan 'dogs pa'i dngos po ngo mtshar rmad du che ba sngon ma byung ba rnams kyang mngon
13b2(rgyud 'bum): du blud par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po de dag mthong bas dga' mgu rangs par gyur nas thal mo sbyar te/ sem
13b3(rgyud 'bum): rtse gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan khyad par du 'phags pa dag pa rnam par bltas nas/ gzhan yang 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan yang sku tshe'i tshad
13b4(rgyud 'bum): 'ba' zhig la the tsom gyi sems skyes par gyur/ / tsa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan tshad med pa mnga' yang sku tshe thung ste lo brgyad cu kho na bzhugs par gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das bzhi po de dag
13b5(rgyud 'bum): gis/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu nged kyis ni bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na tshangs pa dang / bdud
13b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang gis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' shes shing dpog par 'gyur ba yang dag par ma gzigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po dedag
13b7(rgyud 'bum): gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan par bzhed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus/ 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
14a1(rgyud 'bum): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tsa dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed 'dus te
14a2(rgyud 'bum): lpags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gi khyim yongs su dag cing gya nom pa der zhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das bzhi po de dag gis 'khor mang po'i nang du/ de bzhin gshegs pa
14a3(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i chang ji snyed pa dag bstan par bzhed pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rgya mtsho thams cad kun gyi chu// thigs pa'i grangs ni shes rung ba/ shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// gang gis
14a4(rgyud 'bum): kyang ni bgrang mi nus/ / ri rab thams cad rdul rlags te// yungs 'bru bzhin du bgrang shes kyang // shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// gang gis kyang ni bgrang mi nus// sa chen rdul ni thams cad kun// rdul grangs ci yod
14a5(rgyud 'bum): shes rung yang / shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshang // gang gis kyang ni bgrang mi nus// gal te nam mkha'i tshad bcal te// mtha' kun dpag par rung srid kyang // shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshang // gang gis kyang ni dpag mi
14a6(rgyud 'bum): nus/ / mi zhig bskal pa bye bar gnas// mthas gtugs rtag par brtsis bgrangs kyang // bcom ldan 'das kyi sku tshe'i tshad// yongs su shes par mi 'gyur ro// sems can srog ni ma bcad tsang //
14a7(rgyud 'bum): bza' btung sbyin pa btang ba yi// rgyu ni rnam pa 'di gnyis kyis// sku tshe ring po brnyes pa yin// de bas thub pa chen po yi// sku tshe'i tshang ni shes par dka'// bskal pa'i mtha' ni med pa
14b1(rgyud 'bum): sngar/ sku tshe'i tshad kyang de bzhin no// mdzes pa'i tog khyod shes byos la// the tshom som nyi ma skyed cig/ rgyal ba'i sgra tshe'i tshad med pas// de yi grangs ni shes mi nus// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzas
14b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tog gis/ / de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad dpag tu med par bka' stsal pa thos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de dag lo 'di skad ces gsol to//
14b3(rgyud 'bum): tsa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa de lta bu'i sku tshe thung bar bstan par mdzad lags/ de na dacom ldan 'das bzhi po de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu bcom
14b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de snyigs ma lnga'i dus su 'jig rten du byung ba na/ mi rnams tshe lo brgya par gyur cing rang bzhin dma' ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba za zhing chung ba dang / mos pa med par gyur pas/ sems
14b5(rgyud 'bum): can de dag las phal cher bdag tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba po dang / log par lta ba dang / bdag dang bdag gir lta ba dang / rtag pa dang chad par lta/
14b6(rgyud 'bum): ba la sogs pa dang ldan pas/ sems can mang po de dag dang / mu stegs can mang po de dag la phan gdags shing yang dag pa'i shes pa bskyed nas/ myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs
14b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba'i phyir/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de lta bu'i sku tshe thung ba bstan pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa de sems can rnams kyis yongs su mya ngan las
15a1(rgyud 'bum): 'da' ba mthong bar gyur na/ mthong bar dka' ba'i 'du shes dang / mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
15a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mdo sde bstan pa dag myur du len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / kun chub par byas nas gzhan dag la yang dag par bstan pa dang / skur pa 'debs par mi 'gyur bar mdzad
15a3(rgyud 'bum): par bzhed pa'i phyir/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pas de lta bu'i sku tshe thung ba bstan pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag gis gal te de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba mthong
15a4(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur na/ gus pas rim gro'ang mi byed/ shin tu phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes kyang mi skyed la/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde zab mo dag kyang len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton
15a5(rgyud 'bum): du 'don pa dang / kun chub par byas nas gzhan dag la ston par yang mi byed pas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rtag par sangs rgyas mthong bas gus par mi byed pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/
15a6(rgyud 'bum): mi zhig gis bdag gi pha la nor dang rin po che mang zhing 'phel ba dag mthong bar gyur na/ nor rdzas dag la ngo mtshar dang mthong bar dka' ba'i 'du shes skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pha'i nor rdzas dag la rtag par
15a7(rgyud 'bum): 'du shes pa'i phyir ro/ / rigs kyi bu sems can mang po de dag kyang de bzhin du gal te de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba mthong bar gyur na/ ngo mtshar dang mthong bar dka' ba'i 'du shes skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir
15b1(rgyud 'bum): zhe na/ rtag par mthong ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig pha ma dbul zhing nor rdzas kyis 'phongs par gyur pa las/ mi dbul po de rgyal po'i pho brang ngam blon po chen po'i khyim dag tu phyin te/ bang mdzod rin po
15b2(rgyud 'bum): che sna tshogs dang nor rdzas kyis yongs su gang ba mthong bar gyur na/ ngo mtshar dang phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ de'i'o tshe mi dbul po de nor rdzas yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir/ sbyor ba'i thabs rgya cher bshams nas/
15b3(rgyud 'bum): le lo mi byed par yongs su brtson par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbul 'phongs pa spangs shing bde ba'i longs spyod nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu sems can mang po de dag kyang de bzhin du gal te de
15b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong bar gyur na/ mthong bar dka' ba'i 'du shes nas/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i du shes kyi bar dag kyang bskyed nas/ gzhan yang 'di snyam du de
15b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bskal pa grangs med tshad med pa snyed 'das pa na/ gdong 'jig rten du 'byung bas u dum para'i me tog bzhin du brgyal brgya lam na/ lan cig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhes sems
15b6(rgyud 'bum): can de dag ngo mtshar gyi bsam pa bskyed nas/ shin tu mthong bar dka' ba'i 'du shes skyed par byed de// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar gyur na'ang sems kyi gus pa dang dang bskyed par byed la/ yang
15b7(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i chos bstan pa thos par gyur na'ang yang dag pa'i bka' yin no snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ mdo sde ji snyed pa thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing skur pa 'debs par mi byed do// rigs kyi bu rgyu dang
16a1(rgyud 'bum): rkyen des na bcom ldan 'das de yun ring du 'jig rten na mi bzhugs par myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni de ltar thabs mkhyen nas
16a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa yin no/ / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po de dag gis de skad ces bka' stsal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes par
16a3(rgyud 'bum): tog byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong tshad med pa snyed dang / sems can khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dang lhan cig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba der dong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
16a4(rgyud 'bum): sman sngar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis gong du bstan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la rgyas
16a5(rgyud 'bum): por gsol pa dang / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po de dag kyang bya rgod phung po'i ri bcom ldan 'das shAkyang thub pa gang na ba der gshegs te/ so so'i phyogs ji lta ba bzhin du gdan la bzhugs nas//
16a6(rgyud 'bum): zhabs 'bring ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ rigs kyi bu deng khyed bcom ldan 'das shAkya grub pa ga la ba der dong na/ nged kyi tshig gis cung zad mi skung ngam/ cung zad mi gdung
16a7(rgyud 'bum): ngam/ bzhengs shing bzhugs pa yang ngam/ spyod lam thams cad du bde bar spyong ngam zhes bsnyun gsol cig/ gzhan yang 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad la phan
16b1(rgyud 'bum): gdags shing / mu ge'i bgegs yongs su bsal nas bde ba la 'god par bzhed pa'i phyir/ der gser 'od dam pa mdo sde shin tu zab mo 'chos kyi don bstan pa legs so legs so// bdag cag rnams
16b2(rgyud 'bum): kyang rjes su yi rang ngo zhes gsol cig/ de nas zhabs 'bring ba de dag so so nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyog gcig tu 'khod de/
16b3(rgyud 'bum): cig car bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// lha dang mi'i ston pa de dag tshad ma mchis pa'i gsung gis cung zad mi srung ngam/ cung zad mi gdung ngam/ bzhengs shing bzhugs pa yang ngam/ spyod lam
16b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du bde bar spyod dam zhes bstun gsol lags so/ / gzhan yang 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad la phan gdags shing / mu ge'i bgegs yongs su bsal nas bde
16b5(rgyud 'bum): ba la 'god par bzhed pa'i phyir/ der gser 'ong dam pa'i mdo sde shin tu zab mo'i chos kyi don bstan pa legs so legs so zhes gsung ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
16b6(rgyud 'bum): thub pas/ zham ring ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po de dag gis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bzhed pa'i phyir/ nga la yang dag pa'i
16b7(rgyud 'bum): chos bstan par bskul ba legs so legs so/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga ni rtag par bya rgod ri gnas nas// mdo sde rin chen 'di ni 'chang par mdzad// sems
17a1(rgyud 'bum): can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phyir/ / yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar bstan pa yin// so so'i skye bo log lha bskyed nas ni// ngas bstan dag la mngon par yid mi ches// de dag kun
17a2(rgyud 'bum): tu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ / yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar bstan pa yin// de nas 'khor 'dus pa chen po de nyid du/ bram ze ko'u di n+ya chos kyi slob dpon gyis lung bstan pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de bram ze'i 'khor brgya
17a3(rgyud 'bum): stong tshad med pa dag dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa bkas bshad pa thos pa dang / mchi ma blags te ngus nas
17a4(rgyud 'bum): mdun du 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par sems can rnams la byams pa dang thugs rje chen po
17a5(rgyud 'bum): mnga' ba ste/ thugs brtse bas phan 'dogs shing bde ba thob par mdzad de pha ma lta bur gyur pas gzhan de dang mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs mdzad pas zla ba yongs
17a6(rgyud 'bum): su rgyas pa ltar gsal zhing rnam par dag par gyur pa dang / mkhyen pa chen po gsal bar mdzad pas gdugs dang po shar ba lta bur gyur pa dang / sems can rnams la snyoms par gzigs par mdzad de/ sgrag can
17a7(rgyud 'bum): zin la ji lta ba bzhin du thugs brtse ba la mi snyoms pa mi mnga' ba zhig lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la smon lam zhig snang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pa dang
17b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus/ 'khor de nyid du li tsa byi gzhon nu sems can thams cad kyis mthong bar dga' ba zhes bya ba zhig 'dug par gyur pa des/ bram ze ko'u di n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so//
17b2(rgyud 'bum): kye bram ze chen po khyod deng bcom ldan 'das las smon lam ji lta bu zhig yongs su gnyer bar 'dod pa bdag gis khyod la sbyin par bya'o// bram zes smras pa/ kye gzhon nu bdag ni bla na med pa'i bcom ldan
17b3(rgyud 'bum): 'das la mchod pa byed 'dod pas/ deng de bzhin gshegs pa las ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam zhig gsol ba 'debs pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis sngon rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo
17b4(rgyud 'bum): gang la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam zhig thob nas gus pas rim gro dang mchod pa byas na/ gang zag de sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i nang du skyes nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin byed par 'gyur ro/
17b5(rgyud 'bum): zhes thos pas so// de nas gzhon nu des/ bram ze de la 'di skad ces smras so// gal te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes nas rnam par smin pa mchog la longs spyod par 'dod na/ sems rtse gcig tu
17b6(rgyud 'bum): gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po mnyan par bya ste/ / mdo sde 'di ni mdo sde bam cad kyi nang na mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa yin pas/ shes par dka' zhing 'jug par dka' bas/ nyan thos dang
17b7(rgyud 'bum): rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang khong du chud par mi nus so/ / mdo sde 'di ni bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa tshad med pa bskyed pa nas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par 'grub par byed de/
18a1(rgyud 'bum): deng bdag gis khyod la don gyi dngos po mdo tsam zhig bstan pa yin no// bram zes smras pa/ gzhon nu legs so// gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni shin tu zab cing mchog tu gyur pas shes
18a2(rgyud 'bum): par yang dka' la/ 'jug par yang dka' bas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang khong du rlung bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag cag mtha' 'khob kyi mi smad rim shes pa shin tu phra zhing chung bas rig par mi 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/
18a3(rgyud 'bum): de'i phyir deng bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsrel yubs 'bru tsam yongs su gnyer ba yin te/ rang gi gnas su khyer nas rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste/ gus pas mchod pa dang rim gro byas na tshe 'das
18a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'og tu brgya byin lha'i dbang po byas nas rtag par bde ba myong bar 'gyur na/ khyod kyis deng ci'i'o phyir bdag gi ched du rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa la smon lam 'di ci gsol ba 'debs par mi byed/ de skad
18a5(rgyud 'bum): ces smras pa dang / de'i tshe gzhon nu nges/ bu bram ze de la tshigs su bcad de 'di skad ces smras so// gang+gA'i 'bab chu drag po las// pad+ma dkar po skye 'gyur zhing // 'dzin mo dung ltar gyur pa dang // bya rog dmar por
18a6(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa 'am/ / gal te 'dzam bu ljon shing las// ta la'i 'bras bu chags pa dang // kha rdzu ra yi yal galas// a mra'i lo ma skye 'gyur ba// ya mtshan dngos po 'di dag ni// phan tshun rung bar 'gyur
18a7(rgyud 'bum): srid kyi/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsrel ni// mthar ni nams kyang dmigs mo 'gyur// gal te rus sbal spu las ni// gos mchog dam pa rab btags nas// grang che bgo bar rung gyur na// bcom ldan
18b1(rgyud 'bum): ring bsrel btsal bar bya/ / gal te sbrang bu'i rkang pa las// khang pa brtsegs ma byas gyur te// rab brtan mi g.yo gyur pa na// bcom ldan ring bsrel btsal bar bya// gal te chu yi rdza lu ka/ kha nas
18b2(rgyud 'bum): so kar skyes gyur nas/ / rin chen mtshon ltar rno gyur pa// bcom ldan ring bsrel btsal bar bya// gal te ri bong rwa thogs nas// them skas rab gtsang mngon bsgrubs te// mtho ris gnas su 'jog
18b3(rgyud 'bum): rung na/ / bcom ldan ring bsrel btsal bar bya// byi bas them skas 'di 'dzegs te// lha ma yin la sngo ba dang // nam mkha'i zla ba sgrib nus na// bcom ldan ring bsrel btsal bar bya// gal
18b4(rgyud 'bum): te sbrang bu ra ro nas/ / grong khyer kun tu rab rgyu zhing // khang khyim rgya cher byas gyur na// bcom ldan ring bsrel btsal bar bya// gal te bong bu'i mchu yi mdog/ bim pa'i 'bras ltar dmar 'gyur zhing /
18b5(rgyud 'bum): glu gar la ni mkhas gyur na// bcom ldan ring bsrel btsal bar bya// gal te bya rog 'ug pa gnyis// gnas gcig lham cig rab rtse zhing // de dag phan tshun mdza' gyur na// bcom ldan ring bsrel
18b6(rgyud 'bum): btsal bar bya/ / gal te pa la'i 'dab ma las// gdugs dang bla re mngon bsgrub te// char chen skyabs ni byas gyur na// bcom ldan ring bsrel btsal bar bya// gal te gru chen thams cad la/
18b7(rgyud 'bum): nor dang rin chen rab bkang ste// thang bu skam la 'gro nus na// bcom ldan ring bsrel btsal bar bya// gal te sbrang bu lcags phye mchus// spos kyi ri bo khyer nas ni// dga' dgur 'phur zhing 'gro 'gyur
19a1(rgyud 'bum): na/ bcom ldan ring bsrel btsal bar bya// de nas de'i tshe bram ze'i chos kyi slob dpon gyis lung bstan pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/ gzhon nu sems can thams cad kyis
19a2(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar dga' ba la tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ legs so gzhon nu chen po khyod// 'khor ni kun gyis bkra shis yin/ thabs mkhas pa yi sems kyis ni// bla med sangs rgyas lung bston thob// de bzhin
19a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i gzi chen gyis/ / 'jig rten dag ni skyob mdzad pas// khyod kyis rtse gcig nyon cig dang // deng bdag rim bzhin bshad par bya// sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam dka' bas// 'jig
19a4(rgyud 'bum): rten dag na mtshungs med pa/ / chos sku ngo bo rtag bzhugs pas// rnal 'byor sgom la khyad par med// sangs rgyas sku kun mtshungs pas na// chos gsungs pa yang de bzhin te// sangs rgyas
19a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams la mdzad mi mnga'/ / gzod ma nyid nas skye ba med// bcom ldan rdo rje'i sku yin yang // thabs kyis sprul pa'i sku ston pas// de phyir bcom ldan ring bsrel ni// yungs 'bru tsam yang yod ma yin// bcom
19a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan sha khrag sku min na/ ji ltar ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// thabs kyis sku gdung bzhag pa yin// chos sku yang dag sangs rgyas pas// chos dbyings de bzhin
19a7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa yin/ / yang dag sku ni 'di yin pas// de 'dra'i chos ni gsungs pa mdzad// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad shin tu ring bar bstan pa thob
19b1(rgyud 'bum): pas/ thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su sems bskyed nas/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dga' ba dang / mgub dang / rangs pa thob pas thams cad mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bca
19b2(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' ste// yang dag chos kyang nub mi 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// mya ngan 'da' bar bstan pa yin// bcom ldan bsam gyis mi khyab cing // sku mchog tha
19b3(rgyud 'bum): dang mtshan med kyang / / sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// bkod pa sna tshogs ston par mdzad// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs
19b4(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhi dang / skyes bu chen po gnyis dang / lha'i bu rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa mngon sum du thos nas/ yang 'dug pa'i stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas gus pas/
19b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te yang dag par 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing / ring bsrel yang mi mnga' ba zhig lag
19b6(rgyud 'bum): na/ ci'i slad du mdo sde las yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / sangs rgyas la ring bsrel mnga' bar gsungs shing / lha dang mi rnams kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba'i ched du/
19b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sku gdung mnga' bar bstan cing 'jig rten na bzhag pas/ lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod cing rim gro bgyis na bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur ro/
20a1(rgyud 'bum): zhes gsungs la/ deng ni ma mchis so zhes gsungs pas the tshom som nyi 'tshal bar gyur na/ bcom 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te rgya cher rnam par phye bar gsol
20a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog dang 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing ring bsrel yod do/
20a3(rgyud 'bum): zhes gsungs pa ni dgongs pa'i dbang gis gsungs pa yin pas/ 'di ltar de'i don gang yin pa sems rtse gcig tu nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'di ltar
20a4(rgyud 'bum): c hos rnam pa bcu de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi tshul gyis mthar phyin pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yod par gsungs pa gang yin pa shes par 'gyur bar rig
20a5(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / bcu gang zhe na/ dang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa ma lus par spangs shing zad pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// gnyis pa ni
20a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can ngo bo nyid med pa dang / chos ngo bo nyid med par legs par thugs su chud pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// gsum pa ni lus kyi gnas dang / chos
20a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi gnas yongs su gyur pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// bzhi pa ni sems can rnams la don mdzad pa'i rgyu dang rkyen rang gi ngang gis nye bar zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das
20b1(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya'o/ / lnga pa ni de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid tha dang med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi chos kyi sku mngon sum du brnyes pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// drug pa ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa
20b2(rgyud 'bum): la ngo bo nyid gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// bdun pa ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba thugs su chud nas rnam par dag pa mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir/ yongs su
20b3(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ / brgyad pa ni chos thams cad la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med par rnal 'byor legs par bsgoms pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// dgu pa ni de
20b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid kyi yang dag pa'i mtha'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// bcu pa ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang mya
20b5(rgyud 'bum): ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid la bye brag med pa brnyes pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yod par bstan pa'i chos rnam pa bcu zhe
20b6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ 'di ltar yang chos rnam pa bcus de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi tshul
20b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis mthar phyin pa'i yong su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yod par gsungs pa gang yin pa shes par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ / bcu gang zhe na/ dang po ni nyon mong pa thams cad ni 'dod pas gzhi byas pa yin pas
21a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa las skyes pa yin la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dod pa yongs su bcad pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs
21a2(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams nyon mongs pa'i 'dod pa rnams yongs su bcad pas chos 'ga' yang len par mi mdzad la/ len par mi mdzad pa'i phyir gshegs pa'ang mi mnga'/ byon pa'ang mi mnga' zhing len pa mi mnga' ba'i
21a3(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// gsum pa ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la gshegs pa dang byon pa mi mnga' zhing / len pa mi mnga' ba gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku skye ba med cing
21a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gag pa med pa yin pas/ skye ba dang 'gag pa med par gyur pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// bzhi pa ni skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshig gis brjod par bya ba ma yin te/
21a5(rgyud 'bum): tshig gi lam yongs su chad par gyur pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// lnga pa ni bdag dang gang zag med kyi/ chos tsam 'ba' zhig skye 'gag tu gyur pa'i gnas su gyur pa brnyes pa'i phyir
21a6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ / drug pa ni nyon mongs pa dang nye bar nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni glo bur gyi rdul yin la/ chos nyid gang yin pa de ni bdag po yin te/ 'gro ba med cing
21a7(rgyud 'bum): 'ong ba med par sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs su chud pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// bdun pa ni de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa yin la/ gzhan thams cad ni yang dag pa
21b1(rgyud 'bum): ma yin pas/ yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid yin la/ de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa yin pas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// brgyad pa
21b2(rgyud 'bum): ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de la ni spros pa med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis yang dag pa'i mtha'a'i chos mngon sum du gyur nas spros pa gtan du bcad pas na/ yongs su mya ngan las
21b3(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa zhes bya'o/ / dgu pa ni skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa yin la/ skye ba gang yin pa de ni mi bden pa yin pas/ byis pa blun po rnams 'khor bar bying zhing 'dod pas khyer ba yin na/
21b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni yang dag par mi bden pa mi mnga' bas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// bcu pa ni yang dag pa'i chos ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni rkyen las byung ba yin la
21b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni rkyen las byung ba ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa yin pas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o//
21b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yod par bstan pa'i chos rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ yang chos rnam pa
21b7(rgyud 'bum): b cu de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi tshul gyis mthar phyin pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yod par gsungs pa gang yin pa shes par 'gyur bar rig
22a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / bcu gang zhe na/ dang po ni de bzhin gshegs pas sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la bdag dang bdag gi ba med par legs par thugs su chud pas/ sbyin pa dang 'bras bu/
22a2(rgyud 'bum): de la log par rtog pa gtan du bsal nas zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims dang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu la bdag dang bdag
22a3(rgyud 'bum): gi ba med par legs par thugs su chud pas/ tshul khrims dang 'bras bu de la log par rtog pa gtan du bsal nas zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// gsum pa ni de bzhin
22a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pas bzod pa dang bzod pa'i 'bras bu la bdag dang bdag gi ba med par legs par thugs su chud pas/ bzod pa dang 'bras bu de la log par rtog pa gtan du bsal nas zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir/
22a5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// bzhi pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas brtson 'grus dang brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu la bdag dang bdag gi ba med par legs par thugs su chud pas/ brtson 'grus dang
22a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu de la log par rtog pa gtan du bsal nas zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// lnga pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas bsam gtan dang bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu la bdag dang bdag
22a7(rgyud 'bum): gi ba med par legs par thugs su chud pas/ bsam gtan dang 'bras bu de la log par rtog pa gtan du bsal nas zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// drug pa ni de bzhin gshegs
22b1(rgyud 'bum): pas shes rab dang shes rab kyi 'bras bu la bdag dang bdag gi ba med par legs par thugs su chud pas/ shes rab dang 'bras bu de la log par rtog pa gtan du bsal nas zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan
22b2(rgyud 'bum): las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ / bdun pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dang sems can ma yin pa thams cad dang / chos thams cad la ngo bo nyid med par thugs su chud bas/ log par rtog pa gtan du bsal nas
22b3(rgyud 'bum): zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// brgyad pa ni gang gis bdag nyid la sred cing mngon par zhen pa de ni yongs su tshol bar byed la/ yongs su tshol ba'i phyir ni sdug bsngal mang po myong bar
22b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba yin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bdag nyid la sred pa spangs pa'i phyir yongs su tshol ba gtan du bcad de/ yong su tshol ba mi mnga' ba'i phyir/ yong su mya ngan las 'dra ba zhes bya'o// dgu pa ni 'dus byas kyi tshe/
22b5(rgyud 'bum): tham cad ni kradra dang tshad yod pa'i nal/ 'dus ma byas kyi tshe gang yin pa de ni grang dang tshad spangs pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus byas spangs shing 'dus ma byas kyi chos mngon du mdzad pas grangs dang tshad mi mnga' ba'i
22b6(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// bcu pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dang chos kyi ngo bo nyid thams cad stong zhing / stong pa nyid las gud na stong pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de
22b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid la yang dag pa'i chos kyi sku yin par thugs su chud pa'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa yod par bstan pa'i chos rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o//
23a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba gang yin pa de'ang / ci ngo mtshar rmang du byung ba ma yin nam/ gzhan yang ngo mtshar gyi chos rnam pa bcu dang
23a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'khor ba ni nyes dmigs dang bcas pa yin la/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni nye bar zhi ba yin yang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las
23a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa mnyam pa nyid du mkhyen pa'i phyir/ 'khor bar mi gnas par yang mi 'gyur la/ mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas par yang mi mdzad pas/ sems can rnams la yongs su skyo ba mi skyed pa gang yin pa de ni/
23a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can rnams la 'di snyam du byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag ni phyin ci log gi lta ba spyod pas/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis dkris shing nyon mongs
23a5(rgyud 'bum): par gyur pas/ ngas deng rnam par phye ste khong du chud par byas nas rnam par thar par bya'o snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon gyi byams pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus/ sems can de dag gi dbang po dang / rang bzhin
23a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rtog pa mi bskyed par yang / rang gi ngang gis yongs su sgrol bar mdzad cing / phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bar du yang dag pa'i bstan pa bshad nas phan 'dogs
23a7(rgyud 'bum): shing dka' bar mdzad pa la/ mthar thug pa med pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la ngas deng gsung rab yan
23b1(rgyud 'bum): lag bcu gnyis pa bstan nas/ sems can la phan 'dogs par bya'o snyam pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga' mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon gyi byams pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus/ phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bar du sems can de dag la rgya
23b2(rgyud 'bum): cher bstan pa mdzad pa la/ mthar thug pa med pa gang yin pa ni de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la ngas deng grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal de dag tu song ste/ rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang /
23b3(rgyud 'bum): bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i pho brang dang khyim dag tu bsod snyoms blang bar bya'o snyam pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga' mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi spyod pa goms par
23b4(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa'i mthus/ rang gi ngang gis de dag tu gshegs nas phan pa'i dngos po mdzad cing / bsod snyoms slong ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la bkres pa dang /
23b5(rgyud 'bum): skom pa dang / bshang gci dang / nyam chung ba'i mtshan ma'ang mi mnga' la/ bsod snyoms slong bar mdzad kyang bshos gsol ba ma mnga' zhing / rnam par rtog pa'ang mi mnga' mod kyi/ 'on kyang rang gi ngang gis sems can rnams
23b6(rgyud 'bum): la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ bshos gsol ba mnga' ba'i mtshan ma ston pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la sems can mang po 'di dag la rab dang / 'bring dang / mtha'
23b7(rgyud 'bum): ma yod pa de dag gi dbang po dang rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga' mod kyi/ 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' bar/ de dag gi snod dang dbang po'i
24a1(rgyud 'bum): skyon ji lta ba bzhin du shin tu 'tsham par de dag la chos ston par mdzad pa gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa zhes bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa la sems can 'di dag ni ngal
24a2(rgyud 'bum): bkur sti dang rim gro mi byed cing rtag par nga la smod pa'i tshig 'byin par byed pas/ de dag dang lhan cig tu gtam smra bar mi bya'o// sems can 'di dag ni de la bkur sti dang rim gro byed cing rtag par nga'i bsngags
24a3(rgyud 'bum): pa rjod par byed pas/ ngas de dag dang lhan cig tu gtam smra bar bya'o snyam pa'i dgongs pa mnga' mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas byams pa dang thugs rje'i dgongs pa mnyam pa bskyed nas/ gnyis su med
24a4(rgyud 'bum): par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa zhes bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byams sdang dang / nga rgyal dang / 'dod pa dang / ser sna dang / nyon mongs pa rnams mi mnga' mod kyi/ 'on kyang de
24a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa rtag par rab tu dben pa la dgyes shing / 'dod pa chung ba dang / 'du 'dzi spangs pa la bsngags pa brjod par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs
24a6(rgyud 'bum): pa ni chos gcig tsam yang mi mkhyen pa 'am legs par thugs su ma chud pa mi mnga' bas/ thams cad du me long lta bu'i ye shes mngon sum du gyur cing rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs
24a7(rgyud 'bum): pas sems can de dag gi las kyi dngos po mngon par 'du byed pa gzigs nas/ de dag gi yid dang mthun par 'jug cing thabs mkhyen pas drangs te/ nges par 'byung ba thob par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni de
24b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa zhes bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa la ni gal te sems can kha cog phyug cing longs spyod dang ldan par gyur pa gzigs na'ang dgyes pa skye bar mi 'gyur la/ de dag rgung cing 'phongs
24b2(rgyud 'bum): par gyur pa gzigs na'ang yongs su gdung ba skye bar mi 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag yang dag pa'i spyod pa mngon par sgrub pa gzigs par gyur na/ thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i
24b3(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje chen pos rang gi ngang gis yongs su skyob cing sdud par mdzad pa dang / gal te sems can de dag log pa'i spyod pa mngon par sgrub pa gzigs par gyur na/ thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen pos rang gi
24b4(rgyud 'bum): nga gis yongs su skyob cing sdud par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni de lta bu'i
24b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag pa'i mdzad pa dpag tu med pa mnga' bar ston pa yin par rig par bya zhing / khyod kyis 'di dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya'o// res 'ga' yongs su mya ngan
24b6(rgyud 'bum): las 'das pa yod par mthong ba gang yin pa de'ang thabs mkhyen pas bstan pa yin la/ ring bsrel bzhag nas sems can rnams kyis bkur sti deng rim gro byas te mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba'ang / de bzhin gshegs
24b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byams pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthu las gyur pa yin pas/ gang gis mchod pa byas pa de dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi khom pa brgyad dang bral zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
25a1(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad nas dge ba'i sems stor bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan zhing myur du nges par byung nas/ 'khor ba dag gis
25a2(rgyud 'bum): blangs shing 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas/ 'di lta bu'i spyod pa gya nom pa gang yin pa de khyed kyis nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya zhing bag med par mi bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/ bcom ldan
25a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das las mngon sum du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba dang shin tu zab pa'i mdzad pa bkas bshad pa thos nas/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces bdag ni deng gdong de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen po
25a4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba dang / ring bsrel bzhag pa'ang sems can rnams la sman par bgyi ba lags par khong du chud pas/ lus dang sems dga' mgu rangs shing ngo mtshar rmad du gyur to zhes gsol to//
25a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa na/ sems can tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa snyed mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par
25a6(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi pa'ang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'dug pa'i stan las langs te slar sngon gyi gnas
25a7(rgyud 'bum): su song ngo / / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / gser 'od ngam par chos
25b1(rgyud 'bum): tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las bam po gnyis pa/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' snying po 'khor mang po'i nang nas 'dug pa'i stan las langs te/ blagos
25b2(rgyud 'bum): phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ gser dang rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyal
25b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs mchog dam pas mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ji ltar de bzhin
25b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rnams kyi shin tu zab pa'i gsang ba dag la chos bzhin du mngon par bsgrub par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod
25b5(rgyud 'bum): la rnam par phye ste bstan par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sku rnam pa gsum mnga' ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ sprul pa'i sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / chos kyi sku gang yin pa'o//
25b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar sku rnam pa gsum po 'di dag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub phun sum tshogs pa yongs su sdud par byed de/ gang gis yang dag par rtogs shing khong du chud par gyur na/ myur du 'khor
25b7(rgyud 'bum): ba las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar sprul pa'i sku khong du chud par bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa na/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du
26a1(rgyud 'bum): chos rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par bsgrubs so/ / de ltar mngon par bsgrubs pa'ang rnal 'byor yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du mngon par bsgrubs pas/ rnal 'byor bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ni mngab
26a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po brnyes la/ mnga' chen po brnyes pa'i mthus ni sem can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / sem can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba dang / sems can gyi khams ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad thugs su chud pas/ dus la 'ang mi gzhes shing dus dang gnas
26a3(rgyud 'bum): las yol bar mi mdzad pas/ dus dang 'thun zhing spyod pa dang mthun par rjes su mthun pa'i chos ston pa dang sku rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa gang yin pa de ni sprul pa'i sku zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas
26a4(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku khong du chud par bya zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mngon par rtog pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / don dam pa'i bden pa bstan nas 'khor
26a5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ro gcig pa nyid du shes par bya ba'i phyir dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su bsal nas/ 'jigs shing skrag pa dang rab tu dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' med pa'i
26a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhi mdzad pa'i phyir dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang rjes su mthun par mdzad pa'i phyir/ sku gang gis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
26a7(rgyud 'bum): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbu dang rgyab kyi 'od yongs su rdzogs pa ston pa gang yin pa de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
26b1(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar chos kyi sku khong du chud par bya zhe na/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa yongs su bsal nas/ dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kho na dang ldan par gyur pa gang
26b2(rgyud 'bum): yin pa de ni chos kyi sku zhes bya'o/ / sku snga ma rnam pa gnyis ni btags pa tsam du yod pa yin la/ sku gsum pa 'di ni yang dag par yod pa yin te/ sku snga ma gnyis kyi rtsa bar gyur pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi
26b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin nyid dang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par sangs rgyas thams cad la gud na chos gzhan mi mnga' ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad ni mkhyen pa phun sum tshogs par gyur na/ nyon mongs pa thams cad
26b4(rgyud 'bum): gtan du nye bar zhi zhing zad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa rnam par dag pa brnyes par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyis ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sdud par 'gyur ro//
26b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad ni bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i mthar byon pa yin pas/ bdag la phan 'dogs pa ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid do// gzhan la phan 'dogs pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes so// /
26b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag la phan 'dogs par mdzad pa la mnga' brnyes nas/ mdzad pa mtha' yas pa rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ de lta bas na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bye brag tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med
26b7(rgyud 'bum): cing / mtha' med pa snyed yod par rnam par phye ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa la brten nas/ nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs dang / las kyi rgyu rnam pa sna tshogs dang
27a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa de bzhin du/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la brten nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rang sa
27a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par mdzad do// chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la brten nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rang dbang thob
27a3(rgyud 'bum): nas pun sum tshogs par 'gyur bas/ 'di ni mchog tu bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' lar mo bris te rgyan du byed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no//
27a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la brten nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang
27a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes gnyis las rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' bar yang / rang gi ngang gis mdzad pa'i dngos po dag phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa
27a6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar smon lam la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir/ mdzad pa'i dngo bo rnam pa sna tshog phun sumachog par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mdzad pa'i dngos po de
27a7(rgyud 'bum): dag yongs su grub pa la mnga' brnyes pa'ang de bzhin no/ / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug kyang / sngon gyi smon lam la brten
27b1(rgyud 'bum): nas ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ bya ba mang po rnams la mngon par 'du byed do// de bzhin du chos gnyis po dag la rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' yang // rang shing gis mdzad pa dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
27b2(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma dang zla ba la'ang rnam par rtog pa med de/ chu dang me long la'ang rnam par rtog pa med/ 'od snang ba la'ang rnam par rtog pa med mod kyi/ 'on kyang gsum 'dus pa
27b3(rgyud 'bum): las gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la'ang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' mod kyi/ 'on kyang smon lam la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir/ sems can
27b4(rgyud 'bum): skal ba dang ldan pa dag la longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku nyi zla'i gzugs brnyan 'dus pa las snang ba bzhin du ston par mdzad do// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na tshad med dpag tu med pa'i
27b5(rgyud 'bum): chu dang me long dag 'od snang ba la brten pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' gzugs brnyan mtshan ma tha dad pa rnam sna tshogs ston par byed kyang / nam mkha'i mtshan ma med pa nyid do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du slob ma rnams
27b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dul ba gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan yin te/ smon lam gyi mthus sku rnam pa gnyis la mtshan ma rnam pa sna tshogs snang yang / chos kyi sku la ni tha dad pa'i mtshan ma mi mnga' 'o// rigs kyi bu sku
27b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis po de dag la brten nas ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bstan to/ / chos kyi sku de la brten nas ni lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bstan to// de ci'i phyir
28a1(rgyud 'bum): zhe na/ chos gzhan thams cad ni mthar zad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// sku gsum po 'di dag la brten nas ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bstan//
28a2(rgyud 'bum): tosku gnyis kyi phyir mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas te/ chos kyi sku las gud na'ang sangs rgyas gzhan med pas so// ci'i phyir sku gnyis mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas she na/ sku gnyis po de dag ni btag
28a3(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam yang dag pa ma yin pas skad cig mar skye zhing 'gag pa dang bcas pas nges par mi gnas pa'i phyir dang / yang dang yang du 'byung zhing nges pa med pa'i phyir ro// chos kyi sku ni de lta ma yin pas/ de'i
28a4(rgyud 'bum): phyir sku gnyis po mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas so/ / chos kyi sku ni gnyis su med pas/ de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas te/ de bas na sku gsum po de dag la brten nas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa
