28a5(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu so so'i skye bo thams cad ni mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan pa'i phyir/ 'ching ba dang bcas shing sgrib pa dang bcas sku gsum po dag thag ring du spong zhing / sku gsum po dag dang nye bar mi 'gyur
28a6(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / gsum gang zhe na/ kun tu btags pa'i mtshan nyid dang / gzhan gyi dbang las byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do// 'di ltar mtshan nyid 'di dag ma shes pa'i phyir dang / zhi bar ma gyur pa'i
28a7(rgyud 'bum): phyir dang / yongs su ma dag pa'i phyir te/ de lta bas na sku gsum po dag dang nye bar ma gyur pa yin no// 'di ltar mtshan nyid gsum po 'di dag shes shing nye bar zhi ba dang yongs su dag par gyur pa'i phyir/
28b1(rgyud 'bum): de lta bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku gsum dang ldan par gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byis pas sa'i skye bo rnams ni sems rnam pa gsum po 'di dag ma spangs pa'i phyir/ sku gsum po dag thag ring du
28b2(rgyud 'bum): spangs nas nye bar mi 'gyur ba yin no/ / gsum gang zhe na/ bya ba slong ba'i sems dang / rtsa ba la brten pa'i sems dang / rtsa ba'i sems gang yin pa'o// thul bar byed pa'i lam rnams la brten nas ni
28b3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba slong ba'i sems zad par 'gyur ro/ / chos kyis slong ba'i lam la brten nas ni/ rtsa ba la brten pa'i sems zad par 'gyur ro// mchog tu gyur pa'i lam la brten nas ni/ rtsa ba'i sems zad
28b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / bya ba slong ba'i sems nye bar zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir ni/ sprul pa'i sku ston par 'gyur ro// rtsa ba la rten pa'i sems nye bar zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir ni/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par 'gyur
28b5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / rtsa ba'i sems nye bar zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir ni/ chos kyi sku 'thob par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gsum dang ldan par gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams
28b6(rgyud 'bum): cad ni sku dang po'i dbang gis sangs rgyas rnams dang mdzad pa mtshungs pa dang / sku gnyis pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyas rnams dang dgongs pa mtshungs pa dang / sku gsum pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyas rnams dang sku
28b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs par gyur pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku dang po gang yin pa de ni sems can gyi mos pa'i rjes su rnam pa mang po dang ldan pa'i phyir// mtshan nyid sna tshogs ston par mdzad pas/ de'i
29a1(rgyud 'bum): phyir mang por bstan pa yin no/ / sangs rgyas kyi sku gnyis pa gang yin pa de ni slob ma rnams yid gcig tu gyur pa'i phyir/ mtshan nyid gcig kho na ston par mdzad pas/ de'i phyir gcig tu
29a2(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa yin no/ / sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum pa gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma gnyis kyis rnam pa thams cad kun tu khyab cing / mtshan nyid du 'dzin pa'i spyod yul ma yin pas na/ de'i phyir gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha
29a3(rgyud 'bum): dad pa'ang ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu dang po gang yin pa de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la brten nas rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro/ sku gnyis pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku la brten nas snang bar 'gyur ro//
29a4(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni yang dag par yod pa ma yin pas rten pa'i gnas ci'ang mi mnga' 'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar chos gsum po de dag ni rtag pa'i don dang ldan pa'i phyir ni rtag pa zhes bstan la/ mi rtag/
29a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i don dang ldan pa'i phyir ni mi rtag pa zhes bstan te/ sprul pa'i sku gang yin pa de ni rtag par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing / de dang de dag tu rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du thabs mkhas pa ston pa la rgyun chad med pa'i phyir
29a6(rgyud 'bum): de lta bas na rtag pa zhes bstan to/ / rtsa ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / phun sum tshogs pa'i mdzad pa chen po sngon du mi 'byung ba'i phyir/ de lta bas na mi rtag pa zhes bstan to// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gang yin
29a7(rgyud 'bum): pa de ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos rnams yongs su sdud cing 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / sems can zad pa med pa bzhin du/ mdzad pa la'ang zad pa mi
29b1(rgyud 'bum): mnga' ba'i phyir rtag pa zhes bstan to/ / rtsa ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / phun sum tshogs pa'i mdzad pa chen po mngon du mi 'byung ba'i phyir mi rtag pa zhes bstan to// chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i
29b2(rgyud 'bum): chos kyang ma yin la/ tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid mi mnga' zhing rtsa ba yin par gyur pa'i phyir dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir rtag pa zhes bstan to// rigs kyi bu rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes las gud na
29b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu gyur pa'i ye shes med la/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na' mchog tu gyur pa'i spyod yul med pas/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de dang / shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de'i de bzhin nyid
29b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa gnyis po gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma yin te/ de'i phyir chos kyi sku ni shes rab rnam par gyur pa'i phyir dang / 'gog pa rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir/ gnyis rnam
29b5(rgyud 'bum): par dag par gyur pa yin pas/ des na chos kyi sku ni rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pa yin no// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu sku gsum po dag tu rnam par dbyen tha dad pa rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ sprul pa'i sku
29b6(rgyud 'bum): yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa'ang yod/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin la/ sprul pa'i sku ma yin pa'ang yod/ sprul pa'i sku yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin pa'ang yod/ sprul pa'i sku'ang
29b7(rgyud 'bum): ma yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa'ang yod do// sprul pa'i sku yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'ongs pa'i 'o/
30a1(rgyud 'bum): tu smon lam la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir/ rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du phan 'dogs pa gang yin pa de ni sprul pa'i sku zhes bya'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin la/ sprul pa'i sku ma
30a2(rgyud 'bum): yin pa gang zhe na/ sa'i mdun rol gyi sku gang yin pa'o// sprul pa'i sku'ang yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'ang yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas
30a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku gang yin pa'o/ / sprul pa'i sku'ang ma yin la/ longs rdzogs pa'i sku'ang ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sku gang yin pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pas
30a4(rgyud 'bum): rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro/ / gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba'ang gang zhe na/ chos kyi sku de la mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba gnyis ka med pas yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin/ gcig pa'ang ma
30a5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma yin// grangs kyang ma yin/ grangs ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ snang ba'ang ma yin/ mun pa'ang ma yin te/ de lta bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes des ni mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid kyi gnas kyang
30a6(rgyud 'bum): mi gzigs/ yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin pa'ang mi gzigs/ gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma yin pa'ang mi gzigs/ grangs kyang ma yin/ grangs ma yin pa'ang mi gzigs/
30a7(rgyud 'bum): snang ba'ang ma yin/ mun pa'ang ma yin pa'ang mi gzig pas/ de'i phyir spyod yul rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa la rnam par brtag tu'ang mi rung la/ bar zhes bya ba med kyang 'gog
30b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang lam gyi gzhi byed pa'i phyir/ chos kyi sku 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sku 'di'i rgyu dang / rkyen dang / spyod yul dang
30b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas dang / 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dpag par dka' ba'i phyir gang gis khong du chud par gyur na/ sku de ni theg pa chen po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o//
30b3(rgyud 'bum): sku 'di nyid la brten nas dang po bskyed pa'i sems kyang thob par 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor sgom pa'i sems kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// rtse gcig/
30b4(rgyud 'bum): gis thogs pa'i sems dang / rdo rje'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gya nom pa tshad med cing mtha' med pa thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar
30b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / chos kyi sku 'di la brten nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po rnams kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi sku 'di la brten nas ye shes chen po thams cad rab tu snang bar
30b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir sku gnyis po ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab la brten nas mngon du snang bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi sku 'di lta bu 'di ni rang gi ngo bo nyid la gnas pas rtag pa zhes kyang bstan to//
30b7(rgyud 'bum): nga zhes kyang bstan to// ting nge 'dzin chen po la gnas pa'i phyir skyid pa zhes kyang bstan to// ye shes chen po la gnas pa'i phyir yongs su gtsang ba zhes kyang bstan te/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs
31a1(rgyud 'bum): ba ni rtag par bzhugs pa dang / mnga' dbang brnyes pa dang / bde skyid pa dang / yongs su gtsang bar gyur pa yin no// ting nge 'dzin chen po la brten nas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting
31a2(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos dran pa chen po la sogs pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa thams cad dang / byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po dang / gzungs thams cad dang / mtshan
31a3(rgyud 'bum): par shes pa thams cad dang / dbang thams cad dang / chos mnyam pa thams cad yang dag par sdud cing / de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ye shes chen po 'di
31a4(rgyud 'bum): la brten nas stobs bcu dang / bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos brgya brgyad cu dang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyang
31a5(rgyud 'bum): rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che la brten nas rin po che tshad med cing mtha' med pa rnam pa sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ ting nge 'dzin chen po'i rin po che
31a6(rgyud 'bum): dang shes rab chen po'i rin po che la brten nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos gya nom pa tshad med cing mtha' med pa sna tshogs mngon sum du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i chos kyi sku'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
31a7(rgyud 'bum): shes rab gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma thams cad las yang dag par 'das shing / mtshan ma la mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur bas rnam par brtag tu mi rung la/ rtag pa'ang ma yin la/ chang pa'ang ma yin pas
31b1(rgyud 'bum): dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o/ / rnam par rtog pa mnga' yang ngo bo nyid la rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' 'o// gsum du bgrang ba yod kyang ngo bo nyid la gsum du 'gyur ba med pas 'phel ba'ang med/ 'grib pa'ang med de
31b2(rgyud 'bum): rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta bur gzung ba med/ 'dzin pa'ang med pas/ chos kyi sku de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par grol ba'i gnas 'chi bdag gi rgyal po'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ skye shi'i'o mun pa las mngon pa
31b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa sems can thams cad kyis sgrub par mi nus shing bgrod par mi nus pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzhugs pa'i gnas su gyur pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mi
31b4(rgyud 'bum): zhig gser 'dod pa de dag tu gser gyi rje yongs su btsal ba las/ gser gyi rdo de rnyed nas zhib mor btags te snying po gang yin pa blangs nas/ so mal du bzhus btul nas/ gser yongs su dag pa rnyed par gyur
31b5(rgyud 'bum): na yid bzhin du bsgyur te/ gdu bu la sogs pa rgyan gyi rnam pa sna tshogs su byas nas spyod pa mang po dang ldan par gyur kyang / gser gyi rang bzhin la ni 'gyur ba ci'ang med do// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/
31b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis rnam par grol ba'i mchog yongs su gnyer ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa'i dge ba mngon par bsgrubs pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de'i slob ma'i 'khor mthong nas
31b7(rgyud 'bum): nye bar bsnyen te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba ni gang lags/ mi dge ba ni gang lags/ yang dag pa'i rnal 'byor bsgoms pas rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa
32a1(rgyud 'bum): @thob par 'gyur ba ni gang lags zhes gsol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / slob ma'i 'khor rnams de skad du zhu ba gsol ba gzigs par gyur na/ de'i tshe 'di snyam du rigs
32a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'dzin rnam par dag pa yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i chos yongs su nyan par 'dod pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas/ de la rnam par phye ste bstan pa nyid kyis go bar mdzad
32a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur bas/ de thos nas kyang yang dag pa'i dran pas mi brjed par bzung ste/ rnal 'byor sgom pa'i sems bskyed nas/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs thob nas le lo'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal te/ sgrib pa
32a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yongs su sbyong bar byed pas/ bslab pa'i gnas rnams la ma gus pa spangs nas/ rgod pa dang 'gyod pa'i sems nye bar zhi bar bya ste/ sa dang po la 'jug par 'gyur bas/ sa dang po'i sems la brten
32a5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas/ sa gnyis par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ro// sa der yang rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas/ sa gsum par 'jug par
32a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sa der yang sems mnyen zhing rnam par byang ba'i sgrub pa yongs su bsal nas/ sa bzhi par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang thabs mkhas pa'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas/ sa
32a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / sa der yang ngan dam pa dang kun rdzob tu mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas/ sa drug par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang mtshan ma la spyod pa'i mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongs su
32b1(rgyud 'bum): bsal nas/ sa bdun par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der ya mtshan ma nye bar zhi bar mi mthong ba'i slob pa yongs su bsal nas/ sa brgyad par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang skye ba'i mtshan mar mo mthong
32b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas/ sa dgu par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang mngon par shes pa drug go slob pa yongs su bsal nas/ sa bcu par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang shes bya'i sgrib
32b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang rtsa ba'i sems yongs su bsal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par gyur pa'i
32b4(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa dang / sdug bsngal rnam par dag pa dang / mtshan ma rnam par dag pa gang yin pa'o// 'di lta ste/ gser yang dag par
32b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhus sbyangs brdungs te/ dri ma med par bya ba'ang gser gyi rang bzhin gzod ma nyid nas rnam par dag pa gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir/ gser gyi ngo bo nyid yongs su dag pa'i dbang gis gser med par
32b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi rung ngo / / 'di lta ste/ dper na nu rnyog ma can yongs su dngas te/ dri ma med par bya ba'ang chu'i rang bzhin gzod ma nyid nas yongs su dag pa gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir/ chu med par
32b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro zhes byar mi rung ba de bzhin du/ chos kyi sku'ang nyon mongs pa dang 'dres par gyur pas/ sdug bsngal ba dang kun 'byung ba yongs su bsal nas/ bag chags lhag ma med par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rang
33a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gzod ma nyid nas rnam par dag par gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir/ ngo bo nyid med par 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar mi rung ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la du ba dang / sprin dang /
33a2(rgyud 'bum): rdul dang / lug rna rnams kyis bsgribs pa dag las gal te yongs su dang bar gyur na/ nam mkha'i khams yongs su dag par gyur pas/ nam mkha' med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi rung ba de bzhin du/ chos
33a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi sku'ang sdug bsngal mang po thams cad yongs su zad pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa zhes brjod kyang / ngo bo nyid med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi rung ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu zhig gnyid log pa'i rmi
33a4(rgyud 'bum): lam na/ chu chen pos khyer ba las rkang lag bskyod de/ lus dang sems le lo ma byas pa'i phyir/ chu bo thad kar bcad de pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par mthong ba las/ rmi lam sad nas chu bo dang / tshu rol
33a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / pha rol gyi 'gram tha dad par 'gyur ba mi mthong yang / sems med do zhes bya bar mi rung ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor ba'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su zad nas/ blo rnam par dag par
33a6(rgyud 'bum): gyur kyang / blo med do zhes bya bar mi rung ba de bzhin du/ chos kyi dbyings kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad mi skye ba'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa zhes brjod kyang / sangs rgyas rnams kyang yang
33a7(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i ngo bo nyid med ces bya bar ma rung ngo / / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku gang yin pa de nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur pas ni/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par mdzad do// las
33b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur pas ni/ sprul pa'i sku ston par mdzad do// shes bya'i slob pa rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ni/ chos kyi sku ston par mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la brten
33b2(rgyud 'bum): nas ni glog 'byung / glog la brten nas ni 'di 'byung ba de bzhin du/ chos kyi sku la brten pa'i phyir ni/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par mdzad do// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la brten nas ni/ sprul pa'i
33b3(rgyud 'bum): sku ston par mdzad do/ / rang bzhin yongs su dag par gyur pa'i phyir ni/ chos kyi sku ston par mdzad do// shes ro ba rnam par dag par gyur pas ni/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par mdzad do// ti nge
33b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin rnam par dag par gyur pas ni/ sprul pa'i sku ston par mdzad do// de gsum rnam par dag par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang tha mi dong ngo // de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig pa'i de bzhin nyid
33b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / mthar thug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pas/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku la tha dad par gyur pa med do// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'di
33b6(rgyud 'bum): skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston pa chen po yin no// zhes de ltar nges par mngon par yid ches pa'i gang zadab de ni shin tu dang ba'i bsam pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa mi mnga' bar khong du chud
33b7(rgyud 'bum): par gyur pas/ rigs kyi bu don de'i phyir spyod yul rnams la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa rnams yongs su bsal bar gyur na/ chos de dag la mtshan nyid gnyis med par khong du chud cing / rnam par rtog
34a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang med par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa'i rnal 'byor sgom pa la/ de bzhin nyid de mtshan nyid gnyis su gyur pa med cing / yang dag par rnal 'byor sgom pa'i phyir/ 'di ltar de bzhin du
34a2(rgyud 'bum): sgrib pa thams cad yongs su bsal bas nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin nyid sgrib pa thams cad zhi bar gyur pas/ 'di ltar de bzhin du de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mchog tu rnam par dag/
34a3(rgyud 'bum): pa thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes rnam par dag par gyur pas/ 'di ltar de bzhin du rang dbang du phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su sdud par
34a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes dang / yang dag
34a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o/ / de ltar mthob pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lta ba zhes bya bas/ de ni yang dag pa nyid du sangs rgyas mthong ba zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos
34a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi de bzhin nyid mthong ba'i phyir/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus par gzigs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas khams
34a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum las nges par byung nas/ yang dag pa'i spyod yul yongs su 'chol bas kyang khong du mi chud cing mthong bar mi nus pas so// de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i gang zag gang gis kyang mi rog cing mi mthong bas/
34b1(rgyud 'bum): so so'i skye bo thams cad the tsom dang som nyid skyed nas phyin ci log tu rnam par rtog par byed pas yongs su 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na ri bong rgya mtsho la rkyal bar byed kyang gdon mi za bar
34b2(rgyud 'bum): pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyam stobs shin tu chung ba'i phyir ro// byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang de bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid mngon par ma rtogs so// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
34b3(rgyud 'bum): par rtog pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga' bar chos thams cad la mnga' chen po brnyes shing / shes rab shin tu zab cing rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / rang gi spyod yul du gyur cing / gzhan
34b4(rgyud 'bum): dang yang thun mong du ma gyur pa'i phyir/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskal pa tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa nas/ nyid kyi sku srog la 'phangs pa mi mnga' bar dka' ba spyod pas/ dpe zla med/
34b5(rgyud 'bum): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig gi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ rab tu dben pa/ 'jigs pa rnams dang bral ba'i sku mchog dam pa 'di brnyes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos kyi de bzhin nyid
34b6(rgyud 'bum): rig cing mthong ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba med pa/ tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med/ gnyid kyang med/ bkres pa dang skom pa'ang med do// rtag par ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa/
34b7(rgyud 'bum): sems rnam par g.yeng zhing g.yo ba med do// gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la rtsod pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa des ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gang
35a1(rgyud 'bum): ci gsung yang rung ste/ thams cad la phan 'dogs par 'gyur bas/ gang gis mnyan cing thos pa de dag rnam par mi grol ba'ang med do// gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / mi ma rungs
35a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pa dag dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/ chos thos pa'i dbang gis 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang zad par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la lung du ma bstan pa'i dngos pa
35a3(rgyud 'bum): mi mnga' yang spyod yul thams cad la mkhyen par bya'o snyam pa'i dgongs pa'ang mi mnga'/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa tha dad pa'i 'du shes kyang mi mnga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang ci gsung
35a4(rgyud 'bum): yang rung ste ma nges pa mi mnga' 'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni spyod lam bzhi po thams cad du ye shes kyis yongs su ma bzung ba mi mnga' 'o// chos thams cad la byams pa dang thugs rjes yongs sum
35a5(rgyud 'bum): zin pa mi mnga' bas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bas phan mi 'dogs pa gang yang med do// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di thos nas
35a6(rgyud 'bum): mngon par yid ches pa gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / mi ma yin gyi 'gro ba dag tu ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rtag par lha dang mi'i nang du skyes
35a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur bas ma rabs dag tu skye bar yang mi 'gyur la/ rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byas nas yang dag pa'i chos nyan cing len par 'gyur/ rtag par sangs rgyas kyi
35b1(rgyud 'bum): zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos zab mo 'di thos par gyur pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen cing lung bstan par
35b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ shin tu zab pa'i chos gya nom pa 'di lan cig rna bas thos
35b3(rgyud 'bum): par gyur na/ gang zag de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang / yang dag pa'i chos la mi smod pa dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs la mi brnyas pa dang / sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed
35b4(rgyud 'bum): pa ni skyed par byed la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni 'phel zhing yangs pa dang yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can ji snyed pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams
35b5(rgyud 'bum): mngon par sgrub par bskul bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i 'khor mang po rnams 'dug
35b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te/ gus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
35b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das gang yang rung ba dag tu/ 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa 'di yang dag par ston par bgyid na/ yul der phan yon rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur lags so// bzhi gang zhe na/
36a1(rgyud 'bum): @dang po na rgyal po'i dmag tshogs rnams brdzun zhing dar bas/ phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra rnams ma mchis pa dang / thon da dang bral zhing tshwa ring ba dang / bkra shis dang ldan zhing bde snyid
36a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / dam pa'i chos dar zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba'o// gnyis pa ni pho brang nang gi btsun mo dang / slas dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams bzlum zhing rtsod pa ma mchis g.yo sgyu dang phra ma spangs pas/ rgyal pos gnang
36a3(rgyud 'bum): zhing bkur bar 'gyur ba'o/ / gsum pa ni dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / yul gyi mi rnams yang dag pa'i chos spyod pas bro nad ma mchis shing bde skyid pa dang / glo bur du 'gum pa ma mchis pa dang / bsod nams mang
36a4(rgyud 'bum): po mngon par sgrub pa'o/ / bzhi pa ni dus gsum po dag tu 'byung ba chen po dag 'phrod cing rtag par lha rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs nas yongs su srung bar 'gyur ba dang / byams pa dang snying rje mnyam par gyur pas
36a5(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa mi bgyid cing rnam par 'tshe ba'i bsam pa ma mchis pa dang / skye bo rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi zhing thams cad kyis byang chub kyi spyod pa mngon par sgrub par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di dag ni
36a6(rgyud 'bum): phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes bgyi ba lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang rtag par mdo sde 'di rgya cher spel ba'i slad du/ 'di ltar mdo sde yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag de'i slad du rjes su 'brang zhing gang
36a7(rgyud 'bum): na gnas pa'i gnas der sman pa dag bgyid lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyed kyis rab tu brtson pa'i sems
36b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po shin tu gya nom pa 'di spel ba nyid kyis yang dag pa'i chos yun ring du 'jig rten na gnas par 'gyur ro/ / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ sku
36b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum rnam par 'byed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o/ / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mngon sum du gya nom pa'i chos thos pas dga'
36b3(rgyud 'bum): mgu rangs par gyur te/ sems rtse gcig tu yid la bsams nas/ rang gi gnas su phyin pa dang / mtshan mo nyal ba'i rmi lam na gser gyi rje bo che 'od zer shin tu 'bar ba/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang
36b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs pa zhig mthong ste/ 'od zer de las phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams rin po che'i shing drung na bai DUR+Ya'i gdan la bzhugs nas/ 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba la chos 'chang pa'ang
36b5(rgyud 'bum): mthong ngo / / bram ze zhig gis gser gyi rnga brdungs pa las sgra chen po byung ste/ sgra de las sdig pa bshags pa'i chos kyi tshogs su bcad pa shin tu gya nom pa dag bstan pa'ang / mdzes pa'i tog gis thos
36b6(rgyud 'bum): pas thams cad ma lus par yid la bzung ste/ dran pa rtse gcig tu yid la gnas par gyur to// nam langs pa dang 'khor brgya stong tshad med pa mang pos yongs su bskor te mchod pa'i yo byad rnams thogs
36b7(rgyud 'bum): nas nga rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas phyir byung ste/ bya rgod phung po'i rig la ba der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/ me tog dang
37a1(rgyud 'bum): spos dag bkram ste/ g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ thal mo sbyar te gus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas/ bcom ldan
37a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi g.yar lam na/ bram ze zhig gis gser gyi rnga shin tu gya nom pa brdungs pa las sgra chen po byung ste/ sgra de las sdig pa bshags pa'i chos kyi
37a3(rgyud 'bum): tshigs su bcang ba shin tu gya nom pa dag bstan pa bdag gis thams cad yongs su bzung ste dran lags na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos bdag gis bshad par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas
37a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshogs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag gi mdang gsum g.yar lam na/ gser gyi rnga bo chen po dag/ dbyibs ni shin tu khyad par 'phags// kun nas gser 'od khyad par ldan
37a5(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pas na/ / snang bas kun tu khyab par bgyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang bar mthong // sangs rgyas mang po thams cad kun// rin chen ljon shing drung dag tu/
37a6(rgyud 'bum): bai DUR+Ya yi gdan bzhugs te// 'khor ni brgya stong tshad med snyed// gus pas yongs su bskor bar mthong // de nas bram ze zhig gis ni// gser gyi rnga chen brdungs pas ni// rnga chen de yi sgra
37a7(rgyud 'bum): las ni/ / tshogs bcad gya nom 'di skad smras// gser 'od rnga las gya nom sgra byung bas// stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten kun khyab nas// ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal mi bzad dang /
37b1(rgyud 'bum): mo yi sdug bsngal mang po gang yin pa// gser gyi rje sgra mthu stobs dbang gis ni// nyon mongs sgrub pa thams cad gtan zhe nas// dper na thub dbang bcom ldan dza bzhin du// 'jigs pa bas
37b2(rgyud 'bum): nas bde ba nyid du shog/ / bcom ldan 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen por ni// spyod bsags thams cad mkhyen ni bsgrubs pas na// sems can byang chub yan lag ldan mdzad nas// mthar na yon tan rgya mtsho phyogs
37b3(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad/ / gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'di yis ni// thos pa kun ni tshangs dbyangs thob par shog/ bla med byang chub 'bras bu thob gyur nas// chos kyi 'khor lo gya nom rtag skor shog/ tshe ni bskal pa bsam mi khyab
37b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas na/ / ji bzhin thos bshad skye dgu phan byed shog/ nyon mongs sdug bsngal mang po rgyun bcad nas// 'dod chags gti mug la sogs zhi bar shog/ sems can gang zhig ngan 'gror gnas gyur nas// me chen rab 'bar
37b5(rgyud 'bum): lus kun khyab pa dag/ rnga sgra dam pa 'di ni thos gyur nas// sdug bsngal bral nas sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro shog/ thams cad sngon gnas shes pa grub gyur nas// 'das pa'i tshe rabs brgya stong dran par shog/
37b6(rgyud 'bum): thub pa'i gtso bo yang dag dran gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs bstan zab mo thos par shog/ gser gyi rje dbyangs dam pa thos pa'i dbang // rtag par sangs rgyas rnams ni nyer bsten nas// thams cad sdig
37b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i las ni yongs spangs te/ / rnam dag dge phyogs 'ba' zhig spyod par shog/ lha dang mi yi srog chags thams cad kun// gus pas smon lam rtse gcig 'debs pa dag/ gser gyi rnga sgra dam pa thos gyur
38a1(rgyud 'bum): nas/ bsam pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs par gyur// sems can gang zhig mnar med lhung gyur nas// dmyal ba'i 'bar mes lus ni nyon mongs te// mgon skyabs med cing 'khor bar
38a2(rgyud 'bum): gang gnas pa/ / thos par gyur na sdug bsngal zhi bar gyur// lha mo yi dgas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su// sdug bsngal bgegs mang mngon du myong gyur pa// gser gyi rnga dbyangs dam pa thos gyur na//
38a3(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal spangs nas thar pa thob par shog/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// rtag tu bzhugs pa rkang gnyis gtso// thugs rje chen po'i thugs kyis ni// brtse bas bdag la dgongs su
38a4(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / sems can gang zhig skyabs ma mchis// mgon ni bgyid pa ma mchis pa// de lta bu yi rnam pa la// skyabs chen dag ni bgyid par shog/ bdag gis sngon ni bgyis pa'i sdig
38a5(rgyud 'bum): las ngan shin tu lnga pa rnams/ / deng bdag stobs bcu'i spyan sngar ni// thams cad rtse gcig rab tu bshags// bdag gis sangs rgyas yid mches// bla nye bshes ma gus pa dang // dge ba mang po
38a6(rgyud 'bum): ma spyad pas/ / rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa'am// bdog gis mtho btsun rus rigs dang // longs spyod dag gis snyems pa dang // dar la bab pas dregs gyur nas// rtag tu las ngan bgyis
38a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'om/ / rtag tu log pa'i bsam bskyed nas// ngag gis tshig ngan smras pa dang // kha na mtho ma mthong nas// rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa 'am// rtag tu byis pa'i blo sprad pas// ma rig mun pa'i
38b1(rgyud 'bum): sems g.yogs dang / / mi dge'i grogs po'i rjes 'brangs nas// rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa 'am// rtsed mo dga' ba rnams kyi rgyus// mya ngan dag dang ldan 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags zhe sdang dkris pas na//
38b2(rgyud 'bum): de slang sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am// mi dge grogs po bsten pa dang // phrag dog ser sna bsam pa dang // dbul 'phongs gya gyur sprad pas na// de slang sdig rnams bgyis pa'am// sdig mang dag la mi mos kyang
38b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs skrag dag dang bcas pa'am/ / rang dbang dag ni ma mchis pas// de slang sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am// rnam par g.yeng ba'i bsam pa dang // khong khro khon du 'dzin pa dang // bkres skom dag
38b4(rgyud 'bum): gis gdungs pa'i rgyus/ / de slad sdig rnams bgyis pa'am// bza' dang btung dang gos ngag dang // bud med dag la chags sred pa'i// nyon mongs mes ni bsregs pas na// de slang sdig rnams bgyis pa
38b5(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ / sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// gus pa'i sems ni ma skyes pa'i// de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa// deng bdag thams cad so sor bshags// rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' la//
38b6(rgyud 'bum): gus pa'i sems ni ma mchis pa'i// de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa// deng bdag thams cad so sor bshags// mi shes dam chos skur pa dang // pha ma sri zhu ma bgyis pa'i// de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis
38b7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ deng bdag thams cad so sor bshags// gti mug dang ni nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang mthu yis ni// de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad so sor bshags/
39a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams// sangs rgyas grangs med gang dag mchod// sems can rnams ni rab drangs nas// sdug bsngal bgegs rnams bral bgyid shog/
39a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can dag ni thams cad kun// sa bcu la ni gnas gyur te// song nams ye shes yongs rdzogs nas// mngon sangs skye dgu 'dren par shog/ bdag gis sems can kun gyi sbeng // bskal pa brgya stong
39a3(rgyud 'bum): dka' spyad nas/ / shes rab chen po'i stobs kyis ni// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mthar bgyid shog/ bdag gis srog chags kun gyi slad// gser 'od mchog tu rnam par rgyal// zab mo'i mdo sde bshad nas ni//
39a4(rgyud 'bum): las ngan rnams ni bsal bar shog/ gang zhig bskal pa brgya stong du// sdig lci dag ni bgyis pa rnams// skad cig gcig tsam mthol bshags na// sdig pa mang po ma lus 'byang // gser 'od dam pa 'di
39a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ / de ltar bshags pa bgyis gyur na// sdug bsngal las mang thams cad kun// 'di yi dbang gis myur du 'byung // ting 'dzin mchog ni brgya stong dang // bsam gyis mi khyab gzungs
39a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / dbang mchog byang chub lam yan lag/ rtag tu sgom yang skyo mi 'gyur// bdag gis rin chen phun tshogs gnas// sa bcu la ni phyin gyur nas// sangs rgyas yon tan yongs rdzogs te//
39a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bar 'bab pasgrol bar shog/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mtsho las ni// shin tu zab mo yon tan brjod// gya nom ye shes bsam dka' ba// phun sum tshogs pa thob par shog/ phyogs bcu'i
39b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad kun/ / bdag la so sor gzigs dgongs nas// thugs rje chen po'i thugs kyis ni// bdag gi bshags pa bzhes su gsol// bdag gis bskal pa mang por ni// las
39b2(rgyud 'bum): ngan mang po bgyis pas na/ / de yi dbang gis sdug bsngal myong // thugs rjes byang bar mdzad par smon// bdag gis las ngan mang bgyis pas// rtag tu mya ngan 'jigs sems skyes// spyod lam
39b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi po kun tu yang / / dga' ba'i 'du shes yod ma mchis// sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po ldan// sems can 'jigs pa sel mdzad na// bdag gi bshags pa bzhes nas ni// mya ngan sdug bsngal
39b4(rgyud 'bum): 'bral bar smon/ / bdag la nyon mongs sgrib pa dang // rnam smin las ni co mchis pa// thugs rje chen po'i cheb kyis ni// rab bkrus byang bar mdzad par smon// bdag gis sngon chad sdig pa dang //
39b5(rgyud 'bum): da ltar las ngan bgyis pa rnams// rtse gcig sems kyis mthol bshags na// thams cad rab tu byang bar shog/ ma 'ongs pa yi las ngan rnams// bsdams te slong bar yong mi bgyid// gal
39b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gal ba mchis na yang / / nams kyang 'chab par yongs mi bgyid// lus gsum ngag gi rnam pa bzhi// yid kyi las ni rnam pa gsum// sems can rnams ni 'tshong bgyid pas// thog ma med nas
39b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyun mo 'chad/ / spyod pa 'di gsum dbang gis na// mi dge las bcu bgyid gyur pas// de 'dra'i nongs pa mang po rnams// de dag thams cad so sor bshags// bdag gis las ngan mang
40a1(rgyud 'bum): dgyis pas/ / sdug bsngal rnam smin rang nyid myong // sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni// bsam pa thag pas so sor bshags// 'dzam bu gling ni 'di dag dang // 'jig rten
40a2(rgyud 'bum): khams ni gzhan dag tu/ / dge ba'i las mang ci bgyid pa// deng bdag thams cad yi rang ngo // mi dge las bcu rab spangs nas// dge bcu lam ni sngon bsgrubs te// sa bcu dag la rab tu gnas//
40a3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rtag mthong smon// bdag gi lus dang ngag yid kyis// bsod nams ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yi mthus// bla med ye shes myur grub shog/ deng bdag
40a4(rgyud 'bum): stobs bcu'i spyan sngar mngon sum du/ / sdug bsngal bgegs mang sna tshogs mthol zhing bshags// byis pa srid gsum rmongs pa'i bgegs dag dang // rtag par las ngan lci ba bgyis pa'i bgegs// bdag
40a5(rgyud 'bum): gis log pa'i 'dod pa bsags pa'i bgegs/ / rtag tu sred skyed 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i bgegs// 'jig rten 'di la mngon zhe na chags pa'i bgegs// byis pa thams cad kun gyi nyon mongs bgegs//
40a6(rgyud 'bum): sems myos rnam ga yeng phyin ci log pa'i bgegs// mi dge grogs po dag la rten pa'i bgegs// 'khor ba dag la 'dod chags zhen pa'i bgegs// zhe sdang gti mug glen pas sdig bgyis bgegs//
40a7(rgyud 'bum): mi khom brgyad skye mi dge'i grogs po'i bgegs// bsod nams yon tan ma bsags pa yi bgegs// deng bdag rgyal ba kun gyi spyan sngar ni// sdig pa'i las ni mtha' yas bgyis pa bshags/
40b1(rgyud 'bum): deng bdag bder gshegs kun la skyabs su mchi// bla med yon tan mtsho la bdag phyag 'tshal// gser gyi ri ltar phyogs bcur gsal mdzad pa// byams dang thugs rjes bdag ni gzung du
40b2(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / sku ni gser mdog rnam dag dri mo mnga'// spyan ni rnam dag bai DUR+Ya dang 'dra// dpal dang gzi brjid grags dang ldan pa'i gtso// thugs rje shes rab nyi mas mun sel ba// sangs rgyas nyi
40b3(rgyud 'bum): mas 'od kyis kun gsal mdzad/ / shin tu rnam dag dri med rdul dang bral// thub pa'i zla bas gsal mdzad rab bsil ba// sems can nyon mongs gdungs pa sel bar mdzad// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan
40b4(rgyud 'bum): gyis rab brgyan cing / / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs// yon tan bsam dka' mtshung pa ma mchis gra/ nyi 'od lta bur 'jig rten gsal bar mdzad// kha dog bai DUR+Ya 'dra dri mi mnga'// zla ba nya ltar
40b5(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' dag la bzhugs/ / shel mchog dam pa'i dra bas gser sku bsgribs// 'od zer sna tshogs dag gis rab tu brgyan// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chu bo'i nang dag tu// rga nad mya ngan chu yis deng
40b6(rgyud 'bum): pas na/ / de 'dra'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho bzod dka' ba// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od kyis gtan du bskabs// deng bdag stong gsum 'jig rten rmad byung gtso// thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyi btung phyag 'tshal lo//
40b7(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer rab gsal gser mdog 'dra ba'i sku// dpe byad dam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyan// ji ltar rgya mtsho chu tshad shes dka' zhing // sa chen rdul ni bgrang du ma mchis dang // ji ltar ri rab srang grangs
41a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhal dka' zhing / / nam mkha' dag la mu mtha' ma mchis ltar// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan de bzhin te// sems can thams cad kun gyis rig mi 'gyur// bskal pa tshan
41a2(rgyud 'bum): med snyeng du rab bsam kyang / / yon tan rgya mtsho pha mtha' rtogs mi 'gyur// sa chen 'di 'dra'i ri brag ji snyed pa// rdul phran bzhin du gses kyang brtsir rung gi/ rgya mtsho'i cha ba ni spu rtses gzhal rung yang /
41a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas yon tan bgrang bar rngo mi thogs// sems can thams cad lhan cig 'dus nas ni// bcom ldan grags pa'i yon tan thams cad dang // mtshan bzang rnam dag dkon mchog bsngags brjod kyang //
41a4(rgyud 'bum): de yi pha mtha' dpag par yong mi 'gyur// bdag gis dge ba'i las mang ci mchis pas// myur du bla na ma mchis gtso grub nas// yang dag chos bshad skye dgu phan btags te// thams cad sdug bsngal mang
41a5(rgyud 'bum): las thar bgyid shog/ bdud kyi rimag tshogs stobs chen rab btul nas// bla med ngam chos 'khor lo skor bar shog/ bskal pa grangs med bsam mi khyab gnas nas// bdud rtsi'i ro yis sems can tshim
41a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyid shog/ 'das pa'i rgyal ba rnams ni ji lta bzhin// pha rol phyin drug yongs su rdzogs bgyid shog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur nas/ nyon mongs btul te sdug bsngal
41a7(rgyud 'bum): bsal bar shog/ bdag gis rtag tu tshe rabs dran gyur nas// 'das pa'i skye ba brgya stong dran pa dang // rtag par thub pa'i gtso ni dran gyur te// sangs rgyas zab mo'i chos ni thos par
41b1(rgyud 'bum): shog/ bdag gi dge ba'i las ni 'di rnams kyis// rgyal ba tshad med dag la bsnyen bkur nas// mi dge ba yi rgyu kun yongs spangs te// yang dag dam chos rtag tu sgrub par shog/ 'jig rten thams cad
41b2(rgyud 'bum): sems can ji snyed pa/ / sdug bsngal spangs nas bde ba thob par shog/ dbang po mtshang dza snyed mchis pa dag/ de dag lus kyi mtshan rnams yongs rdzogs shog/ sems can gang zhig nad kyi sdug bsngal gyis
41b3(rgyud 'bum): lus ni nyam chung skyabs bgyid ma mchis pa/ / thams cad nad kyi sdug bsngal rang zhi nas// dbang po kha dogs mthu ni rgyas par shog/ gang gis rgyal chos 'gal bgyis bsad la thug/ sdug bsngal mang
41b4(rgyud 'bum): gtses mya ngan rab skyes nas/ / de yis sdug bsngal mi bzad myong ba'i tshe// mgon skyabs dag ni bgyid pa ma mchis dang // gang dag gzhu rjeg mtshon chas bcings pa dang // gnod byed yo byad sna tshogs
41b5(rgyud 'bum): lus nyon mongs/ / mya ngan brgya stong tshad med myong ba na// lus sems rab gzer bde ba cung zad med// de dag thams cad bcings shing brdegs pa dang // sdug bsngal nyon mongs dag las thar bar shog/ bsad la
41b6(rgyud 'bum): thug pa dag ni srog thob nas/ / sdug bsngal mang po thams cad gtan zang shog/ sems can gang gis bkres skom gdungs gyur pa// ro mchog dam pa sna tshogs thob par shog/ long bas gzugs mthong 'on
41b7(rgyud 'bum): pas thos pa dang / / 'theng pos 'gro nus lkugs pas smra nus shog/ dbul 'phongs sems can rin chen gter thob nas// bang mdzod rab rgyas rgung pa ma mchis te// thams cad bde mchog dam pa rab rnyed nas
42a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can sdug bsngal myong ba ma mchis shog/ lha ma thams cad mthong bar mos pa yi// byang bzhin dam pa rab mdzes thob gyur nas/ bde ba tshad med mngon sum myong gyur te
42a2(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod 'byor rgyas bsod nams ldan par shog/ sems can de dag tshal mo bsam pa bzhin// sgra mchog mang ba mngon du 'byung bar shog/ chu 'dod gser gyi me tog steng 'phyo ba/
42a3(rgyud 'bum): rab bsil rdzing bu mngon du snang bar shog/ sems can de dag ji ltar bsams pa bzhin// bza' btung gos dang khri dang stan rnams dang // gser dngul dang ni rin chen bai DUn+da// rgyan 'breng
42a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad phun sum tshogs par shog/ sems can mi snyan thos par mi 'gyur zhing // mi sdug phan tshun mthong bar ma gyur cig/ lus kyi byad bzhin thams cad rab mdzes shing // so sor
42a5(rgyud 'bum): byams pa'i yid kyis brtse bgyid shog/ 'jig rten bde ba'i yo byad longs spyod rnams// yid la bsams te thams cad 'byor par shog/ nor rnams rnyed pa 'phongs pa ma mchis pa// bgo/
42a6(rgyud 'bum): ba shar bgyis te sems can gtong bar shog/ bdug spos phye ma dang ni byug spos dang // me tog sna tshogs kha dog gcig mi la// nyin re dus gsum shing las lhung gyur nas// yid bzhin longs spyod dga'
42a7(rgyud 'bum): bskye bar shog/ sems can thams cad phyogs bcu'i rgyal gtso dang // theg gsum rnam dag gya nom chos kyi sgo// byang chub sems dpa' dang ni rang rgyal dang // nyan thos dge 'dun mchod
42b1(rgyud 'bum): pa bgyid par shog/ rtag tu ma rabs dag tu mi skye zhing // mi khom brgyad po dag tu mi ltung dang // dal 'byor mi yi gtso bor skyes gyur te// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rim gro bgyid par shog/ rtag par phyug
42b2(rgyud 'bum): po dag gi khyim skyes te/ / nor dang rin chen bang mdzod rgyas pa dang // byad bzhin grags pa dpe bla ma mchis te// tshe ring bskal pa grangs med gnas par shog/ bud med thams cad kun ni phor gyur nas/
42b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' zhing sems rno blo gros shin tu che// thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i lam spyad nas// pha rol phyin drug sgrub la brtson par shog/ rtag par phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshad med snyed/
42b4(rgyud 'bum): rin chen shing rgyal drung du gshegs nas ni// bai DUR+Ya yi gdan la rab bzhugs te// chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba mthong bar shog/ gal te 'das pa dang ni da ltar tshe// sringad gsum 'khor nas las rnams bgyis
42b5(rgyud 'bum): pas na/ / yid du mi mching na 'gro thob gyur pa// thams cad ma lus gtan du byang bar shog/ sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtshor ni// 'khor ba'i zhags pas dam du bcings pas na//
42b6(rgyud 'bum): shes rab ral gri dag gis bcad sprul to// sdug bsngal spangs nas byang chub myur thob shog/ sems can gang gis 'dzam gling 'di dag dang // yang na 'jig rten gzhan dag tu yang rung // bsod nams
42b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyun mchog sna tshogs ci bsgrubs pa/ / de dag thams cad kun la yi ring ngo // bsod nams dngos po dag la yi rang nas// lus dang ngag yid dge ba mang bgyis des// las mchog dam pa 'di dag
43a1(rgyud 'bum): rtag 'phel nas/ / bla med byang chub chen po myur thob smon// phyag bgyis sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags pa dang // bsam pa dang zhing rnyog pa ma mchis pas/ bsngo zhing smon lam
43a2(rgyud 'bum): btab pa'i bsod nams des/ / bskal pa drug cu'i ngan 'gro 'das par smon/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dang / bram ze la sogs rigs mchog dam pa rnams// thal sbyar re
43a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig sangs rgyas bsngags brjod dang / / skye ba rtag par kun tu tshe rabs dran// dbang po tshang zhing lus ni yongs rdzogs te// yon tan dam pa thams cad phun tshegs gyur// ma 'ongs pa yi skye ba
43a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du/ / rtag par lha mo rnams kyis lta bar shog/ sangs rgyas gcig dang sangs rgyas bcu dag las// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs nas thos pa min// sangs rgyas brgya stong dge rtsa bskyed pas
43a5(rgyud 'bum): na/ 'gyod tshangs chos 'di thos par gyur pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsol ba gsan pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la legs so legs sa zhes
43a6(rgyud 'bum): bsngags pa brjo nas rig kyi bu khyod kyis ji ltar rmi lam du gser gyi rnga bo che las byung ba'i sgras/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / 'gyod tshangs bya ba'i chos bstan pa gang
43a7(rgyud 'bum): la la zhig gis thos par gyur na/ / bsod nams shin tu mang po thob par 'gyur zhing sems can la rgya cher phan 'dogs pa dang / kha na mtho ba'i sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// khyod kyi las mchog
43b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag thams cad ni 'das pa'i dus su bsngags pa brjod cing / smon lam btab pa'i sngon gyi bag chags kyi rgyu rkyen dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i mthus/ rgyu rkyen
43b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag khyod la bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o/ / de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas/ thams cad rab tu dga' zhing mngon par yid ches nas dga' bzhin du spyod par gyur to//
43b3(rgyud 'bum): gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mchog gi rgyal po las/ rmi lam na 'gyod tshangs byed pa mthong ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// gser 'ong dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal
43b4(rgyud 'bum): ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo bam po gsum pa/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i rnam par rtog pa la bzhugs te/ shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
43b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / sku'i spu'i bu ga nas kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong tshad med pa snyed dang ldan pa'i 'od zer phyogs bcur bkye bas/ phyogs bcu'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi tshed dang dpe byar med pa'i sangs rgyas
43b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhing rnams 'od zer gyi nang du snang bar gyur to/ / snyogs ma lnga'i 'jig rten dag tu 'od zer gyis snang bar byas pas/ sems can gang dag mi dge ba bcu'i las dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba dang
43b7(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum la skur pa btab pa dang / bla ma dang nye ba dag la sri zhu ma byas pa dang / mkhan po dang bram ze dag la brnyes shing nga rgyal byas pas/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye
44a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas su ltung bar 'gyur ba de dag so so nas/ 'od zer gyi snang ba de dag gi gnas su phyin par gyur pas/ sems can de dag 'od zer de mthong ba dang / 'od zer gyi mthus thams
44a2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis bde ba dang / shin tu sdug cing mdzes pa'i mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyis brgyan nas sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar gyur to// de'i tshe brgya byin dang / lha'i 'khor thams
44a3(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / gang+gA'i lha mo dang / 'khor mang po rnams 'od zer rmad du byung ba mthong ba dang / thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te/ g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig
44a4(rgyud 'bum): tu 'khod do/ / de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
44a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
44a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub gnyer zhing theg pa chen po mngon par sgrub pas/ ji ltar phyin ci log tu sems can thams cad yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba lags/ mngon par 'dus bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'i kha na ma
44a7(rgyud 'bum): tho ba ji ltar bshags na yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu deng khyod kyis tshad dpag tu med pa'i sems can rnams
44b1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor bsgoms nas/ rnam par dag pa'i rnam par grol ba'i bde ba thob par bya ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad la snying brtse zhing phan par 'dod pa legs so// sems can gang la la zhig las
44b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgrub pa'i dbang gis sdig pa rnams mngon par 'dus byas pa gang yin pa des nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed de/ nyin mtshan dus drug tu bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
44b3(rgyud 'bum): btsugs nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar bsdus nas/ ngag gi sgo nas bdag nyid kyis 'di skad du/ phyogs bcu na da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla na
44b4(rgyud 'bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes nas/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin cing gsal bar mdzad pa/ chos kyi char chen po phab pa/ chos kyi rdza
44b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po brdungs pa/ chos kyi drung chen po bus pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po btsug pa/ chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'dzin pa/ tham cad sem can rnam la sman cing bde bar mdzes pa'i slad du/ rtag par chos kyi sbyin pa
44b6(rgyud 'bum): gtong ba/ skye dgu rnams drangs nas 'bras bu chen po thob pa la bkod de/ rtag tu bde ba mngon sum du mdzad par bzhed pa/ de lta bu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyabs su
44b7(rgyud 'bum): mchis te mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag yang dag pa'i shes rab dang / yang dag pa'i spun dang / yang dag pa'i mkhyen pa dang / yang dag pa'i mnyam pas
45a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can gyi dge sdig gi las mkhyen cing gzigs pa thams cad la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis sems rtse gcig tu spyi bos btung nge gus par phyag 'tshal lo/
45a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus na sdig pa'i rjes su 'brangs te/ sems can rnams dang lhan cig tu las kyi slob pa'i kha na ma tho ba bgyis pa dang // 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis
45a3(rgyud 'bum): kun tu dkris shing bcings pas/ sangs rgyas ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang / chos ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang / dge 'dun ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang / dge sdig ma 'tshal ba'i dbang gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid
45a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgo nas mtshams ma mchis pa ngan sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshal phyung ba dang yang dag pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa dang / dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen bgyis pa dang / dgra bcom pa bkun
45a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang gapa ma bkum pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa gsum dang / ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dang / yid kyi spyod pa rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis/ mi dge ba bcu'i las bdag nyid kyis bgyis pa dang / gzhan bgyid du
45a6(rgyud 'bum): skul pa dang gzhan bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba dang dge ba po gang zag rnams la nan gyis skur pa btab pa dang / bre srang gis bslus pa dang / yang dag pa ma lags pa la yang dag par bzung ba dang
45a7(rgyud 'bum): mi gtsang ba'i bza' ba dang btung ba gzhan dag la stsal ba dang / 'gro ba drug po de dag tu mchis pa'i pha ma ji snyed pa dag la phan tshun gnod pa bgyis pa dang / mchod rten gyi dkor brkus pa dang / phyogs bzhi'i
45b1(rgyud 'bum): dge 'dun gyi dkor dang / mngon sum gyi dge 'dun gyi dkor rang dbang bgyis te yongs su spyad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos dang 'dul ba la bslab par ma mos pa dang / mkhan po dang bla
45b2(rgyud 'bum): ma'i ga ma ngag gi rjes su mi 'brang ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa dag la smad par dga' bas/ rnal 'byor sgom pa'i gang zag rnams 'gyod pa
45b3(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa dang / bdag pas khyad par 'phags pa zhig mthong na phrag dog bskyed pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing gi sbyin pa dag la rtag par ser sna dang 'phangs pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / ma rig pas bsgrib
45b4(rgyud 'bum): shing log par lta bas sems rmongs par gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rgyu ma bskyed pas sdig pas sdig pa 'phel bar gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la smod pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa dang / chos la chos ma
45b5(rgyud 'bum): lags par bshad pa dang / chos ma lags pa la chos su bshad pa la sogs pa 'di lta bu'i sdig pa mang po rnams/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i shes rab dang / yang dag pa'i spyan dang / yang dag pa'i
45b6(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen pa dang / yang dag pa'i mnyam pa'i mnyam pas thams cad mkhyen cing / thams cad gzigs pa dag la deng bdag srog phyogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar mthol zhing bshags so//
45b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mngon du phyung nas 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyid do// sngar ma bgyis pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnams slan chad mi bgyid do// sngar bgyis pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnams deng thams cad mthol zhing bshags so// ngan
46a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gro'i sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi rigs kyi 'gro ba dang / lha ma yin gyi 'khor dang / mi khom pa brgyad po ngag tu lhung bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib
46a2(rgyud 'bum): paci mchis pa dang / bdag gis tshe 'di la bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zhu byang nas/ sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa ci mchis pa ma 'ongs pa na mi myong bar smon to// ji ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sem
46a3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis spyod pa spyad pa na las kyi sgrib pa tsamachis pa thams cad mgrol zhing bshags pa de bzhin du/ bdag gi las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa'ang mthol zhing bshags so//
46a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mngon du phyung ste 'chab cing spong bar mi bgyid do// sngar bgyis pa'i sdig pa rnams zhu byang bar smon to// ma 'ongs pa'i sdog pa rnams kyang bgyid pa'i thugs mi thub bo// ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems
46a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na las kyi slob pa ci mchis pa ma lus par mthol zhing bshags pa de bzhin du kha dag gi las kyi sgrib pa'ang deng mthol zhing bshags so/ / thams
46a6(rgyud 'bum): cad mngon du phyung nas 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyid / / sngar bgyis pa'i sdig pa rnams zhu byang bar smon to// ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyang bgyi ba'i thugs mo grub bo// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na
46a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po rnam kyis byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pa na'ang de dag las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa mgrol zhing bshags pa de bzhin du/ bdag gi las kyi sgrib pa'ang mthol zhing bshags so/
46b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mngon du phyung nas 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyid do// sngar bgyis pa'i sdog pa rnams zhu byang bar smon to// ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyang bgyid pa'i thugs mi thub bo zhes brjod par bya'o//
46b2(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir gang gis sdig pa byas pa zhig yod na/ skad cig tsam du'ang 'chab cing sbar mi rung na/ nyin gcig gam/ mtshan gcig nas/ dus ring po'i bar lta smos kyang ci dgos//
46b3(rgyud 'bum): gang la la zhig gis sdig pa byas nas rnam par dag pa yongs su tshogs par 'dod cing sems la ngo tsha dang bcas pas/ ma 'ongs pa na gdon mi za bar sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa yod do zhes mngon par yid/
46b4(rgyud 'bum): ches nas/ 'jigs shing skrag pa chen po skyes pa des 'di ltar bshags par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na mo la la zhig mes mgo thod bsregs sam/ gos bsregs par gyur na/ myur ba kho nar
46b5(rgyud 'bum): me gsod par byed do/ / gal te zhi bar ma gyur na sems kyis bde ba thob par mi 'gyur ro// gang gis sdig pa byas na'ang de bzhin du mthol zhing bshags nas myur ba kho nar yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// gang
46b6(rgyud 'bum): la la zhig phyug po'i khyim du skyes nas ner dang rin po che mang po dang ldan par 'dod pa dang / gzhan yang sems bskyed nas theg pa chen po sgom par 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su
46b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyang bar bya'o/ / tshe rigs btsun pa'i bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che bdun dang ldan pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa
47a1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu gal te rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang / 'thab bral gyi lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha
47a2(rgyud 'bum): dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye bar 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/ / gal te tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / 'od chung dang
47a3(rgyud 'bum): tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal gyi lha dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / sprin ming dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang gya nom snang ba dang
47a4(rgyud 'bum): shin tu mthong dang / 'og min gyi lhar skye bar 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// gal te rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang
47a5(rgyud 'bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu yongs su gnyer bar 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// gal te rig pa gsum dang / mngon par shes pa
47a6(rgyud 'bum): drug dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rang dbang thob pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer ba dang / mthar thug pa'i sar phyin nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / yongs su dag pa'i ye shes dang /
47a7(rgyud 'bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang / mi g.yo ba'i ye shes dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su gnyer bar 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs
47b1(rgyud 'bum): su sbyang bar bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen las skye ba de bzhin gshegs pas kyang tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te/ rgyu dang rkyen tha dad
47b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir/ ji ltar 'das pa'i chos rnams 'gag cing zad par 'gyur bas/ las kyi slob pa ji snyed pa ma lus par 'gyur ba'ang 'du byed kyi chos rnams mngon du ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dag dang gdod skye bar
47b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bas/ ma 'ongs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang ldang bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'o phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad stong zhing // de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag dang / gang zag dang / sems can dang /
47b4(rgyud 'bum): srog med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'du byed kyi chos kyang med do zhes gsungs pas so// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi la brten pas brjod du 'ang med do//
47b5(rgyud 'bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshan ma thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'ji ltar yang dag pa'i don shin tu gya nom pa la zhugs nas/ mngon par yi/
47b6(rgyud 'bum): ches pas gus pa'i sems skyes par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sems can med cang ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi yod pa zhes bya ste/ don de'i phyir 'gyod tshangs kyis las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no//
47b7(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu gang gis chos rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur na// las kyi sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas gtan du yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ log pa'i bsam pa mi skye zhing yang dag pa'i dran pa phun su
48a1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs par gyur pa dang / shin tu zab pa'i don dag la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang / spyod pa dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag thams cad mkhyen pa yin no snyam pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa
48a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / sems can rnams la byams pa tshad med pa bskyed pa ste/ 'di dag ni rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rtse gcig sems kyis theg gsum srung
48a3(rgyud 'bum): zab mo'i chos la skur mi 'debs/ / thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'du shes bskyed// byams sems las kyi sgrib pa spong // rigs kyi bu shin tu bsal bar dka' ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ni rnam pa bzhi yod de/ bzhi gang zhe na
48a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa las shin tu lci ba'i kha na ma tho ba byas pa dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la sems kyis skur pa btab pa dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar mi byed pa dang / srid pa gsum la
48a5(rgyud 'bum): mngon par zhen nas nges par 'byung ba'i sems med pa gang yin pa'o/ / gzhan yang las kyi sgrib pa'i gnyen por 'gyur ba rnam pa bzhi yod de// bzhi gang zhe na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na bzhugs
48a6(rgyud 'bum): bapa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsam pa thag pa nas nye bar bsnyen nas kha na ma tho ba thams cad bshags par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi cheng du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dam
48a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chos zab mo bshad par gsol ba 'debs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa dag la rjes su yi rang ba dang / bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par
48b1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba gang yin pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na skyes pa dang bud med ji snyed mchis
48b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dag las theg pa chen po spyod pa spyod rngo thogs pa'ang mchis/ spyod rngo mi thogs pa'ang mchis na/ ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyi legs bcom
48b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang lo la zhig theg pa chen po sgom par mi nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyon mtshan dus drug tu bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
48b4(rgyud 'bum): lgang sa la btsugs nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ sems rtse gcigatu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas rjes su yi rang bar byed na/ bsod nams tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur bas/ 'di skad du phyogs bcu'i
48b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag ngo ltar sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sems kyi shes rab mngon par sgrub pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la deng bdag shin tu dang bas rjes su yi rang ngo zhes brjed par
48b6(rgyud 'bum): gyur na/ de ltar rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi dbang gis gdon mi za bar shin tu btsun zhing khyad par du 'phags pa/ bla na med pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ mchog tu gya nom pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur
48b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad la'ang rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ / gzhan yang da ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po pas byang chub tu
49a1(rgyud 'bum): sems bskyed pa las byung ba'i bsod nams ji snyed pa dag dang / bskal pa chen po brgya 'das nas byang chub sems pa'i spyod pa spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams chen po gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba'i
49a2(rgyud 'bum): bzod pa thob pa nas phyir mi ldog pa dang / tshe gcig gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba'i bar dag las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa de dog thams cad la'ang / 'di ltar bsam pa thag pa nas rjes su yi
49a3(rgyud 'bum): rang zhing bsngags pa brjod par bya'o/ / de bzhin du 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa dag la'ang rjes su yi rang zhing bsngags pa brjod par bya'o//
49a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na yang dag pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa byang chub gya nom pa brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad sems can mtha' yas pa rnams yongs su bzla ba'i phyir
49a5(rgyud 'bum): bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa btang ba/ chos kyi rnga brdungs pa/ chos kyi dung bus pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa/ chos kyi char phab pa dag gis
49a6(rgyud 'bum): thugs brtse bas sems can thams cad bskul zhing yongs su btul bas/ thams cad mngon par yid ches par gyur nas/ chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa'i dbang gis zad mi shes pa'i bde ba 'thob pa la/
49a7(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis bsod nams bsags pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang / sems can gang
49b1(rgyud 'bum): gis de 'dra ba'i bsod nams nga dung phun sum tshogs par ma gyur pa dag thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag la bdag rjes su yi ring ngo / / de bzhin du 'das pa dang ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
49b2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa thams cad la'ang bsam pa thag pa nas rjes su yi rang ngo zhes rjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na rjes su yi rang ba gang yin pa des
49b3(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nyon mongs pa spangs te/
49b4(rgyud 'bum): dgra bcom pa mngon par grub par gyur la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs bu mo gang la la zhig nam 'tsho'i bar du rtag par gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / gsos sman mchog
49b5(rgyud 'bum): dam pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang rim gro byas pas 'thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa des/ ji ltar snga ma lta bur rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams de dang sbran na/ stong gi cha gcig tsam du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
49b6(rgyud 'bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni grangs dang bcas shing tshang dang bcas pas bsod nams thams cad yongs su sdud par mi 'gyur la/ rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams gang yin
49b7(rgyud 'bum): ba de la ni tshad med cing grangs med pas dus gsum gyi bsod nams thams cad yongs su sdud par byed pas/ de'i phyir gang la la zhig dge ba'i rtsa ba khyad par can 'phel bar 'dod pas/ 'di ltar rjes
50a1(rgyud 'bum): su yi rang ba'i bsod nams mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ / bud med gang la la zhig bud med kyi lus yongs su bsgyur nas/ skyes pa'i lus yongs su 'grub par 'dod na'ang
50a2(rgyud 'bum): rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams mngon par sgrub par byed na/ gdon mi za bar yid la bsams pa bzhin du tshe 'di nyid la skyes pa'i lus mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ brgya byin
50a3(rgyud 'bum): lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams gang lags pa ni 'tshal bar gyur na/ slang ma'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar
50a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba dang / da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rnal 'byor sgom par 'gyur bar bgyid pa'i slad du bskul ba dang gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa bshad du gsol/
50a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po rigs kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub yong su gnyer ba gang yin pa des/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang theg
50a6(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po'i lam sgom par 'dod na/ / gang zag nges nyin mtshan dus drug tu snga ma lta bu'i spyod lam gyis sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas/ 'di skad du deng bdag phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blan
50a7(rgyud 'bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes par gyur kyang / bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dung ma bskor ba dang / rnam par smin pa'i sku spangs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bzhed pa gang lags pa de dag
50b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la/ bdag bsam pa thag pa nas spyi bos btud de phyag bgyis nas/ sems can thams cad yongs su bsgral zhing bde bar bgyi ba dang / sngar gong du bstan pa ltar bas pa ma mchis pa'i bde ba thob par
50b2(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ba'i slad du/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po yongs su bskor ba dang / chos kyi char chen po dbab pa dang / chos kyi sgron me chen po sbar ba dang / don gyi tshul gsal bar mdzad pa dang / thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa
50b3(rgyud 'bum): btang nas yongs su mya ngan las mo 'da' zhing / 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs par skul zhing gsol ba 'tshal lo// deng bdag gis bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa 'di dag thams cad bla na
50b4(rgyud 'bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ / ji ltar 'das pa dang da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bskul ba dang gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams de dag
50b5(rgyud 'bum): la byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang bskul ba dang / gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar gyi'o zhes
50b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya'o/ / rig sku bu gal te gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa bas gang la
50b7(rgyud 'bum): la zhig gos de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor bar gsol ba btab pas 'thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de snga ma bas ches khyad par du 'phags te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni zang zing
51a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa yin la/ rdzas kyi smon pa yin pasam/ rigs kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams rin po che sna bdudan gyis bkang ste sbyin pa btang ba ltarare zhig zhog gi/
51a2(rgyud 'bum): gal te gang la la zhig gis gaung+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna dun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas pa
51a3(rgyud 'bum): bas/ bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de de bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags so// chos kyi sbyin pa ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i phan yon rnam pa lnga dang ldan te/ lnga gang zhe na/
51a4(rgyud 'bum): dang po chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs par byed la/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni de lta ma yin pas so// gnyis pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sems can khams gsum nas 'byin
51a5(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa yin lo/ zang zing gi sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i khams las mi 'da' bas so// gsum pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku yongs su dag par byed pa yin la/
51a6(rgyud 'bum): zang zing gi sbyin pas ni gzugs 'ba' zhig 'phel bar byed pas so// bzhi pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni mthar thug pa med pa yin la/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni zad par 'gyur bas so// lnga pa chos kyi
51a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa gang yin pa de ma rig pa yongs su gcod par byed la/ zang zing gi sbyin pa de ni 'dong pa'i sred pa tsam thul bar 'gyur bas so// de lta bas na rigs kyi bu bskul ba dang gsol ba bdab pa'i bsod
51b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni tshad med dpag tu med pas dpe byar sra ba ma yin no/ / nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor la tshan ma yongs su bskor bar bskul pas/ dge ba'i
51b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dbang gis de lta bas na deng brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pasang la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor bar bskul ba ni sems
51b3(rgyud 'bum): can rnams yongs su sgrol zhing bde bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ / nga sngon byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs shing / yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar
51b4(rgyud 'bum): nams pa btab pas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de la brtenanas/ ngas spobs bcu dang bsnyungs pa ma mnga' ba bzhi dang / sas yang dag par rig pa dang / byams patsun pa dang / thugs rna chen po dang /
51b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chos grangs med pa snyed brnyes par gyur pa yin te/ b+hag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya nga las 'das par 'gyur yang / nga'i yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten na yun ring bar gnas par gyur
51b6(rgyud 'bum): ba yin no/ / ngam tshas kyi sku gang yin pa deni rnam par dag cing dpe zla med pas/ mtshan mchogangs pa sna tshogs dang / mgrin pa chad med pa dang / rangag tu mang ba dang / seMn tan bsam kyis ma
51b7(rgyud 'bum): pa chad med pa dang ldas zhing / sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par mdzad pas/ bskal pa bye ba rgya stong snyed du brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// chos kyi skus ni chos thams cad yongs su
52a1(rgyud 'bum): sdud par mdzad la/ chos thams cad kyis ni chos kyi sku yongs su sdud par mi byed do// chos kyi sku rtag par gnas kyang rtag pa'i lta bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'gag par 'gyur yang nad
52a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lta bar 'gyur ba ma yin pas/ sems can gyi tha dad pa'i lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bshig nas/ sems can gyi yang dag pa'i lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs skyed par mdzad do// sems can thams cad 'ching ba
52a3(rgyud 'bum): dgrol bar mdzad kyang / dgrol bar bya ba ci'ang mi mnga' 'o// sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pas/ yongs su ma smin pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su smin par mdzad la/ yongs su smin pa gang yin
52a4(rgyud 'bum): pa de ni rnam par grol bar mdzad kyang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa'ang mi mnga'/ g.yo ba'ang mi mnga' bas/ 'du 'dzi las thag ring du gyur pas/ rab tu dben zhing mdzad pa mi mngar bas/ rang dbang du
52a5(rgyud 'bum): gyur cing bde bar gyur la/ dus gsum las yang dag par 'das kyang dus gsum ston par mdzad pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las nges par byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bsgrub
52a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang sku tha dad par gyur pa med pa yin te/ 'di dag thams cad kyang bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs kyis brnyes pa yin pa'i phyir 'di
52a7(rgyud 'bum): lta bu'i chos sku ngas deng brnyes pa yin te/ de lta bas na gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar 'dod pas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig gcig gam/ tshogs su
52b1(rgyud 'bum): bcad pa gcig tsam gzhan dag la ston par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de'ang tshad med par gyur pa yin no/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po yongs su bskor bar bskul zhing 'jig rten
52b2(rgyud 'bum): na yun ring du bzhugs nas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'debs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ brgya byin lha'i dbang pos yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
52b3(rgyud 'bum): 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer zhing theg pa gsum gyi lam sgom 'tshal bas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ci mchis pa ji ltar
52b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngo bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub yongs su gnyer zhing theg pa gsum gyi lam
52b5(rgyud 'bum): s gom pas dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa yongs su bsngo bar 'dod pa nges nyin mtshan dus drug tu gus pas sems rtse gcig tu 'di skad ces bdag gis thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba zlas dkon mchog gsum po dag gi thang du rnal
52b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor bsgoms nas yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi srog chags dag la kha zas chang gcig tsam byin pa dang / dge ba'i tshig gis rtsod pa
52b7(rgyud 'bum): ngag gi bsdums byas pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song nas bslab pa'i gnas rnams yang dag par blangs pa dang / 'gyod tshangs byas pa dang / bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa dang
53a1(rgyud 'bum): rjes su yi rang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag dang / bdag gis thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ 'gyod cing 'phangs pa med par sems can thams cad la yongs su gtang
53a2(rgyud 'bum): ngornam par grol ba'i phyogs kyis yongs su gzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen cing gzigs pa dpag tu med pa dang thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i
53a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dag pas/ 'di ltar bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan ma'i sems la mi gnas shing / mtshan ma'i sems kyang mi spyod par sems can thams cad la yongs su btang ba de
53a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ bdag gis bsod nams las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la yongs su gtong ste/ thams cad kyis yid bzhin gyi lag pa thob nas/ nam mkha' las
53a5(rgyud 'bum): rin po che byung ste/ sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su bskang bar gyur cig/ longs spyod zad mi shes pa dang / shes rab mthar thug pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi spobs pa thogs pa med pa thob nas/ sems can
53a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang thun mong du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'thob par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i rgyas dge ba'i chos tshad med pa
53a7(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ / gzhan yang 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams spyad pa spyod pa na bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam pa thams
53b1(rgyud 'bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa dang / da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa dag gis ji ltar yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu
53b2(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bsngo'o/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gi dbang gis sems can thams cad dang dus gcig tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas gzhan dag ji lta
53b3(rgyud 'bum): ba bzhin du/ byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub kyi snying po la gnas te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thogs pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa dang / zad mi shes pa'i chos kyi gzungs dang /
53b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ bdud sdig can gyi dmag tshogs tshad med pa dag pham par byas te/ mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa mngon par rtogs nas 'di ltar de dag thams cad skad
53b5(rgyud 'bum): cig ma gcig la gsal bar rtogs te/ nam gyi smad la bdud rtsi'i chos thob nas/ zil mngar gyi don mngon sum du gyur te/ bdag dang sems can thams cad sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa
53b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / sangs rgyas 'phags pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas dam pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang / sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas seng ge'i 'od dang /
53b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas 'od brgya pa dang / sangs rgyas dran pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas rin chen mtshan dang / sangs rgyas rin chen 'bar ba dang / sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas rgyas par 'bar ba'i 'od dang
54a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bkra shis bla ma'i rgyal po dang / sangs rgyas dam pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas bkod pa'i mchog dang / sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / sangs rgyas bla ma 'phags
54a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku dang / sangs rgyas mngon par dga' ba'i gzugs sku dang / sangs rgyas 'od zer kun tu snang mdzad dang / sangs rgyas tshangs pa rnam dag rgyal po dang / sangs rgyas bla ma'i rang bzhin la sogs pa ji
54a3(rgyud 'bum): lta ba bzhin du gya nom par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par mkhyen pa de dag 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul
54a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes nas/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor te/ sems can yongs su bzlas pa bzhin du bdag kyang de bzhin du gyur
54a5(rgyud 'bum): cig ces rgya cher gong du bstan pa bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu shin tu dang ba'i ngang pa dang ldan pa'i skyes pa'am/ bud med gang la la zhig gser 'ong dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdze sder
54a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po las/ las kyi slob pa yongs su sbyong ba'i le'u 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / dran pas mi brjed par byas te/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston
