54a7(rgyud 'bum): par byed na/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med dpag tu med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa thams cad dus gcig
54b1(rgyud 'bum): tu mi'i lus mngon par grub par gyur la/ mi'i lus thob nas kyang thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mngon par 'grub par gyur te/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la zhig nam 'tshe'i bar du bkur sti
54b2(rgyud 'bum): dang bla mar byas te/ yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs bzhi po dag gis mchod par byas te/ rang sangs rgyas re re la'ang so so nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang mnyam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ rang sa
54b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu'ang rin po che las mchod rten brtsigs nas mchod pa byas te/ mchod rten de dag kyang dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam du mtho zhing me tog dang / spos dang /
54b4(rgyud 'bum): rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs mang po dag gis rtag par mchod pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang zag de dag gis thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni ci mang ba
54b5(rgyud 'bum): yin snyam mam/ lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu'ang mang lags so// rigs kyi bu gal te gang la la zhig gis gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las
54b6(rgyud 'bum): las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyong ba'i le'u 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / dran pas mi brjed par byas/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan pas 'thob pa'i bsod
54b7(rgyud 'bum): nams gang yin pa de sngar bstan pa'i mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de dang skrun na/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ brgya stong dang bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ tshang dang / dpe dang / rgya'i bar du'ang /
55a1(rgyud 'bum): bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor
55a2(rgyud 'bum): lo yongs su bskor bar gsol ba 'debs par byed na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rab tu dgyes nas bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur bas so// rigs kyi bu ngas ji skad bstan pa bzhin du/ sbyin pa thams cad
55a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi nang na chos kyi sbyin pa ni mchog tu gyur pa yin pas/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// gsum la skyabs su 'gro zhing bslab pa thams cad srung ba bskul
55a4(rgyud 'bum): zhing nyams par ma byas pa dang / las gsum stongs par ma gyur pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// 'jig rten thams cad kyi mthu dang / nus pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag
55a5(rgyud 'bum): tu byang chub kyi sems skyed par bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nus so/ / dus gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems can ji snyed yod pa thams cad thogs pa med pa thob nas/ bsod nams
55a6(rgyud 'bum): tshad med par myur du yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so/ / dus gsum gyi zhing dag na yod pa'i sems can thams cad thogs pa med par byang chub gsum po ngag thob par byas pas kyang
55a7(rgyud 'bum): dpe byar ma nus so/ / dus gsum gyi zhing dag na yod pa'i sems can thams cad myur du ngan 'gro bzhi po'i sdug bsngal las 'byung bar bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// dus gsam gyi zhing dgan
55b1(rgyud 'bum): yod pa'i sems can thams cad me dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa shin tu lci ba dag yongs su sbyang bar bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nus so/ / sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par bya bar bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi
55b2(rgyud 'bum): nus so/ / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang sdug bsngal gyis gzir cing nyon mongs pa thams cad las grol bar byas pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar sems can thams
55b3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed dag la rjes su yi reng bar bskul nas/ byang chub kyi smon lam btab pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// sdig pa'i spyod pa dang gshe zhing spro ba'i las yongs su bsal bar bskul ba
55b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par smon pa dang / skye ba thams cad du dkon mchogs gsum po thams cad la mchod pa dang / bla mar bya ba dang / bsngags pa brjod par bskul ba dang / sems can
55b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams bsod nams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa mngon par sgrub par bskul nas/ byang chub yongs su rdzogs par byas pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dus gsum
55b6(rgyud 'bum): gyi dkon mchog gsum la bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya bar bskul ba dang / bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor bar bskul zhing gsol ba
55b7(rgyud 'bum): btab pa dang / bskal pa tshad med pa snyed du 'jig rten na bzhugs nas/ chos mchog dam pa zab mo bshad par bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni shin tu zab pas gang gis
56a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang dpe byar mi nus par rig par bya'o/ / de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / gang+gA'i lha mo dang / tshangs pa'i rgyal po dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha tshad med pa rnams stan las langs
56a2(rgyud 'bum): bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang
56a3(rgyud 'bum): gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di thos pas/ thams cad yongs su bzung ste klog pa dang / g.yar ton du 'don pa dang / kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag
56a4(rgyud 'bum): par bstan nas chos 'di la brten te rab tu gnas par bgyid do/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar 'tshal bas/ don
56a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid khyad par du 'phags pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas chos bzhin du spyod pa'i slad du'o/ / de nas tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pas rmos bshad pa'i gnas de nyid du/ me tog man da ra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
56a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor bas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'dzag rten gyi khams kyis chen po thams cad rab tu g.yos par gyur to// lha'i rnga bo che dang rol mo thams cad kyang ma dkrol bar
56a7(rgyud 'bum): rang sgra byung ste/ gser gyi kha dog gi 'od zer bkye nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu khyab par bkang ste sgra dbyangs dam pa byung bar gyur pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ brgya byin lha'i
56b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di dag thams cad ni gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu lags pas/ byams pa dang thugs rje rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su
56b2(rgyud 'bum): skyob cing phan 'dogs pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su sbyong bar mdzad lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
56b3(rgyud 'bum): de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par dran te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa brgya stong tshad med pa snyed 'das pa de'i tshe de'i
56b4(rgyud 'bum): dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya brgyad cu'i bar du 'jig rten
56b5(rgyud 'bum): na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad kyis lha dang / mi dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sems can thams cad
56b6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bzlas nas/ bde bar mdzad pa'i phyir 'jig rten du byung ba na/ 'dus pa dang po la chos bstan pas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong snyed yongs su bzlas nas/ thams cad kyis
56b7(rgyud 'bum): dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pas/ zag pa rnams zad nas rig pa gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / thogs pa med pa'i rang dbang dang ldan par gyur to// 'dus pa gnyis pa'i tshe'ang
57a1(rgyud 'bum): srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong dgu bcu yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob nas/ zag pa rnams zad nas rig pa gsum dang
57a2(rgyud 'bum): mngon par shes pa drug dang / thogs pa med pa'i rang dbang dang ldan par gyur to// 'dus pa gsum pa'i tshe'ang srog nags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong dgu bcu yongs su bzlas nas/ thams cad kyis
57a3(rgyud 'bum): dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pas zhes bya ba'ang rgyas par gong ma bzhin no/ / rigs kyi bu nga de'i tshe bud med kyi lus su gyur te/ ming ni bsod nams rin po che'i 'od ces bya'o// 'dus pa gsum pa'i tshe
57a4(rgyud 'bum): 'ang bcom ldan 'das de la nye bar bsnyen nas/ / gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di yongs su bzung ste bklags/ kha ton du bton nas gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
57a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nges nga la bu mo bsod nams rin po che'i 'od 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
57a6(rgyud 'bum): rog pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung
57a7(rgyud 'bum): bstan te/ bud med kyi lus spangs nas/ de tshun chad ngan 'gro bzhi las yang dag par 'das te/ lha dang mi'i nang du skyes nas bde ba mchog myong bar gyur to// tshe rabs stong phrag bzhi brgya brgyang cu'i bar du 'khor
57b1(rgyud 'bum): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byas te/ deng yang dag par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du'ang grags pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu gang zhing rgyas par gyur pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa
57b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'ong chen snang mdzad bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor nas/ chos mchog dam pa bshad pa mthong bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu 'jig
57b3(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nas/ shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong snyed 'das nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po
57b4(rgyud 'bum): che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar de na bzhugs te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas/ chos mchog dam pa bshad nas skye dgu rnams la phan 'dogs par mdzad pas/ khyod kyis mthong ba ni sangs rgyas de
57b5(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad de'i mtshan thos par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / yongs su
57b6(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ / bud med gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos par gyur na/ 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de'i thad du gshegs par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshes
57b7(rgyud 'bum): pa mthong ba'i dbang gis rnams kyang bud med kyi lus len par mi 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phan 'dogs shing / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub
58a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba dang las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su sbyong bar byed do/ / rigs kyi bu dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig
58a2(rgyud 'bum): gang na gnas pa'i gnas der/ gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par byed na/ yul de ni bsod nams kyi phan yon rnam pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/
58a3(rgyud 'bum): yul de'i rgyal po nad med de bgegs rnams dang bral ba dang / tshe ring zhing thogs pa med par gyur pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra med cing dmag tshegs dpa' bar 'gyur ba dang / bde ba'i longs spyod rgyas shing yang
58a4(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mi'i rgyal po de la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'khor rnams kyis rtag par lhan cig srung
58a5(rgyud 'bum): bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag dngos po 'di dag bden nam/ de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang
58a6(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin gyi 'khor rnams kyis skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ yul gang dag na mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di yang dag par bshad pa dang
58a7(rgyud 'bum): klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don par bgyid na/ yul gyi bdag po de dag la bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rtag par mchis nas/ yongs su srung bar bgyid par mchi ba dang / gnas pa na'ang
58b1(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig gnas par bgyid do/ / rgyal po de la gdon bgegs dang rgol ba'i dgra zhig mchis na'ang / de dag thams cad bdag cag rgyal po bzhi la sogs pas rab tu zhi bar bgyid do// mya ngan dang rims nad la
58b2(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'ang bsal zhing sos par bgyis nas/ tshe 'phel ba dang / dge ba'i rtags 'byung ba dang / smon pa rnams bsams pa bzhin 'grub pa dang / rtag tu dga' ba bskyed par bgyi'o// bdag cag gis yul
58b3(rgyud 'bum): de na dmag tshogs ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad dpa' zhing brtsan par gyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag legs so// khyed kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du khyed kyis mngon par
58b4(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul gyi bdag po de dag chos bzhin du spyod pa'i dus na/ 'bangs thams cad kyang rgyal po'i rjes su mngon par sgrub cing chos bzhin du spyod par byed pas/ khyed la sogs pa'ang
58b5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs dang / stobs dang / phan yon mchog thob par 'gyur zhing gzhal med khang 'od dang ldan pa dang / 'khor rnams kyang brtsan zhing rgyas par gyur pas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa
58b6(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pas/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no zhes gsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gang du mdo sde dam pa yang dag par ston cing klog pa dang / spel ba'i yul de'i blon po chen po
58b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / nang blon rnams phan yon rnam pa bzhi 'thab par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dang po ni phan tshun 'dus shing nye bar sems pa'o// tha mar byed cing sdug par sems pa'o// gnyis pa ni rtag par ma'i rgyal por
59a1(rgyud 'bum): snying du sdug cing bkur ba dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / yul chen po dang / yul chung ngu'i mi rnams kyis btsun par byed pa'o// gsum pa ni nor la'ang dam par 'dzin cing / chos la
59a2(rgyud 'bum): btsun par byed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i khe mi tshol bas snyan pa'i sgra kun tu grags nas mang po kun gyis dkur bar 'gyur ba'o// bzhi pa ni tshe ring zhing bde skyid par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di dag ni phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes
59a3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / gal te yul gyi bdag po gang la la zhig gis mdo sde yang dag par ston par byed na/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams phan yon khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa 'azhi 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ dang po ni gos dang /
59a4(rgyud 'bum): bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman rnams kyis 'phongs pa med pa gang yin pa'o// gnyis pa ni thams cad sems bde bar yid la sems shing klog pa dang kha ton gdon par 'gyur ro//
59a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa ni ri ring nags tshal dag na gnas pa na/ re bar gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi pa ni sems kyis ji ltar smon pa bzhin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di dag ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i
59a6(rgyud 'bum): phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o/ / gal te yul la lar mdo sde 'di yang dag par ston par byed na/ mo thams cad dar zhing skyid pa dang / rims nad rnams med pa dang / tshong pa dang 'gron po phan tshun 'gro ba nor dang rin po che
59a7(rgyud 'bum): mang du thob pa dang / bsod nams khyad par du 'phags pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di dag na yon tan gyi ngan yon rnam pa sna tshogs shes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshangs pa dang / dargya byin dang / rgyal po chen po ching
59b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor mang po rnams kyis 'ang skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das mdo sde don zab mo 'di lta bu mngon du gnas par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang 'jig rten na
59b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas shing nub par mi 'gyur la/ nam mdo sde 'di lta bu nub par gyur pa na yang dag pa'i chos kyang nub par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin
59b3(rgyud 'bum): no/ / de de bzhin te/ de lta bas na khyed kyis gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di las tshig gcig gam/ sde gcig kyang rung ste/ thams cad sems rtse gcig tu yang dag par bzlog par bya/ yang dag par kha ton
59b4(rgyud 'bum): du 'don par bya/ yang dag par mnyan par bya/ yang dag par gzung bar bya/ yang dag par yod la bsam par bya zhing / yang dag par bsgoms nas sems can mang po'i ched du rgya cher yang dag par bstan te/
59b5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su spel bar byed na/ yun ring por bde skyid cing bsod nams kyi phan yon mtha' med do// de nas 'khor mang po rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas/ thams cad
59b6(rgyud 'bum): phan yon khyad par du 'phags pa thob par gyur pas rab tu dga' zhing mgu bas yang dag par bzung bar gyur to/ / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ las kyi sgrib pa rnam
59b7(rgyud 'bum): par sbyong ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/ / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo bam po bzhi pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
60a1(rgyud 'bum): seng ge'i mtshan thogs pa med pache 'od zer 'bar ba 'khor bye ba phrag tshad med pa snyed pang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
60a2(rgyud 'bum): lhang sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ me tog dang / spos dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs
60a3(rgyud 'bum): kyis mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen du zhig gis ni byang chub kyi sems 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / gang byang chub kyi sems zhes bgyi lags/ bcom
60a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das byang chub gang lags pa de la ni/ da ltar gyi sems kyang dmigs su ma mchis/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyang dmigs su ma mchis/ 'das pa'i sems kyang dmigs su ma mchis lags so// byang chub
60a5(rgyud 'bum): las gud na'ang byang chub kyi sems dmigs su ma mchis lags so/ / byang chub ces bgyi ba ni tshig gis brjod du ma mchis pas/ sems kyang gzugs ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ dngos po
60a6(rgyud 'bum): dang las ma mchis pa/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ sems can yang dmigs su ma mchis shing / khong du chud par yang mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos zab mo'i don gang
60a7(rgyud 'bum): lags par rig par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub kyi dngos po dang las ni shin tu gya nom pas/ mngon
60b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'du bya ba'ang dmigs par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub las gud na'ang byang chub kyi sems dmigs par mi 'gyur bas/ byang chub ces bya ba ni brjod du med pa/ sems kyang brjod du med pa/ gzugs
60b2(rgyud 'bum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang / dngos po dang las med pa/ sems can thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub dang sems gnyis karang de bzhin du mtshungs pa'i phyir dang / mngon du
60b3(rgyud 'bum): byed pa dang / mngon du bya ba mnyam par gyur pa'i phyir te/ 'on kyang chos rnams shes par bya ba med par ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis de ltar shes par bya/
60b4(rgyud 'bum): ba gang yin pa de ni/ chos rnams mngon par rtogs pa dang / byang chub dang / byang chub kyi sems legs par bshad pa zhes bya'o// byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs
60b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin te/ sems kyang de bzhin no// sems can yang de bzhin te/ 'di la mtshan nyid gnyis yang dag par dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad la
60b6(rgyud 'bum): skye ba med pa'i phyir ro/ / byang chub kyang dmigs su med/ byang chub kyi ming yang dmigs su med/ sems can dang sems can gyi ming yang dmigs su med/ nyan thos dang nyan thos kyi ming yang dmigs
60b7(rgyud 'bum): su med/ rang sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ming yang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa' dang byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang dmigs su med/ sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yang dmigs
61a1(rgyud 'bum): su med/ spyod pa dang spyod pa ma yin pa'ang migs su med/ spyod pa dang spyad pa ma yin pa'i ming yang dmigs su med/ 'di ltar dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rab tu dbyen
61a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chos thams cad la rab tu gnas pa yin to/ / 'di'ang bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la badzin nas skye bar 'gyur ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rin po che'i rgyal po ri rab thams
61a3(rgyud 'bum): cad la phan 'dogs par byed pa de bzhin du/ byang chub kyi sems 'di'ang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir/ 'di ni dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper
61a4(rgyud 'bum): nas chen po bzhin du dngos po mang po yong su 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni gnyis pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa
61a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig pu 'gro ba la 'jigs pa med pa de bzhin du/ skrag cing dngang ba dang bral bar gyur pa'i phyir/ 'di ni gsum pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung gi
61a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor stobs po che shugs drag cing myur ba de bzhin du sems la nur ba med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni bzhi pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na rin po che sna
61a7(rgyud 'bum): bdun gyi gzhal med khang brtsegs ma them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ sgo bzhi nas shin tu bsil ba'i rlung gis bus pas shin tu bde ba myong ba de bzhin du/ bsam gtan gyi chos kyi gter yongs su btsal
61b1(rgyud 'bum): nas gang zhing rgyas par byed pa'i phyir/ 'doni lnga pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di sa ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer rgyas par gyur pa de bzhin du/ sems 'das
61b2(rgyud 'bum): kyang myur ba kho nar 'khor ba'i ma rig pa'i mun nag 'joms par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni drug pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na tshong dpon gyis thams cad kyi sems
61b3(rgyud 'bum): la smon pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin du/ sems 'das kyang 'khor ba'i lam nyam nga ba las yongs su 'das nas yon tan gyi rin po che thob pa'i phyir/ 'di ni bdun pa thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes
61b4(rgyud 'bum): khyad par du 'phags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba yongs su dag cing shin tu rgyas pa la rab rib med pa de bzhin du/ sems 'dis kyang spyod yul thams cad las rnam par
61b5(rgyud 'bum): dag pa phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni brgyad pa smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dmag la dbang ba blon po chen po yid bzhin du dbang
61b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa bzhin du/ sems 'dis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa shin tu brgyan pa dang / yon tan tshad med pas skye dgu rnams la rgya cher phan 'dogs par byed pa'i phyir 'di ni dgu pa stobs kyi pha
61b7(rgyud 'bum): rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o/ / 'di lnga ste/ dper na nam mkha' la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du/ sems 'dis kyang spyod yul thams cad la thogs pa med cing gnas thams cad du rang dbang thob nas
62a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba'i sar phyin par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni bcu pa ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya ste/ 'di lta bu'i rgyu bcu la khyed kyis rab tu brtson pas bslab par bya'o// rigs kyi bu
62a2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / snying rje dang / 'dod pa yongs su 'chol ba
62a3(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad yongs su sdud pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i yongs su 'chol ba gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu/
62a4(rgyud 'bum): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
62a5(rgyud 'bum): lnga gang zhe na/ las rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ngan 'gro'i sgo rnams gcod cing bde 'gro'i sgo 'byed pa dang
62a6(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'das pa dang / bsod nams thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
62a7(rgyud 'bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
62b1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / lnga gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gi nyon mongs pa 'dul bar nus pa dang / lus dang srog la 'phangs pa med par bde ba yongs su mi 'chol zhing 'du shes nye bar zhi bar byed pa
62b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / sngon gyi las la bsams nas sdug bsngal dang phrad par gyur na'ang dang du len par nus pa dang / byams pa dang snying rje'i bsam pa bskyed nas sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
62b3(rgyud 'bum): momi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa zab mo theb par gyur pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes
62b4(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa rnams
62b5(rgyud 'bum): dang lhan cig gnas par mi mos pa dang / bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur kyi bar du bde ba nyams su len par mi byed pa dang / dka' ba sna tshogs spyod pa la yongs su skyo ba'i bsam pa mi skyed pa dang /
62b6(rgyud 'bum): byams pa dang snying rje chen pos yongs su bsdus nas phan 'dogs pa'i thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su gnyer bar smon pa gang yin pa
62b7(rgyud 'bum): ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
63a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// snga gang zhe na/ dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su bsdus nas
63a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'thor bar mi byed pa'i phyir dang / rtag par grol bar smon cing mtha' gnyis la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa'i phyir dang / mngon par shes pa thob nas sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin
63a3(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa smon pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su sbyangs nas sems kyi dri ma sel bar byed pa'i phyir dang / sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba yongs su gcod par byed pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu 'di na
63a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos
63a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa lnga la rten nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ rtag par sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / gsal zhing thabs mkhas pa thams cad
63a6(rgyud 'bum): la mchod cing nye bar brten nas/ yongs su skyo ba mi skyed cing rgyab kyis phyogs par mi byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos zab mo bshad pa de dag sems kyis rtag tu thos par mos shing yos
63a7(rgyud 'bum): su mi skyo ba dang / chog pa'i bsam pa med pa dang / don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi shes rab dam pas rab tu rnam par 'byed par mos pa dang / sgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad myur du spong
63b1(rgyud 'bum): pab dang / 'jig rten pa'i mabyung dpyad dang rig pa'i gnas lnga'i chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'dini byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyis
63b2(rgyud 'bum): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la rten nas/ thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
63b3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / lnga gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi mos pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa dang / chos tshad med
63b4(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyi gnyen po'i sgo thams cad sems kyis gsal bar rtogs pa dang / byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin las 'byung zhing 'jug pa dag la rang dbang thob pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnam
63b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms nas yongs su smin cing phun sum tshogs par bya bar mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma lus par yongs su bsdus nas mngon par rtogs par smon pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs
63b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa
63b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ chos thams cad gzod ma nas mi skye mi 'gag yod pa ma
64a1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ med pa'ang ma yin pa dag la sems bde bar gnas pa dang / chos thams cad kyi don gyi tshul mchog dam pa dag la dri ma dang bral zhing rnam par dag par so sor brtags
64a2(rgyud 'bum): nas sems bde bar gnas pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i sems kyis de bzhin nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa spyod pa med pa tha dad ma yin/ mi g.yo ba dag la sems bde
64a3(rgyud 'bum): bar gnas pa dang / sems can rnams la phan gdags par 'dod pa'i phyir/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dag la sems bde bar gnas pa dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dus gcig tu mnyam par spyod pa dag la
64a4(rgyud 'bum): sems bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang
64a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis sems
64a6(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang legs nyes rab tu shes pa dang / sems can thams cad shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i chos la gzud par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba dag gis
64a7(rgyud 'bum): las kyi rkyen rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang rang bzhin rnam pa gsum yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam par 'byed cing khong du chud bar
64b1(rgyud 'bum): byed pa dang / sems can rnams la tshul bzhin du yang dag par bstan nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de yongs su smin par byas nas/ ye shes kyi stobs kyis yongs su sgrol ba gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi
64b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
64b3(rgyud 'bum): ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ chos rnams kyi legs nyes rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / nag po dang dkar po'i chos
64b4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su mi spong zhing yang dag par sdud par byed pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag la yongs su mi skyo zhing mngon par mi dga' ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan
64b5(rgyud 'bum): pas mthar thug pa'i gnas su phyin par gyur pa dang / dbang bskur ba mchog thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la sogs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par gyur pa gang yin
64b6(rgyud 'bum): pa ste rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gang yin
64b7(rgyud 'bum): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan 'dogs pa'i mchog mngon par sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// shin tu zab pa'i ye shes chen po tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha
65a1(rgyud 'bum): rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ / spyod pa dang spyod pa ma yin pa'i chos dag la sems kyis mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs dang rtsa
65a2(rgyud 'bum): ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan yang dag par rig cing / yang dag par so sor rtog pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// gti mug dang ldan pa'i gang zag dang shes rab dang ldan pa'i gang zag thams cad
65a3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su sdud par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ / chos kyi rin po che gya nom pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu ston pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// thogs pa med pa'i rnam par grol
65a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang shes rab yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ / chos kyi khams dang sems can gyi khams yang dag par rnam phye nas shes par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i nger
65a5(rgyud 'bum): to/ / sbyin pa la sogs pa nas ye shes kyi bar dag phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas su phyin par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/
65a6(rgyud 'bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// mngon par byang chub nas sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu dang
65a7(rgyud 'bum): bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mtshan nyid gnyis med par
65b1(rgyud 'bum): rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ / thams cad la phan 'dogs shing yongs su zlos pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// mu stegs can thams cad nye bar 'ongs na gal te dro ba dag
65b2(rgyud 'bum): la legs par rnam par bshad nas 'dul bar byed pa gang yin pa den pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ / chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu gya nom pa rnam pa bcu gnyis yongs su bskor ba gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i
65b3(rgyud 'bum): don to/ / mngon par zhen pa med cing mthong ba med pa dang skyon dang 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba
65b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med dpag tu med pa rnams rin po che'i gter rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu gang ba dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs
65b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sa gzhi lag mthol ltar mnyam pa/ kha dog shin tu gya nom pa/ tshad med pa/
65b6(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / yongs su dag pa rin po che'i rgyan gyi rnam pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum
65b7(rgyud 'bum): pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid kyi lus shin tu dpa' ba go chas rab tu brgyan pas phyir rgol ba thams cad pham par byas pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong
66a1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ phyogs bzhi nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis me tog dam pa rnam pa sna
66a2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs mngon par gtor bas/ sa gzhi kun tu khyab par bkram pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan
66a3(rgyud 'bum): ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i 'phreng ba sna tshogs kyis lus kun tu khyab par brgyan pa/ mgo me tog gicod pan gyis brgyan pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs
66a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi rdzing bu them skas kyi lam bzhi dang ldan pa/ gser gyi bye ma kun tu brdal ba/ yongs su dang
66a5(rgyud 'bum): zhing dri ma med pa yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus kun tu gang ba/ me tog ut+pal dang / ku mud dang / puN+Da ri kas kun tu bkram pa/ me tog gi rdzing bu'i nang na rnam par rtsen pa dag shin tu bde skyid pa dang
66a6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su dag cing dpe zla med pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
66a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i mdun du sems can rnams sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs pa dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthus ltung bar mi 'gyur la/ smras pa'ang med/ 'jigs shing skrag pa'ang med par gyur
66b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid kyi lus kyi g.yas g.yon na seng
66b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal pos yongs su bsrungs pas/ gcan gzan mang po thams cad skrag cing 'jigs par gyur pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i
66b3(rgyud 'bum): sa dgu pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor 'bum phrag tshad med pas yongs su bskor nas mchod pa byed pa dang / spyi bo'i gdugs dkar ma tshan po che sna tshogs tshad med
66b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dag gis rab tu brgyan pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
66b5(rgyud 'bum): gser gyi kha dog kun tu 'phro ba/ 'od zer yongs su dag pa tshad med pa thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa la/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'bum phrag tshad med pa dag gis/ sku gser gyi kha dog kun tu 'phro ba yongs
66b6(rgyud 'bum): su bskor nas bkur sti dang mchod pa byas pas/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu gya nom pa yongs su bskor ba dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sa dang
66b7(rgyud 'bum): po la ci'i phyir rab tu dga' ba zhes bya zhe na/ 'di ltar thog ma kho nar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems sngon ma thob pa deng gdong thob nas/ sgrub pa chen po dag ji ltar smon pa bzhin du mngon par grub par gyur
67a1(rgyud 'bum): pas/ rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir sa dang po ni rab tu dga' ba zhes bya'o// dri ma shin tu phra mo dang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa thams cad yongs su dag par gyur
67a2(rgyud 'bum): pas/ de'i phyir sa gnyis pa ni dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i 'od zer snang ba sgrub par mi nus shi'i thul bar mi 'gyur ba dang / thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs tsam par 'gyur
67a3(rgyud 'bum): bas/ de'i phyir sa gsum pa ni 'od byed pa'i sa zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi mes nyon mongs pa rnams bsregs nas 'od kyi snang ba 'phel bar byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs sgom par byed pas/ de'i phyir sa
67a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa ni khong 'phro ba'i sa zhes bya'o/ / thabs mkhas pas bsgoms pa'i ye shes mchog rang dbang du gyur pa shin tu 'thob par dka' ba'i phyir dang / mthong ba dang sgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs
67a5(rgyud 'bum): pa gdul bar dka' ba thul bar gyur pa'i phyir/ sa lnga pa ni shin tu rgyal bar dka' zhes bya'o// spyod pa'i chos rgyun chad med par gsal bar mngon sum du gyur pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad
67a6(rgyud 'bum): mngon sum du gyur pas/ de'i phyir sa drug pa ni mngon sum du gyur pa zhes bya'o// zag pa med pa bar chad med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin yun ring po nas
67a7(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms pa'i phyir dang / sa de rnam par dag cing thogs pa med par gyur pa'i phyir/ sa bdun pa ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o// mtshan ma med pa yid la bsgoms pas rang dbang du gyur nas/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bskul
67b1(rgyud 'bum): bar mi nus pas/ de'i phyir sa brgyad pa ni mi g.yo ba zhes bya'o// tha dad par gyur pa'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad bstan pa la rang dbang thob nas/ nyes pa med cing 'brel pa med par shes rab 'phel bar byed pa
67b2(rgyud 'bum): dang dbang du gyur cing thogs pa med par gyur pas/ de'i phyir sa dgu pa ni legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o// chos kyi sku nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang shes rab sprin chen po lta bur gyur nas/ thams cad kun tu khyab
67b3(rgyud 'bum): par g.yogs par byed pa'i phyir/ de lta bas na sa bcu pa ni chos kyi sprin zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu bdag dang chos la mtshan ma yod par mngon par zhen pa'i ma rig pa dang / 'gro ba'i ngan 'gro la skrag cing 'jig
67b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa dang po la sgrib par byed do/ / bslab pa'i gnas phra mo dag la shes bzhin med pas nyams par byas pa'i ma rig pa dang / las kyi 'du byed rnam pa sna tshogs slong bar byed
67b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa gnyis pa la sgrib par byed do// ma thob pa thob par 'dod pa la sred cing mngon par zhen pa'i ma rig pa dang / gzungs khyad par du 'phags pa dag la
67b6(rgyud 'bum): sgrib par byed pa'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa gsum pa la sgrib par byed do// snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba la mngon par dga' ba'i ma rig pa dang / shin tu gya nom pa'i chos rnam par
67b7(rgyud 'bum): dag pa la sred cing mos pa'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa bzhi pa la sgrib par byed do// 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i ma rig pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par gzhol ba'i
68a1(rgyud 'bum): ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa lnga pa la sgrib par byed do// rnal 'byor mngon du rgyu ba'i ma rig pa dang / mtshan ma rags pa mngon du snang ba'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa
68a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di gnyis kyis ni sa drug pa la sgrib par byed do/ / mtshan ma shin tu phra mo rnams la mngon sum du spyod pa'i ma rig pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa la mngon par dga' ba'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di/
68a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyis ni sa bdun pa la sgrib par byed do// mtshan ma med par sgom par mngon par rtsol ba'i mi rig pa dang / mtshan ma la dbang thob pa la mngon par zhen pa'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni
68a4(rgyud 'bum): sa brgyad pa la sgrib par byed do/ / bstan par bya ba'i don tshad med pa dang / ming dang tshig dang / yi ge tshad med pa gnyis po 'di dag la mi mkhas pa'i ma rig pa dang / tshig gi spobs pa yid bzhin du ma gyur pa'i ma
68a5(rgyud 'bum): rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa dgu pa la sgrib par byed do// rdzu 'phrul chen po ston pa la rang dbang ma thob pa'i ma rig pa dang / shin tu phra ba'i gsang ba'i las kyi dngos po khong du ma chud pa'i ma rig
68a6(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa bcu pa la sgrib par byed do// spyod yul thams cad la shes bya phra mos bsgribs pa'i ma rig pa dang / nyon mongs pa shin tu phra ba'i gnas ngan len gyi ma rig pa ste/ ma rig
68a7(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sangs rgyas kyi sa la sgrib par byed do/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sa dang po la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa gnyis pa la tshul
68b1(rgyud 'bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do/ / sa gsum pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa bzhi pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa lnga pa la bsam gtan
68b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do/ / sa drug pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa bdun pa la thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes mchog gi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod par byed do//
68b3(rgyud 'bum): sa brgyad pa la smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa dgu pa la stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa bcu pa ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// rigs kyi bu
68b4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ sems bskyed pa dang pos rin chen mchog gi ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do// sems bskyed pa gnyis pas yid du 'ong ba'i ting nge 'dzin
68b5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do/ / sems bskyed pa gsum pas shin tu bskul bar dka' ba'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do// sems bskyed pa bzhi pas phyir mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs
68b6(rgyud 'bum): su sdud cing skyed par byed do/ / sems bskyed pa lnga pas rin po che'i me tog gi ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do// sems bskyed pa drug pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'bar ba'i
68b7(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do/ / sems bskyed pa bdun pas smon lam thams cad yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed de// sems
69a1(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa brgyad pas mngon sum du gnas par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do/ / sems bskyed pa dgu pas ye shes kyi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su
69a2(rgyud 'bum): sdud cing skyed par byed do/ / sems bskyed pa bcu pas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
69a3(rgyud 'bum): sems bskyed pa rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sa dang po las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni yon tan bslabs pa'i stobs zhes bya'o//
69a4(rgyud 'bum): denas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ pUr+Na ma no ra te ngo ho do ho/ yA pad sUd+yo/ a ba b+hA sa te/ yA bad tsan+na/ do dAn+te pad tra rak+Sha mA na/ dAn+te pa ri hA raM ku ru swA hA/ rigs kyi gru
69a5(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags
69a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ 'di lta ste/ stag dang / sbyang ki dang / seng ge dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa dang / yi dgas dang / mo dang / mi ma yin pa
69a7(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pas phyir rgol pa dang / gdon rigags dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sadang po ma brjod tsa
69b1(rgyud 'bum): su dran par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa gnyis pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni shin tu bde ba'i gnas shes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ mun+ta ma tsa ra tsir/
69b2(rgyud 'bum): At+to ra/ tor NA ma/ shAn+to shAn+te/ ut+to li/ hu ru hu ru swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di nau geng+ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa gnyis pa'i byang chub
69b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas
69b4(rgyud 'bum): ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing / slob pa lnga las
69b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam par grol nas/ sa gnyis pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa gsum pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni shin tu
69b6(rgyud 'bum): / rgyal bar dka' ba'i stobs zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ dan+d+ha tse ge/ ban thi kaM/ kar thi ko'u ra Shi/ ke yU re/ dAn+ti ri swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das
69b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa gsum pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gzungs sngags 'di la ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ gcan
70a1(rgyud 'bum): gza nam rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa las
70a2(rgyud 'bum): thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa gsum pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa bzhi pa las thob pa'i
70a3(rgyud 'bum): gzungs gang yin pa de ni rgya cher phan 'jogs pa zhes bya'o/ / tad+ya thA/ sha ra na ri/ d+ha ma no// dA ma no/ d+hA ra d+hA raNi/ shi ri sha ra Ni/ bi shA ya/ rba shA la/ pA sha/ pa sha ni/ ban+d+ha ma te swAhA
70a4(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa bzhi pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ gang la la zhig gzungs
70a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang gdon bgegs dang
70a6(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las thar par 'gyur zhing sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa bzhi pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
70a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen pos sa lnga pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni yon tan sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya'o/ / tad+ya thA/ ba ri ha ri Ni/ tsi ra tsa ra Ni/ ka ri ma Ni/ saM ka ri ma Ni/ sa ma shAn+ni/ dzan+d+ha
70b1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ swa yaM b+hu be swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzung 'di ni gang+gA ri klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa lnga pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
70b2(rgyud 'bum): yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang
70b3(rgyud 'bum): mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa las thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa lnga pa mo byed cing rjes su
70b4(rgyud 'bum): / dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa drug pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ bi to ra bi ti ri/ ma ri Na
70b5(rgyud 'bum): ma ri Ni/ ki ri ko ri/ bi to dan+tu/ ru ru ru ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ du ru ba du ru ba/ sha sha shar+b+ha/ pa ri sha sid+d+hi/ sarba satwA nAn/ si d+h+waM tu ma ma man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi
70b6(rgyud 'bum): grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa drug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs
70b7(rgyud 'bum): su 'dzin par byed na/ gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis
71a1(rgyud 'bum): 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa drug pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
71a2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sa bdun pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni rnam par rgyal ba'i chos kyi spyod pa zhes bya'o/ / tad+ya thA/ dza ha dza ha ru dza ha ru/ bai du ke bai du ke/ a mr-i ta/ g+ha ne/ pu ru Sha
71a3(rgyud 'bum): Ni/ be du Sha Ni/ bai du ti ke ba ru bte/ bi d+ho ho ke/ b+hid+hi ba ra nI/ a mr-i ti ge/ ba hu dzu lu swAhA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pas sangs rgyas rnams kyis
71a4(rgyud 'bum): sa bdun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di khe ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ gcan gzan ma rungs pa
71a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / yi rigs ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa las thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib
71a6(rgyud 'bum): pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa bdun pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa brkyang ba las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni mo zad
71a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gter zhes bya'o/ / kad+yathA/ ri/ nari/ ri ka ri ru ru rba/ tsu ma tsu ru/ ba ni hri ga/ rigs sa bu gzungs ba ni gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi gyi mtha
71b1(rgyud 'bum): grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa brgyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing 'dzin par byed
71b2(rgyud 'bum): nagacan gzan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las thar par
71b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa brgyad pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa dgu pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni/
71b4(rgyud 'bum): tshad med pa'i sgo zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ha ra tsiN+Da la ki/ ku la mA b+ha te/ to ra si/ pa ta pa ta sa~M/ sha ra sha re/ ka shaM ri ke bi sha ra/ sad+d+hi sarba satwA nAn swAhA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung
71b5(rgyud 'bum): dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa dgu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin
71b6(rgyud 'bum): par byed na/ gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal
71b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis 'tsho ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas sa dgu pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen
72a1(rgyud 'bum): bos sa bcu pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de nani rdo rje'i ri rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya'o/ / tad+ya thA/ sar+d+ha mu mad+d+ha/ mo can/ mok+Shan/ bi mri k+te/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ narma le/
72a2(rgyud 'bum): mAng+ga l+ye/ hi ra t+ya gan+d+ha/ rAt+na gar+b+hA/ sa man+ta/ sarba an+d+ra sAd+hA ni/ ma na si/ ma hA ma nas/ ad b+hU te/ a t+ya ta b+hu te/ a ts+yu te/ a mr-i ti/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ brag+ne/ brah+maswa re pU ra Ni pU ra Ni/ ma
72a3(rgyud 'bum): nor bre swahA/ rigs kyi bu dbang bskur ba'i bkra shis tshig gi gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung bcu pa'i grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su srung ba
72a4(rgyud 'bum): phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na// gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mo ma yin
72a5(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs kyi 'jigs pa rnams las thar par 'gyur zhing gdug pa'i gdon thams cad yongs su bsal nas rab tu zhi ba dang / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grom
72a6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ sa bcu pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i mtshan thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer 'bar bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzungs 'di
72a7(rgyud 'bum): dag bkas bshad pa thos pa dang / stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
72b1(rgyud 'bum): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal/ rgyas su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ zab mo mtshan ma med pa'i chos/ dpe med de la phyag kyang 'tshal// sems can yang dag shes
72b2(rgyud 'bum): stong la/ / bcom ldan zhag gcig sgrol bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen gsal spyan// nos gcig mtshan nyid mi gzigs kyang // yang dag chos kyi spyan gyis ni// thams cad kun gzigs pasam mi zag
72b3(rgyud 'bum): chos gcig bskyed par mi mdzad la/ / chos gcig mgog par mi mdzad pas// mnyam gtsigs 'di yi dbang gis na// bla med gnas su byon pa lags// 'khor bdag kyang mi 'jig la// mya ngan 'das la
72b4(rgyud 'bum): mi gnas shing / mtha' gnyis dag las chags pas// de srad mya ngan 'das pa brnyes// dag dang ma dag pa yi phyogs// bcom ldan ro gcig nyid mkhyen nas// rnam par rtog par mi mdzad skad//
72b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu rnam par dag pa brnyes// bcom ldan mtha' yas sku dag gis// yi ge 'bru gcig ma gsungs kyang // slob ma mang po kun la ni// chos kyi char gyis nim par mdzad// bcom ldan sam
72b6(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad la/ / mtshan nyid rnam pa med gzigs kyang // sdug bsngal dag gis gzar ba la// rtag par yongs su skyob par mdzad// sdug bsngal bde dang rtag mi rtag/ bdag dang bdag med la
72b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs dang / gcig mini tha dang tshan pa dang // skye med 'gag pa med pa yi/ de 'dra'i dan ni meng pa rnamapa/ bshad phyir bye brag mtshas cing na// dper na srang stong thag cha sar/ bcom ldan ta/
73a1(rgyud 'bum): gcig rab tu mkhyen// chos dbyings rtogs pa ma mchis pas// theg pa tha dad ma mchis kyang // sems can yongs su bsgral ba'i slad// rnam par bye nas gsum du gsungs
73a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas
73a3(rgyud 'bum): te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni shin tu dkon zhing dpag par dka' ba/ thog mar dge ba
73a4(rgyud 'bum): bar du dge ba/ mtha' mar dge ba/ tshig 'bru dang don yongs su rdzogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags pas gang gis yongs su 'dzin par bgyid
73a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gang zag de ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi drin bsab par bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa
73a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin no/ / rigs kyi bu gang gis mdo sde 'di nyan par byed pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dis
73a7(rgyud 'bum): ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par du 'phags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed cing chos kyi phyag rgya mchog dang / mdo sde mang po'i rgyal po yin pa'i phyir mnyan par
73b1(rgyud 'bum): bya yongs su gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kha ton du gdon par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa dang / de bzhi
73b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa de dag thams cad kyis ni shin tu gya nom pa'i chos 'di mnyan par mi nus so/ / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis mnyan nas yongs su 'dzin
73b3(rgyud 'bum): par byed na/ kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang nas/ mchog tu rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur/ rtag par sangs rgyas mthong zhing / sangs rgyas dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / yon tan
73b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams dang yongs su 'bral bar mi 'gyur/ rtag par chos gya nom pa thos shing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo mchog dam pa zad pa med cing 'grib pa med
73b5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ 'di lta ste/ rgya mtsho'i phyag yon tan mchog 'byung ba'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / sems kyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa dang / tshig mngon par rtogs pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa
73b6(rgyud 'bum): med pa dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer gyi gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / zla ba yongs su rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer gyi gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa
73b7(rgyud 'bum): med pa dang / rmongs pa rnams yongs su brtul nas/ yon tan gyi sku yang dag par ston pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / rdo rje'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa
74a1(rgyud 'bum): med pa dang / brjod du med pa'i don gyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi mdzod yang dag par ston pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i bden pa'i tshig gi cho ga'i sgra dbyangs man
74a2(rgyud 'bum): par rtogs pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa'i sems kyi spyod pa'i phyag rgya'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' med pa rnams
74a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par ston pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grob pa med pa de lta bu thams cad kyang rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu de lta bu la sogs pa zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs
74a4(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par sprul nas/ yang dag pa'i chos bla na med pa rnam pa sna
74a5(rgyud 'bum): tshogs ston par byed kyang chos kyi de bzhin nyid las g.yo ba'ang med/ gnas pa'ang med/ 'ong ba'ang med/ 'gro ba'ang med do// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba legs par yongs su smin par byas kyang /
74a6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su smin par byas pa'i sems can gcig tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par byed kyang / tshig las g.yos pa'ang med/ gnas pa'ang
74a7(rgyud 'bum): med/ 'gro ba'ang med/ 'ong ba'ang med/ skye 'gag med cing mngon du byed par 'gyur ro// rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir 'du byed kyi chos rnams la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med par bstan ce na/ chos
74b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid tha dad med pa'i phyir ro/ / chos 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag sum khri ni mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' tshang
74b2(rgyud 'bum): med pa snyed ni byang chub kyis las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / dge slong dang dge slong ma tshad med dpag tu med pa snyed ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to// srog chags tshad med pa snyed na byang chub tu sems
74b3(rgyud 'bum): bskyed par gyur to/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ mos mchog 'khor ba'i rgyun las zlog mdzad pa/ shin tu zab cing gya nom mthong bar dka'// sems
74b4(rgyud 'bum): can dmus long 'dod pas rab g.yogs nas/ / ma mthong phyir ni sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong // de nas 'khor mang po rnams cig car stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
74b5(rgyud 'bum): bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gang du gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di klog tsa'i 'don pa'i
74b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas der bdag cag 'khor mang po rnams der mchis te/ nyan pa'i 'khor bgyis nas/ 'di ston pa'i mkhan po de la sman pa dang / bde ba dang / sgrib pa ma mchis shing lus dang sems bag yangs su
74b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba 'thob par bgyid do/ / bdag cag bsam pa thag pa nas mchod cing rim gro bgyid do// nyan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang rab tu bde zhing skyid par bgyid do// de dag gnas pa'i yul der yang phyir
75a1(rgyud 'bum): rgol ba'i dgra dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / gdon bgegs dang / mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams ma mchis par bgyis nas/ mi rnams rab tu dar zhing rgyas par bgyid do//
75a2(rgyud 'bum): chos 'di ston pa'i dkyil 'khor der lha dang / maM dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis btsog par mi bgyid cing / mi gtsang bas sbags par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos
75a3(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa'i gnas gang lags pa de ni mchod rten lags pas/ rtag par me tog dang / spos dang / lnga lnga dang / ba dan dang / gdugs rnams kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ bdag cag rnams kyang rtag par
75a4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su srung zhing / chung ba rnams yongs su spong bar bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed kyis nan tan brtson 'grus kyis mdo sde dam pa 'das
75a5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su sgom par byed na/ de nyid yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten du yun ring du gnas par gyur pa yin no// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i sa'i
75a6(rgyud 'bum): gzungs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o/ / / gser 'ong dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo bam po lnga pa// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang
75a7(rgyud 'bum): chub kyi shing gi sgo ma la 'di skad kyis bkar stsal to/ / rigs kyi lha mo khyod kyis 'dig shes par bya ste/ mdzes pa'i tig gis can ma tshu man/ gsar gyi rjengs pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin
75b1(rgyud 'bum): bsngags pa rjod pa dang / 'gyod tshangs kyi chos bstan pa'i sgra chen po byung ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gang yin pa de dag ngas khyod la rgya cher yang dag par bshad kyis/ sems rtse gcig tu legs par yid la zung zhig/ 'das
75b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dus kyi tshe rgyal po gser gyi klu'i bdag po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rtag par pad+ma'i dpes phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la mngon par bstod cing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// de nas 'khor mang po
75b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams la des mngon par bstod pa'i tshogs su bcad pa gang len pa bka' stsal pa/ 'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs sangs rgyas// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na bzhugs pa la// deng bdag rtse
75b4(rgyud 'bum): gcig spyo btud phyag bgyis te/ / rgyal ba rnams la rtse gcig bsngags par bgyi// bla med rnam par dag pa thub pa'i gtso// sku yi 'od kyis gsal mdzad gser mdog 'dra/
75b5(rgyud 'bum): sgra kun nang na mchog tu gyur pas na// tshangs chen dbyangs ltar 'brug sgra sgrogs par mdzad// dbu skra bung ba'i rgyab ltar rab gnag cing // g.yas su 'khyil ba'i ri mo sngon por gnas// tshems
75b6(rgyud 'bum): dkar gtams pa kha dog dung 'dra zhing / / rab mnyam kun gsal 'od zer dag dang ldan// rnam dag dri med rab tu mdzes pa'i spyan// ut+pal sngon po 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra// ljags kyi mtshan ni yangs
75b7(rgyud 'bum): shing shin tu mnyen/ / dper na pad+ma le brgan chab chung 'dra// smin mtshams rtag par 'od ni dkar po mngab/ g.yas su 'khyil ba chu shel kha dog mtshungs// shangs kyi dbyibs mthog ser gyi gar bu
76a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dra/ 'od mnyen rnam dag mtshan nyid nyams mi mnga'// 'jig rten dri mchog dam pa thams cad kun// sngon tshe gar gnas thams cad rab tu mkhyen// bcom ldan sku mchog gser gyi
76a2(rgyud 'bum): kha dog 'dra/ / spu rtse re re mtshan ni rab mtshungs shing // sngol rab mnyen g.yas su 'khyil bas na// kha dog rab mnyen dpe bgyir shin tu dkar// bltams ma thag tu 'od mchog mnga' bas na// phyogs
76a3(rgyud 'bum): bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad gsal mdzad cing / / sring gsum sems can sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pas// de dag thams cad bde ba 'thob par mdzad// sems can dud 'gro yi dgas 'gro ba dang // lha ma
76a4(rgyud 'bum): yin dang mi yi 'gro ba kun/ / de dag sdug bsngal mang po zhi mdzad pas// rtag tu rang byung bde ba myong bar 'gyur// sku yi 'od kyis rtag tu gsal mdzad pas// rab sbyangs gser 'dra gya nom zla ma mchis//
76a5(rgyud 'bum): zhal mdog rgyas gsal zla ba nya ba 'dra// sgros dmar mdog mdzes bung ba'i 'bras bu mtshungs// gshegs stobs spyod lam seng ge rgyal po bzhin// sku mdog rab gsal gdugs ni 'char ba 'ang /
76a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag ngar ring ba pus mo 'das pas ni// dbyibs ni sA la'i lcug ma 'phyang dang mtshungs// 'od ni 'dom gang mtha' yas gsal mdzad pas// rab gsal gdugs ni brgya stong ji lta bzhin// sangs
76a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas zhing ni kun tu khyab pas na/ / rkyen ni ji bzhin skye dgu sad par mdzad// rnam dag 'od zer dra ba zla ma mchis// 'od kyis 'jig rten brgya stong rgyas mdzad pas// phyogs bcu kun gsal mdzad
76b1(rgyud 'bum): la thogs mi mnga'/ / mun nag thams cad rab tu sel mdzad pa// bde gshegs byams 'od bde ba rab stsol bas// kha dog gya nom gser gyi ro bo 'dra// 'od kyis zhing ni brgya stong khyab mdzad pas/
76b2(rgyud 'bum): sems can gang reg thams cad nges par 'byung // bcom ldan sku ni bsod nams tshad med ldan// yon tan thams cad kun gyis rab tu brgyan// khams gsum ldan pas nyag gcig gtser gsungs pas
76b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten khyad 'phags dpe zla yong ma mchis/ / 'das pa mi sangs rgyas thams cad ji snyed pa// grangs ni sa chen rdul phran dag dang mtshungs// ma byon da ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i gtso/
76b4(rgyud 'bum): sa chen rdul phran ji bzhin mang po la// bdag ni rtse gcig lus dang ngag yid kyis// dus gsum sangs rgyas spyi btung skyabs su mchi// yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas rab bsngags nas// spos
76b5(rgyud 'bum): dang me tog sna tshogs kun gyis mchod/ / bdag gi lce ni brgya stong mchis 'gyur te// bskal pa tshad med rab tu bsngags brjod kyang // bcom ldan yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab cing // mchog
76b6(rgyud 'bum): tu zab pas shin tu brjod par dka'/ / bdag gi lce ni brgya stong mchis pa yis// sangs rgyas gcig gi yon tan kun bsngags kyang // de la cha shas tsam yang rtogs dka' na// sangs rgyas
76b7(rgyud 'bum): mtha' dag yon tan smos ci 'tshal/ / gal te sa chen dang ni lha rnams nas// srid rtse'i bar dag rgya mtsho'i chab gyur kyang // spu yi rtse mos grangs ni rtogs rung gi/ sangs rgyas yon tan thams
77a1(rgyud 'bum): cang gzhal bar dka'/ / bdag gis lus dang ngag yid rtse gcig tu// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas bsngags brjod pa'i// bsod nams 'bras bu bsam dka' ci mchis pa// sems
77a2(rgyud 'bum): can yongs bsngo sangs rgyas myur 'grub smon/ / rgyal po de yis sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// gzhan yang rang sems smon lam cher btab pa// bdag ni ma 'ongs pa yi dus kyi tshe// tshe rabs bskal pa
77a3(rgyud 'bum): tshad med grangs med snyed/ / rmi lam rtag par gser rnga cher mthong nas// 'gyod tshangs bstan pa'i sgra ni thos par shog/ sangs rgyas yon tan pad+ma'i dpes bsngags pas// skye med rtogs nas yang
77a4(rgyud 'bum): dag sangs rgyas shog/ sangs rgyas brgya la ma lan cig 'jig rten 'byung // bskal pa brgya stong shin tu phrad par dka'// rmi lam rtag par gser rnga smra mchog thob// nyin mtshan ci rigs 'gyod tshangs bgyid
77a5(rgyud 'bum): pabar shog/ bdag gis pha rol byin drug tshogs bsgoms nas// sems can sdug bsngal mtsho las rab drangs te// de 'og bla med mngon par sangs rgyas nas// zhing ni rnam dag bsam gyis mi khyab shog/
77a6(rgyud 'bum): gser gyi rnga mchog sangs rgyas phul ba dang // sangs rgyas yang dag yon tan bsngags pa'i rgyus// bcom ldan shAkya thub pa mthong gyur nas// bdag la mi mchog 'gyur bar lung bstan shog/
77a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi bu ni gser kru ga sor gyi 'od// 'das pa'i dus tshe dge ba shes bgyis pas na// tshe rabs kun tu bdag gi khyim skyes te// lan cig bla med byang chub lung nod shog/ sems can gang
77b1(rgyud 'bum): zhig mgon dang skyabs ma mchis/ / yun ring 'khor bar sdug bsngal mang myong ba// bdag gis ma 'ongs mgon dang skyabs bgyis nas// de dag rtag tu bde ba thob par shog/ srid gsum sdug bsngal mang
77b2(rgyud 'bum): po nyer zhi nas/ / thams cad yid bzhin bde gnas thob gyur te/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dzaM lta bzhin/ ma 'ongs byang chub mngon par sgrub par shog/ gser 'od 'gyod tshangs bgyis pa'i bsod nams
77b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dis/ / sdug bsngal rgya mtsho gtan bskams sdig bral nas// las kyi sgrib dang nyon mongs nyer zhi ste// bdag gis rnam dag 'bras bu myur thob shog/ bsod nams ye shes rgya mtsho tshad med cing //
77b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam ngag dri bral zab pas gting ma mchis// bdag gis yon tan rgya mtsho 'di thob nas// bla med byang chub chen po myur 'grub shog/ gser 'od 'gyod tshangs bgyis pa 'di yi mthus// bsod nams rnam dag
77b5(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer 'thob par shog/ rnam dag 'od zer dam pa thob nas kyang // shes rab 'od kyis thams cad gsal bgyid shog/ bdag gi lus 'od sangs rgyas mtshungs 'gyur zhing // bsod nams ye shes dag kyang de
77b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin shog/ 'jig rten kun tu gcig pu gtsor rjod cing // gzi brjid mthu stobs rang dbang bla med shog/ zag bcas sdug bsngal rgya mtsho 'das par shog/ 'dus ma byas kyi bde mtsho rtag bgrong shog/
77b7(rgyud 'bum): da ltar bsod nams mtshan rtag 'phel shog/ ma 'ongs ye shes rgya mtsho mangs rdzogs shog/ bdag gi zhing na khams gsum yongs 'das nas// khyad 'phags yon tan chad med mtha' med shog/ rkyen
78a1(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan rnams lhan cig skyes gyur nas/ / thams cad rnam dag ye shes myur grub shog/ mdzes pa'i tog khyod shes par byos// rgyal po gser klu bdag po yis// smon lam de 'dra
78a2(rgyud 'bum): gang btab pa/ / de ni khyod bdag nyid yin no// gser klu gser 'od ces bya ba// sngon gyi khye'u gnyis po ni// dngul tog dngul mtshan nyid yin te// nga yas lung bstan thob pa yin// 'khor mang de skad thos pa
78a3(rgyud 'bum): na thams cad byang chub sems bskyed de/ / da ltar ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe// 'gyod tshangs 'di spyod smon lam btab// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ pad+ma lta bu'i dpes
78a4(rgyud 'bum): bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab gnas la 'di skad ces
78a5(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu gser rgyal zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs
78a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rnams mngon sum du mthong zhing / bkur sti dang mchod pa byed 'dod pas gzungs 'ang yongs su gzung bar bya'o// de tsa'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / nga ltar
78a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pas so/ / de lta bas na gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bsod nams chen po dang ldan zhing / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams
78b1(rgyud 'bum): kha dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin pas/ deng yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba yin no// tshul khrims yongs su dag pa mi zhig mi nyams shing thogs pa med pa dang / gdon mi za bar chos zab mcha sgor 'jug par
78b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags sgrub pa'i cho ga bkara' sprul pa/ sngar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod de/ sems rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag byas
78b3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ de'i 'og tu sngags gdon par bya'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
78b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'phags pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog la phyag 'tshalo//
78b5(rgyud 'bum): nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas lha'i rnga sgra rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// steng phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yangs pa'i yon tan mang po la phyag 'tshal lo//
78b6(rgyud 'bum): 'og phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yon tan snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal
78b7(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / sangs rgyas spos brtsegs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mnyam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal mo// sangs rgyas rin chen
79a1(rgyud 'bum): gtsug pud la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas rin chen bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal mo// sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo//
79a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas spobs rab dgongs la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rnam dag zla ba'i 'od zer mtshan grags rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas me tog bkod pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas snang
79a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas legs 'od dri med grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rtog pa 'jigs med dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bsnyengs pa mi mnga'
79a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo//
79a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
79a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal
79a7(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang
79b1(rgyud 'bum): / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ d+ya thA/ kun+te kun+te/
79b2(rgyud 'bum): ku tsa ku tsa le/ in+d+ra mai traM swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rab gnas la bka' skul pa/ gzungs 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am
79b3(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med dpag tu med par rab tu skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di nyid sangs rgyas grangs med pa snyed la mchod cing rim
79b4(rgyud 'bum): gro byed pa dang / gus pas bla mar byed pa dang / bsngags pa rjod par byed pa yin pas/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas mang po rnams kyis kyang gang zag de la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
79b5(rgyud 'bum): ston par 'gyur ro/ / rab gnas gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gos dang / zas dang / nor dang / rin po che dang / mang du thos pa dang / shes rab rno ba
79b6(rgyud 'bum): dang nad med cing tshe ring ba dang bsod nams mang po 'thob par 'gyur bas/ ji ltar mos pa rnams yid bzhin du mi 'grub pa gang yang med par 'gyur ro// rab gnas gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa gang
79b7(rgyud 'bum): yin pa de ni/ bla na med pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar du rtag par byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi grong khyer gyi ri dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / byang chub
80a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma ha bingag la sogs pa dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur bas
80a2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su srung zhing yongs su srung bar 'gyur ro/ / rab gnas 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ sngags 'di yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshe/ cho ga 'di ltar bsgrub par bya'o// sngags
80a3(rgyud 'bum): lan khri rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas te bsnyen pa'i cho ga bya'o/ / de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du dkyil 'khor brgyan nas/ zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig la khrus yongs su dag par byas te/ gos gsar pa bgos
80a4(rgyud 'bum): nas spos bsregs me tog gtor te/ bza' ba dang btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs te/ thog ma kho nar sngar gong du bstan pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
80a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod de/ sems rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag byas nas sngar byas pa'i sdig pa rnams bshags te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas sngar bstan pa'i gzungs sngags
80a6(rgyud 'bum): lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ lus drang por bsrang nas yid la bya zhing smon lam rjes su dran par bya'o// nyi ma ma shar bar dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zas gtsang ma nag po bza' bar bya zhing nyin gcig la zas
80a7(rgyud 'bum): gcig bza' bar bya'o/ / zhag bco lnga tshang nas dkyil 'khor nas 'byung bar byed na/ gang zag de bsod nams dang gzi byin mthu stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur bas/ ci dang tsa smon
80b1(rgyud 'bum): ba ma 'grub pa gang yang med par gyur ro/ / gal te yang bzhin du 'grub par ma gyur na/ yang dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'jug par bya zhing / bsam pa bzhin du 'grub nas kyang rtag par yong la bya zhing brjed par
