80b2(rgyud 'bum): mi bya'o/ / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal pa mde sde rgyam po las gser rgyal gyi gzungs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags de ba
80b3(rgyud 'bum): stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / 'khor mang po rnams la lan gdags shing / de kho na nyid kyi don dam pa shin tu zab pa khong du chud par mdzad par
80b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhed pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yang bstan pa'i ched du tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga yis mdo sde zab mo gzhan dag las// yang dag stong pa nyid dam chos bshad kyang // deng 'dir mdo
80b5(rgyud 'bum): sde'i rgyal po 'di las kyang / / stong nyid bsam gyis mi khyab mdo tsam bshad// zab mo'i chos ni rgya cher mang po la// sems can shes med rig par mi nus pas// de'i phyir ngas 'dir bzlas te bstan pas na//
80b6(rgyud 'bum): stong pa'i chos ni rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen pos sems can brtse ba'i phyir// shin tu thabs mkhas rgyu rkyen mchog dag gis// ngas deng 'khor 'dus chen po 'di nang du// bstan pas de dag stong
80b7(rgyud 'bum): don gsal rtogs 'gyur/ / lus 'di grong stong 'dra bar shes byas te// rkun po drug gnas phan tshun yong mi shes// yul drug rkun po tha dad dbang po gnas// so sor phan tshun mo shes de bzhin no// mig
81a1(rgyud 'bum): gi dbang po rtag par gzugs la nya/ / rna ba'i dbang po sgra nyan rgyun mi 'chang // sna yi dbang pos rgyun du dri yul snom// lce yi dbang pos rtag par ro zhom myong // lus kyi dbang pos
81a2(rgyud 'bum): yang 'jam reg bya len/ / yid kyi dbang pos chos rig skyon mi shes// dbang po 'di drug dngos po'i rjes 'brang bas// so so'i rang yul dag la rtog pa skyed// rnam shes sgyu sprul 'dra bas yang dag min//
81a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang pos gnas nas mi dben 'dod pas 'tshol// dper na mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa ltar// rnam shes drug po dbang gnas de bzhin no// sems ni kun 'tshol gnas kyi rjes su 'jug/ dbang rten yul dmigs
81a4(rgyud 'bum): dngos pos rnam rig pa/ / rtag par gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sred// chos la spyod pas skad cig tsam mi gnas// rkyen ni ji bzhin dbang drug kun rgyug pas// mkha' la bya 'phur thogs pa med pa 'dra//
81a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang po rten byed de la bltos nas ni// phyi rol yul ni rnam par rig par nus// lus 'di shes med byed pa po yang med// rang bzhin mo rten rkyen la bltos nas grub// yang dag ma yin rnam rtog las skyes
81a6(rgyud 'bum): bas/ / 'khrul 'khor bzhin du las kyi dbang gis 'jug/ sa chu me rlung lhan cig lus bsgrubs pas// rgyu rkyen ji bzhin tha dad 'bras bu 'thob// lhan cig gnas kyang phan tshun gnod byed pas// sprul
81a7(rgyud 'bum): gdug bzhi po gzeb gcig gnas pa 'dra/ / 'byung chen sbrul bzhi rang bzhin tha dad pas// lhan cig gnas kyang mtho dab ma' ba yod// steng 'og 'gro zhing lus ni kun tu khyab// 'di dag mthar ni
81b1(rgyud 'bum): zad pa'i chos su 'gro/ / sbrul gdun rnam pa bzhi po de dag las// sa chu sbrul gnyis phal cher thur du 'bying // me rlung sbrul gnyis rang bzhin yang bas na// mi mthun 'di dbang nang mang skye bar 'gyum
81b2(rgyud 'bum): sems dang rnam shes lus 'di gnas nas ni/ / dge sdig las ni sna tshogs byed pas na// lha mi ngan 'gro gsum du song nas ni// lus stobs ji bzhin lus ni len par byed// nang dang phrang nas lus ni
81b3(rgyud 'bum): shi ba'i 'og bshang gci mi gtsang thams cad kun tu snang / / rul myags 'bus brtsegs blta bar yong mo mos// dur khrod bor nas shing rul 'dra bar 'gyur// khyod kyis chos rnams de ltar lta bar
81b4(rgyud 'bum): byos/ / tsa phyir bdag dang sems can yod par 'dzin// chos rnams thams cad zad par mi rtag ste// thams cad ma rig rkyen gyi mthu las byung // 'byung chen de dag yang dag min pas na// yang
81b5(rgyud 'bum): dag yod min rang bzhin skye med pas/ / de phyir 'byung chen ngo bo stong par bshad// 'di dag stong zhing yang dag min rig byos// ma rig rang bzhin bzod pa nyid kyis med// rkyen mang mthu ltos tshogs las
81b6(rgyud 'bum): yod pa min/ / dus rnams kun tu yang dag blos stong pas// de phyir nga yis ma rig yin par bshad// 'du byed rnam shes rkyen byas ming gzugs yod// skye mched drug dang reg tsher rjes su skye// sred len
81b7(rgyud 'bum): srid skye rga shi bskyed pas na/ / mya ngan smre sngags 'khrug pa rjes su 'brang // sdug bsngal sna tshogs las ngan rtag dkris gzir// 'khor bar 'khor ba dag la tshang dus med// rang bzhin yod min ngo bo nyid stong
82a1(rgyud 'bum): yang / / tshul bzhin ma yin rnam par rtog pa bskyed// nga yis nyon mongs thams cad rab spangs nas// rtag par yang dag ye shes mngon rgyu bas// lnga phung khang khyim thams cad stong
82a2(rgyud 'bum): rtogs nas/ / byang chub yang dag nas ni btsal ba yin// nga yis bdud rtsi grong chen sgo phye nas// gya nem bdud rtsi snod ni bstan pa yin// yang dag bdud rtsi ro ni brnyes nas kyang // rtag par bdud rtsi skye dgu sbyin
82a3(rgyud 'bum): ba btang / / ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung chen mchog kyang bus// ngas ni chos kyi sgron chen rab kyang spar// ngas ni chos kyi rmar chen dam pa phab// nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu
82a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ma byas te/ / bla med chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng // 'khor ba'i mtshe las skye dgu rmongs pa bzlas// nga yis ngan 'gro gsum gyi sgo yang bcad// nyon mongs 'bar mes sems can rab bsregs te/
82a5(rgyud 'bum): mgon dang skyabs byed med pa dag la ni// rab bsil bdud rtsis de dag tshim byas nas// lus dang sems kyi gdung ba zhi bar byas// de nas ngas ni bskal pa tshad med snyed// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
82a6(rgyud 'bum): gus mchod byas/ / tshul khrims rab bsrungs byang chub gzhol nas ni// chos sku bde ba'i gnas ni btsal ba yin// gzhan la mig dang rkang lag rna ba dang // bu dang chung ma bran btang 'phangs pa med
82a7(rgyud 'bum): nor dang rin chen bdun gyi rgyan 'phreng dag/ spong ba dag la thams cad yongs su btang // bzod sogs pha rol phyin pa kun bsgoms pas// sa bcu yongs rdzogs yang dag mngon sangs rgyas/
82b1(rgyud 'bum): de phyir nga ni thams cad mkhyen brjod kyang // sems can gang yang gzhal bar nus pa med// gal te stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten khams// sa chen 'di las skyes pa'i dngos rnams dang // nags tshal
82b2(rgyud 'bum): ljon shing sA lu ti la rnams dang / / 'od ma la sogs yal ga dza snyed pa// 'di la sogs pa'i dngos po bcad gtubs te// thams cad rdul phran phye mar byas pa dang // gang nas bsdus spungs chad ni shes dka' dang / de bzhin nam
82b3(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i khams ni gang ba yi/ / phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams dag ni thams cad ni// stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten ji snyed pa'i// sa rnams rdul gyi phye mar byas gyur na// rdul 'di tshad ni bzang bar mi
82b4(rgyud 'bum): nus pas/ / sems can thams cad shes pa ci yod pa// shes pa de kun mi gcig rab byin nas// 'di ltar de yi shes pa tshad med pas// rdul phran de yi grangs ni shes rung yang // bcom ldan
82b5(rgyud 'bum): thug pas skad cig gang mkhyen pa/ / shes ldan de dag lhan cig gzhal bcug nas// bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs snyed du// cung zad tsam yang brtsi zhing shes mi nus// de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams
82b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin zab mo 'di lta bu bkas bshad pa thos nas/ sems can tshad med pa snyed 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / phung po lnga po dag rang bzhin nyid kyis stong pa dang
82b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang po drug dang / yul drug po yang dag pa ma yin pas/ 'tshang bskyed par mngon par rtogs par gyur pas 'khor ba yongs su spangs te/ nges par 'byung ba yang dag par sgrub par smon lam
83a1(rgyud 'bum): btab nas/ shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis rab tu dga' bar gyur pas/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gus pas spyod par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po
83a2(rgyud 'bum): las/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas lha'i bu mo yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phros 'khor mang po'i nang du chos zab mo thos nas/ dga' mgu rangs par
83a3(rgyud 'bum): gyur nas stan las langs te/ / bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
83a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis don gyi tshul zab mo dag la rnal 'byor bsgoms pa'i chos gang lags pa bkas bshad du ci gnang zhes gsol nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag gis 'jig rten snang mdzad dang /
83a5(rgyud 'bum): rkang gnyis gtso bo mchog la ni// byang chub sems dpa' yang dag spyod// zhu na thugs rjes gnang bar smon// bcom ldan rigs kyi lha mo la// gal te the tsom yod gyur na// khyod kyis yid bzhin zhus
83a6(rgyud 'bum): shig dang / / rnam phye bstan par bya zhes gsungs// de nas lha mos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bur// byang chub yang dag spyad spyod na// bdag dang gzhan
83a7(rgyud 'bum): la sman srang du/ / 'khor ba mya ngan 'das spangs 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings la brten te byang chub kyi chos spyad nas/ mnyam pa nyid kyi
83b1(rgyud 'bum): chos spyod pa bsgom par bya'o/ / ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la brten te byang chub kyi chos la spyad pas/ mnyam pa nyid kyi spyod pa bsgom par bya zhe na/ 'di ltar phung po lnga po dag gis chos kyi dbyings ston par byed pas/
83b2(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyid phung po lnga yin yang / phung po lnga'ang brjod du me la/ phung po lnga ma yin pa'ang brjod du med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te chos kyi dbyings phung po lnga yin par gyur na ni chang pa'i lha
83b3(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur la/ gal te phung po lnga tha dad par ma gyur na ni rtag pa'i lta bar 'gyur bas/ mtshan nyid gnyis dang bral ba/ mtha' gnyis la mngon par ma chags pa/ bltar med pa/ blta bar bya ba las yang dag par
83b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa/ ming med pa/ mtshan ma med pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi dbyings bstan pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi lha mo ji ltar phung po dag gis chos kyi dbyings ston par byed ce na/ 'di ltar phung po lnga po dag ni rgyu dang rkyen
83b5(rgyud 'bum): las skye ba ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa zhig yin par gyur na/ skyes zin pa'i phyir ram/ ma skyes pa'i phyir skye/ gal te skyes zin pa zhig skye na ni rgyu dang rkyen mi dgos pa
83b6(rgyud 'bum): zhig yod/ gal te ma skyes pa zhig skye na ni nams kyang skye ba dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni yod pa ma yin pa/ ming med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ dpag
83b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba ma yin pa/ dpe byar mo rung ba/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi lha mo 'di lta ste/ dper na rnga'i sgra gang yin pa de ni shing la'ang brten/ ko ba dang
84a1(rgyud 'bum): dbyug gu dang / lag pa la sogs pa la brten pa'i phyir sgra 'byung bar 'gyur yang / 'di ltar rnga'i sgra gang yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang stong / ma 'ongs pa'ang stong / da ltar 'byung ba'ang
84a2(rgyud 'bum): stong ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnga'i sgra gang yin pa de ni shing las kyang mi 'byung / ko ba las kyang mi 'byung / dbyug gu dang lag pa las kyang mi 'byung / dus gsum las kyang mi 'byung bas/ de ni ma skyes pa gang
84a3(rgyud 'bum): yin pa de ni 'gag par yang mi 'gyur ro/ / 'gag par yang mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo // gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba de ni gang du rang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// gang du'ang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba gang
84a4(rgyud 'bum): yin pa de ni rtag pa'ang ma yin/ chad pa'ang ma yin no// rtag pa'ang ma yin/ chang pa'ang ma yin pa de ni gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma yin pas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te 'di gcig pa zhig yin
84a5(rgyud 'bum): na ni chos kyi dbyings dang tha mi dang bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te de lta yin na ni so sor skye bo rnams kyang yang dag pa'i bden pa mthong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag pa'i bde ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub mya ngan las 'das
84a6(rgyud 'bum): pa 'thob par 'gyur bar rigs kyi/ de lta ma yin pas de'i phyir gcig pa'ang ma yin par rig par bya'o// gal te tha dad do zhe na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid thams
84a7(rgyud 'bum): cad mngon par zhen pa dang bcas pa yin pas/ nyon rmongs pa'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi gyur
84b1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad ni 'du byed dang 'du byed ma yin pa dag la yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid du mnyam par rtogs pas/ de'i phyir tha dad pa'ang ma yin te/ de lta bas na phung po snga la
84b2(rgyud 'bum): ngag ni yod pa ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin/ rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa/ rgyu dang rkyen med pa las skyes pa'ang ma yin par rig par bya'o// 'phags pas shes par bya ba yin gyi/ gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin/
84b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir/ tshig tha snyad kyis reg par mi 'gyur/ ming med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa/ rgyu med pa/ rkyen med pa/ dpe med pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med par rab tu dben pa/ gzod ma nyid nas rang bzhin gyis
84b4(rgyud 'bum): stong pa yin pas/ de'i phyir phung po lnga po dag gis chos kyi dbyings ston par nus pa yin no// rigs kyi lha mo rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
84b5(rgyud 'bum): chub yongs su gnyer bar 'dod pas/ don dam pa dang kun rdzob las gud na yongs su 'chol bar byed na/ de ni shin tu dpag cing bsam pa dka' ba yin te/ so so'i skye bo dang 'phags pa'i spyod
84b6(rgyud 'bum): yul gyi ngo bo nyid ni gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma yin pas/ kun rdzob kyang mi spong la/ don dam pa dang yang mo 'bral bar chos kyi dbyings la brten nas byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad par bya'o// de'i
84b7(rgyud 'bum): tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rigs kyi lha mo dga' mgu rangs par gyur nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la
85a1(rgyud 'bum): btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ sems rtse gcig tu mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gong du ji skad bka' stsal
85a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub kyi yang dag pa'i don la spyod pa gang lags pa de dag deng bdag gis slob par bgyid do/ / de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos 'khor mang po'i nang
85a3(rgyud 'bum): du lha mo yod bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces smras so/ / byang chub kyi spyod pa 'di ni shin tu sgrub par dka' ba yin na/ deng khyod kyis byang chub kyi spyod pa la rang dbang thob par 'gyur/ de nas
85a4(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi lha mos/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye tshangs pa'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar na/ 'di ni yang dag par shin tu zab pa yin pas so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis
85a5(rgyud 'bum): de'i don shes par mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ni 'phags pa'i spyod yul yin pas/ shin tu gya nom zhing shes par dka' ba yin no// gal te deng bdag gis chos 'di la brten nas/ bde bar gnas pa'i
85a6(rgyud 'bum): 'thob pa bden te mi brdzun par gyur na/ dus ngan pa'i snyigs ma lnga'i sems can tshad med/ grangs med/ mtha' med pa thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu gyur nas/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan te
85a7(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa'ang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin par gyur nas rin po che'i pad+ma la 'dug ste/ bde ba tshad med pa myong ba dang / lha'i me tog dam pa'i char mngon par 'bab pa dang / lha'i rol mo'i cha byad rnam ma
85b1(rgyud 'bum): dkrol bar rang sgra 'byung ba dang / mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces/ de'i tshe rigs kyi lha mos de skad ces spras ma thag tu ngus ngan pa'i snyigs ma lnga'i sems can ji snyed pa thams
85b2(rgyud 'bum): cad gser gyi kha dog tu gyur nas/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan te/ skyes pa'ang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin par gyur nas rin po che'i pad+ma la 'dug ste/ bde ba tshad med pa dag la longs spyod par gyur pas
85b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gzhal med khang dza lta ba bzhin du ngan 'gro rnams kyang med de/ rin po che'i ljon shing 'phreng du bsgrigs shing / rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gis 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu gang
85b4(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur to/ / gzhan yang lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi char yang mngon par phab/ lha'i rol mo rnams byas te/ rigs kyi lha mo yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro'ang bud med kyi lus yongs su bsgyur nas
85b5(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa'i lha'i lus su gyur to/ / de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos/ byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ji ltar byang chub kyi spyad pa yongs su spyod par
85b6(rgyud 'bum): byed na/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi/ smras pa/ kye tshangs pa'i rgyal po gal te chu'i zla ba byang chub kyi spang pa spyod par byed na/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed do// gal te rmi lam byang chub kyi spring ba
85b7(rgyud 'bum): spyod par byed na/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed do// gal te smig rgyu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed na/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed do// gal te lung pa'i brag cha byod
86a1(rgyud 'bum): chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed na/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos de skad ces smras pa thos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di
86a2(rgyud 'bum): skad ces smras so/ / khyod don gang la brten nas tshig 'di smra bar byed/ smos pa/ kye tshangs pa'i rgyal po chos gcig 'ga' tsam yang de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid ma yin pa med mod kyi/ 'on kyang
86a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyu dang rkye gyi dbang gis mngon par grub pa yin no/ / tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta bu yin par gyur na/ 'o na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
86a4(rgyud 'bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ / smras pa/ khyod ci la bsams te 'di skad du smra bar byed/ ci gti mug dang ldan pa'i gang zag kyang tha dad / shes rab dang ldan pa'i gang
86a5(rgyud 'bum): zag kyang tha dad / byang chub kyang tha dad / byang chub ma yin pa'ang tha dad / rnam par grol ba'ang tha dad / rnam par grol ba ma yin pa'ang tha dad pa zhig yin snyam mam/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'di ltar chos
86a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni mnyam zhing tha dad pa med de/ chos kyi dbyings 'di la de bzhin nyid tha dad par gyur pa med pas// mngon par zhen par bya ba'i bar zhes bya ba'ang med de/ 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med par
86a7(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa yin no/ / kye tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma sgyu ma ston pa la shin tu mkhas pa zhig gos lam gyi bzhi mdor gseg ma dang / rtswa dang / shing gi lo ma
86b1(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa blangs te phung po gcig tu spungs nas/ sgyu rtsal rnams kyis glang po che'i tshigs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta dang dmag la sogs pa'i tshogs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang
86b2(rgyud 'bum): bang mdzod rnam pa sna tshogs skye bo rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba mngon par sprul par gyur nas/ sems can gang dag glen zhing gti mug can du gyur pa/ dpyod par mi nus pa/ sgyu ma'i rtsa ba mi shes pa dag
86b3(rgyud 'bum): gis mthong ngam thos par gyur na/ 'di snyam du bdag gis mthong zhing thos pa'i glang po che dang rta la sogs pa'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag ni yang dag par yod pa yin gyi/ gzhan ni brdzun pa yin no//
86b4(rgyud 'bum): snyam du sems pas phyis legs par so sor rtog cing sems pa'ang med do// gang blo dang ldan pa dag ni de ltar ma yin te/ sgyu ma'i rtsa ba rab tu shes pas/ gal te mthong ngam thos par gyur na'ang 'di snyam du//
86b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis ji ltar mthong ba'i glang po che dang rta la sogs pa'i tshegs gang yin pa de dag ni yod pa ma yin gyi/ sgyu ma'i dngos pos mig slu bar byed pa tsam zhig yod par zad de/ mi bden pas glang po che la sogs
86b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / khang mdzod rnams yod do snyam du mi sems pas/ ming tsam zhig yod par zad kyi/ yang dag par ni ci'ang med do snyam du sems pas/ bdag nyid kyis ji ltar mthong ba thos pas de dag la yang dag pa
86b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid du 'dzin par yang mi byed la/ phyis dpyod cing sems pa'i tshe'ang yang dag pa ma yin par rab tu shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du blo dang ldan pa dag gis kyang chos thams cad la yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid med
87a1(rgyud 'bum): par rtogs pas/ kun rdzob kyi rjes su ji ltar mthong ba dang / ji ltar thos pa bzhin du dngos po ston cing rjod par byed kyi/ bden pa'i tshul yid la byed pa'i tshe ni de ltar ma yin te/ btags
87a2(rgyud 'bum): pabatsam du yang dag pa'i don rab tu ston par byed pa'i phyir ro/ / tshangs pa'i rgyal po byis pa so so'i skye bo 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig ma mthong ba dag ni chos thams cad kyi de
87a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nyid brjod du med pa mi shes pa'i phyir/ byis pa so so'i skye bo dag 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos mthong ngam thos par gyur na/ 'di ltar yang dag par yod pa yin no snyam du bsams nas/
87a4(rgyud 'bum): mngon par zhen pa bskyed nas don dam par chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa yin par mi shes so// 'phags pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de dag ni 'du byed dang 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos mthong ngam thos par
87a5(rgyud 'bum): gyur na/ ci nus ci lcogs kyis yang dag par yod pa yin no snyam du mngon par zhen pa skyed par mi byed pas/ thams cad du yang dag pa'i 'du byed kyi chos dang / mi bden pas bsams pa'i 'du byed dang 'du
87a6(rgyud 'bum): byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de dag gi ming tsam zhig yod pas/ yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ci'ang med do snyam du rig cing khong du chud par gyur kyang / 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag kun rdzob kyi rjes su
87a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag yang dag pa'i don rtogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir yang dag par ston par byed pa yin no/ / de bzhin du tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag kyang 'phags pa'i shes pa dang mthong bas chos
87b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med par rtogs par gyur kyang / 'du byed dang 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos 'di ltar gzhan dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ kun rdzob kyi ming dang tha snyad rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa
87b2(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos/ byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces smras so// sems can ji snyed cig gis yang dag pa'i chos zab mo 'di lta bu khong du chud par
87b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ smras pa/ kye tshangs pa'i rgyal po sgyu ma'i skyes bu mang po'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos kyis yang dag pa'i chos zab mo 'di lta bu khong du chud par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/
87b4(rgyud 'bum): sgyu mas sprul pa'i skyes bu gang yin pa de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa ma yin/ 'di dag gis sems dang sems las byung ba gang yang skyes par 'gyur/ smras pa/ gang gis chos kyi dbyings yod pa ma
87b5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ med pa'ang ma yin par shes pa'i sem can de dag gis don zab mo 'di shes par gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshangs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
87b6(rgyud 'bum): yod bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas don zab mo 'di lta bu mngon par rtogs par gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ tshangs
87b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal po khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro 'dis bstan nas khyed mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa sgom zhing bslab par sems bskyed pa yin no/ / de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen
88a1(rgyud 'bum): po tshangs pa'i 'khor mang po dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhin rin chen 'od
88a2(rgyud 'bum): 'phro'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ 'di skad du shin tu dkon zhing ngo mtshar che'o// bdag cag ni deng skyes bu chen po 'di dang phrad pas yang dag pa'i chos thos par gyur to zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan
88a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po la 'di skad ces yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ni ma 'ongs pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
88a4(rgyud 'bum): zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'bar ba dpal gyi snying po zhes bya
88a5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/ / le'u 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag sum stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa thob par gyur to// lha'i bu 'bum
88a6(rgyud 'bum): phrag brgyad stong dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / mi phel ba tshad med pa grangs med pa snyed ni rdul spangs shing dri ma dang bral nas chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur to// de nas de'i 'khor mang po de'i nang
88a7(rgyud 'bum): nas dge slong 'bum phrag lnga bcu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa las byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog pa rnams/ byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhin rin chen 'ong 'phros chos bstan pa thos pas
88b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad shin tu brtan par gyur nas/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i smon lam mchog yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas/ yang byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ so so'i nas rang gos phud de/ byang chub sems dpa' la
88b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa byas nas/ mchog tu brtson pa'i sems bla na med pa bskyed de/ smon lam 'di skad du bdag cag bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba tsa bsags pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
88b3(rgyud 'bum): par yongs su bsngo'o zhes smon lam btab bo/ / tshangs pa'i rgyal po dge slong mang po dag ni bsod nams 'di la brten nas ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par bsgrubs pas/ bskal pa chen po dgu bcu 'das nas khong du chud
88b4(rgyud 'bum): cing go bar 'gyur bas/ 'khor ba las nges par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong mang po de dag la khyed bskal pa grangs med pa sum cu 'das nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal
88b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ming ni rgyal bar dka' ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o/ / zhing gi ming ni dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ste/ dus gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
88b6(rgyud 'bum): bas thams cad ming mthun par smon lam gyi bkod pas brgyan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing / mtshan rnam pa bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// tshangs pa'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa shin
88b7(rgyud 'bum): tugya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di gang gis yang dag par mnyan nas yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ gzi byin chen po'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur bas/ gang la la zhig gis bskal pa chen po brgya stong du ma'i bar du
89a1(rgyud 'bum): thabs dang mi ldan par pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su spyad pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger bris nas/ zla ba
89a2(rgyud 'bum): phyed phyed cing sems rtse gcig tu klog gam/ kha ton du 'don par byed na/ 'di'i bsod nams gang yin pa de snga ma'i bsod nams dang bskrun na brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ bgrang ba dang / da
89a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// tshangs pa'i rgyal po de'i phyir ngas deng khyod kyis bslab par bya zhing dran pa yongs su gzung nas/ gzhan dag la rgya cher bstan par bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no// de ci'i
89a4(rgyud 'bum): phyir zhe na/ ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su spyad pa na/ ji ltar dpa' bo g.yul ngor 'jug pa bzhin du lus dang srog la 'phangs pa med par 'di ltar mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di yongs
89a5(rgyud 'bum): su spel zhing yang dag par bzung / bklags/ kha ton du bton nas/ gzhan dag la yang dag par bstan te/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gal te 'jog rten na 'dug
89a6(rgyud 'bum): par gyur na rin po che sna bdun yang nub par mi 'gyur la/ gal te rgyal po che zad par gyur na rin po che sna bdun yod pa dag kyang rang nyid du nub cing zad par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i rgyal po de bzhin du gser
89a7(rgyud 'bum): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di gal te 'jig rten na gnas par gyur ni ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi rin po che rnams kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/ gal te mdo sde 'di med par gyur na ni gnas de nyid du nub par
89b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de bas na mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di sems rtse gcig tu mnyan nas yongs su gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kha ton du gdon par bya/ gzhan dag la bstan par bya zhing / yi ger 'dri bar bskur nas
89b2(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyad de/ lus dang srog la'ang 'phangs pa med par rab tu brtson par byed na/ bsod nams kyi nang na mchog tu 'gyur bas/ nga'i slob ma rnams kyis de bzhin du rab tu
89b3(rgyud 'bum): brtson pas rnal 'byor sgom par bslab par bya'o/ / de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po tshangs pa'i 'khor tshad med pa snyed dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang lhan cig tu stan
89b4(rgyud 'bum): las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
89b5(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di dang / chos 'chad pa'i mkhan po gang lags pa de dag yongs su srung spel bar bgyid pas/ gal te bgegs bgyid pa zhig mchis na'ang bdag cag
89b6(rgyud 'bum): gis yongs su bsal nas/ dge ba mang po dang ldan pa dang / kha dog dang mthu stobs dang ldan pa dang / spobs pa la thogs pa ma mchis pa dang / lus dang sems bag yongs su 'gyur ba dang / nyan pa'i
89b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rnams bde ba myong bar bgyid do/ / yul gang na gnas pa der mu ge dang / phyir rgol ba'i ngagra dang / mi ma lags pa dag gis 'che zhing gnod pa bgyid par gyur na/ bdag cag lnga'i 'khor rnams kyis
90a1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bsrungs pas/ skye bo rnams bde zhing skyid cing longs spyod rgyas pa dang / glo bur gyi gnod pa rnams ma mchis par bgyid do// 'di dag thams cad kyang bdag cag dang lhan
90a2(rgyud 'bum): cig 'khor rnams kyi mthu lags so/ / gang la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di la mchod par gyis na/ bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du tha dad pa ma mchis pa'i bsam pas bkur sti dang mchod par bgyid
90a3(rgyud 'bum): do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po dang / tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i bar la bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs
90a4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / khyed kyis chos zab mo gya nom pa thos nas/ mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di dang / mdo sde 'dzin pa dag la yongs su bsrungs shing yongs su bskyangs pas bsod nams khyad par du 'phags
90a5(rgyud 'bum): pa mtha' med pa snyed thob pas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pas/ bcom ldan
90a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas rab tu dga' ste spyi bos blangs par gyur to/ / gser 'ang dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid la brten nas smon lam yongs
90a7(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ / / de nas lnga'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / lha'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang / lha'i rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang / lha'i
90b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po mig mi bzang cig car stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lga nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom
90b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser 'ong dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
90b3(rgyud 'bum): rtag par dgongs shing gzigs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bkur sti bgyis pa/ lha dang klu thams cad kyis rtag par mchod pa/ lha'i 'khor rnams kyis rtag par dga' ba bskyed pa/ 'jig rten
90b4(rgyud 'bum): skyong ba thams cad kyis rtag par bsngags pa brjod pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ lha'i gzhal med khang thams cad gsal bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad la
90b5(rgyud 'bum): khyad par du 'phags pa'i bde ba stsol ba/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar bgyid pa/ 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad
90b6(rgyud 'bum): rab tu sel ba/ phas kyi dgra thams cad phyir ldog par bgyid pa/ mu ge'i dus ngan pa'i tshe lo legs par bgyid pa/ rims nad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa/ ltas ngan pa thams cad
90b7(rgyud 'bum): dang sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa brgya stong rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni 'di lta bu'i bde ba stsol zhing / bdag cag
91a1(rgyud 'bum): la'ang sman par bgyid pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du rgya cher bkas bshad du gsol/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas bla nam
91a2(rgyud 'bum): mchis pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi ro 'di thos par gyur na/ mthu stobs dang ldan zhing gzi byin 'phel ba dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan zhing dpa' bar 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul yang ches lhag cing khyad par du
91a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phags par 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhi yang dag par mngon par sgrub cing / rtag par yang dag pa'i chos bstan nas/ chos kyis 'jig rten 'dul bar bgyid pas/
91a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag gis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / grul bum dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag dang / mi'i rgyal po rnams kyang rtag par
91a5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag pa'i chos kyis 'jig rten 'dul ba la 'god par bgyid pas/ sdig pa'i las rnams 'gog cing yongs su sel bar bgyid do// mi'i mdangs 'phrogs par bgyid pa'i 'dre srin byams pa dang snying rje
91a6(rgyud 'bum): ma mchis pa thams cad kyang thag ring du mchis par 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong chad ma mchis pa snyed
91a7(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pas/ lha'i mog rnam par dag pa mi las yang dag par 'das pas/ 'dzam bu'i glong 'dir lta bar bgyid cing yongs su skyab pa dang / yongs su gzung bar bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang
91b1(rgyud 'bum): rkyen des na/ bdag cag rgyal po rnams kyang 'jig rten skyong ba zhes bgyi lags so// gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling 'dir yul gyi rgyal po gang lags pa zhig la phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra rnams rtag par nye bar mchis te/
91b2(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa bgyis par gyur tam/ mu ge dang rims nang mang pos gnod par gyur tam/ ltas ngan gyi dngos po brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed byung bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag
91b3(rgyud 'bum): gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la bkur sti dang mchod pa bgyid pa'i dge slong chos smra ba gang la la mdo sde 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog cing 'don pa zhig mchis par
91b4(rgyud 'bum): gyur na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi de'i thad du mchis te/ go bar bgyis nas de la skal zhing gsol ba 'debs par bgyid de/ chos smra ba de'ang bdag cag gi rdzu 'phrul gyis go bar bgyis pa'i mthus yul
91b5(rgyud 'bum): khams der mchis nas/ gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di rgya cher yang dag par spel bar bgyid pas/ mdo sde'i mthus gnod pa dang ltas ngan gyi dngos po brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa de dag thams
91b6(rgyud 'bum): cad nye bar zhi zhing yongs su sel bar 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das mi'i'o rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba yul der mchis par gyur na/ mdo sde 'di'ang yul der
91b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs par rig par bgyi lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe yul de'i rgyal po de chos smra ba'i thang du mchis nas/ des chos bstan pa gang lags pa mnyan par bgyi'o// thos nas kyang rab tu dga'
92a1(rgyud 'bum): bas chos smra ba de la bkur sti dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bgyis te shin tu dang ba'i bsam pasna yongs su bsrungs nas/ mya ngan dang gnod pa ma mchis par bgyis te/ mdzen
92a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di yang dag par bstan nas thams cad la phan gdags par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rgya dang rkyen des na bdag cag rgyal chen po bzhi thams cad sems rtse gcig tu mi'i rgyal po de dang / yul gyi mo tham
92a3(rgyud 'bum): cad yongs su bsrungs nas/ gnod pa rnams spong zhing rtag par bde ba la reg par bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig mdo
92a4(rgyud 'bum): sde 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa zhig mchis par gyur na/ de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po des ci dang ci 'tshal ba sbyar te mchod pa bgyis nas/ 'phongs pa ma mchis par bgyid par gyur na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po
92a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi yul gyi bdag po de dang / yul gyi mi thams cad rab tu bde bar bgyid cing / gnod pa rnams thag ring du spong bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog
92a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / kha ton du 'don par bgyid pa la mi'i rgyal po des mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / tha mar bgyis te/ bsngags pa rjod par bgyid na/ bdag cag rgyal po de rgyal po rnams kyi nang na mchog tu
92a7(rgyud 'bum): btsun pa dang / gus pas bla mar bgyis pas/ yul gyi rgyal po gzhan rnams kyis kyang bsngags pa rjod par 'gyur ro// 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces thos pa dang / rab tu dga' bas yongs su 'dzin
92b1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhis lha dang mi rnams la blta zhing brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//
92b2(rgyud 'bum): gser 'ad dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo ba ma po drug pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gos gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde
92b3(rgyud 'bum): bkur sti dang mchod pa byas pa dang / mdo sde 'dzin pa dag la yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su srung bar byed pa gsan pa dang / legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po
92b4(rgyud 'bum): khyed cag ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med pa snyed la bkur sti dang / rim gro dang / mchod pa dang / bla mar byas nas bsngags pa brjod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yang dag
92b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chos mngon par bsgrubs nas/ rtag par yang dag pa'i chos bstan te/ 'di ltar chos kyis 'jig rten 'dul ba yin pas khyed cag yun ring po nas sems can rnams la rtag par phan 'dogs shing /
92b6(rgyud 'bum): byams pa chen po'i sems bskyed nas bde ba sbyin par smon pa'i rgyu rkyen des na/ khyed cag da ltar rnam par smin pa mchog la longs spyod pa yin no// mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde mchog
92b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di bkur sti byas nas/ mchod pa byed pa zhig yod pas khyed kyis nan tan bskyed de/ yongs su bsrungs nas bde ba thob par bya'o// khyed cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'khor bzhi dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong tshad med
93a1(rgyud 'bum): grangs med pa snyed kyis mdo sde 'di yongs su srung bar byed na/ des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang dag pa'i chos yongs su bsrungs
93a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur bas/ khyed cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i 'khor gzhan rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin dang 'thab pa'i cha/ rtag tu rgyal ba'i lan yon 'thob par 'gyur ro// khyed cag ma
93a3(rgyud 'bum): sde 'di yongs su srung zhing / yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ mdo sde 'di'i mthus sdug bsngal mang po dang / phyir rgol ba'i dgra dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / rims nang thams cad rab tu zhi zhing yongs su
93a4(rgyud 'bum): sel bar byed pas/ de'i phyir khyed kyis gal te 'khor bzhi po dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don par mthong bar 'gyur na/ rab tu brtson pa'i sems
93a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis yongs su bsrungs nas/ gnod pa bsal te bde ba sbyin par byed do// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsug
93a6(rgyud 'bum): tegus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di slad ma'i dus kyi tshe/ yul lam/
93a7(rgyud 'bum): grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ ri 'am/ nags tshal lam/ 'brog dgon pa'i gnas gang yang rung ba dag tu yongs su spel zhing gnas par gyur na/ yul de'i rgyal po mdo sde 'dis sems rtse gcig tu
93b1(rgyud 'bum): mnyan nas yongs su gzung ste/ bsngags pa brjod nas mchod pa bgyid pa dang / mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i 'khor bzhi po dag la yo byad sbyar te mchod pa bgyis nas/ shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis yongs su
93b2(rgyud 'bum): bsrungs te/ gnod cing mi bde ba dag yongs su spong bar bgyid na/ rgyu dang rkyen des bdag cag rgyal po de dang ma meng po rnams yongs su bsrungs nas bde ba la bkod de/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal rnams thag ring du
93b3(rgyud 'bum): spangs nas/ tshe 'phel ba dang gzi byin phun sum tshogs par byed do// bcom ldan 'das yul gyi bdag po des 'khor bzhi po de dag mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin pa mthong nas gus pas yongs su bsrungs te/
93b4(rgyud 'bum): pha ma bzhin du ci 'tshal ba thams cad sbyar te mchod pa bgyis na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis rtag par yongs su bsrungs nas/ sems can mang po kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur bar bgyid pas/ de'i slad
93b5(rgyud 'bum): du bdag cag gnod sbyin dang 'dre srin chad ma mchis pa dang bcas par mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di gang du bsrel ba'i gnas der lus sbas nas/ yongs su skyob pa dang / yongasu srung bar bgyid pas
93b6(rgyud 'bum): bgegs rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / mdo sde 'di nyid nyan pa'i gang zag dang rgyal po la sogs pa la'ang yongs su bsrungs shing rjes su dran par bgyid pas/ gnod pa yongs su
93b7(rgyud 'bum): bsal nas bde ba la 'god pa dang / phyogs gzhan nas mchis pa'i dgra rnams kyang slar zlog par bgyid do// ma'i rgyal po gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di nyen pa'i tshe/ nye 'khor na gnas
94a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dgra phyir rgol ba dmag rnam pa bzhi bshams te/ yul de gzhom mo snyam du sems par gyur na'ang / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyi
94a2(rgyud 'bum): mthus/ de'i tshe nye 'khor gyi dgra de la phyir rgol ba'i dgra tha dad pa gzhan mchis nas gzhom pa bgyid cing / de'i yul khams su ltas ngan mang po dang / rims nad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ de'i tshe rgyal
94a3(rgyud 'bum): po des de lta bu mthong ba dang / dmag rnam pa bzhi bshams nas yul der chas te gzhom par bgyid pa na/ bdag cag kyang de'i tshe gnod sbyin dang 'dre srin gyi 'khor tshad ma mchis shing mtha' ma mchis pa nyid dang bcas
94a4(rgyud 'bum): pas/ so so nas rang gi lus sbas te/ yongs su bsrungs nas grogs bgyid pa nyid kyis phyir rgol ba'i dgra de rab tu dul bar 'gyur bas/ yul khams der mchis pa'i thugs kyang mi thub na/ phan tshun
94a5(rgyud 'bum): dmag dang mtshon gyis 'thab pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po khyed kyis 'di ltar mdo sde 'di yongs
94a6(rgyud 'bum): su skyong ba dang / yongs su srung bar byed pa legs so legs so// ngas sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'das pa na/ dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs spyad nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
94a7(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pas chos 'di bstan pa yin pas/ mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di yongs su bzung nas bkur sti dang mchod
94b1(rgyud 'bum): pa byed na/ gnod pa rnams nye bar zhi nas rab tu bde bar 'gyur/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal rnams yongs su srung bar 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba'i dgra rnams klog par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling du gtog
94b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal po thams cad la gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa'i dngos po rnams gtan med par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na yod pa'i grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal
94b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad khro bzhi stong dag gi mo'i rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po rnams kyang so so nas rang rang gi yul du longs spyod kyi bde ba myong zhing rang dbang dang ldan par 'gyur/ nor dang rin po che dpal 'byor rgyas rgyas pa dag
94b4(rgyud 'bum): la longs spyod par byed pas/ phan tshun 'phrog par mi byed cing / sngon gyi rgyu ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par smin pa dag la longs spyod par byed pas/ bsam pa ngan pa bskyed nas gzhan gyi yul 'dod pas 'byor pa
94b5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su 'chol ba med do/ / thams cad 'dod pa chung zhing phan 'dogs pa'i bsam pa skye bar 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / bcing ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang med par 'gyur//
94b6(rgyud 'bum): yul de dag na gnas pa'i mo rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bla 'og mthun zhing chu dang po ma 'dres pa lta bu sems kyis phan tshun sdug cing bkur bar 'gyur/ rab tu dga' bas rnam
94b7(rgyud 'bum): par rtse bar 'gyur/ byams pa dang snying rjes phan 'dogs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar byed pas/ rgyu dang rkyen des na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rab tu bde zhing mo legs pa dang / mi rnams rgyas
95a1(rgyud 'bum): shing rab tu gang bar 'gyur/ sa chen po mthu dang ldan par 'gyur/ grang dro ran par 'gyur/ dus tshigs mi mthun pa med par 'gyur/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar
95a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang sngon gyi gnas las 'pho zhing 'gyur ba med par 'gyur/ rlung dang char pa'ang dus bzhin du ldang zhing 'bab par 'gyur/ ltas ngan rnams dang bral bar 'gyur/ nor dang rin po che rnams 'byor
95a3(rgyud 'bum): zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ sems la ser sna'i 'jungs pa med cing rtag par sbyin pa gtong bar 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ mi rnams tshe 'phos par gyur na'ang phal cher mtho ris su
95a4(rgyud 'bum): skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i 'khor rnams rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di mnyan te/ yongs su bsrungs nas gus
95a5(rgyud 'bum): pas mchod par byed pa dang / mdo sde 'dzin pa'i 'khor bzhi po dag la bla mar byed cing bsngags pa rjod par 'dod pas/ gzhan la'ang khyed 'khor dang bcas pa dngaganod sbyin gyi 'khor brgya
95a6(rgyud 'bum): stong tshad med pa snyed la phan pa dang bde bar phan 'dogs par 'dod na/ de'i phyir rgyal po des rtag par mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di mnyan nas yongs su bzung bar byas te/ yang dag pa'i chos kyi chu bdud
95a7(rgyud 'bum): rtsi'i ro mchog dam pa 'di thos pa'i dbang gis khyed la sogs pa'i lus dang sems kyi mthu stobs 'phel bar byed pas/ brtson 'grus dang ldan zhing dpa' ba dang / bsod nams dang / gzi byin rnams rab
95b1(rgyud 'bum): tu rgyas par 'gyur ro/ / mi'i rgyal po de dag gal te sems rtse gcig tu mdo sde mnyan nas yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ de ni yengs shing rgya che ba dang / shin tu dkon pa'i mchog pas yang dag par rdzogs pas
95b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/ gang gis nga la mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rnams la
95b3(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / gang gis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur bas/ rgyu dang rkyen des
95b4(rgyud 'bum): na khyed la sogs pas rgyal po de dang / btsun mo dang / sbas dang / 'khor rnams yongs su bsrungs nas/ gnod cing nyam nga ba med par byas te/ pho brang srung ba'i lha rnams kyang rtag tu bde
95b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i longs spyod myong ba la 'god par byed na/ bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ yul de dag na gnas pa'i mo rnams kyang 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/
95b6(rgyud 'bum): dngo bo ngan pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus kyi tshe mi'i rgyal ba
95b7(rgyud 'bum): gang la la zhig 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di mnyan par mos pa dang / bdag nyid dang / btsun mo dang / rgyal bu nas/ pho brang nang gi slas la sogs pa'i bar dag dang / grong khyer dang /
96a1(rgyud 'bum): grong rdal dang / pho brang yongs su bsrung zhing skyob pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dga' ba mchog dam pa dang / rab tu dben pa'i bde ba 'thob par 'tshal ba dang / tshe 'di nyid la
96a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal thabs btsun zhing mtho ba dang / dbang phyug dang ldan zhing dar ba dang / rtag tu 'phel bar 'tshal ba dang / gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po tshad ma mchis shing / mtha'am
96a3(rgyud 'bum): mchis pa yongs su sdud pa dang / rang gi yul du phyir rgol ba'i dgra dang / mya ngan dang / 'khrug pa dang / gdon bgegs kyi dngos po rnams ma mchis par 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi'i
96a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po des bag ma mchis pas sems g.yeng bar mi bgyi zhing shin tu gus pa bskyed de/ bsam pa thag pa nas mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di mnyan cing yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o// chos nyan par 'tshal
96a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i tshe sngar rgyal po la gces pa'i pho brang mchog dam pa rab tu brgyan te/ gsal ba'i phyogs su spos chab kyis chag chag btab ste/ me tog mchog dam pa sna tshogs mngon par gtor nas/ seng ge'i
96a6(rgyud 'bum): khri chos kyi gdan khyad par du 'phags pa btsugs te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan nas/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan bsgreng ste/ rin thang ma mchis pa'i
96a7(rgyud 'bum): spos bsregs nas rol mo rnams bgyi'o/ / rgyal po de'i tshe yongs su dag par khrus bgyis te/ spos kyi byug pas lus bskus nas gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos te/ rgyan 'phreng rnams kyi brgyan
96b1(rgyud 'bum): nas stan dma' ba la mchis te/ mtho ba'i bsam la mi skyed par dbang phyug gi thabs yongasu spang bar bgyi'o// nga rgyal rnams spangs te/ sems rtse gcig dran pa nye bar gzhag nas/ mdo sde'i rgyal
96b2(rgyud 'bum): po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o/ / chos smra ba'i mkhan po la ston pa chen po'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// pho brang nang gi btsun mo dang / rgyal bu dang / slas dang / 'khor rnams la byams pa dang brtse ba'i
96b3(rgyud 'bum): sems bskyed nas/ rab tu dga' bas phan tshun blta bar bgyi'o// shin tu mthun pa'i mdangs kyis tshig 'jam por smra bar gyi'o// bdag nyid kyi lus dang sems la dga' ba chen pos kun tu khyab par
96b4(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / deng bdag ni shin tu bsam par dga' zhing khyad par 'phags pa'i phan yon chen po yangs shing rgya che ba 'di lta bu 'thob par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/ mdo sde'i rgyal po de la rab tu
96b5(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bgyi'o/ / de ltar bsams lags nas chos smra ba'i mkhan po der mchis pa mthong bar 'gyur na/ shin tu gus pa chen pos dkon pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// de nas bcom
96b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po bzhi dag la bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar chos smra ba'i mkhan po de mi bsu bar mi bya'o// de'i tshe mo'i rgyal po des gos gsar pa bgos nas/ rgyan dang 'phreng ba rnam pa sna
96b7(rgyud 'bum): tshetshogs kyis rab tu brgyan te/ bdag nyid gdugs dkar po dang / spos dang / me tog thogs nas dmag gi dpung bshams te rol mo rgyas par byas nas/ rkang gis grong khyer nas phyir byung ste/
97a1(rgyud 'bum): bkra shis kyi dngos po 'thob par bya ba'i phyir gus pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ chos smra ba'i mkhan po de bsu bar bya'o// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir mi
97a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po des bdag nyid kyis bkur sti dang mchod pa de lta bur bya dgos she na/ ma'i rgyal po de rkang pa btog cing rkang pa bzhag pa na gom par re re zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
97a3(rgyud 'bum): mang po rnams la bkur sti dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bla mar byed par 'gyur zhing / gzhan yang bskal pa'i grangs de snyed kyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur
97a4(rgyud 'bum): bas so/ / gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa'i grangs de snyed du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i longs spyod mchog khyad par du 'phags pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur/ gom pa re re bor ba'i dbang gis
97a5(rgyud 'bum): tshe 'di nyid la'ang bsod nams 'phel bas rang dbang rgyal po byed cing / bsam gyis mo khyab pa'i rnam par smin pa dang ldan pa dang / mang po kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad
97a6(rgyud 'bum): med pa snyed du lha dang mis yongs su spyad pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang dag la longs spyod par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du rgyal po byed par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ tshig gi spobs pa dang
97a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan pas lha dang mi kun gyis mngon par yid ched par 'gyur/ 'jigs shing skrag pa med par 'gyur/ grags pa chen po dang ldan zhing mang po kun gyis yongs su lta bar 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i nang du khyad par
97b1(rgyud 'bum): du 'phags pa'i bde ba dag la longs spyod par 'gyur/ mthu stobs chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ gzi byin chen po'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur/ lus kyi mtshan ma gya nom zhing shin tu mdzes pas
97b2(rgyud 'bum): dpe zla med par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i ston pa mthong bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa mngon par 'grub cing phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//
97b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ mi'i rgyal po de dag gis yon tan gyi phan yon rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med pa de lta bu mthong ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid dpag tshad gcig nas/ dpag tshad brgya stong du
97b4(rgyud 'bum): ma'i bar du chos smra ba'i mkhan po bsu bar bya zhing / chos smra ba'i mkhan po la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// slar grong dang grong khyer du phyin nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
97b5(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bdag gi pho brang du shegs nas bdag gi mchod pa bzhes te/ bdag la chos ston par mdzad do// bdag gis thos pa'i dbang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
97b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur bas/ 'di nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang phrad par gyur pa yin no// deng bdag gis ni shin tu yangs shing rgya che ba mchog tu khyad par
97b7(rgyud 'bum): du 'phags pa'i bde ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang rim gro byas so// deng bdag gis ni gshin rje'i 'jig
98a1(rgyud 'bum): rten dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rtsa nas bton to// deng 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / brgya byin
98a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / tshangs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bskyed do// deng sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bton nas mya ngan las 'das
98a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bde ba la bkod nas/ deng tshad med mtha' med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu bsags so// pho brang nang gi slas dang skye bo mang po bde ba la bkod nas yul rnams rab tu zhi
98a4(rgyud 'bum): bar byas pas/ gnod pa dang / dug gdug pa dang / mi ma rungs pa med cing / phyogs gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i dgra rnams nye bar 'ongs nas gnod pa mi byed pa dang / mya ngan dang nad rnams med par
98a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro snyam du bsam par bya'o/ / rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po de dag gis de ltar yang dag par chos la btsun par byas shing / bla mar byas pa dang / mdo sde dam pa 'di/
98a6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag la mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
98a7(rgyud 'bum): gang yin pa de dag dang / bsod nams mchog gang yin pa dag thog ma kho nar 'khor dang bcas pa la yongs su sngo bar byed na/ mi'i rgyal po de dag bsod nams chen po'i dge ba'i las kyi rgyu dang rkyen dang ldan
98b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur bas/ tshe 'di nyid la dbang chen po thob nas gzi byin rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dpal dang mtshan mchog rnams kyis rab tu brgyan par 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba thams cad yang dag pa'i chos
98b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig de ltar yang dag pa'i chos la gus pas
98b3(rgyud 'bum): bkur sti bgyis nas/ mdo sde 'di mnyan par bgyid pa dang / mdo sde ba 'dzin pa'i 'khor bzhi po dag la bkur sti dang / mchod pa dang / bla mar bgyis nas bsngags pa brjod par bgyis na/ de'i tshe mi'i
98b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po des bdag cag rnams dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos kyi gdan dang nye ba'i phyogs gcig tu spos chab kyis nag chag btab ste/ me tog mchog dam pa mang po mngon par gtor nas/ rgyal po chen
98b5(rgyud 'bum): po bzhi mchis pa'i stan yang bshams te bting bar gyur na/ bdag cag kyang rgyal po de dag dang lhan cig yang dag pa'i chos nyan par 'gyur ro// rgyal po des kyang bdag cag la phan 'dogs pa'i
98b6(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba tsa mchis pa'i bsod nams kyi skal ba gang lags pa bdag cag la'ang yongs su bsngo bar brgya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po des chos smra ba la chos bshad par gsom
98b7(rgyud 'bum): ba btab nas stan la mchis pa'i tshe/ / bdag cag gi slad du spos mchog dam pa sna tshogs bsregs nas mdo sde 'di la mchod par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe spro ci bdug pa de dag skad cag
99a1(rgyud 'bum): ma gcig lanam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ bdag cag lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang du phyin te spos kyi gdugs su 'gyur bas/ bdag cag lha'i 'khor rnams kyang spos
99a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi dri mchog de tshor bar 'gyur/ spos kyi du ba de'ang gser 'od dang ldan pas/ bdag cag gnas pa'i khang khyim nas/ tshangs pa'i gnas dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / lha mo spobs pa chen
99a3(rgyud 'bum): po dang / lha mo dpal chen mo dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / sde dpon chen po yang dag shes gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha dbang phyug chen po dang / lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag
99a4(rgyud 'bum): po dang / sde dpon chen po rin chen bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu 'khor lnga brgya dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas kyi bar thams cad kyang rab tu gsal bar bgyid do//
99a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis rang rang gi gzhal med khang du spos kyi bdug pa des/ skad cig yud tsam zhig la spos kyi gdugs su gyur pa'ang mthong la/ spos kyi dri'ang
99a6(rgyud 'bum): tshor bar 'gyur/ 'od zer gyi kha dog gis lha'i gzhal med khang thams cad gsal bar bgyid pa'ang mthong bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po dag la bka' stsal pa/ spos
99a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'od zer de gzhal med khang de dag 'ba' zhig gsal bar byas nas spos kyi gdugs su gyur te/ 'od zer chen po 'gyed pa ma yin te/ mi'i rgyal po de dag lag pa pog por bzung ste/ spos mchog
99b1(rgyud 'bum): dam pa bsregs nas mdo sde 'di la mchod pa byed pa'i tshe/ spos kyi du ba de thang cig yud tsam zhig la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang
99b2(rgyud 'bum): ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha
99b3(rgyud 'bum): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / khang khyim thams cad gsal bar byas nas/ nam mkha' kun tu gang zhing rgyas pa dang / spos kyi bdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag sprin gyi
99b4(rgyud 'bum): gdugs su 'gyur te/ gdugs de'ang gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pas/ lha'i khang khyim thams cad gsal bar byed de/ 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprin dang
99b5(rgyud 'bum): spos kyi gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa thams cad ni/ gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i gzi byin gyi mthu las gyur pa yin no// mi'i rgyal po de dag lag tu spos por
99b6(rgyud 'bum): thogs nas mdo sde 'ang la mchod par byed pa'i tshe/ spos kyi gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'ba' zhig tu khyab par gyur pa ma yin gyi/
99b7(rgyud 'bum): skad cig yud tsam zhig gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med mtha' med pa kun tu khyab cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyi rnam
100a1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' kun gyi spos kyi gdugs su gyur nas/ kun gsal bar byed pa'ang de bzhin te/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas mang po de dag spos kyi gya nom pa'i dri gang yin pa de dag kyang rig
100a2(rgyud 'bum): cing mkhyen/ sprin gyi bla re dang gser gyi kha dog de dag kyang gzigs nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrug
100a3(rgyud 'bum): bstan nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang po de dag gis mthun par gzigs shing so sor brtags te/ gsung mthun par chos smra ba'i mkhan po de la skyes bu chen po khyod kyis shin tu zab
100a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mdo sde gya nom pa 'di rgya cher yongs su spel nas/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur
100a5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di lta bu mnyan nas thos pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de'i tshad kyang shin tu mang ba yin no// yi ger 'dri ba dang / len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dag
100a6(rgyud 'bum): par ston pa dang / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag sems can gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal
100a7(rgyud 'bum): ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di thos par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur bas so// de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag
100b1(rgyud 'bum): k hrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsung gcig tu chos kyi stan la 'dug pa'i chos smra ba'i mkhan po de la leg
100b2(rgyud 'bum): so legs so zhes bsngags pa 'di brjod nas/ rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis dga' ba brgya stong tshad med pa snyed mngon par bsgrubs te/ tshogs yongs su rdzogs par
100b3(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ 'phags pa mang po las yang dag par 'das te/ khams gsum las nges par byung nas/ gtso bo mchog tu gyur te byang chub kyi shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/ khyad par du 'phags
100b4(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams yongs su brgyan par 'gyur/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rkyen dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'i bdud kyi
100b5(rgyud 'bum): dmag tshogs rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos rnams dang / shin tu zab pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
100b6(rgyud 'bum): khyod rdo rje'i stan la 'dug nas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa shin tu zab pa gya nom pa rnam pa bcu gnyis yongs su skor bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa'i
100b7(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi rnga chen po mchog tu gyur pa rab tu rdung bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi dung shin tu gya nom la 'bud par 'gyur/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan khyad par du 'phags pa sgreng bar 'gyur/
101a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgron ma shin tu gsal bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi char rab tu 'debs par 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i 'ching ba tshad med pa yongs su gcod par 'gyur
101a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa skyed pa mtha' med cing 'jigs su rung ba'i rgya mtsho las yongs su bzlas par 'gyur/ mu med pa'i skye shi'i 'khor ba las thar bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag
101a3(rgyud 'bum): khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed dang phrad par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam
101a4(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni slad ma dang da ltar gyi tshe'i yon tan tshad ma mchis pa'i 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas/ de'i slad du mi'i rgyal po gang gis mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa 'di
101a5(rgyud 'bum): thos par gyur pa de ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lags pas/ mi'i rgyal po de dag la bdag cag rnams yongs su srung zhing rjes su dran par bgyid do//
101a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang bsod nams kyi phan yon tshad ma mchis pa snyed mthong ba'i slad du/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'khor gzhan rnams dang / yi dgas 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad ma mchis
101a7(rgyud 'bum): p a snyed rang rang gi gzhal med khang rnams su spos kyi bdug pa'i sprin gyi gdug pa'i sprin gyi gdugs dang cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs de dag mthong ba'i tshe bdag cag rang gi lus mi snang bar
101b1(rgyud 'bum): bgyis nas/ chos gnyan pa'i slad du rgyal po de'i pho brang yongs su gtsang zhing mdzes par brgyan pa/ chos 'chad pa'i gnas su mchis par 'tshal lo// de bzhin du tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang /
101b2(rgyud 'bum): lha mo spobs pa chen po dang / dpal gyi lha mo chen mo dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang
101b3(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po dang / sde dpon chen po rin chen bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu 'khor lnga brgya pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / lha dang / gnod
101b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyin la sogs pa'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshang ma mchis pa snyed kyang chos mnyan pa'i slad du so so nas rang gi lus mi snang bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa chos
101b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi gdan shin tu mdzes par bgyis pa/ chos bshad pa'i gnas su mchi bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'khor gzhan rnams dang / gnod sbyin
101b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad rtse gcig tu mi'i rgyal po de dag lhan cig tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyis nas/ bla na ma mchis pa'i chos kyi sbyin bdag chen por gyur pa'i rgyus bdud rtsi'i ros bdag cag tshim par gyur pas
101b7(rgyud 'bum): de'i slang du bdag cag rgyal po de la yongs su bsrungs nas/ gnod pa rnams bsal te bde ba thob par bgyid do// de'i pho bang dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul rnams su'ang sdig pa dang
102a1(rgyud 'bum): ltas ngan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid do/ / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi cig car thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal
102a2(rgyud 'bum): po gang la la zhig rang gi yul du mdo sde 'di bzhugs par gyur kyang / yongs su spel bar yang mi bgyid la sems kyis kyang spong bar bgyid cing / nyan par yang mi mos mchod par yang ma
102a3(rgyud 'bum): mos/ mchod par yang mi bgyid/ bla mar yang mi bgyid/ bsngags pa rjod pa'ang mi bgyid la 'khor bzhi po dag mdo sde 'dzin pa mthong bar gyur na'ang bla mar mi bgyid cing / mchod pa dang rim gro'ang ma
102a4(rgyud 'bum): bgyid na/ bdag cag dang / 'khor gzhan rnams dang / lha tshad ma mchis pa rnams kyang shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i chos thos par mi 'gyur bas/ bdud rtsi'i ro la rgyab kyis phyogs shing dam pa'i chos kyi
102a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyun yang stor bar 'gyur/ gzi byin dang mthu stobs kyang ma mchis par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro bar 'phel bar bgyid cing / lha dang mi rnams yongs su nyams par 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i chu bor bying bar 'gyur
102a6(rgyud 'bum): zhing / mya ngan las 'das pa'i shul dang gol bar 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'khor gzhan rnams dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa de lta bu'i dngos po mthong bar
102a7(rgyud 'bum): gyur nas/ yul de yongs su spong bar bgyid la/ yongs su srung ba'i sems kyang yongs su ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// bdag cag 'ba' zhig rgyal po de spong bar bgyid pa ma lags kyi/ yul skyong
102b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i lha dge ba chen po tshang ma mchis pa rnams kyang yal bar bor nas mchi bar 'gyur lags so/ / de ltar yal bar bor ba'i dbang gis yul der gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur zhing rgyal thabs
102b2(rgyud 'bum): stor bar 'gyur/ mi'i tshogs thams cad dge ba'i sems ni ma mchis kyis/ gcig la gcig 'ching ba dang / gsod pa dang / gshe ba dang / rtsod pa dang / phan tshun phra ma dang gya gyur bgyid cing /
102b3(rgyud 'bum): nongs pa ma mchis pa la chad pa gcod pa 'ba' zhig sems pas/ nad dang rims nad 'byung bar 'gyur/ gza' mjug rings yang nas yang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ gdugs gnyis cig car 'char bar 'gyur/
102b4(rgyud 'bum): gza' 'jug pa la rgyun chad pa ma mchis par 'gyur/ gzha' dkar nag gis bkra shis pa ma lags pa'i mtshan ma ston par 'gyur/ skar mda' ltung zhing sa g.yo bar 'gyur/ khron pa'i nang nas sgra 'byung
102b5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ char dang rlung drag po dus ma lags par 'bab cing ldang bar 'gyur/ rtag par mu ge'i gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'bru rnams yongs su smin par mi 'gyur/ phas rgol ba'i dgra mang pos
102b6(rgyud 'bum): gtses pas yul mi rnams sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa mang po myong bar 'gyur/ yul gyis phyogs kyang yid du mi mchi zhing mngon par dga' ba ci'ang ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag
102b7(rgyud 'bum): cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sgra brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa dang / sngon yul skyong ba'i lha dge ba chen po rnams kyis yongs su spangs nas mchi ba'i tshe/ ltas ngan pa'i dngos po brgya stong tshad ma mchis
103a1(rgyud 'bum): pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig yul skyong zhing rtag par bde ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'chal ba dang / skye bo mang po rnams
103a2(rgyud 'bum): bde ba la 'god par 'tshal ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar bkum nas rang gi yul khams gtan du rgyas shing ngar bar 'tshal ba dang / yang dag pa'i ston pa 'jig rten du gnas nas sdug bsngal gyis
103a3(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa dang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams nye bar zhi bar 'gyur bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das yul gyi bdag po de dag gdon mi 'tshal bar mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di mnyan nas yongs su gzung bar
103a4(rgyud 'bum): bgyi zhing mdo sde 'di klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / len pa dang / 'dzin pa dag la'ang bsnyen bkur ba dang / rim gro dang / mchod par bgyid na/ bdag cag dang chang ma mchis pa'i wa
103a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gzhan rnams chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus/ bla na med pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi ro myong bar 'gyur bas/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa la sman par 'gyur zhing lha gzhan
103a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang sman yon mchog thob par 'gyur lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar mi'i rgyal po des sems rtse gcig tu mdo sde 'di mnyan nas yongs su bzung ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
103a7(rgyud 'bum): ltar tshangs pa chen pos kyang sems can rnams la rtag par 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos yang dag par bstan/ brgya byin lha'i dbang gis kyang bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs
103b1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par bstan/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong rnams kyis bstan bcos mang po bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong
103b2(rgyud 'bum): gis bstan bcos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed bstan mod kyi/ 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa dang / thugs rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs nas/ sgra dang ma'i tshogs
103b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi cheng du/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa bka' bshad pa gang lags pa sngar bstan pa de dag dang bskrun na ni/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gyur snyed kyis ches khyad par du 'phags pas dper
103b4(rgyud 'bum): bgyir ma mchis lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling na rgyal po ji snyed mchis pa de dag yang dag pa'i chos kyis 'jig rten brtul nas/ sems can la bde ba'i dngos po stsal pa
103b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / bdag dang 'khor rnams yongs su bsrungs nas/ sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa ma mchis par bgyid pa dang / gzhan yang bas kyi rgol bas gnod par bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba ji snyed pa thams cad
103b6(rgyud 'bum): thag ring du spong ba dang / yul gyi gdon bgegs rnams yongs su bsal nas/ yang dag pa'i chos kyis 'dul zhing rtsod pa ma mchis par bgyid pa'i slad du'o// de'i slad du mi'i rgyal po rnams so so nas rang gi
103b7(rgyud 'bum): yul du chos kyi sgron ma sbar te/ mtha' yas pa rnams gsal bar bgyis nas lha'i tshogs dang / rang gi 'khor rnams la sman par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang
104a1(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'khor tshad ma mchis pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na lha dang yi dgas ci mchis pa thams cad rgyu dang rkyen 'di'i dbang gis bla na ma mchis pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi ro myong
104a2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang gnod sbyin gyi 'khor tshad ma mchis pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na lha dang / mi dang / gzi byin chen po'i mthu stobs dang ldan pa dang / 'od kyi snang ba phun gsum tshogs pa dang
104a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan yang slang ma'i dus kyi tshe bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis shing / bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed du rtag tu shin tu bde ba'i long spong bde bar 'gyur
104a4(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / gzhan yang slang ma'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas tshad ma mchis pa snyed mnyes par bgyis nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/
104a5(rgyud 'bum): bas/ 'di lta bu'i sman yon tshad ma mchis shing mtha' ma mchis pa thams cad kyang / thugs rje chen po tshangs pa'i 'khor las yang dag par 'das pa/ mkhyen pa chen po brgya byin pas lhag pas dka' ba rnam pa sna
104a6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs yongs su spyod pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong las khyad par du 'phags par gyur pas/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gyur snyed kyi chos lhag par gyur te/ brjod du ma mchis
104a7(rgyud 'bum): p a'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems can rnams 'jig rten gyi cheng du'adi lta bu'i mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa yang dag par bkas bshad nas
104b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzam bu'i gling gi yul gyi bdag po thams cad dang / mi'i chos mang po rnams 'jig rten na chos kyi cho ga dang / yul yongs su skyong zhing mi rnams gdul ba dang / bskul bar bgyi ba'i dngos po rdza
104b2(rgyud 'bum): snyed pa de dag gsal bar khong du chud pa las gyur pa lags te/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus thams cad bde ba thob pa'i bsod nams kyi phan yon 'ang ngag thams cad kyang ston
104b3(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po shAkya thub pas byams pa dang thugs rje'i mthus mdo sde 'di rgya cher yang dag par spel ba las gyur pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen de'i slad du mi'i rgyal po rnams kyis mdo sde dam pa yong
104b4(rgyud 'bum): su gzung ste mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar bgyis nas bsngags pa brjod par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab
104b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dag gis thams cad la sman par bgyid pas/ de'i slad du mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po ngag la yang 'di skad
104b6(rgyud 'bum): ces bka' stsal to/ / khyed cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'khor gzhan rnams dang / lha'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa rnams dang / mi'i rgyal po de dag gal te sems rtse gcig tu mdo sde 'di
104b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhan nas mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang bla mar byas te bsngags pa brjod pa mthong nas/ yongs su bsrungs te gnod pa rnams yongs su sel bar byed na/ khyed cag rab tu bde ba myong bar 'gyur
105a1(rgyud 'bum): bar byed do/ / gal te 'khor bzhi po dag gis mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par spel bar byed na/ de ni lha dang mi'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgya cher byas/ yang dag par
105a2(rgyud 'bum): byas pa yin pas/ sems can tshad med pa snyed la 'khor ba la phan btags pa yin te/ 'di lta bu'i gang zag gang yin pa de la khyed kyis rtag par srung zhing yongs su bskyab par bya'o// 'di lta bu'i 'khor
105a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi po dag rkyen gzhan gyis phan tshun gnod par byos la/ de dag lus dang sems rab tu dben zhing bde bas mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par spel ba phyi ma'i mtha' ji srid pa'i bar du sems can la phan
105a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dogs pa la rgyun chad pa med par byos shig/ de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po
105a5(rgyud 'bum): che'i gzungs kyi cho ga mchis te/ sems can gang la la zhig yongs su 'dzin par mos na/ yon tan tshang ma mchis pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / bdag gis rtag par bzung bas sems can de sdug bsngal
105a6(rgyud 'bum): spangs nas bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam pa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so// gang zhig yongs su 'dzin par bzung 'tshal bas sngar lus srung
105a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sngags 'di gdon par bgyi'o/ / sngags ni 'di lta ste/ na mo be shra ba NA ya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ra ra ra ra/ ku ru ku nu/ khu nu lu nu/ gu nu gu nu/ sa pa sa pa/ ka ra ka ra/ ba kAram
105b1(rgyud 'bum): ma hA bi kA ram/ ma hA kA la/ ma hA rA dza/ rak+Sha/ bdag nyid kyi ming brjod par bya/ rak+ShaM tu mAM sarba satwA nAM tsa swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das sngags pa 'di 'don pas skud pa dkar po la lan bdun
105b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyis btab ste/ lan re mdud pa re re bor nas dpung pa la bcings na/ de'i don gdon mi 'tshal bar 'grub par 'gyur lags so// pog mang po 'di lta ste/ gu gul dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka
105b3(rgyud 'bum): dang kata ka ri'i pog 'di rnams cha mnyam par gcig tu bsres te/ sug par pog por thogs nas/ pog por bsregs te mchod par bgyi'o// khrus yongs su dag par bgyis te gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos
105b4(rgyud 'bum): te/ khang pa dben par sngags bzlas te/ lha'i rgyal po rnam thos bdag gis g.yar drang bar bgyi lags so// sngags ni 'di lta ste/ na mo ba shA ba N+Da ya/ na mo dA na dA ya/ tsaN+De sha rA ya/ A kaR+Sha/ a pa
105b5(rgyud 'bum): ri mi ta/ tsaN+De shwa ra ba ra ma/ kA ru Ni ka sarba satwa/ hi ta tsiH/ bdag gi ming brjod/ ma ma d+ha na/ badz+ra par+ye shwa ra/ swa yaM A kaR+Sha swAhA/ sngags 'di lan bdun tshang bar
105b6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas nas de'i rjes la sngags kyi snying po gdon par bgyi'o/ / sngags 'don pa'i tshe/ sngar dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag bgyis nas/ lha'i dbang po rnam thos kyi ming nas 'don
105b7(rgyud 'bum): par bgyid na/ nor rdzas rnams stsol zhing sems can rnams ci dang ci smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas/ bde bar stsal bar bgyid do// de ltar phyag bgyis nas/ de'i rjes
106a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po rnam thos kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i sngags kyi snying po 'don par bgyid na/ yid bzhin gyi bde ba stsol bar bgyid do// de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyis bcom
106a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i sngags kyi snying po smras pa/ na mo bai shra ma NA ya/ ma hA rA dza ya/ tad+ya thA/ si mi si mi/ su mu su mu/ tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/
106a3(rgyud 'bum): ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ sA d+ha ya dA ma/ At+ma na ni dz+ya/ an+ta ra/ d+hA tu swa hA/ na mo bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/ d+ha na dA ya swA hA/ ma no ra tha ba ri pU rA ya swA hA/ sngags 'don pa'i tshe
106a4(rgyud 'bum): sngar lan stong tshang bar bzlas nas de'i rjes la khang pa gtsang ma dag tu ba lang gi lci bas ngogs la zhal zhal bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor chung ngu zhig bgyis nas/ zas tsa 'byor pas sems rtse gcig tu mchod par
106a5(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / rtag par pog spos dam pa sregs nas dud pa rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o// sngags kyi snying po snga ma gdugs mtshan du sems dran pa nye bar gzhag nas/ bdag nyid kyis thos pa tsam du zlos shing
106a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyis rig par mi bgyid na/ de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu shi na shi zhes bgyi ba gzhon nu'i gzugs nye bar bstan te/ drung du mchis nas 'di skad du ci'i phyir bdag gi pha bod ces bya bar gyur pas
106a7(rgyud 'bum): lan du 'di skad ces bdag dkon mchog gsum mchod pa'i don du nor 'tshal na/ de bzhin du srul bar gsol zhes smra bar bgyi'o// de'i tshe shan ni shi tshig de thos pa dang / slar ba'i thad du mchis
106b1(rgyud 'bum): nas pa la 'di skad du dge ba spyad pa'i mi zhog sems rtse gcig tu dkon mchog gsum chod/ nor gyis 'phongs pa'i slang du yab la gsol ba 'debs so zhes bgyis pa dang / phas khyod myur du song la nyin gcig
106b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du de la ka ra sha pa Na brgya byin cig ces mchi bar 'gyur te/ sngags 'den pas de lta bu'i mtshan ma mthong bar gyur na/ don 'grub par 'gyur bar rig par bgyis nas/ gcig tu khang pa gtsang ma
