106b3(rgyud 'bum): nang du bdug spos bsregs te/ mchis nyal ba'i khri'i drung du spos kyi sgrog ma gcig gzhag nas/ rtag par nam langs pa'i tshe sprog ma'i nang du nor ci thob pa blta bar bgyi'o// rtag par nor thob pa'i tshe de nyid
106b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdug spos dang / me tog dang / zhal zas kyis dkon mchog gsum la mchod cing dbul 'phongs pa rnams la sprul nas bas par bgyi'o// bsris te gzhag par mi bgyi'o// sems can rnams la byams
106b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang snying rje'i bsam pa bskyed par bgyi'o/ / zhe sdang dang / g.yo sgyu dang / gnod sems kyi bsam pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o// gal te zhe sdang skyes par gyur na dngos grub kyi mthu stor bar 'gyur/ rtag par
106b6(rgyud 'bum): sems bsrungs te zhe sdang bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ / gzhan yang sngags 'dzin pas rtag par lha'i rgyal po rnam thos bdag dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / 'khor rnams rjes su dran par bgyis te/ sngags brjod nas
106b7(rgyud 'bum): rtag par dge ba bcu po de dag gi bstangs te/ lha de dag bsod nams kyi mthu 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / dge ba mang po kun tu 'phel ba dang / byang chub mngon par rtogs par 'gyur bar bgyid na/ lha mang po
107a1(rgyud 'bum): de dag gis dngos po de lta bu mthong ba dang / thams cad rab tu dga' bas lhan cig tu nye bar mchis te/ sngags 'don pa'i gang zag de la yongs su srung bar bgyid do// gzhan yang sngags
107a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa de'i tshe ring zhing lo tshad ma mchis pa snyed du gnas par 'gyur/ ngan song gsum dang rtag tu 'bral zhing rtag par gnod pa ma mchis par 'gyur/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang gter rnams thob par
107a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa dang / dbang phyug dang / smon pa thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur/ gal te blon thabs 'tshal na yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/ gcan gzan thams cad kyi skad kyang 'tshal
107a4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te sngags 'don pa'i tshe/ bdag gi lus mngon gsum du mthong bar 'tshal na/ tshes brkyang ngam bco lnga'i gdugs la ras dkar po la/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs
107a5(rgyud 'bum): shing sprin dang tshon sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa tho bar bgyi'o/ / sku gzugs 'ji ba'i ri mo mkhan po'ang bslab pa'i gnas brgyad yang dag par blang bar bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi sku g.yon phyogs su dpal rtsa lha
107a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs su bri bar bgyi'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi g.yas phyogs su rgyal po rnam thos bdag dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / 'khor rnams kyi gzugs bris nas mchis pa'i stan legs par
107a7(rgyud 'bum): bshams te/ metog sna tshogs pakram nas/ spos mchog dam pa bsregs te/ gdugs mtshan tshun chang pa ma mchi bar mar me sbar bar bgyi'o// bza' ba dang btung ba mchog das pa sna tshogs gus pa'i sems
107b1(rgyud 'bum): bskyed de dus su mchod par bgyis nas/ sngags gdon par bgyil// brnyas pa'i sems bskyed par mi 'gyi'o// bdag g.yar 'dren pa'i tshe sngags 'di gdon par bgyi'o// nam/ shrI kar+N+Na ya/ bud dA ya/ na mo ba sa
107b2(rgyud 'bum): NA ya/ yak+Sha rA dzA ya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/ a ng+gi rA dzA ya/ na ma/ shri ma hA de byaM/ tad+ya thA/ ta ra ta ra/ tu ru tu ru/ ba ra ba ra/ su shud+d+ho su shud+d+ho/ ha na ha na/ ma Ni ka na ka/ badz+ra be DUR+Ya/ muk+te kA la kri ti/ sha ri rA ya/ sarba satwA nA/
107b3(rgyud 'bum): hi ta kA ma/ bai shra ma Na shrI ya de baM/ pra b+ha ya/ e h+ye hi/ ma bi lam+ba/ g+hur+ya g+hur+N+Na/ pa ra s+ya/ pa ra s+ya/ da dA hi ma ma a mo ka na ma s+ya/ dar sha na/ kI ma s+ya/ da ru nam/ ma ma ma na/ pa ri ha ra dA ra d+ha rA ya swA hA/
107b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sngags 'don pa'i mi de dang / gzhan yang de lta bu mchod pa rgyas par bgyis pa mthong bar gyur na/ byams shing sdug pa dang rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/ bdag byis pa gzhon
107b5(rgyud 'bum): nu'i gzugs sam/ rgan po'am/ dge slong gi gzugs su lus bsgyur nas/ sug pa na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang gser gyi snod thogs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs te lus kyis gus pa bstan
107b6(rgyud 'bum): te/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas brjod de/ sngags 'don pa de la khyod kyis bsams pa bzhin du smon pa rnams 'grub par bya'o zhes mchis par 'gyur lags so// nags tshal gyi nang du mi snang bar
107b7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lam/ rin po che mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / skye bo mang po kun gyi snying du sdug cing bkur bar 'tshal lam/ gser dang dngul la sogs pa'i nor rnams yongs su gnyer bar
108a1(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lam/ sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'tshal lam/ mngon par shes pa dang / tshe shin tu ring ba dang / longs spyod mchog dam pa yongs su gnyer bar 'tshal na'ang bsam
108a2(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhin du mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/ / deng bdag gis re zhig dngos po 'di tsam zhig bstan pa lags te/ gal te yang gzhan dag yongs su gnyer bar bgyid na/ yang thams cad
108a3(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar smon pa bzhin du mngon par 'grub cing / rin po che'i gter bas pa ma mchis pa dang / yon tan mthar thug pa ma mchis pa'ang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lags so// gal te nyi ma dang zla ba dog sa la lhung
108a4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur yang srid/ sa chen po res 'ga' gzhan du 'gyur yang srid kyi/ bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'di ni nam chab 'tshal bar mi 'gyur bas/ rtag par yid bzhin gyi bden pa 'thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom
108a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa des sngags 'ang 'don par bgyid na/ ngal ba ma mchis par cho ga rnams myur du 'grub par 'gyur
108a6(rgyud 'bum): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das deng bdag gis dbul 'phongs pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis gnod par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gi cheng du sngags 'di bstan pa/ phan yon chen po thob nas thams cad phyug
108a7(rgyud 'bum): cing skyid pa dang / rang dbang dang ldan zhing gnod pa ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur lags so// bdag gis nam 'tsho'i bar du gang zag de'i rjes su 'brangs nas yongs su bsrungs nas/ gnod pa rnams yang
108b1(rgyud 'bum): su sel bar bgyid ngo / / gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'ang yongs su bzung nas spel bar bgyid pa dang / sngags 'don pa'i gang zag de la gom pa brgya tshun chad du 'ong
108b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis kun tu gsal bar bgyid lags so/ / bdag gis gnod sbyin brgya stong ji snyed pa mchis pa'ang rtag par rim gro bgyid cing / ji ltar mos pa bzhin du g.yog bgyod pas yod bzhin du mi 'grub pa gang yang
108b3(rgyud 'bum): ma mchis lags so/ / bdag gis bden tshig smra ba la mi med pa ma mchis par ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig dbang du gyur cing mkhyen par gyur pa lags so// de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyis sngags 'di
108b4(rgyud 'bum): smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi dbul 'phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dra ba dral nas bde ba thob par bya ba dang / mdo sde 'jig rten du
108b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya cher spel ba'i phyir/ rig sngags 'di bshad pa legs so legs so// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi cig car stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
108b6(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ gus pas thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pa gya nom pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan la mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan
108b7(rgyud 'bum): zhal ni zla gtsang nya 'dra zhing / / nyi ma stong gi 'od zer bkye nas mtshungs// spyan ni dag yangs pad+ma sngon po 'dra// tshems dkar gtams pa dper na dung dang mtshungs// bcom ldan yon tan mtha' med rgya mtsho
109a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dra rin chen gya nom tshad med bden pa bsags/ / mkhyen pa'i yon tan chab kyis rtag rgyas shing // ting 'dzin dam pa brgya stong rab tu gang // zhabs mthil 'khor lo mtshan ni thams cad
109a2(rgyud 'bum): mdzes/ / lte ba mu khyud rtsibs stong kun rab mnyam/ phyag dang zhabs kyi dra ba kun brgyan pa// ngang pa'i rgyal bzhin mtshan ni phun sum tshogs// bcom ldan sku 'od gser gyi ri bo 'dra// rnam dag
109a3(rgyud 'bum): khyad 'phags dpe zla yod ma mchis/ / ri rab bzhin du yon tan kun rgyas pas// bcom ldan ri rgyal khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// mtshan dang dpe byad mkha' bzhin dpag mi reg/ zla ba stong pas lhag par 'od zer
109a4(rgyud 'bum): bkye/ / smig rgyu sgyu ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pas// thugs zhe na mi mnga' khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa dang / bcom
109a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde mchog 'di ni// bla med stobs bcu dag gis rab tu gsungs// khyed cag rgyal po bzhi yis rab srungs la// rab
109a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' nur med pa yi sems skyed cig/ mdo sde rin chen gya nom zab mo 'di// sems can thams cad bde ba sbyin par byed// sems can de dag bde bar gyur pa'i phyir// rtag tu 'dzam gling rab tu spel bar
109a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / stong chen 'jig rten khams ni 'di dag tu// sems can rnam pa thams cad ji snyed pa// yi dgas dud 'gro sems can dmyal ba yi// sdug bsngal 'gro ba de kun sel bar byed// 'dzam gling 'jiganas
109b1(rgyud 'bum): pa yi rgyal po dang / gzhan yang sems can rnam pa thams cad kun// mdo rje mthu yis rtag tu rab dga' zhing // nad mang sdug bsngal bsal bas chom rkun med// yul der mdo sde rgya cher spel ba'i phyir/
109b2(rgyud 'bum): rab bde lo legs mi mthun gnod pa med// gang zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan nas// cho rigs btsun zhing nor ni gnyer ba dang // yul na lo legs rtsod pa med 'dod na// sems la bsams bzhin
109b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ / pha rol dgra rnams phyir ni zlog byed cing // rang gi yul khams rtag tu bde bar 'gyur// mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di yi mthus// sdug bsngal mang po mya ngan 'jigs pa med/
109b4(rgyud 'bum): rin chen shing rgyal khyim na gang gnas pa// bde ba'i yo byad thams cad skyed pa ltar// mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa'ang de bzhin te// mi yo rgyal po dag la yon tan mchog sbyin byed// dper na rab dang chu ni grang
109b5(rgyud 'bum): mo yis/ / skom pa'i gdung ba rnams ni sel ba ltar// mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa'ang de bzhin te// bsod nams mos pa'i sems ni yongs rdzogs byed// mi zhig gya nom rin chen gzeb bdog na// longs
109b6(rgyud 'bum): spyod sems la bsams bzhin 'byor pa ltar/ / mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa'ang de bzhin te// bsod nams bsam bzhin 'grub pas rgud pa med// lha yi bdag po khyod dang lha tshogs kyis// mdo sde'i rgyal
109b7(rgyud 'bum): po 'di la mchod par gyis/ / gal te bstan bzhin mdo sde 'dzin byed na// shes rab gzi byin phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// da ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// mdo sde'i rgyal po
110a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni srung dgongs pa/ klog 'don 'dzin pa dag ni gzigs gyur na// legs so ngo mtshar che zhes bsngags par gyur// gang zhig mdo sde 'ang ni nyan byed na// lus dang sems ni dga' rangs mgub
110a2(rgyud 'bum): skye rtag par gnod sbyin brgya phrag mang po yis/ / gang du gnas pa der ni der srung byed// 'jig rten khams 'di'i lha ni mang po rnams// de yi grangs ni tshad med bsam mo khyab// thams cad mdo sde'i dbang po 'ang
110a3(rgyud 'bum): mnyan pas/ / rab dga' srung byed nur ba ci yang med// gang zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan na// mthu che rab dpa' rtag par dbang dang ldan// mi yi 'khor mang thams cad phan 'dogs pas// gnod
110a4(rgyud 'bum): pa rab spong snang ba 'phel bar byed/ / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas dga' mgu rangs par gyur pas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
110a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni/ / sngon chad nam yang mdo sde zab mo shin tu gya nom pa 'di lta bu ma thos so zhes rab tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis mchi ma blags te ngus nas/ lus kyi yan lag 'dar zhing g.yo bar gyur te/
110a6(rgyud 'bum): ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mngon du gyur pas/ lha'i me tog man dar ba dang man ngar ba chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchod pa
110a7(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi la so so nas/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya mchis pas/ rtag par gnas de dang de dag tu
110b1(rgyud 'bum): mdo sde 'di dang / chos smra ba de dag yongs su bsrung zhing yongs su skyob par byed pas/ ye shes kyi snang bas yongs su skyob par bgyid do// gal te mdo sde 'di'i tshig dang don bsgyud pa zhig mchis na'ang bdag
110b2(rgyud 'bum): cag gis de dag rjes su dran zhing mi bskyud par bgyid pa'i slad du/ gzungs kyi sgo shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa stsal nas yongs su rtogs par bgyid do// gzhan yang mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di gang du
110b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa der sems can rnams la rgya cher 'phel zhing myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid lags so/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du chos 'di bstan pa na/ sems can tsha med pa snyed
110b4(rgyud 'bum): shes rab chen po'i spobs pa thob nas/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa snyed yongs su bsdus te/ mya ngan gyi gnod pa dang bral nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems thob par gyur pas/ bstan bcos sna tshogs
110b5(rgyud 'bum): la rab tu mkhas pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'i lam thob nas/ phyir mi ldog par gyur pas myur du byang chub mngon par rtogs par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal
110b6(rgyud 'bum): po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis yul srung ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mad bam po bdun pa/
110b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos kyi rnam grangs mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba yo nga / da ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
111a1(rgyud 'bum): par grub par bya ba'i chos 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mar gyur pa yin no zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
111a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs zhes bgyi ba gang gi tshig dang don gang zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs zhes bgyi ba ni phyogs dang gnas ma lags
111a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ phyogs dang gnas ma lags pa'ang ma lags so zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par
111a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhol zhing / theg pa chen po la mngon par yid ches nas/ theg pa chen po la bla mar byas pa legs so legs so// khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du gzungs zhes bya ba ni phyogs dang gnas yod pa'ang ma yin//
111a5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs dang gnas med pa'ang ma yin/ chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin/ dngos po'ang ma yin/ dngos
111a6(rgyud 'bum): po ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ rkyen yang ma yin/ rkyen ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ 'du byed kyang ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ chos skye bar 'gyur ba'ang med/ chos 'gag par 'gyur ba'ang
111a7(rgyud 'bum): med mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdags pa'i phyir de skad du bstan pa yin te/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan gyi nus pa dang / yang dag par lam gyi tshul dang / mthu stobs rnam par gzhag
111b1(rgyud 'bum): pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi bslab pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba'i dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams
111b2(rgyud 'bum): skye ba'i 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs mchog gya nom pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs shes par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
111b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pas bdag la gzungs 'di'i cho ga gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di la gnas par gyur na/
111b4(rgyud 'bum): bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chub las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / yang dag pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs nas gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / rang bzhin gyis spobs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i
111b5(rgyud 'bum): dngos po thob nas/ 'phags pa'i lam la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di dag thams cad kyang gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu legs so legs
111b6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis gzungs 'di thob par gyur na/ gang zag de ni sangs rgyas dang tha dad pa med par rig par bya'o//
111b7(rgyud 'bum): gang la la zhig gos byang chub sems dpa' de la mchod cing bkur sti byed pa dang / bla mar byed cing yo byad sbyin par byed na/ de ni sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas pa yin par rig par bya'o// shA riH
112a1(rgyud 'bum): bu gang zag gang la la zhig gzungs 'di thos nas len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / mngon par yid ches par bgyid pa de la 'di ltar sangs rgyas
112a2(rgyud 'bum): dang tha dad pa med par bkur sti byas nas/ mchod cing rim gro byas nas rgyu dang rkyen nges bla na med pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags bka' stsal pa/ tad+ya thA/ san d+hA ra
112a3(rgyud 'bum): Ni/ a ba d+hA ra NI/ su saM pra tiSh+Thi te/ su nA ma/ su pra tiSh+Thi ta/ bi dza ya ba la/ sa t+ya pra ti dz+nyA/ pa ri ti shiny+dza/ su a ro ha/ dz+nyA na pra ti/ u pa d+ha ne/ a ba na ma Ni/ a b+hi Shany+tsA ni/ a b+hi byA ha ra/ shu b+ha ba ti
112a4(rgyud 'bum): su ni shri tA ba hu/ gu b+ha a b+hi pA da swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chog 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig rab tu gnas nas
112a5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par 'dzin par byed na/ gang zag de ni bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du yang dag pa'i smon lam bskyed pa mthar thug pa med cing
112a6(rgyud 'bum): ral gri dang / dbyig pa dang / dug dang / chu dang / me dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pa rnams kyis de'i lus la gnod pa byed mi nus par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu mngon par zhen/
112a7(rgyud 'bum): pa med pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pas so// shA ri'i bu gang la la zhig gis grangs med pa bcu'i stong gsum
112b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phul nas/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du na bza' dang zhal zas mchog dam pa rnam
112b2(rgyud 'bum): pasna tshogs kyis mchod pa byed pa bas/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di la ni tha na tshig gcig tsam yang dag par bzung ba las byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ches mang du mang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na
112b3(rgyud 'bum): shA ri'i bu mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs shin tu zab pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / 'khor mang po rnam
112b4(rgyud 'bum): de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas/ thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur pas/ thams cad kyis yongs su 'dzin par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ mngon par zhen
112b5(rgyud 'bum): pa med pa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par
112b6(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba'i gzungs gnod pa thams cad ring du spong ba/ 'brug dang glog ma rungs pa thams cad 'gog cing 'jil bar byed pa yod de/ de ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs
112b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yin pas/ ngas kyang deng mdo sde 'dir lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang / 'jig rten la brtse ba dang / thams cad yongs su
113a1(rgyud 'bum): bsrungs nas bde ba 'thob par bya ba'i phyir 'khor mang po khyed la yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ / de nas 'khor mang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi bkra
113a2(rgyud 'bum): sprul pa thos pa dang / so so nas sems rtse gcig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas rig sngags mnyan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag legs par nyon cig/ 'di
113a3(rgyud 'bum): nas shar phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po a ga ta zhes bya ba dang / lho phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po sha te ru zhes bya ba dang / nub phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po tsu ta kAng zhes bya ba dang / byang
113a4(rgyud 'bum): phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po su ta mi ni zhes bya ba so so nas yod de/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis glog gi rgyal po 'di dag gi ming thos shing phyogs shes par gyur na/ gang zag
113a5(rgyud 'bum): de 'jigs shing skrag pa'i dngos po thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / glo bur gyi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gal te gang du gnas pa'i gnas der phyogs bzhi'i glog gi rgyal po 'di dag tu
113a6(rgyud 'bum): ming yi ger bris par gyur na/ gang du gnas de dag tu 'brug dang glog gi 'jigs pa med cing / gdon bgegs dang gnod pa'i sgrib pa med par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par glo bur du 'chi ba thams cad thag ring du srong
113a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags bka' stsal pa/ d+ya thA na mini mo nim/ ni mi wen dra trai loH/ mo ki sha ni ri sha la ne/ ha rak+Sha sa rak+Sha/ bdag mang 'di zhes bya ba'i gnas 'ja
113b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba dang / 'brug dang / glog dang / thog 'bab pa dang / glo bur du 'chi bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cigs
113b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug 'khor mang po'i nang du 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo btsugs nas
113b3(rgyud 'bum): thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang deng lha dang mi rnams la sman par bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten la brtse ba dang / thams cad yongs su bsrungs
113b4(rgyud 'bum): nas bde ba 'thob par bgyi ba dang / mthu chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyi ba'i ched du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po
113b5(rgyud 'bum): che'i gzungs gang lags pa mdo tsam zhig bstan par bgyi'o/ / de nas gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ kaTe/ bi ka Te/ ni ka De/ pad+har+thi ke/ pra ti mai tr-i/ shud+d+he muk+te bi ma le pra b+hA swa re/ aN+Da ri/
113b6(rgyud 'bum): par+N+Na ri/ she te/ bar+t+ta ra/ bA sa ni/ ha ri/ kaN+Da ri/ ka ba ri/ bing ga la ak+Shi/ dad+d+hi mu kha~M/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gnas 'dir 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad dang sdug bsngal gyi
113b7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshe ba nas/ glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ bdag gis sdig pa'i dngos po ngan pa thams cad mi mthong zhing / rtag par byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
114a1(rgyud 'bum): @#dbang phyug gi thugs rje chen pos byin gyi rlabs kyis dgongs shing yongs su srung bar gyur cig swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po stan las langs
114a2(rgyud 'bum): gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang deng lha dang mi rnams la sman pa cher bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten la brtse ba dang / thams cad yongs
114a3(rgyud 'bum): su bsrungs nas gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa dang / smon pa rnams yid bzhin 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du mi 'pham pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad par bgyi'o// de nas gzungs sngags smras pa
114a4(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni mu ni ne/ d+ha re/ ma ti me ti/ su ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ ha ha ha ha/ ma b+hU/ na ti ti pA pa/ badz+ra pA Ni/ a ha tsi ri tsa swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gzungs sngags 'ang ni mo 'pham
114a5(rgyud 'bum): par srung ba zhes bgyi ste/ skyes pa'am bud med gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu yang dag par gzung ste yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / mi bskyud cing rjes su dran par bgyid na
114a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag gdugs mtshan du de la yongs su srung bar bgyid pas/ 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad nas/ glo bur du 'tsho ba'i bar thams cad thag ring du spong bar 'gyur lags so// de nas mi mjed kyi
114a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po stan las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la'ang shin tu gya nom pa'i chos
114b1(rgyud 'bum): tsirnam grangs kyi gzungs lha dang mi rnams la rgya cher phan 'jogs pa/ 'jig rten la rab tu brtse ba/ thams cad yongs su srung bar bgyid pa dang / gan byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa/ smon pa 'ang
114b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du 'grub par bgyid pa mchis te/ gzungs sngags de bshad par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ rga la mo ma/ d+hi li swAhA/ prah+ma pu re swAhA/ brad+ma swa ra swA hA/ brad+yA b+h+r-i su gan+d+he/ puSh+pa sa sid d+ha re swA hA/ bcom
114b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das bdag gi gzungs sngags 'di ni tshangs pa'i ched pas bcad pa zhes bgyi ste/ gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dag la yongs su srung bar bgyid pas// mya ngan gyi gnod pa dang sdig pa'i las rnams thag
114b4(rgyud 'bum): ring du spong zhing / glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chang thams cad kyang yongs su spong bar bgyid do// de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po stan las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
114b5(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag la'ang badz+ra sha ni zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs rig sngags chen mo 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / gdon bgegs thams cad rab tu sol ba dang / glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad
114b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad thag ring du spong ba/ sdug bsngal dang bral nas bde ba stsol ba dang ma rnams la sman par bgyid pa mchis te/ gzungs de bshad par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ bi ni ba ra Ni ban d+ham pa/ 3/ ma Nin tan gau ra/
114b7(rgyud 'bum): gan d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li/ mthang gi/ drug si/ sa ra pra b+he/ wi ni ma byoH ta ma/ u ka ra Ni/ mo ha ra Ni/ dAr Nig/ tsam bA ke/ sha ba ri sha ba ri/ swAhA/ de nas lha'i rgyal po nam thos dang / lha'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung nga
115a1(rgyud 'bum): lha'i rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang / lha'i rgyal po mig mi bzang cig car stan las langs te gus pas thal po sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
115a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das bdag cag la'ang sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs/ sdug bsngal gyi nyon mongs pa las rtag par yongs su bsgrubs nas bde ba thob par bgyid pa/ tshe 'phel
115a3(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyid cing nad kyi sdug bsngal ma mchis par bgyid pa/ glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad thag ring du spong bar bgyid pa mchis te/ gzungs sngags de brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe/ su puSh+pa
115a4(rgyud 'bum): du ma/ pa r-i ha re Ar+ya pa ri sha sid+d+hi/ shAn+te/ nir muk+te/ maM ga l+ye/ hi rir+N+Na gar+b+he/ su ru te/ sing d+ha bi te swA hA/ de nas yang klu'i rgyal po chen po mang po 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po nA ga si dang / klu'i rgyal po
115a5(rgyud 'bum): klogs 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dngo / klu'i rgyal po gya nom 'od la sogs pa star las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
115a6(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la'ang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rim po che zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs/ glog ma rungs pa 'gog par bgyid pa 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams rab tu sel ba/ lha dang mi rnams
115a7(rgyud 'bum): la rgya cher phan 'dogs pa/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa/ gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa/ smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub pa/ glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad thag ring
115b1(rgyud 'bum): du spong ba/ dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ byang stems dang / sngags dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su sel bar bgyid pa mchis te/ bdag cag gzungs sngags 'di bcom
115b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la 'bul na/ thugs rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bdag cag klu'i 'gro ba 'di dang bral nas/ ser sna'i 'dod pa gtan du spang ba'i slad du bzhes su gsol/ de tsa'i slad du zhe na/ ser sna'i
115b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa 'di'i dbang gis 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mang po myong bar gyur pas/ bdag cag ser sna'i 'dod pa'i sa bon yongs su bcad par 'tshal lags so// de nas gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/
115b4(rgyud 'bum): a tsa le/ a ma le/ a mr-i te/ a k+Sha ye/ a b+ha ye/ pur+b+ha bi d+ya ba te/ sarba pA pa/ pra sha ma Na ye swAhA/ a li ye/ pan du/ su baR+Shi ye swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
115b5(rgyud 'bum): gang la la zhig rig sngags 'dig yar kha nas brjod par bgyid dam/ yi ger bris te glegs bam du bgyis nas 'chang zhing 'dzin par bgyid dam/ klog cing 'don par bgyid ngam/
115b6(rgyud 'bum): gus pas mchod par bgyid na/ 'brug dang / glog dang / thog thog mi 'bab cing / skrag pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa dang / mya ngan dang / nang dang / glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar
115b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad thag ring du spong bar 'gyur/ byang stems dang / mi la gnod pa bgyid pa'i stag dang / seng ge dang / spyang ki dang / sbrul gdug pa rnams dang / sbrang ma dang / sbrang ma mchu rings la sogs
116a1(rgyud 'bum): pas kyang gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// gzungs sngags 'di
116a2(rgyud 'bum): dag thams cad mthu chen po dang ldan pas sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems la bsams pa'i dngos po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed/ rgya cher phan 'dogs par byed do// sems rtse gcig tu ma
116a3(rgyud 'bum): byas pa ni ma gtogs te/ khyed cag the tshom ma za zhig/ de nas 'khor mang po rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pa dang / rab tu dga' bas mngon par yid ches par gyur nas/ bka'
116a4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par gzung bar gyur to/ / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas lha mo spobs
116a5(rgyud 'bum): pa chen mo 'khor mang po stan las yangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba'i mkhan po gang la la zhog/ gser
116a6(rgyud 'bum): 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par ston par bgyid na/ bdag gis shes rab 'phel bar bgyis nas/ rgyan dang ldan pa'i tshig gi spobs pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid do//
116a7(rgyud 'bum): gal te chos sba ba'i mkhan po de mdo sde 'di las tshig 'bru dang / yi ge dang / tshig gi don baspyad pa bzhin mchis na'ang / thams cad dran bzhin legs par khong du chung bar bgyis nas/ gzungs kyi kun 'dzin thogs
116b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ma mchis pa stsal bar bgyid ngo do/ / gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di sems can gang dag sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas/ yongs
116b2(rgyud 'bum): su 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher spel nas/ myur du nub par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can tshad ma mchis pa snyed mdo sde 'di thos pa'i dbang gis thams cad shin tu myur ba'i
116b3(rgyud 'bum): spobs pa dang / bsam pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob nas/ bstan bcos sna tshogs sgyur rtsal rnams la rab tu mkhas pa dang / 'khor ba las myur du nges par byung nas/ bla na med/
116b4(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid do// tshe 'di nyid la'ang tshe 'phel zhing 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams phun sum tshogs par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
116b5(rgyud 'bum): mdo sde 'dzin pa'i chos kyi mkhan po de dag dang / sems can gzhan yang mdo sde 'di mnyan par mos pa de dag gi ched du sman rnams sngags kyis btab nas khrus bgyi ba'i cho ga bshad par 'tshal te/ des de dag la
116b6(rgyud 'bum): gza' ma rungs pa ltas ngan ston pa tsa mchis pa dang / dang po btsas pa'i skar ma dang / phan tshun mi mthun par gyur pa dang / nad kyi sdug bsngal dang / 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang
116b7(rgyud 'bum): rmi lam ngan pa dang / gdon bgegs dang / byang snyems dang / dug dang / ngan du bgyis pa dang / sngags dang / ra langs dang / 'di gi bu la sogs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyi sgrib dang / bgags bgyid pa thams
117a1(rgyud 'bum): @cad yongs su bsal nas/ / rab tu zhi bar bgyid pas blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis khrus kyi cho ga 'di ltar bgyi ste/ des sman spos kyi ro dang ldan pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta ste/ shu dag
117a2(rgyud 'bum): gi wang dang ni s+thi ka spos/ / gla rtsi ba bla dag dang shi ri sha// in+d+ra ha ta sha ma ka sha mi// thang chu dang ni shing tshagla sgang dang / a ka ru dang tsan dan ta ka ra// sa la ki dang gur kum ha la las/ na tra smig bcud su kau me
117a3(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / / thang shing pa tra dang ni on shi la// sa la kye dang phra pa shu kul dang // yungs kar go snyong nag ge sa ra// sar tsa ra sa ru rta cha mnyam bgyi// skar ma rgyal la gcig tu btags nas ni// spos kyi phye ma de dag
117a4(rgyud 'bum): rab blangs te/ / sngags 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad gdab par bgyi// sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ su tr-i tre/ kr-i ke kA mA ta la/ dza na ka ra te/ u ka ra te in+d+ra dza li ni/ shaM ka ran te/ pA shi tsa li/ a brta ka
117a5(rgyud 'bum): ka si ke na/ ku du ku du/ kha ka bIr+ye/ kha ka pi le/ ka pa le/ ka pi la ma te/ shI la ma ti san d+hi du ra ma tre/ ba bang ka/ b+haM tsi li/ shi ri shi le sa t+ya s+thi te swa hA/ gal te chos bzhin khrus ni bgying 'tshal na// dkyil
117a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gru bzhi khru brgyad pa bgyis nas/ / rab tu dben zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu// don gang sgrub pa sems la dran par bgyi// ba lang lci bas dkyil 'khor byugs nas ni// steng du me tog kun tu dgram par bgyid//
117a7(rgyud 'bum): gser dngul snod ni shin tu gtsang mngag/ ro mchog 'o ma sbrang rtsis dgang bar bgyi// dkyil 'khor de yi sgo bzhi dag tu yang // skyes bu bzhi zhig chos bzhin srung du stsal// gzhon nu bzhi zhig lus ni rab
117b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyan nas/ so sor grwa rer chab kyi bum pa thogs// der ni rtag par gu gul ba sregs nas ni// dbyabs lnga'i rol mo rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi// dkyil 'khor de yi ngos bzhi dag tu yang // ba ngan gdugs dang lnga
117b2(rgyud 'bum): ldi mdzes par bgyi/ / dkyil 'khor nang du me long gsal ba dang // ral gri rnon po mnga' bzhi gzhag par bgyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhong kung ches stsal nas// 'dzeg pa'i shing leb 'di yi steng du
117b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhag/ snga ma'i phye ma chab dang sbyar nas ni// dkyil 'khor de yi nang du gzhag par bgyi// de ltar bkram zhing rnam par gzhag nas ni// de nas sngags bzlas dkyil 'khor mtshams bcad bgyi// mtshams
117b4(rgyud 'bum): bcad pa'i sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ a na ra ke na ya ni/ hi li mi li/ khe le/ khi khi le swA hA/ de ltar mtshams ni rab bcang nas// dkyil 'khor nang du zhugs nas ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig chab bsngags te
117b5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bzhi dag tu gtor bar bgyi/ / de nas spos chab dag la ni// brgya rtsa brgyad tshang sngags btab ste/ ngos bzhir yol bas bskor nas ni// de 'og lus ni bkru bar bgyi// chab dang spos chab la gdab ba
117b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni/ 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ sa ga tsi bi ga tsi/ bi ga tsa ba de swA hA/ khrus bgyis lags nas/ khrus bgyis pa'i chab dang / dkyil 'khor gyi nang du mchod pa bgyis pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba ci mchis pa
117b7(rgyud 'bum): rtsang po 'am/ rdzing gi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing / gzhan ni bsdu bar bgyi'o// de ltar khrus bgyis lags nas/ gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dkyil 'khor nas phyir byung nas khang pa gtsang ma'i nang du zhug te/
118a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags mkhan gyis de dag yi ngas rgya chen po slad du sprul nas/ sdig pa sna tshogs gtan du bcad cing / dge ba sna tshogs rtag par spyad nas/ sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed/
118a2(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi ste/ rgyu dang rkyen des na yid bzhin gyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed thob par 'gyur lags so// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ sems can gang zhig nad kyi sdug bsngal
118a3(rgyud 'bum): nyen/ / sman dpyad sna tshogs gsos kyang ma sos pa// khrus kyi cho ga 'di bzhin khrus bgyis te// gzhan yang mdo sde 'di ni klog bton nas// gdugs mtshan rtag par sems ni mi g.yeng bar// rtse gcig
118a4(rgyud 'bum): gus pas dang sems bskyed bgyis nas/ / nad kyi sdug bsngal bas par zhi bar 'gyur// dbul 'phongs nor dang ldan par 'gyur// phyogs bzhi'i gza' skar nyi zla'i lha// mthu yis rab bsrungs tshe ni
118a5(rgyud 'bum): ring bar 'gyur/ / bkra shis rab bde bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// ltas ngan gdon bgegs thams cad sel bar bgyi// de'i 'og tu lus srung ba'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla bar bgyi'o/
118a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ sa me bi sa me/ swAhA/ sa ga te/ bi ga te swA hA/ bi ga tsa ba te swA hA/ sA ga ra/ saM bud+d+hA ya swA hA/ skan drA mA tA ya swA hA/ ni la kar+N+Na ya swA hA/ a pa ra dzi ta/ bir+ya ya swA hA/ sim
118a7(rgyud 'bum): ban d+hA ya swAhA/ a ni mo la bA ga tA ya swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ brah+ma NAM swAhA/ na ma sa ra sA b+h+yo/ ma hA de byaM swA hA/ sid d+hAn+ta mAM/ man+t+ra pA da swA hA/ d+ha ra to// dza rtsi ta~M pra h+ma nu ma no ra/ bi to swA hA/ de nas lha mo
118b1(rgyud 'bum): spobs pa chen mo khrus kyi cho ga dang dkyil 'khor gyi sngags bshad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong ma
118b2(rgyud 'bum): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig/ mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / yi ger bris nas spel ba dang / ji skad
118b3(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa bzhin du spyod par bgyid na/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ 'brog dgon pa'am/ ri 'am/ nags tshal lam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'i gnas gang yang rung ba dag tu gnas kyang rung ste/
118b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag de'i ched du 'khor rnams dang ldan cig lha'i rol mo bgyis nas/ de'i thad du mchis te yongs su skyob pa dang srung bar bgyis nas/ nad kyi sdug bsngal dang / skar mnga' ltung ba dang / ltas ngan dang /
118b5(rgyud 'bum): rims nang dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa rnams sel bar bgyid/ rgyal po'i khrims kyis bzung ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pas gnod pa dang / byad stems thams cad rab tu
118b6(rgyud 'bum): zhi bar bgyis nas/ mdo sde 'dzin pa'i gang zag dge slong la sogs pa'i 'khor dang / nyan pa'i 'khor rnams myur du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las yongs su bzlas nas/ byang chub las bzlog par mi 'gyur bar
118b7(rgyud 'bum): phan 'dogs par bgyid do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsol pa gsan pa dang / lha mo spobs pa chen mo la/ lha mo khyod kyis sems can tshad med cing mtha' med pa dag la phan pa dang bde bar bya/
119a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyir ched du rig sngags de dag dang / spos chus khrus bya ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi chog rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yang dag par bshad pa legs
119a2(rgyud 'bum): so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ khyod kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di bsrungs nas/ myur du nub par mi 'gyur zhing / rtag par rgya cher gnas par 'gyur bar byos shig/ de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos
119a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to/ / de nas bram ze ko'u di rgya chos kyi slob dpon gyis lung bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus/ 'khor mang po'i mdun lha mo
119a4(rgyud 'bum): spobs pa chen mo la mngon par bstod pa/ shes gsal rab dpa' spobs pa'i lha mo khyod// lha mi'i mchod pa dag gis mchod par 'os// grags pas 'jig rten kun tu rgyas pas na// sems can thams cad re ba rdzogs par byed
119a5(rgyud 'bum): rirtse mthon po gnas mchog dag tu ni/ rtswa bsdus khyim byas de na rab tu gnas// rgyun du rtsa 'jam 'dud nas gos byas te// rtag par rkang pa ya gcig bkug ste 'greng // lha 'khor mang po thams cad 'dus lhaganas// thams
119a6(rgyud 'bum): cad rtse gcig sems kyis khyod la bsngags/ shes rab spobs pa ldan pa'i lha mo khyod// tshig snyan gya nom thams cad sbyin par gyis// de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mo des gsol ba btab pa mnyan nas gzungs
119a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags smras pa/ taHthA/ ma ra ts+yai ra/ a ba tse/ a ba dza ba ti ding gu le/ mang gu le/ bing ga la ba ti/ a gu shaM/ mA ri ts+yai/ sa ma ti/ da sha ma ti/ a gra ti/ ma gri ta ra tsa~M / ta ra tsa pa ti/ tsar tsa ra
119b1(rgyud 'bum): ma ro/ ma nan hrI/ dam/ A ts+yai/ praN drAr+ya/ lo ka dz+nyAn+d+re/ lo ka shed+d+ho/ lo ka bA ra/ sid dA bar te/ b+h+yAm sul/ shu tsi tsa ra/ a mra ta~M ha te/ a rba ti g+ha ta bud d+hA/ na mu tsi ma bAn su tsi man+ta b+h+ya/
119b2(rgyud 'bum): ha na ma skA raM/ bdag gi maung brjod/ ma ma bud d+hi/ dra shi hi bud d+hi/ a pra ti ha ta/ b+ha ba tu/ si b+ha me bi shu d+ha tsi to/ shash+tsA sh+lo ka/ man tra/ bi d+yA ka ka paM ya di sho/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA pra b+ha behi laM mi li/ hi ma ha/
119b3(rgyud 'bum): bi tsa to bi bud d+hi/ bdag gi ming brjod/ ma ma bud d+hA bi shud d+hi/ b+ha ga ba t+yaM ma/ de be yam/ sa ra swasti/ kA ra ti/ kaM yU ra ma ti/ hi mi li mi li/ a b+ha ya mi/ ma hA de be/ bud d+ha sa t+ye na/ d+harma sa t+ye na
119b4(rgyud 'bum): sad g+ha sa t+ye na/ in+d+ra sa t+ye na/ ba ru Na sa t+ye na/ ye lo kye/ sat+ya sa t+ye na/ de shes t+ye na/ sad dwe bA di tsin na/ a b+ha ha ma mi/ mahA de bi tsi la mi li bi tsa ra to// bdag gi maung brjod/ ma ma bud d+he/
119b5(rgyud 'bum): na mo b+ha ga ba ti/ ma hA de be/ sa ra sa t+ye/ sid+d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa daM swA hA/ de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos gzungs sngags 'di bstan nas/ bram ze de la 'di skad ces kye skyes bu chen po sems can rnams kyi ched
119b6(rgyud 'bum): du spobs pa gya nom pa dang / rin po che dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / shes rab yongs su gnyer nas/ thams cad la rgya cher phan btags te/ myur du byang chub mngon du byed par 'dod pa legs so legs so// de ltar
119b7(rgyud 'bum): shes par byas nas chog 'di gzung bar bya'o zhes smras nas/ yang tshigs su bcang de smras pa/ thog ma kho nar gzungs 'di kha ton du// byang zhing nor ba med par bklags nas ni// byin gyis rlob cing smon
120a1(rgyud 'bum): pa rdzogs bya'i phyir/ / dkon mchog gsum dang lha rnams skyabs 'gro zhing // sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rang rgyal nyan thos tshogs la gus phyag bya
120a2(rgyud 'bum): de 'og tshangs dang brgya byin dang / / 'jig rten skyong dang rgyal po bzhi// rtag par tshangs par spyod pa thams cad la// rtse gcig gus pas gus par phyag byas nas// dgon pa rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu//
120a3(rgyud 'bum): skad cher snga ma'i sngags dang cho ga gdon// sangs rgyas sku gzugs lha klu'i mdun dag tu// ji tsam 'byor pas mchod pa bsgrub par bya// sems can rnam pa de dag thams cad la// byams dang
120a4(rgyud 'bum): snying rjes brtse ba'i sems kyang bskyed/ / bcom ldan gser sku shin du gya nom mtshan// g.yeng ba med sems rtse gcig dran par bya// bcom ldan yang dag chos don dgongs mdzad pas// dbang po ji bzhin tinge 'dzin sgom
120a5(rgyud 'bum): la 'god/ / de yi tshig gi don ni legs soms la// stong pa nyid bstan rab tu sgom par gyis// bcom ldan sku gzugs dag gi spyan sngar no// rtse gcig yang dag dran pas gnas byed na// rgya nom ye shes tang
120a6(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin ngag dang / / gzungs mchog dam pa dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan gser zhal yang dag chos bstan nas// gya nom dbyangs kyis lha mi 'dul bar mdzad// ljags mtshan rkyen bzhin ngo
120a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshar rab ston pas/ / yangs ring stong gsum 'jig rten khyab par mdzad// bcom ldan gsung dbyangs gya nom de 'dra ba// rtse gcig dran na sems la 'jigs med 'thob// bcom ldan smon lam rgya chen btab
120b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbang / / ljags mtshan bsam gyis mi khyab 'di brnyes nas// chos rnams yod pa ma yin gsungs mdzad pas// dper na nam mkha' chags pa med pa 'dra// bcom ldan gsung dbyangs dag dang ljags
120b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan rnams/ / dran pa nyer gzhag gzhan med smon rdzogs 'gyur// gal te lha mo spobs chen mchod mthong ngam// slob mas slob dpon rjes slob mthong nas ni// gsang ba'i cho ga 'di blangs sgom phyed dam// bla mar
120b3(rgyud 'bum): byed na sems la bsam pa 'grub/ / gang zhig ye shes dam pa mchog 'dod na// rtse gcig sems kyis chos 'di gzung bar bya// bsod nams ye shes yon tan 'phel byed pas// nges par 'grub 'gyur the/
120b4(rgyud 'bum): tshom yongs ma skyed// nor 'tshel dag ni nor mang rnyed par 'gyur// grags pa gnyer ba grags chen thob par 'gyur// nges 'byung 'tshol ba rnam par grol 'gyur bas// nges par 'grub 'gyur the tshom yongs
120b5(rgyud 'bum): ma skyed/ / yon tan tshad med mtha' yas ji snyed pa// sems la bsams bzhin yongs su sdud par byed// gal te de ltar chos bzhin sprod nus na// nges par 'grub 'gyur the tshom yongs ma skyed// gtsang
120b6(rgyud 'bum): ma'i gnas su gos gsar bgos nas ni/ / dkyil 'khor che chung ji tsam nus par bya// bum pa gtsang ma bzhi na ro zhim dgang bar bya// me tog pog spos tsa 'byor mchod par bya// lnga ldi ba dan dag dang
120b7(rgyud 'bum): gdugs bres te/ / byug spos phye ma kun tu khyab brgyan nas// sangs rgyas lha mo spobs chen mchod byed na// lha lus mthong bar 'dod na smon bzhin 'grub// lha mo spobs chen mdun du snga ma'i sngags// zhag ni nyi shu rtsa
121a1(rgyud 'bum): gcig gdon par bya/ / gal te lha de mthong bar ma gyur na// rtsa gcig sems kyis zhag dgu dran par bya// nam gyi cha smad 'on kyang ma mthong na// gnas gtsang dam pa gzhan dag btsal
121a2(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / lha mo spobs chen gzugs ni rab bris te// mchod gnas bzlas brjod sems kyis mi gtang zhing // nyin mtshan le lo sems ni mi skyed na// bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs mthar thug med//
121a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam smin gang thob skye dgu sbyin byed na// smin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// gal te yid bzhin ma grub zla ba gsum// yang na drug dang dgu dang lo gcig par// rab brtson gsol 'debs
121a4(rgyud 'bum): sems ni mi g.yon/ / lha yi mig dang gzhan sems shes thob 'gyur// de nas bram tha ko'u di n+yas de skad ces bstan pa thos pa dang / dga' mgu rangs shing ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ 'khor mang po rnams la 'di/
121a5(rgyud 'bum): skad ces kye khyed cag lha dang mi'i 'khor mang po thams cad shes par byos la/ sems rtse gcig tu deng bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i chos la brten nas/ lha mo spobs pa mchog dam pa de dag la bsngags pa
121a6(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa nyon cig ces smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'jig rten dag la dbang phyug thob gyur pa// lha mo mthu chen thob la gus phyag 'tshal// deng bdag gtso mo de la bsngags pa yang // sngon gyi drang
121a7(rgyud 'bum): srong ji skad bstan pa bzhin/ / bkra shis yongs rdzogs sems ni bde bar gnas/ sems gsal ngo tsha khrel yod grags dang ldan// a ma byas te 'jig rten rab tu bskyed// rab dpa' rtag par brtson
121b1(rgyud 'bum): 'grus chen po spyod/ / 'thab mo'i g.yul du rtag par rgyun du rgyal// rab dul byams sems bzod pa gsol bar byed// da ltar gshin rje'i sring mo chen mor gyur// gos su rtag par dar chen sngon po gyon//
121b2(rgyud 'bum): sdug dang mi sdug byad bzhin kun dang ldan// mig ni mthong ba thams cad rab tu sdang // spyod mchog dam pa tshad med 'jig rten 'das// phyogs shing mngon dang mi kun yongs su sdud// res 'ga' ri brag zab
121b3(rgyud 'bum): ma ngag na gnas/ / res 'ga' brag phug gtsang po'i 'gram na gnas// res 'ga' ljon shing nags tshal chen por gnas// lha mo phal cher 'di dag kun tu gnas// ri dang nags tshal mo rgod ji snyed pa//
121b4(rgyud 'bum): rtag par lha mo la ni mchod par byed// rma bya'i sgros ni rgyal mtshan pa ngan byed// dus su mchog tu rtag par 'jig rten skyong // stag dang seng ge spyang kos rgyun du bskor// gnag lug bya la sogs pas
121b5(rgyud 'bum): rten yang 'arlal/ dril chen bsgrags nas sgra ni phyung bas na// byi ti ri ri la sgra ni kun tu bsgrags// res 'ga' rtse gsum tr-i shU la thogs byed cing // g.yas g.yon rgyun du nyi zla ru mtshon 'dzin// zla ba nag po'i
121b6(rgyud 'bum): tshes dgu bcu gcig la/ / de yi dus su rtag par mchod pa bya// res 'ga' ba su lha chen sring mor ston// g.yul 'gyed mthong na rtag par snying yang brtse// sems can thams cad rnam par lta ba la// lha mo mchog
121b7(rgyud 'bum): tu gyur pas bzlas pa med/ / res 'ga' ba rdzi bu mo dga' mor ston// lha dang 'thab tshe rtag par rgyal ba 'thob// 'jig rten dag na yun ring gnas par byed// rab dul bzod dang khro gtum ston par byed// bram ze
122a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po rig pa'i chos bzhi dang / / sgyu 'phrul sngags sogs thams cad rab tu rtogs// drang srong nang na rang dbang dag dang ldan// sa bon dang ni sa chen byed par nas/ lha yi bu mo la sog
122a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa'i tshe/ / rgya mtsho'i rlabs ltar nges par der yang 'du// klu dang gnod skyon mang po'i tshigs kun gyi// gtso bor gyur pas rab tu dul bar byed// bud med nang na tshangs spyod mchog dang ldan// tshig byung
122a3(rgyud 'bum): dper na 'dzag rten bdag po 'dra/ / rgyal po'i gnas na pad+ma dang yang mtshungs// chu bo'i 'gram na gnas tshe gru zam bzhin// byang bzhin sdug mdzes zla ba nya ba 'dra// mang thos phun tshegs gnas dang rten yang
122a4(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / spobs pa mchog byung ri rtse mthon po 'dra// dran pa thams cad kun gyi gling yang byed// lha ma yin la sogs te lha tshogs rnams// thams cad 'di yi yon tan bsngags par byed// mig stong brgya byin g+ha/
122a5(rgyud 'bum): yi dbang pos kyang // gus pa'i sems kyis lta zhing rab tu rtog/ sems can gang zhig re zhing 'tshol ba yod// de dag thams cad myur du 'grub par byed// yid myur spobs dang chos 'dzin ldan byed pas// sa chen
122a6(rgyud 'bum): steng na mchog tu gyur pa yin/ / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams ni 'di dag tu// mar me che ltar rtag par kun gsal byed// tha na lha 'dre gcan gzan dag la yang // de bas bsams bzhin thams cad rdzogs
122a7(rgyud 'bum): byed 'gyur/ / bud med rnams kyi nang na ri rtse 'dra// sngon gyi drang srong ji bzhin yun ring gnas// lha mo gzhon nu ji bzhin 'dod chags spangs// 'jig rten bdag po che bzhin bden tshig sgra// 'jig rten yum gyi khyad par
122b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyan rnams dang / / 'dod khams lha yi khang pa kun bltas nas// lha mo 'ba' zhig gtso mor grags pas na// sems can mchog tu gyur pa yongs mi snang // gal te g.yul 'gyed 'jigs pa gnas ngag dang / me dong
122b2(rgyud 'bum): lhung pa dag ni mthong gyur tam/ chu bo nyam nga chom rkun 'jigs pa'i tshe// 'jigs pa de dag thams cad sel bar nus// gal te rgyal po'i khrims kyis bcings sgrogs sam/ gal te sha chags gsod bar byed pa'i
122b3(rgyud 'bum): tsheHsems ni rtse gcig mi g.yo gnas gyur na/ / nges par mya ngan sdug bsngal kun las thar// dge sdig mi kun yongs su skyob pa na// byams dang snying rje'i brtse ba rtag sngon snang // de phyir bdag ni bsam pa rtsa
122b4(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu/ / lha mo che la phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi// de nas bram ze des sngags dang bsngags pa brjod pa'i tshig gis lha mo de la mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig rten gtso la gus phyag 'tshal// ma rnams nang
122b5(rgyud 'bum): na kun gyi mchog gyur pas/ / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la mchod// byad bzhin rab mdzes kun gyis lta bar mos/ yon tan dam pa sna tshogs lus rab brgyan// mig yangs pad+ma sngon po'i 'dab
122b6(rgyud 'bum): ma 'dra/ / bsod nams ye shes snang ba'i grags par rgyas// dper na rin thang med pa'i nor bu mtshungs// dang bdag dam pa khyod la bsngags pas na// sems la bsams pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//
122b7(rgyud 'bum): yang dag yon tan bkra shis gya nom pa// pad+ma lta bu shin tu rnam par dag/ lus mdog rab mdzes kun gyis lta bar mos// mtshan mar ngo mtshar bsam gyis mi khyab pa// dri med ye shes 'od zer rab 'gyed pas/
123a1(rgyud 'bum): dran pa kun gyi nang na mchog tu gyur// ji ltar seng ge gcan gzan mchog gyur ltar// rtag par lag pa brgyad kyis bdag nyid brgyan// so sor mnga' gzhu ral gri sta re dang // tho ring/
123a2(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyi 'khor lo zhags pa thogs// rab mdzes lha mo zla ba nye ba 'dra// tshig la thogs med dbyangs snyan 'byin par byed// sems can gang zhig sems la smon yod na// skyes bu dam pas bsams
123a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin rdzogs par byed/ / brgya byin lha mang kun gyis khyod mchod nas// thams cad bsngags brjod skyabs su 'gro bar byed// bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan skyed byed pas// dus rnams kun tu gus pas skyed par
123a4(rgyud 'bum): byed/ swA hA/ gal te spobs chen lha mo gsol 'dod na// sngags bstod tshig ni 'di las 'byung ba bzhin// nang par rnam dag sems kyis rtse gcig 'don// bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad bsams
123a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin 'grub/ / de nas bcom 'das kyis/ bram ze la khyod kyis sems can rnams la phan gdags shing bde ba sbyin pa'i ched du/ lha mo de la bsngags pa brjod nas byin gyis rlob par gsol ba
123a6(rgyud 'bum): btab pas/ bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur ba legs so leg so zhes bka' stsal to// // gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i ming
123a7(rgyud 'bum): bam po brgyad pa/ / / de nas bram ze ko'u di n+yas gong du bstan pa lta bu'i mngon par bstod pa'i tshig dang / sngags kyi tshig gis lha mo spobs pa chen mo la mngon par bstod nas/
123b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed cag lha mo spobs pa chen mo la gsol ba btab nas/ stong brtse ba'i byin gyis brlabs nas/ tshe 'di nyid la thogs pa med pa'i sems myur ba
123b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / ye shes chen po dang / tshig la shin tu mkhas pa dang / shes pa rgya chen po 'thob pa dang / 'bel ba'i gtam gyi phan tshun lan 'debs pa dang / tshig 'bru'i rgyan yid bzhin du grub nas thogs pa med par
123b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na/ sems rtse gcig tu gus pas 'di ltar gsol ba gdab par bya'o// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang /
123b4(rgyud 'bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang / 'phags pa thams cad dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas yang dag pa'i bden pa'i tshig mngon par grub pa/ dbang po ji lta ba
123b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du yang dag pa'i bden tshig gsung ba/ mi slu ba'i tshig gsung ba/ bskal pa chen po bye ba tshad med pa snyed du rtag par yang dag pa'i bden tshig gsung zhing / yang dag pa'i bden tshig dang ldan pa
123b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la rjes su yi rang nas phyag 'tshal lo/ / mi bden pa'i tshig ma gsungs pa'i phyir/ yangs shing ring ba'i ljags phyung nas nyid kyi zhal dang / 'dzam bu'i gling dang / gling bzhi dang / stong dang
123b7(rgyud 'bum): stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kun tu khyab par g.yogs nas/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad rab tu
124a1(rgyud 'bum): sel bar mdzad pa la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas/ / sangs rgyas ljags kyi mtshan de lta bu dang ldan pa thams cad la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas/ bdag mang 'di zhes bya ba shin tu gya nom pa'i
124a2(rgyud 'bum): spobs pa dang ldan par smon nas/ sems rtse gcig tu srog phyogs so// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spobs pa dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rang rgyal 'phags pa'i spobs pa dam pa dang / zhugs
124a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi'i 'bras bzhi'i spobs pa dam pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshig gi spobs pa mchog dang / drang srong lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang / tshangs 'khor drang srong spob pa dam pa dang / lha chen dbu ma'i spobs pa dam
124a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / skal ldan lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rgyal po min sa'i spobs pa mchog dang / yid bzhin lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rab gnas lha'i bu'i spobs pa dam pa
124a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / rdo rje'i gsang ba'i bdag po'i spobs pa mchog dang / khyab 'jug lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang / lha mo b+hi ma'i spobs pa dam pa dang / biSh+Ti lba'i spobs pa dam pa dang / lha mo bzang mo'i spobs pa dam pa dang
124a6(rgyud 'bum): shi re ma ti'i spobs pa dam pa dang / he r-i tshig gi spobs pa dam pa dang / ma dang ma chen spobs pa dam pa dang / ha ri te'i spobs pa dam pa dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyi spobs pa dam pa dang / phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i
124a7(rgyud 'bum): spobs pa la gus phyag 'tshal/ / las mchog ci mnga' thams cad bdag stangs nas// spobs mchog dam pa mtha' med thob par shog/ bslu ba med la gus phyag 'tshal// rnam par grol la gus phyag 'tshal//
124b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags spangs la gus phyag 'tshal// 'ching sgrib spangs la gus phyag 'tshal// rnam dag sems la gus phyag 'tshal// 'od dang ldan la gus phyag 'tshal// bden tshig smra la gus phyag 'tshal// rdul chags
124b2(rgyud 'bum): med la gus phyag 'tshal/ / don mchog gnas la gus phyag 'tshal// 'khor mang dag la gus phyag 'tshal// spobs pa'i lha la gus phyag 'tshal// bdag ni tshog la thogs med shog/ bdag gis smon cing gnyer
124b3(rgyud 'bum): paba'i dngos/ / thams cad myur du grub par shog/ nad med rtag tu rab bde zhing // tshe ring lo nur 'thob par shog/ rig sngags kun la rab mkhas shing // nan tan byang chub lam bsgoms nas// skye dgu rgya cher
124b4(rgyud 'bum): phan btags te/ / bsam pa myur du 'grub par smon// bdag gis bden tshig smras pa dang // bdag gis bslu ba med smras pa// lha mo'i spobs pa gang yin pa// bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// lha mo khyod ni
124b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dir gshegs te/ / tshig thogs ma mchis bgyi slad du// bdag lus khar ni myur zhugs nas// yid myur spobs dang ldan par mdzod// bdag gi lce yi dbang po yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs thob pas//
124b6(rgyud 'bum): tshig de'i mthu stobs dbang gis ni// sems can rnams ni 'dul bar shog/ bdag ni tshig dag smras pa'o tshe// don ni ci bzhin grub gyur cing // thos pa dag ni gus bskyed nas// byas pa chung gson ma gyur cig/
124b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis spobs pa gnyer ba yi// dngos po gal te ma grub na// lha mo'i bden tshig gang yin pa// thams cad rdzun pa nyid du 'gyur// bdag gis mtshams med sdig byas pa// sangs rgyas gdung gis 'dul
125a1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / de bzhin dgra bcom gang yin dang // drin gzo'i tshig ni ji snyed dang / shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal bu// bcom ldan 'khor mang mchog gyur pa// 'di la sogs pa'i bden
125a2(rgyud 'bum): tshig rnams/ / thams cad bdag la 'grub par shog/ deng bdag sangs rgyas nyan thos 'khor// thams cad 'dir ni spyan 'dren na// thams cad myur du 'dir gshegs te// bdag gi smon pa rdzogs
125a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad smon/ / yang dag bden tshig gang gnyer ba// thams cad bdag la 'grub par shog/ gong du 'og min lha man chad// gnas gtsang rigs kyi lha dag dang // tshangs chen tshangs lha nye phan dang // tshangs pa'i
125a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'khor rnams dang / / stong gsum 'jig rten kun khyab dang // mi mjed 'jig rten bdag po dang // 'khor ni mang po thams cad kun// de nga bdag thams cad spyan 'dren na// byams dang thugs rje
125a5(rgyud 'bum): rab bskyed de/ / thams cad brtse bas gzung du gsol// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha rnams dang // 'phrul dga'i lha ni de dag dang // dga' ldan pa yi lha tshogs dang // byams pa mngon par rdzogs
125a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur dang / / 'thab 'bral ba yi lha rnams dang // sum cu rtsa gsum lha dag dang // rgyal chen bzhi yi lha tshogs dang // lha mang 'khor ni thams cad dang // sa nu me rlung lha rnams dang // ri rab brten nas
125a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa dang / / mtsho bdun ri yi lha tshegs rnams// 'khor ni mang po bcas pa dang // nor rgyas dang ni mgo lnga dang // nyi zla gza' skar lha dag dang // 'di la sogs pa'i lha mang po// 'jig rten bde bar byed pas
125b1(rgyud 'bum): na/ 'di la sogs pa'i lha mang po// sdig pa'i las ni byed mi mos// sangs rgyas gus pa 'phrog ma dang // de yi bu sdug tha chung dang // lga dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za dang ni lha ma yin// mi 'am ci yi
125b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rnams dang / / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa// bdag ni bcom ldan mthu stob kyis// de dag thams cad spyan 'dren na// byams dang snying rje'i sems bskyed nas// bdag la thogs med spobs pa stsol//
125b3(rgyud 'bum): lha dang mi yi 'khor rnams las// gzhan gyi sems ni rig gyur pa// thams cad byin gyis brlabs pas ni// bdag la spobs pa dam pa stsol// nam mkha'i khams ni mthar thug dang // chos kyi dbyings kyis
125b4(rgyud 'bum): klas pa na/ / sems can rnam pa ji snyed pas// bdag la spobs pa dam pa stsol// de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos de skad gsol ba btab pa thos pa dang // bram ze de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye skyes bu chen
125b5(rgyud 'bum): po legs so/ / skyes pa 'am bud med la la zhig sngags de dang / sngags kyi mngon par bstod pa de dag la brten nas/ sngar gong du bstan pa bzhin du chos yang dag par blangs te/ dkon mchog gsum
125b6(rgyud 'bum): la gus par skyabs su 'gro zhing / sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar 'jog par byed na/ ci dang ci bsgrubs pa thams cad chud za bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom
125b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mdo sde 'di yang dag par bzung ste/ klog cing 'don par byed na/ smon pa thams cad 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur zhing myur du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ sem rtse gcig tu ma byas pa de ma gtogs so//
126a1(rgyud 'bum): de'i tshe bram ze de shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis rab tu dga' bar gyur pas thal mo sbyar/ spyi bos yang dag par blangs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha mo spobs pa chen mo
126a2(rgyud 'bum): la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo khyod kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di rgya cher spel nas/ mdo sde yang dag par 'dzin pa dag la yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su bsrung bar byas pa dang / sems
126a3(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad la phan gdags shing bde ba thob par bya ba'i ched du chos de lta bu bstan na/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spobs pa byin te/ bsod nams tshad med pa thob par gyur pa dang / sems bskyed pa rnams
126a4(rgyud 'bum): myur du byang chub las gzhol bar byas pa legs so legs so/ / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ lha mo spobs pa chen mo'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//
126a5(rgyud 'bum): / de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas gus pas bral mo sbar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kal te
126a6(rgyud 'bum): dge slong ngam dge slong ma ba ma/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don
126a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par bgyid pa zhig mthong bar gyur na/ bdag gis sems rtse gcig tu gus pas bkur sti dang mchod par bgyid do// chos smra ba de dag la 'di lta ste/ bzang
126b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / gsos sman dang / yo byad ci 'tshal ba tham cad phun sum tshogs par sbyar te/ brel zhing 'phongs pa ma mchis par bgyid do// gdugs mtshan du mdo sde'i
126b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'di'i tshig gi don ji snyed pa dag la so sor brtags te/ yid la bsams shing yongs su btsal nas bde bor gnas pa dang / mdo sde 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du brgya stong tshang ma mchis pa snyed
126b3(rgyud 'bum): pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag tu thos par 'gyur zhing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid na/ skal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed du lha dang mi'i longs spyod rnam pa sna
126b4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs myong bar 'gyur lags so/ / rtag par lo legs shing mu ge'i rgud pa gtan du sel bar gyur pas/ skye bo rnams gtan du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mjal bar gyur
126b5(rgyud 'bum): slad ma'i dus kyi tshe myur du byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur bas/ ngan 'gro gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi bgegs gtan du gcod par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon dran
126b6(rgyud 'bum): lags te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bai DUR+Ya dang gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i me tog snang ba dpal gyi yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bgyi ba mtshan rnam
126b7(rgyud 'bum): pa bcu dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ bdag de las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun te/ de bzhin gshegs pa des byams pa dang thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyi mthus brtse bar dgod par gyur pa'i slad du deng bdag gang du bsam pa
127a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas de dang / gang du bltas pa'i phyogs de dang / gang du mchis pa'i yul de dang de dag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshang ma mchis pa snyed shin tu bde ba'i longs spyod myong zhing /
127a2(rgyud 'bum): gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'tshe ba'i yo byad dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / byu ru dang / 'gron bu dang / mu tig la sogs pa rin po che ci'i tshal ba thams
127a3(rgyud 'bum): cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur lags so/ / gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu gser 'ong dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'don pa 'dis gdugs re bzhin du spos sna tshogs bsregs nas
127a4(rgyud 'bum): me tog dam pa rnams kyis bdag gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bai DUR+Ya dang gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i me tog snang ba dpal gyi yon tan rgya mtsho de la mchod par bgyi'o/ /
127a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang gdug gcig bzhin du dus gsum du bdag gi mong nas brjod cing rjes su dran par bgyis nas/ logs shig tu spos dang / me tog dang / zas mchog rnams kyis bdag mchod cing / rtag par mdo sde'i
127a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyid na/ bsod nams 'di lta bu dag 'thob par 'gyur lags so// de nas rigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'di ltar mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin pa'i slad// bdag dang 'khor rnams gnod pa kun
127a7(rgyud 'bum): dang bral/ / gos zas ci 'tshal 'phongs pa ma mchis 'gyur// gzi bon ldan zhing tshe yang dpag par dka'// sa yi ro yang rtag tu 'phel bar 'gyur// lha rnams dus bzhin char ni rab tu 'bebs// lha 'tsha
127b1(rgyud 'bum): de dag rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ / skyed mos tshal dang 'bru yi lha rnams kyis// nags tshal ljon shing 'bras bu rab 'phel zhing // 'bru rnams thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid// rin chen nor tshol bsam pa
127b2(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs 'gyur zhing / / ci dang tsa smon bsam bzhin 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dpal gyi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di ltar mngon gyi rgyud rjes su dran nas/ drin rjes su bsab pa'i
127b3(rgyud 'bum): phyir mchod pa byas pa dang / mtha' yas sems can rnams la phan gdags shing / bde bar bya ba'i ched du mdo sde 'di yongs su spel nas yon tan zad mi shes par byas pa legs so legs so// gser 'od
127b4(rgyud 'bum): dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ / dpal gyi lha mo chen mo'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ dpal gyi lha mo chen mos yang 'di skad ces
127b5(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang phyogs na sgra'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i grong khyer nor ldan zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ grong khyer de las mi ring ba na me tog dam pa'i bsod nams kyi 'od ces bgyi ba'i kun dga'
127b6(rgyud 'bum): rab mchis pa de na/ / gzhal med khang mchog dam pa rin po che sna bdun las mngon par grub pa zhig mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rtag par de na gnas lags pas/ gang la la zhig 'bru rnam pa lnga gdug
127b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig bzhin du 'phel ba dang / bang mdzod rnams rgyas shing gang bar 'tshal bas/ gus pas dang ba'i sems bskyed de/ khang pa gcig gtsang mar bgyis nas/ ba lang gi lci bas dog sa la zhal zhal bgyis te/
128a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi gzugs rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa ri mor bris nas/ khrus legs par bkrus te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas byug pa dam pas byugs te/ khang pa gtsang ma'i nang
128a2(rgyud 'bum): du zhugs nas/ bdag gi ched du gdugs re dus gsum du sangs rgyas de'i mtshan dang mdo sde 'di'i mtshan brjod par sems bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUR+Ya dang gser gyi ri bo rnon po me tog snang ba dpal
128a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi ri yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod nas me tog dang spos rnams thogs te/ zhal zas bda' ba sna tshogs sems rtse gcig tu dbul bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang spos dang / me tog dang / bza' ba
128a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / btung ba rnams kyis bdag gi gzugs brnyan la mchod par bgyi'o// gzhan yang bza' ba dang btung ba dag thogs te/ phyogs gzhan du gtor nas 'dre srin rnams la stsal bar bgyi'o// yang dag
128a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bden pa'i bden tshig gis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la gsol ba btab nas/ ci dang co gnyer ba'i smon lam gdab par bgyi'o// gal te ji skad smras pa bzhin du brdzun ma lags na/ gsol ba
128a6(rgyud 'bum): btab pa don dang ldan par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bgyi'o/ / de'i tshe dpal gyi lha mos dngos po de rig nas/ brtse ba'i bsam pa skye bar 'gyur bas/ de'i khyim du nor dang 'bru rnams rab tu 'phel
128a7(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyid do/ / de nas sngags bzlas nas bdag g.yar drang bar bgyis te/ sngar sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang byang chub sems dpa'i ming nas brjod do// sems rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag bgyi'o//
128b1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug pud can la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer rin po che'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo//
128b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas gser tog 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser brgya'i 'od kyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser gdugs rin po che brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser gyi
128b3(rgyud 'bum): me tog 'od zer rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas sgron ma chen po'i 'ong la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin po che chen po'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la
128b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo/ / lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas lha'i rnga sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// byang
128b5(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' gser mdze da la phyag 'tshal lo// byang rlab sems dpa' rtag
128b6(rgyud 'bum): bshums la phyag 'tshal le/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bde bar gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
128b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rnams la gus pas phyag bgyis nas/ de'i rjes la sngags bzlas te dpal gyi lha mo chen mo bdag g.yar 'dren par bgyid nas/ sngags 'di'i mthus yongs su gnyer ba'i dngos po rnams
129a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur/ dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ pra ti purA tsa re/ sa man+ta/ daR+sha ni/ ma hA bi hA rag
129a2(rgyud 'bum): ti sa man+te/ pi ti ma ma ni/ ma hA kA ra yaM/ pra ti/ bashrI ba ni/ sarba an+da sa man+ta nu/ pra pU re/ a ya na d+harma ta/ ma hA b+ho ge na/ ma hA me tri/ u pa sing ha te/ ma hA kle sha/ su sang gr-i hi te/ sa mAr+tha/
129a3(rgyud 'bum): a nu pA la ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su bzung nas/ bdag yar 'dren par bgyid na/ bdag g.yar 'dren pa thos nas/ de'i thad du mchis te
129a4(rgyud 'bum): smon pa rnams 'grub par bgyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i tshig/ ting nge 'dzin mngon par sgrub pa'i chog/ yang dag pa'i tshig/ bslu ba ma mchis pa'i tshig/ yang dag pa'i spyod
129a5(rgyud 'bum): pa sems can rnams kyi yang dag pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba lags pas/ gang la la zhig sngags 'di yang dag par 'dzin cing klog pa dang / 'don pa des gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du yan lag brgyad dang
129a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs nas/ snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sngar so shing bcas te dag par bkrus nas/ slar snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ spos dang me tog dag gos sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa bgyis te
129a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid kyi dngos sdig bshags nas bdag dang sems can rnams smon pa myur du 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du/ yongs su bsngo zhing smon lam gdab par bya'o// khang pa gcig gtsang mar bgyis pa 'am/ yang na
129b1(rgyud 'bum): dben pa'i gnas sam/ dgon pa'i gnas kyang rung ste/ ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas/ tsan ngan bsregs te mchod par bgyi'o// stan mchog gcig bting ste/ ba dan dang gdugs brgyan par bgyi'o/
129b2(rgyud 'bum): me tog dam pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi nang bkram ste/ sems rtse gcig tu sngags snga ma bzlas nas/ bdag der mchi bar re bar bgyi'o// bdag de'i tshe de la rjes su sems shing lta bar dgyes pas/ de'i khang
129b3(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs te stan la mchis nas/ de'i mchod pa len par bgyis te/ de slan chad mo des g.yar lam bdag mthong bar gyur pas/ ci dang ci smon pa'i dngos po rnams yang dag pa'i tshig gi sgo nas go bar bgyid do/
129b4(rgyud 'bum): grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ 'brog dgon pa 'am/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang yang rung ste/ ci dang ci smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas/ gser dang / dngul dang / nor dang / rin po che dang
129b5(rgyud 'bum): ba glang dang / lug dang / 'bru rnams dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang gos rnams yid bzhin du 'thob par 'gyur zhing / bde ba'i longs spyod mchog la yongs su longs spyod par 'gyur lags so// de ltar
129b6(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mchog dam pa thob nas kyang / skal ba mchog gang lags pa des dkon mchog gsum la mchod cing bdag la'ang skul bar bgyi'o// chos kyi 'dus pa rgya cher bshams nas/ bza' ba
129b7(rgyud 'bum): dang btung ba rnams sbyar te/ spos dang me tog gcal du bkram nas mchod par bgyi'o// mchod par bgyis pa'i zas lhag ma ci mchis pa btsongs te/ rin blangs nas yang mchod par bgyis na/ bdag nam 'tsho'i
130a1(rgyud 'bum): bar du rtag tu der gnas nas/ gang zag de la bsrung zhing skyob pa dang / 'phongs shing brel ba ma mchis pa dang / smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid do// dus dus su dbul
130a2(rgyud 'bum): 'phongs pa rnams la'ang stsal bar bgyi zhing / bdag gcig pu'i ched du ser snas 'phangs par mi bgyi'o// rtag par mdo sde 'di lpags nas rgyun chad par ma mchis par mchod par bgyi ste/ bsod nams ci mchis pa
130a3(rgyud 'bum): de'ang thams cad la'ang btang zhing byang chub tu yongs su bsngos nas/ 'khor ba la nges par 'byung zhing myur du rnam par grol ba 'thob par 'gyur bar smon par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dpal
130a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi lha mo khyod kyis de ltar mdo sde 'di rgya cher spel nas/ bdag dang gzhan gnyis ka la phan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa byas pa legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog
130a5(rgyud 'bum): tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ dpal gyi lha mo chen mos nor 'phel bar byed pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// de nas sa'i lha mo brtan ma 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las
130a6(rgyud 'bum): yangs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di de ltar ram/ slad ma'i dus kyi
130a7(rgyud 'bum): tshe gal te grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ ri 'am/ phug gam/ nags tshal dag na'ang rung ste/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di spel bar bgyid na/
130b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag der mchis nas mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / yongs su bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab par bgyis te rgya cher spel bar bgyid do// sa phyogs gang yang rung ba dag tu chos smra ba'i
130b2(rgyud 'bum): mkhan po'i ring du khri mthon po btsugs te/ mdo sde 'di 'chad par byed na/ bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus lus mi gda' bar bgyis nas/ der mchos de de'i rkang pa nas spyi bos 'degs par bgyid de/ bdag
130b3(rgyud 'bum): chos thos par gyur nas kyang shin tu dang ba'i bsam pas rab tu dga' bar bgyid do/ / chos kyi ro thob pa'i dbang gis gzi byin 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ mgu ba tshad ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur te/
130b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag de lta bu'i phan yon thob pa nyid kyis/ sa chen po 'di'ang dpag tshad brgya phrag brgya brgyad cu rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la thug pa tshun chad sa'i bcud thams cad rab tu 'phel bar bgyid do// rgya mtsho
130b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi tshun chad kyis chen po ji snyed pa de dag sa'i bcud rgyas shing rab tu gshin pas sngon pas kyang lhag pa dang ches khyad par du 'phags par bgyid do/ / 'dzam bu'i gling 'di ni chu bo dang / rdzing dang
130b6(rgyud 'bum): rdzing bu dang / ljon shing dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs ci mchis pa de dag kyang dbyibs
130b7(rgyud 'bum): mdzes shing yid du mchi ba dang / mang po kun gyis lta bar mos pa dang / kha dog dang dri phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod du rung bar bgyid de/ sems can gang gis bza' ba dang btung ba mchog de lta bu de dag la 'ongs
131a1(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa rnams kyang tshe ring zhing kha dog dang stobs dang ldan pa dang / dbang po rnams bde zhing gzi byon 'phel ba dang / bro nad rnams ma mchis pa dang / sems kyi shes rab dpa' zhing ci'ang rtsol rje
131a2(rgyud 'bum): thogs par 'gyur lags so/ / gzhan yang sa chen po 'di las ji tsam du yongs su spyad par bgyi ba'i dngos po brgya stong ji snyed pa thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen des na 'jam
131a3(rgyud 'bum): bu'i gling rnams rab tu bde zhing lo legs pa dang / mi rnams dar zhing rgyas pa dang // gnod pa rnams ma mchis pas sems can ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad bde ba myong bar 'gyur lags so// de ltar lus
131a4(rgyud 'bum): dang sems kyis bde ba myong bar gyur nas kyang / mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la shin tu gus pa bskyed nas gang du gnas kyang rung ste/ thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang
131a5(rgyud 'bum): bla mar bgyi zhing sngags brjod par smon par bgyi'o/ / gzhan yang chos 'chad pa'i mkhan po chen po de dag gang du chos 'chad pa'i gnas der yang mchis te/ sems can rnams kyi cheng du mdo sde'i rgyal po ngam
131a6(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di 'chad par gsol ba gdab par bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di bshad pa'i dbang gis bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la sman par 'gyur zhing / 'od dang
131a7(rgyud 'bum): kha dog dang / mthu stobs dang / dpa' zhing gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / byad bzhin shin tu sdug cing sngon pa ches khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur bas so// bcom ldan 'das bdag sa'i lha mo brtan ma'ang
131b1(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi ros tshim par gyur pa'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad bdun stong tshun chad sa thams cad bcud dang ldan pa dang / sngags bzhin du sems can ji snyed thams cad kyang bde ba myong bar bgyid
131b2(rgyud 'bum): lags so/ / de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sems can de dag gis kyang bdag gi drin bsab pa'i slad du/ bdag cag gdon mi za bar mdo sde 'di mnyan nas bkur sti dang / rim gro dang / mchod pa dang
131b3(rgyud 'bum): bla mar bgyis nas/ bsngags pa brjod par bgyi'o snyam du bsam par bgyi'o// de ltar bsams nas kyang gnas nas byung ste/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / khang khyim dang / dgon pa
131b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas gang du chos bshad pa'i 'dus pa der mchis te/ chos bshad pa'i mkhan po la spyo bos btud de phyag bgyis nas mdo sde 'di mnyan par gyi'o// mdo sde 'di mnyan nas kyang so so nas rang gi gnas
131b5(rgyud 'bum): su mchis te/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du bdag cag deng shin tu zab cing bla na ma mchis pa'i chos gya nom pa thos nas/ 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed
131b6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bsdus par gyur to/ / mdo sde'i mthu stobs kyi dbang gis bdag cag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis shing mtha' ma mchis pa snyed la mchod cing rim gro bgyis pas ngan
131b7(rgyud 'bum): song gsum gyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang bral bar gyur to/ / ma 'ongs pa'i tshe rabs brgya stong gi bar du'ang rtag par mtho ris dang mo'i nang du skyes nas bde ba mchog myong bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod par
132a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de'i tshe mi mang po de dag so so nas slar rang gi gnas su mchis nas skye bo mang po rnams la mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las gsungs pa'i dpe gcig tsam mam/ le'u gcig
132a2(rgyud 'bum): tsam mam/ sngon gyi gtam rgyud gcog tsam mam/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi mtshan tsam mam/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi ming tsam mam/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad pa gcig tsam mam
132a3(rgyud 'bum): yang na tshig tsam zhig sems can rnams la yang dag par ston par bgyid dam/ tha na mdo sde 'di'i mtshan tsam zhig rjod par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag gang na gnas pa'i sa phyogs de dag
132a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bcud dang ldan zhing gzhan pas lhag par 'gyur ba dang / sa chen po las skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang rgya cher rab tu 'phel zhing rab tu rgyas par 'gyur bas/ sems can rnams shin tu bde
132a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'gyur ro/ / rin po che dang nor mang bar 'gyur/ sbyin pa legs par gtong bar 'gyur/ rtag par sems brten zhing dkon mchog gsum la shin tu mngon par yid ches par 'gyur lagaso//
132a6(rgyud 'bum): de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha mo brtan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig gcig
132a7(rgyud 'bum): tsam zhig thos par gyur na/ yang tshe 'phos pa'i 'og tu sum cu rtsa gsum dang / lha'i gnas gzhan dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang la la zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mchod par 'dod pa'i phyir/ khang khyim dag rab tu brgyan nas
132b1(rgyud 'bum): bla re gcig bre bar byed dam/ ba dan rim gcig tsam sbyor bar byed na/ rgyu de dang rkyen des lha'i ris drug po dag tu ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du skye bar 'gyur bas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang mchog dam pa dag la yod
