132b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyur/ so so nas lha'i bu mo bdun stong dang phan tshun lhan cig rtse zhing nyin mtshan rtag par khyad par du 'phags pa'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces
132b3(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa dang / / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen des na 'khor bzhi po las gang la la zhig chos kyi ston la mchis nas/ chos 'di
132b4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par ston pa na/ bdag gdugs mtshan du gang zag de la yongs su srung zhing skyab par bgyid/ rang gi lus mo gda' bar bgyis nas/ chos kyi stan drung du mchis te/ de'i rkang pa nas 'degs par bgyid lags so//
132b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di no// sems can de dag gis sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pas na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher 'phel zhing nub par mi 'gyur ba lags so// sems can
132b6(rgyud 'bum): gang gis mdo sde 'di mnyan par bgyid pa de dag slad ma'i dus kyi tshe/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi bar du lha dang mi'i nang du rtag par bde ba mchog la longs spyod par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mang po
132b7(rgyud 'bum): dang mjal nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/
133a1(rgyud 'bum): sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la sngags kyi snying po lha dang mi rnams la phan 'dogs shing thams cad la bde bar bgyid pa mchis te/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang
133a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bzhi po dag las gang la la zhig bdag gi lus yang dag par mngon sum du mthong bar 'tshal ba des/ sems rtse gcig tu gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ ji ltar smon pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid do//
133a3(rgyud 'bum): nor dang / rin po che'i gter dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshe ring ba'i sman dam pa gnyer ba dang / sems can gyi nad mang po gso ba dang / phyir rgol ba'i dgra pham par bgyi ba dang / tha dad par smra ba rnams tshar gcod par
133a4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal na khang pa gtsang mar bgyis te dkyil 'khor bgyi'o/ / lus bkrus te gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos nas/ rtswa bting ba'i steng du mchis te/ ring bsrel dang sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ram/ yang na ring
133a5(rgyud 'bum): bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bdug pa bsregs te/ me tog gtor nas bza' ba dang btung bdag gis mchod par bgyis te/ zla ba yar gyi jo tshes brgyad la skar ma rgyal rdzogs pa na/ g.yar 'dren
133a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sngags 'di bzla bar bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ tsi ro tsau ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ ku Tu ku Tu/ to Tu to Tu/ bA ha bA ha/ sha ba ri sha ba ri swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di 'khor bzhi po las gang
133a7(rgyud 'bum): la la zhig gis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ bdag g.yar 'dren par bgyis na/ bdag gis de'i cheng du g.yar 'dren pa der mchi bar 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sem can gang la la zhig
133b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag dngos po mngon sum du mngon par mthong zhing lhan cig gtam bgyi bar 'tshal na'ang snga ma bzhin du cho ga bshams nas/ gzungs 'di bzlas par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ aM tsa ne/ kri lig k+Shin ti/ shi ra shi d+ha ri/
133b2(rgyud 'bum): ha ha hi hi/ ku ru b+ha re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig sngags 'di 'don pa na/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas sngags snga ma'ang 'don par bgyid na/ bdag gdon mi 'tshal bar lus mngon du bstan
133b3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ des ji ltar smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas/ nams kyang chub 'tshal bar mi bgyid do// gal te sngags 'di 'don par 'tshal na/ sngar lus srung ba'i sngags 'di gdon par
133b4(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ ni shi ri/ ma sha ka ni/ na ti ku ti/ bud d+hi bud d+hi ri/ bau to bo ti/ ku ku ti/ bi tsi ri swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das sngags 'di 'don pa'i rmi tshon sna lnga'i skud pa blangs nas
133b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyis nas/ dpung pa g.yon pa la bcings nas/ slan chad lus bsrung bar bgyis pas/ 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu sngags
133b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di zlos par byed na/ bsams pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur te/ bdag sho bi mo mchi ste/ bdag gi dbang du sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'du dkon mchog bzhugs pa nyid du rab tu
133b7(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen par 'gyur lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sa'i lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod yang dag pa'i bden tshig gi sngags kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di dang / chos smra ba dag la yongs su
134a1(rgyud 'bum): bsrung bar byas pa legs so legs so/ / rgyu dang rkyen 'dis khyod bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa tshad med pa snyed thob par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal
134a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa
134a3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad dang lhan cig tu 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
134a4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di de ltar ram/ srad ma'i dus kyi tshe grong ngam/ grong khyer rom
134a5(rgyud 'bum): grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ri 'am/ dgon pa'am/ nags tshal lam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ dge 'dun gnas pa'i gnas dag tu'ang rung ste/ yang dag par bstan nas rgya cher spel bar bgyid na/
134a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu der mchis nas/ so so nas rang gi lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ ci rigs par
134a7(rgyud 'bum): chos smra ba'i mkhan po de dang / chos nyan pa'i 'khor de dag la yongs su bsrungs nas/ gnod pa rnams spangs te rtag par bde ba myong bar bgyid do// skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang la la
134b1(rgyud 'bum): zhig mdo sde 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid dam/ tshig gcig tsam yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid dam/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan tsam smos par
134b2(rgyud 'bum): bgyid dam mdo sde 'di las gsungs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi mtshan tsam ma ma/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi ming tsam brjod par sems bskyed nas/ gus par rim gro dang mchod par bgyid na/
134b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis yongs su srung zhing byin gyis brlabs nas/ gnod pa ma mchis par bgyis te/ sdug bsngal spangs nas bde ba thob par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag gi ming yang dag shes
134b4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bgyi ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gang lags pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon sum du mkhyen pa lags te/ bdag gis chos rig pa dang / bdag gis chos thams cad kyi ji snyed pa dang / chos thams cad
134b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi ji lta ba dang / chos thams cad rnam pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang / bye brag ji snyed pa thams cad gsal bar rtogs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos rnams bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba
134b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi sgron ma dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi spong pa dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa dang /
134b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi spyod yul rnams mngon par rtogs par gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'di ltar chos thams cad yang dag par rig/ yang dag par gsal bar rtogs
135a1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par khong du chud/ yang dag par so sor rtogs par bgyid pas/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen de'i slad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes bgyi ba
135a2(rgyud 'bum): lags te/ don de'i slad du bdag gis chos smra ba'i mkhan po de'i tshig gi spobs pa gsal zhing rgyan dang ldan pa dang / gzi byin dang mdangs spu'i bu ga kun nas 'jug pa dang / lus kyi mthu stobs dang ldan pa dang /
135a3(rgyud 'bum): gzi byin dang ldan zhing dpa' ba dang / dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / yang dag par dran pa thob nas spa bkong ma mchis pa dang / de'i lus la phan 'dogs shing
135a4(rgyud 'bum): nyams pa ma mchis pa dang / dbang po rnams bde zhing rtag par dga' ba bskyed par bgyi'o// rgyu dang rkyen de'i slad du sems can gang dag sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas
135a5(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams kyi las mngon par sgrub pa dag gi ched du 'dzam bu'i gling dag tu rgya cher spel nas/ myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid pas// sems can de dag gis mdo sde 'di thos nas bsam
135a6(rgyud 'bum): gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba chen po dang / bsod nams kyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur zhing / slad ma'i dus kyi tshe yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tshad ma mchis pa'i bar du bsam
135a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis mi khyab pa'i lha dang mi'i bde ba myong ba dang / rtag par sangs rgyas mang po dang mjal nas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas/ gshin rje'i
135b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dang ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa dag kyang myong bar mi 'gyur lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes kyis 'di
135b2(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag la gzungs mchis te/ sems can rnams la sman par bgyi zhing brtse ba'i slad du/ deng bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag nyid kyis bshad par
135b3(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / de nas sngags smras pa/ na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harma ya/ na moHsaM g+hA ya/ na mo brah+ma la/ na mash+tsa turmA hA rA dzA naM/ tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ go ri ma hA gau r-i/ gan+d+ha ri/ ma hA gan+d+ha ri/ dri mi Ti/ ma hA/
135b4(rgyud 'bum): dri mi ri/ daN+Da lu gun+d+he ha ha ha ha ha/ hi hi hi hi hi/ ho ho ho ho ho/ ha lo d+ha maM/ gu d+ha me/ tsa tsa tsa tsa/ tsi tsi tsi tsi/ tsu tsu tsu rU/ dat+te shwa ra/ shi kha ra shi kha ra/ ut+tiSh+ThA he b+ha ga ban/ saM bi dzA ya swAh+ma/ gang
135b5(rgyud 'bum): la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'dzin par bgyid na/ bdag gis 'tsho ba'i yo byad sman dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rin po che ngo mtshar che ba dag gis rim gro
135b6(rgyud 'bum): bgyid do/ / gal te skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / rgyan 'phreng gi rnam pa rnam yong su gnyer bar bgyid na'ang / bdag gis thams cad
135b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyar nas/ ji ltar smon pa bzhin du rgud cing 'phongs pa ma mchis par bgyid do// rig sngags 'di mthu chen po dang ldan pas sngags 'don pa'i tshe bdag myur du de'i thad du mchis nas thogs pa ma mchis
136a1(rgyud 'bum): par yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid do/ / sngags 'di 'don pa'i tshe cho ga rig par bgyis nas/ thog ma kho nar gnod sbyin yang dag shes kyi gzugs 'phang du chag bzhi lnga tsam mchis pa/ sug pa
136a2(rgyud 'bum): dgra sta thogs par ri mor bri bar bya'o/ / gzugs brnyan de'i mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/ bum pa bzhi sbrang rtsi'i chab bam/ bu ram gyi chab kyis bkang ste bzhag nas/ byug spos dang /
136a3(rgyud 'bum): phye ma dang / bdug spos dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba rnams kyang bkram par bgyi'o// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du thab gcig bgyis te/ de'i nang du sol ba'i zhugs stsal nas/ mar dang
136a4(rgyud 'bum): yungs kar bsregs te/ snga ma'i sngags de lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ sngags lan re zhing lan cig bsregs na/ bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rang nyid drung du mchis nas/ lus mngon du
136a5(rgyud 'bum): bstan te/ sngags 'don pa'i mo de la khyod ci dang ci dgos pa dang / yid la ci 'dod pa'i dngos po gang yin pa smros shig ces 'dri bar bgyid do// bdag gis ji skad mchi ba bzhin yongs su gnyer ba'i
136a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos po rnams thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid do/ / gal te gser dang / dngul dang / gter 'tshal bar gyur ta ma/ yang na lha'i drang srong du gyur pas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'tshal lam/
136a7(rgyud 'bum): lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang / gzhan gyi sems 'tshal ba dang / sems can thams cad la yid bzhin du rang dbang thob nas nyon mongs pa bcad de/ myur du rnam par grol ba thob pa la dgod
136b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'tshal na'ang / thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la bka' stsas pa/ khyod kyis 'di ltar sems can thams cad/

136b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams su mi'i rgyal po bgyid pa la gal te yang dag pa'i chos ma mchis par gyur na/ yul skyong zhing skye bo mang po rnams kyang gso ba'i rngo mi thogs la/ bdag nyid kyang yun ring du khyad par du 'phags
136b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal thabs la gnas par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa dang thugs rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bdag la rgyal chos yang dag pa'i bstan bcos yul skyong bar bgyid pa'i don gang lags
136b7(rgyud 'bum): pa bkas bshad du gsol/ de na mi'i rgyal po rnams chos 'di thos pa'i dbang gis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par sgrub cing yang dag par 'jig rten 'dul ba dang / khyad par 'phags pa'i rgyal thabs gtan du bde zhing
137a1(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba dang / yul na gnas pa'i skye bo thams cad la'ang sman par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma la bka' stsal pa/ khyod/
137a2(rgyud 'bum): legs par nyon cig/ sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe rgyal po stobs kyi gtso bo'i tog ces bya ba byung ngo // rgyal po de la bu mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas ring po ma lon par de nas rgyal po
137a3(rgyud 'bum): yab kyis/ mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos lnga'i bdag po rten dag ces bya ba yod de/ des sngon spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas/ yul gyi bdag po
137a4(rgyud 'bum): byas pa'i tshe/ nga'i yab shes pa'i tog gi gtso bo'i tog ces bya bas nga la rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos 'di bstan pas/ ngas stan bcos 'di la brten nas/ lo nyi khri'i bar du yul
137a5(rgyud 'bum): legs par bskyangs te/ ngas skad cig gcig tsam gyi bar du'ang chos ma yin pa spyad par bya'o snyam pa'i bsam pa byung ma myong ngo // deng khyod kyang de bzhin du chos ma yin pas yul skyong bar ma byed cig/ ci'i
137a6(rgyud 'bum): phyir rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos shes bya zhe na/ khyod deng legs par nyon cig dang / khyod la deng legs par bstan par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe rgyal po stobs kyi gtso bo'i tog gis
137a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bu de la tshig su bcad pa gya nom padag gri yang dag pa'i bstan bcos mngon par bstan pa/ ngas ni sems can bde bya dang // 'jig rten the tshom gcad pa dang // nyes dmigs mang po bsal ba
137b1(rgyud 'bum): byam rgya rnams panan bcas bshad par bya/ / sgra ma bdag pa thams cad dang // ma rgyal po gang yin pa// dga' ba 'i sems ni rab bskyed sa// thal ma sbyar nas ngas bshad ston//
137b2(rgyud 'bum): byung lha 'khor mang po rnams// rdo rje ril 'dus pa na// rgyal bzhi stan las langs nas ni// tshangs chen la ni 'di skad zhus// tshangs bdag mchog tu gtser gyur cing // lha yi nang na dbang phyug mi//
137b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag la ni brtser dgongs nas// the tsom rnams ni gcad du gsol// ji ltar mo yo 'jig rten skyes// rgyal po zhes ni bgyi bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rgyu rkyen gang gi slad// lha yo bu zhes

137b5(rgyud 'bum): zhus pa dang / / de tshe tshangs pa'i bdag po yis// de dag la ni 'di skad smras// 'jig rten skyong khyod shes par byos// sems can la ni phan bya'i phyir// nga la yul skyong chos dris pas// ngas bshad/

137b7(rgyud 'bum): de 'og ma yi mngal du 'jug/ ma yo mangs na gnas pa na// lha rnams kyis ni srung bar byed// mi yi 'jig rten skyes gyur kyang // gtso mchog gyur phyir lha zhes bya// lha rnams
138a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni bsrungs pas na/ / lha yi bu zhes brjod pa yin// sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po yis// stobs bgos mi'i rgyal gtong bar byed// lha ni mang po thams cad kyis//
138a2(rgyud 'bum): rang dbang stobs ni rab bstangs nas// chos min kun ni rab bsal te// sdig pa'i las ni skyed mi byed// sems can dge ba sgrub bskul nas// mtho ris gnas su skye bar byed// mi dang lha min 'khor dag
138a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / dri za dang ni srin po dang // gdol pa la sogs thams cad kyis// stobs kyi phyed ni gtong bar byed// pha mas stobs phyed bstangs nas ni// sdig spong dge ba sgrub la 'dzud// lha rnams lhan cig rab
138a4(rgyud 'bum): bsrungs nas/ / dge sdig rnam smin ston par byed// dge sdig las ni byas gyur na// da ltar tshe 'di nyid la ni// lha rnams lhan cig rab bsrungs nas// dge sdig rnam smin ston par byed// yul mis sdig pa'i

138b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad stong par 'gyur/ / g.yo sgyu sna tshogs skyes pa na// phan tshun gcig la gcig kyang 'dron yang dag chos kyi sa rgyal thob kyang // chos bzhin du ni mi spyod pas// yul mi thams cad 'thor 'gyur te/

138b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bru rnams me tog 'bras bu dang // lo tog thams cad mi smin cing // yul na mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur// rgyal po yang dag chos spangs nas// sdig chos mi ni sten byed na// gzhal med khang

142a1(rgyud 'bum): brtsegs/ / gnas khang gcig pu yang dag gnas nas ni// dran pa nyer gzhag mdo sde 'di 'don pas// drang 'dug mo g.yo lus dang sems kyang bde// de tshe dge slong zhig gis rgyal khrid nas/
142a2(rgyud 'bum): rin chen brtsegs pa de yi gnas su phyin// gnas khang nang du de yi lus ni drang bsrang ste// 'od dang mtshan mchog lus kun khyab pa mthong // rgyal po de la 'di ni rin chen brtsegs// mdo sde'i rgyal po'i
142a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog gyur 'di lta ste/ / gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom mchog/ sangs rgyas spyod yul zab mo 'dzin ces smras// rgyal pos rin chen brtsegs la phyag byas nas// gus pas thal mo sbyar nas 'di
142a4(rgyud 'bum): skad smra/ / zla ba nya ltar zhal mdog mdzes gyur pa// gser 'od dam pa'i chos 'di bshad du gsol// rin chen brtsegs kyis rgyal po'i tshig mnyan nas// gser 'od dam pa 'di ni bshad snang
142a5(rgyud 'bum): bas/ / stong gsum 'jig rten khams ni kun khyab pa'i// lha mi thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur// rgyal pos phyogs yangs shing gtsang ba'i gnas// rin chen gya nom mchog gis rab brgyan te/
142a6(rgyud 'bum): spos chu dam pa mchog gis chag chag btab// me tog sna tshogs mchog ni gcal du bkram// gnas mchog der ni sten mtho rab bting ste// ba dan bla re bres nas mdzes par byas// phye ma byug spos
142a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bdug pa dag gis kun tu khyab par byas/ / lha klu lha ma yin dang mi 'am ci// lto 'phye chen po dang ni gnod sbyin dang / lha rnams man nga ra yi char phab nas/ thams cad
142b1(rgyud 'bum): nyer 'ongs ston mchog de la mchod/ / gzhan yang lha ni 'bum phrag brgya stong rnams// dam chos nyan thos thams cad de na 'dus// chos sgra dang po stan las langs pa'i tshe// thams cad lha yi me tog
142b2(rgyud 'bum): ngag gis mchod/ de tshe chos sgra chen po rin chen brtsegs// shin tu lus bkrus gos gtsang rab bgos te// tshogs chen chos bstan de drung song nas ni// thal sbyar rtse gcig sems kyis
142b3(rgyud 'bum): gus phyag byas/ / lha dbang lha tshogs lha yi bu mo rnams// thams cad me tog man nga ra yang gtor// lha yi rol mo brgya stong bsam mi khyab// mkha' la gnas nas sgra dbyangs snyan pa phyung // de tshe chos
142b4(rgyud 'bum): sgra chen po rin chen brtsegs/ / stan la 'dug ste skyil mo krung bcas pa// phyogs bcu'i zhing na bzhugs pa'i byams chen gtso// bye ba brgya stong de dag yid la bsams// sdug bsngal sems can thams
142b5(rgyud 'bum): cad ji snyed pa/ / thams cad byams sems mnyam par nyer gzhag nas// gsol 'debs bdag po rgyal po legs skyes phyir// gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde rab tu bshad// rgyal pos de 'dra'i chos ni thos
142b6(rgyud 'bum): gyur nas/ / thal sbyar rtse gcig rjes su yi rang smras// ya mtshan chos thos mchi ma blags te rngus// lus dang sems ni dga' chen kun khyab gyur// de tshe yul bdag rgyal po legs skyes kyis// mdo
142b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni mchos par 'dod pa'i phyir/ / lag na yod bzhini nor bu thogs nas ni// sems can kun phyir smon lam 'di skad btab// 'dzam gling 'di ni kun tu khyab par yang // rin chen rgyan 'phreng dag gi
143a1(rgyud 'bum): char phab nas/ nor dang yo byang chud 'phongs ji snyed pa// thams cad yid bzhin bde ba myong bar shog/ de nas rin chen sna bdun char pab nas// gling bzhi kun tu chog cing tshim byas pas/
143a2(rgyud 'bum): lus kyi rgyan 'phreng gos dang zas skom dang / tsaM dang tse'i 'dod 'phongs pa med par gyur// de tshe yul bdag rgyal po legs skyes kyis// gling bzhi rin chen char phab mthong ba dang // sems can sangs rgyas rin
143a3(rgyud 'bum): chen gtsug pud kyi/ / bstan pa bzhag pa'i dge slong dge 'dun mchod// 'das pa'i rgyal po legs skyes gang yin pa// shAkya thub pa nga yin shes par byos// sngon yang sa chen mang po rab btang ste// rin chen
143a4(rgyud 'bum): dag gis gleng bzhi yongs su bkang / / sngon tshe chos mkhan chen po rin chen brtsegs// legs skyes de la gya nom chos bshad de// mdo sde'i rgyal po rnam phye bshad pa'i phyir// shar phyogs sangs rgyas mi 'khrug
143a5(rgyud 'bum): grub pa yin/ / ngas ni mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan nas// thal sbyar rtse gcig yi rang brjod pa dang // rin chen sna bdun btang ba'i bsod nams kyis// rdo rje sku mchog 'di ni brnyes pa yin// gser 'odang bsod
143a6(rgyud 'bum): nams brgya yi mtshan brgyan pas/ / mthong ba thams cad kun ni rabo dga' zhing // sems can thams cad kun gyi stong du sdug/ lha tshogs mang po bye ba kun de bzhin// 'das tshe bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu dgu/ 'khor
143a7(rgyud 'bum): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag kyang byas/ / yul khams chung ngur mi yi rgyal po byas// gzhan yang bskal pa brgya stong tshad med snyed// brgya byin lha yi dbang po dag kyang byas// tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po
143b1(rgyud 'bum): dag byas te/ / phyogs bcu'i byams chen gcol mchod pa yi// de yi grangs tshad shin tu mthar thug dka'// ngas sngon mdo thos rjes su yi rang dge/ bsod nams phung po ci yod tshad shes dka'/ bsod nam/
143b2(rgyud 'bum): de dbang byang chub mngon rtogs nas// chos sku yang dag ye shes dam pa brnyes// de nas 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal ba thos pa dang // ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas thams cad kyis mdo sde gser 'od
143b3(rgyud 'bum): dam pa spel zhing rgyun mi 'chad par sdud par mos par gyur to/ / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las// rgyal po legs skyes kyi le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//
143b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dpal gyi lha mo// l+lA 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shin tu ngang ba'i dad pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang
143b5(rgyud 'bum): da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa'i yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / yangs shing rgya che ba dag gis mchod par byed par 'dod pa dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul zab
143b6(rgyud 'bum): mo shes shing rtogs par 'dod pa gang yin pa des gdon mi za bar sems rtse gcig tu mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ri 'am/ nags tshal gang yang rung ste/ gnas de dang
143b7(rgyud 'bum): de dag tu sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bstan nas yongs su spel bar bya'o/ / chos nyan pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam par g.yeng ba'i 'du shes spangs nas/ rna ba blags te sems rtse gcig
144a1(rgyud 'bum): tu gzhag par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lha mo de dang / 'khor mang po rnams la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig sangs rgyas mang po la// bsam gyis
144a2(rgyud 'bum): mi khyab mchod pa dang / / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// spyod yul zab mo shes 'dod na// gal te gser 'od dam pa 'di// yang dag phye bshad mthong gyur na// de yi phyogs su nyer song nas
144a3(rgyud 'bum): de yo drung du 'gro bar bya/ / / mdo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pas// yon tan mang po skyed byed cing // sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mtha' med pas// sems can rnams ni thar par byed// nga yis
144a4(rgyud 'bum): mdo 'di rnam bltas nas/ / thog ma bar dang tha mar dge/ shin tu zab pas dpag par dka'// dpe dag gis ni zla byar med// gaing+gA'i bye ma sa chen rdul// rgya mtsho chu dang namasakha' dang // ri zag thams cad gang
144a5(rgyud 'bum): gis kyang / cha shas tsam yang dpe byar med// chos dbyings zab mo 'jug 'dod na/ mdo sde sngar ni mnyan par byed// chos nyid mchod rten gang na bar// zab mo shin tu bde bar gnas// mchod rten 'di yi nang
144a6(rgyud 'bum): dag tu/ / shAkya thub pa nga yis ni// yid 'ong sgra dbyangs dam pa yis// mdo sde bshad pa mthong bar 'gyur// de nas grangs tshad bsam dka' ba'i// bskal pa bye ba snyed du ni// lha dang mi yi nang skyes nas//
144a7(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu bde ba mchog mo 'gro// mdo sde 'di ni nyan pa yis// bdag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bsod nams phung po 'thob 'gyur zhes// de snyam du ni bsam par bya// gal te me chen phung po dag/
144b1(rgyud 'bum): dpag tshad brgya na gang gyur kyang // mdo sde rgyal po 'di nyan phyir// dka' ba med par 'gro bar bya// de yi gnas su phyin nas ni// 'di 'dra'i mdo 'di thos gyur na// sdig pa'i las rnams 'byung 'gyur/
144b2(rgyud 'bum): zhing // rmi lam ngan pa sel bar 'gyur// gza' skar ma rungs ltas ngan dang // byang stems log pa'i gdon la sogs// mdo sde 'di ni thos pa'i tshe// sdig pa mang po spang bar byed// stan mtho mchog ni rab
144b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyan nas/ / rab gtsang pad+ma 'dra ba la// chos smra steng du phyin nas ni// klu chen lta bur 'dug par bya// de la bde bar 'dug nas ni// zab mo'i mdo 'di bshad par bya// yi ger bris nas klog 'dzin dang /
144b4(rgyud 'bum): de yi don ni bshad par bya// chos smra stan ni spangs nas ni// phyogs gzhan dag tu song gyur kyang // khri stan mthon po de las ni// mo 'phrul mtshan ma mang byung bas// res 'ga' chos smra mkhan po'i gzugs//
144b5(rgyud 'bum): stan mtho steng na 'dug par mthong // res 'ga' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mthong // res 'ga' kun tu bzang po'i gzugs// res 'ga' 'jam dpal lta bu dang //
144b6(rgyud 'bum): res 'ga' byams pa gtso bo'i gzugs// stan mtho steng na 'dug par mthong // res 'ga' ya mtshan mtshan ma dang // lha ni mang po rnams kyi gzugs// yud tsam du ni mthong gyur kyang // de ma thag tu mi snang 'gyur//
144b7(rgyud 'bum): bkra shis mang po rdzogs byed pas// byas pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub// yon tan rnams ni yongs rdzogs par// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs// mchog tu rnam rgyal grags ldan dang // nyon mongs
145a1(rgyud 'bum): mang po zhi bar byed/ / pha rol dgra rnams rab tu sel// g.yul 'gyer chen rtag par rgyal// rmi lam ngan pa thams cad med// dug dang gnod pa mang po ni// lan gsum sdig pa ci byas/
145a2(rgyud 'bum): pa// mdo sde'i mthu yis 'byang bar byed// 'dzam bu'i gling ni 'di dag tu// grags pa kun tu rgyas par 'gyur// 'khor 'dzin dgra ni ji snyed pa// phan tshun 'khon ni gtong bar 'gyur// gal te dgra ni phyin
145a3(rgyud 'bum): gyur kyang / / mang thos tsam gyis ldog 'gyur bas// mtshon cha g.yo bar mi ltos par/ dgra gnyid dga' ba skyes par 'gyur// tshangs rgyal dang ni brgya byin dbang // 'jig rten skyong dang rgyal po bzhi
145a4(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje gnod sprin dang / / sde dpon chen po yang dag shes// klu yi rgyal po ma dros dang // klu yi rgyal po rgya mtsho dang // mi 'am ci dang rol mo'i lha// lha ma yin dang gser 'dab bdag/ lha mo spobs
145a5(rgyud 'bum): pa chen mo dang / / dpal gyi lha mo chen mo dang // 'di la sogs pa lha yi gtse// so sor lnga tshegs khrid nas ni// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byed// dkon mchog chos ni bsam mi khyab// rtag par
145a6(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i sems kyis ni/ / mdo sde la ni bkur sti byed// 'di la sogs pa'i lha mang po// thams cad ldan cig 'grogs nas ni// bsod nams sgrub pa rnams bltas nas// lhan cig 'di skad smra
145a7(rgyud 'bum): bar byed/ / sems can 'di dag rab tu ltos// bsod nams yon tan che ldan zhing // dge rtsa brtsor 'grus stobs kyis ni// bdag cag lha gnas skye 'gyur zhes// mdo sde zab mo mnyan pa'i
145b1(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ / gus pa'i sems kyis der 'ongs nas// yang dag chos ni bkur ba'i phyir// chos kyi mchod rten mchod par byed// sems can kun la snying brtse bas// phan pa chen po byed pas na// mdo sde zab mo
145b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag gi/ chos kyi rin chen snod kyang byed// chos kyi sgo 'dir gang zhugs pa// chos nyid la ni 'jug 'gyur bas// mdo sde gser 'od dam pa 'di/ rtse gcig sems kyis mnyan par bya//
145b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas brgya stong tshad med la// gang zag de dag mchod pas na// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dbang gis// mdo sde 'di ni thos pa yin// 'di ltar lha yi bdag po dang // lha mo spobs pa chen mo dang // dpal gyi lha mo de
145b4(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ / rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha rnams dang // gnod sbyin 'khor ni grangs med pa// dpa' zhing rdzu 'phrul ldan pa rnams// so sor phyogs bzhi dag nas ni// rtag tu 'ongs nas skyob par byed// nyi zla brgya
145b5(rgyud 'bum): byin lha dbang dang / / rlung dang chu dang me yi lha// khyab 'jug dang ni phrag chen dang // gshin rje stobs po'i lha mo dang // 'jig rten mgon po la sogs pa// rab dpa' gzi ldan thams cad kun// mdo sde 'dzin
145b6(rgyud 'bum): bas srung byed pas/ / nyan mtshan rtag par yongs mi 'bral// gnod sbyin rgyal po stobs po che// mthu chen dang ni dbang phyug dang // gtso bo yang dag shes la sogs// gnod sbyin nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang //
145b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang gnod sbyin brgya stong rnams// rdzu 'phrul stobs dang ldan pa dag/ rtag par 'jigs pa'i gnas rnams su// nyer 'od gang zag de srung byed// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin rgyal// 'khor ni lnga brgya
146a1(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs// rtag par nyer 'od de srung byed// rin chen rgyal po gnod sbyin dbang // de bzhin rdzogs sangs rgyas po dang // 'brog dgon dang na
146a2(rgyud 'bum): kum b+hi ra/ zas sbyin kha dog ser po dang // 'di la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin dang // so sor g.yog 'khor lnga brgya bcas// thams cad nyer 'od srung bar byed// sna tshogs sde dang dri za dang // 'dam bu rgyal po
146a3(rgyud 'bum): rtag yul rgyal/ / nor bu tsug dang ne gdang / char pa'i dbang po de dag dang // rtag tu rgyal ba nag po che// su pa na dang kye sha dang // pan rtsi ka dang ra rkang dang // de bzhin bskul pa chen po dang // bran rtsi
146a4(rgyud 'bum): cung chos skyong dang / spre'u rnams kyi ni rgyal po dang // khab pu dang ni nyi ma'i gnyen// rin chen gtsug pud srung bar byed// pra na li chen na kun la// bdun pa dang ni 'dod mchog dang // mthu bo che dang gangs
146a5(rgyud 'bum): ridang / bde ba'i ri dang de bzhin te// thams cad rdzu 'phrul che ldan zhing // rab dpa' mthu stobs ldan pa yang // mdo sde 'di 'dzin mthong gyur na// thams cad 'ongs nas srung bar byed// ma dros klu yi
146a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po dang / / klu yi rgyal po rgya mtsho dang // btang bzung dang ni e la'i 'dab// dga' bo dang ni nye dga' bo// klu ni brgya stong mang po'i nang // rdzu 'phrul dang ni gzi byin ldan// mdo sde 'dzin pa srung byed pas
146a7(rgyud 'bum): nyin mtshan rtag par yongs mi'i bral/ / ba lang dang ni sgra gcan dang // thag bzangs ris dang sngob pa ba// bong bu dpung dang phrag chen dang // de bzhin du ni rab dga' dang // lha min mang po gzhan rnams dang //
146b1(rgyud 'bum): lha yi tshogs ni grangs med pa// stobs che rab tu dpa' ba rnams// thams cad 'ongs nas der srung byed// 'phrog ma 'byung po rnams kyi ma// gnod sbyin 'khor ni lnga brgya rnams/ mi de gnyid log sar
146b2(rgyud 'bum): kyang rung / / rtag par 'ongs nas srung bar byed// ma rungs pa dang gdug pa dang // gnod sbyin lag na dbyug thogs dang // rung chen dang ni so brtsegs ma// sems can kun gyi mdangs 'phrog pa// de 'dra
146b3(rgyud 'bum): lha tshogs mang po rnams/ / mthu chen rdzu 'phrul ldan pa kun// mdo sde 'dzin pa rtag bsrungs pas// nyin mtshan rtag par yong mo 'bral// lha mo spobs pa chen mo dang // lha yi bu mo tshad med dang /
146b4(rgyud 'bum): dpal gyi lha mo gtso mo dang // de yi 'khor ni mang po dang // sa chen 'di yi lha mo dang // lo tog kun dga' nags tshal lha// shing gi lha dang rlung lha dang // mchod rten lha la sogs pa dang // de la sogs pa'i lha
146b5(rgyud 'bum): mang po/ / dga' chen sems ni rab bskye nas// mdo sde 'di ni 'dom pa la// thams cad 'ongs nas srung bar byed// mdo sde 'dzin pa mthong gyur na// tshe dang kha dog stobs 'phel byed/ gzi byin dang ni yin
146b6(rgyud 'bum): tan dang / / mtshan mchog gis ni brgyan par 'gyur// gza' skar ltas ngan ston pa dang // de la nyam thag byung byung dang // rmi lam ltas ngan mthong ba yang // thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed// sa
146b7(rgyud 'bum): chen 'di yi lha mo yang / / rab brtan gzi byin mthu stobs ldan// mdo sde 'di yi mthu yis ni// chos kyi ro yis rtag tshim pa// sa bcud thur du song ba yang // dpag tshad brgya ni yan chang du// sa
147a1(rgyud 'bum): bcud gyen du 'phags byas nas/ / sa chen 'di ni snum par byed// sa ni rngams su dpag tshad ni// 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad nas// rdo rje gzhi thug pa'i
147a2(rgyud 'bum): bar/ / sa bcud thams cad gyen du 'phags// mdo sde rgyal po 'di thos dbang // bsod nams phung po che thos pas// lha yi 'khor ni mang po rnams// thams cad phan yon thob par gyur
147a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang lha tshogs mang po rnams/ / mthu stobs 'od dang ldan 'gyur zhing // rab dga' rtag tu bde byed pas// nyams pa'i mtshan ma spong bar 'gyur// 'dzam bu'i gling ni 'di nang gi/ nags tshal
147a4(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu lo tog la/ / mdo sde 'di yi byon rlabs kyis// sems ni rtag tu dga' thob pas// lo tog thams cad legs 'gyur zhing // kun du me tog dam pa dang // 'bru rnams thams cad 'phel
147a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bas/ / sa chen kun tu rgyas par 'gyur// 'bras bu'i ljon shing mang po dang // kun dga' nags tshal mang po kun// tha ma cad le tog mchog skyes nas// dri zhim rtag par kun tu 'phrul// rtswa mang
147a6(rgyud 'bum): ljon shing rnams las kyang / / me tog dam pa skye 'gyur zhing // 'bras bu zhim po skye 'gyur bas// thams cad kun tu gang bar 'gyur// 'dzam bu'i glong ni 'di dag kun// klu yi bu mo tshad med snyed//
147a7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas// thams cad kun tu zhugs nas ni// me tog pa du ma dag dang // de bzhin pad+ma dkar po dang // pad+ma sngon po dkar po gnyis// bskyed nas rdzing kun gang bar 'gyur/
147b1(rgyud 'bum): mdo sde 'di yi byon rlabs kyis// nam mkha' gang zhig sgrib pa med// sprin dang khug rna yongs su sel// mun nag thams cad snang bar 'gyur// nyi ma'i 'od zer stong 'gyed pas// dri med 'od ni rnam
147b2(rgyud 'bum): par dag/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yo mthus// gling bzhi yongs bskor gsal bar byed// mdo sde 'di yo byin rlabs kyis// lha yo bu rnams bstangs pas na// thams cad 'dzam bu'i gser dag gis/
147b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhal med khang ni byed par 'gyur// nyi zla dang po 'char ba'i tshe// gling 'di mthong na rab dga' bas// rtag par snang ba chen po yis// thams cad kun tu gsal bar byed// sa chen 'di la yod pa yi//
147b4(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i rdzing ni ji snyed pa// nyi mas dus bzhini gsal byed pas// kha ni mi 'bye gang yang med// 'dzam bu'i glong ni 'di dag tu/ me tog 'bras bu sman rnams kun// thams cad legs shing smin 'gyur bas
147b5(rgyud 'bum): sa chen kun tu gang bar 'gyur/ / mdo sde 'di yi byin rlabs kyis// nyi zla snang bar byed pa'i gnas// rgyu skar tshang las mo 'da' zhing // rlung char dus bzhin ldang 'bab pas// 'dzam gling 'di dag kun tu yang
147b6(rgyud 'bum): yul rnams lo legs skyid par 'gyur/ / gang na mdo sde 'di bzhugs pa// phyogs gzhan dag las khyad par 'phags// gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di// gang du spel zhing 'don pa dang // rnam phye 'chad par
147b7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i gnas/ / bsod nams gong du thob par 'gyur// de nas dpal gyi lha mo che mo dang lha la sogs pa mang po de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pa dang // thams cad rab tu dga' bas
148a1(rgyud 'bum): @mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di dag yongs su 'dzin par byed pa de dag la sems rtse gcig tu yongs su bsrungs nas/ / mya ngan gyi gnod pa med cing rtag tu bde ba 'thob par 'gyur bar mos par 'gyur/
148a2(rgyud 'bum): gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las// lha dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs su srung zhing 'dzin par byed pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// / de nas de
148a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pas 'khor mang po'i nang du rgya cher yang dag par bshad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog dang / de'i bu gnyis po dngul gyi tog dang / dngul 'od ces bya ba gnyis po bla na med pa
148a4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bzhed par gyur pa dang / de'i tshe lha'i bu stong phrag bcu mchog tu rgyal ba 'od ces bya ba gtso bor gyur pa dang lhan cig tu sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas nas babs
148a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas chos bshad pa mnyan par gyur to// de nas
148a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa snyed 'das pa na
148a7(rgyud 'bum): gser 'od ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
148b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan dra gser dang rin po che'i ri bo'i/
148b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bstan pa'i chos rnams nub par gyur pa dang / de'i tshe 'di'i bu chen po dngul
148b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi tog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal tshab tu gyur te/ de'i tshe de'i ming bsgyur nas rnam dag tog ces bya bar 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas
148b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams
148b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser tog 'od ces bya bar 'gyur ro/ / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ bstan pa'i chos rnams nub par gyur pa dang 'di'i
148b6(rgyud 'bum): bu chung ngu dngul gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal tshab tu 'gyur bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
148b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser 'od ces
149a1(rgyud 'bum): bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ / de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag gis/ skyes bu chen po gsum po de dag las lung bstan pa'ang thos/ 'di ltar mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog
149a2(rgyud 'bum): dam pa 'di'ang thos pas/ sems rab tu dga' ba skyes nas rnam par dag cing dri ma med par gyur pas/ dper na nam mkha' lta bur gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i bu stong phrag bcu pa de dag dge ba'i
149a3(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba de dag yongs su smin pa thugs kyis mkhyen pas byang chub chen por lung bstan nas/ 'di skad du lha'i bu khyed cag ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa snyed
149a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i tog mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ rus rigs kyang mthun/ ming
149a5(rgyud 'bum): mthun par 'gyur bas/ thams cad zhal dang spyan rnam par dag cing ut+pa la'i dri'i ri bo zhes bya ba/ mtshan rnam pa bcu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar rim bzhin du sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu 'jig
149a6(rgyud 'bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub kyi shing gi lha mos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag ni sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i
149a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas nas chos nyan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa lags na/ ci'i slang du de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan par mdzad lags
149b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis ni lha'i bu 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug phun sum tshogs par bsgoms nas dka' ba spyad de/ lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mgo dang / mig dang / rkang dang / klang rgyas dang / g.yog 'khor dang
149b2(rgyud 'bum): bu dang / mchis brang dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / mngag gzhug bgyid pa dang / khang khyim dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / nags tshal dang / gser dang / dngul
149b3(rgyud 'bum): dang bai DUR+Ya dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / byu ru dang / man shel dang / dung dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / gaspo sman dag sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'ang
149b4(rgyud 'bum): ma thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa gzhan dag ni/ mchod pa'i yo byad mang pos 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phrag khrag khrig brgya stong grangs ma mchis pa snyed la mchod pa bgyis
149b5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas/ bskal pa tshad ma mchis shing mtha' ma mchis pa snyed lon nas/ gdod de'i rjes la byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur ba lags na/ bcom ldan
149b6(rgyud 'bum): 'das lha'i bu 'di dag rgyu rkyen ni gang / spyod pa mchog ni ji lta bu zhig mngon par bsgrubs/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ni ji lta bu zhig bsrung na/ lha'i gnas de nas 'dir mchis te/ yud tsam zhig chos thos pa nyid kyi
149b7(rgyud 'bum): lung bstan pa thos par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bkas bshad de/ the tshom gyi dra ba bcad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ shing gi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo
150a1(rgyud 'bum): @khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ 'di dag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog dag pa'i rgyu dang / rkyen dang nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba bsgrubs nas/ gdong lung bstan
150a2(rgyud 'bum): pa thob pa yin pas/ lha'i bu mang po 'di dag lha'i gzhal med khang mchog dam pa nas 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba'ang spangs te/ ched du gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'ang mnyan du 'ongs pa yin pas/ chos thos
150a3(rgyud 'bum): par gyur nas kyang mdo sde 'di la sems kyis gus pa bskyed de/ bai DUR+Ya yongs su dag pa ltar skyon gyi dro med par gyur pa dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsum po 'di
150a4(rgyud 'bum): dag la lung bstan pa'i dngos po'ang thos pa dang / gzhan yang 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ yun ring por yang dag pa'i spyod pa bsgrubs nas/ yi dam chen po blangs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir ngas ma 'ongs pa'i
150a5(rgyud 'bum): dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa yin no// de nas shing gi lha mo dos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pa
150a6(rgyud 'bum): dang rab tu dga' bas mngon par yid ches par gyur to/ / gser 'ong dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// bcom
150a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la bka' stsal pa rigs kyi lha mo legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung zhig dang / lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag gi sngon gyi smon lam gyi rgyu dang rkyen gang yin
150b1(rgyud 'bum): pa deng khyod la bshad par bya'o/ / rigs kyi lha mo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa tshad med cing bsam gyi mi khyab pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
150b2(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom lnga 'das rin chen
150b3(rgyud 'bum): gtsug pud ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'ang dam pa'i chos nub par gyur nas/ gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyi tshe/
150b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba zhig yod de/ rtag par yang dag pa'i chos kyis pha ma bzhin du mi rnams la rjes su 'dzin par byed do// rgyal po de'i yul na tshong dpon chu 'dzin ces bya ba sman gyi rigs
150b5(rgyud 'bum): la shin tu mkhas pa shes pa'i yan lag brgyad legs par khong du rlud pa/ sems can gyi nad kyi sdug bsngal 'byung ba chen po bzhi mi mthun pa las gyur pa thams cad yongs su skyob cing gso bar byed pa
150b6(rgyud 'bum): zhig yod de/ rigs kyi lha me de'i tshe tshong dpon chu 'dzin de la bu chu 'bebs shes bya ba byad bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa mang po kun gyis mos par blta bar mos pa// rang bzhin gyi sems myur ba/ gtsug lag
150b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams legs par rtogs pa/ yi ge dang / ri mo dang / rtsis dang / grangs rnams mngon par mi rtogs pa gang yang med pa zhig yod par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po de'i yul khams na sems can brgya
151a1(rgyud 'bum): @stong tshad med pasnyed nad kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis rab tu gzir bar gyur pas/ than dga' ba'i sems cung zad tsam yang med par gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi du chu 'bebs
151a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can brgya stong tshad med pa de dag nad kyi sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa mthong ba dang / snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas 'di snyam du sems can tshang mang ba snyed sdug bsngal mi bzang bas nyon mongs
151a3(rgyud 'bum): par gyur te/ bdag gi pha tshong dpon sman dpyad la shin tu mkhas shing shes pa'i yan lag brgyad legs par 'ong du chud de/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'phel zhing 'grib pa las byung ba'i nang sna tshogs gso bar nus
151a4(rgyud 'bum): kyang rgas khogs pas lus kyi nyam chung zhing dma' ba dang / 'khar ba la brten nas gdod 'gro bas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal rnams su song nas/ nad kyi sdug bsngal rnams yongs su skyob
151a5(rgyud 'bum): par byed mi nus la/ deng sems can brgya stong tshad med pa snyed ni nang tshabs chen pos thebs pa yongs su skyob par nus pa med na/ deng bdag pa sman pa chen po'i drung du song la nang gso ba'i sman dpyad gsang ba dris
151a6(rgyud 'bum): te/ gal te shes par gyur na grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dag tu song la/ sems can rnams kyi nang rnam pa sna tshogs gsos te/ yun ring por bde ba myong bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas tshong dpon
151a7(rgyud 'bum): gyi bus de snyam du bsams nas/ pa'i thang du song ste/ rkang pa la mgo bos gtugs nas phyag byas te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis pha la 'ang/
151b1(rgyud 'bum): skad ces dris so// bdag ni sems can bskyab pa'i spang// sman dpyad rnams ni zhu lags na// byams pa'i yab kyis brtser dgongs te// bdag la bkas ni bshad du gsol/ ji ltar lus
151b2(rgyud 'bum): ni 'jig pa na/ / 'byung chen rnams ni 'phel 'grib 'gyur// gzhan yang dus ni gang gi tshe// nang mang rnams ni skye 'gyur lags// ji ltar zas skom 'tshal 'gyur na// bde ba dag ni mang 'gyur
151b3(rgyud 'bum): zhing / / lus kyi nang na me yi mthu// nyams shing gnod par mi 'gyur lags// sems can nad ni bzhi mchis te// rlung dang mkhris pa bang kan dang // kun 'dus pa yi nad lags na
151b4(rgyud 'bum): de dag ji ltar gso bar bgyi/ / gang gi tshe ni rlung nang ldang // gang gi tshe ni mkhris nang slong // gang gi tshe ni bdag bad kan g.yo// gang gi tshe ni kun 'dus skye// de nas tshong dpon gyi bus gsol ba btab
151b5(rgyud 'bum): pa thos pa dang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ngas de drang srong snying po yi// nad gso dpyad la brten nas ni// rom bzhin khyod la rab bstan gyis// legs par nyon la sems can skyobs// zla ba gsum
151b6(rgyud 'bum): nidapyid kyi dus/ / zla ba gsum ni dbyar zhes bya// zla ba gsum ni ston gyi phyogs// zla ba gsum ni dgun zhes bya// 'di ni lo gcig las brtsams pas// gsum gsum so sor bshad par bya//
151b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis gnyis dus tshogs gcig byas nas// lo gcig dus ni drun tu 'gyur// dang lo gnyis ni me tog dus// gsum dang bzhi ni tsha ba'i dus// lnga dang drug pa char pa'i dus// bdun dang brgyad pa
152a1(rgyud 'bum): ston gyi dus/ / dgu dang bcu pa grang bar 'gyur// phyi ma gnyis ni kha ba'i dus// de ltar bye brag shes gyur na// 'gal ba med par sman gtang bya// dus ni 'di dag rjes mthun par/
152a2(rgyud 'bum): zas skom legs par sbyor byed na// ltor ni myur du 'ju 'gyur bas// nang mang dag ni skye mi 'gyur// dus tshogs gal te log 'gyur zhing // 'byung chen bzhi ni 'phos gyur la// de tshe gsos sman med
152a3(rgyud 'bum): gyur na/ / nges par nad kyi sdug bsngal skye// sman pas dus bzhi shes bya zhing // dus tshigs dag kyang shes par bya/ lus kyi khams bdun rig byas nas// 'gal ba med par zas sman btang //
152a4(rgyud 'bum): ro yi khams dang khrag dang sha// rus dang rkang dang klad rgyas su// nad ni 'di dag zhugs pa'i tshe// gsor rung mi rung shes par bya// nang ni tha dad rnam bzhi yod// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang / kun
152a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa yi nad yin te/ / g.yo ba'i dus ni shes par bya// dpyid ka'i dus ni bde kan g.yo// dbyar ni rlung nang skye bar 'gyur// ston gyi dus su mkhris pa rgyas// dgun ni gsum po cog car ldang
152a6(rgyud 'bum): dpying ni tshe rtsub dro ba bzar/ / dbyar ni snum dro lan tshwa sgyur// ston ni grang dang mngar dang snum// dgun ni rtsub sgyur snum dang mngar// dus ni bzhi po 'di dag tu// sman dang zas skom gang bza' ba// gal
152a7(rgyud 'bum): tede bzhin bza' byed na/ / nang mang dag ni skye mi 'gyur// zos 'og na ba bad kan dbang // zhu tshon pa mkhris par gyur// zhu 'og ldang ba rlung gi dbang // dus dang sbyar la nad shes bya// nad kyi rtsa ba
152b1(rgyud 'bum): shes gyur nas/ / nang ni ji bzhin sman gtang bya// nang dbyibs bye brag tha dad kyang // sngar ni rtsa ba shes par bya// rlung nad dag la snum bag gtang // mkhris pa'i nang ni 'khru na bzang // bang kan nang ni skyug
152b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / kun 'dus la ni sman gsuM dgos// rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ldang ba// de ri kun 'dus par shes bya// nang ldang dus ni shes gyur kyang // rang bzhin dag ni shes par bya// de ltar brtag
152b3(rgyud 'bum): te shes gyur nas/ / dus bzhin du ni sman dpyad bya// zas skom sman ni 'gal med pa// de ni sman pa mkhas shes bya// shes pa'i yan lag brgyad rig nas// sman dpyad rnams ni kun sdud pas// 'di dag
152b4(rgyud 'bum): la ni gsal byas nas/ / sems can nad ni gso bar bya// gtar ba dang ni smas snad dang // lus kyi nad dang 'dre gdon dang // ma rungs dug dang byis pa dang // tshe bsring dang ni mthu skyed yin// sngar ni de yi la
152b5(rgyud 'bum): dog dang / spu tshig rang bzhin rab brtags nas// de 'og rmi lam dris gyur na// rlung mkhris bad kan bye brag shes// skem ring mgo yi sgra ngan cing // sems kyi rang bzhin mi brtan pa// tshig mang rmi lam 'phur
152b6(rgyud 'bum): mthong na/ / de ni rlung gi rang bzhin can// gzhon nu sgra dkar skye ba dang // rdul che gsher ba mang ba dang // yid gzhungs rmi lam me mthong ba/ de ni mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can// sems brtan lus ni mnyam
152b7(rgyud 'bum): pa drang / / zhib rtog mgo dang snum zhing rlan// rmi lam chu dang rdzas dkar mthong // bad kan rang bzhin shes par bya// kun 'dus rang bzhin kun ldan pas// kha cig gnyis dang gsum ldan pas
153a1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs gcig lhag par gang mang ba/ / de yi rang bzhin shes par byos// rang bzhin rig par gyur nas ni// nang bzhin sman ni gtang bar bya// 'chi ba'i mtshan ma med gyur na//
153a2(rgyud 'bum): mo de gsor rung ba zhes bya// dbang pos log pa la 'dzin cing // bla ma sman pa dag la brnyas// nye du dag la khong khro na// 'tsho ba'i mtshan mar shes par bya// mig yon kha dog dkar 'gyur zhing // lcaganag
153a3(rgyud 'bum): sna zur yo ba dang / / rna ba'i 'khor lo sngo las gyur// maru thur 'phyang ba 'chi ba'i mtshan// a ru ra ro nam gcig la// ro yi rnam pa drug ldan te// nang ni thams cad sel byed pas// nyes med sman rnams
153a4(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi rgyal/ / 'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum// sman rnams nang na rnyed par sla// bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar// 'di dag nad mang gso bar nus// de las gzhan pa'i sman rnams ni// nad dang sbyar te bskyed
153a5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / sngar ni brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas// nor dang khe la blta mi bya// ngas ni khyod la nad gso ba'i// gces pa'i don ni bstan pa yin// 'di yaMs sems can gso byas na// mtha' med 'bras bu thob
153a6(rgyud 'bum): par gyur/ / rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs pa las mngon du shes pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi don gces pa dang // 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'phel zhing 'grib pa dang // dus tshigs mi mthun pa dang /
153a7(rgyud 'bum): sman dpyad pa'i cho ga thos pas legs par khong du chud par gyur nas/ bdag nyid nang mang po gso nus par rig par gyur pas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal kun tu khyab par de dang de dag tu song ste/
153b1(rgyud 'bum): nad kyi sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i sems can 'bum phrag stong du ma de'i thad du lhags pa rnams la legs pa'i tshig gis spro ba bskyed nas/ 'di skad du bdag ni sman pa'o// bdag ni sman pa ste/ sman dpyad
153b2(rgyud 'bum): la shin tu mkhas pas/ deng khyed cag gi nad mang po gsos nas thams cad sos par bya'o zhes smras so// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe mo mang po rnams tshong dpon gyi bus legs pa'i tshig gis spro ba bskyed nas/
153b3(rgyud 'bum): nad gso bar gnang ba thos pa dang / de nas sems can nad tshabs chen pos btab pa brgya stong tshad med pa snyed cig tshig de skad smras pa thos nas/ lus dang sems dga' mgu rangs shing ngo mtshar rmad du byung
153b4(rgyud 'bum): ba thos par gyur pas/ rgyu dang rkyen des nad kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed pa thams cad sos shing zhi bar gyur pas nyam stobs rtas te/ snga mkho bzhin du sos par gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe gzhan yang
153b5(rgyud 'bum): nad kyi sdug bsngal shin tu lci zhing gso bar dka' ba'i sems can brgya stong tshad med pa rnams kyang lhan cig tshong dpon gyi bu de'i thad du lhags nas yang nang gso bar gsol ba btab pa dang / de'i tshe
153b6(rgyud 'bum): tshong dpon gyi bus sman gyi nom pa dag btang nas thams cad sos par gyur te/ rigs kyi lha mo de'i mchong dpon gyi bu des yul khams de kun gyi sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya
153b7(rgyud 'bum): stong du ma sos par byas so/ / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ nad rab tu zhi bar byas pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan
154a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis/ byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis/ sngon gyi rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul khams su sems
154a2(rgyud 'bum): can nad kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa dag gsos nas/ snga mkho bzhin du rtas te bde ba myong bar gyur pa dang / de'i tshe sems can mang po de dag nad sos par gyur pa'i phyir bsod nams kyi las mang du bsags
154a3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ sbyin pa rgya chen btang ba la bdag nyid longs spyod par gyur pas/ thams cad lhan cig tshong dpon gyi bu'i thad du dong ste/ thams cad gus pa bskyed nas/ 'di skad du tshong dpon chen po'i bu bsod nams
154a4(rgyud 'bum): kyang dngos po shin tu legs par bskyed de/ bdag cag la phan btags nas bde bar 'tsho bar byas pa legs so legs so// khyod ni yang dag pa'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po byams pa dang snying
154a5(rgyud 'bum): rje dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/ sman dpyad la shin tu mkhas pas/ sems can gyi nad kyi sdug bsngal tshad med pa dag las legs par gsos so zhes grong khyer kun tu khyab par de ltar
154a6(rgyud 'bum): bsngags pa brjod par gyur to/ / rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu de'i chung ma nu'i pad+ma'i mdzod ces bya ba la bu gnyis yod de/ de gcig gi ming ni chu rgyas zhes bya'o// gcig gi ming ni chu'i mdzod ces
154a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de nas chu 'bebs bu gnyis khrid nas/ mthar gyis grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal rgyu zhing dong ba las/ dgon pa'i gnas shin tu nyam nga ba zhig 'das pa dang / de na phar ba dang / spyang ki dang
154b1(rgyud 'bum): wa dang / sgra chen dang / bya rgod la sogs pa gcan gzan gyi rnam pa sha khrag za zhing 'thung ba mang po phyogs gcig tu rgyug cing 'phur te dong ba mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu de 'di snyam du gcan gzan//
154b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir phyogs gcig tu 'phur zhing rgyug par gyur/ bdag gis skad cig phyi bzhin du brtag go snyam du bsams nas/ phyi bzhin du song ba las rdzib chen po dgon pa chu skyes zhes
154b3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba de ni chu zad la thug pas/ rdzing de'i nang na nya mang po yod pa mthong bar gyur to// chu 'bebs kyis mthong nas kyang snying rje chen po'o sems skyes pa dang / de'i tshe shing gi lha zhig lus phyed tsam bstan
154b4(rgyud 'bum): nas 'di skad du legs so legs so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod ni yang dag pa'i don dang ldan pa'i phyir/ chu 'bebs zhes bya bas nya 'di dag la snying brtse bas chu sbyin pa'i rigs so// rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa
154b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya ste/ chu 'bab par byed pa'i dang / chu sbyin par byed pa'o// deng khyod kyis mang ji lta ba bzhin du byos shog/ de nas chu 'bebs kyis/ shing gi lha mo la smras
154b6(rgyud 'bum): pa nya 'di dag gi grangs ji tsam zhig yod/ shing gi lha mos smras pa/ grangaso ni stong phrag bcu tshang ba snyed yod do// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bus grangs de snyed yod par thos pa dang / skrag
154b7(rgyud 'bum): par snying rje'i bsam pa skyes par gyur to/ / de'i tshe rdzing chen po de'ang nyi mas gdungs nas chu'i lhag ma cung zad gcig lus par gyur pas/ nya stong phrag bcu po de dag kyang 'chi ba'i sgor zhugs
155a1(rgyud 'bum): lus kyis 'gre ldog byas nas tshong dpon de mthong ba dang sems la re ba dang bcas/ mig mi 'dzums par rjes su 'brang zhing lta bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bus dngos po de mthong nas
155a2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bzhir brgyugs te/ chu btsal bar 'dod kyang rnyed par ma gyur pas/ yang phyogs gcig tu rnam par bltas pa las/ ljon shing chen po zhig mthong ba dang / steng du 'dzegs nas yal ga dang lom
155a3(rgyud 'bum): bcad de bsol grib byas so/ / gzhan yang rdzing 'di'i chu gang nas 'ong zhes yongs su btsal ba las chu bo chen po chu skyes zhes bya ba zhig mthong ngo // de'i tshe chu bo de'i 'gram na nya mang po yod pas/ nya blang ba'i
155a4(rgyud 'bum): phyir chu bo de'i gong du g.yangs chen po yod pa'i gnas su chu bo nas 'bab tu mi ster bas/ chu dral ba'i gnas de'ang shin tu bcos dka' bar gyur/ 'di snyam du gang ba 'di ni shin tu zab cing g.yang sa che bas
155a5(rgyud 'bum): mi brgya stong gis zla ba gsum gyi bar du'ang gcod par mi nus na/ bdag gcig pus mi nus pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu myur du rang gi grong khyer du song ste/ rgyal po chen po
155a6(rgyud 'bum): drung du phyin nas mgo bos rkang pa la phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad du bdag gis rgyal po chen po'i mdza' ris na/ 'bangs la bro nad sna tshogs ci mchis pa
155a7(rgyud 'bum): gsos nas/ thams cad bde bar bgyis te/ mthar gyis ljongs rgyur mchis pa las/ 'brog dgon pa zhig tu mchis pa dang / rdzing dgon pa chu skyes zhes bgyi ba de'i chab pas su nye bas
155b1(rgyud 'bum): den nya stong phrag bcu mchis pa'ang gdugs kyis bsams pas/ ring po mi thogs par 'gum par 'gyur ba dag mthong lags na/ rgyal po chen po byams pa dang thugs rjes brtse bar dgongs te/ glang po
155b2(rgyud 'bum): che nyi shu zhig chab dgal bar skad cig stsal du gsol/ ji ltar bdag gis nad pa mang po la srog stsal pa de bzhin du nya de dag gi srog gi skyabs bgyid pa lags so zhes gsol to// de nas rgyal po chen pos kyang blon po
155b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po la sman pa'i rgyal po 'di la glang po che byon cig ces bsgo'o/ / de'i tshe blon po chen pos kyang rgyal po'i bka' khyer nas tshong dpon gyi bu la 'di skad ces smras so// kye skyes bu chen po legs so// khyod bdag
155b4(rgyud 'bum): nyid glang po che'i lhas su song ste/ yid la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du glang po che nyi shu zhig gdams te khyer la sems can la phan btags nas bde ba thob par gyis shig/ de nas chu 'bebs bu gnyis dang lhan cig
155b5(rgyud 'bum): tu glang po che nyi shu khrid de/ chang pa'i khyim nas rgyal ba mang po g.yar te/ chu dral ba'i gnas su phyin nas rgyal pa chus bkang ste/ glang po che la bkal nas rdzing gi drung du phyin te/ rdzing gi nang du blugs pa dang
155b6(rgyud 'bum): snga mkho bzhin du gang zhing rgyas par gyur to/ / rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bus rdzing gi ngos bzhir 'khor bar bltas pa dang / de nas nya mang po de dag kyang phyi bzhin du 'brangs nas 'gram du rgyu bar gyur
155b7(rgyud 'bum): to/ / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu yang 'di snyam du nya mang po 'di dag ci'i phyir bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang / gdon mi za bar bkres pa'i mes gdungs nas/ bdag la zas spong ba yin pas bdag giso sbyin par
156a1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis/ bu la 'di skad smras so// khyod kyis glang po che mchog tu stobs dang ldan pa gcig blangs te myur du
156a2(rgyud 'bum): khyim du deng la yab tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs khyim na bzar rung ba'i dngos po ci yod pa dang / pha ma za ba'i skal ba dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / zan mo dang / zan po'i skal ba ci yod pa thams cad
156a3(rgyud 'bum): kyang bsdus te khyer la shog cog/ de nas bu gnyis pas bstan pa mnyan nas glang po che mchog la zhon te rings par khyim du song nas/ mes po'i drung du phyin pa dang / dngos po gong ma rgyas par smras nas//
156a4(rgyud 'bum): khyim na bzar rung ba'i dngos po ci yod pa blangs te/ glang po che la bkal nas myur zhing rings par 'dug pa'i rdzing drung du phyin pa dang / de nas chu 'bebs bu 'ongs pa mthong nas/ lus dang sems dga' mgu rangs
156a5(rgyud 'bum): par gyur te/ zas rnams blangs nas rdzing kun tu khyab par gtor ba dang / nye rnams zas thob pas thams cad 'grangs shing tshim par gyur to// yang 'di snyam du deng bdag gis zas yongs su btang nas
156a6(rgyud 'bum): nya rnams srog thob par gyur pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi tshe yang / chos kyi zas yongs su btang nas/ sems can mtha' yas pa rnams tshim par byed par gyur cig snyam mo// gzhan yang 'di snyam du bdag
156a7(rgyud 'bum): gis dgon pa'i nags tshal na dge slong zhig theg pa chen po'i mdo sde klog pa las/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos zab mo'i don gces pa ston pa'ang mthong zhing thos
156b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang mdo sde las sems can gang la la zhig 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug pud kyi mtshan thos par gyur na/ mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas/
156b2(rgyud 'bum): deng bdag gis nya stong phrag bcu po de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos zab mo'ang bstan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug phud kyi mtshan yang brjod par bya'o//
156b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzam bu'i gling 'di ni sems can rnam pa gnyis yod de/ theg pa chen po la shin tu mngon par yod ches pa dang / yid mi ches shing smod par byed pa ste/ de dag kyang mngon par yid ches pa'i sems 'phel bar bya'o snyam
156b4(rgyud 'bum): mo/ / de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu 'di snyam du bdag rdzing gi nang du zhugs te/ nyamang po de dag la chos zab mo shin tu gya nom pa bshad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas chu'i nang du zhugs te/ 'di skad ces 'das pa'i de
156b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa
156b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug pud la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'di sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di ltar thugs dam bzhes te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
156b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can ji snyed pa gang dag 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe nga'i ming thos par gyur na/ shi 'phos pa'i 'og tu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyo bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to zhes bsgrags so// de nas chu 'bebs kyis rdzing
157a1(rgyud 'bum): gi nya de dag la chos zab mo gya nom pa'ang 'di skad du'ang yod pa'i phyir de yod/ 'di skyes pa'i phyir de skye bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis
157a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/
157a3(rgyud 'bum): sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'khrug pa 'byung ste/

157a6(rgyud 'bum): ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag
157a7(rgyud 'bum): rga shi 'gags pas mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes
157b1(rgyud 'bum): bshad do/ / chos 'di dag bshad nas/ gzhan yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i gzungs 'di bstan to// tad+ya thA/ ba tsi na/ btsun/ bi tsan/ sa sh+tsa
