157b4(rgyud 'bum): sha ma ni ni/ sha ma ni ni swA hA/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor mang po rnams la tshong dpon gyi bu'i sngon gyi rgyu 'di bstan pa na/ lha dang mi'i 'khor rnams shin tu ngo mtshar che'o zhes bsngags pa
157b5(rgyud 'bum): brjod par gyur to/ / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis so so nas/ gnas de nyid du mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// legs so shAkya thub pa'i gtso// yan lag bcu gnyis mtshungs ldan
157b6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ dam chos rig sngags bkas bshad nas// sdig bsal bsod nams 'phel bar mdzod// bdag cag kyang ni sngags brjod pa// dam pa'i chos ni srung bar bgyid// gang zhig 'gal bar bgyis nas ni//
157b7(rgyud 'bum): legs par rjes su mi 'brang na// ardza ka yi yal ga bzhin// mgo ni tshol pa bdun du 'gems// bdag cag bcom ldan spyan sngar ni// rig sngags lan cig brjod par bgyid// tad+ya thA/ hi ri mo/ ga te/
158a1(rgyud 'bum): gan d+ha ri/ tsa na d+ha ri/ d+ha ri/ dI ba re shi ho b+ha re/ pu re pu re/ gu gu ma ti khi ra ma ti/ da d+hi mu kha/ l-i ru b+ha/ mu ru b+ha/ ku tsa mu ru gan+te/ du ru du ru du ru/ bIr+ye/ a dI sid+d+he da be/ dad+ma be/
158a2(rgyud 'bum): u ste/ u ste ba d+he/ a na le pra b+ha te/ ku su ma ba te u su ma ba te swAhA bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs dang / bu gnyis kyis rdzing de'i nya dag la rlu dang zas
158a3(rgyud 'bum): byin nas/ chos bshad de slar rang gi khyim du dong ngo // tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs de dus gzhan zhig na ston mo la 'dus te/ ston mo sna tshogs byas nas/ chang gos ra ro ste nyal ba dang / de'i tshe nya stong phrag
158a4(rgyud 'bum): bcu po de dag dus gcig tu tshe 'das nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes pa de dag 'di snyam du/ bdag cag gi dge ba'i las kyi rgyu dang rkyen gang gis lha'i gnas 'dir skyes par gyur ces pasam nas/ phan tshun
158a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig la gcig 'di skad du bdag cag ni sngon 'dzam bu'i gling du dud 'gro'i skye gnas su lhung nas nya'i lus blangs pa la tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis/ bdag cag la chu dang zas byin nas/ gzhan yang
158a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos zab mo dang gzungs kyang bshad/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug pud kyi mtshan nas kyang brjod pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des bdag
158a7(rgyud 'bum): cag lha'i gnas 'dir skyes pa yin pas/ de'i phyir bdag cag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu de'i thad du dong la/ drin bsab pa'i phyir mchod pa bya ba'i rigs so zhes smras so// de nas lha'i bu stong phrag bcu
158b1(rgyud 'bum): po de dag lha'i gnas de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i glong du sman pa'i rgyal po chen po'i thang du lhags so// de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu de yang thog mthon po'i steng du bde bar gnyid log pa las
158b2(rgyud 'bum): lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag gis mu tig gi 'phreng ba stong phrag bcu ni mgo drung du bzhag/ yang stong phrag bcu ni rkang pa'i drung du bzhag/ yang stong phrag bcu ni g.yas logs su bzhag/ yang stong
158b3(rgyud 'bum): phrag bcu ni g.yon logs su bzhag ste/ me tog man da ra ba dang man da ra ba chen po'i char pa pus nub tsam du phab nas/ 'od kyis kun snang bar byas te/ lha'i rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs las sgra dbyas
158b4(rgyud 'bum): snyan pa dag byung nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling du gnyid log pa thams cad sad par byas so// tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyang gnyid log pa las sad par gyur pa dang / de nas lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag
158b5(rgyud 'bum): gis mchod pa byas nas nam mkha' la 'phur te dong ngo / / rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi 'od kyi yul khams su rang gnas de dang de dag thams cad du/ lha'i me tog pad+ma dam pa'i char mngon par phab bo//
158b6(rgyud 'bum): b+ha'i bu mang po de dag sngon gyi gnas dgon pa'i rdzing drung du dong nas/ lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab ste/ de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ slar lga'i gnas su dong ste/ yid bzhin du ci dga' bar
158b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba dag la longs spyod par gyur to/ / rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi 'od kyang nam nangs pa dang / blon po chen po de dag la mngang sum rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir ya mtshan gyi mtshan ma de lta bu dag snang zhing
159a1(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer chen po dag kyang bkye bar gyur ces smras so/ / blon po chen pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig/ lha'i tshogs mang po chen po rnams kyis tshong dpon gyi bu chu bebs kyi sdum
159a2(rgyud 'bum): ba ra mu tig gi 'phreng ba 'bum phrag bcu dang / me tog man dar ba'i char mngon par phab pas pus nub tsam du bgyis lags so// rgyal pos blon po la bsgo ba/ tshong dpon gyi khyim du song la/ de'i bu bos shig/ blon po chen pos
159a3(rgyud 'bum): bka' mnyan nas/ de'i khyim du song ste/ rgyal po'i bka' bzlas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu bkug go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu rgyal po'i drung du phyin pa dang / mngang sum rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir/ ya mtshan che ba'i mtshan ma de lta bu byung bar
159a4(rgyud 'bum): gyur ces dris so/ / tshong dpon gyi bus smras pa/ bdag gis dpyad pa lta na gdon mi 'tshal bar rdzing de'i nang gi nya mang po de dag mdo sde las gsungs pa bzhin du tshe 'das nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes pas/ de dag drin lan
159a5(rgyud 'bum): blan pa'i slad du ya mtshan che ba'i mtshan ma de lta bu bstan snyam bgyid lags so/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ ji ltar shes/ chu 'bebs kyis smras pa/ lhas pho nya 'ga' zhig dang / bdag gi bu gnyis rdzing chen po'i drung du btang ste/
159a6(rgyud 'bum): nyastong phrag bcu po de dag gum mam 'tsho brtags na mad dam mi med dam mkhyen par 'gyur lags so// rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas/ pho nya dang de'i bu gnyis rdzing de'i drung du btang ba las/ rdzing de'i nang na me tog man nga
159a7(rgyud 'bum): ba mang po phung po chen pos gang bar gyur pa dang / nya mang po thams cad dus las 'das par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang slar myur du log ste/ rgyas par rgyal po la gsol pa dang / rgyal po'ang de ltar gyur pa thos pas rab tu
159b1(rgyud 'bum): dga' bar gyur nas/ sngon de lta bu ma byung ngo zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lha mo khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par
159b2(rgyud 'bum): byaste/ sngon byung ba tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bya ba de ning nyid yin no// tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'dzin zhes bya ba de ni mdzes pa'i tog yin no// de'i bu gnyis las bu chen po chu rgyas shes bya ba de ni dngul gyi rig bya ba nyid
159b3(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / de'i bu chung ngu chu'i mdzod ces bya ba de ni dngul gyi 'od ces bya ba nyid yin no// rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi 'od ces bya ba 'di ni byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo khyod nyid yin no// nya stong phrag bcu po de dag ni lha'i
159b4(rgyud 'bum): bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag nyid yin no/ / ngas sngon nya de dag la chu dang zas byin te tshim par byas nas/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos zab mo dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di bshad pa'i
159b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyu de dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug pud de'i mtshan nas brjod de bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i rgyus mtho ris su skyes par gyur pas/ deng nga'i thad du 'ongs nas rab tu dga' bas chos
159b6(rgyud 'bum): mnyan pas/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan nas/ de dag gi ming bstan pa yin no// rigs kyi lha mo ji ltar ngas sngon srid pa rnams su 'khor ba na 'khor pa ri tshe//
159b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can tshad med pa snyed la rgya cher phan btags nas/ thams cad rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de bzhin du khyed cag thams cad kyis kyang nan tan brtson 'grus
160a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis nges par 'byung ba yongs su gnyer nas bag med par mi bya'o/ / de nas 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pa dang / thams cad kyis byams padang snying rje chen
160a2(rgyud 'bum): pos thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba spyad na/ gdod bla na med pa'i byang chub rtogs shing mngon du byed par 'gyur bar khong du chud par gyur pas/ shin tu dang ba'i
160a3(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis mngon par yid ches shing rab tu dga' bar gyur to/ / gser 'od dam po mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyi le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//
160a4(rgyud 'bum): / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo bam po bcu pa// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor mang po rnams la lha'i bu stong phrag bcu
160a5(rgyud 'bum): po de dag gi sngon gyi rgyu dang rkyen bkas bshad nas/ yang byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo dang / 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i lam spyod
160a6(rgyud 'bum): pa na/ chu dang zas sbyin pa btang nas nya de dag gi srog la phan btags pa 'ba' zhig byas pa ma yin gyi/ shin tu 'phangs pa'i lus kyang yongs su btang ste/ de'i rgyu dang rkyen gang yin pa lhan cig blta bar
160a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha'i gnas kyi steng dang / lha'i gnas kyi 'og thams cad na mchog tu rnam par rgyal zhing mchog tu btsum pa
160b1(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer brgya stong du mas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gsal bar mdzad pa/ mkhyen pa thams cad phun gsum tshogs par gyur pa/ yon tan yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa des/ dge slong rnams
160b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'khor mang po rnams dang thabs cig tu pan tsa la'i ljongs su byon nas/ nags tshal sa gzhi shin tu mnyam la tsher ma rnams med pa/ me tog mchog dam pa dang rtswa 'jam po ngag gis kun tu khyab par
160b3(rgyud 'bum): bkram par gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis shing 'di'i drung du nga'i ched du stan thongs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bka'
160b4(rgyud 'bum): mnyan nas gdan bting ngo / / bting zin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gangan bshams lags na/ 'phags pas dus mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom
160b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das gdan gyi steng du skyil mo krung bcas te sku drang por bsrang nas/ yang dag pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag ste bzhugs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag sngon dka' ba spyad pa'i byang
160b6(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi lus kyi ring bsrel blta bar 'dod dam/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bdag cag mthong bar mos lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgyas rab tu brgyan pa
160b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa'i phyag gis sa la bsnun pa dang / de'i tshe sa chen po rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur pas/ sogs shing bye bar gyur pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten rin po che sna tshogs kyi
161a1(rgyud 'bum): dra bas rab tu brgyan pa zhig mngon par 'phags te byung ba 'khor mang po kun gyis mthong nas/ ngo mtshar che ba'i bsam pa skyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhes
161a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag mdzad nas/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba mdzad de slar gdan la bzhugs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis mchod rten 'di sgo phye zhig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sgo
161a3(rgyud 'bum): phye ste/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i sgrom bu rin po che mchog dam pas brgyan pa zhig mthong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rin po che sna bdun las bgyis
161a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sgrom bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa zhog gda' lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis sgo phye zhig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bka' mnyan
161a5(rgyud 'bum): nas phye ba dang / ring bsrel kha dog dung dang me tog ku mu da 'dra ba zhig mthong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ sgrom gyi nang na ring srol kha dog dam pa gzhan las khyad par du
161a6(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa zhig gda' lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis skyes bu chen po'i rus pa 'di khyer te shog cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ring bsrel de blangs
161a7(rgyud 'bum): nas bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes nas/ dge slong rnams la khyed kyis dka' ba spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi ring bsrel bzhag pa la ltos shig ces bka' stsal
161b1(rgyud 'bum): nas tshags su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan mchog ldan blo// rab dpa' brtson pas pha rol phyin drug rdzogs// rtag sgom byang chub phyir ni rgyun chad med// btang snyoms che brtan sems
161b2(rgyud 'bum): ngal ba med/ dge slong dag khyed cag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi lus la gus pas phyag byos shig/ ring bsrel 'di ni tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi dri tshad med pa dag
161b3(rgyud 'bum): gos yongs su gtugs pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing mchog dam pa yin pas shin tu phrad par dka' 'o// de nas dge slong rnams dang / 'khor mang po rnams kyis sems rtse gcig tu gus pas thal me sbyar te/
161b4(rgyud 'bum): mgo bos ring bsrel la phyag byas nas/ sngon chad nam yang de lta bu ma byung ngo zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mdun du 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
161b5(rgyud 'bum): la phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen po ni thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa lags/ sems can kun gyis bsnyen
161b6(rgyud 'bum): bkur bgyi ba lags na/ rgyu dang rkyen gang gi slad du lus kyi rus pa 'di la phyag mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bong ni rus pa 'di'i rgyus myur du
161b7(rgyud 'bum): med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog par sad rgyas par gyur pas/ sngon gyi drin bsab pa'i phyir ring ngas phyag byas pa yin no// yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ ngas deng khyod dang
162a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor mang po'i the tsom dang som nyi gcod pa'i phyir/ ring bsrel 'di'i sngon gyi rgyu dang rkyen gang yin pa yang dag par bshad kyis/ khyed cag legs par yid la byos la sems rtse gcig
162a2(rgyud 'bum): tu nyon cig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bdag cag shin tu thos par mos lags na/ rnam par phye ste bkas bshad du gsol/ kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi che/ yul gcig gi rgyal po
162a3(rgyud 'bum): shong rta chen po zhes bya ba shin tu phyug cing no mang ba/ bang mdzod rgyas pa/ dmag gi dpung rab tu dpa' ba/ mang po kun gyis bkur zhing ngag nyan pa/ rtag par yang dag par chos kyis skye bo 'dul ba/ mi rnam
162a4(rgyud 'bum): dang zhing rgyas pa/ phyir rgol ba'i dgra med pa zhig yod de/ btsun mo dam pa la byad bzhin shin tu sdug cing mdzes pa/ mang po kun gyis blta bar mos pa'i bu gsum yod de/ bu chen po'i ming ni sgra chen po zhes
162a5(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / bu 'bring po'i mong ni lha chen po zhes bya'o// bu tha chungs kyi mong ni sems can chen po zhes bya'o// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po de rtse zhing ltad mo lta ba'i phyir/ ri dang nag kun tu blta bar chas pa dang /
162a6(rgyud 'bum): gsum po de'ang phyi bzhin du dong ngo // me tog dang 'bras bu btsal ba'i phyir pha spangs te kun tu 'khyam pa las/ 'od ma'i tsha la chen po zhig tu phyin te ngal bsos so// de nas rgyal bu chen pos 'di skad du deng bdag ni
162a7(rgyud 'bum): sems skrag cing 'jigs par gyur na/ nags tshal 'dir gcan gzan ma rungs pa dag gis bdag cag gsod par mi 'gyur ram zhes smras so// rgyal bu 'bring pos yang 'di skad du/ bdag ni rang gi lus
162b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang po nas 'phangs pa med na/ snying du sdug pa 'di dang 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal zhig 'byung du dogs so zhes smras so// rgyal bu tha chungs kyis phu bo gnyis la smras pa/ 'di ni lha dang drang srong 'dug pa'i
162b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ bdag la 'jigs dngangs 'bral ba'i mya ngan med// lus sems kun khyab dga' ba skyes pas na// khyad par 'phags pa'i yon tan 'thob par 'gyur/ de'i tshe rgyal bu rnams so so nas rang gi sems
162b3(rgyud 'bum): la ci bsams pa'i dngos po dag smras nas/ mthar gyis mdun du song ba las/ stag mo zhig bu bdun btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa/ bu rnams kyis bskor bas bkres pa dang skom pa dag gis rab tu gzir
162b4(rgyud 'bum): ga lus rid cing nyam chung la/ ring por mi thogs par 'tsho bar 'gyur ba zhig mthong ba dang / rgyal bu chen pos 'di skad du/ kye ma stag mo 'di ni bu btsas nas zhag bdu lon te/ bu bdun gyis yongs su
162b5(rgyud 'bum): bskor bas zas btsal ba'ang mi khom ste/ bkres pa dang skom pa dag gis rab tu gzir bas gdon mi za bar bu rnams za bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so// rgyal bu sems can chen pos smras pa/ stag 'di dag
162b6(rgyud 'bum): rtag par zas ji lta bu zhig za/ rgyal bu chen pos smras pa/ stag dang seng ge phar spyad rnams/ sha khrag dron mo 'ba' zhig za// de bas gzhan pa'i zas skom gyis/ 'di ni nyam chung sel mi nus// rgyal bu
162b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bring pos de skad smras pa thos pa dang / 'di skad ces smras so// stag mo 'di ni ring cing nyam chung la/ bkres skom gyis nyon mongs pas srog gi lhag ma cung zad tsam zhig lus na/ bdag cag gis ji ltar
163a1(rgyud 'bum): rnyed par dka' ba'i zas dang skom btsal bar nus/ su zhig ni 'di dag gi ched du rang gi lus dang srog spangs nas/ bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngam sel bar byed/ rgyal bu che
163a2(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ spang bar dka' ba thams cad kyi nang na bdag gi lus las lhag pa gang yang med do// rgyal bu sems can chen pos smras pa/ deng bdag cag ni so so nas nang gi lus la sred cing mngon par zhen pa dang //
163a3(rgyud 'bum): shes rab med pas gzhan rnams la lan 'dogs mi nus kyis/ skyes bu dam pa dag ni snying rje chen po'i sems dang ldan pas rtag par gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ rang gi lus khyad du bsad nas sems
163a4(rgyud 'bum): can rnams la phan 'dogs par byed/ gzhan yang 'di snyam du bdog gi lus 'di ni tshe rabs brgya stong du ma'i bar du don med par rul zhing myags te bor bas phan pa ci'ang byas pa med na/ ci'i phyir deng
163a5(rgyud 'bum): mchil snabs bzhin du yongs su spangs nas/ bkres pa dag gis nyen pa'i sdug bsngal sel bar mi byed snyam mo// de'i tshe rgyal bu de dag tshig de lta bu dag smras nas/ so so nas byams shing brtse ba'i sem
163a6(rgyud 'bum): bskyed de/ stag mo nyam chung ba de la mig mi g.yeng bar bltas nas/ ring zhig tu bskor te cig car spangs nas dong ngo // de nas rgyal bu sems can chen po 'di snyam du/ bdag gis lus srog btang ba
163a7(rgyud 'bum): dus ni deng yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis yun ring lus 'di rab bzung yang / mi gtsang mnam la rnag 'dzag yid mi 'ong // yo byad gos zas shing rta glang po rta/ nor dang rin chen rim gro byas kyang ni/
163b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing 'jig chos ngo bo nyid mi rtag/ rtag tshol dgang dka' srung bar rab tu dka'// rtag tu mchod cing rim gro byas kyang ni// nams kyang bdag 'dor byas pa'i drin mi shes// gzhan yang lus 'di ni mi
163b2(rgyud 'bum): brtan pas bdag la phan pa med pa/ 'jigs su rung bas dgra dang 'dra ba/ mi gtsang bas lung dang mtshungs pa yin pas/ deng bdag gi lus 'dis yangs shing rgya che ba'i las mngon par bsgrubs nas/
163b3(rgyud 'bum): skye shi'i rgya mtshor gru gzings chen po byas te/ 'khor ba yongs su spangs nas nges par 'byung ba thob par bya'o snyam mo// gzhan yang 'di snyam du gal te lus 'di spangs par gyur na/ 'di nyid 'bras dang /
163b4(rgyud 'bum): nang ma rungs pa tshad med pa dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa brgya stong du ma spangs pa yin no// lus 'di ni bshang gci 'ba' zhig dang ldan pa/ chu bur lta bur mi brtan pa/ srin bu mang po 'dus pa/ rtsa rgyus
163b5(rgyud 'bum): rus pa phan tshun 'brel ba/ shin tu yongs su skyo bar bya ba'i nyes dmigs dang bcas pa yin pas/ de'i phyir deng bdag gos lus yongs su spangs nas/ bla na med pa mthar phyin pa mya ngan las 'das pa yongs
163b6(rgyud 'bum): su btsal te/ mya ngan gyi nyes pa dang / mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal dang / 'khrug pa gtan du spangs nas/ 'khor ba rgyun bcang de nyes pa rnams spangs nas/ ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi stobs kyis phun
163b7(rgyud 'bum): sum tshogs par bsgoms nas/ bsod nams brgya stong mang pos brgyan pa/ thams cad mkhyen par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags pa'i chos kyi sku shin tu gya nom pa thob par bya'o//
164a1(rgyud 'bum): thob par gyur nas kyang sems can rnams la chos kyi sman tshad med pa gtang bar bya'o snyam mo/ de'i tshe rgyal bu de shin tu brtul ba'i dpa' bsan dang skyon lam chen po btab nas/ rje
164a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i bsam pas sems brtas shing 'phel bar gyur kyang / phu bo gnyis skrag cing dngangs pas bar chad kyi bgegs byas nas smon pa mi 'grub par dogs pas/ phu bo gnyis la gcen gnyis slar gshegs
164a3(rgyud 'bum): shig/ bdag re zhig slar mchis so zhes smras so// de nas rgyal bu sems can chen po slar tshal gyi nang du zhugs nas/ stag mo'i drung du phyin te/ gos phud nas 'od ma'i steng du gzhag ste smon lam 'di skad bta
164a4(rgyud 'bum): pobadag ni chos mkhas sems can kun gyi phyir/ / bla med byang chub gnas ni gnyer bas na// snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed g.yo ba med// skye bos 'phangs pa'i lus ni gtong bar byed// byang chub nang med gdung
164a5(rgyud 'bum): ba med pas na/ / blo dang ldan pa kun gyis rab tu mos// khams gsum sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i sems can kun// deng bdag drangs nas bde la 'god par shog/ de nas rgyal bus tshig de skad smras nas/ stag
164a6(rgyud 'bum): mo ltogs pa'i mdun du lus bor te nyal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de'i byams pa dang snying rje'i gzi byin gyi mthus stag mos ci'ang byed ma nus so// byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu mthong ba dang
164a7(rgyud 'bum): rimathon po'i steng du 'dzegs te lus bor nas 'di snyam du stag mo 'di ni/ nyam chung zhing rmya bas bdag la bza' bar mi nus so snyam du bsams nas langs te/ mtshon btsal yang ma rnyed pas/ 'od ma
164b1(rgyud 'bum): skam po'i tshal bas lkog mar khrag phyung ste/ mthar gyis stag mo ri drung du nye bar bsnyen pa dang / de ri tshe 'di ltar rlung gos chu bskyod pa bzhin du sa chen po'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur/ nyi ma'ang
164b2(rgyud 'bum): sgra gcan gyis bsgribs pa bzhin du 'od dang mi ldan pas/ phyogs bcu kun tu mun nag tu gyur nas/ lha rnams kyis kyang me tog dam pa dang spos mchog dam pa'i char yang mngon par phab pas/ tshal gyi nang du
164b3(rgyud 'bum): kun tu khyab cing gang bar gyur to/ / de'i tshe bar snang la gnas pa'i lha tshogs mang po rnams kyis dngos po de lta bu mthong ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i sems bskyed nas/ sngon chad nam yang 'di lta bu ma byung ngo /
164b4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bsngags pa brjod do// thams cad kyis skyes bu chen po legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ skyes bu chen po yongs su skyob pa snying rje'i sem bskyed nas/
164b5(rgyud 'bum): bu gcig bzhin du sems can mnyam par lta// rab dpa' dga' chen sems la 'jungs med pas// lus spangs 'phongs skyob bsod nams dpag par dka'// nges par rtag bde gya nom gnas phyin nas/
164b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba 'ching ba mang po gtan du spong // ring por mi thogs byang chub 'bras thob nas// nyer zhi bde ba skye med mngon rtogs 'gyur// de'i tshe stag mo ltogs pa des byang chub sems dpa'i lkog ma
164b7(rgyud 'bum): nas khrag zag pa mthong ba dang khrag bldags te/ sha ma lus par zos pas/ rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byas so// de nas rgyal bu chen pos sa g.yos pa mthong ba dang / nu bo la smras pa
165a1(rgyud 'bum): sa chen ri krung kun kyang rab tu g.yos/ / phyogs kun mun nag nyi ma'i 'od mi ldan// lha yi me tog lhung bas mkha' khyab nas// 'don nu bos nges par lus spangs rtags//
165a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bu 'bring pos phu bos de skad smras pa thos pa dang tshotshigs su bcad de smras pa/ stag mo lus ltogs shin tu nyam chung ba// bkres gzir bu phrug bza' dogs mthong nas ni// sems can chen po smre
165a3(rgyud 'bum): ba bdag thos nas/ / nu bos lus btang deng bdag the tshom 'tshal// de nas rgyal bu gnyis mya ngan dang sdug bsngal chen po skyes pas/ smre sngags bton te ngus nas/ gnyis ka lhan cig tu slar stag
165a4(rgyud 'bum): mo'i drung du phyin te/ nu bo'i gos no 'od ma'i yal ga la bkal/ rus pa dang sgra ni kun tu 'thor/ khrag babs pas ni rdzab tu gyur nas/ sa gzhi kun tu khyab par gyur pa mthong ba dang / brgyal nas
165a5(rgyud 'bum): rang gi lus kyi gzung ma nus pas/ rus pa'i drung du lus brdabs te/ ring zhig lon nas dran pa slar thob pa dang / langs nas lag pa bteg ste rab tu ngus nas smre sngags bton pa/ bdag cag nu
165a6(rgyud 'bum): bopo byad sdug mdzes/ / pha ma gnyis ka lhag par byams// ci phyir lhan cig phyir byung nas// lus spangs slar ni ldog ma gyur// gal te pha mas dris gyur na// bdag cag lan ni ji skad gdab// lhan cig
165a7(rgyud 'bum): srog ni btang bla na/ / rang gi lus ni tsi phyir bzhag/ de nas rgyal bu gnyis smre sngags bton te ngus nas/ yid la gcags bzhin du mthar gyis spangs te dong ngo // de'i tshe rgyal bu tha chud kyis 'ang
165b1(rgyud 'bum): / yog 'khor nam phan tshun gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ rgyal bu gang na yod pa lhan cig btsal ba'i rigs so zhes smras par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po'i btsun mo yang tog mthon po'i steng du nyal ba'i rma
165b2(rgyud 'bum): lam na/ ltas ngan pa'i mtshan ma mthong ba 'di lta ste/ nu mganyis gzhan gyis bcad pa dang / so lhung ba dang / phug ron gyi phrug gu gsum thob pa las/ gcig ni khras khyer/ gnyis ni dngas
165b3(rgyud 'bum): shing skrag par gyur pa dag mthong bar gyur to/ / sa g.yos pa'i tshe btsun mo sad de/ sems la mya ngan chen po skyes nas 'di skad du smras so// ci'i phyir deng ni sa chen rab tu g.yos// chu klung nags tshal ljon
165b4(rgyud 'bum): shing kun kyang 'gul/ / nyi ma 'od med g.yos shing bsgribs pa 'dra// mig 'gul nu g.yo sngon chad yong ma 'dra// snying la mdas phog bzhin du sdug bsngal gzir// lus kun rab tu g.yo zhing bde ba ci yang
165b5(rgyud 'bum): med/ / bdag gis rmi lam ltas ngan mthong bas na// nges par sngon med ltas ngan dngos po yod// btsun mo'i nu ma gnyis las nu zho zags pa dang / 'di snyam du 'di ni gdon mi za bar ltas ngan gyi dngos po
165b6(rgyud 'bum): ston pa yin no snyam mo/ / de'i tshe nang 'khor ma zhig phyi rol gyi mi rnams rgyal bu btsal ba las da dung ma rnyed do zhes zer ba thos pa dang / sems la shin tu skrag cing 'jigs pa skyes nas pho brang gi nang du song ste/
165b7(rgyud 'bum): btsun mo la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mo mkhyen lags sam/ smad rol gyi mi rnams las kun tu so sor btsal ba las/ da dung ma rnyed ces mchi ba thos lags so// de nas btsun mo des tshig de skad smras pa thos
166a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / mya ngan chen po skyes pas smre sngags bton te/ mig mchims gang bzhin du rgyal po'i drung du phyin nas/ rgyal po la 'di skad gsol to// lha chen po bdag gis slang rol gyi mo rnams
166a2(rgyud 'bum): las 'di skad du/ bdag gi bu sdug tha chung stor ces mchi ba thos lags so// rgyal pos tshig de thos pa dang shin tu skrag par gyur pas/ brnangs bzhin du smre tshog 'di skad du kyi hung sdug bsngal lo// deng nga'i
166a3(rgyud 'bum): bu yid du 'ong ba stor bar gyur to zhes smras nas/ mchi ma phyis te btsun mo la spo ba bskyed nas 'di skad du bzhin bzang khyod mya ngan ma byed cig/ da deng lhan cig phyir byung ste bu sdug btsal bar bya'o zhes smras nas/
166a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po btsun mo dang skye bo'i tshigs mang po dang lhan cig tu grong khyer nas phyir byung ste/ so sor gyes te phyogs kun tu btsal ba las/ ring po ma lon par blon po chen po zhig nye bar 'ongs te/ rgyal po la 'di
166a5(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsol to/ / lha rgyal bu bzhugs zhes thos pas/ thugs ngan mi mdzad du gsol/ rgyal bu tha chung ni da dung mi gda' lags so// rgyal pos tshig de thos pa dang smre sngags bton nas/ 'di skad
166a6(rgyud 'bum): du kyi hud nga'i bu yid du 'ong ba stor bar gyur to zhes smras par gyur to/ / dang po bu yod chen dga' ba chung // phyis ni bu stor tshe na sdug bsngal che// gal teng bu srog ni slar thob na/ nga yi lus
166a7(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal ci yang med/ / btsun mos de skad thos pa dang / dper na mangs log pa bzhin du mya ngan gyis kun tu dkris par gyur pas/ smre tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gi bu gsum 'khor/
166b1(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas par ni// nags tshal dong ste lhan cig rtse ba las/ bu sdug tha chung gcig pu ma 'ongs pas// nges par bral ba'i ltas ngan dngos po yod 'gyur ba// de'i 'og tu yang blon po 'bring
166b2(rgyud 'bum): po rgyal po'i drung du nye bar 'ongs pa las/ rgyal pos blon po de la bu sdug gang na 'dug ces smras pa las/ blon po 'bring pos de yid la gcags te ngus pas/ lkog ma dang lce'ang bskams nas
166b3(rgyud 'bum): tshig 'byin cing lan 'debs kyang ma nus pa dang / btsun mos 'di skad ces dris so// bu chung da ltar gang na myur du smros// bdag gi lus gdung kun tu bsregs par gyur// myos 'khrugs rmongs pas nang gi
166b4(rgyud 'bum): sems nyid stor/ / bdag gi brang ni de ring gas snyam byed// de nas blon po 'bring pos rgyal bus lus yongs su btang ba'i dngos po de dag zhib tu rgyal po la gsol te shes par byas pa dang / rgyal po dang
166b5(rgyud 'bum): btsun mos gtam de thos nas/ smre zhing mchi mas brnangs bzhin du lus yongs su btang ba'i sa phyogs su myur zhing rings par dong ste/ 'od ma'i tshal byang chub sems dpas lus yongs su btang ba'i gnas su
166b6(rgyud 'bum): byin nas/ rus pa rnams kun tu 'thor ba mthong ba dang / cig car sa la 'gyel te shi ba dang 'dra bar brgyal bar gyur pas// de dper na rlung drag pos ljon shing chen po 'gyel pa bzhin du sems rmongs shing dran
166b7(rgyud 'bum): pa stor bas shes pa ci'ang med par gyur to/ / de nas blon po chen po la sogs pas chus kun tu gtor ba dang / rgyal po dang btsun mo ring zhig lon nas gdod dran pa thob par gyur to// de nas lag pa bteg ste 'dug
167a1(rgyud 'bum): nas smre tshig smras pa/ kyi hud bu sdug mdzes pa'i mtshan ldan pa/ ci'i phyir 'tsho ba'i sdug bsngal sngar 'ongs gtses// gal te khyod kyi mdun du bdag shi na// 'di 'dra'i sdug
167a2(rgyud 'bum): bsngal mthong bar ga la 'gyur/ / de nas btsun mo myos shing brgyal ba khad kyis zhi bar gyur nas kyang / skra long long por gyur te/ lag pa gnyis kyis brang brdungs nas/ nya skam sa la 'gyel ba
167a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du sa la 'gre ste/ ba bu stor ba bzhin du ngus nas smye tshige smras pa/ bdag gi bu ni sus gtubs na// rus pa lhag ma sa la gtor// bdag gyi bu sdug stor bas na// mya ngan sme ba rang mi
167a4(rgyud 'bum): theg/ kyi hung bu ni sus bsad na// mya ngan dngos po 'di 'dra mthong // bdag snying rdo rje ma yin nam// ci yi phyir nags ma gyur// bdag gi rmi lam nu ma gnyis// gzhan dag gis ni bcad
167a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / so rnams lhung bar mthong bas na// deng ni sdug bsngal chen po myong // phug ron phrug gu gsum las ni// gcig ni khras khyer mthong bas na// deng ni bu sdug stor gyur pas// ltas
167a6(rgyud 'bum): ngan ston la mi bden med/ / de nas rgyal po chen po de btsun mo dang / bu gnyis dang bcas par brtse bar gtugs te ngus nas rgyan thams cad bkrol te/ skye bo'i tshogs mang po dang lhan cig tu byang
167a7(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpas bzhag pa'i lus kyi ring bsrel bsdus te/ mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag go// kun dag po khyod kyis 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' de'i rang bsrel yin par
167b1(rgyud 'bum): rig par bya'o/ / yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ nga sngon 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i tshe na'ang/ sems can dmyal ba
167b2(rgyud 'bum): dag yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas la sogs pa'i 'gro ba lnga po dag tu'ang rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bskyabs nas phan btags te/ nges par 'byung ba thob par byas nas/ da ltar nyon mongs
167b3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad zad nas bag chags kyi lhag ma med de/ lha dang mi'o ston par gyur nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pas/ sems can re re'i phyir yang bskal pa mang po'i bar du/ sems can dmyal ba dang /
167b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas gzhan dag tu gnas te/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang du blangs nas skye shi dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba thob par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don
167b5(rgyud 'bum): de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe// bskal pa grang med tshad med snyed/ res 'ga' yul gyi rgyal po byas// res 'ga' rgyal bu byas pa na// rtag par sbyin pa che ba
167b6(rgyud 'bum): btang / / shin tu 'phangs pa'i lus btang bas// 'khor ba las ni nges byung ste// byang chub dam pa phyin par smon// sngon byung yul chen zhig tu ni// yul bdag shing rta che zhes bya// rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bya ba/
167b7(rgyud 'bum): rtag par sbyin gtong ser sna med// de la phu bo gnyis yod de// sgra chen lha chen zhes bya ba// gsum po lhan cig phyir bung ste// mthar gyis ri dang nags tshal phyin// stag mo bkres pas nyen mthong nas// 2dra
168a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dra'i sems ni bskyed par gyur/ / stag mo bkres mes rab bsregs kyang // gzhan bzar rung ba ci yang med// skyes chen 'di 'dra mthong nas ni// de yis bu ni zos dogs phyir// chags
168a2(rgyud 'bum): med lus ni rab btang nas/ / bu bskyabs rmas pa med par byas// sa chen dang ni ri rnams kyang // dus gcig thams cad rab tu g.yos// chu klung rgya mtsho shin tu 'khrug/ rlabs chu dag ni gyen du 'bab// gnams
168a3(rgyud 'bum): 'od ni stor bas na/ / mun nag ci yang mthong ba med// nags tshal dgon pa'i gcan gzan rnams// 'bur rgyug rnams ni yongs su spangs/ bu gnyis ci'i phyir ma log ces// mya ngan brtse ba'i sdug bsngal
168a4(rgyud 'bum): skyes/ / g.yog 'khor mang po rnams dang ni// nags tshal kun tu yongs su btsal// spun gnyis lhan cig rab 'grogs te// ri zab nags su phyin nas ni// phyogs bzhir bltas kyang mi ma mthong //
168a5(rgyud 'bum): stag mo mthong ba'i gnas stong du// ma dang bu bdun bcas par ni// thams cad khrag gis kha bskus dang // rus pa stag mo sla yi rnams// sa la kun tu 'thor ba mthong // gzhan yang khrag ni
168a6(rgyud 'bum): zags pa rnams/ / 'od ma'i tshal kun 'bags pa dag/ phu bo gnyis kyis mthong nas ni// sems la 'jigs skrag chen po skyes// gnyis ka brgyal nas sa la 'gyel// 'khrugs myos
168a7(rgyud 'bum): ci yang mi dran pas/ / sa rdul dag gis lus kun gos// rnam shes drug ni dran pa nyams// rgyal bu g.yog ni mang po rnamaso// de tshe sems la mya ngan skyes// chu gtor dran pa thob nas
168b1(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / lag bteg skad ches phyung ste dus// byang chub sems dpa'i lus btang ste// byams pa'i ma ni pho brang nang // bud med lnga brgya rnams dang ni// lhan cig longs spyod myong ba las// btsun mo
168b2(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i nu ma gnyis/ / rang gi nu zho zags gyur pas// lus kun khab kyis phug pa bzhin// shin tu sdug bsngal rab tu byed// bu stor 'du shes skyes pas na// mya ngan zug rngu sems la zug/
168b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po zhes byas nas// sdug bsngal dngos po de dag bshad// cho nges sme ba mi bzod pas// brtse ba'i skad kyis rgyal po la// rgyal po chen po mkhyen par mdzod// deng bdag sdug bsngal
168b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po skyes/ / nu bo gnyis ni rang byung bas// bkab kyang bsam pa bzhin ma grub// khab kyis lus kun phug pa bzhin// mya ngan brang ni gas la thug/ bdag ni g.yar lam snga ltas ngan//
168b5(rgyud 'bum): nges par bu sdug skor bar gyur// lhas ni bdag gi srog skyobs la// bu ni gum gson mkhyen par mdzod// g.yar lam phug ron gsum mthong ba// chung ngu de ni bu sdug lags// zas ni phrogs
168b6(rgyud 'bum): te 'tshal bas na/ / mya ngan rdzogs par gsol ba dka'// deng bdag mya ngan mtshor bying bas// 'chi bar 'gyur ba ring mi thogs// bu srog mi gson glo ba chung // myur ba nyid du btsal bar gsol/
168b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang slad rol ma rnams las// bu chung ma rnyed thos pas na// deng bdag sems ni rab mi bde// lhas ni bdag la brtse bar mdzod// btsun mos de skad smras nas ni/ lus btebs la rab tu brdabs
169a1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu brtse bas sems brgyal myos/ / rab rmongs shes pa ci yang med// nang 'khor bud med btsun mo de// brgyal te sa la 'gyel mthong nas// skad cher phyung ste rab tu ngus/
169a2(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan dngangs skrag gnas kyang stor// rgyal pos tshig de thos pas na// mya ngan rang nyid gzung ma nus// blon po thams cad bkug nas ni// bu sdug tshol bar yongs su bkye// thams cad grong khyer phyir
169a3(rgyud 'bum): byung ste/ / de dag de dag kun tu btsal// ngus nas mi ni mang po la// rgyal bu gang na yod ces smras// da ltar gson nam 'on te shi// gang du song ba su yis shes// ji ltar byas na mthong gyur nas//
169a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag mya ngan bsal bar 'gyur// skye bo mang po thams cad kun// rgyal bu de ni shi zer bas// thos pa thams cad rab tu gdung // smre sngags sdug bsngal brjod par dka'// de tshe rgyal po shing
169a5(rgyud 'bum): che/ / cho nges smras nas stan las langs// btsun mo'i drung du nyer song ste// de yi lus la chus kyang gtor// btsun mo chus ni gtor bas na// ring zhig lon nas dran pa thob// rab smras rgyal po la
169a6(rgyud 'bum): zhus pa/ / bdag bu da ltar gang na mchis// rgyal pos btsun mo la bsgo ba// ngas ni pho nya mang bkye ste// phyogs bzhir rgyal bu tshol bcug na// da dung gtam skyel yongs ma 'ongs// rgyal pos
169a7(rgyud 'bum): btsun mo yang bsgo ba/ / khyod ni mya ngan ma byed par// re zhig rang nyid bde bar byos// lhan cig phyir byung brtsal bar bya// de nas rgyal po btsun mo bcas// bzhon pa zhon nas mdun du chas/
169b1(rgyud 'bum): sme ba'i skad kyis cho nges btab// gdung sems me ni 'bar ba 'dra// ya rabs ma rabs brgya stong rnams// rgyal po'i rjes su grong khyer byung // brtse ba'i du sgra mi chad par// so sor rgyal bu yongs su//
169b2(rgyud 'bum): btsa la// rgyal pos bu sdug btsal ba'i phyir// mig gis phyogs bzhir bltas pa las// sla bshig khrag gis lus bskus te// lus kun rdul gyis gos pa dang // ngus nas mdun bcad 'ong ba
169b3(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / mi zhig kyang ni mthong bar gyur// rgyal pos ltas ngan de mthong nas// lhag par mya ngan skyes par gyur// rgyal pos lag pa gnyis bteg nas// brtse bas ngus te bkag ma nus// thog mar blon po chen
169b4(rgyud 'bum): po zhig/ rings stabs rgyal po'i drung 'ongs nas// rgyal po de la 'di skad smras// lnga ni thugs ngan ma mdzad gsol// lha yi thugs brtse sras bu de// da dung rnyed par ma gyur kyang // ring por mo thogs phyin
169b5(rgyud 'bum): par mchi/ / lha ni thugs ngan mi mdzad gsol// rgyal po yang ni song ba las// blon po 'bring po 'ongs pa mthong // blon po rgyal po'i drung 'ongs nas// ngus te rgyal la 'di skad smras// rgyal bu gnyis ni
169b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa yang / / mya ngan zhugs kyis yongs su gdungs// rgyal bu tha chungs gang lags pa// de ni mi rtag pa yis med// bu btsas stag mo ltogs pa zhig/ bu 'tshal snyam pa gzigs nas ni/
169b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bu sems can chen po yis// thugs rje chen po'i sems bskyed de// bla med lam ni gnyer ba dang // mang po thams cad bzla ba'i slad// byang chub mchog la 'du shes bcings// shin tu ba
170a1(rgyud 'bum): / yangs rgya mtsho bzhin// ri mtho rtse la 'dzegs nas ni// stag mo ltogs mdun sku yang bor// nyam chung 'tshal rngo ma thogs nas// 'od mas mgur du khrag phyung bas// rgyal bu
170a2(rgyud 'bum): sku ni 'tshal bas na/ / sku gdung lhag ma tsam zhig lus// de tshe rgyal po btsun mor bcas// de skad thos nas brgyal bar gyur// sems ni mya ngan mtshor bying ste// nyon mongs me yis rab tu bsregs/
170a3(rgyud 'bum): blon pos tsan dan chu dan gis// rgyal po btsun mor gtor bas na// cig car langs nas rab tu ngus// lag bteg zang dag la yang brdungs// blon po chung ngu 'ong nas ni// rgyal po de la 'di skad spras/
170a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi rgyal bu gnyis po ni// tshal na brgyal bar gyur pa mthong // bdag gis chab grang gtor bas na// dran pa cung zad thob par gyur// phyogs bzhi dag ni gzigs pas na// rab tu 'bar me kun khyam
170a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dra/ / skad cig bzhengs kyang slar yang 'gyel// cho nges bdag nyid 'dzin mi spyod// phyag bteg brtse ba'i tshig dag gis// gcung gi ye mtshan bsngags par mdzad// rgyal pos de skad thos nas kyang //

170a7(rgyud 'bum): da ltar bu gnyis lus par gyur pa yang // mya ngan me yis rab sregs ston yang mongs// bdag deng ri drung dag tu myur song la// spro bskyed srog gi lhag ma bsrung bar bya// de nas bzhon 'on lam
170b1(rgyud 'bum): du myur zhugs nas/ / rtse gcig sems kyis lus spangs brag drung song / khu gnyis yid gcags brang brdungs spyod tshul nyams// 'gro bzhin du ba dag dang lam du 'phrang // phams pad blangs rgyu

171a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhing khams nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lpags nas yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas sems rtse gcig

171b2(rgyud 'bum): mnyen pad+ma dag dang mtshungs/ / mtshan mchog dam pa tshad med kun tu bkod// mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis rab brgyan te// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs// 'od zer rab gsal dpe zla yod
171b3(rgyud 'bum): ma mchis/ / dri bral dper na rnam dag zla nya 'dra// gsung dbyangs rab dang shin tu gya nom pas// seng ge bzhin du 'brug sgra sgrogs par mdzad// dam pa rnam brgyad dbang po mthun mdzad pas//
171b4(rgyud 'bum): ka la bing ka'i sgra sgrogs kun las 'phags// bsod nams brgya yi mtshan mchog sku brgyan pas// 'od zer phun tshogs dri ma yongs mi mnga'// mkhyen blo rab gsal dper na rgya mtsho 'dra// yon tan
171b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya chen nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs/ / yongs rdzogs 'od zer phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bkang // rkyen ni ji bzhin sems can sgrol bar mdzad// nyon mongs srid pa'i bag chags kun bsal nas/
171b6(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi sgron ma rtag par rgyun mi 'chad// thugs brtses sems can dag la phan 'dogs pas// da ltar slad ma'i dus che bde ba stsam// rtag par don mchog dam pa rab bshad nas// yang dag rab
171b7(rgyud 'bum): dben mya ngan 'das la 'god/ / bcom ldan bdud rtsi chos mchog rab bstan nas// bdud rtsi'i gya nom don ni sum mdzad pas// bdud rtsi'i grong khyer dag tu rab drangs nas// bdud rtsi
172a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dus ma byas kyi bde la 'god/ / rtag par 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po nas// sdug bsngal sem can tham cad thar par mdzad// de dag bde ba shul du rab bcud de// de bzhin bde ba/
172a2(rgyud 'bum): bsam gyis mi khyab stsom// bcom ldan yon tan rgya mtsho zab la yangs// dpe ni mang po dag gis rig mi 'gyur// rtag par kun la thugs rje cher gzigs pas// thabs mkhyen brtson 'grus
172a3(rgyud 'bum): dag ni rgyun mi 'chad/ / bcom ldan yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' ma mchis// bskal pa bye ba brgya stong bar du ni// lha mi thams cad lhan cig dpag bsams kyang // cha shas tsam yang rig par yong
172a4(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur/ / bdag cag sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho las// thigs pa 'ga' zhig bsngags pa brjod pa yi// bsod nams de dag skye dgu yongs bsngos nas// thams cad byang chub 'bras bu myur

172b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/
172b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ thub pa bsod nams brgya yi mtshan rdzogs shing // yon tan tshad ma mchis pas su
172b3(rgyud 'bum): rab brgyan/ / rnam dag rgya che sems can blta mos pas// nyi ma stong bzhin 'od kyis snang bar mdzad// kha dog mtha' yas 'od ni rab tu rgyas// rin chen pad+ma ri phung bzhin mtshan rnams mdzes//
172b4(rgyud 'bum): dper na gdugs shar nam mkha' snang bzhin bgyidade// kha dog dkar gsal gser gyi mdog kyang gnon// gser gyi ro bzhin 'od kyis gsal mdzad pas// zhing ni brgya stong mang po kun tu khyab
172b5(rgyud 'bum): sems can sdug bsngal tshad med zhi mdzad nas/ / bde ba dam pa mtha' yas stsal bar mdzad// mtshan rnams phun tshogs rnam dag rab mdzes pas// sems can blta mos skyo ba yongs ma mchis//
172b6(rgyud 'bum): dbu skra rab mnyan kha dog mthon mthing gnas// bung ba nag pos me tog sdug pa 'dra// dges dang btang snyoms chen po dag pas brgyan// byams dang thugs rje dag ni phun sum tshogs// mtsham
172b7(rgyud 'bum): dpe byad dam pa rab mdzes pa/ / byang chub yan lag chos las grub pa lags// bcom ldan bsod nams phan yon mang btang bas// de dag rtag tu bde ba chen po 'thob// yon tan dam pa sna tshogs rab
173a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pas/ / 'od kyis zhing ni brgya stong snang bar mdzad// bcom ldan 'od zer shin tu rdzogs pas na// dper na gdugs kyis nam mkha' kun khyab 'dra// bcom ldan ri rab bzhin
173a2(rgyud 'bum): du yon tan ldan/ / phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par ston par mdzad// bcom ldan gser zhal dam pa rab tu mdzes// tshems dkar gtams pa'i dung gi kha dog 'dra// bcom ldan zhal mdzes dpe zla
173a3(rgyud 'bum): yong ma mchis/ / smin mtshams pa spu rtag par g.yas su 'khyil// 'od mnyen dkar gsal chu shel dag dang mtshungs// dper na zla nya nam mkha'i khams gnas 'dra// bcom ldan 'das kyis//
173a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas/ thams cad la phan 'dogs
173a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur zhing / gang dag khong du ma chud pa de dag kyang rjes su mthun par rnal 'byor sgom pa la slob par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ byang chub sems
173a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas byang chub kyi shing gi lha mos kyang tshigs su bcad pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la
173a7(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan rnam dag blo la gus phyag 'tshal// yang dag chos gnyer blo la gus phyag 'tshal// chos sbyin spong ba'i blo la gus phyag 'tshal// rnam rtog mi mnga' blo la gus
173b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal/ / kye ma ngo mtshar bcom ldan mtha' yas spod// kye ma mthong dka' u dum pa ra 'dra// kye ma ngo mtshar rgya mtsho'i ro rgyal 'dra// kye ma ngo mtshar bde gshegs 'od tshad med// kye ma ngo mtshar
173b2(rgyud 'bum): kha sbyar smon lam che/ / kye ma ngo mtshar shAka ri'i nyi ma 'ongs// 'di 'dra'i mdo sde dkon mchog bkas bshad nas// brtse bas skye dgu rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad// thub pa rab dben dbang po mnyam
173b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jog pas/ / rab zhi mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer gshegs// rab dben gzungs kyi sgo la rab zhugs pas// rab dben spyod yul zab mo dag kyang mkhyen// rkang gnyis gtso bo rab dben
173b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pas na/ / nyan thos slob ma lus kyang de bzhin stong // chos rnams thams cad ngo bo ma mchis pas// sems can thams cad kyang ni stong zhing dben// bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan dran par bgyid//
173b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan mthong bar mos// bdag ni rtag tu gus sems bskyed pas na// rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdugs dang mjal// bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan phyag bgyis nas/
173b6(rgyud 'bum): rtag par zhal blta sems kyis mi spong smon// rab gdung du sems bar chad ma mchis pas// rtag par rim gro bgyid kyang skyo mi bgyid// bcom ldan thugs rje'i thugs ni rab bskyed nas// mdangs
173b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan zhal ni bdag gis rtag mthong mdzod/ / bcom ldan nyan thos dge 'dun rnam dag pas// rtag par lha mi dag ni bsgral bar bgyi// sku ni rang bzhin rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra// sgyu ma smig rgyu chab kyi
174a1(rgyud 'bum): zla ba mtshungs/ / bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das pa'i chos bshad nas// yon tan phung po thams cad bskyed par smon// bcom ldan rnam dag spyod yul byams pa dang // bcom ldan rnams/
174a2(rgyud 'bum): spyod yul bsam mi khyab// nyan thos rang rgyal gzhal bar mi 'gyur zhing // drang srong byang chub sems dpa'i dpog mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la thugs brtse nas// thugs rje chen po'i sku
174a3(rgyud 'bum): ni rtag mthong smon/ / las gsum ngal med byams gtso mchod nas ni// myur du nges 'byung yang dag mtha' phyogs smon// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bsngags pa brjod nas/ tshangs pa'i
174a4(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs kyis shing gi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo khyod kyis nga'i yang dag pa'i mi brdzun pa'i chos kyi sku rnam par dag pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/ bdag gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir
174a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mchog gya nom pa yang dag par bsgrags pa legs so legs so/ / bsod nams 'dis khyod myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / sems can
174a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mtshungs par rnal 'byor sgom par 'gyur la/ gang gis thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi sgor 'jug par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal

174b1(rgyud 'bum): thal mo sbyar nas yang dag pa'i tshig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ sku yang dag pa gser gyi
174b2(rgyud 'bum): kha dog dang ldan pa/ mgur dung gi dbyibs dang zhal zla ba nya ba lta bu/ spyan pad+ma sngon po dang mtshungs pa/ sgros dmar zhing bzang ba/ chu shel gyi kha dog dang 'dra/ shangs kyi dbyibs mtho zhing drang

174b4(rgyud 'bum): tu khyab pa/ 'dzam bu gser dang 'dra ba'i tshig gsung la nor cing 'khrul pa med pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yang dag par bstan nas byang chub rnam pa gsum gyi lam yang dag par 'byed pa/ thugs rtag
174b5(rgyud 'bum): tu rnam par dag cing thugs kyi mos pa'ang de bzhin du gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i gnas dang spyod yul rnams dag par gyur pa/ spyod lam ma lags pa spangs pas gshegs shing bzhugs
174b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dag la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba/ lo drug dka' ba mdzad nas chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum bskor ba/ sdug bsngal ba'i sems can yongs su bzlas nas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par mdzad pa

175a1(rgyud 'bum): pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa gang ci gsung yang rung ste/ rtag par sems can gyi don du 'gyur bar mdzad pa/ don ma mchis par mi gsung ba

175a3(rgyud 'bum): su de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi phyogs las cung zad tsam zhig bsngags pa brjod pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sbrang bus rgya mtsho chen po'i chab 'tshal ba dang 'dra yang / bsod nams de'i
175a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang gis sems can thams cad 'khor ba gtan du spangs nas/ bla na med pa'i lam mngon par grub par smon no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha mo spobs pa chen mo la bka' stsal pa/

175a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chos kyi sgo mo mngon par rtogs nas/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs par gyur te/ thams cad la rgya cher phan 'dogs par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal

175b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / lha dang mi rnams dang / 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ ngas bskal pa chen po tshad med grangs med pa nas/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba spyad

176a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs/ / da dung thugs rje de stobs kyis// mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid// bsod nams tshegs ni yongs rdzogs nas// ye shes tshogs ni rab tu bskyed// tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs

176a6(rgyud 'bum): bdud rnams dag ni pha ma mdzang srad/ / mang sde 'don srung 'dzin bgyid// nam mkha'i thogs bcas 'gyur yang srid// thogs bcas nam mkhar 'gyur srod kyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyis srung bzung ba

179a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba brgya stong dang yang thabs cig ste/ de dag kyang klu'i rgyal po chen po ltar dpal dang gzi brjid chen por ldan pas kun tu grags pa/ sbyin pa dang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa rtag tu
179a7(rgyud 'bum): srung bar mos pa dang / bzod pa dang brtson 'grus bskal pa grangs med par spyod pa/ bsam gtan kun las 'das pa'i dran pa mngon du gyur pa/ shes rab kyi sgo rnam par phye ba/ thabs mkhas pa shin tu bsgrub
179b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dbang dam pas rnam par rol cing mngon par shes pa dam pa brnyes pa/ gzungs chen po thob pa/ spobs pa mi zad pa/ nyon mongs pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ myur du rnam pa thams
179b2(rgyud 'bum): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob cing / bdud dang phyir rgol ba'i dpung 'joms pa/ chos kyi rnga chen po brdung bas mu stegs can thams cad 'dul zhing sems rnam par dang bskyed par byed pa/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor
179b3(rgyud 'bum): lo bskor nas lha dang mi rnams sgrol bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad brgyan par byed pa/ 'gro ba drug na gnas pa rnams la phan dam pa 'dogs pa/ ye shes chen po phun sum tshogs pa/ bzod
179b4(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po dang ldan pa/ byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems la gnas pa/ mthu chen po brtan pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing ma 'ongs pa'i mtha'
179b5(rgyud 'bum): klas pas gnas par yi dam chen po 'arlang ba/ sangs rgyas mang po la rgyu rnam par dag pa skyed pa/ dus gsum gyi chos mi skye bar bzod pa thob pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spod yul las shin tu 'das pa
179b6(rgyud 'bum): thabs mkhas pa chen pos 'jig rten 'dren pa/ ston pa chen pos bstan pa'i chos zab mo dgongs pa 'grel pa la mkhas pa/ stong pa nyid mngon du gyur pas the tsom yongs su chad par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub
179b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' thogs pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson pa dang / byang chub sems
180a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' mo gtong brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub
180a2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa chen pos bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhun po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho zab mo'i rgyal
180a3(rgyud 'bum): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems
180a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' lag na rin chen dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos chen mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'od bkod
180a5(rgyud 'bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od chen pos bkod dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims rnam dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam dag blo gros
180a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha' bzhin dang / byang chub sems dpa' smon lam chen po mi gtong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman sbyin pa dang
180a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs nad sal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman pa'i rgyal po dang byang chub sems dpa' dgar bas mthong ba'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan
180b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rnam dag 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen chos 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen grags dga' dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan
180b2(rgyud 'bum): chen grags pa mtha' med ston dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen seng ge'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chem kyu mchog sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen bkra shis dang / byang chub sems
180b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sprin chen rin chen dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen zla ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen skar ma'i 'od dang / byang chub
180b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sprin chen me'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen glog gi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen 'brug sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen shes rab kun tu 'char ba dang /
180b5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rnam dag char pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen me tog shing rgyal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chem ut+pa la'i dri dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin
180b6(rgyud 'bum): chetsheche rin po che tsan dan dri bsal sku dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen mun sel dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rab rib sel ba la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad
180b7(rgyud 'bum): med grangs med pa rnams so so nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag par 'jog pa las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan
181a1(rgyud 'bum): gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de nas yang yi tsa byi gzhon nu rnams la 'di lta ste/ gzhon nu seng ge'i 'od dang / gzhon nu seng ge'i blo gros dang / gzhon
181a2(rgyud 'bum): nu chos skyon dang / gzhon nu dbang po sbyin dang / gzhon nu 'od chen dang gzhon nu dpal chen dang / gzhon nu sangs rgyas skyong dang / gzhon nu chos skyong dang / gzhon nu dge 'dun skyong dang / gzhon
181a3(rgyud 'bum): nu rdo rje skyong dang / gzhon nu nam mkha' skyong dang / gzhon nu nam mkha' sgrogs dang / rin chen snying po gzhon nu dang bkra shis mchog gi snying po gzhon nu la sogs pa lnga 'bum brgyad stong de dag kyang
181a4(rgyud 'bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bde bar gnas pa theg pa chen po la rab tu mos pa de dag so so nas phyi dra'i dus kyi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
181a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyog gcig tu 'khod ngo // gzhan yang lha'i sras po la 'di lta ste/ lha'i sras po dga' ba mthong ba dang / lha'i sras po rab dga' dang / lha'i sras pa
181a6(rgyud 'bum): nyi 'od dang / lha'i sras po zla ba'i gtsug pud dang lha'i sras po shes rab gsal dang lha'i sras po nam mkha' rnam dag shes rab dang / lha'i sras po nyon mongs sel dang / lha'i sras po bkra
181a7(rgyud 'bum): shis dang / de dag la sogs pa lha'i sras po bzhi khri nyis stong yang theg pa chen po srung ba dang / yang dag pa'i chos rjes su 'dzin cing rgyun mi 'chad par smon lam rgya chen po btab pa de dag thams cad kyang
181b1(rgyud 'bum): byi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod ngo // gzhan yang klung
181b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po la 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po pad+mo dang / klu'i rgyal ba a la'i 'dab ma dang / klu'i rgya po pa stobs chen dang / klu'i rgyal po sgra chen dang / klu'i rgyal po rba rlabs chung dang / klu'i rgyal po klu
181b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po gser gdong dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po nyi khri brgyad stong po de dag kyang theg pa chen po'i chos 'chang zhing 'dzin par mos pa dang / yongs su rgyas
181b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / srung bar sems bskyed pa sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad kyang so so nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/
181b5(rgyud 'bum): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa sum khri drug stong la 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin a mra dang / gnod sbyin a mra 'chang dang /
181b6(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin pad+mo 'od kyi snying po dang / gnod sbyin pad+mo'i gdong dang / gnod sbyin khro gnyer can dang / gnod sbyin 'jigs pa chen po ston dang / gnod sbyin sa g.yo byed dang / gnod sbyin zas 'phrog la sogs
181b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gnod sbyin de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos yang dag pa la dad cing srung ba la brtson pa sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad kyang phyi dro'i dus kyi cha/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags nas/ bcom
182a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po spos kyi glang po che mthu stobs
182a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po la sogs pa bzhi khri dgu stong dang / gzhon yang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa dang / r-i dang / nags tshal dang / chu bo dang / rgya mtsho'i lha'i
182a3(rgyud 'bum): drang srong rnams dang / rgyal po chen po dang / de'i 'khor dang / gtsun mo dang / sras dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rig kyi bu mo dang / lha dang / mi la sogs pa de thams cad bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po
182a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di klog cing 'don pa dang / 'chang zhing 'dzin pa dang / 'dri ba dang / rgyas par byed pa dang / srung zhing skyob par smon lam yongs su 'debs pa de dag thams cad kyang phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ bcom ldan
182a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de ltar nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha
182a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding la sogs pa sde brgyad po de dag sprin bzhin du 'dus pa sems rtse gcig tu byas nas/ thal mo sbyar te mig mi 'dzum pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du blta
182a7(rgyud 'bum): zhing dam pa'i chos bstan par mos par gsol ba 'debs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ 'khor 'dus pa mang po la gzigs nas tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gsung
182b1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / mdo sde'i rgyal po'i dbang po ste// mnyan na shin tu zab pa dang // yongs su brtags na zab pa nyid// gsar 'od dam pa 'di 'chad do// phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// byin gyi rlabs kyis byin
182b2(rgyud 'bum): brlabs pa/ / mi 'khrugs pas ni shar phyogs su// rin chen tog gis lho phyogs su// 'od dpag med kyis nub phyogs su// rnga sgra yis ni byang phyogs su// sdig pa thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir// bshad pa
182b3(rgyud 'bum): dam pa bkra shis pa/ / sdig pa'i las rnams zad byed pa// bde ba thams cad sprin byed pa// sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig byed pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhi// dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan//
182b4(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis brlabs te brjod par bya// sems can gang dag dbang po nyams// tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang // phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang // lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / mdza' sdug skye bo sdang
182b5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / bram ze la sogs gtses pa dang // phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang // nor 'gribs pas ni gnod pa dang // mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa dang // 'jigs pa dang ni 'phongs pa dang // gza' dang rgyu skar
182b6(rgyud 'bum): byang stems dang / / mi bzang gdon gyis nyen pa dang // mya ngan ngal las byung ba yi// rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang // de ni rab khrus gtsang ma yin// mdo sde'i dam pa mnyan par bya// gang dag yid dag sems
182b7(rgyud 'bum): dang zhing / / gos gtsang rnams kyis rab brgyan te/ zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// mdo 'di nyan par byed na ni// mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis// srog chags kun gyi gnod pa dag/ shin tu mi bzang
183a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di 'dra ba/ / de dag rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur// 'jig rten skyong ba bdag nyid dang // rlon pa'i tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas// gnod sbyin byed du ma yis// de dag la ni srung bar byed
183a2(rgyud 'bum): lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang / / nai rany+dza rar gnas pa dang // 'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog ma dang // sa yi lha mo brtan ma dang // tshangs pa'i dbang dang lha dbang dang // klu dbang mthu chen rnams dang ni// mi 'am
183a3(rgyud 'bum): tsa dbang lha min dbang / / de bzhin nam mkha' lding dbang rnams// sde dang stobs dang bzhon pa dang // bcas te de dag der lhags nas// nyin dang mtshan mo mi g.yel bar// de dag la ni srung bar byed//
183a4(rgyud 'bum): zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ste// bskal pa bye bar rnyed dka' ba// mdo 'di rab tu bshad par bya// gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa dang // gang dag gzhan la thos byed dang //
183a5(rgyud 'bum): gang dag rjes su yi rang dang // gang dag mchod par byed pa rnams// de dag lha dang klu dag dang // mi dang mi 'am ci dag dang // lha min gnod sbyin du ma yis// bskal pa bye bar mchod par 'gyur// srog
183a6(rgyud 'bum): chags bsod nams byed pa rnams/ / de dag bsod nams phung po ni// mtha' yas grangs kyang med pa dang // bsam gyis mi khyab skye bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
183a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin zab mor spyod pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // rab tu bzung bar 'gyur ba yin// gtsang ma'i gos rnams rab bgos la// dri zhim pa yi gos 'chang zhing // byams pa'i
183b1(rgyud 'bum): sems ni nyer gzhag nas/ / g.yel ba med par mchod par byas// rang gi sems ni dri med cing // rgya che bar yang rab byed la// sems kyang shin tu dang byed kyis// mdo sde dam pa mnyan par gyis//
183b2(rgyud 'bum): gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa ni// de dag mi nang legs par 'ongs// mi yi srid pa legs par thob// 'tshe ba bde bas 'tsho bar 'gyur// gang gi rna ba'i bu gar yang // bshad pa 'di ni grags 'gyur ba//
183b3(rgyud 'bum): de dag dge rtsa sbyangs pa ste// sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o// // de'i tshe de'i
183b4(rgyud 'bum): dus na rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba
183b5(rgyud 'bum): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la rim gror byas pa zhig gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di lta ste/ lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste/ 'di ltar sku che/
183b6(rgyud 'bum): thung snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis kyis tshe ring bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang /
183b7(rgyud 'bum): kha zas rab tu sbyin pa'o zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa mang po nas/ srog gcod pa spangs par gyur pa nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
184a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi bar du yang dag par blangs te gnas par gyur/ zas dang phyi nang gi dngos po rnams sems can dag la yongs su btang ste/ cher na rang gi lus kyi sha dang / khrag dang
184a2(rgyud 'bum): rus pa dang / rkang gis kyang sems can ltogs pa rnams tshim par mdzad nas/ zas gzhan gyis lta ci smos snyam mo// de nas skyes bu dam pa des sangs rgyas la song ba'i yid la byed pa dag las 'di
184a3(rgyud 'bum): lta bu'i tshul gyis bsam pa 'di dag sems pa na/ de'i khyim yangs shing rgya che ba/ bai DUR+Ya sngon po las grub pa/ lha'i rin po che du mas spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo //
184a4(rgyud 'bum): lha'i las 'das pa'i spos kyis khyab par gyur to// khyim de'i phyogs bzhi nas lha'i rin po che'i khri bzhi byung bar gyur to// khri de dag las kyang lha'i khri lha'i ras bcos bu rin po che'i phrugs rnams bting ba dag
184a5(rgyud 'bum): byung bar gyur to/ / khri de dag las kyang lha'i me tog pad+ma rin po che du mas spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo // pad+ma de dag las kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi byung bar gyur
184a6(rgyud 'bum): te/ shar phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa byung / lho phyogs nas ni de bzhin gsheg pa rin chen tog byung / nub phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byung / byang phyogs
184a7(rgyud 'bum): nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra byung ste/ seng ge'i khri de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byung ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to//
184b1(rgyud 'bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag snang bas khyab par gyur/ lha'i me tog gi char yang bab/ lha'i
184b2(rgyud 'bum): sil snyan dag gi sgra'ang byung ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyang lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// sems can dbang po ma
184b3(rgyud 'bum): tshang ba rnams ni dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur/ sems can dmus long dag ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong / sems can 'on pa dag ni rna bas sgra rnams thos/ sems can smon pa rnams ni dran
184b4(rgyud 'bum): pa so sor rnyed/ sems can sems rnam par g.yengs pa dag ni sems rnam par mi g.yeng bar gyur/ sems can sgren mo rnams ni gos bgos par gyur/ sems can bkres pa dag ni lto 'grangs par
184b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur/ sems can skom pa dag ni skom pa dang bral bar gyur/ sems can nad kyis btab pa dag ni nad dang bral bar gyur/ sems can lus kyi dbang po nyams pa dag ni dbang po rnams tshang bar gyur te/ 'jig
184b6(rgyud 'bum): rten du ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams rgya cher byung bar gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tig gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ de tshim
184b7(rgyud 'bum): zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
185a1(rgyud 'bum): @rnams las rjes su dran la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yon tan rjes su dran zhing / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku che'i tshad la the tshom za bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
185a2(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pa 'di ltar lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste/ sku tshe thung ba 'di ji lta bu/ 'di ji zhig snyam du bsams pa de sems shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dgongs shing
185a3(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar sku tshe byung ngo snyam du ma sems
185a4(rgyud 'bum): shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par/ lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/
185a5(rgyud 'bum): dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' phyi ma'i mtha'i
185a6(rgyud 'bum): mu'i bar du'ang rtogs par nus pa nged kyis su'ang ma mthong ngo / / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa brjod ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la sangs rgyas
185a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi mthus lha'i bu 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
185b1(rgyud 'bum): po'i bar dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gi khyim der lhags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
185b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa tshogs su bcad de mdor bka' stsal pa/ rgya mtsho'i chu rnams thams cad kyi// thigs pa dag ni bgrang bar
185b3(rgyud 'bum): nus/ / shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// ri rab rnams ni thams cad kyang // phra rab rdul rlags bgrang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang
185b4(rgyud 'bum): bar mi nus so/ / sa la gang dag yod pa yi// rab tu phra rdul ji snyed pa// thams cad bgrang bar rus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tshad mi nus// gal te la las nam mkha' la// sna 'ga' zhig
185b5(rgyud 'bum): gis dpag 'dod kyang / / shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di srid bzhugs// bskal pa dag ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa bye ba brgya dag
185b6(rgyud 'bum): ces/ / grangs ni rnyed par mi rung ngo // gang phyir de yi byed rgyu gnyis/ rgyu yang rnam pa gnyis gsungs te// gzhan la 'tshe ba spangs pa dang // kha zas mang po byin pa ste// de phyir bdag nyid che ba de'i//
185b7(rgyud 'bum): sku tshe'i tshad ni mo rnyed de// bskal pa 'di snyed cig ce'am// grangs med pa yang de bzhin te// de bas the tsom med par 'gyur// the tsom cung zad ma za zhig/ rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tha ma yi// grangs ni gang
186a1(rgyud 'bum): du'ang mi dmigs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa de thos nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
186a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar sku tshe'i tshad thung bar bstan par gyur ces de skad gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
186a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa de ni snyigs ma rnam pa lnga'i 'jig rten du skye dgu'i tshe'i
186a4(rgyud 'bum): tshad lo brgya thub pa'i dus su bltams nas/ sems can mos pa dman pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang dad pa chung ba'i sems can de dag bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba
186a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / gso bar lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / log par lta ba dang / bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang dag dang / rtag pa dang chad par lta ba la sogs pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams
186a6(rgyud 'bum): la phan 'dogs pa dang / gzhan yang mu stegs can rnams la yang dag pa'i lta ba bskyed pas myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sku tshe'i
186a7(rgyud 'bum): tshad thung ba bstan to/ / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de mya ngan las 'da' ba bstan pas/ sems can rnams de dkon pa dang phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes dang / mya ngan dang sdug
186b1(rgyud 'bum): bsngal gyi 'du shes la sogs pa bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i mdo 'di dag myur du 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan
186b2(rgyud 'bum): dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa la skur pa 'debs pa med par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas sku tshe thung bar bstan to// de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu bzhugs shing mya ngan
186b3(rgyud 'bum): las mi 'da' na/ sems can rnams gus pa med pa dang phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes kyang mi skyed pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo zab mo dag 'dzin cing klog pa dang / kun chub par
186b4(rgyud 'bum): byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bcom ldan 'das rtag tu 'jig rten na bzhugs par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dper na gang la la
186b5(rgyud 'bum): zhig pha ma la nor bu rin po che rgyas pa mang du yod pa mthong nas/ nor de la dkon pa dang ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes mi skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pha ma'i nor rdzas de la rtag tu yod pa'i 'du shes skye ba'i phyir
186b6(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rtag tu mya ngan las mi 'da' na de la dkon pa dang phrad bar dka' ba'i 'du shes mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dper na la la zhig pha ma dbul zhing nor
186b7(rgyud 'bum): dang mi ldan pa zhig ste rgyal po 'am blon pa chen po zhig gi gnas su phyin te/ de dag gi bang mdzod dang / nor dang / rin po che la sogs pa mang ba rgyas pa mthong na de dkon pa dang rnyed par dka' ba'i 'dugs
187a1(rgyud 'bum): skyes te/ dbul po de nor btsal ba'i thabs sgrub pa la brtson par byed do// de ni dbul ba dang 'phongs pa spangs te/ bde ba dang 'byor pa sgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro// rigs
187a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong na/ de dkon pa dang / phrad par dka' ba dang / mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes kyang bskyed cing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
187a3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'jig rten du byung ba dang / bskal pa grangs med pa na lan 'ga' zhig byung ste/ ji ltar u dum pa ra'i me tog brgya lam na yang 'ga' zhig 'byung ba bzhin pas/ sems can rnams de la dkon pa dang
187a4(rgyud 'bum): phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes skyed cing / bcom ldan 'das de la gus pa skye bar 'gyur/ zhal nas gsungs pa'i mdo rnams la'ang bden pa'i 'du shes dang / yongs su gzung ba'i 'du shes skyed cing
187a5(rgyud 'bum): skur pa 'debs par mi byed do/ / rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu de dang rkyen de'i phyir 'jig rten na yun ring du mi bzhugs shing myur du mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad pas/ de bzhin gshegs
187a6(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams ni thabs mkhas pa phun sum tshogs pa de lta bus sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad do/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po de dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
187a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong tshad med pa dang / gzhan yang srog chags bye ba brgya stong chad med pa dang thabs cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba der so
187b1(rgyud 'bum): ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis ji lta bur gyur pa de dag gsol
187b2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhi'ang bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs par byon nas/ phyogs so so'i gdan gyi steng na bzhugs te/ 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' la
187b3(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu song la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa dang nyam nga ba chung ngam/ spyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol cig/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de
187b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po shin tu zab pa 'ang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / mu ge'i yang ba yongs su bsal te/ thams cad bde ba dang ldan pa'i
187b5(rgyud 'bum): phyir 'di ston pa legs te/ rjes su dgyes pa mdzad do zhes kyang gsol cig/ de nas so so'i zhabs 'bring nas mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der
187b6(rgyud 'bum): song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das bzhi po de dag gis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin
187b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ legs so legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhis kyang sems
188a1(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du dam pa'i chos 'di bshad par ngal bskul ba mdzad pas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs
188a2(rgyud 'bum): so/ / bya rgod phung po'i ri la nga bzhugs te// mdo sde rin chen 'di ni 'chang mdzad kyang // skye bo mang po de dag bsgral ba'i phyir// yongs su mya ngan bzla ba'ang ston pa mdzad// byis pa lta ba log par gyur
188a3(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams/ / nga yi bstan la mos par mi byed pa// de dag kun tu bsgral ba'i don gyi phyir// yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba'ang ston mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe 'khor der slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+ya
188a4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba dang / bram ze stong phrag du mas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i sgra thos nas 'phral du ngus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
188a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams
188a6(rgyud 'bum): cad la pha ma lta bu mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par gyur pa/ zla ba lta bur snang ba mdzad pa/ shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i nyi ma shar ba lta bu lags shing / gal te khyod sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin
188a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du gzigs na/ bdag la dam pa zhig sbrul du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor der li tsa byi gzhon nu sems can thams cad kyis mthong
188b1(rgyud 'bum): na dga' ba zhes bya ba de spobs pa skyes nas/ slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so// ci bram ze chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das la dam pa zhig gsol lam/ bdag gis khyod
188b2(rgyud 'bum): la dam pa sbyin no/ / bram zes smras pa/ li tsa byi gzhon nu bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang ring bsrel gyi phye ma dgos pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la brten
188b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'dong ngo / / ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam de ma brjed par mchod na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po 'ba' zhig thob ces drag go/ kye li tsa byi gzhon nu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo nyan
188b4(rgyud 'bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba/ de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang yon tan dang ldan pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'chad ces grag gis nyon cig/ kye li tsa
188b5(rgyud 'bum): byi gzhon nu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo ni de ltar shes par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' bas na kho bo cag mtha' 'khob kyi gling gi bram ze rnams ni gang bcang na/ sems can rnams myur du sum cu rtsa
188b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'i bdag po thob par 'gyur ba'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam za ma tog gi nang du bcug la bcangs kyang rung ngo / / kye la tsa byi gzhon nu khyod ci de bzhin gshegs pa las ring bsrel yungs 'bru
188b7(rgyud 'bum): tsam gsol nas/ rang bsrel za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste bcangs pas sems can rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob par mi 'dod dam/ kye li tsa byi gzhon nu kho bos ni dam pa de lta bu gsol
189a1(rgyud 'bum): to/ de nas ya tse byi gzhon nu sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas/ slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u ngi n+yal tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa/ nam ma
189a2(rgyud 'bum): gang+ga'i chu rgyun la/ / me tog rnams ni skye ba dang / bya rog dmar por 'gyur ba dang // khu byug dung mdog 'drar 'gyur dang // 'dzam bur ta la'i 'bru chags dang // 'bra gor a mra'i dog pa chags
189a3(rgyud 'bum): de yi tshe na yungs 'bru tsam/ / ring bsrel du ni gsal bar 'gyur// nam zhig rus sbal spu rnams las// gos su legs par btags gyur te// dgun gyi grang ba sel byed pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod
189a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / nam zhig sbrang bu'i rkang lag las// yang thog legs par byas gyur te// brtan zhing rab tu mi g.yon// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig srin bu bad pa kun// so ni dkar
