189a5(rgyud 'bum): bor skyes gyur te/ / rno zhing chen por gyur pa na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// mtho ris su ni 'dzeg pa'i phyir// nam zhig ri bong rwa rnams las// skas ni legs par byas gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel
189a6(rgyud 'bum): yod par 'gyur/ / nam zhig skas der rab 'dzegs te// byi bas zla ba bza' ba dang // sgra gcan la yang gnod byed pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// grong na rgyu ba'i sbrang bu yis// nam zhig rdza
189a7(rgyud 'bum): ma'i chang 'thungs te/ / khyim na gnas par byed 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig bong bu bde 'gyur la// mchu dmar bim pa 'drar gyur cing // glu gar rnams la mkhas gyur pa/
189b1(rgyud 'bum): detshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig 'ug pa bya rog rnams// dben par song nas rtse ba dang // phan tshun mthun par 'gyur ba na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// pa la sha yi lo ma rnams// ran
189b2(rgyud 'bum): chen sna gsum gdugs gyur te/ / char 'bab skyabs su nam 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig rgya mtsha'i gru bo che// 'khrul 'khor dang ni g.yor mor bcas// thang la byung ste 'gro
189b3(rgyud 'bum): ba na/ / de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig bya ni 'ug pa rnams// ri bo spos kyi ngad ldang ba// mchul thogs te 'gro 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// slob dpon lung ston pa
189b4(rgyud 'bum): bram ze ko'u di n+yas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/ / li tsa byi gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa/ legs so legs so gzhon nu mchog
189b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba'i sras po chog po che/ / dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas ldan pa// lung bstan pa ni dam pa thob// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid// bsam gyis mi khyab go rims
189b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / gzhon nus bdag la mnyan par gyis// sangs rgyas yul ni bsam mi khyab// de bzhin gshegs rnams mtshungs pa med// sangs rgyas thams cad rtag tu shes// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag
189b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / / sangs rgyas thams cad kha dog mtshungs// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin// bcom ldan de ni bcos ma min// de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes te// rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i sku// sprul pa'i sku ni ston par
190a1(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / drang srong chen po'i ring bsrel ni// yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya ba med/ sku la rus pa khrag med na// ring bsrel yod par ga la 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/
190a2(rgyud 'bum): thabs kyis ring bsrel bzhag par mdzad// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings// chos ston mdzad pa ci 'dra ba// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de 'dra// bdag gis
190a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di thos shes nas ni/ / bdag gis dam pa gsol bar bya// de nyid kho na lung bstan phyir// gtam gleng ba ni bdag gis byas// de nas lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad
190a4(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa zab mo 'di lta bu 'di thos nas/ thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag yid kyis kun tu rtog pa rab tu dga' nas/ sgra skad mthun par
190a5(rgyud 'bum): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / sangs rgyas mya ngan yong mi 'da'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir// yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba ston// sangs
190a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bcom ldan bsam mi khyab/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku// sems can rnams la phan bya'i phyir// bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
190a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa'i tog gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku che'i tshad bstan pa thos nas yang stan las langs te/ thal mo
190b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mya ngan las mi 'da' la/ ring bsrel 'jig rten du bzhag pa'ang ma mchis na/ ci'i srang
190b2(rgyud 'bum): du mdo sde dag las sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'da' zhing / ring bsrel 'jig rten du bzhag la/ lha dang mos gus pa dang bcas/ bkur sti dang bcas pas 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
190b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi ring bsrel 'jig rten du bzhag pa la lha dang mor bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod pa byas na/ bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'thob bo zhes kyang gsungs la/ da 'dir ni de dag med do zhes
190b4(rgyud 'bum): kyang gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bas rnam par dbye zhing bshad par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la sogs
190b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag la bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das te/ ring bsrel 'jig rten du bzhag ces gsungs pa'ang dgongs pa'i 'don du bstan par shes par bya'o// rigs
190b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'di bcus/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang dag pa dang bden pa'i tshul du mya ngan las 'das pa chen
190b7(rgyud 'bum): po yod par gsungs par shes par bya'o/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa yongs su spangs pas mya ngan las 'das pa
191a1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gang zag la bdag med pa dang / chos la bdag med par mngon du mkhyen pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / lus kyi
191a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas dang chos kyi gnas su gyur pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / sems can rnams 'dul ba'i mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / yang dag pa nyid mngon
191a3(rgyud 'bum): du gyur pas mtshan nyid tha dad pa med pas/ chos kyi skur mnyam pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin gnyis su med par mngon du gzigs pas
191a4(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs pas/ rnam par dag pa mngon du gyur pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad skye ba dang 'jig pa med pa'i
191a5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa la mkhas pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad kyi
191a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin nyid dang mya ngan las 'da' ba'i de bzhin nyid la bye brag med par mkhyen pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'di bcus ni
191a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa dang / bden pa'i tshul du mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po yod par gsungs so// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyon
191b1(rgyud 'bum): mongs pa thams cad kyi gzhi ni mos pa dang 'dod pa ste/ gang mos pa las 'dod pa skye'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mos pa dang / 'dod pa las bral ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang
191b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni mos pa dang / 'dod pa thams cad dang bral nas chos gang yang mi len pa'i phyir/ gzung ba med pa dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / len pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir mya ngan la
191b3(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / blang bar bya ba med pa de ni chos kyi sku ste/ skye ba dang 'gog pa med pa'o// skye ba dang 'gog pa med pa de nyid la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /
191b4(rgyud 'bum): skye ba dang 'gog pa med pa de tshig gis mi brjod pas tshig gi lam chad pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / bdag dang gang zag med cing skye ba dang 'gag pa'i chos tsam la gnas 'pho ba thob pa'i phyir ru
191b5(rgyud 'bum): ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dag glo bur nyid du gzigs shing // gang chos nyid de ni gnas pa ste/ 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
191b6(rgyud 'bum): mngon du gyur pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / yang dag pa ni bden pa ste/ de las gzhan pa ni brdzun pa'o// gang bden pa nyid ni yang dag pa ste/ yang dag pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa
191b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid pas/ de la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid ni spros pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyag gcig gis yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du gyur cing / spros pa nye bar zhi
192a1(rgyud 'bum): ba de nyid la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / mi skye ba ni bden pa/ skye ba ni brdzun pa yin pas na/ byis pa so sor skye bo rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba/ de bzhin
192a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i sku ni bden pa yang dag pa ma yin pa med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos ni rkyen las skye ba/ yang dag pa'i bden pa'i chos ni rkyen gyis bskyed pa
192a3(rgyud 'bum): ma yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'ang yang dag pa bden pa nyid yin pas/ de la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rnam pa 'di
192a4(rgyud 'bum): bcus ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang dag pa dang / bden pa'i tshul rtogs pas/ mya ngan las 'das pa chen por shes par 'gyur ro//
192a5(rgyud 'bum): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas sbyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la bdag dang bdag gir bya ba med par rab tu shes pas/ sbyin pa de dang de'i 'bras bu la log pa'i rnam par rtog pa
192a6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su spangs pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu la bdag dang bdag gir bya ba med par rab tu shes pas/ tshul khrims
192a7(rgyud 'bum): de dang de'i 'bras bu la log pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su spangs pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bzod pa dang / bzod pa'i 'bras bu la bdag dang bdag gir bya ba med
192b1(rgyud 'bum): par rab tu shes pas/ bzod pa de dang de'i 'bras bu la log pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su spangs pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas brtson 'grus dang / brtson 'grus
192b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'bras bu la bdag dang bdag gir bya ba med par rab tu shes pas/ brtson 'grus de dang de'i 'bras bu la log pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su spangs pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin
192b3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pas bsam gtan dang / bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu la bdag dang bdag gir bya ba med par rab tu shes pas/ bsam gtan de dang de'i 'bras bu la log pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su spangs pas
192b4(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang / shes rab kyi 'bras bu la bdag dang bdag gir bya ba med par rab tu shes pas/ shes rab de dang de'i 'bras bu la log
192b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su spangs pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can dang / sems can med par rab tu mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad
192b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi rang bzhin med pa la log pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su spangs pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / gang sred pa'i bdag nyid can ni tshil ba la nan tan byed do// tshol ba la nam tan byed pa
192b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang gis sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bdag gir 'dzin pa yongs su bcad cing tshol ba mi mnga' bas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / 'dus byas
193a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi chos thams cad ni bgrang zhing dpag tu yod la/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos ni bgrang zhing dpag pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dus byas kyi chos spangs shing
193a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dus ma byas kyi chos mngon du mdzad de/ bgrang ba dang dpag pa mi mnga' ba de la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dang chos kyi rang bzhin kun stong pa dang /
193a3(rgyud 'bum): stong pa de las gzhan pa'ang yod pa ma yin pa dang / stong pa'i rang bzhin de nyid yang dag pa'i chos kyi sku yin pas/ de'i phyir de la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag gis
193a4(rgyud 'bum): ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las mi 'da' ba de 'ba' zhig ngo mtshar che ba ma yin gyi/ gzhan yang ngo mtshar du bya ba'i chos rnam pa bcu yod pa de ni/
193a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba ni skyon dang ldan pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi zhing dben pa yin na/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa de gnyis mnyam par
193a6(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen pas 'khor ba la'ang mi gnas/ mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mi bzhugs shing / gang sems can rnams kyi don la mi skyob de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
193a7(rgyud 'bum): pas byis pa so so'i'i skye bo phrin cu log tu sprod pa dang / nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis glags par gzigs kyang / 'di dag rnam par grol bar bya'o snyam du mi dgongs med kyi/ sngon gyi thugs rje dang
193b1(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus sems can 'di dag so so'i dbang po dang / rang bzhin dang / bsam pa ci la mos pa rtog pa mi mnga' bar lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis/ phyi ma'i mthar thug pa med par phan 'dogs
193b2(rgyud 'bum): shing ston pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams la gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis rgyas par bstan pas/ phan gdags so snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi/
193b3(rgyud 'bum): sngon gyi thugs rje dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus sems can 'di dag la phyi ma'i mthar thug pa med par chos rgyas par ston pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang
193b4(rgyud 'bum): grong khyer dang / grong 'dab tu gshegs shing / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i khyim du bsod snyoms blang ngo snyam du mi
193b5(rgyud 'bum): dgongs mod kyi/ sngon gyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi spyod pa la goms pa'i mthus/ lhun gyis grub par bsod snyoms la gshegs shing phan pa'i don mdzad pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
193b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi spyod pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la sgribs pa 'am/ skyems pa mi mnga'/ bshang gci dang / sku nyams chung ba'ang mi mnga' bar bsod snyoms len par snang yang de la gsol ba'ang
193b7(rgyud 'bum): med de'i rnam par rtog pa'ang mi mnga' mod kyi/ sems can la phan gdags pa'i phyir bsod snyoms gsol bar yang snang ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa lhun gyis grub pa'o//
194a1(rgyud 'bum): gang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can 'di dag gi dbang po rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan to snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
194a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis so so'i dbang po dang / snod ji lta bu yin pa rtog pa mi mnga' ba rab tu mkhyen cing de dag la chos ston pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas sems can
194a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag ni gus pa med pa rtag tu tshig rtsub pos ngan du smra ba yin pas/ 'di dag dang lhan cig mo smra'o// sems can 'di dag ni nga la rtag tu gus par byed pa/ bstod cing snyan par smra ba yin pas/
194a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag dang lhan cig smra bar bya'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pa mi dgongs te/ byams pa dang thugs rjes mnyam par dgongs shing gnyis su med pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o// sangs
194a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la byams sdang dang / nga rgyal dang / 'dod pa dang / ser sna la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa mi mnga' mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag par dben pa la dgyes shing 'du
194a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzi thams cad spangs te/ 'dod pa chung ba la bsngags pa mdzad pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos 'ga' tsam yang mi mkhyen pa 'am/ thugs su ma rung
194a7(rgyud 'bum): pa mi mnga' ba dang / gnas thams cad du me long lta bu'i ye shes mngon du gyur pas rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can 'di dag gi las dang spyod pa la gzigs nas/ de dag gi
194b1(rgyud 'bum): bsam pa dang mthun par sbyor bas/ thabs kyis 'dren cing 'khor ba las sgrol ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gang dag phyug cing dar ba gzigs
194b2(rgyud 'bum): na'ang dgyes pa mi skye/ rgud pa dang dma' ba gzigs na'ang thugs ngan mi mdzad mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can de dag yang dag pa'i spyod pa sgrub pa gzigs nas/ thogs pa med pa'i thugs rje
194b3(rgyud 'bum): chen pos skyob par mdzad do/ / sems can la la log par spyod pa gzigs na'ang / chags pa med pa'i thugs rje chen pos skyob cing 'dzin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o// rigs kyi
194b4(rgyud 'bum): bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang dag pa'i spyod pa mtha' med par bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid du
194b5(rgyud 'bum): shes par gyis shig/ skabs gzhan dag tu mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / ring bsrel 'jig rten du bzhag ces bya ba de ni thabs mkhas pa bstan pa ste/ sems can rnams kyis mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa
194b6(rgyud 'bum): de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthu yin par blta bar bya'o/ / de la gang zhig mchod pa dang rim go byed pa de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi khom pa brgyad yongs su spangs te/
194b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang phrad cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ldan pa dang / byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'phel ba dang / 'khor ba las myur du 'da' zhing 'khor
195a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'ching bas glags par mi 'gyur ba'o spyod pa dam pa 'di yin pas/ khyed kyis nan tan du sgrub cing g.yel ba med par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/
195a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i don dang bzod pa zab mo bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du thos nas bral mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces gsol to// deng gzong bdag gis de bzhin
195a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa ston pa chen po mya ngan las mi 'da' ba dang / ring bsrel 'jig rten du bzhag cing sems can rnams la phan pa rgya cher mdzad pa 'di 'tshal bar gyur nas/ lus dang sems dga' zhing rangs
195a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ngo mtshar du gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad 'di bstan pa na/ grangs med dpag tu med cing mtha' yas pas sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
195a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub tu sems skyes so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog kyang stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
195a6(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal te/ slar yang rang gi gnas de nyid du 'dug go/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
195a7(rgyud 'bum): / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo
195b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa'i lgang sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ gser dang rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dam pas mchod pa byas
195b2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dgongs pa shin tu zab pa de tshul bzhin ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi zhes
195b3(rgyud 'bum): gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / khyod la de'i don rnam par phye ste bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs
195b4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad la sku rnam pa gsum mnga' ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ sprul pa'i sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / chos kyi sku'o// 'di lta bu'i sku gsum lhun gyis grub pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
195b5(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin te/ gang gis de mngon du gyur pa rnams 'khor ba la 'byung bar byed do// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa'i sku shes par bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa
195b6(rgyud 'bum): sngon sa rnam par sbyong ba'i dus na/ skye bo thams cad kyi phyir chos rnam pa sna tshogs sgrub bo// de ltar spyod pa sbyangs pas rnal 'byor gyi mthar phyin pa yin no// rnal 'byor de'i stobs kyis dbang chen po thob bo//
195b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang chen po'i mthus skye bo'i bsam pa ji lta ba dang / spyod pa ji lta ba dang / khams ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad mngon du gyur nas/ dus la mi gzhes/ dus la mi 'da'/ gnas dang mthun pa/ dus dang mthun pa/
196a1(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa dang mthun pa/ chos bshad pa dang yang mthun par sku rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa de ni sprul pa'i sku zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' longs spyod rdzogs
196a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku shes par bya zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thogs pa med par thob par bya ba'i phyir don dam pa'i bden pa ston te/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das
196a3(rgyud 'bum): pa ro gcig pa nyid du shes par bya ba dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba bsal nas sems can 'jigs par gyur pa rnams dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mtha' yas pa'i rgyur gyur pas//
196a4(rgyud 'bum): bden pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dang mthun par sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus sku de ston par 'gyur te/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa
196a5(rgyud 'bum): 'od sku la 'khor ba grub pa de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi sku shes par bya zhe na/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa tham
196a6(rgyud 'bum): cad dang bral ba dge ba'i chos thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir de kho na nyid dang yang dag pa'i ye shes nyid tsam du gnas pa de ni chos kyi sku zhes bya'o/ / sku snga ma de gnyis ni btags pa tsam mo// chos kyi sku
196a7(rgyud 'bum): ni yang dag pa ste/ sku de nyid kyi gzhi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi sku de bzhin nyid dang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes las gud na sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang med pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs/
196b1(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams na ye shes spyan sum tshogs pa zhin mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i mthar byin pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyis rnam par dag pa brnyes pa'i phyir chos ci de kho na nyid dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes byams
196b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su 'dzin to/ / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi mthar phyin pa ste/ de la chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyis ni bdag gi ngan mdzad/ de bzhin
196b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi ye shes kyis ni gzhan gyi don mdzad do/ / bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i don mdzad pa la dbang brnyes pa'i phyir mdzad pa mtha' yas pa sna tshogs lhun gyis grub bo// de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos
196b4(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ rnam pa mang po khyad par du bstan to// rigs kyi bu dper na rnam par rtog pa'i sems la brten nas/ nyon mongs pa rnam pa mang po dang / las rnam pa mang po dang
196b5(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu rnam pa mang po ston pa de bzhin du/ chos kyi chos nyid dang de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la brten nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang
196b6(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos kyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs mang po ston to/ / chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la brten nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la dbang phun sum tshogs pa brnyes pa de ni dam pa pag
196b7(rgyud 'bum): par dka' ba yin no/ / dper nam mkha' la ri mo bris te rgyan du byas pa de ni dpag par dka' ba yin no// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i chos dang yang dag pa'i ye shes la brten nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam
197a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub pa yang dpag par dka' ba yin no/ / rigs kyi bu ji ltar na chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing 'phrin las la mnga' brnyes pa yin ne
197a2(rgyud 'bum): na/ rigs kyi bu dper na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang smon lam la mnga' brnyes pas/ 'phrin las kyi rnam pa thams cad kyang mdzad de/ de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes
197a3(rgyud 'bum): kyis don thams cad grub par mnga' mdzad pa'ang de bzhin no/ / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs pa las sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang
197a4(rgyud 'bum): gis bsam gtan de las bzhengs te don dang 'phrin las thams cad mdzad pa ltar/ chos rnam pa gnyis kyang rnam par rtog pa med par don thams cad mdzad pa la mnga' brnyes pa'o// rigs kyi bu dper
197a5(rgyud 'bum): na nyi ma dang zla ba la'ang rnam par rtog pa med/ chu dang me long la'ang rnam par rtog pa med/ snang ba la'ang rnam par rtog pa med mod kyi/ gsum 'dus pa las gzugs brnyan 'byung ngo // de bzhin du
197a6(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la'ang rnam par rtog pa med mod kyi smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can skal ba can dag la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul pa'i sku'ang nyi zla'o
197a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brnyan bzhin rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ngo / / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dper na tshad med grangs med pa'i chu dang me long dag ni snang ba la brten nas stong pa'i gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid tha
197b1(rgyud 'bum): dang pa dag snang ngo / / stong pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgra dang / sprul pa'i sku ni 'khor rnams la chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan ston par smon ma
197b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi dbang gis sku de gnyis snang ste/ mtshan sna tshogs su snang na'ang chos kyi sku'i gnas la ni mtshan nyid tha dad ba med do// rigs kyi bu sku de gnyis la gnas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bung
197b3(rgyud 'bum): po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes gsung ngo / / chos kyi sku las dgongs te phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes gsungs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ der ni chos tham
197b4(rgyud 'bum): cang zad pa'i mthar gyur pa'i phyir sku 'di gsum la brten nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa zhes bshad do// sku gnyis la ni mya ngan las
197b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa zhes mi gsung ste/ chos kyi sku las gzhan pa'i sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir ro// ci'i phyir sku gnyis po la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes mi bya zhe na/ sku de gnyis ni yang dag pa ma yin pa btag
197b6(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam pas skad cig tu skye zhing 'gag pa rtag par mi gnas pa dang / yang dang yang du 'byung bas ma nges pa ltar chos kyi sku ni de lta ma yin no// de'i phyir sku de gnyis ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes mi bya'o/
197b7(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi sku'ang de dang mi gnyis pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin pas sku de gsum las brten te/ mi gnas pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes gsung ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byis pa so/
198a1(rgyud 'bum): so'i skye bo rnams ni mtshan nyid gsum gyi phyir/ 'ching ba dang sgrib pa yod pas sku gsum las ring du gyur to// gsum gang zhe na/ kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang / gzhan gyi
198a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang gi mtshan nyid dang / yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do// mtshan nyid de rnams shes pa dang / 'gog pa dang / dag par ma gyur pa de'i phyir sku gsum ma thob bo// de lta bu'i mtshan nyid gsum
198a3(rgyud 'bum): shes pa dang / 'gog pa dang / rnam par byang bar gyur pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sku gsum yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis rnam par shes
198a4(rgyud 'bum): pa gsum ma spangs pa'i phyir sku gsum las ring du gyur to/ / gsum gang zhe na/ dngos po la 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi la gnas pa'i yid dang / kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'o/
198a5(rgyud 'bum): lam spong ba dag la gnas pas 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa spong ngo // gcod pa'i lam la gnas pas kun gzhi la gnas pa'i yid spong ngo // mchog tu rgyal ba'i lam la gnas pas kun gzhi'i rnam
198a6(rgyud 'bum): par shes pa spangs so/ / 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa sbyangs na sprul pa sku mngon du 'gyur ro// kun gzhi la gnas pa'i yid spangs pos longs rdzogs pa'i sku ston to// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa
198a7(rgyud 'bum): spangs pas ni chos kyi sku 'thob ste/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku ni sangs rgyas thams
198b1(rgyud 'bum): cad dang spyod pa mthun pa'o/ / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang dgongs pa mthun pa'o// chos kyi sku ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang sku mthun pa'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi sprul
198b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku ni so so'i skye bo'i yid dang mthun par rnam pa mang pos mtshan ma sna tshogs ston pa'i phyir mang po zhes bya'o/ / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni 'khor rnams kyi bsam pa gcig pas// mtshan nyid gcig pa'i
198b3(rgyud 'bum): phyir mtshan nyid gcig ces bya'o/ / chos kyi sku ni mtshan ma sna tshogs las yang dag par 'das pa/ mtshan mar bzung ba'i spod yul ma yin pa ste/ de bas na gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma yin pa zhes bya'o//
198b4(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu sprul pa'i sku ni l-ibA spong rdzog pa'i sku la brten te mngon par snang ngo // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni chos kyi sku la rten te mngon par snang ngo // chos kyi sku ni yang dag pa ste ci la'ang mi gnas pa'o//
198b5(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu skra de gsum ni rtag par bshad pa'i rnam grangs kyang yod/ mi rtag par bshed pa'i rnam grangs kyang yod do// sprul pa'i sku ni thabs mkhas pas gnas thams cad du dmigs pa ji lta ba
198b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du rgyun mi chad par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir rtag pa zhes bya'o/ / de bzhir ma gyur pas mdzad pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa mngon du mi ston pa'i phyir mi rtag pa zhes bya'o// longs spyod
198b7(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i sku mi thog ma med pa'i dus nas rgyun mchod cang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos ma 'dres pas yongs su 'dzin cing sdud pa'i phyir/ sems can zad pa med pas spyod pa'ang mi zad de/ de'i phyir
199a1(rgyud 'bum): rtag pa zhes bya'o/ / derang gzhir ma gyur pa'i phyir mdzad pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa mngon du mi ston pas mi rtag pa zhes bya'o// chos kyi sku ni 'du byed kyi chos ma yin pa/
199a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma tha dad pa med pa/ rtsa ba dang gzhir 'gyur ba'i phyir/ nam mkha' ji lta ba bzhin pas de ni rtag pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes las gud na 'phags pa'i ye shes med do// de
199a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nyid kyi chos nyid las kyang lhag pa'i spyod yul med do/ / de ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ye shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de gnyis kyi de bzhin nyid ni gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang
199a4(rgyud 'bum): ma yin pas/ de'i phyir chos kyi sku ni ye shes rnam par dag pa dang / spangs pa rnam par dag pa gnyis kyi phyir/ chos kyi sku ni rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sku
199a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di gsum dbye ba la'ang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sprul pa'i sku yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa'ang yod/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin la/ sprul pa'i sku ma yin pa'ang yod/ sprul pa'i sku
199a6(rgyud 'bum): yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa'ang yod/ sprul pa'i sku'ang ma yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'ang ma yin pa'o// sprul pa'i sku yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa gang /
199a7(rgyud 'bum): zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 'das su zin kyang / smon lam gyi dbang gis skal ba ji lta bzhin phan 'dogs pa ni sprul pa'i sku zhes bya'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin la
199b1(rgyud 'bum): sprul pa'i sku ma yin pa gang zhe na/ sa'i snga rol pa'i sku'o// sprul pa'i sku'ang yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'ang yin pa de gang zhe na/ lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra'o//
199b2(rgyud 'bum): sprul pa'i sgrubang ma yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'ang ma yin pa de ni chos kyi sku'o// rigak+Shi bri chos kyi sku de ni chos gnyis su med pa mngon du gyur pa'o// gnyis gang zhe na/ chos kyi sku de la
199b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid kyi gzhi gnyis ka med pa ste/ yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin/ gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma yin/ bgrang ba'ang ma yin/ bgrang bar mi bya
199b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'ang ma yin/ snang ba'ang ma yin/ mun pa'ang ma yin pa ste/ de lta bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid kyi gzhir yang mi dmigs/ yod pa dang med par yang mi dmigs
199b5(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa dang tha dad par yang mi dmigs/ bgrang bar yang mi dmigs/ bgrang bar mi bya bar yang mi dmigs/ snang ba dang mun par yang mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ltar spyod yul rnam par dag pa dang ye shes
199b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dag pa de dbyer med pa/ bar mtshams med pa/ 'gog pa dang lam gyi gzhir gyur pa ste/ de'i phyir na chos kyi sku de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa sna tshogs mngon du gyur pa'o// rigs kyi bu
199b7(rgyud 'bum): sku 'di ni rgyu dang / rkyen dang / spyod yul dang / gnas dang / 'bras bu dag gzhi nyid la brten pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ don de mngon par shes na sku de nyid theg pa chen po'o// de nyid de bzhin
200a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ste/ sku de la brten nas sems dang po bskyed pa dang / sa yongs su sbyong ba'i sems mngon par 'byung ste/ sa las
200a2(rgyud 'bum): phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyang mngon du 'gyur ba dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa la gnas pa'i sems dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'ang mngon par 'byung
200a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos tshad med grangs med pa thams cad kyang mngon du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / chos kyi sku la brten nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po'ang mngon du 'byung bar
200a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / chos kyi sku 'di la brten nas ye shes chen po thams cad kyang snang bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na sku gnyis ni ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes la brten nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi sku 'di ni rang
200a5(rgyud 'bum): gi ngo bo nyid la brten nas rtag pa zhes bya'o/ / bdag ces bya'o// ting nge 'dzin chen po la brten pas na bde ba zhes bya'o// ye shes chen po la brten pas na rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin
200a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rtag par bde ba dang / rnam par dag pa la mnga' brnyes shing bzhugs pa'o// ting nge 'dzin chen po la brten pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang
200a7(rgyud 'bum): chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa thams cad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / gzungs thams cad dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad dang / dbang thams
200b1(rgyud 'bum): cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi chos thams cad 'dzin pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par 'byung ngo / / ye shes chen po la brten pas ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so//
200b2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sogs pa ma 'dres pa'i chos brgya brgyad cu dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos thams cad dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na yidi
200b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che la brten nas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med grangs med pa thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin chen po'i rin po che dang / ye shes chen po'i rin po che la
200b4(rgyud 'bum): brten nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med chad med pa mngon du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar na chos kyi sku dang // ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes ni mtshan ma
200b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ mtshan mas mi gos pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ rtag pa'ang ma yin/ chad pa'ang ma yin pa ste/ de ni dbu ma'i lam bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// rnam par
200b6(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa yod par snang yang ngo bo nyid la ni rnam par rtog pa'ang med/ gsum du bgrangs pa'ang yod mod kyi/ dngos po gsum du'ang med do// 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med pa de ni rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta
200b7(rgyud 'bum): bu ste/ gzung ba'ang med/ 'dzin pa'ang med do// chos kyi ngo bo'i de bzhin nyid ni rnam par grol ba'i gnas te/ 'chi bdag gi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ 'khor ba'i mun pa las mngon du rnal
201a1(rgyud 'bum): skye bo thams cad kyis sgrub par ma nus pa/ mthar phyin par mi nus pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bzhugs par bya ba'i gnas so// rigs kyi bu dar/
201a2(rgyud 'bum): na gang la la zhig gser 'dod de gnas kun tu btsal ba las gser gyi sgram bu rnyed nas/ sbrum bu de zhib tu btags te/ snying po bzhu zhing sbyangs nas rnam par byang bar gyur pa dang / gser de gdu
201a3(rgyud 'bum): bu la sogs pa rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs yid bzhin du bsgyur te sprad kyang / gser gyi rang bzhin nyid ni mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang 'jig rten gyi dge ba spyod
201a4(rgyud 'bum): par mos pa de de bzhin gsheg pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor de dag mthong ste/ nye bar bsnyen nas de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge ba ni gang / mi dge ba ni gang / yang dag
201a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sgrub pa gang bgyis pas rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / de'i 'khor dag gis 'di skad ces 'dri ba la 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rigs kyi bu dang
201a6(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mo 'di dag ni ngem pa'i chos nyan par mos pa dang / rnam par byang bar 'dod pa ste/ 'di dag la yang dag pa'i chos bstan to snyam mo// de thos nas kyang tshul bzhin yid la bya ste/ nan tan
201a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis bsam pa skyes shing brtson par gyur pa'i mthus/ le lo'i slob pa dang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad bsal te/ bslab pa'i gnas thams cad la rab tu gus par gnas shing / sems bying ba dang rgod pa
201b1(rgyud 'bum): dag bsal te sa dang po la 'jug go/ / sa dang zo'i sems la brten nas/ sems can mang po'i don la brtson pa'i sgrib pa spangs pas sa gnyis pa la 'jug go/ sa de las nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs/
201b2(rgyud 'bum): nas sa gsum pa la 'jug go/ sa de las sems rnam par sbyong ba la sgrib pa spangs nas sa bzhi pa la 'jug go// sa de las thabs mkhas pa'i slob pa spangs nas sa lnga pa la 'jug go// sa de las don dam pa
201b3(rgyud 'bum): dang kun rdzob tu dmigs pa'i sgrib pa spangs nas sa drug pa la 'jug go/ / sa de las mtshan ma dang spyod pa la dmigs pa'i slob pa spangs nas sa bdun la 'jug go// sa de las mtshan ma 'gog par yang mi dmigs
201b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i slob pa spangs nas sa brgyad pa la 'jug go/ sa de las mtshan mar skye bar yang mi dmigs pa'i slosgrib pa spangs nas sa dgu pa la 'jug go// sa de las drug mngon par shes pa'i sgrib pa spangs nas bcu pa la
201b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jug go/ sa de las shes bya'i sgrib pa dang kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa spangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa ni rnam par dag pa gsum gyi phyir/ rab tu rnam par
201b6(rgyud 'bum): dag pa zhes bya'o/ / gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa dang / sdug bsngal rnam par dag pa dang / mtshan ma rnam par dag pa ste/ ji ltar gser bzang po bzhu zhing btul te
201b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyangs pa la rdul dang dri mas phyir mo gos shing / rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i gser nyid du snang ste/ gser gyi dngos po rnam par dag pa'ang med par gyur pa ma yin pa bzhin no// dper na chu rnyog pa can dang
202a1(rgyud 'bum): te rnam par dngas nas chu'i rang bzhin nyid gsal bar gyur pa yin gyi/ chu de nyid med par gyur pa'ang ma yin no// de bzhin du chos kyi sku'ang nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'dus/
202a2(rgyud 'bum): pa spangs nas/ bag chags ma lus par bsal te/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo rnam par dag pa nyid snang bar gyur pa yin gyi// dngos po med par gyur pa nyid ni ma yin no// yang dper na nam mkha' ya du ba dang / sprin
202a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / rdul dang / na bun gyis bsgribs pa de med par gyur na nam mkha'i khams de rnam par dag par gyur pa yin gyi/ nam mkha' de nyid med par gyur pa ni ma yin no// de bzhin du chos kyi sku nyon mongs pa thams
202a4(rgyud 'bum): cad zad pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes bya'i/ sku de nyid med par gyur pa ni ma yin no// gzhan yang dper na 'ga' zhig gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na chu chen pos khyer nas/ lus dang rkang lag bskyod de lus dang
202a5(rgyud 'bum): sems 'bad pa dang bcas pas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin pa mi'o/ / rmi lam de las sad pa dang / chu dang phan tshun gyi 'gram tha dad pa yod pa mthong ba med kyang / sems nyid med pa ma yin no// 'khor
202a6(rgyud 'bum): bar rnam par rtog pa zad pa'ang blo rnam par dag pa ste/ sangs rgyas pa de med pa ma yin no// de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings la rnam par rtog pa thams cad mi skye ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/
202a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang dag pa'i sku ni med pa ma yin no// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku snang bar 'gyur ro// las
202b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi slob pa rnam par dag pas sprul pa'i sku snang bar 'gyur ro/ / ye shes kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pas chos kyi sku snang bar 'gyur ro// dper na stong pa la brten nas glog 'byung glog la brten te 'od//
202b2(rgyud 'bum): snang ngo // de bzhin du chos kyi sku la brten te longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur snang ngo // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la brten te sprul pa'i skur snang ngo // de la rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi skur snang
202b3(rgyud 'bum): ngo/ / ye shes rnam par dag pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur snang ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pas sprul pa'i skur snang ngo // de gsum rnam par dag pa ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i
202b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin nyid dang / ro gcig pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / mthas klas pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad ni sku tha mi dad do// rigs kyi bu 'am
202b5(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston pa chen po'o/ / zhes smra zhing mos pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gnyis su med par bsam pa thag pa nas shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de'i
202b6(rgyud 'bum): phyir spyod yul thams cad la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa yongs su bsal bas/ chos de dag la mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / 'phags pa rnams kyis
202b7(rgyud 'bum): bslab par bya ba de la ji lta ji ltar gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bsgrubs pas/ de lta de ltar sgrib pa thams cad sbyong bar 'gyur ro// ji tsam du sgrib pa byang bar gyur pa de tsam du chos kying/
203a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa mchog thob par 'gyur ro// ji tsam du chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa
203a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du dbang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang 'dzin cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / sgrib pa thams cad kyang sbyong bar 'gyur ro// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i byor/ de ni yang
203a3(rgyud 'bum): dag pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes dang / bden pa'i mtshan nyid du mthong ba de ni yang dag pa zhes bya/ 'phags pa'i gzigs pa zhes bya/ yang dag pa bden pa'i
203a4(rgyud 'bum): tshul du sangs rgyas mthong ba zhes bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul bzhin du chos nyid mthong ba'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du gzigs pa zhes bya'o// /
203a5(rgyud 'bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ni khams gsum las mngon par 'byung zhing yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol bas/ 'phags pa'i gang zag de lta bus mthong bar mi nus so//
203a6(rgyud 'bum): de ma mthong bas byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni thams cad kyang phyin ci log gis bslad pa dang / log pa'i rnam par rtog pas shes par mi nus te/ dper na shin tu mthu chung ba'i ri bong gi rgyal gyis rgya
203a7(rgyud 'bum): mtsho mi rgal ba bzhin du/ byis pa so so'i skye bo'i shes pas chos kyi de bzhin nyid mngon par shes par mi nus so// 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rtog pa med par chos thams cad la dbang chen
203b1(rgyud 'bum): po brnyes pa/ rnam par dag pa'i ye shes zab mo dang ldan pa rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul yin te/ gzhan dang thun mong du ma gyur pa'o// de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bskal pa tshad med grangs
203b2(rgyud 'bum): med par sku dang srog mi 'phangs par dka' ba spyod pas/ shin tu mchog dam pa/ bla na med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshig dang brjod pa'i spod yul las 'das pa/ shin tu zhi ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad
203b3(rgyud 'bum): dang bral ba'i sku de brnyes par gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i chos kyi chos nyid shes shing mthong ba ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba med par yun ring du 'tshe ba'o// gnyid kyis log pa dang /
203b4(rgyud 'bum): bkres pa dang / skom pa med par sems rtag par ting nge 'dzin du gnas te g.yo zhing spros pa med pa'o// gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la spros pa dang bcas pa'i sems skyes na/ des ni de bzhin gshegs
203b5(rgyud 'bum): pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ / gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bshad pa 'di phan pa dang bcas pas te/ sus mdo 'di thos pa des gcan gzan dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / skye bo mi
203b6(rgyud 'bum): bgrungs pa rnams dang yang phrad par mi 'gyur ro/ / chos 'di thos pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang zad par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni lung du mi ston pa dang / yul thams cad la mkhyen
203b7(rgyud 'bum): bar bzhed pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga' 'o/ / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la dgongs pa tha dad pa mi mnga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la ma brtags pa'i lung ston pa mi mnga' 'o// sangs rgyas bcom
204a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rnams ni spyod lam rnam pa bzhir ye shes kyis ma bzung ba med do/ / chos thams cad la thugs rjes ma zin pa med do// sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde/
204a2(rgyud 'bum): bsam bzung ba med do// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la las gser 'od dam pa mdo sde 'di thos te mos na/ de sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang /
204a3(rgyud 'bum): ma yin gyi gnas su nam yang mi lhung ngo // rtag tu lha dang me'i gnas su skye ste dman par mi skye ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed cing dam pa'i chos nyan cing 'dzin pa dang
204a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dag tu skye bar yang 'gyur te/ de ni chos shin tu zab mo 'di thos pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas/ bla na med pa yang
204a5(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang mkhyen cing lung yang ston to/ / gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shin tu zab mo dam pa'i chos 'di rna lam du lan cig thos pa'ang de ni
204a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa la dbang za bar mi 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos la mi smod/ 'phags pa rnams la mi brnyas/ skye dgu thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyes pa ni skyed par byed/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyes pa
204a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni 'phel ba dang yongs su smin par byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa stobs par byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying
204b1(rgyud 'bum): po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa'i lha rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas shin tu gus pa dang bcas pas
204b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'chang pa'i gnas de dang / yul de dag tu phan pa'i
204b3(rgyud 'bum): yon tan 'di bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ yul der rgyal po pha rol po'i dgra dang dpung dar bas mi tshugs pa dang / nad thams cad bsal zhing tshe ring ba dang / bkra shis shing bde bas yang
204b4(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i chos ston par byed do/ / btsun mo dang / slas dang / sras dang / sras mo dang / blon po rnams kyang 'dum zhing rtsen pa med pa dang / gtsam dang sgyus 'tshe ba spangs pas/ rgyal pos gnang zhing
204b5(rgyud 'bum): bkur bar 'gyur ba dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze la sogs pa dam pa'i chos spyod cing nad med pa dang / bde bas glo bur du 'tsho ba med pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad sgrub cing yongs su 'dzin
204b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / gang dus thams cad du 'byung ba chen po bzhi mi 'phrod pa med pa dang / rtag par lha rnams kyis srung zhing skyob pa dang / byams pa dang snying rje mnyam pas gnod pa med pa dang / 'tshe ba'i sems
204b7(rgyud 'bum): med pa dang / sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro zhing / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa sgrub par smon lam 'debs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang rtag tu mdo sde 'dra
205a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas par bgyi ba'i blang du/ / mdo sde 'di su 'dzin pa'i gang zag de'i gnas su mchi zhing phan gdags par bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bka' stsal te/
205a2(rgyud 'bum): legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin du khyed kyis kyang mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di 'jig rten na yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir spel ba dang / rgyas par bya ba la brtson par gyis
205a3(rgyud 'bum): shig/ gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ sku gsum rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gnyid log
205a4(rgyud 'bum): paba'i rmi lam na gser gyi rje kun tu snang ba/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo // phyogs thams cad na rang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grang med dpag tu med padag rin po che'i shing drun
205a5(rgyud 'bum): rin po che'i bai DUR+Ya'i khri rnams la bzhugs shing / 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong ngo // de na'ang skyes bu bram ze'i gzugs lta bu zhig rnga de rdub
205a6(rgyud 'bum): mthong ste/ rnga'i sgra de las bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung ba thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog sad ma thag tu bstan pa'i tshogs su bcad pa 'ang dag rjes su
205a7(rgyud 'bum): dran no/ / rjes su dran nas kyang de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ srog chags stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bya rgod phung po'i rig la ba dang bcom ldan
205b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug
205b2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ rmi lam na rnga'i sgra las tshogs su bcad pa gang dag thos pa de dag gsol to//
205b3(rgyud 'bum): nuchub gcig g.yel ba med par yang // bdag gi rmi lam rmis pa ni// mdzes pa'i rje chen mthong ba ste// thams cad du ni gser gyi 'od// nyi ma ji lta bzhin du 'bar// kun tu rnam par ldang nge ste/
205b4(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bcu rnams su snang bar gyur/ kun tu rin chen shing drung na// rin chen bai DUR+Ya dag gi/ khri la sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te// brgya stong phrag ni du ma yi// 'khor dbus mdun gyis
205b5(rgyud 'bum): bltas pa mthong / bram ze'i gzugs ni 'dra ba zhig/ rnga chen rab tu rdung ba mthong // de yis de la brdungs pa dang // tshigs su bcad ba 'di dag byung // gser 'od dam pa'i rnga chen sgra yis
205b6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / stong gsum 'jig rten 'jig rten gsum 'di na// ngan song sdug bsngal gshin rje'i sdug bsngal las// dbul ba'i sdug bsngal sdug bsngal zhi bar shog/ rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni//
205b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten rmongs pa thams cad zhi gyur cig/ ji ltar thub dbang 'jigs med 'jigs zhe ltar// sems can 'jigs med 'jigs dang bral bar shog/ ji ltar 'khor ba kun mkhyen thub dbang po//
206a1(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar// skye dgu'i ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag go// yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya mtshor gyur// rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni//
206a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i sgra ldan gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa mchog reg shog/ chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba skor gyur cig/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bzhugs par shog/ 'gro
206a3(rgyud 'bum): la phan phyir chos kyang ston gyur cig/ nyon mongs 'joms gyur sdug bsngal sel bar shog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur cig/ sems can gang dag ngan song sar gnas te// rus pa'i
206a4(rgyud 'bum): lus la me lce rab 'bar ba/ / de dag rnga chen bsgrags pa thos gyur cig/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi gyur nas// sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig thos shog/ sems can kun gyi tshe
206a5(rgyud 'bum): rabs brgya dag dang / / tshe rabs stong phrag bye ba skye dran shog/ thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig/ de dag gis ni rgya chen gsung thos shog/ rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas rnams
206a6(rgyud 'bum): dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed gyur/ / sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong bar shog/ bya ba dge ba rnams ni spyod gyur cig/ mi dang lha dang srog chags thams cad kyi// de dag bsam dang smon lam gang yin pa//
206a7(rgyud 'bum): rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yos ni// de dag rnams kyi re kun rdzogs gyur cig/ sems can gang dag sems dmyal mi bzad skyes// lus la me lce kun tu rab tu 'bar// skyabs med mya ngan bcas shing yongs 'khyam pa//
206b1(rgyud 'bum): me rnams de dag rab tu zhi bar shog/ sems dmyal yi dgas mi yo 'jig rten na// sems can sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po gang // rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// de dag rnams kyi sdug bsngal kun
206b2(rgyud 'bum): zhi shog/ rten med dpung gnyen med pa dang // skyabs med par ni gyur pa dag/ de rnams la ni sgrib pa dang // dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rkang gnyis dam pa dag/ thugs
206b3(rgyud 'bum): brtse thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs/ / gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// bzhugs pa bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag gis sngon chad sdig pa'i las// shin tu mi bzang gang bgyis pa// stobs
206b4(rgyud 'bum): bcu'i spyan sngar bdag mchis te/ / de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// pha ma dag tu mi 'dzin dang // sangs rgyas rnams su mi 'dzin dang // dge ba dag tu mi 'dzin dang // sdig pa bdag gis
206b5(rgyud 'bum): gang bgyis dang / / phyug pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang // rigs dang longs spong rgyags pa dang // gzhon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // nyes bsams
206b6(rgyud 'bum): nyes par smras pa dang / / nyes par bgyis pa'i las rnams dang // nyes pa'i dmigs su ma bltas pas// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // byis pa'i blo yi 'jug pa dang // mi shes mun pa'i
206b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dang ni/ / sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gyur dang // nyon mongs rnam par 'khrug sems dang // rtsed mo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang // mya ngan dang ni nad dbang dang // nor gyis mo chog nyes pa yis//
207a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // 'phags min skye bo 'dre ba dang // phrag dog ser sna'i rgyu dang ni// g.yo dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang /
207a2(rgyud 'bum): 'phongs pa byung ba'i dus kyi tshe// 'dod pa rnams kyi 'jigs sgyu dang // phyug po ma yin gyur pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // g.yo ba'i sems kyi dbang nyid dang // bkres dang skom
207a3(rgyud 'bum): gyis nyen pa yis/ / bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // bza' ba dag dang btung ba dang // bud med rgyu dang gos kyi phyir// nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang //
207a4(rgyud 'bum): lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdig/ nyes par spyod pa rnam gsum bsags// 'di 'dra'i tshul gyis gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang //
207a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang //
207a6(rgyud 'bum): gus pa ma lags bgyis pa rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// dam chos smra ba rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags bgyis pa dang // chos la'ang gus pa ma bgyis pa// de dag thams
207a7(rgyud 'bum): cad bdag 'chags so/ / bdag gis rtag tu mi shes pas// dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang // pha ma rnams la ma gus dang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// blun pa dang ni byos pa dang /
207b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal dregs pas bsgribs bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// bdag ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// stobs bcu rnams la mchod par shog/
207b2(rgyud 'bum): bdag ni phyogs bcur sems can rnams// sdug bsngal kun las 'don gyur cig/ sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun// sa bcu dag la 'god par shog/ sa bcu dag la gnas nas kyang // thams
207b3(rgyud 'bum): cad de bzhin gshegs gyur cig/ ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las// de kun thar bgyid nus srid du// sems can re re'i phyir yang ni// bskal pa bye bar spyod par shog/ gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi
207b4(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / las rnams thams cad byang byed pa// zab mo dag ni ston pa 'di// sems can de dag ston gyur cig/ gang gis bskal pa stong rnams su// sdig pa shin tu mi bzad bgyis// lan cig rab tu bshags
207b5(rgyud 'bum): ba yis/ / de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur// gang gis las kyi sgrib pa rnams// myur du yang dag zad 'gyur ba// gser 'od dam pa dge ba yis// bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas ni// rin chen
207b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung gnas mchog bcu po/ / sa bcu la ni gnas par shog/ sangs rgyas yon tan snang gyur cig/ srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang // yon tan rgya mtsho zab mo de//
207b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas yon tan bsam yas kyis// thams cad mkhyen du rdzogs par shog/ ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnams dang // gzungs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang // dbang stobs byang chub yan lag
208a1(rgyud 'bum): gis/ / stobs bcu dam par 'gyur bar shog/ dgongs pa'i thugs kyis sangs rgyas rnams// bdag la rnam par gzigs su gsol// thugs rjer ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni/
208a2(rgyud 'bum): nongs pa rab tu gzung du gsol// bdag gis bskal pa brgya rnams su// sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// de phyir bdag ni mya ngan sems// 'phongs dang mya ngan 'jigs pas gzir// sdig pa'i
208a3(rgyud 'bum): las la 'jigs par bgyid/ / yid ni rtag tu dman par gyur// gang dang gang du 'gro bgyid pa// bdag ni gang du'ang dga' ma mchis// sangs rgyas thams cad thugs rjer ldan// 'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs
208a4(rgyud 'bum): sel bas/ / nongs pa rab tu gzung du gsol// 'jigs pa dag las bdag thar mdzod// bdag gi nyon mongs las rnams kyi// dri ma de bzhin gshegs pas shol// sangs rgyas rnams kyis
208a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag la ni/ / thugs rje'i chu yis bkru bar gsol// sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// sngon chad bdag gis yang bgyis dang // da ltar bdag gi sdig pa gang // de dag thams cad bdag
208a6(rgyud 'bum): 'chags so/ / nongs par bgyis pa'i las rnams kun// slad chad mi bgyi bsdam par bgyi// bdag gis nongs par bgyis pa gang // sdig de bcab par mi bgyi'o// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang /
208a7(rgyud 'bum): ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// lus kyis bgyis dang ngag gi las// yid kyis rnam par bsams pa dang // las rnams
208b1(rgyud 'bum): bcu po bgyis pa dag/ de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// mi dge las bcu spangs nas su// dge ba bcu po bsten bgyis la// sa bcu la ni bdag gnas shing // stobs bcu mchog tu gyur par
208b2(rgyud 'bum): shog/ bdag gi ldog pa'i las gang dag/ mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas su// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir gang dag dang //
208b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu// gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyid pa// de dag kun la yi ring ngo // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs pa// bdag ni
208b4(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ / byang chub mchog la reg par shog/ srid 'gror nyam ngar byis pa'i blo yis ni// shin tu mi bzad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu mi nyams spyan sngar mchis nas ni/
208b5(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// skye ba nyam nga srid pa nyam nga dang // 'jig rten nyam nga g.yo sems nyam nga bar// lus kyi spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bsags
208b6(rgyud 'bum): de 'chags so/ / byis pa blun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang // sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga dang // srid pa nyam nga 'dod chags nyam nga dang // zhe sdang gti mug mun pa nyam pa dang // ngal ba'i
208b7(rgyud 'bum): nyam nga dus kyi nyam nga dang / / bsod nams bsgrubs pa nyam nga bdag gis kyang // rgyal ba mi mnyam mngon sum mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// sangs rgyas gser mdog ri
209a1(rgyud 'bum): @#snang ri rab 'dra/ / son tan rgya mtsho 'dral phyag 'tsham sa// rgyal ba de dag rnams la skyabs su mchi// rgyal ba de dag rnams la mags phyag 'tshal// gser mdog gas ngan dram
209a2(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i gser gyi 'od/ / dri med rnam dag bai DUR+Ya yi yan lag spyan// sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal gzi grags 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas// thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis mun pa mun nag bsal// yan lag rab
209a3(rgyud 'bum): tu dri med rab bzang rnam par mdzes/ / sangs rgyas nyi ma yan lag dri med gser 'dras khyab// nyon mongs mes gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i me 'dra la/ thub pa zla ba'i 'od zer dra bas tshim par mdzad//
209a4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis kyis dbang po yan lag mdzes// dpe byad bzang po dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes// dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs 'od zer dra ba yis// 'jig rten
209a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs/ / dri med rgya chen kha dog sna tshogs bai DUR+Ya// skya rengs dmar dang dngul dang shes bzhin yan lag dmar// 'od zer dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs legs brgyan pas//
209a6(rgyud 'bum): thub chen khyod ni nyi ma bzhin du de yis mdzes// mya ngan 'khrug pa 'chi chu rga ba'i rba rlabs can// 'khor ba'i klung chen 'phongs pa'i chu bor lhung ba la// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsub cing shugs
209a7(rgyud 'bum): drag pa/ / bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer mang po rnams kyis bskams// yan lag gser gyi mchog tu rnam par snang // ye shes 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog/ rab mdzes mtshan
209b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis yan lag rnam spras pa/ / sangs rgyas gser sku 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni dpag med dang // ji ltar sa las rdul mtha' yas dang // ji ltar ri rab rdo mtha' mtshungs med
209b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / / ji ltar nam mkha'i mtha' ma mtha' yas pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// sems can kun gyis shes par mi nus so// bskal pa du mar gzhal zhing bsams kyang ni// yon
209b3(rgyud 'bum): tan mtha' ma shes par mi nus so/ / chu ni skra yi rtse mo'i tshad tsam dang // rdor bcas rir bcas rgya mtshor bcas pa ni// bskal par bgrangs na shes par nus kyang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan shes par
209b4(rgyud 'bum): mi nus so/ / yon tan kha dog snyan dang grags pa dang // dge ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku lus dang // dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus brgyan pa yis// sems can thams cad de 'drar gyur par shog/
209b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// 'jig rten mi rang sangs rgyas 'gyur bar shog/ 'gro la phan phyir chos kyang ston gyur cig/ sems can sdug bsngal mang gzir thar byed shog/ stobs
209b6(rgyud 'bum): bcas sder bcas bdud las rgyal gyur cig/ chos kyi 'khor lo dge bskor bar shog/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab gnas gyur cig/ bdud rtsi'i chu yis sems can tshim byed shog/
209b7(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal bas rdzogs pa ltar// pha rol phyin drug bla med rdzogs par shog/ nyon mongs bcom zhing sdug bsngal sel gyur cig/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi byed shog/ tshe rabs
210a1(rgyud 'bum): @brgya dang tshe rabs bye ba stong/ / bdag ni rtag tu tshe rabs dran par shog/ thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig// de dag rnams kyi gsung rgya che thos shog/ bdag ni dag pa
210a2(rgyud 'bum): las rnams 'di dag gis/ / rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par shog// sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong gyur cig/ dge ba'i 'byung gnas dge rnams spyod par shog/ zhing rnams kun na srog
210a3(rgyud 'bum): chags thams cad kyang / / 'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kum zhir gyur// sems can dbang po ma tshang yan lag nyams// de kun de ring dbang po tshang bar shog/ gang dag nad btab nyam chung
210a4(rgyud 'bum): lus nyams dang / / phyogs bcu dag na skyabs med gyur pa rnams// de kun myur du nang las thar gyur cig/ nad med stobs dang dbang po rnyed par shog/ gang dag rgyal po chom rkun dgras bsdigs
210a5(rgyud 'bum): sa thug dang / / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brgya yis 'alongs gyur pa// sems can nyam thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun// 'jigs mchog mi bzang brgya po de las thar gyur cig/ gang
210a6(rgyud 'bum): dag brdegs shing bcings gzir ba/ / 'phongs pa sna tshogs dag na gnas gyur cing // nyon mongs stong phrag du mas dkrugs nas kyang // 'jigs pa mi bzang mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed// de dag thams
210a7(rgyud 'bum): cad bcings las grol gyur cig/ rdeg pa dag ni brdeg las thar par shog/ bsad pa rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur cig/ 'phongs gyur thams cad 'jigs pa med par shog/ sems can
210b1(rgyud 'bum): gang dag bkres sred skom gyis gzir/ / de dag zas skom sna tshogs rnyed par shog/ long bas gzugs rnams sna tshogs mthong gyur cig/ 'on pas yid 'ong sgra rnams thos par shog/ gcer bu
210b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis sna tshogs gos rnyed gyur/ / sems can dbul pos gter rnams rnyed par shog/ nor 'bru rin chen sna tshogs mang po yis// sems can thams cad bde dang ldan par shog/ gang yang sdug
210b3(rgyud 'bum): bsngal tsher bas gnod ma gyur/ / sems can thams cad blta na sdug pa dang // gzugs bzang mdzes shing tshul du shis par shog/ rtag tu bde ba du ma sogs gyur cig/ yid kyis zas skom rab 'byor bse
210b4(rgyud 'bum): nams dag/ bsams ma thag tu de dag grub gyur cig/ rdza rnga cang ke'u bi wang sgra snyan dang / chu mog mtsho dang rdzing bu lteng ka dag/ gser gyi pad+ma ut+pal 'dab ma can// zas skom gos nor mu tig nor
210b5(rgyud 'bum): bu dbyig/ rgyan gser rin chen sna tshogs bai DUR+Ya// de dag bsams ma thag tu grub gyur cig/ 'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byung // sems can gcig kyang mi 'grong mthong ma gyur// de dag tham
210b6(rgyud 'bum): kha dog rgya chen dang / / phan tshun du ni 'od byed gyur par shog/ mi yi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yod// de dag bsams par skye bar de dag gyur// bsams pa thams cad bsams ma thag tu yang //
210b7(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par shog/ spos dang 'phreng ba dag dang bug pa dang // gos dang bye ma me tog sna tshogs dang // sngon shing dag las dus gsum 'bab par shog/ sem
211a1(rgyud 'bum): can de dag len cing dgar gyur cing / / de bzhin gshegs pa bsam las thams cad dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang // rdul bral dri med brtan pa'i chos la/
211a2(rgyud 'bum): yang // phyogs bcu rnams su mchod pa byed par shog/ 'gro ba dman pa thams cad spong gyur cig/ mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog/ ngal ba'i rgyal po dam pa mchog thob gyur// rtag tu
211a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog/ rtag tu mthon po'i rigs su skye bar shog/ nor dang 'bru yi mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig/ snyan dang grags dang gzugs dang kha dog gis// bskal pa du mar
211a4(rgyud 'bum): legs par rgyan par shog/ bud med thams cad rtag tu por gyur te// dpa' zhing rtul phong mkhas shing gsal bar shog/ de kun rtag tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur// pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par
211a5(rgyud 'bum): shog/ phyogs bcu dag na rin chen shing dbang drung // sangs rgyas bde bzhugs rin chen bai DUR+Ya'i// khri la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig/ chos bstan pa yang de dag thos par shog/
211a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis sdig pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa ni// srid pa nyam ngar sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa// sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob pa/ de dag thams cad ma lus zad gyur cig/ sems can
211a7(rgyud 'bum): gang dag srid par bcings gnas kun/ / 'khor ba'i zhags pa'i thag pas dam bcings la// shes rab lag gis bcings pa khrol bar shog/ sdug bsngal rnams las thar gyur thob gyur cig/ sems
211b1(rgyud 'bum): can gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dang / / gang dag 'jig rten khams ni gzhan rnams na// bsod nams sna tshogs zab mo rnams byed pa// de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo // lus dang ngag dang yin
211b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis bsgrubs pa yis/ / bdag gis rjes su yi rang bsod nams nges// bdag gi smon grub 'bras bu yod par shog/ byang chub rdul bral dri med thob gyur cig/ gang dag rtag dang dri ma bral ba dang // dri med
211b3(rgyud 'bum): yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang / / yongs su bsngo ba'i brjod pa 'di yis ni// bskal pa drug cur ngan song spong bar 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis// skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal
211b4(rgyud 'bum): rigs las/ / thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal ba gang bstod pa// tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur// yan lag dbang po kun gyis yan lag brgyan// bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan/
211b5(rgyud 'bum): mi dbang rgyal los rtag tu de mchod de// de dang de dag tu ni de 'drar 'gyur// gang dag rna ba'i bu gar bshags pa 'di ni grag gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin// gnyis la
211b6(rgyud 'bum): ma yin bzhi la ma yin lnga min bcu la min/ / de ltar sangs rgyas stong gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsan nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
211b7(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / lems so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi ni lam na gser gyi rnga las de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa 'i yon tam bsngags pa dang
212a1(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa bshags pa 'di dag gang gis thos pa de dag thams cad bsod nams kyi phung po rgya chen po dang ldan pa dang / skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / bde bas tshim par byed do//
212a2(rgyud 'bum): sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur bar shes par gyis shig/ 'di lta bu'i spyod pa khyad par can dang ldan pa 'di dag ni thams cad kyang sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dag la bstod pa dang / smon
212a3(rgyud 'bum): lam rgya chen po btab pa'i rgyu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de dag thos par gyur pa yin no zhes bka' stsal nas/ de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis
212a4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rmi lam na bshags pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par
212a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dbye ba la bzhugs te/ shin tu zab mo mchog tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ sku'i ba spu'i bu ga dag nas 'od zer kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong tshad med pa
212a6(rgyud 'bum): byung bas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od de'i nang du snang bar gyur pa ni/ phyogs bcu'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis kyang dpe dang tshad kyis skrun par mi nus so// snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams
212a7(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer des snang bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag mi dge bcu'i las kyi lam dang mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skur pa 'debs pa dang / bla ma dang gnyen pa la se zhu chung ba dang /
212b1(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon dang bram ze la bkur sti mo byed pa rnams/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas kyi gnas su ltung bar gyur pa de dag gi gnas su 'ong des reg ma thag tu bde ba so sor myong bar gyur
212b2(rgyud 'bum): to/ / gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od de'i mthus thams cad bde zhing nyams dga' ba dang / kha dog dang dbyibs legs pa'i mchog thob pas mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes
212b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshigs kyis brgyan dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po lha'i tshogs mang po dang / gang+gA'i lha mo la sogs te/ 'khor 'dus pa de dag ya mtshan
212b4(rgyud 'bum): du gyur pa'i 'od des bskul nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu stan
212b5(rgyud 'bum): las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
212b6(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang
212b7(rgyud 'bum): dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ las kyi sgrib pa rnams ji ltar so sor
213a1(rgyud 'bum): bshags par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
213a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/
213a3(rgyud 'bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos zag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i sgra/
213a4(rgyud 'bum): nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten gsum la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams
213a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/

213b1(rgyud 'bum): nyam bag tu spyod du 'dzud pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i gnas/ phyag bgyi ba'i gnas/ ri mo bgyi ba'i gnas/ mkhyen par gyur
213b2(rgyud 'bum): par spyan du gyur pa/ dbang du gyu pa/ tshad mar gyur pa/ mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ gzigs pa dang ldan pa de dag la bdag mgo dang / ngag dang / yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo// thog ma dang

214a1(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ dge 'dun gyi sa 'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nor brkus pa 'am/ ji ltar bslab pa'i gzhi bcas pa rnams kyi 'dul ba dang 'gal bar bgyis

216a5(rgyud 'bum): paba'i ye shes dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub par 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o//
