216a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan skye'o/ / gzhan 'gag go// de la 'das pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag ni 'gags pa/ zad pa dang bral ba/ rnam par gyur pa ste/ de dag la'ang las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med
216b1(rgyud 'bum): do/ / de ltar na 'du byed pa gang yin pa rnams kyang med pa las byung ba ste/ de dag la'ang las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ni
216b2(rgyud 'bum): stong pa/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ 'dus ma byas pa zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu chos thams cad bdag las byung yang bdag kyang
216b3(rgyud 'bum): yod pa ma yin no/ / shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'di lta ste/ sems can med pa'i mtha'i chos kyi tshul 'di la 'dug pa 'di ni las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba
216b4(rgyud 'bum): ste/ shA ri'i bu 'ang ni so sor bshags pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos
216b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/
216b6(rgyud 'bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rjes su yi rang bar gyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
216b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bkal stsas to// shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar la/ pus
217a1(rgyud 'bum): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsug te thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten nas sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang
217a2(rgyud 'bum): tshul khrims las byung ba dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'dus bgyis pa de dag thams cad la'ang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo // rjes su
217a3(rgyud 'bum): yi rang ba dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / khyad par can dang / rab dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / ltag na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
217a4(rgyud 'bum): pas rjes su yi rang ngo / / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / sgom pa las byung
217a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad la'ang rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas/ rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis
217a6(rgyud 'bum): rjes su yi rang ngo / / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams
217a7(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bgyid pa de dag thams cad la'ang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas/ rjes su yi rang ba ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang /
217b1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag da ltar na sems dang po bskyed pa de dag gis dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa brgyas
217b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa dang / phyir mi
217b3(rgyud 'bum): ldog pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa de dag thams cad la'ang rjes su yi rang ba'i
217b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas/ rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
217b5(rgyud 'bum): pa na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bgyis pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la'ang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo // rjes su yi rang ba dam pa dang / gtso
217b6(rgyud 'bum): bo dang / khyad par can dang / rab dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / ltag na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ngo // ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub
217b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa spyod pa na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mngon par 'du bgyid par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad la'ang rjes
218a1(rgyud 'bum): su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo / / rjes su yi rang ba dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / khyad par can dang / rab dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / b+hag na
218a2(rgyud 'bum): med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa de dag pha rol
218a3(rgyud 'bum): tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mngon par 'du bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la'ang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo / / rjes su yi rang ba dam pa dang / gtso bo dang /
218a4(rgyud 'bum): khyad par can dang / rab dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / ltag na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ngo // skye bo mang po la sman pa
218a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
218a6(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu
218a7(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa/ chos kyi tshul rab tu bzung ba chos kyi char rab tu phab pa/ chos kyi char rab tu btang ba/ chos kyi rnga rab tu brdungs pa/ chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs pa/ chos kyi dung
218b1(rgyud 'bum): bus pa/ chos kyi srog shing bsgrengs pa/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad pa/ sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa/ nyam bag tu spyod du 'jud pa gang lags pa dang / de la nyan
218b2(rgyud 'bum): thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la'ang rjes su/
218b3(rgyud 'bum): yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas/ rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo // skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la blugs brtse
218b4(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / skye bo bal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
218b5(rgyud 'bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i bar dag gang lags pa dang / de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ byang chub sas
218b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad la'ang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas//
218b7(rgyud 'bum): rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo // skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang
219a1(rgyud 'bum): sgra dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
219a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu ston pa/ chos kyi tshul rab tu 'dzin pa/ chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ chos kyi
219a3(rgyud 'bum): char rab tu gtong ba/ chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad pa/ chos kyi rnga rdung ba// chos kyi rnga bo che rdung ba/ chos kyi dung 'bud pa/ chos kyi srog shing sgreng ba/ sems
219a4(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pos tshim par mdzad pa/ nyim bag tu spyod du 'dzud pa gang lags pa dang / de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ byang chub sems
219a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la'ang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas/ rjes su yi rang ba mi
219a6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi ring ngo zhes brjod par bya'o/ / shA ri'i bu 'di ni rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po'o// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rjes su yi rang ba'i
219a7(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams kyi phung po 'dis rjes su yi rang na/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang po grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can nas/ 'jig
219b1(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa zag pa zad par gyur la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de dag la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
219b2(rgyud 'bum): gos dang / zas dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa bas/ gang zhig rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes su yi rang na/ de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du grangs med dpag
219b3(rgyud 'bum): tu med pa skyed do/ / shA ri'i bu de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes su
219b4(rgyud 'bum): yo rang bar bya'o/ / bud med skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'dod cing / bud med kyi dbang po brje bar 'dod pas kyang rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
219b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ba dang /
219b6(rgyud 'bum): da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mos pa skyed par 'gyur ba'i bskul ba'i phung po'ang bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang pa shA ri'i bu
219b7(rgyud 'bum): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/
220a1(rgyud 'bum): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'od
220a2(rgyud 'bum): pas/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ska nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
220a3(rgyud 'bum): gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
220a4(rgyud 'bum): dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar skul gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse
220a5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bstan du gsol/ chos kyi tshul
220a6(rgyud 'bum): rab tu gzung du gsol/ chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad du gsol/ chos kyi sgron ma'abar dar mdzad du gsol/ chos kyi char dbab tu gsol/ chos kyi char gtang du gsol/ chos kyi rnga rdung du gsol
220a7(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi rnga bo che rdung du gsol/ chos kyi dung 'bung du gsol/ chos kyi srog shing gleng du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa
220b1(rgyud 'bum): la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ nyin lan gsum
220b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar na phyogs
220b3(rgyud 'bum): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sku tshe'i 'du byed gtong ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba 'debs kyis
220b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang /
220b5(rgyud 'bum): sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni rab tu bskor/ chos kyi sgron me ni rab tu 'bar bar mdzad/ chos kyi char ni rab tu 'bebs/ chos kyi char ni rab tu gtong / chos kyi rnga ni rab
220b6(rgyud 'bum): tu rdung / chos kyi rje bo chen rab tu rngu / chos kyi drung ni rab tu 'bud/ chos kyi srog shing ni rab tu sbreng / chos kyi sgron me ni mched par mdzad/ sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas
220b7(rgyud 'bum): ni tshim par mdzad/ nyam bag tu spyod du 'dzud cing re zhig bzhugs su gsol/ gsol ba btab pa'i phung po 'di'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos so// jis
221a1(rgyud 'bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin du 'di yongs su bsngo'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ / shA ri'i bu 'di ni gsol ba gdab pa'i phung po
221a2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gsol ba gdab pa'i phung po 'dis gsol ba 'debs na/ bsod nams mang po grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
221a3(rgyud 'bum): mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas/ gang gis de bzhin
221a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar bskul na/ de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lha zhog
221a5(rgyud 'bum): ste/ shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
221a6(rgyud 'bum): la dbul ba sum pas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la gsal ba btab na/ de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do// de tsa'i byor zhe na/ shA ri'i bungs ldan
221a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des ni nga la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/
221b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du//
221b2(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol zhes/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol ba btab bo// shA ri'i bu ngas sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa spyod pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ring du
221b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs par gsol te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des ni nga mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mo 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
221b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa thob ste/ nga'i dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
221b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
221b6(rgyud 'bum): la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/ drug pachan pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/ sems can gzhan dag cang rung ste/ tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyabar
221b7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal bas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i srang du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ji skar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
222a1(rgyud 'bum): tsha bu la 'di sad ces bka' stsal to/ / shAr bu 'ad la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la'ang dag par zhugs pa'am/ dasangs
222a2(rgyud 'bum): pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya
222a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pas/ nyi ma lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du tshig 'di skad ces/ thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus bgyis par gyur pa/ sangs
222a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas sam/ chos sam/ dge 'dun nam/ gang zag gam/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams sam/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ zan tshangs gcig tsam skul bar gyur pa dang
222a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chags pa gang lags pa dang / gsol ba gdab pa gang lags pa dang / skyabs su mchi ba gang lags pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / so sor 'chags
222a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gang lags pa dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de
222a7(rgyud 'bum): dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus/ gzhal bzlums te/ sems dul zhing rnam par grol ba dang gzung ba ma mchis pas/ sems can thams cad la stsal to// ji ster dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can
222b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams la gtang bar bgyi ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa mi mnga' bas/ ji ltar mkhyen pa de lta bus bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa bde btang ngo // sems can
222b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad lag na rin po che dang ldan par gyur cig/ nam mkha'i mdzod dang / longs spyod zad mi shes pa dang / bsod nam zad mi shes pa dang / chos zad mi shes pa dang / ye shes zad mi shes zad mi
222b3(rgyud 'bum): shes pa dang / spobs pa zad mi shes pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig/ bdag gis
222b4(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'di sems can thams cad la stsal ba las byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus/ gzhal bzlums te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
222b5(rgyud 'bum): tu yongs su bsngo'o/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
222b6(rgyud 'bum): kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
222b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtse ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can
223a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar
223a2(rgyud 'bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo
223a3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na
223a4(rgyud 'bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
223a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po de dag gis byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yong su bsngos pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar
223a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa bo rnams yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig
223a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa
223b1(rgyud 'bum): dri ma med pa/ shin tu dkar ba la bzhugs nas/ bdud sdig can bcom ste/ shes par bgyi ba dang / blta bar bgyi ba dang / rtogs par bgyi ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi ba gang tsa'ang
223b2(rgyud 'bum): rung ste/ de thams cad nam gyi tho rangs skya rengs 'char kar skad cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bdud rtsi brnyes te/ 'chi ba med par 'gro ba'i lam mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du
223b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag dang sems can thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar
223b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med pa dang / 'od mchog dang / 'od dge dang / bsod nams 'od dang / mi 'khrugs pa dang / seng ge dang / 'od zer brgya pa dang / 'od zer mtho dang / 'od
223b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi dra ba can dang / rin chen 'od 'phro dang / 'od 'bar dang / snang ba'i rgyal po dang / shin tu rgyan dang / rin chen me tog dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / yan lag mchog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
223b6(rgyud 'bum): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
223b7(rgyud 'bum): dza tsam du skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye ba sel po che dang / swa dang / ma rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slang du
224a1(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba de bzhin du/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ skye ba
224a2(rgyud 'bum): mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab
224a3(rgyud 'bum): tu skor bar shog cig ces brjod par bya'o/ / shA ri ri bu 'di ni yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po ste/ bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/
224a4(rgyud 'bum): dpe'i bar du'ang mi bzod do// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di len tam/ kun chub par byed dam/ 'dzin ta ma/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag
224a5(rgyud 'bum): par rab tu ston na/ de'i bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams
224a6(rgyud 'bum): cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag snga phyi med par mi'o lus thob nas kyang / rang byang chub thob par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis ba
224a7(rgyud 'bum): stang dang phud dung du bya ba'i phyir gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis ji srid 'tshe'i bar du bsnyen bkur byas te/ rim gro bya ba lan cig tsam yang rin po che
224b1(rgyud 'bum): rna # 'a / nas pa dgas na shA smra// hA t+ma/ sA k+sha
224b2(rgyud 'bum): shel dang / sdug dang / mu tig dmar po las 'bang du dpag tshad bcu pa byas te/ de dag la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / ba dan phra mo rnams kyis mchod pa byas na/ shA ri'i drure
224b3(rgyud 'bum): ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//
224b4(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsas pa/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang mdo 'di 'dzin tam/ kun chub par byed dam/ 'don par byed dam/ klog gam/ skye bo mang po la yang dag par rab tu ston tam
224b5(rgyud 'bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs na/ de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas bsod nams kyi phung po 'ang
224b6(rgyud 'bum): 'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ dpe'i bar du'ang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sgrub pa 'di la gnas pa na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
224b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba'i phyir ro/ / shA ri'i bu sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa mchog ces ngas bshad do// de nas
225a1(rgyud 'bum): @#'khor de las srog chags khri stan las langs te/ so so nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das galab de
225a2(rgyud 'bum): logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis mdo 'di gzung bar bgyi'o// gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par/
225a3(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o// sgrub pa la gnas par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dge ba'i chos de lta bu dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
225a4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing don du gnyer ba lags so/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la lha'i me tog man da ra bas mngon par gtor to// mngon par
225a5(rgyud 'bum): gtor nas kyang tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa'i gces spras bgyid pa lasas
225a6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ spa'i dbang po ngas mngon par shes te/ 'di nas bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grang
225a7(rgyud 'bum): med par gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa
225b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo // lha'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
225b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi phung po chen po de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag drug cu thub par gyur to/ / de'i nyan thos thog mar 'dus pa ni bye ba phrag 'bum yod de/ thams cad
225b3(rgyud 'bum): kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa sha stag go/ de'i nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa ni bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad yod de/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa sha stag go// de'i nyan thos
225b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa gsum pa ni bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu yod de/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa sha stag go// lha'i dbang po de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
225b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi phung po chen po de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgur don gyi phyir rgyu'o// lha'i dbang po de'i tshe bud med pa
225b6(rgyud 'bum): rdza mo zhes bya ba zhig 'khor 'dus pa de nyid ca nang du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ chos kyi rnamagrangs 'di ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od byer gyi chung mi chen gyi las mangs sum du 'drung
225b7(rgyud 'bum): kur chub par byas/ blangs nas skye bo mang po la yang dag par bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs para'agyur to// de nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi lus rdzas
226a1(rgyud 'bum): te skyes pa'i dbang po thob nas/ rtag par rgyun du lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ lan brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'khor mos sgyur ba'i rgyal po byas nas/ de bzhin
226a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya bar gyur te/ ko'u shi ka 'di nas shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgya na chos ston te/ ngas da ltar na'ang mthong ngo // ko'u shi ka su dgagra bcom ldan 'das
226a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de'i mtshan thos pa de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par nges par 'gyur ro/ / bud med gang la la zhig
226a4(rgyud 'bum): gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de'i mtshan thos sam/ 'chi kar yang mngon sum du byed na/ de nyid de'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma yin no//
226a5(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di'i phan yon rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyun thams
226a6(rgyud 'bum): cad gcod par 'gyur ro/ / yang dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'chad cing ston pa'i gnas dang / yul
226a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor der phan yon rnam pa 'di bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ yul de'i rgyal po nad med cing gnod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / tshe ring zhing bar chad mi 'byung ba dang / dgra dang pa
226b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'joms par mi 'gyur ba dang / bde ba la longs spyod cing dam pa'i chos yongs su rgyas par byed pa de ni/ mi'i rgyal po de la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang /
226b2(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin gyi bdag po la sogs pas yongs su bsrungs pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i 'khor de dag la rigs kyi bu dag de de lta yin nam zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de nas brgya byin
226b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa tshad med pa'i 'khor de dag so so nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// de de lta lags so// bcom ldan 'das yul 'khor gang du mdo sde'i dbang po 'di klog cing 'don pa dang /
226b4(rgyud 'bum): ston pa de'i rgyal po dang yul 'khor der mchis te/ de la bdag cag gis rtag tu srung ba dang lhan cig gnas par bgyis te/ rgyal po de'i phas kyi dgra dang / gnod pa dang / bar chad dang / nad dang / mya ngan
226b5(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/ / tshe ring ba dang / bde ba dang / bkra shis su ldan zhing bsams pa thams cad 'grub pas rtag par sems dga' bar yang bgyi'o// rgyal po'i 'khor de'i dmag
226b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang dpa' zhing brtul phod par bgyi'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ legs so// legs so// rigs kyi bu dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin du
226b7(rgyud 'bum): skabs shig dang / rgyal po de chos bzhin du spyod pas/ de'i 'bangs rnams kyang rgyal po bzhin chos bzhin spyad par 'gyur ro// de la khyed kyis mthu dang kha dog phun sum tshogs pas btang zhing / phan pa dam pas gnas pa dang /
227a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la sogs pa 'od can du gyis shig/ de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bkar sprul pa bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol to//
227a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang mdo sde'i dbang po 'di bstan pa dang / rgyas par byed pa'i gnas dang / yul der rgyal po'i blon po rnams la phan yon rnam pa 'di bzhi
227a3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gcig la gcig gus shing mdza' ba'i sems su 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu rgyal pos gnang zhing dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal phran la sogs pas
227a4(rgyud 'bum): btsun par 'dzin pa dang / dam pa'i chos don du gnyer zhing khe dang grags pa mi tshol bas grags pa chen po phyogs su rgyas shing kun gyis bstod pa dang / tshe ring zhing bde bar longs spyod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/
227a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang dam pa'i chos 'di ston pa'i yul de'i dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la phan yon 'di bzhi 'byung ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / sman la sogs pas
227a6(rgyud 'bum): 'phongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / de dag kun kyang klog po dang 'don pa'i bsam pas sems bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ri deng nags tshal la sogs par gnas pa bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang
227a7(rgyud 'bum): brnag par bya ba'i bsam pa de yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang mdo 'di 'don pa'i yul de'i skye bo de dag nad med cing bde ba 'phel ba dang / nor dang / yo byad/
227b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / rin po che la sog pa sgrub pa myur du 'grub cing bsod nams 'phel ba la sogs te/ phan yon rnam pa de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs
227b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'khor de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das don zab mo ston pa'i mdo sde 'ang ji srid 'jig rten na gnas kyi bar du/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams kyang
227b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas par 'gyur ro/ / mdo sde 'di nam mi bzhugs par gyur pa'i dus der dam pa'i chos rnams kyang med par 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de lta'o// rigs kyi bu dag
227b4(rgyud 'bum): de lta bas na khyed kyis gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'di las tha na tshig gcig gam/ tshogs su bcad pa gcig gam/ le'u gcig gam/ sde tshang bar yang rung ste/ yang dag par gdon par bya/ gzung bar bya/

227b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba mi le'u
227b7(rgyud 'bum): ste lnga pa'o/ / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lga ngas la
228a1(rgyud 'bum): btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi gdugs dang / me tog gi phur mas
228a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sem byang chub kyi sem+ba zhes bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa lags
228a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub la ni sems sam/ byang chub sems dpa' ma dmigs/ mi dmigs/ dmigs par yang mi 'gyur ro// byang chub las gud na'ang
228a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub kyi sems mi dmigs te/ byang chub ni brjod du ma mchis/ sems ni gzugs ma mchis bstan du ma mchis/ thogs pa ma mchis/ bstan rnam par rig pa ma mchis shing sems par yang mi dmigs/
228a5(rgyud 'bum): na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos 'di dag gi don rtogs par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub ni brda 'am/ gdags pa 'am/ tha snyad du mi dmigs shing /
228a6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub las gud na byang chub kyi sems kyang mi dmigs la/ byang chub ni brjod du med/ sems ni gzugs med/ bstan du med/ thogs pa med/ rnam par rig pa med/ sems pa yang mi dmigs
228a7(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni brjod du med pa ste/ byang chub ji lta bar sems kyang de bzhin no// sems ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no// byang chub dang sems ji lta bar sems pa rnams
228b1(rgyud 'bum): kyang de bzhin no/ / sems pa rnams ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar 'byung ba'i chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /
228b2(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa'i mi thob bo// chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sems de ni byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o// byang chub ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin te/ sems kyang de
228b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin no/ / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'di la ci'ang rnyed pa med de/ byang chub kyang med/ byang chub tu gdags pa'ang med/ sems can yang med/ sems can du gdags pa'ang med/ nyan
228b4(rgyud 'bum): thos kyang med/ nyan thos su gdags pa'ang med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang med/ rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa'ang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ byang chub sems dpar gdags pa'ang med
228b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyang med/ sangs rgyas su gdags pa'ang med/ 'dus byas kyang med/ 'dus byas su gdags pa'ang med/ 'dus ma byas kyang med/ 'dus ma byas su gdags pa'ang mi dmigs
228b6(rgyud 'bum): dmigs par mi 'gyur ba'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'on kyang dper na ri rab kyi tshul du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i sems dang po bskyed de/ de la rgyu ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o//
228b7(rgyud 'bum): sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni chos thams cad kyi bya ba'i gnas kyi tshul gyis sa lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni 'jigs pa med pa dang
229a1(rgyud 'bum): bya bya/ bag tsha ba med pa dang / skrag pa med pa'i tshul gyis ri rigs kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi rtsel lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa
229a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis sred med kyi bu'i mthu dang / stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus dang / brtul ba lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems
229a3(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa lnga pa ni bsod nams kyis chog mi shes pa'i tshul gyis dge ba sna tshogs kyis yang dag par 'phags pa lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi ba'o// sems bskyed pa drug pa ni//
229a4(rgyud 'bum): mun pa mun nag chen po sel ba'i tshul gyis nyi ma'i dkyil khor 'od gsal ba lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa bdun pa ni ded dpon mdzod chen pos phyug
229a5(rgyud 'bum): pa lta bur 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las sgrol ba'i tshul gyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ de la legs par brgyan pa lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin
229a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / sems bskyed pa brgyad pa ni zla ba nya'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i dpe'i tshul gyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam pa dag pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu
229a7(rgyud 'bum): phyin pa'o/ / sems bskyed pa dgu pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa lta bur
229b1(rgyud 'bum): blta ste/ de la rgyu ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa bcu pa ni yon tan dang / ye shes dang / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bar dbang skur ba thob pas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan gyi dpe'i tshul
229b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa ni bcu po 'di dag yin te/ 'di dag dang ldan pas
229b3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ / don dam par na 'di la byang chub kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ byang chub kyi sems kyang med do// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams
229b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa sngon du 'gro
229b5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang / snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi rten sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs
229b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dra'i sngon du 'gro
229b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las yongs su dag
230a1(rgyud 'bum): pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rnam par mi 'tshe ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / ngan song thams
230a2(rgyud 'bum): cad rnam par spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la bkod pa sngon
230a3(rgyud 'bum): du 'gro ba dang / bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
230a4(rgyud 'bum): sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa 'di bcu'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rjes su
230a5(rgyud 'bum): chags pa spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / khong khro ba spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / lus la mi lta ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / srog la yid mi rton pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / mos pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can
230a6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su smin par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams pa'i stobs sngon du 'gro ba dang / zab mo'i chos la bzod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rgya chen po la mos pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / mi shes pa bsal ba sngon du
230a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
230b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod snyam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dge ba'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid mngon par 'grub pas
230b2(rgyud 'bum): rjes su yi rang ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / zhum pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bsdu ba thob par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / dran pa nyer bar gzhag
230b3(rgyud 'bum): pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'dul ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad kyis dben pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba sngon du gro ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
230b4(rgyud 'bum): shes yang dag par sgrub pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
230b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos la gnas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba dang /
230b6(rgyud 'bum): snyos par 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / yang dge par rdzog pa'i byang chung sngon du grob dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang /
230b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin gyi stobs sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su
231a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyang ba sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i tshe rnam pa tshul// rigs bu de la byu
231a2(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa 'di bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / khams la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro
231a3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / skye mched la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bden pa la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad bsal ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
231a4(rgyud 'bum): shes rab kyi dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba sngon
231a5(rgyud 'bum): du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sem dpa' rnam kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
231a6(rgyud 'bum): sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi rten sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams pa dang snying rje chen po sngon
231a7(rgyud 'bum): du 'gro ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mi skye ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / khyad par gyi ye shes mthong ba khong du chud pa sngon du
231b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gro bdang / pha ro du phyin pa yongs su byung bar bya ba dang / yongs su smin par ba ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / dngos po jis pa bzhin du yongs su rtogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems kyi stobs nye bar
231b2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su thob par byed pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa
231b3(rgyud 'bum): bcu'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa thabs
231b4(rgyud 'bum): po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon
231b5(rgyud 'bum): du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / lhags pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa thibs po nye bar
231b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dang khams gsum gyi thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal gyi thibs po nye
231b7(rgyud 'bum): bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba thabs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi phung po gsum du rnam par gzhag pa thibs
232a1(rgyud 'bum): po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dbang po ma skyo ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
232a2(rgyud 'bum): smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/ / rigs kyi du de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ phru gang
232a3(rgyud 'bum): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gzod ma nas byung ba med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas mtshan nyid med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas skye ba med
232a4(rgyud 'bum): pa sngon du 'gro ba dang chos thams cad gzod ma nas yod pa ma yin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas chags pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad 'jug pa med pa
232a5(rgyud 'bum): sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad ldog pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad kyi thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma mnyam pa
232a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa'i rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin
232a7(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos
232b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rnam par dbye ba la shin tu rnam par brtag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dkar ze'i chos shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi tshogs bsags pa dpag tu med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsod na/
232b2(rgyud 'bum): dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yongs su gzung ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / snying rje chen po yangs pa khong du chud par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba'i rim pa shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /
232b3(rgyud 'bum): sems can gyi khams dang nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la 'jug cing rjes su 'gro ba shes pa yid la byed pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / stobs bcu dang /
232b4(rgyud 'bum): mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la lhag par dmigs shing kun shes par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang
232b5(rgyud 'bum): bskur ba'i sa thob pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gang zhe na/ spyod pa'i
232b6(rgyud 'bum): khyad par yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ / ye shes zab cing rgya che ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la chags pa
232b7(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i dodon la rol tu phyin pa'i dzin no/ / 'khor ba'i nyes pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa tsha ngan ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// skye bo ma mkhas pa rnams khong du chud par byed pa don ni la rol du phyin pa 'dzin no//
233a1(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi mdzod zad mi shes pa yang dag par ston pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i
233a2(rgyud 'bum): don no/ / sems can gyi khams rab tu shes par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sbyin pa mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// tshul khrims mnyam pa nyid yongs
233a3(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ / bzod pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i
233a4(rgyud 'bum): don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ / bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i
233a5(rgyud 'bum): don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ / chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//
233a6(rgyud 'bum): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang dag par thob par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed
233a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ / byang chub kyi snying po la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// bdud thams cad gdul bar bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin
233b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i don no/ / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su med par ston cing sgrol ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// phas kyi rgol
233b2(rgyud 'bum): ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don
233b3(rgyud 'bum): no/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa'i don ni pha rol
233b4(rgyud 'bum): tu phyin pa'i don no/ / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang
233b5(rgyud 'bum): bo'i snga ltas ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
233b6(rgyud 'bum): po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa'i snga ltas ni gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil lta bur gyur pa la/ rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas legs
233b7(rgyud 'bum): par brgyan par mthong ngo / / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' sa gsum pa'i snga ltas ni/ bdag nyid dpa' zhing lag cha dang go cha sra ba thogs
234a1(rgyud 'bum): nas pas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul bar mthong ngo / / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa'i snga ltas na
234a2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bzhi nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la me tog sna tshogs kyis mngon du 'thor bar mthong ngo / / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
234a3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa'i snga ltas ni/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bud med kyi mgo la me tog tsam pa ka'i 'phreng ba 'dogs par mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
234a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'i snga ltas ni/ rdzing them skas bzhi dang ldan pa gser gyi bye ma brdal ba/ rnyog pa med cing dngas la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs
234a5(rgyud 'bum): su gang ba/ me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos brgyan pa'i chu mthong ste/ de la bdag nyid rtse dga' zhing yongs su spyod par mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
234a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'i snga ltas ni/ phyogs g.yas g.yon gnyis na sems can dmyal ba'i g.yang sa mthong ste/ de nas bdag nyid ma smas ma nyams par slar ldog pa
234a7(rgyud 'bum): mthong ngo / / rig kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa'i snga ltas ni/ phrag pa gnyis na ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can cod pan thogs
234b1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ gcan gzan phra mo thams cad skrag par byed cing 'dug par mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa'i snga ltas ni/ 'khor lo sgyur
234b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyal por mthong ste/ skye bo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas la/ mgo bo'i steng na rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i gdugs dkar po 'dzin pa
234b3(rgyud 'bum): mthong ngo / / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa'i snga ltas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ste/ kha dog gser lta bu'i 'od 'dom gang
234b4(rgyud 'bum): ba/ tshangs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston par mthong ste/ rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po
234b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po'i snga ltas yin no/ / de la rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir sa dang po la rab tu dga' ba zhes bya zhe na/ de ni thog mar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems sngon
234b6(rgyud 'bum): ma thob pa de mngon du gyur te/ don chen po'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir rab tu dga' ba chen po skye bas sa dang po la rab tu dga' ba zhes bya'o// ltung ba phra mo'i dri ma dang tshul khrims kyi nyes pa
234b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa gnyis pa ni dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/ / tshad med pa'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od snang ba de bskyod par mi nus shing / gang gis kyang zil gyis mi gnon pa dang /
235a1(rgyud 'bum): thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs la gnas pa'i phyir sa gsum pa ni 'od byed pa zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi mes nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg cing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bsgom
235a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i me'o 'od 'phro ba cher gyur pas sa bzhi pa ni 'od 'phro ba zhes bya'o/ / de sgom pa'i thabs dang / mchog gi ye shes la dbang sgyur bar dkar ba dang / mthong ba dang bsgoms pas spang ba'i nyon mongs pa
235a3(rgyud 'bum): thul bar dka' ba'i phyir sa lnga pa shin tu sbyang bar dka' ba zhes bya'o/ / 'du byed kyi chos bar chad med par mngon du gyur te/ mtshan ma med pa yid la byed pa thams cad mngon du byas pas sa drug pa la
235a4(rgyud 'bum): mngon sum pa zhes bya'o/ / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la bar chad med cing mtshan ma med pa yid la byed pas/ rnam par grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rgyun ring du bsgoms pas sa de rnam par dag cig
235a5(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa med pa'i phyir sa bdun pa ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ / mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa bsgoms pa la dbang thob ste/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis g.yo bar mi nus pas nas brgyad pa ni mi
235a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba zhes bya'o/ / rnam pa thams cad du chos ston pa la dbang du gyur pas kha na ma tho ba med cing blo gros shin tu yangs pa thogs pa med pa thob pa'i phyir sa dgu pa ni legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o//
235a7(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi sku nam mkha' lta bu la ye shes chen po'i sprin lta bus khyad par 'gebs pa'i phyir sa bcu pa ni chos kyi sprin ces bya'o// de la rigs kyi bu chos dang gang zag la mtshan ma can du mngon par zhen pa
235b1(rgyud 'bum): rmongs pa dang / 'khor ba dang ngan song gi nyon mongs pas 'jigs pa'i rmongs pa dang / rmod pa 'di gnyis kyis sa dang po la sgrub bo// ltung ba phra mo'i 'khrul pa la rmongs dang / las dang spyod
235b2(rgyud 'bum): ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par skyed pa'i rmongs pa dang / rmongs pa'adi gnyis kyis sa gnyis pa la sgrib bo// ma thob pa thob par 'dod pa'i rmongs pa dang / gzungs dam pa'i mchog thob pa la rmongs po dang
235b3(rgyud 'bum): rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa gsum pa la sgrib bo/ / mnyam par gzhag pa'i ro'i dga' ba la sred pa'i rmongs pa dang / chos rnam par dag pa la sred pa'i rmongs pa dang / rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa zhi
235b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa la sgrib bo/ / 'khor ba la shin tu skyo ba'i rmongs pa dang / mya ngan la 'das pa la mngon par gzhol ba'i rmongs pa dang / rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa lnga pa la sgrib bo// 'du byed kyi rgyub
235b5(rgyud 'bum): mngon du gyur pa'i rmongs pa dang / mtshan ma sbom po mngon du gyur pa'i rmongs pa dang / rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa drug pa la sgrib bo// mtshan ma phra mo mngon du gyur pa'i rmongs pa dang / mtshan
235b6(rgyud 'bum): ma med pa'i yid la byed pa'i rmongs pa dang / rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa bdun pa la sgrib bo// mtshan ma med pa la ched du rtsol ba'i rmongs pa dang / mtshan mar 'dzin pa la dbang thob pa'i
235b7(rgyud 'bum): rmongs pa dang / rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa brgyad pa la sgrib bo// gang chos ston pa tshad med pa dang / tshig dang yi ge tshad med pa la mkhas par ma gyur pa'i rmongs pa dang / spobs pa la dbang ma thob pa'i
236a1(rgyud 'bum): rmongs pa dang / rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa dgu pa la sgrib bo// mngon par shes pa chen po la dbang sgyur ba ma thob pa'i rmongs pa dang / don dang las gsang ba phra mo la
236a2(rgyud 'bum): mkhas par ma gyur pa'i rmongs pa dang / rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa bcu pa la sgrib bo// spyod yul shin tu phra ba thams cad la shes bya'i sgrib pa'i rmongs pa dang / nyon mongs pa shin tu phra ba'i gnas
236a3(rgyud 'bum): ngan len la rmongs pa dang / rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sangs rgyas kyi sa la sgrib bo// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
236a4(rgyud 'bum): phyin pa gnon to/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa la ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa gsum pa la ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa bzhi pa la ni brtson 'grus kyi pha
236a5(rgyud 'bum): rol tu phyin pa gnon to/ / sa lnga pa la ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa drug pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa bdun pa la ni thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to//
236a6(rgyud 'bum): sa brgyad pa la ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa dgu pa la ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa bcu pa la ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
236a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa dang po ni rin po che yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/ / sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni gnas pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
236b1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bzung ste skye'o/ / sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni rab tu mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung
236b2(rgyud 'bum): ste skye'o/ / sems bskyed pa lnga pa ni rin po che'i me tog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa drug pa ni nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste/
236b3(rgyud 'bum): skye'o// sems bskyed pa bdun pa ni don thams cad grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa brgyad pa ni da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
236b4(rgyud 'bum): gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/ / sems bskyed pa dgu pa ni ye shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa bcu pa ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su
236b5(rgyud 'bum): bzung nas skye ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sems bskyed pa bcu pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang
236b6(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa'i sa dang po las khyad par rgya byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye ste/ gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/ pUr+Na ma nor the/ duhu du wa duH/ yA bang sUr+ya/ a ba b+hA sa te/ yA bang sh+tsa
236b7(rgyud 'bum): dAn+te/ dA ba da rak+Sha mAH/ daN+Da pa ri hA raM ku ru swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+ga klung gcig gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sa dang po'i byang chub sems
237a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ su zhig gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'dzin na/ 'jigs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ stag dang seng ce
237a2(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa gcan gzan ma rungs pa'i rigs dang / yi dgas thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs te/ dgra dang / rkun po dang / gza' dang / nyon mongs pa rnams dang / sgrib pa rnam pa lnga
237a3(rgyud 'bum): las rnam par grol te/ sa dang po rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gzhan gyis mi grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// gzungs
237a4(rgyud 'bum): latad+ya thA/ ut+to li/ tsau ro tsi ri/ ut+to ra/ to ra nAM/ shAn+to/ shAn+to/ an+to li/ hu lu hu lu swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
237a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das rnams kyis/ sa gnyis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' srung ba'i phyir gsungs so// gang la la zhig gzungs sngags 'di klog cing 'dzin na 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/ de gcan gzan
237a6(rgyud 'bum): ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa pha rol gyi dgra dang / bza' dang / nyon mongs pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las rnam par grol te/
237a7(rgyud 'bum): sa gnyis pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sa gsum pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o// gzungs la
237b1(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ daN+Di ke/ baN+Di ke/ ka ra dzi/ kau ra ShI/ ke yU re/ dan+ti li swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sa gsum
237b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ su gzungs sngags 'di 'chang ba dang 'don pa de 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / gdon ma rungs pa dang / mo dang
237b3(rgyud 'bum): mami me yin pa la sogs pas gtses pa dang / gza' dang / pha rol gyi dgra dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las rnam par grol te/ sa gsum pa rjes su dran par 'gyur
237b4(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / rigs kyi bu sa bzhi pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o// gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/ shi ri shi ri/ da mi da ma ni/ da ri da rin
237b5(rgyud 'bum): shi ro sho ri/ bi shA la/ bi shA la/ pa shA pa shA ni/ ban+d+ha ni ye swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+ga'i klung bzhi'o bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
237b6(rgyud 'bum): sa bzhi pa'i byang chub sems dpa' srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don pa dang 'chang bde 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang /
237b7(rgyud 'bum): mi dang / mi me yin pa la sogs te/ pha rol gyi dgra dang / sdug bsngal mang pos gtses pa dang / gza' dang / slob pa rnam pa lnga las kyang rnam par grol te/ sa bzhi pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro//
238a1(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bus lnga pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la yon tan sna tshogs kyis bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o// gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/
238a2(rgyud 'bum): ha ri ha ra ni/ tsa rin+da ra ni/ ka ri mA Ni/ saM ka ri mANi/ saM b+ha sa ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ swa yaM/ pu ke swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed las 'das
238a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sa lnga pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang na/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang /
238a4(rgyud 'bum): gcan gzan khro bo dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs te/ pha rol po'i dgra dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa dang / gza' dang / sgrub
238a5(rgyud 'bum): pa rnam pa lnga las rnam par grol te/ sa lnga pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sa drug pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor sgron ma zhes
238a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o/ / gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/ bi ti ri bo ti ri ma ri ni/ ki li ko li/ bo to han+te/ lu lu lu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu to lu ba to lu ba sha sha shad tsa pa ri sha sA stA
238a7(rgyud 'bum): sarba satwo nAn/ sid d+hun+t+ra ma ma/ man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'ang ni gang+ga'iri klung drug gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sa drug pa la gnas pa'i
238b1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang na/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang
238b2(rgyud 'bum): mi ma yin pa la sogs te/ pha rol gyi dgra dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa dang / gza' dang / sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las kyang rnam par grol te/ sa drug pa rjes su dran par
238b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o// gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/ dza ba dza hA ru
238b4(rgyud 'bum): ha dza ha dza ru/ baM lu ke baM lu li/ a mri ta g+ha ne/ pa ru sha ne/ bai ru ti ke ba ru bat+te/ bi d+bi hiM ke/ ban+de bi la ni/ a mr-i l+r-i ha~M/ ke b+he dzu yu/ b+hai dzu yu swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+ga
238b5(rgyud 'bum): klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpal srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'domaci
238b6(rgyud 'bum): 'chang na/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs te/ pha rol gyi dgra dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtses
238b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / gza' dang / sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las kyang rnam par grol te/ sa bdun pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bus brgyad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ma
239a1(rgyud 'bum): la rnyog pa med pa'i rtog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'ang skye'o/ / gzus la/ drAr+thA shar sha ri shi ri ni/ mai te mi te/ kA ri kAr/ be ru h+ye ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ban+d+ha ni swA hA/ rigs kyi bu
239a2(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sa brgyad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' srung ba'i phyir
239a3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang na/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs te
239a4(rgyud 'bum): pha rol gyi dgra dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa dang / gza' dang / sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las kyang rnam par grol te/ sa brgyad pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sa dgu pa la gnas
239a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sgomatha' yas pa'i rgyun zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o/ / gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/ ha ri tseN+Da li kaM/ ku la mA b+ha te/ to ra shi/ pa ta pa ta si/ bI ri shi ri/
239a6(rgyud 'bum): ga shi ri/ ga bi shi ri/ swasti/ sarba satwA nAn+da swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang
239a7(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang na/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mim
239b1(rgyud 'bum): yin pa la sogs te/ pha rol gyi dgra dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa dang / gza' dang / sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las kyang rnam par grol te/ sa dgu pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/
239b2(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye ste/ gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/ sid+d+hi su sid+d+hi/ mo tsa ni mony+dza
239b3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ bi muk+te/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ da ma le/ mAng+ga le/ hi ra N+ya gan+d+he/ rat+na gar+b+he/ sa man+ta b+ha dre/ sarba ar+tha sAng+ga ni/ ma sa ni/ ma hA ma na si/ a ta b+hu te/ at+ya b+hu te/ a ra dze bi ra dze/ ats+tsha te/
239b4(rgyud 'bum): a mr-i tai/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ brah+me/ brah+me swa re/ pU ra Ni/ pU ra Na/ ma nor the swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni bkra shis pa dang spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba ste/ gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed las
239b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang
239b6(rgyud 'bum): na/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs te/ pha rol gyi dgra dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa
239b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / gza' dang / gdug pa can thams cad dang / sgrib pa rnam pa lnga la sogs pa las rnam par grol te/ sa bcu pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng
240a1(rgyud 'bum): ke'i tog gi 'od zer snang ba thogs pa med pa zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs 'di dag bshad pa thos nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
240a2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas zhabs la phyogs 'tshal te tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bstod do// zab mo mtshan nyid med chos la/ skye bo shes pa nyams
240a3(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams/ / bcom ldan nyag gcig sgrol mdzad pas// dpe med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab spyan// chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig mi gzigs// yang dag chos kyi spyan gyis
240a4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / kun tu gsal ba bsam mi khyab// chos 'ga' yang skye ba med pa ste// 'gog par yang ni mi 'gyur ro// de ltar mnyam par gzigs pas na// bla med gnas su gzhug par gyur// 'khor ba dag
240a5(rgyud 'bum): kyang mi 'jig la/ / mya ngan 'das la'ang mi bzhugs shing // mtha' gnyis la ni mi gnas te// de phyir mya ngan bzla ba brnyes// dag dang ma dag phyogs la yang // rnam par dbye ba med pa'i phyir// bcom
240a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan ro gcig mkhyen pas na/ / rnam dag pa yi mchog brnyes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshad med skus// tshig gcig ston pa med par yang // 'khor mang 'di dag thams cad la// chos kyi char gyis tshom
240a7(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad/ / sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi// mtshan nyid rnam par gzigs med kyang // nyon mongs sdug bsngal thams cad las// bcom ldan rtag tu skyob par mdzad/ bde dang dug sngal rtag ma rtag/
240b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag dang bdag med la sogs dang // gcig dang tha dad ma yin dang // skye ba med dpa' gog med pa'i// de 'dra'i don gyi rnam pa la/ rnam par dbye zhing ston par mdzad// dper na brag cha stong par ni// de don
240b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen/ / chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer med pas// theg pa mi mthun gzhan med de// sems can rnams ni bsgral ba'i phyir// gsum du rnam par dbye ba mdzad// de nas tshangs
240b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bral mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
240b4(rgyud 'bum): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di shin tu dkon zhing dpag par dka' ba/ thog mar yang dge ba
240b5(rgyud 'bum): bar du'ang dge ba/ tha mar yang dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa 'di gang zhig
240b6(rgyud 'bum): 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mdzad pa gzo ba lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin
240b7(rgyud 'bum): te/ rigs kyi bu gang mdo 'di nyan par byed pa ni// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dis ni sa las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
241a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog tu smin par byed pa dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa yin pa dang / mdo sde kun gyi rgyal por gyur pa ste/ de'i phyir mnyan pa dang / gzung
241a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / klog pa dang / gdon par bya'o// de yang rigs kyi bu dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'i sems
241a3(rgyud 'bum): can de dag gis ni dam pa'i chos 'di mnyan par mi nus so/ / rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa tsam gyis/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag
241a4(rgyud 'bum): tsacang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya mi zad
241a5(rgyud 'bum): pa mngon par sgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ / sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa dang / sgra la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i tog snang ba'i gzungs
241a6(rgyud 'bum): dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ / zla ba'i tog snang ba'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// kun nos ldang ba thams cad rnam par gnon pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje ltar sra
241a7(rgyud 'bum): zhing brtan pa'i ro rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ / brjod du med pa'i don bstan pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// tshig dang / spyod pa dang /
241b1(rgyud 'bum): sgra thams cad la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa bsgrubs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha'
241b2(rgyud 'bum): yas pa yongs su rdzogs pa sgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ / lha'i bu gzungs 'di dag thob pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi

241b4(rgyud 'bum): ston kyang yi ge mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba med do/ / 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba ston kyang 'pho ba'ang med// skye ba'ang med do// chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ 'du byed rnams
241b5(rgyud 'bum): gang du'ang 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ / gang nas kyang 'ong bar yang mi 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'ashad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sum stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa

241b7(rgyud 'bum): can tshad med pa rnams kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa dang / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod dam chos ni//
242a1(rgyud 'bum): zab cing phra la blta dka' ste// 'dod pas bsgribs pa'i dmus long dag/ de ma mthong bas sdug bsngal len// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag stan las langs te/ bcom ldan
242a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di klog cing 'don pa dang / ston cing gnas pa der
242a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag thams cad mchis nas chos ston pa'i 'khor du bgyis te/ de la phan pa dang bde ba stsal cing / lus dang sems bde bar bgyi'o// bdag cag gis sems rtse gcig tu gyur pas mchod
242a4(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi'o/ / nyan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang bde bas tshim par gyi'o// rgyal po'i yul der yang pha rol gyi dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / mu ge'i yang bas sdug bsngal ba ma mchis pa dang
242a5(rgyud 'bum): skye bo mang pos rgyas shing yongs su dar bar bgyi'o/ / chos 'di bshad pa'i gnas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis mi brdzi
242a6(rgyud 'bum): zhing gtsang mar bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos 'di bshad pa'i gnas 'di ni mchod rten lags pa'i slad du/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / lhab lhub kyis yongs

242b1(rgyud 'bum): khyed kyis mdo sde dam pa 'di sgrub pa la brtson par gyis shig dang / dam pa'i chos 'di 'jig rten 'dir yun ring du gnas par 'gyur// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las sa rnam par

242b3(rgyud 'bum): dus na rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa pad+mo'i 'byung gnas 'dis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas

242b5(rgyud 'bum): kun la bdag gis bstod/ / thub dbang zhi zhing rab zhi rnam par dag/ sku ni gsar gyi mdog tu rab tu gda'// dbyangs rnams kun pas sangs rgyas gsung snyan te/ tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs rab tu bsgrag
242b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sung / / bung ba rma bya ut+pal sngon po'i dbu// mthon mthing lcang lo bya ni tsa sha 'dra// kha ba dung ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems// rtag tu gser ltar rnam par mdzes par gda'// spyan ni ring zhing mtho
242b7(rgyud 'bum): mthing dri ma med/ / ut+pal sngon po rab tu rgyas pa 'dra// ljags ni che zhing leb la pad+ma'i mdog/ pad+ma 'drar snang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra// zhal gyi mdzod spu pad rtsa dung dang 'dra// bai DUR+Ya yi mdag 'dra g.yas su

243a3(rgyud 'bum): mamagrin sdug 'dra bar sngo la mdzes/ / bltams ma thag tu sku yis snang bar bgyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag ni thams cad gang // 'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi// bde ba kun gyis
