243b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang po'i sna 'dra rgyal ba'i sku/ / phyag dang zhabs 'od rab mdzes dri ma med// sa yi steng gi rdul dang mtshungs 'dra snyed// phra ba'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas gang 'das dang // gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed 'byung/

247a7(rgyud 'bum): gzi brjid kyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan zhing bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / gal te bsams pa ma grub na yang dkyil 'khor der zhugs nas/ bsams pa yongs su
247b1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ de phyin chad kyang rtag par rjes su dran par bya'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs te le'u rgyud pa'o//
247b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs de gsungs nas/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dang / lha dang / mi la sogs pa'i 'khor 'dus de dag la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ don
247b3(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i bden pa stong pa'i mtshan nyid de bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// bsam gyis mi khyab mdo rnams gzhan dag tu// stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad de// de lta bas na
247b4(rgyud 'bum): mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/ / stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad par bya// sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas// chos rnams thams cad shes par mi nus te// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos
247b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams mdo tsam rab tu bshad/ / sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang // sems can 'byung bya'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang // thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni// mdo mchos dam pa dbang po 'di bshad do//
247b6(rgyud 'bum): lus 'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te// dbang po rnams ni dmag dang chom rkun 'dra// de dag thams cad grong gcig gnas mod kyi// de dag phan tshun rnam par mi shes sa// mig gi dbang po gzugs gyur nas
247b7(rgyud 'bum): la rgyug/ rna ba'i dbang po sbrul rnam par dpyod// sna yi dbang po sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog/ lce yi dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyug/ lus kyi dbang po reg pa dag la rgyug/ yid kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam par dpyod//
248a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du// rang rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed// sems ni sgyu ma lta bur g.yo ba yin// dbang po drug ni yul la rnam dpyod de// ji ltar mi zhig
248a2(rgyud 'bum): grong stong rgyug pa dang / / dmag dang chom rkun dag dang gnas pa bzhin// ji ltar bya zhig yul drug gnas bcas shing // dbang po spyod yul dag kyang rab shes pa// de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas
248a3(rgyud 'bum): bcas te/ / dbang po'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab tu shes// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang // ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos// sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la// dbang por
248a4(rgyud 'bum): zhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo bar 'gyur/ / dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni shes pa bdag nyid byed// lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med// snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin//
248a5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag ma yin yongs su rtog las byung // grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas// sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams ni// grong gzhan gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sprul
248a6(rgyud 'bum): gdug gnas gcig ji bzhin te/ / rtag tu phan tshun mthun pa ma yin bzhin// khams kyi sbrul rnams bzhi po de dag kyang // gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams
248a7(rgyud 'bum): su gnyis gnyis te/ / khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'dzegs par 'gyur// sa yi sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin// me yi sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang // 2
248b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis steng gi nam mkhar 'gro ba yin/ / ji ltar sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis// sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dong // lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i las
248b2(rgyud 'bum): srid par skye/ / bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa zad gyur na// lus shi gcig dang ngan skyugs rnams kyis gang // mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur// dur khrod dag na 'thor ba shing bzhin gyur// lha mo
248b3(rgyud 'bum): khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos/ / 'di las sems can gang zag gang zhig yod// chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// 'byung ba chen po 'di dag che 'byung
248b4(rgyud 'bum): mini/ ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste// gang gi phyir ni 'byung dang mi 'byung ba// de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do// yod pa man zhing nam yang yod min la// ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba
248b5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin to// de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do// 'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang // skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang // sred dang len dang de bzhin srid pa
248b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / skye dang rga shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mo khyab pa// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag/ ma byung ba las byung dang mi 'byung dang // tshul bzhin ma yin
248b7(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis rnam dpyad dang / / bdag gi lte bar gyur pa bcad par gyis// ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya me drol// phung po'i gnas la stong par gyur par ltos// byang chub yor tan rgya cher reg par gyis
249a1(rgyud 'bum): ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer sgo yang phye/ / bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstan// ngas ni bdud rtsi'o grong khyer gnas der 'jug/ ngas ni bdud rtsi khu bas bdag tshim byas/
249a2(rgyud 'bum): ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang bus// ngas ni chos kyi sgron me mchog 'bar byas// ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa lab// ngas ni nyon mongs dgra tshogs rnam
249a3(rgyud 'bum): las rgyal/ / ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgrengs// srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral// ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi lam rnams bkag/ sems can nyon mongs me yis gdungs
249a4(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa/ / rten med gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag/ srog chags nyon mongs mes gdungs zhi byas nas// bdud rtsi'i khu ba bsil bas tshim par byas// gang phyir bskal pa du mar sngon chad ngas//
249a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byas// chos kyi sku de yongs su 'chol ba na// brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de// lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang // yan lag mchog dang bu
249a6(rgyud 'bum): sdug bu mo dang / / nor dbyig nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser// bai DUR+Ya dang rin chen sna tshogs btang // stong gsum shon ljon thams cad dang // rtswa dang rtswa rnams thams cad dang // nags tshal dag
249a7(rgyud 'bum): dadeng sa las ni/ / 'khrungs pa thams cad bcad gtubs te// de dag thams cad phyir brlags nas// rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ji tsam par// phye ma'i phung
249b1(rgyud 'bum): po spangs nas ni/ / 'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus// sa la rdul ni yod pa rnams// stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi// rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sems can kun gyi shes pa gang //
249b2(rgyud 'bum): de ni sems can gcig gi gyur// shes pa de yis rdul rnams kyi// phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags pa// ye shes rab ldan mi rnams kyis// thams cad
249b3(rgyud 'bum): bgrang bar nus srid kyi/ / rgyal ba'i mkhyen pa mi nus so// thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang / skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang // bskal pa bye ba du mar ni// gang du'ang bgrang bar mi nus so
249b4(rgyud 'bum): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// / de nas lha mo rin chen 'od 'phros chos bstan pa shin tu zab mo de thos
249b5(rgyud 'bum): nas dga' ba dang rangs pa skyes te 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
249b6(rgyud 'bum): 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bstan pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnal 'byor du bya ba zhu ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgyal ba rkang
249b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis gtso lags te/ / 'jig rten kun tu snang mdzad pa// byang chub spong pa yang dag tshul// bdag la thugs rjes bshad du gsol// rigs kyi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod la the tsom ci yod pa//
250a1(rgyud 'bum): dra ba'i don de zhus shig dang // rnam par phye ste bshad par bya// de nas yang rigs kyi lha mos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags phyir/ byang
250a2(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni/ / 'khor dang mya ngan 'das bral ba'i// byang chub spyod pa ji ltar spyod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// rigs kyi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsas to// lha mo chos kyi da'ong
250a3(rgyud 'bum): la gnas te/ byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pas ni mnyam pa nyid la nan tan du bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rigs kyi lha mos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom
250a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ji ltar na chos kyi dbyings la gnas te/ byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod cing mnyam pa nyid la nan tan du bgyi ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ lha mo de ni phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su 'dogs te/
250a5(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi dbyings ni phung po lnga nyid do// phung po lnga'ang brjod du med pa/ phung po lnga ma yin pa'ang brjod du med pa ste/ de la chos kyi dbyings de nyid phung po lnga yin na ni chad par 'gyur ro// gal te
250a6(rgyud 'bum): phung po lnga las gzhan par 'dod na ni rtag par 'gyur te/ mtshan ma gnyis dang bral bar mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa/ bltar med pa/ blta bar bya ba las 'das pa/ ming dang mtshan ma med pa
250a7(rgyud 'bum): de ni chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod do/ / rigs kyi lha mo phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su ji ltar gdags she na/ phung po lnga po de ni rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa ste/ de yang gal te rgyu dang rkyen las skye
250b1(rgyud 'bum): ba zhig yin na ni/ skyes zin pa skye'am/ mi skye ba skye zhes bya/ gal te skyes zin pa skye na ni/ rgyu dang rkyen kyang mi dgos pa'i rigs so// gal te ma skyes pa skye na ni/ skye ba dmigs su med pa'i
250b2(rgyud 'bum): phyir ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ma skyes pa'i chos rnams ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid pas ming med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ gzhal ba dang / dpag pa dang / dper bya bas mi brjod pa ste/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis
250b3(rgyud 'bum): bskyed par bya ba ma yin no/ / rigs kyi lha mo dper na rnga'i sgra ni shing dang / ko ba dang / lag pa la brten te sgra 'byung mod kyi/ rnga'i sgra de ni 'das pa'ang stong / ma 'ongs pa'ang stong / da ltar byung
250b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'ang stong ste/ rnga'i sgra de ni shing las kyang ma byung / ko ba dang lag pa las kyang ma byung / dus gsum gyis ma bskyed pas mi skye ba ste/ gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gog pa'o// gang mi 'gog pa de ni gang
250b5(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'o/ / gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de ni gang du'ang mi 'gro ba de ni rtag pa dang chad pa ma yin pas/ gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te gcig pa
250b6(rgyud 'bum): yin na chos kyi dbyings dang tha mi dad pas/ 'o na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis kyang / don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du gyur pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba dam pa thob par 'gyur ba zhig na
250b7(rgyud 'bum): de lta ma yin pas de gcig pa ma yin no/ / gal te tha dad pa yin na ni sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'ang mtshan ma de nyid 'dzin pa yin pas/ rnam par grol bar yang mi 'gyur zhing / nyon
251a1(rgyud 'bum): mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang ma bral bas/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa rnams ni 'du byed dang 'du
251a2(rgyud 'bum): byed ma yin pa yang dag pa'i ngo bor gcig pa'i phyir tha dad ba ma yin no/ / de bas na phung po lnga de ni yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa'ang ma yin/ rgyu dang rkyen med pas
251a3(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa'ang ma yin pa/ tshig gi thog tu mi phebs pa/ ming dang mtshan ma med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen med pa/ dpes bstan du med pa/ thog ma dang tha mar dben pa/ rang gi ngang gis stong pa ste/ de ni
251a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa rnams kyis mkhyen par bya ba yin gyi/ gzhan gyi spyod yul du ma gyur pa'o// de bas na phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su ston to// gzhan yang rigs kyi lha mo gang rigs kyi bu'am/
251a5(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don dam pa dang / kun rdzob gzhan dang gzhan ma yin par 'dod pa de ni dpag par dka' ba ste/ 'phags pa dang ma
251a6(rgyud 'bum): rabs kyi spyod yul ni gcig pa dang tha dad pa'i rang bzhin ma yin te/ kun rdzob kyang ma spangs/ don dam pa dang yang bral bar ma gyur pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa'i
251a7(rgyud 'bum): spyad pa spyod pa'o/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rigs kyi lha mo de rab tu dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
251b1(rgyud 'bum): nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud de spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis
251b2(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de la bdag gis bslab par 'tshal lo/ / de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang na 'dug pas/ rigs kyi lha mo rin chen
251b3(rgyud 'bum): 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces dris so/ / lha mo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shin tu sgrub par dka' ba 'di khyod ji ltar spyod pas de la dbang thob par 'gyur// de nas rigs kyi lha mos/ tshangs pa chen po la 'ang
251b4(rgyud 'bum): skad ces smras so/ / tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don de shin tu zab pas/ so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis de'i don mi shes te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod
251b5(rgyud 'bum): yul bas/ mchog tu phra ba shes par dka' ba'o// bdag ni chos 'di la brten te bde bar gnas pa thob bo// gal te tshig de bden pa blta na/ snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ni tshad mod
251b6(rgyud 'bum): grangs med/ dpag tu med pa'i sems can de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog can du gyur te/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ skyes pa'ang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin pa sha stag tu gyur te/
251b7(rgyud 'bum): rin po che'i pad+mal 'dug cing // bde ba tshad med pa la longs spyod pa dang / lha'i me tog mchog gi char 'bab cing / lha'i sil snyan dang rol mo ma dkrol bar rang byung ba'i mchod pa de lta bu dang ldan par
252a1(rgyud 'bum): shog cig/ ces smras ma thag tu stegs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog can skyes bu chen pa
252a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan dang ldan pa/ skyes pa'ang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin par gyur nas/ rin po che'i pad+ma la 'dug cing / bde ba tshad med pas longs spyod par gyur pa ni ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i gzhal
252a3(rgyud 'bum): med khang pa na/ ngan 'gro thams cad med cing rin po che'i ljon shing sna tshogs 'dres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+mas 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang lha'i me tog gi char
252a4(rgyud 'bum): 'bab pa/ lha'i rol mo sna tshogs kyis longs spyod par gnas pa bzhin du gyur to// de nas rigs kyi lha mo rin chen 'od 'phros yang bud med kyi lus las/ tshangs lus su bsgyur cing 'dug go// byang chub sems
252a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro la/ tshangs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa khyod ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod/ smras pa/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po chen po chu'i zla ba byang chub kyi
252a6(rgyud 'bum): spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// rmi lam byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyod pa spyod do// smig rgyu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang
252a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do/ / sgra brnyan byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// de skad ces bshad pa tshangs pa chen pos thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces
252b1(rgyud 'bum): smras so/ / btsun pa khyod don gang la gnas te tshig de skad ces smra/ lha mos smras pa/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chos gang yang bden pa'i mtshan nyid du ma grub cing / rgyu dang rkyen la brten nas grub pa
252b2(rgyud 'bum): phyir ro/ / tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa// gal te de ltar na so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar rigs so//
252b3(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ skyes bu khyod ci'i phyir de skad ces smra/ byis pa'ang gzhan/ mkhas pa'ang gzhan/ byang chub kyang gzhan/ byang chub ma yin pa'ang gzhan/ rnam par grol ba'ang gzhan/ rnam par grol ba ma yin
252b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin mod kyi/ tshangs pa chen po chos de dag thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid de/ so so ma yin pa/ yang dag par dbyer med pa/ bar mtshams med pa/ 'phel ba dang 'grob pa
252b5(rgyud 'bum): med pa la mngon par chags shing 'dzin to/ / tshangs pa'i rgyal po dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ de'i slob ma sgyu ma sprul pa la mkhas shing byang bar gyur pa zhig gis/ lam kya bzhi mdor sa dang / bye ma dang / shing dang
252b6(rgyud 'bum): rtswa dang / mo ma la sogs pa gnas gcig tu bsdus te/ sgyu ma sprul pa 'di lta ste/ rta dang klung ba zhi'i tshogs dang / dmag dang / shing rta la sogs pa'i tshogs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang /
252b7(rgyud 'bum): bang ba dang mdzod la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun lo ston to// de la sems can byis pa blun po mi shes pa'i rang bzhin can dag gis mthong nas/ sgyu ma sprul par mi shes te/ rta dang glang gi che la sogs pa
253a1(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba dang thos pa 'di dag ni yang dag par yod pa yin te/ gzhan ni brdzun pa snyam du sems shing / phyis kyang de la zhib tu rtog par mi byed do// de la mkhas pa shes pa'i rang ba
253a2(rgyud 'bum): can rnams ni de lta ma yin te/ sgyu ma sprul pa yin par shes nas/ thos pa dang mthong ba de dag la 'di snyam du sems te/ rta dang glang po che la sogs pa bdag gis mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa sgyu ma sprul pas
253a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba'i mig slu bar byed pa ste/ rta dang / glang po che dang / bang mdzod la sogs pa 'di dag ni der snang ba tsam du zad de/ bdag gis mthong ba dang thos pa bzhin du bden pa ma yin par yang 'dzin la'i phyis zhib tu
253a4(rgyud 'bum): brtag na'ang brdzun pa slu ba'i chos su shes so/ / de lta bas na mkhas pa rnams kyis ni/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs te/ ji ltar mthong ba dang thos pa'ang kun rdzob tsam du
253a5(rgyud 'bum): de dag gis don mtshan pa dang / tshig gi tha snyad la brten nas yang dag pa'i don shes par bya ba tsam du zad kyi/ don dam pa ni de lta ma yin no snyam mo// yang tshangs pa chen po byos pa so so'i skye bo 'phags pa 'jig
253a6(rgyud 'bum): rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi mog ma thob pa rnams kyis ni/ chos 'di dag thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med par yang mi shes la/ gang mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yi/
253a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chos rnams ji ltar brtags pa ltar bden pa nyid du mngon par zhen te/ chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa don dam pa'i tshul de shes par mi nus so// de la 'phags pa rnams kyis ni gang gzigs
253b1(rgyud 'bum): shing gsan pa dang / 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos rnams kyi mthu dang / las ji lta bu yin pa de la bden pa'o zhes mngon par mi zhen te/ 'du byed kyi chos kyang mi bden pa/ 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos
253b2(rgyud 'bum): kyang mi bden pa/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pas brtags pa tsam du 'du byed dang 'du byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ming tsam du zad pa/ bden pa'i rang bzhin du ma grub par 'phags pa rnams kyis kun rdzob kyi
253b3(rgyud 'bum): tha snyad la brten nas/ yang dag pa bden pa'i don de ston par byed do// de bzhin du tshangs pa chen po gang 'phags pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i gzigs pas chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
253b4(rgyud 'bum): brjod du med pa bzhin/ 'du byed dang 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos kyang de bzhin du lta ste/ kun rdzob tu ming dang mtshan ma sna tshogs la brten nas gzhan la ston par byed do// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro/
253b5(rgyud 'bum): la/ tshangs pa chen pos 'di skad ces smras so// sems can ji snyed cig gis chos zab mo 'di lta bu rtogs shing shes par nus/ smras pa/ tshangs pa chen po gang sprul pa mang po'i sems dang sems las byung bas chos
253b6(rgyud 'bum): zab mo 'di yang dag par shes par gyur pa de nyid kyis shes so/ / tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ sprul pa de dag nyid kyang rang bzhin yod pa ma yin na/ de dag gi sems dang sems las byung ba gang nas skye bar 'gyur/
253b7(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ gang chos kyi dbyings yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin par yang dag par shes po de dag gis zab mo de'i don shes par nus so// de nas tshangs pa chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to//
254a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ chos kyi gzhung zab mo 'di la mkhas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa
254a2(rgyud 'bum): de de bzhin te/ tshangs pa chen po de ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'dis khyod la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du nan tan du sgrubs shig dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
254a3(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ / de nas lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa chen po dang / gzhan yang tshangs pa'i 'khor de dag stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te
254a4(rgyud 'bum): thal mo sbyar bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rin chen 'od phro'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so// deng skyes bu chen po khyod dang phrad cing bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos 'di lta
254a5(rgyud 'bum): bu thos par gyur pa ngo mtshar che lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshangs pa chen po la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rin po che'i 'od dpal gyi
254a6(rgyud 'bum): snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i
254a7(rgyud 'bum): kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// de skad ces bka' stsas pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag sum stong gis bla na med pa
254b1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / lha'i bu khri phrag brgyad stong dang / rgyal po dang / blon po la sogs pa tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis rdul dang bral ba'i chos la chos kyi mig
254b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dag par gyur to/ / de nas 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang nas dge slong khri phrag lnga bcu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par sems pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems
254b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rin chen 'od 'phros chos bstan pa 'di thos nas/ byang chub kyi sems phyir zhing brtan pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa bla na med pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs nas yang byang chub tu sems bskyed de/
254b4(rgyud 'bum): so so nas rang go gos gyon pa phud de/ byang chub sems dpa' la gsol nas/ bla na med pa'i mchog dam pa'i sems bskyed de/ smon lam 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci mchis pa de
254b5(rgyud 'bum): dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes smon lam btab bo/ / tshangs pa chen po dge slong de dag gi bsod nams de la brten nas ji skad smras pa bzhin nan tan du
254b6(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs nas/ bskal pa chen po dgu bcu 'das pa na/ 'khor ba las yongs su 'das pa'i shes pa skyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong de dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed
254b7(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa grangs med pa sum cu 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ bskal pa'i ming ni rgyal bar dka' ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ yul gyi mong ni dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar dus
255a1(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu kun kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de dag kun kyang mtshan smon lam rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yon tan
255a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi mtshan bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ / gzhan yang tshangs pa chen po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po gang nyan pa dang 'dzin pa de dag gi mthu dang / gzi brjid chen po dang
255a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan par 'gyur te/ dper na gang la la zhig gis thabs dang mi ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug bskal pa chen po brgyad stong du spyod pa bas/ gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gser
255a4(rgyud 'bum): 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di glegs bam du bris te zla ba phyed phyed cing sems rtse gcig tu byas te klog cing 'don na/ bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i
255a5(rgyud 'bum): char yang nye bar mi phod pa nas/ grangs su bgrangs pa dang / dper sman par yang mi bzod do// tshangs chen po de lta bas na khyed kyis rtag tu yid la bya zhing / nan tan du sgrub pa dang / gzung zhing gzhan
255a6(rgyud 'bum): la'ang yang dag par rgya cher bstan par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ji ltar skyes bu dpa' bo g.yul ngor lus dang srog la mi lta ba
255a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du ngas kyang mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gzung zhing 'dzin pa dang / klog cing 'don pa dang / gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston po la thogs pa med par gyur to// tshangs pa chen po dper na
255b1(rgyud 'bum): mkhor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nam 'jig rten na gnas kyi bar du/ rin po che sna bdun yang med par yang mi 'gyur ro// gal te rgyal po mi bzhugs na rin po che sna bdun yang mod la med par 'gyur ro// tshangs
255b2(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po de ltar de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'jig rten na gnas kyi bar du/ bla na med pa'i chos rin po che thams cad kyang nub par mi 'gyur ro// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nam med pa
255b3(rgyud 'bum): na gzhan dag kyang nub par 'gyur ro/ / de lta bas na mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di sems rtse gcig tu byas te/ mnyan pa dang / gzung ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher bshad pa dang / yi ger 'drir
255b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa dang / lus dang srog la mo lta bas ngal ba dang / dub pa khyad du gsod cing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyad par bya ste/ bsod nams kyi nang na mchog yin par nga'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang de bzhin
255b5(rgyud 'bum): du bslab cing nan tan du bya'o/ / de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po la sogs te/ tshangs pa'i 'khor grangs med pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi dbang
255b6(rgyud 'bum): bo la sogs pa de dag thams cad stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das lo 'ang skad
255b7(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsrung ba dang yongs su rgyas par bgyi'o// chos 'di ston pa'i tshe bgegs dang bar chad kun bsal
256a1(rgyud 'bum): te dge bar 'gyur ba dang / kha dog dang mthu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / lus dang sems bde bar gyur pa dang / de'i 'khor rnams kyang
256a2(rgyud 'bum): bde ba nyams su myong ba dang / gang na gnas pa'i yul 'khor de'ang mu ge dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / mi ma yin pas 'tshe ba zhig mchis na'ang / bdag cag lha'i 'khor gyis yongs su bsrungs
256a3(rgyud 'bum): pas de dag bde zhing skyed pa dang gnod pa rnams mi 'byung bar gyur na/ de dag kyang bdag cag lha'i mthu lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di la mchod cing rim gro bgyid na/ de la
256a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mchod cing rim gro bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa chen po la sogs te/ tshangs pa'i 'khor de dag dang
256a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po la sogs pa rnams la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyed kyis dam pa'i chos zab mo 'di'ang thos/ mdo sde'i dbang
256a6(rgyud 'bum): po 'di 'dzin pa la/ srung ba dang / bskyab pa'i sems bskyed pa des bsod nams kyi khyad par tshad med pa dang ldan pas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
256a7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa
256b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid la brten nas bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ / / de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po
256b2(rgyud 'bum): 'a'ag skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
256b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs
256b4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag
256b5(rgyud 'bum): bgyis pa/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags te/ brjod nas rab tu
256b6(rgyud 'bum): kur ba/ lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyis pa/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba thams cad rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro ri skye gnas dang/
256b7(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zlog pa/ mu ge'i yang ba thams cad rab tu zhi
257a1(rgyud 'bum): bya bya/ / bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi yang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gza'i gnod pa thams cad sel ba/ mchog tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mya ngan dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu
257a2(rgyud 'bum): zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa 'bum rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/
257a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad na/ chos nyan pa chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi'i lha'i lus 'di gzi byin chen pos rnam par
257a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ / bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang / stobs dang / mthu'ang skyed par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang bdag cag gi lus la 'jug par 'gyur
257a5(rgyud 'bum): tebatsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi no chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
257a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o// 'byung po'i tshogs mi bzad pa snying rje ma mchis pa/ gzhan gyi gzi byin 'breg
257a7(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun du lha'i
257b1(rgyud 'bum): mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ bdag cag rgyal po chen
257b2(rgyud 'bum): po bzhi 'jig rten skyong ba zhes ming du chags so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir pha rol gyi dmag tshegs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i yang ba 'am
257b3(rgyud 'bum): nad kyi yang ba'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong dang / gnod pa 'bum dag gis gtses par gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bani gser 'od dam pa mdo
257b4(rgyud 'bum): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul bar bgyi'o/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyis brlabs kyis dge slong chos
257b5(rgyud 'bum): smra ba de dag la bskul ba na/ yul gang dang gang du mchi bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dang de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang
257b6(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa sna tshogs stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mo'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag mche bar
257b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'da'ang bsnyen par 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mo'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan
258a1(rgyud 'bum): te/ de thos nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las kun tu srung bar bgyid/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su skyong
258a2(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bsgrub pa dang

258a4(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la/ bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems
258a5(rgyud 'bum): can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
258a6(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa la bsti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po chen po de la rgyal
258a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad pas ches bsti steng du bgyid/ ches bla mar bgyid/ ches rim gror bgyid/ ches mchod par bgyi ste/ yul thams cad du'ang rab tu bsngags par 'gyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
258b1(rgyud 'bum): bo las/ rgyal po chen po bzhis lha dang mi la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la legs so zhes bya ba byin
258b2(rgyud 'bum): te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po khyed yang legs so legs so// 'di lta ste/ khyed ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye

258b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ mi phan pa thams
258b5(rgyud 'bum): cad 'gog pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub par brtson pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa
258b6(rgyud 'bum): dang rim gro byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu srung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ des
258b7(rgyud 'bum): na rgyal po chen po dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kun
259a1(rgyud 'bum): tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ / yongs su bskyang ba dang / yongs su bzung bar yang 'gyur ro// des na rgyam ma chen po dpung dang / g.yos dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag dum dang @
259a2(rgyud 'bum): pa khyed bzhis/ lha dang lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rna ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshegs
259a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la kun tu srung bar gyis shig/ yongs su
259a4(rgyud 'bum): bskyabs pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor

259a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su bral mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
259a7(rgyud 'bum): po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mo'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang /
259b1(rgyud 'bum): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por gyur pa gang la la zhig lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal po bgyid cing // rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam
259b2(rgyud 'bum): rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid dam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang du bgyid/ btsun par bgyid
259b3(rgyud 'bum): rim gror bgyid cing mchod de/ rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu bo'i chus/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa
259b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi byin chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs chen por yang bgyid par yang 'gyur
259b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag gi gzi byin dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin
259b6(rgyud 'bum): 'bum phrag du ma dang lus ltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na gser 'od dam po med
259b7(rgyud 'bum): rje dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o/ / mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang // mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu
260a1(rgyud 'bum): bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o//
260a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang
260a3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// yul de dag kyang 'jig pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshegs rnams kyang slar
260a4(rgyud 'bum): bzlog par bgyi'o/ / mo'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis
260a5(rgyud 'bum): la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems
260a6(rgyud 'bum): bskyed na/ bcu pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de/ rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyed
260a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na'ang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya
260b1(rgyud 'bum): dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rang gi yul du phyin na/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo ngo/
260b2(rgyud 'bum): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs su mchi ba'i slad du rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag
260b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig par 'chal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
260b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ der mchi bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de shul
260b5(rgyud 'bum): du zhugs pa las kyang de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o/ / brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// bgegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de mchi bar yang mi nus
260b6(rgyud 'bum): na/ yul gzhig par bgyid pa lta ga la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen
260b7(rgyud 'bum): po dag khyen yang legs so/ / khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde
261a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag la kun tu srung bar rgyas shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba
261a2(rgyud 'bum): dang 'chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ rgyal po'i pho 'brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang /
261a3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrugs pa thams
261a4(rgyud 'bum): cad las yongs su thar par gyis shig/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang zlog par gyis shig/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mo'i rgyal po de dag mi 'thab pa dang / mtshang mi 'dru ba dang /
261a5(rgyud 'bum): ma rtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhes 'dzam bu glong 'dir/ nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi steng de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri
261a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi stong po de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun rnam par 'tshe
261a7(rgyud 'bum): ba mi skyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir
261b1(rgyud 'bum): pha rol gyis mi gnod pa dang / nam 'dzam bu'i glong 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag nang phan tshun du byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i//
261b2(rgyud 'bum): sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du mi 'thab/ mtshang mo 'dra/ mi rtsod/ mi 'gyid par rang rang gi yul dag na dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu
261b3(rgyud 'bum): gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur/ sa'ang byin can du 'gyur/ dus dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / lo khyud 'khor
261b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ char pa'i rgyun kyang sa la dus dus su 'bab par
261b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ longs spyod che ba dang ser sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/
261b6(rgyud 'bum): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ros kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po
261b7(rgyud 'bum): dag gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur te/ rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen
262a1(rgyud 'bum): ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod
262a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin 'bum phrag du ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nyan na/ chos snyan pa'i chu klung / chos bdud rtsi'o khung ba 'dis khyed cag gi lus 'di dag
262a3(rgyud 'bum): tshim par 'gyur ro/ / khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byon chen po'ang rnam par 'phel lo// khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs kyang skyed do// khyed kyi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang /
262a4(rgyud 'bum): phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la'ang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
262a5(rgyud 'bum): rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la'ang yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab
262a6(rgyud 'bum): pa cha che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / des na mo'i rgyal po chen po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su
262a7(rgyud 'bum): bskyab pa dang yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chang pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byas par 'gyur ro// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang
262b1(rgyud 'bum): btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang /

262b3(rgyud 'bum): bde ba dang / yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur/ yongs su bskyang bar 'gyur
262b4(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa med par 'gyur/ dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang //
262b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mag mi bzang dang / de dag gis 'di skad
262b6(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mo'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'ang nyan mtshal bar gyur/ bdag nyid la'ang bsrung ba chen po bgyid
262b7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal bar gyur/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la'ang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang
263a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor de dag thams cad la'ang zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ tshe 'ang nyid/
263a2(rgyud 'bum): la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag
263a3(rgyud 'bum): tu ma mchis pa'ang yongs su 'dzin 'tshal bar gyur/ bdag gi yul thams cad kyang kun tu bsrung 'tshal bar gyur/ yongs su bskyang 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang /
263a4(rgyud 'bum): dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi brdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mo'i rgyal po des
263a5(rgyud 'bum): g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang / gus pa dang bcas dang / rim gro dang bcas pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi'o// gser 'od
263a6(rgyud 'bum): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ang mnyam pa'i slad du/ mi'i rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o// der mchis nas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tsho/
263a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis chag chag btab cing me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram par bgyi'o// spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bsham
263b1(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi'o/ / phyogs der gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o// gos dri rab tu bda' ba shes
263b2(rgyud 'bum): gsar pa mdzes pa bgos nas/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag gis stan rab tu dma' ba gding bar bgyis te/ stan de la mchis nas rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi rgyan
263b3(rgyud 'bum): der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o/ / rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
263b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di mnyan par bgyi'o/ / dge slong chos smra ba de la'ang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// mo'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu
263b5(rgyud 'bum): mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang phan pas blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa rnams dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan par smra bar
263b6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la'ang tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// chos mnyan pa'i phyir mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs spyod du stsal par bgyi'o// dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pas
263b7(rgyud 'bum): mchis pas bdag tshim par bgyi'o/ / dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po bde bar brgya'o// bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o// bdag dga' ba chen pos
264a1(rgyud 'bum): bya/ dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas/ chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di
264a2(rgyud 'bum): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rgyal po chen po dag de'i tshe de'i dus na mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar po gsar pa mdzes pa bgo bar bya'o// spyad pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag la legs par
264a3(rgyud 'bum): brgyan par bgyi'o/ / gdugs dkar po'ang gzung bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i bkod pa chen pos bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la/ chos
264a4(rgyud 'bum): smra ba de bsu ba'i phyir dor 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal pos der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gi 'khor ba phyir bskol bar 'gyur/ de snyed
264a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed du tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar
264a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba lha'i gzhal mer khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ mo rnams kyi rgyal rigs dang lha'i rgya che zhing rgya
264a7(rgyud 'bum): che ba 'bum phrag du ma thob par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par
264b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa shin tu rgya che bar 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams
264b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur/ chen po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang / bltan sdug pa dang / kha des paca
264b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung pa dpag tu med pa yongs su
264b4(rgyud 'bum): gzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong nas/ ma'o rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang / dpag tshad steng du'ang bsu
264b5(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// yang 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gi rgyal ba'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par
264b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ bdag gi rgyal po'i lo brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
264b7(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bgyi'o/ / deng bdag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
265a1(rgyud 'bum): mi ldog par bgyi'o/ / deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
265a2(rgyud 'bum): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gi sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas
265a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag
265a4(rgyud 'bum): gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis
265a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar
265a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba las yongs su thar par byas par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis bsod nam gyi phung po dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// deng
265a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab/
265b1(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis yul 'di dag thams cad kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyang ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / dgra
265b2(rgyud 'bum): med pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / nad 'gro ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro// snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/
265b3(rgyud 'bum): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag la/ ma'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa de lta bus bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed//
265b4(rgyud 'bum): rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / lha'i tshegs de dag dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin na/ mi'i
265b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro//
265b6(rgyud 'bum): tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzi brjid kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / dgra
265b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad chos dang mthun par shin tu tshar chod par 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
266a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das gang la la zhig mo'i rgyal por gyur la/ de chos la gus pa de lta bus gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen man
266a2(rgyud 'bum): sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod par bgyid cing / rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad du rgyal po'i pho brang de shin du dag par phyag bdar gyid/ spos chab sna tshogs
266a3(rgyud 'bum): kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun mong du chos mnyan pa de dag nyan cing / bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shas cung zad cig sbyin par
266a4(rgyud 'bum): bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po des bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du spos sna tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o// btsun
266a5(rgyud 'bum): pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du bdug pas 'dugs ma thag tu spos sna tshogs rnams las/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar
266a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po bdag cag bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khro shing dag gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur
266a7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / spos dri rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan
266b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la maM mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang
266b2(rgyud 'bum): lhame chen mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpen chen po
266b3(rgyud 'bum): lags na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang ldan pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / de dag rang
266b4(rgyud 'bum): rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams
266b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi nang du gser du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des gnas thams cad snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di
266b6(rgyud 'bum): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rgyal po chen po dag rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par ma
266b7(rgyud 'bum): zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ sros sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu/ lag na bog snod gcig
267a1(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa de las/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham/
267a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag thams cad na/ gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang khor yug chen po bye
267a3(rgyud 'bum): ba phrag brgya dang / gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum cu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med
267a4(rgyud 'bum): mon du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad nas/ lha dang /
267a5(rgyud 'bum): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tsa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyi rang rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshog
267a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'khri shong de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos kyi dri rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnams su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang
267a7(rgyud 'bum): lha'i khang pa rnams snang bar byas par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa
267b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khri shing dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po des spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu/ gser
267b2(rgyud 'bum): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i
267b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag rnams su/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag gi bar

267b7(rgyud 'bum): pa legs so legs so/ / skyes bu dam pa khyod gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'di lta bu/ zab mo'i don 'di lta bu/ zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab
268a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa/ khyod yang legs so legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang /
268a2(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 'chad pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa
268a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'khor la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu/ byang chub sems
268a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ / de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig

268a6(rgyud 'bum): dag mthun pa dang / smre skad mthun pas dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi khri stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/
268a7(rgyud 'bum): skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad
268b1(rgyud 'bum): las rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi
268b2(rgyud 'bum): snying po la legs par rgyan par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung

268b4(rgyud 'bum): dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpe med par rab tu zhi ba/ rdul dang bral ba/ zab mo mngon par rdzogs par
268b5(rgyud 'bum): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ mchog tu zab pa/ bla na med pa rnam pa bcu
268b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis rab tu skor bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi rje chen po bla na med pa rdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi dung bla na med pa 'bud par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rgyal mtshan

269a1(rgyud 'bum): mongs pa'i dgra 'bum phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma shin tu 'jigs su rung ba/ 'jigs pa chen po'i rgya

269b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i bro brang ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o/ / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can
269b2(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang

269b5(rgyud 'bum): par brgyan pa/ me tog bkram pa'i sa la bshams par gyur pa ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog

270a1(rgyud 'bum): bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po'i bo zang de dang / grong khyer de dang / yul de'ang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba

270a3(rgyud 'bum): cad las yongs su thar par bgyi'o/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur te/ mo'i rgyal po de'i yul du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di byung la

270b1(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs tham/
270b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis kyang yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal

270b4(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / gza' dang nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyogs tha dad pa nas skar mda' ltung bar 'gyur/ gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par gda' bar 'gyur/ dgung zla
270b5(rgyud 'bum): 'char ba na nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i gza' dang nyi ma'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' la gnas pa'ang rtag par rgyun du sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus su nam
270b6(rgyud 'bum): mamakha' la 'ja'i kha dog lta bu 'khyol bar 'gyur/ sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i khron pa'ang sgra 'byin pa grag par 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ char ba drag po 'bab par 'gyur
