271a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang / yul na gnas pa'i lha dang klu
271a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor nas/ yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la
271a3(rgyud 'bum): de bdag nyid la kun tu bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myong bar 'tshal bar gyur/ bde ba thams cad bstabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'a
271a4(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad pham par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul thams cad du yun ring du yongs su skyong
271a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chal bar gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi yul yang 'jig pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyid 'tshal bar gyur nA/
271a6(rgyud 'bum): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma'o rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyid/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma lam dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde
271a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang du bgyi/ tha mar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang / chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i
271b1(rgyud 'bum): ba bsags pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyid/ bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin chen po'ang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
271b2(rgyud 'bum): mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das
271b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa bstan pa dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs
271b4(rgyud 'bum): ngag gis sems can dag gi don gyi slad du/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa/ gser 'od
271b5(rgyud 'bum): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang po 'bum phrag de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba
271b6(rgyud 'bum): khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad pa lags so//
271b7(rgyud 'bum): ci nas 'dzam bu'i glong thams cad na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang ci nas sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas rang gi yul kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang /
272a1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bskyang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul thams cad na gnod pa dang dgra ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams pha ma ste phyir phyogs
272a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul de dag na nad 'go ba ma mchis shing 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul thams cang chos kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing mi brdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas
272a3(rgyud 'bum): mi'i rgyal po de dag gis rang rang gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar bar bgyis shing snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / tsa nas lha'i khang khyim thams cad lha dag dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar
272a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang / 'dzam bu gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshim pa dang rim gror bgyid
272a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / tsaM nas bdag cag gi lus la brtson 'gras dang / stobs dang / mthu chen po skyed par
272a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba dang ci nas bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs parab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du lo legs shing nyams dga' la/ skye bo dang
272a7(rgyud 'bum): mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur ba dang ci nas 'dzam bu'i grong thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang ci nas sems can thams cad
272b1(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
272b2(rgyud 'bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad da lta na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
272b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag pas res 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag gi lha'i shes pa bas
272b4(rgyud 'bum): ches 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tsho gas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas ches 'phags pa'i byin
272b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling
272b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ / mi'i rgyal po'i dgos pa dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems can 'di
272b7(rgyud 'bum): dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nye bar
273a1(rgyud 'bum): bstan yongs su brjod/ yang dag par rab tu bshad do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu de dang rkyen des/ mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
273a2(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyal po 'ang gas par mnyan par bgyi/ gus par rim gror bgyi/ gus par mchod par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
273a3(rgyud 'bum): de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyod bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas/ gdon mi za bar ma'o rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kun
273a4(rgyud 'bum): tu srung ba'i phyir spro ba rgya cher gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi
273a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa 'dzin du chug cig dang de dag lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'ong ngas pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ang rgya cher
273a6(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis ci nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma srung ba dang / gnod pa
273a7(rgyud 'bum): med pa dang / nang med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang sems bde bar 'gro zhing / gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba ra/ dge slong ngam/
273b1(rgyud 'bum): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang /
273b2(rgyud 'bum): bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu stan las langs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la yi de bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis pa
273b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di/ sems can gang la la dag 'dzin cing 'chang bar mos pa de la bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu de la bdag gis srung zhing bskyabs pas/ de'i sdug bsngal thams cad
273b4(rgyud 'bum): bsal te bde bar gnas par bgyi'o/ / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyang bskyed par bgyi'o// gang gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin par 'dod pas lus srung ba'i phyir sngags 'idi sngar brjod par bgyi'o//
273b5(rgyud 'bum): namo bai shra ba NA ya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ra ra ra ra/ ku no ku no/ khu no khu no/ ru no ru no/ sa ba sa ba/ ka ra ka ra/ bi kA raM/ ma hA bi kA raM/ ma hA kA la/ ma hA rA dza/ rak+Sha rak+Sha tu mAM/ sarba satwA
273b6(rgyud 'bum): nany+tsa swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das sngags 'ang skud pa dkar po la sngags lan re bzlas shing mdud pa lan re bor te de ltar lan bdun byas nas dpung pa la btags na don nges par
273b7(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang mkhrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon te/ spos gu gul dang / tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / du ru ka dang / a ka ru dang / pog dkar po la sogs pa 'di dag cha
274a1(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par sbyar ba'i spos kyis mchod cing sngags 'di bzlas pas/ rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang bar bya'o// na mo be shra ba NA ya/ ma hA d+hA na dA ya/ tsaN+De shwa rA ya/ A kaR+Sha
274a2(rgyud 'bum): / a pa ra mi ta tsaN+De shwa ra/ pa 'am/ kA ru Ni ka/ sarba satwA/ hi ta tsan+te/ ma ma d+ha na badz+ro/ par+ye sha swa yaM/ A kaR+Sha ya swA hA/ sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas pa'i 'og tu rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o// sngags
274a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di 'don pa'i dus su dkon mchog gsum dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la sngar phyag 'tshal bar bya'o// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa skong zhing nor sbyin pas
274a4(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad bde bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas na/ sems can de ngag yid bzhin du bde ba rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos
274a5(rgyud 'bum): bus bcom ldan 'das kyi spun sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba'i sngags kyi snying po 'di smras so/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ si mi si mi su mu su mu/
274a6(rgyud 'bum): tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sau ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ka la~M ka li/ ku ru ku ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ saM dA ya/ at+ma naM/ ni t+yaH/ an+taR+tha tu swA hA na mo bai shra ba NA ya swAhA/ d+hA na dA ya swA hA/ ma nor
274a7(rgyud 'bum): thab ri pU ra ya swA hA/ sngags 'di sngar lan stong bzlas pa'i 'og tu/ khang pa dben pa'i nang du lci ba'i dkyil 'khor chung ngu zhig byas te/ bshos ci dang ci 'byor par mchod par bya'o// spos dam pa
274b1(rgyud 'bum): bsregs pa'i du ba'i rgyun mi 'chad par bya zhing nyin mtshan du sems rtse gcig pas/ sngags kyi snying po 'di bdag nyid kyis thos pa tsam du bzlas pa byas na/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi
274b2(rgyud 'bum): bu'i sras dzi na ra sha b+ha zhes bya ba gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis/ de'i gan du mchis te nga'i yab la ci zhig gsol zhes dri bar bya'o// de nas bdag ni dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir nor zhig gsol
274b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis stsol cig ces smros shig/ de nas sras dzi nar sha b+has yab la gsol pa/ skyes bu dam pa zhig dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir nor zhig gsol lo zhes gsol pa dang / yab kyis
274b4(rgyud 'bum): khyod myur du song la nyin gcig bzhin du kar sha pa Na brgya brgya byin cig ces bka' stsal to/ / de nas sngags sgrub pa des ltas de lta bu mthong nas don de grub par shes te/ gnas dben par bdag gcig
274b5(rgyud 'bum): bu spos bsregs la/ nyal khar sngags su dri'i za ma tog gcig gzhag ste nyal bar bya'o// de phyin chad nang gcig bzhin du za ma tog de'i nang nas nor 'byung ba las/ nor de de'i nyin par dkon
274b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog gsum la mchod pa'i yo byad me tog dang / spos dang / zhal zas la sogs pa sbyar ba dang / brel cing 'phongs pa rnams la'ang sbyin zhing zad par bya'o// sems can thams cad la byams
274b7(rgyud 'bum): par bsam mo/ / khro ba dang 'tshe ba'i bsam pa bskyed na/ de nyams par 'gyur bas khro ba'i sems mi skye bar rtag tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// de nas yang sngags 'di 'dzin pa des nyin gcig bzhin lha'i
275a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / gzhan yang sras dang sras mo'i 'khor du bcas pa la rtag par bsam zhing bstod pa dang bsngags pa bya'o// rtag par dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
275a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis gtong zhing / lha la sogs pa rnams kyi mthu dang bsod nams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba rgyas pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// zla de dag gis de ltar byed
275a3(rgyud 'bum): pa de mthong nas/ kun dga' zhing mgu rangs pas 'ong zhing de la srung ba dang skyob par byed do// sngags mkhan de nyid kyang tshe lo dpag tu med par gnas shing / ngan song gsum yongs su spong ba dang /
275a4(rgyud 'bum): bgegs dang bar chad thams cad kyang med par 'gyur ro// yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'di dag dang gter gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul la dbang sgyur zhing bsam pa thams cad kyang grub par
275a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gal te longs spong can du 'dod na 'ang yid bzhin du grub pa dang / bya dang gcan gzan gyi skad thams cad kyang shes par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das sngags sgrub pa des bdag mthong bar
275a6(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal na tshes brgyad dam/ chos bcwo lnga'i nyon par ras dkar po la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ka li ta dang sbyar ba'i tshon rtsis rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa// ri mo mkhan gso sbyong yan lag
275a7(rgyud 'bum): brgyad dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yon phyogs su ni dpal gyi lha mo'i gzugs bri/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yas phyogs su ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bdag bu smad dang 'khor du bcas par bris
275b1(rgyud 'bum): te/ gnas der bkram nas me tog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs mang po dang / mar me dam pa dang / zhal zas bda' ba sna tshogs kyis nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par mchod par bya'o// sngags
275b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di zlos pas sems mo g.yeng bar bya zhing / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o// na mo shrI kar+N+Na ya/ bud d+hA ya/ na mo be shra ba NA ya/ yak+Sha rA dzA ya/
275b3(rgyud 'bum): ma hA rA dzA ya/ a ti rA dzA ya/ na maHshri ma hA de byaM/ tad+ya thA ta ra ta ra/ tu ru tu ru/ ba ra ba ra/ su shud+d+ho su shud+d+ho/ ha na ha na/ ma ni ka na/ badz+re bai DUr+Ya/ muk+ko ke/ a laM kr-i ta/ sha ri
275b4(rgyud 'bum): ya sarba satwA/ hi ta kA ma/ be shra ba Na/ shrI ya de ba pra b+hA ya/ e hi e tsi/ ma bam+l-i/ g+hur+Na g+h+rAH/ pa ras+sapar s+ya/ da dA hi ma ma/ daR+sha na/ kA ma s+ya ngadran/ ma ma
275b5(rgyud 'bum): ma na pra la dA ye swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngags zlos pa de dang mchod pa rgya chen po mthong nas/ bdag byams pa dang dga' ba'i bsam pa skyes nas/ bdag de'i mdun du byis pa gzhen nu'i
275b6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs sam/ yang na rgan po 'am/ dge slong gi gzugs su byas te/ bdag lag na yid bzhin gyi nor bu gser gyi snod dang bcas pa thogs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas
275b7(rgyud 'bum): lus kyis gus pa ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tu brjod de/ sngags mkhan de la 'di skad ces smra'o// khyod ci deng ci slong ba de dag thams cad grub par bya ste/ nags tshal dben
276a1(rgyud 'bum): sh+ya bya/ par 'gro 'dod pa 'am/ nor bu rin po che 'dod pa 'am/ mi mang po'i yid du 'ong bar 'dod pa 'am/ gser dang dngul la sogs pa'i nor 'dod pa 'am/ sngags gzhan sgrub
276a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa 'am/ rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang / sman bcud kyis len 'dod pa la sogs pa thams cad bsams pa bzhin du grub par bya'o// bdag
276a3(rgyud 'bum): gis dngos po de dag la sogs pa mdo tsam zhig smos par zad kyis/ de ma yin pa gzhan zhig 'dod na'ang thams cad bsams pa bzhin du yongs su grub par bya ste/ rin po che'i gter mi zad pa dang
276a4(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / dper na nyi zla 'di sa la ltung bar 'gyur ba dang / sa chen po 'di gzhan du 'gyur ba'i dus ni yod kyang srid kyi bden pa'i tshig 'dis ni rnams kyang slu bar
276a5(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur bas rtag tu bde ba dang / yid bzhin du skyid pa longs spyod pa thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gang zhig 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog tsang
276a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa'ang rung sngags 'di sgrub pa'ang rung ste/ tshegs chung ngus myur du grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can dbul zhing 'phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams kyi ched
276a7(rgyud 'bum): du sngags 'ang bshad pas/ des phyug cing bde ba'i mchog dang phun sum tshogs pa tshe gcig tu 'byor par 'gyur ro// bdag gis kyang de yongs su bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang zhing garjod
276b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang 'tshe ba thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/ / gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de 'dzin cing rgyas par byed pa dang / sngags 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag de gom pa brgya tshun chad
276b2(rgyud 'bum): 'od kyis snang bar byas te/ bdag gi 'khor gnod skyon stong rnams kyis kyang rtag tu de'i g.yog tu sgom zhing mngag gzhug yid bzhin du byed du gzhug go/ bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'di slu ba med par
276b3(rgyud 'bum): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus sngags de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen
276b4(rgyud 'bum): po khyod kyis sems can thams cad sred pas gdung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi dra ba thams cad bral bas phyug cing bde bar bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di smras pa dang / gzhan yang mdo sde 'di 'jig rten du yongs su
276b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di bshad pa ni legs so legs so/ / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lgang sa la btsugs te/
276b6(rgyud 'bum): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ de'i tshe mngon sum du tshul dang mthun pa'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba zla ba
276b7(rgyud 'bum): dri ma med pa'i sku/ / rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'od// rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan// rgyal ba me tog par rtsa rdul med tshems// rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste// rin po chen du ma'i 'byung
277a1(rgyud 'bum): / gnas gyur// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yis gang // ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang // rgyal ba'i zhabs ni 'khor los bris 'dra ste/ khor yug mu khyud de bzhin/
277a2(rgyud 'bum): rtsib ma stong // phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas spras pa ste// zhabs kyi dra ba dang pa'i dbang po bzhin// gser gyi ri bo lta bur rab tu gda'// rgyal ba dri med gser gyi ri dbang rgyal// yon tan thams cad
277a3(rgyud 'bum): ri dbang 'dra ba ste/ / sangs rgyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba chu zla 'dra// nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste// sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur chags med pa
277a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// rgyal po chen po bzhi la tshigs su bcad de bka' sbal ba// stobs bcu dag gis gse ro 'od dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i
277a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po rab mchog 'di/ / 'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyis ni// brtson 'grus rab tu brtan pas bskyang bar bya// 'di ltar mdo sde dkon mchog zab mo 'di// sems can kun la bde ba sbyin
277a6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / sems can rnams la phan dang bde ba'i phyir// 'dzam bu gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur// 'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi// 'jig rten dag na ngan song sdug bsngal dang // sems can dmyal
277a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sems can rnams kyi ni/ / sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa yin// 'dzam gling 'di ni 'jam gling gnas pa yi// rgyal po gang dag yin pa thams cad kyis// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni/
277b1(rgyud 'bum): chos rnams kyis ni yul dag bskyang bar gyis// gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir bde ba dang // shin tu lo legs nyams kyang dga' 'gyur zhing // 'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad dag na yang // sems can
277b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar gyis/ / 'di ni mo yi dbang po gang rnams ni// yul la dga' dang bdag bde dga' ba dang // rgyal srid rnam par 'byor pa dga' ba des// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya//
277b3(rgyud 'bum): mdo sde'i dbang 'di mchog tu dge bar byed// pha rol dgra ni yang dag zad par byed// pha rol dmag tshegs zlog byed dge ba byed// mchog tu 'jigs pas 'phongs pa sel bar byed// dper na rin chen
277b4(rgyud 'bum): shing ljon rab mdzes pa/ / yon tan kun 'byung khyim na yod pa ltar// rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de ltar blta// dper na chu grang skom pa sel byed pa//
277b5(rgyud 'bum): tshabs nyam thag tshe ni rnyed pa ltar// yon tan dag gis skom pa'i rgyal po la// mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no// dper na rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rin chen snod ni lag mthil yod
277b6(rgyud 'bum): pa ltar/ / mi yi dbang po'i tshogs la gser 'od mchog/ mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no// 'di ni lha yi tshogs kyis mchod mchod pa// mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyug byas pa// 'dzag
277b7(rgyud 'bum): rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po pa/ / bzhi po dag gis kun tu bsrung ba yin// phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / mdo sde'i dbang po 'dini rtag tu dgongs// mdo sde'i dbang po 'dun
278a1(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa na/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs zhes brjod pa byin// gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dag tu yul yang srung bar byed// rab tu dga' zhing
278a2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu mgu sems kyis/ / mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed// 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par gyur pa yi// lha yi tshogs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas//
278a3(rgyud 'bum): mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed// chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yis ni// gzi brjid dang ni stobs dang brtson 'grus thob// gzi byin chen po yis ni lha yi lus// shin tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel
278a4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das las tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa dang / ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur nas dga' bar gyur te/ de dag chos
278a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi shugs kyis yud tsam zhig ngus nas mchim phyis te/ de dag lus 'phar yan lag kun 'dar zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan
278a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das la lha'i me tog man nga rab dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor to// mngon par gtor nas kyang stan rnams las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang
278a7(rgyud 'bum): sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/
278b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po re re la'ang gnod sbyin lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / chos smra ba de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du rtag tu dge slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// gal te mdo sde 'di
278b2(rgyud 'bum): tshig gi don 'ga' zhog brjed par gyur na'ang / bdag cag gis de la dran pa dang / mi brjed pa'i mchog gi gzungs chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dag gang na bzhu
278b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gnas de dag gi sems can rnams kyis yongs su rgyas par byed pas nam yang nub par mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa de dag la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe//
278b4(rgyud 'bum): sems can de dag gis ye shes dang / spobs pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa thob pas/ nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i bde ba dang ldan te/ bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas shing 'khor ba yongs
278b5(rgyud 'bum): su spangs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldeg pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// rgyal po chen po bzhis yul 'khor
278b6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su skyong ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la 'di lta ste/
278b7(rgyud 'bum): chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la bsgoms pa rnams kyi me dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
279a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
279a2(rgyud 'bum): gzungs ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi tshig gi don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
279a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar khyod theg pa chen po la gnas pa dang / theg pa chen po la mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la lhag par
279a4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba byas pa yin na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar khyod gzungs ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas shing / chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs
279a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin/ dngos po can yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa can yang ma yin/ rkyen las byung ba'ang ma yin/ rkyen med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin/ 'gro ba las byung
279a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'ang ma yin/ 'gro ba med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin/ chos gang gi skye ba'ang ma yin/ 'gog pa'ang ma yin par rmos ston mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ 2
279a7(rgyud 'bum): lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs
279b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs sgrub pa'i lam gyi reg pa dang / stobs kyi gnas 'dri ba legs so legs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
279b2(rgyud 'bum): bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gzungs thob pas gang na gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
279b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / yang dag par dam bcas par 'gyur ba dang / rten med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi spobs pa can gyi slob dpon dang / lam la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzud kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad
279b4(rgyud 'bum): du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu legs so/
279b5(rgyud 'bum): legs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas nyid du brjod par bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang la la gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
279b6(rgyud 'bum): la bkur stir byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / rim gror byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa des/ sangs rgyas la bkur stir byas par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang la la gzungs 'di nyan par
279b7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa dang / gang dag gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa dang / gang dag mos par byed pa de rnams la byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral bas/ sangs rgyas la ji ltar mchod pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro//
280a1(rgyud 'bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs de ni 'di yin te/ d+ya thA/ san+na ra Ni/ ud+d+ha ra Ni/ su saM pra tiSh+NI te/ su nA ma/ su pra tidz+dzi te/ bi dza ya ba la sad+d+ha pra ti drA tsa a ro hA/ dAn sa?
280a2(rgyud 'bum): ti/ ut+pA da ni/ a ba nA be ni/ a b+hiny+dza ni/ a b+hi byai ha ra/ shu b+ha ba s+t+wa~M/ su na skr-i tA/ bahu gum+b+ha/ a b+hi pa dA swA hA/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi tshig 'di byang chub
280a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' gang gis shin tu gnas pa dang / legs par bzung ba byas nas 'ching bar byed pa de la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa bas lhag pa'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya phrag steng du
280a4(rgyud 'bum): 'ang smon lam zad par mi 'gyur la/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur te/ dug gis ma yin zhing / sbrul gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chags pa
280a5(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum ste/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs
280a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa phrag bcu rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom
280a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rnams la yon du phul zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bskal pa grangs med par na bza' dang zhal zas gya nom par bzhugs par byed pa bas/ gang dag gos chags pa ma
280b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig gcig tsam 'dzin par byed pa'i sems can de dag de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
280b2(rgyud 'bum): la chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum yin no/ / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu
280b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsas pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis glog thams cad zlog pa/ so sor 'brang ba'i sngon gyi yang dag
280b4(rgyud 'bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ nga'ang da ltar 'chad kyis zung zhig/ kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo lho phyogs na skad brgya pa zhes bya
280b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod do// kun dga' bo gang la la glog 'di rnams kyi
280b6(rgyud 'bum): ming shes pa dang / phyogs rnam par gnas pa shes pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o// glog gi ming 'di dag yi ger bris te/ gnas gang dag tu gzhag pa'i gnas
280b7(rgyud 'bum): de dag tu glog thams cad mi 'bab bo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ drA bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi chog 'di dag bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ ni mo ni ma~M/ ni min d+ha ri/ 'jig rten gsum
281a1(rgyud 'bum): snang bar byed pa/ lag na rtse gsum pas phyogs 'dir glog thams cad bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
281a2(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi
281a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam grangs 'di la/ drA bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ka Te bi ka Ta/ ni ka Te/ pra t+ya mi tre/ pra t+ya mi tre/ shud+d+he/ muk+te/ bi ma le/ pra b+ha sa re/ aN+Da re/ par+t+ta /
281a4(rgyud 'bum): shwe te/ paN+Da ra/ bA si ni/ ha ri kar+N+Na ri/ ka pi l-i/ pi ga la/ ak+Shi da d+hi mu khi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig/ 'phags pa spyan ras
281a5(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjod kyis/ bdag dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad mthong bar ma gyur cig swA hA/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das ga la
281a6(rgyud 'bum): bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ mu ni mra ni/
281a7(rgyud 'bum): mu nin d+ha re/ ma ti ma ti/ su ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ ha ha ha ha/ khyod la sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig ces lag na rdo rjes spras kyi/ drA bi Da swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi srung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di sa'i
281b1(rgyud 'bum): snying la 'dzin tam/ yi ger bris pa de dag gi rtag par rgyun du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o// dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las thar par bgyi'o// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po
281b2(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba bskyed pa'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs
281b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ tsi li swA hA/ brah+ma pu re swA hA/ brah+ma swe ra swA hA/ brah+ma b+hi su gar+b+he/ puSh+pa saM sta re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi srung ba tshangs
281b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ba ste/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa/ sdig pa thams cad las rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom
281b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags
281b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ bi ni ba ra ni/ dan+d+ha/ ma dar+N+Ne/ ma ni nai te/ ti ni gau ri/ ban+d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li/ ma taM gi/ puk+ka se/ sa la pra b+he/ he na ma t+yo taM/ ud+b+ha ra ni/
281b7(rgyud 'bum): ma ho ra ni/ d+ha ra Ni ge/ tsakra bA ge/ sha ba ri sha ba ri swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni/ bdag gi rig sngags rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa
282a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad las thar par bgyid pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so// de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes
282a2(rgyud 'bum): po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
282a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag gis kyang / skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par
282a4(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe su puSh+pe/ du ma pa ri hA re/ Ar+ya pu sha ste/ shAn+te ni muk+te/ ma ga l+ya/ hi ra N+ya gar+b+he stu ste/ sta bi ta swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag d+hi
282a5(rgyud 'bum): srung ba 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las mi 'jigs par bgyid pa/ tshe skyong ba dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so// de na
282a6(rgyud 'bum): klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
282a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi srung ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba/ glog thams cad zlog pa/ dus ma lags par
282b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gum pa thams cad sel ba/ dug rnams mi gdug par bgyid pa/ gshed byed dang / byad sems dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shes pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bgyid pa mchis na/ bcom ldan
282b2(rgyud 'bum): 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung ba dang / ser sna spang ba'i slad du/ thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzhes su gsol/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu rnams ni ser
282b3(rgyud 'bum): sna can te/ sems ser snas skor ba lags so// tar+ya thA/ a tsa le/ a ma le/ a mri te/ a k+Sha ye/ a b+hi ye pu N+ye/ bar+ya ba te/ sarba pA paM/ pra sha ma nI ye swA hA/ Ar+ya ban+na su da ra nI ye swA hA/
282b4(rgyud 'bum): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la lce la 'don tam/ yi ger bris pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma mchis par rig par bya'o/
282b5(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i dug gam/ mche ba'i dug gam/ dbyig dug gam/ gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// bdag 'jigs pa thams
282b6(rgyud 'bum): cad dang gnod pa thams cad las bde bar gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / klu'i dbang po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/
282b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin bzang dag khyed skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjes su yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ drA bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad
283a1(rgyud 'bum): pa legs so leg so/ / phyogs rnams na gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa rnams srung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
283a2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ dge slong de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / klu'i bdag po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zad bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
283a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o//
283a4(rgyud 'bum): / de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
283a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang / dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig rgyan pa'i slad du/ spobs pa nye bar sgrub par
283a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig gis brjod pa kun tu gzhag par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la shes pa'i snang ba chen po bgyi/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
283a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig 'ga' 'am/ yi ge gang yang rung ba dag cig yongs su nyams par gyur tam bskyud na/ bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang / tshig dang /
283b1(rgyud 'bum): yi ge de rab thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// ci nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo
283b2(rgyud 'bum): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can du ma dag gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/ shes
283b3(rgyud 'bum): rab rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di la tshe phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / srog la phan
283b4(rgyud 'bum): gdags pa dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / thabs sna tshogs rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / bstan bcos thams cad la rab tu mkhas par
283b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba dang / bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / bskyud pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de dang / sems
283b6(rgyud 'bum): can chos mnyan pa de dag gi don gyi slad du/ sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi las brjod par bgyi ste/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog
283b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'khrug glo ba dang / khrag khrug dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byad dang ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus dgyid
284a1(rgyud 'bum): du stsal ba'i sman dang sngags ni 'di dag ste/ shu dag gi'u wang spri ka dang // sha mya sha myi shi ri sha/ in+d+ra hasta skal ba che// dzam shing tsa a ka ru// shau ro bai sta sra rtsi'i
284a2(rgyud 'bum): pogog/ gu gul ra sa sha la gi/ rdo dreg lo ma rgya spos dang // tsan dan dang ni ldong ros dang // gi'u wang dang bcas ru rta dang // gur kum gla sgang yungs kar dang // spyi mo sug smel na la da// na ga ge sar u

284a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bu mo bzhi/ / bum pa thogs pa gzhag par bgyi// rtag tu gu gul bdug par bgyi// sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du stsal// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis// lha mo de ni legs par brgyan// bar bar dag
284a7(rgyud 'bum): tu me long gzhag/ mnga' dang mdung rtse sna sbrang gzhag/ de nas mtshams kyang gcad par bgyi// de yi 'og tu dgos pa brtsam// sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis// mtshams gcad pa yang brtsam par bgyi//

290a3(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs can mchog/ gnod sbyin kun kyang dbyangs can mchog/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal po dbyangs can mchog/ bdag la las mchog kun gyi stongs// mtha' med dbyangs can mchog thob mdzod// slu med
290a4(rgyud 'bum): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / rnam par grol la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dod chags bral la phyag 'tshal lo// bcings pa bcad la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od snang mdzad
290a5(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bden tshig gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo// do ma gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor mang gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyangs can lha la phyag
290a6(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / bdag ni tshig la thogs med mdzod// bdag gi bsam pa ci mchis pa// thams cad myur du grub par mdzod// nad med rtag tu bde ba dang // tshe ring ba yang thob par shog
290a7(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i gnas la mkhas pa dang / / byang chub lam la brtson pa dang // skye bo kun la phan mang mdzod// ri ba thams cad myur du skongs// bdag gi yang dag bden tshig dang // bdag gis
290b1(rgyud 'bum): mi slu tshig smras pa/ / dbyangs can lha mo mchog gis ni// bdag gi don de grub par mdzod// lha mo 'dir ni gshegs par gsol// bdag gi tshig la thogs med mdzod// lus dang ngag
290b2(rgyud 'bum): la myur zhugs shing / / yid myur spobs pa rdzogs par mdzod// bdag gi lce yi dbang po la// bde gshegs spobs pa ldan par mdzod// tshig gi gzi brjid mthu des ni// sems can
290b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'dul bar mdzod/ / bdag gis tshig ni ci smras pa// don de thams cad grub par shog/ tshig la thams cad gus bskyed cing // byed pa thams cad chud ma gson// nam
290b4(rgyud 'bum): zhig bdag gi spobs 'dod pa/ / don de grub par ma gyur na// lha mo khyod kyi bden tshig ni// thams cad brdzun pa nyid du 'gyur// mtshams med lnga yi sdig bgyis pa// sangs rgyas
290b5(rgyud 'bum): bkas ni 'dul bar 'gyur/ / gang yang dgra bcom pa dag dang // byas pa gzo ba'i tshig rnams dang // shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal dang // bcom ldan 'khor gyi gtso bo ste// de la sogs

290b7(rgyud 'bum): cad myur du gshegs par mdzod/ / yang dag bden pa'i tshig gsol pa// thams cad slu ba med par shog/ srid pa'i rtse mo man chad dang // gtsang ma'i gnas ni thams cad dang // tshangs pa
291a1(rgyud 'bum): tshangs chen mdun 'don dang / / tshangs pa'i rgyal 'khor thams cad dang // stong gsum 'khor ba'i bar dag dang // mi mjed 'jig rten gtso bo dang // de dang de yi 'khor
291a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / de kun deng 'dir spyan drangs te// thugs rjes bdag la dgongs mdzad cing // brtse ba kun gyis gzung bar mdzod// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha dag dang // gzhan yang 'phrul
291a3(rgyud 'bum): dga'i lha dag dang / / byams pa mngon par 'tshang rgya'i gnas// dga' ldan gnas kyi lha rnams dang // 'thab bral gyi ni lha rnams dang // sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang // rgyal chen bzhi yi lha
291a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / gzhan yang lha 'khor thams cad dang // sa chu me rlung lha dag dang // ri rab lhun la gnas pa dang // chu bdun ri bo lha rnams dang // de kun 'khor dang bcas pa dang // zur phud/

291a6(rgyud 'bum): mos dang / / sangs rgyas la gus 'byung ba'i ma// bu rab gzhon la byams pa dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams// dri za dang ni lha ma yin// gzhan yang mi 'am ci dag dang // lto 'phye/
