296b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa de dag chos kyi khri stan la mchis pa'i gan du mchi bar 'gyur/ mchis nas kyang sems rab tu dang bas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang /
297a1(rgyud 'bum): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi ba'i slad du chos smra ba de dag la gsol ba 'debs par 'gyur ro//
297a2(rgyud 'bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rab tu bshad pa na/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag g.yog dang bcas te/ rab tu
297a3(rgyud 'bum): gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / rab tu stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bdag cag gi lus la stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu chen po skyed par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi lus la
297a4(rgyud 'bum): gzi byin dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'jug par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur/
297a5(rgyud 'bum): gzi byin dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / shugs chen po thob par gyur na/ sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag bdun pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'di sa'i bcud
297a6(rgyud 'bum): chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ / sa chen po gzi byin dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa la brten pa'i sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang
297a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur/ chen por yang 'gyur ro// sa la gnas pa'i sems can de dag chen por gyur nas kyang / longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa sna tshogs la spyod
297b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ bde ba dag kyang myong bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / stan dang /
297b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / skyed mos tshal dang / chu bo dang / rdzing dang / chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / mtsho dang / lteng ka dang / 'di lta bu'i
297b3(rgyud 'bum): yo byad bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa sa las 'byung ba/ sa la brten pa 'di dag la spyod par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des na sems can de dag thams
297b4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis bdag la byas pa gzo bar bgyi'o/ / gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di sti sta nga du bgyis te/ mnyan par bgyi/ bkur stir bgyi/ tha mar bgyi/ rim
297b5(rgyud 'bum): gror bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe sems can de dag chos smra ba de'i gan du mchi ba'i slad du/ rigs tha dad pa dang khyim tha dad pa dag nas
297b6(rgyud 'bum): byung ste mchis nas/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur la/ thos nas kyang rang rang gi rigs dang / khyim dang / grong dang / grong
297b7(rgyud 'bum): rdal tha dad pa dag tu zhugs nas/ rang rang gi khyim na gnas pa dag phan tshun du 'di skad ces bdag cag gis de ring chos mnyan pa zab mo thos so// de ring bdag cag gis
298a1(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ngo / / bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
298a2(rgyud 'bum): phrag du ma dag mnyes par byas so/ / deng bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar to// dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
298a3(rgyud 'bum): rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul la sa yongs su thar to/ deng bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ tshe rabs 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i skye ba yongs
298a4(rgyud 'bum): su bzung bar 'gyur ro zhes gtam zer bar 'gyur ro/ / khyim tha dad pa na gnas par gyur pa de dag sems can gzhan dag la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
298a5(rgyud 'bum): po 'di las tha na dpe gcig tsam brjod dam/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na le'u gcig gam/ sngon byung ba gcig gam/ tha na byang chub
298a6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i ming ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig gam/ tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshig gcig gis sems can gzhan dag la
298a7(rgyud 'bum): thos par bgyid dam/ tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan gzhan dag la rab tu ston tam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang na sems
298b1(rgyud 'bum): can rnam pa tha dad pa de dag phyogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag tu mdo sde'i gtan tshigs rnam pa sna tshogs 'dri lta bu 'di dag gcig la gcig rjod dam/ thos par bgyid dam/ gtam
298b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyud rjod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs de dag thams cad shin tu gzi byin dang ldan pa dang shin tu snum par 'gyur ro// sa phyogs de dang de dag tu sems can de dag
298b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi phyir/ sa'i bcud rnam pa sna tshogs dang yo byad thams cad rgyas par skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ shin tu rgyas par 'gyur/ sems can de dag
298b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyang bde bar 'gyur ro/ / nor che ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / sbyin pa mos par 'gyur/ dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dad par 'gyur ro// de skad ces
298b5(rgyud 'bum): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sa'i lha mo brtan mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la dag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
298b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig gcig nyan na/ de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rigs kyi nang du lha'i rigs gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar
298b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la dag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di dag la mchod pa'i phyir gnas de dag legs par rgyan par byed dam/ ba na
299a1(rgyud 'bum): gdugs gcig gam/ ba dan gcig gam/ ras bcos bu gcig gis g.yogs na/ sa'i lha mo rtag tu brgyan pa'i gnas de dag 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i
299a2(rgyud 'bum): ris bdun po de dag tu lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang rgyan thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa dag tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe sems can de dang /
299a3(rgyud 'bum): mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang de dag tu skye ba de'i tshe/ sa'i lha mo rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang re rer yang lan bdun bdun
299a4(rgyud 'bum): du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / lha'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang myong bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces
299a5(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das des na sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi khri stan la mchis pa de'i tshe/ chos kyi stan gyi 'og logs kyis phyogs de dang de
299a6(rgyud 'bum): dag tu gnas par bgyi'o/ / ci nas kyang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
299a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par 'gyur ba dang /
299b1(rgyud 'bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang / mi'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa myong bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang /
299b2(rgyud 'bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin
299b3(rgyud 'bum): rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsnga la thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur bar lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ dge slong chos smra ba de'i rkang pa la yan lag gi dam pa mgo bos brten par bgyi'o//
299b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la sngags kyi snying po zhig mchis pa 'di lha dang mi thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba ste/ gang skyes
299b5(rgyud 'bum): pa 'am/ bud med dam/ 'khor bzhi po gang la la zhig gis bdag mngon sum du mthong bar 'dod pa dang / nor dang / nor bu rin po che dang / dbyig la sogs pa 'dod pa dang / sman
299b6(rgyud 'bum): bzang pos tshe ring zhing nad med par 'dod pa dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad 'jil bar 'dod na/ gnas dben par dkyil 'khor byas te/ khrus byas
299b7(rgyud 'bum): gos gsar pa bgos te/ rtswa bting ba'i steng 'dug nas/ sku gzugs ring bsrel can gyi mdun nam/ mchod rten ring bsrel can gyi mdun du me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
300a1(rgyud 'bum): zhal zas sna tshogs kyis mchod de/ skar ma rgyal dang sbyar ba'i tshes brgyad la sems rtse gcig gis gzungs sngags 'di bzlas pas spyan drangs par 'gyur te/
300a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags la/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi lo/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ ku Tu ku Tu/ ton+yA to Tu/ ba ha ba ha/ sha ba ri sha ba ri swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po gang la la zhig gis
300a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag spyan drang ba'i phyir/ sngags kyi tshig 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ bdag de'i gan du mchi bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig bdag dang mjal
300a4(rgyud 'bum): cing smra bar 'tshal na/ cho ga snga ma'i tshul du bshams te sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ an tsa ni kya li k+Sha ni/ shi sho d+ha ri/ hA ha/ hi hI/ ku ru ba re swA hA/ bcom
300a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ sngags snga ma bzlas pa byas na/ de'i mdun du lus bstan te/ nges par bsam pa rdzogs par bgyi'o// gang sngags 'di zlos/
300a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod pas/ sngar lus srung ba'i phyir sngags 'di brjod do// tad+yanA/ ni shau ro/ b+ha sha ka ti/ da ti shud ti/ d+hA tA/ b+hU te raM/ b+hU te ra/ Ti Ti ba T+Ti/ ku kuNI
300a7(rgyud 'bum): ka ba tsi li swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags 'di sgrub pa'i tshe/ tshon skur sna snga la sngags lan re gdab cing mdud pa re re bcing ngo // de 'dra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
300b1(rgyud 'bum): bsngags te/ dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na/ 'jigs pa thams cad bsal te lus srung bar 'gyur ro// sems mi g.yeng bar sngags 'di bzlas nas/ bsam pa thams
300b2(rgyud 'bum): cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / bdag gi tshig 'di mi slu bar/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams bdag la mngon du gzigs
300b3(rgyud 'bum): shing dgongs par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ gang khyod kyis bden pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'dis mdo
300b4(rgyud 'bum): sde'i dbang po 'di dang chos smra ba de la bsrung bar byas pa de ni legs so legs so/ / de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur
300b5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
300b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po yang dag shes/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
300b7(rgyud 'bum): lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
301a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs
301a2(rgyud 'bum): sam dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor gang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes
301a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag dang lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman
301a4(rgyud 'bum): ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor der mchi bar bgyi'o// lus mi gda' bar bgyi ste/ dge slong chos smra ba de la bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung
301a5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo chos nyan pa de dag
301a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / gang su dag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad pa gcig nyan pa dang / phan tshig gcig gam/ tha na
301a7(rgyud 'bum): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig tsam thos par gyur te bzung ba dang / tha na
301b1(rgyud 'bum): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i ming zos par gyur te bzung ba de thams cad kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs
301b2(rgyud 'bum): su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rigs de dag dang / khyim de dag dang / grong de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / grong rdal de dag dang /
301b3(rgyud 'bum): dgon pa de dag dang / pho brang 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang /
301b4(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang gis bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes ming du chags par gyur ce na/ 'di ni
301b5(rgyud 'bum): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon sum lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad 'tshal to// chos thams cad yongs su 'tshal to// chos thams
301b6(rgyud 'bum): cad khong du chud do/ / chos thams cad ji snyed pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba dang / chos thams cad gnas pa gang lags pa dang / chos thams cad gang dag lags pa dang /
301b7(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad kyi rogs gang dag lags pa dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad bdag la mngon sum mo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gi
302a1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / ye shes kyi gsal ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// ye shes kyi rgyu ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// ye shes kyi phung po bsam
302a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis mi khyab bo/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gi ye shes kyi yul 'jug pa bsam mi khyab bo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag chos thams cad yang
302a3(rgyud 'bum): dag par 'tshal ba dang / yang dag par yongs su brtags pa dang / yang dag par yongs su 'tshal ba dang / yang dag par rnam par bltas pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa'i rgyu des
302a4(rgyud 'bum): na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes ming du chags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan
302a5(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi ba'i slad du spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ / ci nas dge slong chos smra ba de'i lus mi ngal bar 'gyur ba dud/ lus kyi dbang po bde bar 'gyur ba dang / rab tu dga' ba
302a6(rgyud 'bum): skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gi slad du sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
302a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyen par 'gyur ba dang /
302b1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/
302b2(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma
302b3(rgyud 'bum): 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang
302b4(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ de'i spu'i bu ga rnams su gzi byin stsal bar bgyi'o// de'i lus la mthu dang / stobs dang
302b5(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus chen po bskyed par bgyi'o/ / de'i ye shes kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab par bgyi'o// de'i dran pa khong du chud par bgyi'o// de cher spro bar bgyi'o// de nas gnod
302b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes des 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag la gzungs sngags shig mchis pa 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa dang snying brtse
302b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag nyid kyis sngags 'di gdon par bgyi'o// sngags la/ na mo du d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na ma saM g+hA ya/ na mo brah+ma ya/
303a1(rgyud 'bum): na mo in+d+ra la/ na maHtsat+tarma hAnA dz+nyA nA na/ mnam/ mi mam zhig ri ma hA ko ra/ gan+d+ha ri/ mahA ban+d+har/ dra ma Ni/ mahA dra maT/ dar+dz+dzas
303a2(rgyud 'bum): ha ha ha ha hA/ hi hi hi hi hi/ hrI hu hu hu hwA/ ha lo d+ha me/ g+hu d+ha me/ tsa tsan+daH/ Tu tsi tsir+thi/ tsutsu tsu tsu/ tsaN+De shwa ra/ shi kha ra sha~M kha ra/ ut+tiSh+Tha he b+ha ga bAn+ta/ sa bid d+hA ma swAhA/
303a3(rgyud 'bum): gang la la zhig gis rig sngags 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin na/ bdag gis de la 'tsho ba'i yo byad bsod snyoms dang / gos dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / nor dang / rin po che la
303a4(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o/ / gang la la zhig bu pho mo smos pa dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / rgyan la sogs pa'i yo
303a5(rgyud 'bum): byad 'dod na'ang / bdag gis de la yid zhin du so sor stsal bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'di'i mthu dang / gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir/ gang gsang sngags 'di zlos pa'i
303a6(rgyud 'bum): tshe/ bdag myur du de'i gan du mchis te ci'ang thog pa med par 'grub par bgyi'o// gsang sngags 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ thog mar gnod sprin gyi bdag po chen po yang dag shes kyi
303a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs srid chags bzhi pa 'am lnga pa/ lag na dgra sta thogs pa bris pa'i mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas pa'i grwa bzhir/ sbrang rtsi 'am bu ram chus gang ba'i bum pa bzhi/
303b1(rgyud 'bum): zhog la/ byug pa dang / phye ma dang / bdug pa sreg cing / me tog gi 'phreng bas kyang mchod par bgyi'o// yang dkyil 'khor de'i mdun du sbyin sreg gi thab lung brkos pa la/
303b2(rgyud 'bum): dud pa med pa'i me'i nang du mar yungs kar bsres la/ sngags lan re bzlas shing / thab de'i nang du sbyin sreg bya'o// de ltar lan brgya rtsa brgyad sreg pa dang / bdag de la lus
303b3(rgyud 'bum): mngon par ston te/ khyod ci 'dod ces dri bar bya'o// de nas sngags sgrub pa des kyang ci 'dod pa de la smos shig dang / ci 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par byed do// gang gser
303b4(rgyud 'bum): dngul 'dod pa dang / gter tshol bar 'dod pa dang / lha'i drang srong 'dod pa'ang 'grub ste nam mkha' la 'gro'o// gzhan yang lha'i mig dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa la sogs
303b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyang thob par byed do/ / sems can thams cad la yid bzhin du dbang sgyur zhing / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcad de rnam par grol ba thob
303b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ legs so legs so// gang khyod kyis
303b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad la phan zhing bde ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'di yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsang sngags kyi chog 'di smras pas/ bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro// /
304a1(rgyud 'bum): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po yang dag shes kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas sa'i lha mo
304a2(rgyud 'bum): brtan ma zhes bya ba de/ 'khor mang po de'i nang na 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces gsol to//
304a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das gang yul 'khor na mi'i rgyal po byed pas yang dag pa'i chos mi spyod na/ yul gyi srid 'dzin cing sems can mang po la bde ba dang / rang gi lus rgyal thabs 'thon pa'i sa na yun ring
304a4(rgyud 'bum): por gnas par mi 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje dang ldan pas rgyal po'i bstan bcos yang dag pas yul gyi srid ji ltar 'dzin pa bshad par gsol/ de thos pas mi'i rgyal
304a5(rgyud 'bum): po rnams chos de lta bus 'jig rten skyong zhing / rgyal thabs dam pa la yun ring du gnas pas bde bar 'gyur ba dang / yul 'khor gyi skye bo de dag thams cad kyang yongs su bde bar 'gyur ro//
304a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i tshogs kyi nang na/ sa'i lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sa'i lha mo khyod de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon cig/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
304a7(rgyud 'bum): na rgyal po stobs kyi dbang po'i tog ces bya ba la/ bu mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba de'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na/ yab mchog gi rgyal po'i tog las blangs pa/ rgyal
304b1(rgyud 'bum): po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba zhig yod de/ / ngas rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig des lo nya khro'i bar du rgyal po nyid byas par gyur te/ tha na sems kyi skad cig/
304b2(rgyud 'bum): gcig tsam gyis chos kyang sngon chos ma yin pas phyogs 'ga' zhig la gnas par ma shes so// bu rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam chog ces bya ba de gang zhe na/ de nas rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe
304b3(rgyud 'bum): de'i dus na rgyal po stobs kyi dbang po'i tog ces bya bas bu rgyal po mdzes pa'i tog la/ rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis rgya cher yang dag
304b4(rgyud 'bum): par rab tu bstan to/ / sems can kun la phan byed pa// the tshom thams cad gcod pa po// nyes byas thams cad 'jig byed pa// rgyal po'i bstan bcos bshad par bya// rgyal po thams cad
304b5(rgyud 'bum): so so nas/ / dga' ba'i sems su 'gyur byos la// lha yi dbang po'i dam tshig kun// thal mo sbyar te nyan par byos// rdo rje'i 'byung gnas ri dbang 'dir// lha yi dbang po 'dus pa na// tshangs
304b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang la ni dri ba'i phyir/ / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang langs// khyod ni lha gtso tshangs pa ste// khyod ni lha rnams dbang phyug lags// khyod ni bdag cag the tshom gcod// bdag cag dogs pa
304b7(rgyud 'bum): gcad du gsol/ / mir skyes pa yi rgyal po la// ji lta bur ni lha zhes bgyi// gang gi rgyus na rgyal po la// lha sras zhes ni bgyi bar 'gyur// gal te lha ni ji lta bur// mi yi 'jig rten
305a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dir skyes shing / / mi bdag gyur te mi rnams la// rgyal po nyid ni bgyid par 'gyur// 'jig rten skyong bas tshangs dbang la// de skad yongs su dris pa dang /
305a2(rgyud 'bum): lha yi gtso bo tshangs pa des// 'jig rten skyong la 'di skad smras// de ltar 'jig rten skyong rnams kyis// de ltar bdag la dris pa na// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// bstan bcos dam
305a3(rgyud 'bum): pa kho bos bstan/ / mi yi gnas su skyes pa ni// rgyal po rnams kyi skye ba dang // rgyu gang gis ni yul rnams su// rgyal por 'gyur ba bshad par bya// lha dbang rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis/
305a4(rgyud 'bum): ma yi rum du 'jug gyur te// b+ha yis sngar ni byin brlabs nas// phyi nas mngal du 'jug par 'gyur// mi yi 'jig rten skyes kyang ni// mi yi dbang por gyur pa yin// lha las skyes par
305a5(rgyud 'bum): gyur pas na/ / de ni lha yi sras zhes bya// khyod ni lha kun bu yin zhes// sum cu rtsa gsum lha dbang gis// rgyal po'i skal ba byin nas ni// mi rnams la ni dbang por sprul// nyes
305a6(rgyud 'bum): par byas pa rnams 'gog pa/ / chos ma yin pa gzhig pa dang // sems can legs byed dgod pa dang // lha yi gnas su bgyi ba'i phyir// mi yi dbang po mi shes dang // lha yi
305a7(rgyud 'bum): shas dang dri za'i shas/ / gdol ba'i shas dang srin shas kyis// nyes par byed pa zlog par byed// legs par bya ba byed rnams la// mi yi dbang po pa ma'i shas// rnam smin
305b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir/ / b+ha yi rgyal por byin gyis brlabs// tshe 'di legs par byas pa dang // nyes pa byas pa'i las rnams kyi// rnam smin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir// lha yi rgyal por
305b2(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis brlabs/ / yul na nyes byas gnas pa bdag/ gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor zhing // sdig pa can gyi skye bo la// mthun pa'i chad pas mi gcod cing // nyes par byed pa yal bor ba/
305b3(rgyud 'bum): de tshe chos min shin tu 'phel// 'thab mo dang ni g.yo rnams kyang // yul 'khor der ni phyo phyir 'byung // sum cu rtsa gsum khang pa na// lha yi dbang po 'khrug par 'gyur// yul na nyes
305b4(rgyud 'bum): byed gnas pa dag/ gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor ba// de tshe g.yon ni mi bzad pa// drag po rnams kyis yul 'joms 'gyur// pha rol dmag tshogs lhags nas su// yul 'khor
305b5(rgyud 'bum): de ni rnam par 'jig/ longs spyod rnams dang rigs kyang 'jig/ gang gi nor bsags yod pa yang // g.yo byed rnam pa mang po yi// phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur// bya
305b6(rgyud 'bum): ba gang gis rgyal po nyid/ / bya ba de ni mo byed na// glang chen dbang pos rdzing bu bzhin// rang gi yul 'khor rnam par 'jig/ ma rungs pa yi rlung ldang zhing // ma rungs pa ma
305b7(rgyud 'bum): char pa 'bab/ / nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // gza' dang rgyu skar ma rungs 'gyur// rgyal pos yal bar bor na der// sa bon lo tog me tog 'bras// legs par smin par mi
306a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / / mu ge dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// yul na nyes byed gnas pa dag/ gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor na// de tshe lha rnams khang pa na// yid ni dga' bar mi
306a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / lha rgyal dbang po de dag kun// rgyal 'di chos dang mi ldan te// chos min phyogs la gnas pa'o zhes// phan tshun du ni smra bar 'gyur// rgyal 'dis ring por mi thogs par// sku
306a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams 'khrug par byed par 'gyur/ / lha rnams rab tu 'khrugs pa na// de yi yul ni rnam par 'jig/ yul du chos min 'byung 'gyur zhing // mtshon chas kyang ni 'jig par 'gyur// gtso
306a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang ni 'thab mo dang / / nad kyang kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur// lha dbang rnams ni reb khros shing // lha rnams kyis kyang yal bar 'dor// yul 'khor de ni 'jig par 'gyur// rgyal
306a5(rgyud 'bum): po de ni mya ngan rnyed/ / spun nam yang na bu yang rung // sdug pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur// sdug pa'i chung ma dang yang 'bral// yang na bu mo 'chi bar 'gyur// skar ma dag kyang sbyang bar 'gyur//
306a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin nyi ma 'dra ba 'byung // pha rol gyi ni dmag tshegs dang // mu ge shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur// de yi glang po 'phangs pa dang // blon po 'phangs pa 'chi bar 'gyur// de yi 'og tu rnga
306a7(rgyud 'bum): mo ni/ / 'phangs pa dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur// khyim dang longs spyod nor rnams kyang // phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur// yul yul du ni mtshon cha yis// phan tshun du ni 'debs par
306b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'thab mo dag dang rtsod dang g.yo// yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// yul 'khor du ni gdon 'jug cing // mi bzad pa yi nad kyang 'byung // de yi 'og tu sprin gnas kyang /
306b2(rgyud 'bum): chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur// de yi 'khor dang blon po yang // chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur// chos dang mi ldan skye bo la// de yi 'og tu mchod byed 'gyur// chos dang ldan pa'i sems
306b3(rgyud 'bum): can la/ / rtag tu chad pas gcod par 'gyur// chos dang mi ldan skye bo bkur// chos ldan chad pas bcad pas na// der ni chu dang rgyu skar rlung // rnam gsum rnam par 'khrug par
306b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / chos min skye bo bzung bas na// dam chos ro yi snying po mdangs// sems can mdangs dang sa yi bcud// dngos po rnam pa gsum po 'jig/ skye bo ngan pa rab bkur
306b5(rgyud 'bum): cing / / skye bo dam pa smad pas na// 'chi dang lce 'bab mu ge dang // rnam pa gsum ni der 'byung 'gyur// 'bras bu lo tog ro dang mdangs// de yi 'og tu med par 'gyur// sems
306b6(rgyud 'bum): can nad pa mang po dag/ yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// mngar zhing che ba'i 'bras bu dag/ yul rnams na ni yod pa yang // kha ba dang ni tsha ba dang // chung ba dag ni nyid du
306b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rtse dang dgod dang dga' ba dang // sngan chad dga' ba'i dngos po dag/ dga' ba nyams shing mi dga' 'gyur// nyon mongs brgya yis rnam par 'khrug/ lo tog rnams dang
307a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu mi/ / snum dngos khu bzad pas na// lus dang khams dang dbang po la// de ltar tshim par mi 'gyur ro// sems can rnams ni mdo ba ngan cing //
307a2(rgyud 'bum): mthu chung shin tu ring bar 'gyur// kha zas mang po zos kyang ni// tshim par 'gyur ba ma yin no// stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus kyang // de mi 'og tu med par 'gyur// sems can
307a3(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus nyams bdag/ yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// sna tshogs nad kyis gzir ba yi// sems can nad mang 'byung bar 'gyur// srin po sna tshogs las gyur pa'i//
307a4(rgyud 'bum): gza' dang rgyu skar 'byung bar 'gyur// chos min phyogs la rab gnas te// rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pas// 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor na// khams gsum rnam par 'jig
307a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / gang tshe rgyal po phyogs gnas te// nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe// 'di 'dra'i nyes pa du ma dag/ yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// lha dbang rnams kyis
307a6(rgyud 'bum): dgongs gangs gang phyir/ / rgyal po byin gyis brlabs pa yis// rgyal po nyid ni mo byed cing // nyes byed yal bar 'dor na ni// legs par byas pas sems can rnams//
307a7(rgyud 'bum): yi gnas su lhar yang skye// nyes par byas pa yi dgas dang // sems can dmyal dang dud 'gror skye// gang tshe rgyal po'i yul rnams ni// nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe//
307b1(rgyud 'bum): sum cu rtsa gsum lha gnas nas// nyes par byas pas lhung bar 'gyur// rgyal po nyid ni mo byed na// de ni bu yang ma yin la// lha yi rgyal po pha rnams kyis// gnas la nyes
307b2(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas par 'gyur/ / g.yo ni shin tu mi bzad pas// gang tshe yul 'khor 'jig 'gyur ba// de phyir lha yi dbang rnams kyis// mi gnas rgyal po byin gyis brlabs// nyes
307b3(rgyud 'bum): pabar byas pa zhi bya'i phyir/ / legs par byed la 'dzud pa ste// tshe 'di la ni sems can la// yul gyi chos kyi don gyi phyir// rnam smin skyed pa rgyal po yin// legs byas dang ni
307b4(rgyud 'bum): nyes byas kyi/ / las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras// rnam pa tha dad bstan pa'i phyir// byed pa gang yin rgyal por brjod// bdag gi don dang gzhan don dang // yul gyi chos kyi don
307b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi phyir/ / lha tshogs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs/ lha rnams dag kyang rjes yi rang // yul 'khor dag na skye bo ni// sdig can g.yon can 'dul ba dang // yul gyi don gyi chos
307b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyir/ / srog dang rgyal srid rnams kyang btang // chos ma yin pa bzod byed cing // shes bzhin yal bar 'dor ba ni// yul na 'jigs pa mi bzad ba// de 'dra zhan ni yod
307b7(rgyud 'bum): ma yin/ / ji ltar g.yo rnams 'byung ba la// g.yo byed chad par ma bcad na// yul du shin tu mi bzad pa// g.yo rnams phyir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// glang chen rnams kyis rdzing
308a1(rgyud 'bum): chen bzhin/ / yul 'khor de ni rnam par 'jig/ lha dbang rnams kyang khro bar 'gyur// lha yi gnas ni rnam par 'jig/ yul du dngos po thams cad ni/
308a2(rgyud 'bum): rungs par yang 'gyur bas na// de phyir sdig pa byed pa rnams// nyes pa'i rom bzhin gdul bar bya// chos kyis yul 'khor bskyang bar bya// chos ma yin pa spyad mi bya// srog
308a3(rgyud 'bum): kyang yongs su gtang bya zhing / / nyes mgon bya bar mi bya'o// skye bo gnyen dang skye bo gzhan// yul 'khor skye bo thams cad la// rgyal pos phyogs kyang gci ga bya zhing // phyogs
308a4(rgyud 'bum): su lhung bar gyur ta re/ / rgyal po chos dang ldan pa yi// grags pa 'jig rten gang ba ste// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas rnams na// lha yi dbang po dgar gyur te// 'dzam bu'i gling na
308a5(rgyud 'bum): nged kyi bu/ / 'di ltar chos ldan rgyal po yin// chos kyi yul 'khor der bstan nas// legs par 'byung la skye bo bkod// rgyal po de ni legs byed pas// skye bo dag ni 'dir 'gyir
308a6(rgyud 'bum): de/ lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis// lha gnas gang bar byed snyam mo// chos kyi yul 'khor der bstan pas// rgyal po rnams ni rab tu dga'// lha dbang rab tu dang 'gyur bas//
308a7(rgyud 'bum): mi yi rgyal po de la srung // nyi zla dang ni de bzhin du// rgyu skar legs par rgyu bar 'gyur// rlung yang dus su ldang 'gyur zhing // char yang dus su 'bab par 'gyur// lba ba nas
308b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang de bzhin du/ / yul 'khor rnams su lo legs byed// b+ha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis// b+ha mi gnas rnams gang bar byed// de lta bas na rgyal po yis// bdag gis
308b2(rgyud 'bum): 'phangs pa'i srog gtang gis/ / gang gis 'jig rten bde 'byur ba// dkon mchog chos ni mi gtang ste// yon tan rnams kyis gang brgyan pa// chos dang ldan pa bsten par
308b3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / rang gi skye bos rtag dga' ba// rtag par sdig pa rnam par spongs// chos kyis yul 'khor bskyang bar bya// chos kyang yang dag bstan par bya// legs par byed la
308b4(rgyud 'bum): sems can dgod/ / nyes byed las ni bzlog par bya// gang tshe sdig pa byed pa rnams// tshul bzhin gdul bar byed pa'i tshe// yul 'khor du ni lo legs shing // rgyal
308b5(rgyud 'bum): po gzi brjid ldan par 'gyur/ / rgyal po grags dang ldan 'gyur zhing // skye dgu rnams kyang bde bar skyong // gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// rgyal po'i
308b6(rgyud 'bum): bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dmachog ces bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o/ / // de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//
308b7(rgyud 'bum): gang tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur// de tshe rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa rnams dang // gling bzhi rin chen gang bar bcas pa yang // sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la ngas phul lo//
309a1(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi sku de yongs su btsal ba'i phyir// gang sngon yid du 'ong zhing 'phangs pa yi// dngos po de dag ngas ni ma btang med// bskal pa du mar 'phangs//
309a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i srog kyang btang // ji ltar sngon gyi bskal pa bsam yas na// rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bde bar gshegs// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde bar gshegs pa de'i// bstan la legs
309a3(rgyud 'bum): byung zhes bya'i rgyal po byung / / de ni gleng bzhi'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur// rgya mtshor thug pa'i sa la rab tu ston// rgyal dbang gsung phyir rgyal po'i pho brang na// de tshe rgyal po dam pa
309a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyid kyis log/ rmi lam du ni sangs rgyas yon tan thos// chos smra rin chen sogs pa gnyid dkyil na// rnam par lhang de mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di// rab tu chad cing 'dug pa
309a5(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar gyur/ / rgyal po de ni gnyid kyis log las sad// de yi lus kun dga' bas khyab par gyur// mgu nas rgyal po'i khab nas sngon byung ste// nyan thos dge
309a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dun mchog gi gnas su song / / rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams la mchod byed cing // 'phags pa'i dge 'dun 'di ni rin chen sogs// yon tan ldan pa'i dge slong gang yod
309a7(rgyud 'bum): ces/ / chos spu rin chen sogs pa kun tu dris// de yi tshe na rin chen sogs pa ni// phug gzhan zhig gi nang na 'dug gyur te// mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni rnam sems la/
309b1(rgyud 'bum): kha ton byed cing bde bar rab tu 'dug/ dge slong chos smra rin chen sogs pa de// phun sum gzi brjid dpal gyis rab 'bar zhing // phug gzham nig pi nang na 'jug gyur pa/
309b2(rgyud 'bum): de yi tshe na rgyal po de la bstan// 'di ni chos smra rin chen sogs pa 'dir// rgyal po'i spyod yul zab mo 'dzin pa ste// gser 'od dam pa zhes ni bya ba yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
309b3(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu ston/ / rin chen sogs pa'i rkang la phyag 'tshal te// rgyal po legs par byung bas 'di skad smras// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal// dra ba nya ba'i zhal 'dra
309b4(rgyud 'bum): bshad du gsol/ / rgyal po legs par byung ba de nyid la// rin chen sogs pas khas ni blangs pas na// stong gsum pa yi 'jig rten thams cad du// lha rnams thams cad rab tu
309b5(rgyud 'bum): dga' bar gyur/ / de tshe mi yi dbang pos sa phyogs ni// gtsang zhing mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa der// rin chen chu dang spos chus chug chag btab// me tog sil ma bkram sde wa~M
309b6(rgyud 'bum): bshams nas/ / rgyal pos khri de gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang // dar yug stong phrag du mas legs par brgyan// rgyal pos khri der tsan dan dam pa dag/ rnam pa sna tshogs rnams
309b7(rgyud 'bum): kyang mngon par gtor/ / lha dang klu dang lha min mi 'am ci// gnod sbyin dbang dang gnod sbyin lha 'phye ches// lha yi me tog man da ra ba'i char// khri de la ni mngon par rab tu phab/
310a1(rgyud 'bum): chos 'dod rgyun bye khrag khrig stong // bsamagyis mi chu ba gang dag phyugs b+har ba// rin rten sogs pa mngon par byung ban// sal me tog dag gis mngon/
310a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'tshod// chos smra rin chen sogs pa de nyid kyang // shin tu lus bkrus gtsang ba'i gos bgos te// khri der nye bar song bar byas nas ni// thal mo sbyar ba byas te byug kyang
310a3(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal/ / rna dbang dang ni rtswa dang mo rnams// bar snang 'dus nas me tog man du ra'i// ra pa 'bebs shings la stan brgya stong zag/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag rab tu sdigs
310a4(rgyud 'bum): rin chen sogs pa dge slong chos spungs/ / phyogs bcu dag gis sangs rgyas byed stong // bsam b+his mi khyab pa gdun byas nas// de ni mngon par 'dzegs te 'dug par gyur/
310a5(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun la snying brtse bskyed nas ni// snying rje'i sems kyang yang dag bskyed byas te// rgyal po legs par byang ba de la ni// de yi chen mdo sde 'di bstan te// rgyal po thal mo sbyar
310a6(rgyud 'bum): byas 'dug nas su/ / tshig gcig gis ni rjes su yi rang ste// chos kyi shugs kyis mi gnas mchi ma byung // de yi lus la dga' bas khyab par gyur// mdo sde 'di la mchod pa
310a7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i phyir/ / de tshe rgyal po legs par byung ba yis// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rgyal po blangs// sems can rnams phyir smon lam btab pa ni// rin chen bdun dang ldan pa'i rgyan
310b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / gang yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rnams// bde bar 'gyur ba'i nor bu rin po che'i// char pa de ring 'dzam bu'i gling du phog/ de yi chen rin chen sna bdun dang /
310b2(rgyud 'bum): dpung rgyan dang ni do shal rna cha mchog/ de bzhin zas dang skom dang gos rnams kyang // gling bzhi dag tu rab tu 'bab par gyur// rgyal po legs par byung bas 'jam gling du/ rin
310b3(rgyud 'bum): chen char pa 'bab pa de mthong nas/ / gling bzhi rin chen gang bar bcas pa ni// rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bstan la phul// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nga // rgyal po legs
310b4(rgyud 'bum): par byung zhes bya bar gyur/ / gling bzhi dag na rin chen gang bcas kyi// sa 'di de tshe nga yis yongs su btang // gang gis rgyal po legs par byung de la// de tshe mdo sde 'di ni rab bstan pa//
310b5(rgyud 'bum): rin chen sogs pa chos smra dge slong de// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs der gyur to// ngas gang de tshe mdo sde 'di thos shing // tshig gcig gis ni rjes su yi rang ste// ngas ni dge
310b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i las ni de nyid dang / / chos mnyan pa dang rjes su yi rang bas// gser gyi mdog dang bsod nams brgya yi mtshan// blta na sdug cing mig tu mngon mdzes la// lha stong bye ba rab tu
310b7(rgyud 'bum): dga' byed pa/ / skye bos mthong na dga' lus rtag tu thob// bskal pa dag ni bye ba brgya stong phrag/ dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'khor los sgyur rgyal gyur// bskal pa brgya stong du ma mang por
311a1(rgyud 'bum): yang / / ngas ni khams kyi rgyal po myong bar gyur// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab brgya byin gyur// tshangs pa'i dbang po mi zhir de bzhin no// gang dag tshang na
311a2(rgyud 'bum): nam yang yod min pa'i/ / stobs bcu dpag med ngas ni mnyes par byas// ngas gang mdo zas rjes su yi rang ba// bsod nams phung po de ltar tshad med mang // bsam pa ji bzhin
311a3(rgyud 'bum): ngas ni byang chub thob/ / chos sku dam pa yang ni ngas thob bo// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ legs par byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// /
311a4(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan lha mo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
311a5(rgyud 'bum): la yo byad thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po shin tu rgyas shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa byed par 'dod cing / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
311a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul zab mo yongs su shes par 'dod pa des/ gtsug lag khang ngam dgon pa'i phyogs kyang rung ste/ gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
311a7(rgyud 'bum): bo'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag por rab tu ston pa'i sa phyogs der/ des gdon mi za bar g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis rna ba blags te/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
311b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid 'khor la rgya cher brjod pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang zhig sangs
311b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thams cad la/ / bsam yas mchod pa byed 'dod cing // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ba// zab mo rab tu shes 'dod pa// gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang ngam//
311b3(rgyud 'bum): gang na gser 'od dam pa yi// mdo sde dam pa 'di ston pa// sa phyogs der ni 'gro bar bya// mdo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste// yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pas//
311b4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub bsngal mchod smrams// sems na thams dpang bar byed/ na snga man thog sa dang // dargyas dang de bzhin mtha' ma mthong // rdo rje dbang por rang '
311b5(rgyud 'bum): di la dpe ni yod ma yin/ / gang+gA dang ni sa rnams dang // rgya mtsho dang ni nam mkha' la// gnas pa'i rdul ni gang yang rung // dper bya bar nA mi nus so// chos kyi
311b6(rgyud 'bum): dbyings la 'jug pa yis/ / de yi tshe na 'jug par bya// chos kyi bdag nyid mchod rten ni// zab mor rab brtan gang yin pa// mchod rten de yi dbus na ni// rgyal ba shAkya
311b7(rgyud 'bum): thub pa mthong / / yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis su// mdo sde 'di ni rab tu ston// grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bskal pa bye ba ji snyed par// lha dag dang ni mi rnams
312a1(rgyud 'bum): / yade dgu na rjes sachod // gang nag ma rje 'di lda pa// de ltar bdag gi bsod nams kyi// zang po bas mams sgra ba snyam du// datshangs na
312a2(rgyud 'bum): ltar shes/ / mes gang 'obs kyis bskor ba yis// dpag tshad brgya dag 'da' byed cing // tshor ba drag po bzod byas nas// mdo sde nyan par gang nus pa// gtsug lag khang
312a3(rgyud 'bum): ngam gnas khang du/ / zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni// sdig pa rnams ni med par 'gyur// mi ngam mtshan nyid thams cad dang // gza' dang rgyu skar gnod pa dang // byang dang
312a4(rgyud 'bum): gdon ni mi bzad kyang / / zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni// thams cad gzhan du phyogs par 'gyur// klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis ni// rmi lam bstan pa ci 'dra bar// der ni
312a5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma 'dra ba'i khri/ / de lta bu yang bsham par bya// khri de la ni 'dug nas su// mdo sde 'di ni rab tu bstan// yi ger bris pa bklag par bya// de bzhin yongs su chub par bya//
312a6(rgyud 'bum): khri de las ni babs nas su// gzhan du song bar gyur na yang // khri de la ni yod pa yi// cho 'phrul rnams kyang snang bar 'gyur// chos smra ba yi gzugs su yang // de na res 'gab
312a7(rgyud 'bum): snang bar 'gyur/ / res 'ga' sangs rgyas gzugs su ste// res 'ga' byang chub sems dpa' yang // res 'ga' kun tu bzang po dang // de bzhin 'jam dpal gzugs su ste//
312b1(rgyud 'bum): res 'ga' byams pa'i gzugs su yang // khri de la ni snang bar 'gyur// res 'ga' 'od ni 'ba' zhig snang // res 'ga' lha rnams snang bar 'gyur// yud tsam zhig ni der snang nas//
312b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas mi snang bar yang 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong na bsngags par 'gyur// thams cad du yang grub par byed// dpal yon bkra shis phun sum tshogs// mtshan ma sangs rgyas sprul pa
312b3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ rgyal dang dpal dang grags par byed// phyir rgol ba yang zlog par byed// pha rol dgra tshegs rab tu 'joms// g.yul du dgra rnams phung bar byed// rmi ngan thams cad zhi
312b4(rgyud 'bum): bar byed/ / sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig/ sdig pa thams cad rab ni byed// g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar byed// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir thams cad ru// grags pas rab tu gang bar
312b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / de yi dgra rnams thams cad ni// shin tu pham pa nyid du 'gyur// rtag tu dgra ni choms par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs// g.yul de'i gdong las rnam par
312b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal/ / dgra dang bral zhing mchog tu dga'// tshangs dbang sum cu rtsa gsum dbang // de bzhin 'jig rten skyong rnams dang // lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // rgyal ba khyu mchog yang
312b7(rgyud 'bum): dag shes/ / klu yi rgyal po ma dros dang // de bzhin du ni rgya mtsho dang // mi 'am cing bang bla min dbang // de bzhin nam mkha' lding dbang po// de dag la ni sogs pa dang // rgya
313a1(rgyud 'bum): @rnams de dag thams cad kyang / / chos kyi mchod rten bsam las la// rtag tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur// zhe sar bcas pa'i sems can rnams// mthong nas shin/
313a2(rgyud 'bum): dga' bar 'gyur// lha yi dbang po mchog de dag/ thams cad 'di snyam sems par 'gyur// lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang // phan tshun du ni spu byed pa// bsod nams dpal dang gzi
313a3(rgyud 'bum): brjid dag/ bsags pa de dag kun la ltos// gang dag mdo sde zab mo 'di// nyan pa'i don du 'dir lhags pa// mi de dag ni rab sbyangs pa'i// dge ba'i rtsa bas 'dir lhags so// rang

313a7(rgyud 'bum): thos bu dang ni/ / de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams dang // gnod sbyin brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis// phyogs bani dag ni kun nas kyang // srung ba shin tu byed
313b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / dbang po zla ba gshin rje dang // rlung dang chu lha nyid dang ni// skem byed 'jug sel dbyangs can dang // bsreg bya ba dang skye dgu dang // stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa/
313b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten skyong ba de kun kyang // nyin mtshan g.yel ba med par ni// de dag rnams la srung bar byed// stobs chen gnod sbyin dbang gnyis dang // sred med bu dang dbang phyug che//
313b3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag shes la sogs pa dag/ gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // gnod sbyin brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis// 'jigs shing skrag pa thams

314a1(rgyud 'bum): po dang / / yur ba can dang chos skyong dang // spre'u dang ni de bzhin khri byed dang // khad kyi spu dang gnyen bshes dang // de bzhin rin chen skra dang ni// mur che mtshan

315a1(rgyud 'bum): sa mi steng dag snum par byed// mdo 'di mnyan pa'i stobs kyis ni// lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang // gser gyi 'od ni dam pa mi// mdo sde'i dbang

317b1(rgyud 'bum): pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis pa du ma dag la mchod pa sna tshogs tha dad pa 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa du ma dag dang / yo byad thams cad kyis mchod par bgyis/ yongs su

317b3(rgyud 'bum): su gtang bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yongs su gtong / nor dang / 'bru dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / rung dang / man shel dang / byu ru
317b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram rnams yongs su gtang bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yongs su gtong / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / stan dang
317b5(rgyud 'bum): khang khyim dang / gzhal med khang dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal dang / rdzing bu dang / lteng ka dang / glang po che dang / ba glang dang / rta pho rgod dang / bran pho dang / bran mo yongs su gtang
317b6(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yongs su gtong zhing / rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid/ rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag rdzogs par bgyis nas/

323b1(rgyud 'bum): chu 'bab pa'i klung de'ang de'i tshe sdig pa can gyi sems can zhig gis/ nya khri po de dag gi phyir ci nas kyang nya de dag la chu 'bab par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyogs kyi grog po chen por klung de phab bo//

330a2(rgyud 'bum): tshal de'i yon tan la chags shing / me tog 'dod pas phan tshun rgyu ste/ nags khrod chen po bcu gnyis su zhugs so// de nas rgyal po'i bu dag dong ba dang / gzhon nu'i rim gro pa
330a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang rgyal bus bskrad nas phan tshun du dong ste/ kun tu bsrungs pa'i skyed mos tshal chen po'i nags khrod bcu gnyis su zhugs so// de nas sgra chen pos nu bo gnyis la smras
330a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ kho bo'i snying la 'jigs pas non na 'dir bdag cag gcan gzan gyis gsad du 'ong gis tshur shog/ lha chen pos smras pa/ bdag la 'jigs pa ni ma mchis na/
330a5(rgyud 'bum): skye bo sdug pa dang bral ba snyam du bgyid pa'i snying du gyur to// snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ thub pas bsngags pa'i nags khrod dben pa 'dir// bdag ni mi 'jigs mya ngan
330a6(rgyud 'bum): ma mchis kyi/ / shin tu rgyas mchog don chen rnyed snyam ste// bdag gi snying 'di rab tu dga' bar gyur// de nas rgyal bu gnon nu de dag nags khrod bcu gnyis po de dag gi khrong du
330a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ba na/ stag mo bu byung nas zhag drug gam/ zhag bdun zhig lon par gyur la/ bu lngas bskor te bkres shing skom pas nyams smad nas/ lus mchog tu nyam chung bar gyur
330b1(rgyud 'bum): de 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang sgra chen pos smras pa/ kye ma'o nyon mongs ma 'di bu byung nas zhag drug gam/ zhag bdun zhig lon par gyur la/ da ltar zas ma rnyed pas/ yang nin
330b2(rgyud 'bum): rang gi bu la za bar 'gyur/ yang na ni bkres pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ nyon mongs ma 'di'i bas ci/ sgra chen pos smras pa/ 'dir gang sha
330b3(rgyud 'bum): gsar pa dang khrag dron mo yod na/ de ni stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / seng ge rnams kyi zas yin no zhes zer ro// lha chen pos smras pa/ 'dir nyon mongs ma 'di bkres pa
330b4(rgyud 'bum): dang skom pa dang ldan pa'i lus su gyur pas srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig lus te/ rab tu nyam chung bas 'dis gnas 'dir zas skom tshol ni mi nus na/ 'di'i srog yongs su srung ba'i phyir
330b5(rgyud 'bum): su zhig rang gi lus yongs su gtong bar byed par 'gyur zhig gu/ sgra chen pos smras pa/ kye rang gi lus yongs su gtang ba ni bya dka' ba'o// snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ bdag cag
330b6(rgyud 'bum): lta bu srog dang lus la mngon par chags pa blo chung ba rnams la ni tshul 'di bye dka' ba lags kyi/ gzhan lus yongs su gtong ba la zhugs pa/ gzhan la phan par brtson pa'i skyes bu dam
330b7(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams la ni bya dka' ba ma lags so/ / yang / snying rje snying brtse las byung 'phags pa'i sems can dag/ lha yul dang ni sa 'dir rang lus rnyed snyam ste// gzhan gyi srog phyir mthun pa'i
331a1(rgyud 'bum): @/ dga' ba'i yid kyis ni// 'gyur ba med par 'dir ni rnam par brgya yis brtse// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de shin tu mi dga' ste// skyug mo de la mig mi 'dzums par ring zhig
331a2(rgyud 'bum): tu bstas nas song ngo / / de nas snying stobs chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni bdag gi lus 'di yongs su gtang ba'i dus la bab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig cing 'gyes pa'i
331a3(rgyud 'bum): chos can mthar 'bye mthar ngan pa/ / rnag can lus 'di zas dang skom dang mal cha dang // gzhon pa 'os pa chen po dag gis ring bsrungs kyang // sngar med rang gi rang bzhin mi 'dor byas
331a4(rgyud 'bum): don med/ / yang na tha mas cad du mi gtsang bar gyur pas na/ de'i 'tsho ba med kyis/ da bdag gis de las bzang po'i las sbyar bar bya'o// de'i phyir bdag skye ba dang 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho las
331a5(rgyud 'bum): rgal ba'i gru bo che lta bur 'gyur ro/ / yang snying po med lus dbu ba 'dra la srin bu brgyas gang byas pa chud gson pa// 'bras dang 'dra ba'i srid pa brgya ldan gcin dang phyi sa sa gang ba 'di gtang ste//
331a6(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan med cing 'gyur med bud med dri med bsam gtan la sogs yon tan gyis// kun tu gang ba'i tshes sku yon tan brgyas gang rdul dang bral ba thob par bya// de snying rje chen po mchog dang ldan
331a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i snying du gyur pas/ de ltar brtul nas khyed gnyis gshegs su gsol/ bdag ni rang gi bgyi ba zhig gi slad du chags khrod chen po bcu gnyis su 'jug go zhes de gnyis bslang ngo //
331b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying stobs chen po nags 'dab de nas slar log ste/ stag gi gnas su song nas nags kyi yal ga la gos gzar te/ bdag ni 'gro la phan phyir byang chub mtshungs med
331b2(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba thob 'dod de/ / gzhan gyis gtang bar dka' ba'i lus ni blo gros 'gyur ba med pa'i snying rjes sbyin// bdag gis skyon med byang chub ring med rgyal sras rnams kyis gnyer ba thob par shog/
331b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'jigs las 'jig rten gsum po bsgral bar bya// zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas snying stobs chen pos stag mo'i mdun du nyal ba dang / de nas byams
331b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la stag mos ci'ang ma byas so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kye ma'o// 'di ni nyam chung bas mi nus so snyam nas langs te/ spring brtse ba'i blo
331b5(rgyud 'bum): gros kyis mtshon cha btsal na gang nas kyang mtshon cha ma rnyed nas/ de nas 'od ma'i yal ga lo brgya lon pa sra ba zhig blangs te/ bdag gis mgul pa bcad nas stag mo'i mdun du 'gyel
331b6(rgyud 'bum): to/ / byang chub sems dpa' 'gyel ma thag tu/ chu'i dbus su son pa'i gru rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin du sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// nyi ma'ang sgra gcan gyis zin pa bzhin du
331b7(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes pa med do/ / lha'i spos dang phye ma dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char yang bab bo// de nas lha zhig gis ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i yid kyis byang chub sems dpa' la
332a1(rgyud 'bum): bstod pa/ blo gros bzang po khyod 'dir ji ltar thugs rjes sems can rnams khyab ste// mi yi dbang po rab tu dgyes pas ji ltar sku 'di btang bas na// skye ba dang mi chi
332a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i don dang bral ba zhi pa'i gnas kyi mchog/ zhi ba gtsang ma khyod kyis 'dir ni tshegs med ring por mi thogs brnyes// de nas stag mo des byang chub sems dpa'i lus khrag gis sbags pa la
332a3(rgyud 'bum): bltas nas/ yud tsam gyis sha dang khrag med par rus pa tsam zhig lus par byas so// de nas sgra chen pos sa g.yos bde ba bsams nas/ lha chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// ji
332a4(rgyud 'bum): ltar phyogs bcur rgya mtsho'i mthar thug rgya mtshor bcas pa yi/ / sa 'di rab tu g.yos shing nyi ma'ang 'od ni med gyur la// me tog char pa 'bab cing kho bo'i yid kyang 'khrugs pas na// nga gzod
332a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi nu bos rang gi lus ni btang yang dag/ lha chen pos smras pa/ de ni ji ltar snying rje'i tshig smras pa// bkres dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal brgyas gtses pa// shin tu nyam chung rang gi bu la yang /

332a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ni 'od ma'i yal ga dag la gzar/ rus pa rnams ni bye zhing bral/ khrag ni rdzab tu gyur/ sgra ni phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'thor ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang brgyal te rus
332b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i steng du 'gyel nas ring zhig lon pa dang / 'du shes rnyed de langs nas lag pa sgreng ste/ nyam thag pa'i sgra phyung ngo // kye ma'o nu bo sdug pa dang ni rgyal po dang // de bzhin du ni du la rab tu
332b2(rgyud 'bum): gdung ba'i ma/ / pad+ma 'dra ba'i mig ring khyed kyis gar gzhag ces// ma ni bdag cag la yang tha chungs 'dri bar 'gyur// kye ma bdag cag gnyis ni sa phyogs 'di nyid du// shi na legs kyis
332b3(rgyud 'bum): gson pa re lha ma yin no/ / snying stobs chen po med par gyur pas bdag cag la// pha ma dag gis ji ltar lto ba ster bar 'gyur// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis snying rje rje'i skad du rnam pa mang por
332b4(rgyud 'bum): dus nas dong ngo do/ / de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu'i rim gro pa rnams kyang gzhon nu 'tshol zhing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rgyug pa dang / gcig gis gcig mthong nas gzhon nu ga re/ gzhon nu/

332b6(rgyud 'bum): rnyed pa las gcig khras khyer bar rmis so/ / de nas btsun mo sa g.yos pas snying spangs te/ mod la sad nas sems pa la zhugs te/ 'byung po'i rngan ma rgya mtsho'i gos can 'di ni kun tu rab

333a1(rgyud 'bum): rtser dong ba la dge bar 'gyur ram N+ye/ / de nas de snyam du bsam pa dang / bran mo'ang snying myos te 'ongs nas/ btsun mo la smras pa/ jo mo gzhon nu'i rim gro pa
333a2(rgyud 'bum): ngag gzhon nu 'tshol zhing mchis na/ jo bo stor ces gda' 'o// de skad ces thos ma thag tu btsun mo'i snying 'dar zhing mig dang gdong mchi mas gang ste/ rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa/ lha
333a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi bu sdug pa stor ces thos so/ / rgyal po'ang snying 'dar zhing shin tu myos te/ kyi hud bdag gi bu sdug pa dang bral ba lta zhes smras so// de nas rgyal pos btsun mo dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir/
333a4(rgyud 'bum): nga gzhon nu btsal ba la nan tan du byed kyis/ bzang mo mya ngan ma byed cig/ der gzhon nu 'tshol ba la zhugs pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs dag rod rod por gyur to// de nas ring po ma lon par
333a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal pos rgyal bu gzhon nu gnyis rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang smras pa/ gzhon nu de dag ni 'ong na thams cad ni ma yin te/ kyi hud bu dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal
333a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / ji ltar bu dang bral bar gyur na yid ni mi bde ba// mi rnams bu rnyed pa ni de ltar dga' ba ma yin no// 'jig rten na ni gang dag bu med pa dang shi ba 'am// mi rnams gang dag bu
333a7(rgyud 'bum): gson de dag bde ba yin nam ci/ / de nas btsun mo shin tu mya ngan gyis non nas/ rnga mo gnad du bsnun pa bzhin du shin tu mi zad pa'i sgra byung ngo // de ltar bu gsum dag ni g.yog gi tshogs
333b1(rgyud 'bum): bcas te/ / me tog rnams kyis gang ba'i nags khrod zhugs pa las// bdag gi bu dge tha chung 'ongs par ma gyur na// bdag gi snying dang 'dra ba'i tha chung de ga re// de nas de gnyis
333b2(rgyud 'bum): lhag pa dang / rgyal pos bu la dris pa/ khye'u tha chung ga re zhes gzhon nu gnyis la dris pa dang / de nas mya ngan gyis nyam thag cing mig mchi mas gang ste/ rkan dang / mchu dang / kha dang /

333b5(rgyud 'bum): rje'i skad du ngu zhing phyogs der dong ngo / / de nas rgyal po dang btsun mos rus pa de dag sha dang / khrag dang / rgyus pa med cing / skra phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'thor ba mthong nas/

334b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhag go/ / kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu snying spobs chen po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe

335b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di la/ / 'gyel nas yid ni nyams par gyur// lus rnams la ni rdul gyis gos// dran dbang nyams shing sems kyang myos// de dag gi ni 'khor rnams kyang // snying rjer

335b3(rgyud 'bum): dag ni lnga brgya dang / / pho brang nang na der 'dug pa// nu sor gnyis ka'i rtse mo nas// 'o ma khrug tu 'byung zhing 'dzag/ de yi lus dang yan lag kun// khab kyis gtsags

336a3(rgyud 'bum): sa der 'gyel bar gyur/ / dran pa'i dbang po rnam par nyams// sems kyang stor cing dran pa med// btsun mo'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyang // snying rje'i skad kyis rab tu ngu// btsun mo

336a6(rgyud 'bum): stobs chen po de gar song / / bdag cag de ring mthong zhig gam// yid 'ong sems can mthong re dga'// de ring mi snyan thos gyur cing // yun ring mya ngan mi bzang rlung // sgra mi byin
336a7(rgyud 'bum): cing rgyu mtha' yas/ / drag po'i sgra bcas ldang zhig gam// rgyal po shing rta che langs te// mya ngan non cing ngu bzhin du// btsun mo dam pa sar 'gyel la// bdag nyid chu yi rgyun yang
336b1(rgyud 'bum): 'thor/ / ji srid dran rnyed ldan gyur pa// de srid du ni chu lis gtor// bdag bu gum mam gson zhig ces// zhum pa'i yid kyis 'dri bar byed// rgyal po shing rta chen po yis//
336b2(rgyud 'bum): btsun mo'i mchog la 'di skad smras// blon po rnams dang 'khor rnams kyang // gzhon nu rnams ni 'tshol phyir dong // khyod ni rab tu yid zhum zhing // rtag tu mya ngan snying ma byed// de
336b3(rgyud 'bum): ltar shing rta chen po yis/ / btsun mo dam pa spro bsrings te// rgyal po pho brang nas byung nas// mya ngan non cing ngu zhing ngu// blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor te// yid ni rab
336b4(rgyud 'bum): zhu ma lus kyang zhan/ / srog chags brgya phrag mang po yang // ngu zhing mchi ma zag bzhin rgyug/ rgyal bu rnams ni btsal ba'i phyir// grong khyer gyi ni mchog nas byung // rgyal po
336b5(rgyud 'bum): byung ba mthong nas ni/ / rgyal po'i phyi bzhin kun tu 'brang // rgyal po shing rta chen po ni// grong khyer nas byung de ma thag/ sdug pa'i ru ni lta ba'i phyir// rgod pa'i mig gis phyogs
336b6(rgyud 'bum): su bltas/ / mgo bregs yan lag khrag sbags shing // lus la rdul gyis gos gyur la// gdong la mchi zag ngu bzhin du// 'ong ba'i mi zhig mthong nas ni// shing rta
336b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i snying la yang / / rab tu mi bzad mya ngan gnas// ngu zhing gdong la mchi ma zag/ lag pa bsgrengs te ngu zhing 'dug/ de nas blon po gzhan zhig ni// rgyang ring myur du rings
337a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'ongs/ / 'ongs nas mi dbang rgyal po ni// shing rnga che la 'di skad smras// mi dbang thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ khyod sras yid du 'ong bar mchis/
337a2(rgyud 'bum): ring po mi thogs khyod kyi gan 'dir ni// sras mchog yid 'ong mchi ba khyod kyis gzigs// rgyal po yud tsam lam du zhugs pa dang // de nas blon po chen po gnyis pa 'ongs//
337a3(rgyud 'bum): rdul chags dri ma can gyi gos gyon cing // mchi ma'i gdong gis rgyal la 'di skad smras// rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras gnyis ni// mya ngan me yis rab tu gdungs shing gnas//
337a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog gcig mi gda'// snying stobs chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zi ni// stag mo du byung ring por ma lon pa// rang gi bu rnams za bar 'dod pa mthong // de dag
337a5(rgyud 'bum): la ni gzhon nu sems can ches/ / snying rje chen po ldan pas sems bskyed nas// byang chub tu ni smon lam che btab pa// sems can thams cad bdag gis dgrol bar bya// byang
337a6(rgyud 'bum): chub zab mo rgya chen 'dod pa la/ / ma 'ongs pa na bdag gis reg par bya// sems can chen po ri ngos gzar nas mchongs// stag mo bkres pas non pa de langs te// yung
337a7(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis ni lus la sha med byas/ / rgyal po'i bu ni rus pa nyi tshe lus// ma rungs pa yis tshig ni de thos nas// rgyal po shing rnga chen po brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel nas sems
337b1(rgyud 'bum): kyang stor bar gyur/ / mya ngan me ni shin tu mi bzad 'bar// 'khor dang blon po snying rje'i skad kyis ni// dra zhing mya ngan non bzhin de dag kyang // chus 'thor lag pa bsgrengs te rab
337b2(rgyud 'bum): tu ngu/ blon po gsum pas rgyal la smras pa ni// bdag gis de ring gzhon nu gnyis po dag/ nags chen de na rab tu brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel te sems kyang stor mthong
337b3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / dran pa rnyed de langs kyi bar du ni// bdag cag rnams kyis chab kyis rab tu gtor// phyogs bzhi dag nas kun nas 'bar ba mthong // yud tsam 'grengs nas slar
337b4(rgyud 'bum): yabs la 'gyel/ / snying rje'i skad kyis smre sngags rab tu 'don// rtag par lag pa bsgrengs te gnas nas ni// nu bo de yi bsngags pa rab tu brjod// rgyal po de na rab tu
337b5(rgyud 'bum): sems zhum zhing / / bu dang bral bas non nas sems kyang 'khrugs// mya ngan rab tu 'don zhing smre sngags 'don// rgyal po de ni 'di snyam yongs su sems// bdag
337b6(rgyud 'bum): bu sdug cing yid 'ong gcig pu ni/ / sems can chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin// bdag gi bu ni gnyis po de dag kyang // mya ngan me yis srog ni zad 'ong gi/ 'di ltar bdag nyid
337b7(rgyud 'bum): myur du der song la/ / mthong na dga' ba'i bu dag blta bar bya// bzhon pa mgyogs pas rgyal po'i pho brang gi/ rgyal po'i khab tu myur du bkri bar bya// de dag rnams ni skyed pa'i ma
338a1(rgyud 'bum): yi snying / / mya ngan me yi sags par 'gyur du 'ongs// bu gnyis mthong nas zhi ba thob gyur te// srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// rgyal po blon po'i tshogs
338a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis yongs bskor nas/ / glang chen zhon te bu rnams lta phyir song // bu gnyis snying rje'i skad kyis rab ngu zhing // nu bo'i ming 'bod lam nas 'ong ba mthong // rgyal pos bu de gnyis ni khrid
338a3(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / rab tu ngu zhing khyim du song nas ni// de yis sbyin par la gor myur du yang // btsun mo la ni rang gi bu rnams bstan// shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa nga // sngon gyi rgyal po shing
338a4(rgyud 'bum): rta chen po yi/ / bu de snying stobs chen po mchog gyur cing // gang gis stag mo bde bar byas pa yin// rgyal po'i dbang po dam pa zas gtsang ni// shing rta che zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur// btsun
338a5(rgyud 'bum): mo'ang btsun mo dam pa sgyu 'phrul gyur/ / sgra chen po ni byams par gyur pa yin// rgyal po lha chen po yang de bzhin du// de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin// stag mor gyur pa skye dgu'i bdag mo
338a6(rgyud 'bum): che/ / stag phrug dag ni dge slong lnga por gyur// de nas rgyal po shing rta chen po dang / btsun mos snying rje bar smre sngags rnam pa mang po bton nas/ rgyan thams cad bkrol te/ skye bo'i tshegs chen po dang ldan
338a7(rgyud 'bum): cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas/ snying stobs chen po de'i rus pa 'di dag phyogs 'di nyid du bzhag ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten 'di byas so// snying stobs chen po 'dis stag mo
338b1(rgyud 'bum): la lus yongs su btang nas/ lus yongs su btang ba 'dis phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bgrangs pa las shin tu 'das pa rnams su'ang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya'o zhes smon//
338b2(rgyud 'bum): lam de skad btab bo// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag blan med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// mchod rten 'di 'dir ston pa'i
338b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ni 'di yin no/ / rkyen ni 'di yin no// mchod rten de'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sa de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stag mo la lus yongs su bta
338b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o/ / // de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs
338b5(rgyud 'bum): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs
338b6(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu 'khod nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di
338b7(rgyud 'bum): ngag gis mngon par bstod do/ / rgyal ba'i sku mdog btso ma'i gser 'dra ste// sku lu so gser gyi mdog tu rnam par gda'// gser gyi ri dbang lta bur gser gyi mdog/ thub pa pad+ma dkar po'i
339a1(rgyud 'bum): @gser mdog can/ / bzang po'i mtshan gyi mtshan gyis sku lus brgyan// dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs sku lus spras// gser gyi 'od ltar mdzes pa rnam par 'bar//
339a2(rgyud 'bum): shin tu dri med zhi ba ri dbang 'dra// tshangs pa'i sku dang sgra snyan tshangs pa'i dbyangs// seng ge'i sgra dang 'brug sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs// yan lag drug cu'i bsgrags pa'i dri med sgra// rgyal dbyangs rma
339a3(rgyud 'bum): byA ka la bing ka'i sgra/ / shin tu dri med dri bral gzi 'od mdzes// rgyal ba bsod nams brgya yi mtshan gyis brgyan// mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshe dri med dri bral mchog/ rgyal ba yon tan kun ldan ri rab 'dra//
339a4(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams la phan par thugs brtse'i mchog/ 'jig rten dag na bde ba sbyin pa'i mchog/ rgyal ba dam pa'i don rnams ston pa ste// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la 'dzud pa lags// 'chi ba
339a5(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i bde ba gsol ba ste/ / rgyal ba bdud rtsi'i chos ni rab tu ston// 'chi ba med pa'i grong khyer 'dzud pa ste// bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas bde ba'i gnas// rgyal ba 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thar par mdza
339a6(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni skye dgu sgrol/ / zhi ba'i lam la skye dgu rab tu 'dzud// skye dgu rnams la bde ba kun stsol ba// khyod la dpe ni bgyi bar mi nus te// ji snyed 'dren pa'i ye shes yon tan mtsho// srog
339a7(rgyud 'bum): chags kur la khyod kyi thugs rje dang / / byams pa'i stobs dang thabs dang brtson 'grus dang // khyod kyi yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho las// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por yang // yon tan
339b1(rgyud 'bum): thigs pa gcig tsam rab bstan par/ / lhar bcas 'gro ba'i nang na nus ma mchis// yon tan mtsho las yon tan zhig blangs te// de ltar bdag gis mdor bsdus cung zad bshad// bdag
339b2(rgyud 'bum): gis bsod nams gang bsags de yis ni/ / sems can de dag byang chub mchog reg shog/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis
339b3(rgyud 'bum): bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o/ / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas
339b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lha nga sa la brtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// thub dbang khyod ni
339b5(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams brgya yi mtshan/ / dpal stong mdzes pa'i yon tan rnams kyis dan+dan// kha dog rgya chen mchog tu zhi ba ston// nyi ma stong ltar 'od ni rnam par 'phro// 'od zer du ma 'bar bas
339b6(rgyud 'bum): 'od kyis khyab/ / kha dog sna tshogs gang bas rin chen 'dra// sngon po dkar po gser 'od bai DUR+Ya// zangs dang skya rengs shel gyi 'od lta bus// rdo rje ri dbang ri rab thal mdzad cing // zhing rnams
339b7(rgyud 'bum): bye ba du mar snang mdzad do/ / sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po zhi bar mdzad// bde ba'i mchog gis sems can tshim par mdzad// mdog dang dbang po gsal ba blta na mdzes// gzugs bltas mi ngoms
340a1(rgyud 'bum): skye bos bltan dag/ rma bya'i mdog 'dra'i dbu skra rnam par mdzes// bung ba mang pos gang ba'i 'od dang 'dra// thugs rje rnam dag yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// ting 'dzin byams pa
340a2(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams dam pa bsags/ / dpe byad bzang dang kha dog sna tshogs ldan// ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag yon tan brgyan// khyod ni rab tu tshims mdzad pan pa mdzad// bde mdzad bde ba kun gyi 'byung
340a3(rgyud 'bum): nas 'byung / / yon tan zab mo sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// zhing rnams bye ba dag tu lhang nge ste// me yi 'od ltar 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes// ji ltar nam mkha'i nyi dkyil rdzogs pa bzhin//
340a4(rgyud 'bum): ri rab lta bur yon tan kun ldan par// 'jig rten khams rnams kun tu rab tu gda'// ba no ku mu da dang zla 'dra zhing // kha ba'i mdog dang dkar po bzang 'dra ba'i// tshems kyi 'phreng bas khyod
340a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhal mdzes pa/ / nga pa'i rgyal pos bar snang ji bzhin no// khyod kyi ni zhal mtshan granas zla ba 'dra// g.yas su 'khyil cing khong chung 'dra ba lags// bai DUR+Ya 'dra'i spu 'od dkar rnams
340a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / nam mkha'i dkyil na nyi ma lta bur mdzes// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa
340a7(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa rnam par
340b1(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i chos la spobs pa'i blo mnga' ba/ / las ngan lam dang bral ba'i bdag nyid blo mnga' zhing // srid dang srid min mkhyen pa'i rnam dag blo mnga' ba// sangs rgyas rnam dag blo mnga' ba la phyag
340b2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / kye ma'o kye ma'o sangs rgyas gzi brjid mtha' yas te// kye ma'o kye ma'o rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab 'dra// kye ma'o kye ma'o sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas te// u dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin du
340b3(rgyud 'bum): shin tu dkon/ / sems can dag ni thams cad rjes su gzung slad du// gang gis mdo sde'i dam pa 'di 'dra rab gsungs pa// mi dbang nyi ma shAkya'i dbang po'i rigs kyi tog/ kye ma'o kye ma'o de bzhin
340b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thugs rje ldan/ / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dbang po zhi// zhi ba dam pa zhi ba'i grong khyer rab tu zhugs// ting 'dzin zab tsang zhi la rdul dang bral ba ni// rgyal ba sangs rgyas spyod
340b5(rgyud 'bum): yul der yang rab tu zhugs/ / de ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa ste// rkang gnyis dam pa rnams kyi gnas pa'ang stong pa lags// chos rnams de dag thams cad rang bzhin stong lags na//
340b6(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams ni stong pa'i bdag nyid ma 'tshal to// rtag par khor zug tu ni rgyal ba dran par bgyid// rgyal ba mthong bar yang ni rtag tu mya ngan bgyid// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma mthong bar
340b7(rgyud 'bum): bgyi slad du/ / rtag par yang ni smon lam rab tu 'debs par bgyid// bdag ni rtag tu dog sar pus mo btsugs nas su// rgyal ba'i gzugs kyis skom pas rab tu mya ngan sems// 'dren
341a1(rgyud 'bum): @pa'i slad du snying rje'i skad kyis ngu bar bgyid/ / bdag ni bde bar gshegs pa mthong bar rab tu skom// mya ngan me yis kun tu rab tu 'bar bar gyur// mthong ba'i chu bsil
341a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag la rtag par stsal du gsol/ / bdag nyid khyod kyi gzugs la blta bas rab tu skom// thugs rje'i chab kyis bdag la rab tu tshim par mdzod// 'dren pa khyod ni bdag la thugs rjer mdzad
341a3(rgyud 'bum): du gsol/ / zhi ba'i gzugs mthong ba ni bdag la stsal du gsol// khyod ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba'i skyob pa ste// 'di ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa lags// sems can thams
341a4(rgyud 'bum): cad dag ni rmi lam rang bzhin te/ / nam mkha' 'dra zhing nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyang lags// sgyu ma smig rgyu dang ni chu yi zla ba 'dra// 'dren pa khyod kyi ston pa che dang ldan pa lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das
341a5(rgyud 'bum): gdan las bzhengs te tshangs pa'i sgra skad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo khyod legs so legs so// khyod yang legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// rigs
341a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la sogs pa'i lha'i bu mo de dag thams cad dang / lha mo chen mo dpal la sogs pa lha mo'i tshogs de dag thams cad
341a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa'i lha'i rgyal po de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
341b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ 'jug bsdus kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//
