341b3(rgyud 'bum): lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis btsos nas gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su bar+Na pra b+hA sot+ta ma sutra
341b4(rgyud 'bum): na ma tra rA dza nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po dang po/ 'das
341b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
341b6(rgyud 'bum): gcig nA/ bya rgod phung po chos kyi dbyings// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul na// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas ni// dag cing rdul rnams med pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' mchog rnams la
341b7(rgyud 'bum): mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po ste/ / mnyan na shin tu zab pa dang // yongs su brtags na zab pa nyid// gser 'od dam pa 'di 'chad do// phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// byin gyi rlabs kyis byin
342a1(rgyud 'bum): brlabs pa/ / mi 'khrugs pas ni shar phyogs su// rin chen tog gis lho phyogs su// 'od dpag med kyis nub phyogs su// rnga sgra yis ni byang phyogs su// sdig
342a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir/ / bshad pa dam pa bkra shis pa// sdig pa'i las rnams zad byed pa// bde ba thams cad sbyin byed pa// sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig byed pa// thams cad mkhyen
342a3(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid kyi gzhi/ / dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan// byin gyis brlabs te brjod par bya// sems can gang dag dbang po nyams// tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang // phun sum tshogs min gang
342a4(rgyud 'bum): chags dang / / lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang // mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang // bram ze la sogs gtses pa dang // phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang // nor 'grib pas ni gnod pa dang // mya ngan
342a5(rgyud 'bum): mngal dang gnod pa dang / / 'jigs pa dang ni 'phongs pa dang // gza' dang rgyu skar byed snyems dang // mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang // mya ngan mngal las byung ba yi// rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang //
342a6(rgyud 'bum): des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yis// mdo sde'i dam pa mnyan par bya// gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing // gos gtsang rnams kyis rab brgyan te// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// mdo 'di nyan par
342a7(rgyud 'bum): byed na ni/ / mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis// srog chags kun gyi gnod pa ste// shin tu mi bzang 'di 'dra ba// de dag rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur// 'jig rten skyong ba bdag nyid dang // blon po tshogs kyi
342b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug bcas/ / gnod sbyin bye ba du ma yis// de dag la ni srung bar byed// lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang // nai rany+dza rang gnas pa dang // 'byung po ma mo 'phrog ma dang // sa yi lha mo brtan ma dang /
342b2(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa'i dbang dang lha dbang dang // klu dbang mthu chen rnams dang ni// mi dbang ci dbang lha min dbang // de bzhin nam mkha' lding dbang rnams// sde dang stobs dang bzhon pa dang // bcas te de dang der
342b3(rgyud 'bum): lhags nas/ / nyin dang mtshan mo mi g.yel bar// de dag la ni srung bar byed// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ste// bskal pa bye bar rnyed dka' ba// mdo 'di rab
342b4(rgyud 'bum): tu bshad par bya/ / gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa dang // gang dag gzhan la thos byed dang // gang su rjes su yi rang dang // gang dag mchod pa byed pa rnams// de dag lha dang klu dag dang // mi dang mi 'am
342b5(rgyud 'bum): ci dag dang / / lha min gnod sbyin du ma yis// bskal pa bye bar mchod par 'gyur// srog chags bsod nams byed pa rnams// de dag bsod nams phung po ni// mtha' yas grangs kyang med pa dang //
342b6(rgyud 'bum): bsam gyis mi khyab skye bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin zab mor spyod pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // rab tu gzung bar 'gyur ba yi// gtsang ma'i gos
342b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams rab bgos la/ / dri zhim pa yi gos 'chang zhing // byams pa'i sems ni nyer gzhag nas// g.yel ba med pas mchod par bya// rang gi sems ni dri med cing // rgya che bar yang rab byed la
343a1(rgyud 'bum): sems kyang shin tu dang byed kyis/ / mdo sde dam pa mnyan par gyis// gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa ni// de dag mi nang legs par 'ongs// me yi srid pa legs par 'thob// 'a
343a2(rgyud 'bum): re bas 'tsho bar 'gyur/ / gang gi rna ba'i bu gar yang // bshad pa 'di ni grags 'gyur ba// de dag dge rtsa sbyangs pa ste// sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
343a3(rgyud 'bum): be la po las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba sde dang po'o// // yang de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
343a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la rim gro byas pa zhig gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems
343a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di lta ste/ lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste/ 'di ltar sku che thung snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du rgyu gnyis dang
343a6(rgyud 'bum): rkyen gnyis kyis tshe ring bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang / kha zas rab tu sbyin pa'o zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
343a7(rgyud 'bum): brgya stong grangs med pa mang po nas srog gcod pa spangs par gyur pa nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar yang dag por blangs par gyur/ zas dang phyi nang gi dngos po rnams sems can dag la yongs su btang
343b1(rgyud 'bum): ste tha na rang gi lus kyi sha dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang gis kyang sems can ltogs pa rnams tshim par mdzad na/ zas gzhan gyis lta ci smos snyam mo// de nas skyes bu dam pa de sangs rgyas la
343b2(rgyud 'bum): song ba'i yid la byed pa dag las 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis bsam pa 'di dag sems pa na/ de'i khang pa langs shing rgya che la/ baiDUrba sngon po las grub pa/ lha'i rin po che du mas spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas
343b3(rgyud 'bum): kha dog bsgyur ba/ lha'i las 'das pa'i spos kyis khyab par gyur to// khyim de'i phyogs bzhi nas/ lha'i rin po che'i khri bzhi byung bar gyur te/ khri de dag las kyang lha'i ras bcos bu rin po che'i phrugs
343b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams bting ba dag byung bar gyur to/ / khri de dag las kyang lha'i me tog pad+ma rin po che du mas spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo // pad+ma de dag las kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
343b5(rgyud 'bum): bani byung bar gyur te/ shar phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa byung / lho phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin tshon tog byung / nub phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag
343b6(rgyud 'bum): med byung / byang phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs parnga sgra byung ste/ seng gA'i khri de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byung ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po snang ba
343b7(rgyud 'bum): chen pos khyab par gyur to/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams bad+ma'i klung
344a1(rgyud 'bum): gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag snang bas khyab par gyur/ lha'i me tog dag gi char yang 'bab/ lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra'ang byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
344a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyang lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur/ sems can dmus long dag ni mig
344a3(rgyud 'bum): gis gzugs rnams mthong / sems can 'on pa dag ni rna bas sgra rnams thos/ sems can smon pa dag ni dran pa so sor rnyed/ sems can sems g.yeng ba dag ni sems mi g.yeng bar gyur//
344a4(rgyud 'bum): sems can sgren mo rnams ni gos bgos par gyur/ sems can bkres pa dag ni lto 'grangs par gyur/ sems can skom pa dag ni skom pa dang bral bar gyur/ sems can nad kyis btab pa dag ni nad dang
344a5(rgyud 'bum): bral bar gyur/ lus kyi dbang po nyams pa dag ni dbang po rnams tshang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten du ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams rgya cher byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog
344a6(rgyud 'bum): gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid de ba skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga
344a7(rgyud 'bum): la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag rnams rjes su dran la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yon tan rjes su dran zhing / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku
344b1(rgyud 'bum): tshe'i tshad la the tshom za bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste sku tshe thung ba 'di ji lta bu/ 'di ci zhig snyam du bsam pa de sems shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom//
344b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de dag gis dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar sku tshe thung
344b3(rgyud 'bum): ngo snyam du ma sems shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud
344b4(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
344b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du'ang rtogs par nus pa nged kyis su'ang ma mthong ngo / / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de zhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa
344b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ lha'i bu 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
344b7(rgyud 'bum): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag dang / byang chub sem dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gi khyim der lhags so// de nas
345a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa tshigs su bcad da mdor bka' stsal pa/
345a2(rgyud 'bum): mtsho'i chu rnams thams cad kyi/ thigs pa dag ni bgrang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// ri rab rnams ni thams cad kyang // phra rab rdul dang bgrang bar nus//
345a3(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// sa la gang dag yod pa yi// rab tu phra rdul ji snyed pa// thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tshad mi nus// gal te
345a4(rgyud 'bum): la las nam mkha' la/ / sna 'ga' zhig gis dpag 'dod kyang // shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di srid bzhugs// bskal pa dag ni 'di
345a5(rgyud 'bum): sked cig/ bskal pa bye ba brgya dag ces// grangs ni rnyed par mi rung ngo // gang phyir de yi rgyu dang ni// rkyen yang rnam pa gnyis yin te// sdig pa'i 'tshe ba spangs pa dang // kha zas mang po byin pa ste// da
345a6(rgyud 'bum): phyir bdag nyid chen po de'i/ / sku tshe'i grangs ni mi rnyed de// bskal pa 'di snyed cig ce'am// grangs med pa yang de bzhin te// de bas the tshom med par 'gyur// the tshom cung zad ma za zhig/ rgyal ba'i sku
345a7(rgyud 'bum): tshe'i mtha' ma ni/ / grangs ni gang du'ang ma dmigs so// de nas de'i tshe 'khor der slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+ya zhes bya ba dang / bram ze stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/
345b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i sgra thos nas 'phral la ngus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan//
345b2(rgyud 'bum): 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad la pha ma lta bu/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par gyur pa/ zla ba lta bur snang
345b3(rgyud 'bum): bar mdzad pa/ shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i nyi ma shar ba lta bu lags shing / gal te khyod sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs na/ bdag la dam pa cig stsal du gsol/
345b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor der li tsa byi gzhon nu sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba de spobs pa skyes nas/ slob dpon
345b5(rgyud 'bum): lung ston pa ko'u di n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so/ / ci bram ze chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das la dam pa cig gsol lam/ bdag gis khyod la dam pa cig sbyin no// bram zes smras pa/ li tsa byi
345b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / ring bsrel gyi phye ma dgos pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la brten par 'dod do// ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam de
345b7(rgyud 'bum): mngon par mchod na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po 'ba' zhig 'thob ces grags so// kye li tsa byi gzhon nu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par
346a1(rgyud 'bum): @#dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang yon tan dang ldan pa/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'chad ces grag gis nyon cig/ kye li tsa byi gzhon nu gser 'od
346a2(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i mdo 'di ni de ltar shes par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' bas na/ kho bo cag 'tha' 'khob kyi gling gi bram ze rnams ni gang bcangs pa na/ sems can rnams myur du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag
346a3(rgyud 'bum): po thob par 'gyur ba'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam za ma tog gi nang du bcug la bcangs kyang rung ngo / / kye li tsa byi gzhon nu khyod ci de bzhin gshegs pa las ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gsol nas/ ring
346a4(rgyud 'bum): bsrel za ma tog tu bcug ste bcangs pas/ sems can rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob par mi 'dod dam/ kye li tsa byi gzhon nu kho bos ni dam pa de lta bu gsol to// de nas li tsa byi gzhon nu 'jig
346a5(rgyud 'bum): / rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas/ slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+ya la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa/ nam zhig gang+gA'i chu rgyun la// me tog rnams ni skye ba dang // bya rog dmar
346a6(rgyud 'bum): por 'gyur ba dang / / khu byag dung mdog 'drar 'gyur dang // 'dzam bur ta la'i 'bru chags dang // 'bra gor a mra'i dog pa chags// de yi tshe na yungs 'bru tsam// ring bsrel du ni gsal bar 'gyur// nam
346a7(rgyud 'bum): zhig rus sbal spu rnams las/ / gos su legs par btags gyur te// dgun gyi grang ba sel byed pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig sbrang bu'i rkang lag las// yang thog legs par byas
346b1(rgyud 'bum): gyur te/ / brtan zhing rab tu mi g.yo ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig srin bu pad pa kun// so ni dkar por skyes gyur te// rdo zhing chen por gyur pa na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur//
346b2(rgyud 'bum): mtho ris su ni 'dzeg pa'i phyir// nam zhig ri bong rwa rnams las// skas ni legs par byas gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig skas ni der 'dzegs te// byi bas zla ba bza' ba
346b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sgra gcan la yang gnod byed pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// grong na rgyu ba'i sbrang bu yis// nam zhig rdza ma'i chang 'thungs te// khyim na gnas par byed 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par
346b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / nam zhig bong bu bde 'gyur la/ chu dmar bim pa 'drar gyur cing // gla gar rnams la mkhas gyur pa// de tshe ring bsral yod par 'gyur// nam zhig 'ug pa bya rog rnams// dben par dong nas rtse ba dang //
346b5(rgyud 'bum): phan tshun mthun par gyur pa na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// ba la sha yi lo ma rnams// rin chen sna gsum gdugs gyur te// char 'bab skyabs su nam gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur//
346b6(rgyud 'bum): nam zhig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che// 'khrul 'khor dang ni g.yor mor bcas// thang la byung ste 'gro ba na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig bya ni 'ug pa yis// ri bo spos kyi ngad ldan pa// mchu
346b7(rgyud 'bum): kha thogs te 'gro 'gyur ba/ / de tshe rang bsrel yod par 'gyur// slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di rgyas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag zos nas/ li tsa byi gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis
347a1(rgyud 'bum): mthong na dga' ba la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis sngar smras pa/ legs so leg so gzhon nu mchog/ rgyal ba'i sras po tshig po che// dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas ldan pa/
347a2(rgyud 'bum): lung bstan pa ni dam pa thob// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid// bsam gyis mi khyab go rims bzhin// gzhon nus bdag la mnyan par gyis// sangs rgyas yul ni
347a3(rgyud 'bum): bsam mi khyab/ / de bzhin gshegs rnams mtshungs pa med// sangs rgyas thams cad rtag tu zhi// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag byung // sangs rgyas thams cad kha dog mtshungs// 'di ni sangs rgyas
347a4(rgyud 'bum): chos nyid yin/ / bcom ldan 'das ni bcos ma min// de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes te// rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i sku// sprul pa'i sku ni ston par mdzad// drang srong chen po'i ring bsrel ni// yungs 'bru tsam zhes
347a5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba med/ / sku la rus pa khrag med na// ring bsrel yod par ga la 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// thabs kyis ring bsrel gzhag par mdzad// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// de
347a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings/ / chos ston mdzad pa ci 'dra ba// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de 'dra// bdag gis 'di thos shes nas ni// bdag gis dam pa gsol ba byas// de nyid kho na lung bstan
347a7(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ gtam gleng ba ni bdag gis byas// de nas lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa zab mo de lta bu de dag thos nas/ thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par
347b1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag yid kyi kun tu rtog pa rab tu dga' nas sgra dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs mi 'da'// chos kyang
347b2(rgyud 'bum): nub par mi 'gyur te/ / sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir// yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba ston// sangs rgyas bcom ldan pasam mi khyab// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku// sems can rnams
347b3(rgyud 'bum): la phan pa'i phyir/ / bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las/ bcom 'das
347b4(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa thos nas/ tshim zhing mgul yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ba dang / ling bde ba skyes nas dga' ba dang mgu nga rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
347b5(rgyud 'bum): sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
347b6(rgyud 'bum): kyang mi snang bar gyur to/ / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// /
347b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na/ gser gyi rnga kun tu snang ba 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo // phyogs thams cad na'ang
348a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rin po che'i shing drung na/ rin po che bai DUrmali khri rnams la bzhugs shing 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor /
348a2(rgyud 'bum): mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong ngo // de nas yang skyes bu bram ze'i gzugs lta bu zhig rnga de rdung ba mthong ste/ rnga'i sgra de las bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung ba thos so//
348a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog sad ma thag tu/ bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag rjes su dran no// rjes su dran nas kyang de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
348a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po nas byung ste/ srog chags stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
348a5(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la
348a6(rgyud 'bum): bder logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas rmi lam na gang rnga'i sgra las bstan pa'i tshogs su bcad pa thos pa de dag gsol to/ / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// rmi lam
348a7(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o/ / / nub gcig g.yal ba med par yang // bdag gi rmi lam gyur pa ni// mdzes pa'i rnga chen mthong ba ste// thams cad du ni gser
348b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi 'ang / / ji ltar nyi ma bzhin du 'bar// kun tu rnam par lhang nge ste// phyogs bcu rnams su snang bar gyur// kun tu rin chen shing drung na// rin chen bai DUn dag gi/ khri la sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te//
348b2(rgyud 'bum): brgya stong phrag ni du ma yi// 'khor dbus mdun gyis bltas pa mthong // bram ze'i gzugs ni 'dra ba zhig/ rnga chen rab tu rdung ba mthong // de yis de la brdungs pa dang // tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
348b3(rgyud 'bum): byung / / gser 'od dam pa'i rje chen sgra yis ni// stong gsum 'jig rten 'jig rten gsum 'di ni// ngan song sdug bsngal gshin rje'i sdug bsngal dang // dbul ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bar shog/ rnga bo che yi
348b4(rgyud 'bum): sgra skad 'di yis ni/ / 'jig rten rmongs pa thams cad zhi gyur cig/ ji ltar thub dbang 'jigs med 'jigs zhi ltar// sems can 'jigs med 'jigs dang bral bar shog/ ji ltar 'khor bar kun
348b5(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen thub dbang po/ / 'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar// skye dgu ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag gi/ yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya mtshor gyur// rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// sems can
348b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan gyur/ / sangs rgyas dam pa byang chub mchog reg shog/ chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba skor gyur cig/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bzhugs par shog/ 'gro la
348b7(rgyud 'bum): ban phyir chos kyang ston gyur cig/ nyon mongs 'joms gyur sdug bsngal sel bar shog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur cig/ sems can gang dag ngan song sar gnas te// rus pa'i
349a1(rgyud 'bum): lus la me lce rab 'bar ba/ de dag rnga chen bsgrags pa thos gyur cig/ sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig thos shog/ sems can kun gyis skye ba brgya dag dang //
349a2(rgyud 'bum): skyeb stong phrag bye ba skye dran shog/ thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig/ de dag gis ni rgya chen gsung thos shog/ rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di lis ni// sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed gyur//
349a3(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong bar shog/ bya ba dge ba rnams ni spyod gyur cig/ mi dang lha dang srog chags thams cad kyi// de dag bsam dang smon pa gang yin pa// rnga bo che yi
349a4(rgyud 'bum): sgra skad 'di yis ni/ / de dag rnams ni don kun rdzogs gyur cig/ sems can gang dag sems dmyal mi bzad skyes// lus la me lce kun tu rab tu 'bar// skyabs med mya ngan bcas
349a5(rgyud 'bum): shing yongs 'khyam pa/ / me rnams de dag rab tu zhi bar shog/ sems dmyal yi dgas mi yi 'jig rten na// sems can sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po gang // rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di
349a6(rgyud 'bum): yis ni/ / de dag rnams kyi sdug bsngal kun zhi shog/ rten med dpung gnyen med pa dang // skyabs med par yang gyur pa dag/ de rnams la ni skyob pa dang // dpung gnyen rten mchog
349a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo dag/ thugs brtse thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs// gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// bzhugs pa bdag la dgongs su gsol/
349b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis sngon chad sdig pa'i las// shin tu mi bzang gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu spyan sngar bdag mchis te// de dag thams cad bshags par 'gyi// pha ma dag tu mi 'dzin dang /
349b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams su mi 'dzin dang // dge ba dag tu mi 'dzin pas// sdig pa bdag gis gang bgyis pa// phyag pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang // rigs dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang //
349b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // nyes bsam nyes par smras pa dang // nyes par bgyis pa'i las rnams dang // nyes pa'i dmigs su
349b4(rgyud 'bum): ma bltas pas/ / bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // byis pa'i blo yis 'jug pa dang // mi shes mun pa'i sems dang ni// sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gyur dang // nyon mongs
349b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'khrug sems dang / / rtsed mo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang // mya ngan dang ni nad dbang dang // nor gyis mi chog nyes pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // 'phags
349b6(rgyud 'bum): min skye bo 'dre ba dang / / phrag dog ser sna'i rgyu dang ni// g.yo dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis// bdag gis nyes pa gang bgyis pa// 'phongs pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe// 'dod pa rnams kyi
349b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rgyu dang / / phyug po ma yin gyur pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // g.yo ba'i sems kyi dbang nyid dang // 'dod dang khro ba'i dbang dag dang // bkres dang skom gyis
350a1(rgyud 'bum): nyen pa yis/ / bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // bza' bdag dang btung ba dang // bud med rgyu dang gos kyi phyir// nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyis/
350a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdig/ zhes par spyod pa rnam gsum bsags// 'di 'dra'i tshul ni gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so//
350a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang // de bzhimanyan thos rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa/ 'a dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// gang yang ma sangs rgyas spang sa / byang chub sam dpa'adas
350a4(rgyud 'bum): kha yang / / gus pa ma lags bgyis pa rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// dam chos smra ba rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis dang // chos la'ang gus pa ma
350a5(rgyud 'bum): bgyis pa/ / de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// bdag gis rtag tu mi shes pas// dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang // pha ma rnams la ma gus dang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chags
350a6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / blun pa dang ni byis pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal dregs pas bsgribs bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// bdag gi phyogs bcu'i 'jig
350a7(rgyud 'bum): rten du/ / spobs bcu rnams la mchod pa bgyi// bdag gis phyogs bcur sems can rnams// sdug bsngal kun las gdon par bgyi// sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun/
350b1(rgyud 'bum): sa bcu la ni dgod par bgyi// sa bcu la ni gnas nas kyang // thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur cig/ ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las// de kun thar bgyi nus srid du// sems can
350b2(rgyud 'bum): re re'i phyir yang ni/ / bskal pa bye bar spyad par bgyi// gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba// las rnams thams cad byang bgyid pa// zab mo dag ni ston pa 'di// sems can de dag bstan
350b3(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi/ / gang gis bskal pa stong rnams su// sdig pa shin tu mi bzad bgyis// lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis// de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur// gang gis las kyi
350b4(rgyud 'bum): sgrib pa rnams/ / myur du yang dag zad 'gyur ba// gser 'od dam pa dge ba yis// bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas ni// rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po// sa bcu la
350b5(rgyud 'bum): ni gnas par bgyi/ / sangs rgyas yon tan snang bar bgyi// srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang // yon tan rgya mtsho zab mo dang // sangs rgyas 'on
350b6(rgyud 'bum): tan mtha' yas kyi/ / thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs par bgyi// ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnams dang // gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang // dbang stobs byang chub yan lag gi
350b7(rgyud 'bum): stobs bcu dam par 'gyur bar bgyi/ / dgongs pa'i thugs kyis sangs rgyas rnams// bdag la rnam par gzigs su gsol// thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni// nongs par rab tu
351a1(rgyud 'bum): gzung du gsol/ / bdag gis bskal pa brgya rnams su// sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// de phyir bdag ni bya 'an sems// 'bongs dang mya ngan 'jigs
351a2(rgyud 'bum): pas gzir/ / sdig pa'i las la 'jigs par bgyid// yid ni rtag tu dman par gyur// gang dag gang du spyod bgyid pa// bdag ni gang du dga' ma mchis// sangs rgyas thams cad
351a3(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje ldan/ / 'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs sel bas// nongs pa rab tu gzung du gsol// 'jigs pa dag las bdag thar mdzod// bdag gi nyon mongs las rnams kyi// dri ma de bzhin
351a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pas shol/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la ni// snying rje'i chu yis bkru bar gsol// sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyis dang /
351a5(rgyud 'bum): da ltar bdag gis sdig pa bang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// nongs par bgyis pa'i las rnams kun// slan chad mi bgyi bsdam par bgyi// bdag gis nongs par bgyis
351a6(rgyud 'bum): pa gang / / sdig de bcab par mi bgyi'o// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags
351a7(rgyud 'bum): so/ / lus kyis bgyis dang ngag gi las// yid kyis rnam par bsams pa dang // las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// mi dge las bcu
351b1(rgyud 'bum): spangs nas su/ / dge ba bcu po bsten bgyis te// sa bcu la ni bdag gnas bgyi// stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar bgyi// bdag gi sdig pa'i las gang dag/ mi 'dod 'bras bu thob
351b2(rgyud 'bum): bgyid pa/ / sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir gang dag dang // 'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu// gang rnams dge
351b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i las bgyid pa/ / de dag kun la yi rang ngo // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs pa// bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des// byang chub mchog la
351b4(rgyud 'bum): reg par bgyi/ / srid 'gro nyam ngar byis pa'i blo yis ni// shin tu mi bzad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu mi mnyam spyan sngar mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags
351b5(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi/ / skye ba nyam nga srid pa nyam nga dang // 'jig rten nyam nga g.yo sems nyam nga bar// lus kyi spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bsags de 'chags
351b6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / byis pa blun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang // sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga dang // srid pa nyom nga 'dod chags nyam nga dang // zhe sdang gti mug mun pa nyam nga dang // dal
351b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i nyam dus kyi nyam nga dang / / bsod nams sgrub pa nyam nga ngag gis kyang // rgyal ba mi nyam mngon sum mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// sangs rgyas gser
352a1(rgyud 'bum): @mchog ri snang ri rab 'dra/ / yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal bde dag rnams la skyabs su mchi// rgyal ba de dag kun la mgos phyag 'tshal// gser mtsho
352a2(rgyud 'bum): gser ni dri ma med pa'i gser gyi mdog/ dri med rnam dag bai DUR+Ya yi yan lag spyan// sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal gzi grags 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas// thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis mun nag
352a3(rgyud 'bum): bsal/ / yan lag rab tu dri mer rab bzang rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas nyi ma yan lag dri med gser 'dras khyab// nyon mongs mes gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i me 'dra la// thub pa'i zla ba'i
352a4(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer rlabs tshim par mdzad/ / mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis kyis dbang po yan lag mdzes// dpe byad bzang po ngag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes// dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs
352a5(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer dra ba yis/ / 'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs// dri mer rgya chen kha dog sna tshogs bai DUrma// skya rengs dmar dang dngul dang shel bzhin yan lag dmar// 'od zer
352a6(rgyud 'bum): ba rnam pa sna tshogs legs brgyan pas/ / thub chen khyod ni nyi ma bzhin du de yis ni// mya ngan 'khrugs pa 'chi chu rga ba'i dba' rlabs can// 'khor ba'i klung chen 'phongs pa'i chu bor lhung ba la/
352a7(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsub cing shugs drag pa// bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer mang po rnams kyis skems// yan lag gser gyi mdog tu rnam par snang // ye shes 'byung gan
352b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum kun mchog/ rab mdzes mtshan gyis yan lag rnam spras pa// sangs rgyas gser sku 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni dpag med dang // ji ltar sa la sa rngub
352b2(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas dang / / ji ltar ri rab rdo mtha' mtshungs med dang // ji ltar nam mkha'i mtha' ma mtha' yas pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// sems can kun gyis shes par
352b3(rgyud 'bum): mi nus so/ / bskal pa du mar gzhal cing bsam kyang ni// yon tan mtha' ma shes par mi nus so// chu ni skra yi rtse mo'i tshad tsam dang // rdor bcas rir bcas rgya mtshor bcas pa ni//
352b4(rgyud 'bum): bskal par bgrangs na shes par nus kyang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan pa mtha' shes mi nus// yon tan kha dog snyan dang grags pa dang // dge ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku lus dag/
352b5(rgyud 'bum): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa yi// sems can thams cad de 'char 'gyur bar shog/ bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// 'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas 'grub par bgyi//
352b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro la phan phyir chos kyang ston par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal mang gzir thar par bgyi// stobs bcas sder bcas bdud las rgyal bar bgyi// chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bsko
352b7(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi/ / bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab gnas par bgyi// bdud rtsi chu yis sems can tshim par bgyi// ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal bas rdzogs pa lngar// pha rol phyin drug bla med
353a1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs par bgyi/ / nyon mongs gzhom phyir sdug bsngal bsal bar bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi bar bgyi// skye ba brgya dang skye ba bye ba stong // bdag ni rtag tu skye
353a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dran par bgyi/ / thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig/ de yi gsung ni rgya chen mos par bgyi// bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par bgyi//
353a3(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spang bar bgyi// dge ba'i 'byung gnas dge rnams sprad par bgyi// zhing rnams kun na srog chags thams cad kyang // 'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun zhi
353a4(rgyud 'bum): gyur/ / sems can dbang po ma tshang yan lag nyams// de kun de'u re dbang po tshang bar shog/ gang dag nad btab nyam chung lus nyams dang // phyogs bcu dag na skyabs med gyur pa
353a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / de kun myur du nad las thar gyur cig/ nad med stobs dang dbang po rnyed par shog/ gang dag rgyal po chom rkun spre'u bsdigs gsang thug dang // sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs
353a6(rgyud 'bum): brgya yis 'phongs gyur pa/ / sems can nyam thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun// 'jigs mchog mi bzang rgyal po de las thar gyur cig/ gang dag brdegs shing bcing bas bcings
353a7(rgyud 'bum): gzer ba/ / 'phongs pa sna tshogs dag ni gnas gyur cing // nyon mongs stong phrag du mas dkrugs nas kyang // 'jigs pa mi bzang mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed// de dag thams cad bcings las
353b1(rgyud 'bum): grol gyur cig/ brdeg pa dag ni brdegs las thar par shog/ gsad pa rnams kyang srog dang lhan gyur cig/ 'phongs gyur thams cad 'jigs pa med par shog/ sems can gang dag
353b2(rgyud 'bum): bkres sred skom gyis gzir/ / de dag zas skom sna tshog ma rnyed par shog/ long bas gzugs rnams sna tshogs mthong gyur cig/ 'on pas yid 'ong sgra rnams thos par shog/ gcer
353b3(rgyud 'bum): bu rnams kyis sna tshogs gos rnyed gyur/ / sems can dbul pos gter rnams rnyed par shog/ nor 'bru rin chen sna tshogs mang po yis// sems can thams cad bde dang ldan par shog
353b4(rgyud 'bum): gang yang sdug bsngal tsher bas gnod ma gyur/ / sems can thams cad blta na sdug pa dang // gzugs bzang mdzes shing tshul du shis par shog/ rtag tu bde ba du ma rdzogs gyur cig/

353b6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma can/ / ngas skom gos nor mu tig nor bu dbyig/ rgyan gser rin chen sna tshogs be nucha// de dag bsams ma thag tu grub gyur cig/ 'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma 'byung /

354a1(rgyud 'bum): bar skye bar de dag gyur/ / bsams pa thams cad bsam ma thag tu yang // bsod nams 'bras bus yongs su rdzogs par shog/ spos dang 'phreng ba dag dang byug pa

354b1(rgyud 'bum): ngar sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa/ / sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob pa// de dag thams cad lu sa ni zad gyur cig/ sems can gang dag srid par bcings gnas kun// 'khor ba'i zhags

354b4(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams des/ / bdag ni smon grub 'bras bu thob par sho ga/ byang chub rdul bral bla med thob gyur cig/ gang dag rtag dang dri ma bral ba dang // dri med yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod pa
354b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / yongs su bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yis ni// bskal pa drug cur ngan song spang bar 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis// skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rigs las//
354b6(rgyud 'bum): thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal ba gang ston pa// tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur// yan lag dbang po kun gyis yan lag brgyan// bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan// mi
354b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang rgyal pos rtag tu de mchod do/ / de dang de dag tu ni de 'jar 'gyur// gang dag rna ba'i bu gar bshags pa 'di ni grags 'gyur ba// de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gnanas dge ba byas ma yin//
355a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis la ma yin bzhi la ma yin lnga min bcul min// de ltar sangs rgyas stong gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las
355a2(rgyud 'bum): bshags pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o/ / // bam po gnyis pa// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par
355a3(rgyud 'bum): bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa pad+ma'i 'drung

355a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dag na gang gzhes pa/ / rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag bgyi'o// rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod// thub dbang zhi zhing rab zhi rnam par dag/ sku ni gser gyi mdog tu
355a6(rgyud 'bum): rab tu gda'/ / dbyangs rnams kun gyis sangs rgyas gsung snyan te// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa'i gsung // brang barma bya ut+pal sngon po'i dbu// mthon mthing lcang lo
355a7(rgyud 'bum): niH sha 'dra/ / kha ba drang ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems// rtag tu gser ltar rnam par mdzes par gda'// spyan ni ring zhing mthon mthing dri ma med// ut+pal sngon po rab tu rgyas pa 'dra/
355b1(rgyud 'bum): ljags ni che zhing legs la pad+ma'i mdog/ pad+ma 'drar snang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra// zhal gyi mdzod spu pad+ma dung dang 'dra/ bai DUR+Ya yi mdog 'dra g.yas su 'khyil// thub pa'i zla ba phra zhing
355b2(rgyud 'bum): zla bzad pa 'dra/ / sku yi lte ba bung ba gsal ba bzhin// zhal mtho'i shangs ni rtag tu lhag ge ste// 'jam zhing sa la gser ltar kha dog bzang // rtag par rgyun du rgyal ba thams cad kyi//
355b3(rgyud 'bum): ro mchog 'jam zhing dam pa mchog rab 'phags// spu yi bu gnas ni re re skyes// spu rnams skyes pa g.yas su 'khyil ba ste// mthon mthing 'od 'bar 'tsher zhing lcang lo can//
355b4(rgyud 'bum): rma bya'i mgrin sdug 'dra bar sngol mdzes// bltams ma thag tu sku yis snang bar bgyis// phyogs bcu 'jig rten dag ni thams cad gang // 'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas
355b5(rgyud 'bum): zhi/ bde ba kun gyis sems can rnams kyang tshim// sems can dmyal 'gro dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dang // yi dgas lha gnas mi yi 'gro rnams su// sems can de dag thams cad bde
355b6(rgyud 'bum): bas tshom/ / ngan song 'gro ba rnams ni thams cad zhi// kha dog mdog bzang gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od// bco ma'i gser ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku// bde gshegs zla ba rab tu dri med
355b7(rgyud 'bum): zhal/ / 'dzug zhing rnam mdzes shin tu dri med zhal// gzhon nu btsas 'drar sku lus yan lag 'jam// seng ge 'drang bar rtsal gyis gnon pa'i mchog/ phyag ring phyag ni rab tu ring
356a1(rgyud 'bum): bste/ sA la'i lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// 'dom gang 'od 'bar 'od zer rab tu gtong // nyi ma stong ltar rab tu lhag gi'o// thub pa'i dbang po sku mngon/
356a2(rgyud 'bum): dri ma med// zhing rnams mtha' yas thams cad rab tu snang // sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par lhung nge bas// zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnams su yang // mtshan byad zla ba nyi ma mang
356a3(rgyud 'bum): po dag/ de dag thams cad 'od ni med par 'gyur// sangs rgyas nyi ma 'jig rten sgron ma ste// sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag stong rnams ni// zhing rnams mtha' yas stong phrag brgya dag
356a4(rgyud 'bum): na/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i sems can mthong // bsod nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku// yon tan kun gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sku// glang chen dbang po'i sna 'dra rgyal
356a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyag/ phyag dang zhabs 'od rab mdzes dri ma med// sa yi steng gi rdul dang mtshungs 'dra snyed// phra ba'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas gang 'das dang // gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed 'byung ba dang //
356a6(rgyud 'bum): gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed bzhugs pa yis// rgyal ba de dag la ni rab dang ba'i// ngag yid lus kyis me tog dbul ba dang // spos rnams dbul dang bsngags pa brgya dag dang // dga'
356a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag 'tshal lo/ / rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag dger gyur pa// snying po mchog rab sna tshogs du ma ste// bdag gis bskal pa stong du lce brgya yis// sangs rgyas
356b1(rgyud 'bum): yon tan brjod par mi nus so/ / rgyal ba gcig gi yon tan rnams kyang ni// lce stong gis kyang cung zad brjod mi nus// bdag gis rgyal ba dag ni thams cad kyi// yon tan bcag
356b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas brjod par ga la nus/ / lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad mtshor gyur te// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad chus gang ba// skra mi rtse mos dpag par nus srid kyi// bde gshegs
356b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi yon tan gcig la min/ / lus dang ngag yid rab tu dang ba yis// rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas// bdag gis bsod nams 'bras bu mchog bas
356b4(rgyud 'bum): gang / des ni sems can rgyal ba reg gyur cig/ de ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas rnams bstod nas// rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa ni// ma 'ongs bskal pa mtha' yas
356b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams su yang / / gang dang gang du bdag ni skye ba na// rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra'i rnga blta zhing // der ni bshags pa 'di 'dra ma nyan par bgyi// rgyal bstod pad+ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba/
356b6(rgyud 'bum): skye ba de dang der ni rnyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' las mtshungs med dang // gang yang bskal pa stong du rnyed dka' ba// de dag rmi lam du yang mnyan par bgyi//
356b7(rgyud 'bum): nyin gyur tshe yang de dag bshad par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal mtsho las thar bar bgyi// pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzogs par bgyi// phyi nas byang chub bla med thob par bgyi/
357a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi zhing ni lhod pa med gyur cig/ rnga phul rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang // rgyal ba thams cad la yang bstod pa'i rgyus// shAkya thub dbang mngon du blta bar
357a2(rgyud 'bum): bgyi/ / der ni bdag gis lung bstan thob gyur cig/ gser gyi lag pa'i dbang dang gser gyi 'od// bdag gi khye'u ni gang yin 'di gnyis kyang // der ni bu pho de dag gnyis ka dang //
357a3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub bla med lung bstan thob par shog/ sems can gang dag gnas med rten med cing // skyabs dang bral nas 'phongs par gyur pa dag/ de dag la yang ma 'ongs dus rnams na//
357a4(rgyud 'bum): skyob dang dpung gnyen skyabs dang rten gyur shog/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad par byed gyur cig/ bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur par shog/ sngon mtha' 'das pa de dag ji srid pa//
357a5(rgyud 'bum): ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyad par bgyi// gser 'od dam pa yi ni bshags pa yis// bdag gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho bskams par shog/ bdag gi las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig
357a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi nyon mongs rgya mtsho zad par shog/ bdag gis bsod nams rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur cig/ ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi ye shes rgya mtsho rnam dag cing //
357a7(rgyud 'bum): tan kun gyi rgya mtshor gyur par shog/ byang chub yon tan rin chen rdzogs gyur cing // gser 'od dam pa'i bshags pa'i stobs kyis ni// bdag gi bsod nams rab tu snang bar shog
357b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi byang chub snang ba rnam dag gyur/ / ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi lus kyi 'od ni snang bar shog/ bsod nams dam pa lhag ger bya ba'i phyir// 'jig rten
357b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum na khyad par 'phags gyur cig/ bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan par shog/ sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni sgrol ba dang // bde ba kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dra ba yis// ma 'ongs
357b3(rgyud 'bum): bskal par byang chub spyad par bgyi/ / 'jig rten gsum na sngon mthar ji snyed gshegs// de dag zhing ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// yon tan mtha' yas khyad 'phags ci 'dra ba// yon tan
357b4(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas rnams kyi bdag gi zhing / / ma 'ongs dus na de 'drar 'gyur bar shog/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
357b5(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bstod pa me tog pad+ma'i 'byung gnas kyi le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
357b6(rgyud 'bum): tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ / bsam gyis mi khyab mdo rnams gzhan dag tu// stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rnas bshad de// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/
357b7(rgyud 'bum): stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad par byas// sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas// chos rnams thams cad shes par mi nus te// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/
358a1(rgyud 'bum): stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam rab tu bshad// sems can kun gyis ci nus shes 'gyur dang // sems can 'byung bya'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang // thabs dang
358a2(rgyud 'bum): tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni/ / mdo mchog dam pa dbang po 'di bshad do// lus 'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te// dbang po rnams ni dmag dang chom rkun 'dra// de dag
358a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad grong gcig gnas mod kyi/ / de dag phan tshun rnam par mi shes so// mig gi dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug/ rna ba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par spyod// sna yi dbang po
358a4(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog/ lce yi dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyug/ lus kyi dbang po reg pa dag la rgyug/ yid kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam par spyod// dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun
358a5(rgyud 'bum): du/ / rang rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed// sems ni sgyu ma lta bu g.yo ba yin// dbang po drug ni yul la rnam spyod de// ji ltar mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa dang // dmag dang chom
358a6(rgyud 'bum): rkun dgra dang gnas pa bzhin/ / ji ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas shing // dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab shes pa// de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te//
358a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab tu shes// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang // re dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos// sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la//
358b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang por zhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo bar gyur// dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni shes pa bdag nyid byed// lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med// snying
358b2(rgyud 'bum): po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin/ / yang dag ma yin yongs su rtog las byung // grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas// sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams ni//
358b3(rgyud 'bum): grong gzhan gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sbrul gdug gnas gcig ji bzhin te// rtag tu phan tshun mthun pa ma yin bzhin// khams kyi sbrul rnams bzhi
358b4(rgyud 'bum): bopo de dag kyang / / gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te// khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// sa yi
358b5(rgyud 'bum): sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag dang / / 'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin// me yi sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis steng gi nam mkhar 'gro ba yin// ji ltar sngon chad byas
358b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i las rnams kyis/ / sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dong // lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye// bad kan rlung
358b7(rgyud 'bum): dang mkhris pa zang gyur nas/ / lus shig cin dang ngan spyugs rnams kyis gang // mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur// dur khrod dag na 'thor ba zhing bzhin gyur//
359a1(rgyud 'bum): lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can gang zag gang zhig yod// chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa 'i rkyen las byung
359a2(rgyud 'bum): ba yin/ / 'byung ba chen po 'di dag che 'byung min// ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste// gang gi phyir ni 'byung ba mi 'byung ba// de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do// yod pa min zhing nam yang
359a3(rgyud 'bum): yod min la/ / ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te// de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do// 'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang // skye mched drug dang reg
359a4(rgyud 'bum): dang tsher ba dang / / sred dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang // skye dang rga shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag/ ma
359a5(rgyud 'bum): byung ba las byung ba mi 'byung dang / / tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam dpyad dang // bdag gi lta bar gyur pa gcad par gyis// ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mo drol// phung po'i gnas la stong par
359a6(rgyud 'bum): gyur par ltos/ / byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par gyis// ngas ni bdud rtsi grong khyer sgo yang phye// bdud rtsi khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstan// ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas der 'jug/ ngas ni bdud rtsi khungs
359a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag tshim byas/ / ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang bus// ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas// ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phab// nga ni nyon mongs dgra mchog rnams
359b1(rgyud 'bum): las rgyag/ / ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgrengs// srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral// ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi las rnams bkag/ sems can nyon mongs me yis gdungs gyur pa// rten
359b2(rgyud 'bum): med gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag/ srog chags nyon mongs mes gdungs ni byas nas// bdud rtsi khu ba bsilabs tshim par byas// gang phyir bskal pa du mar sngon chadangs// 'dren pa bsam gyis mi ny+tsa
359b3(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa byas/ / chos kyi sku de yongs su tshel ba na// brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de// lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang // yan lag mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang // nor dbyig nor bu mu tig
359b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyan dang gser/ / bai DUrma dang rin chen sna tshogs btang // stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang // rtswa dang rtswa rnams thams cad dang // nags tshal dag dang sa las ni// 'khrungs pa thams cad bcad
359b5(rgyud 'bum): gtubs te/ / de dag thams cad byer brlags nas// rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ji tsam par// phye ma'i phung po spungs na sa ni// 'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus
359b6(rgyud 'bum): sa la rdul ni yod pa rnams/ / stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi// rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sems can kun gyis shes pa gang // de ni sems can gcig gir gyur// shes
359b7(rgyud 'bum): pa de yis rdul rnams kyi/ / phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags pa// ye shes rab ldan mi rnams kyis// thams cad bgrangs par nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i mkhyen la mi
360a1(rgyud 'bum): nus so/ / thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang // skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang // bskal pa bye ba du mar ni// gang du'ang bgrang bar mi nus so// gser 'od dam pa mdo
360a2(rgyud 'bum): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste drug pa'o// / de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po
360a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs
360a4(rgyud 'bum): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
360a5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba/ lha'i tshogs
360a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags pa brjod nas rab
360a7(rgyud 'bum): tu bkur ba/ lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud bzob skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
360b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi sdug bsngab thams cad rab tu skems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zlog pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad
360b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gza' thams cad sel ba mchog tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mya ngan dang nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod
360b3(rgyud 'bum): pa brgya stong rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa lags so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par bshad na/ chos nyan pa bdud rtsi'i khu ba
360b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dis bdag cag rgyal po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi lha'i lus 'dis gzi chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ / bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang / stobs dang / mthu bang skyed par 'gyur/ gzi
360b5(rgyud 'bum): brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang bdag cag gi lus la 'jug par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po lags
360b6(rgyud 'bum): tebatsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po
360b7(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / 'byung po'i tshogs mi bzad pa snying rje ma mchis pa/ gzhan gyi mdangs 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin
361a1(rgyud 'bum): ldeng pon chen pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun du lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad
361a2(rgyud 'bum): la blta bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong zhes ming du chags so// btsun pa bcom
361a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i dgon pa 'am/ nad kyi dgon pa 'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa

361a6(rgyud 'bum): gang dang gang du mchi bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di yul de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par ston par gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu
361a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong tshes smra ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser
361b1(rgyud 'bum): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'ang bsnyen par 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te thos nas/ mdo

361b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su

361b6(rgyud 'bum): yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos dge
361b7(rgyud 'bum): slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa la bsti stang bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
362a1(rgyud 'bum): cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de la/ rgyal po thams cad pas ches bsti snang du bgyi/ ches bla mar rabagyi/ ches rim gror bgyi/ ches mchod par bgyi ste/ yul
362a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du'ang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po
362a3(rgyud 'bum): khyed yang legs so legs so/ / 'di lta ste/ khyed ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur
362a4(rgyud 'bum): byas pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos kyis lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal po byed pa'o// 'di lta ste/ khyed ni yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang
362a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ mi phan pa thams cad 'gogs pa/ sems can thams
362a6(rgyud 'bum): cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub par brtson pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang / rim gror byed par brtson pa de
362a7(rgyud 'bum): dag la kun tu srung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bsrung ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ des na rgyal
362b1(rgyud 'bum): po chen po dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kun/
362b2(rgyud 'bum): tu bsrungs par 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung bar yang 'gyur ro// des na rgyal po chen po dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhi
362b3(rgyud 'bum): b+ha dang lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ / lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul
362b4(rgyud 'bum): bar byed pa'i phyir/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la kun tu srung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su
362b5(rgyud 'bum): gzung ba dang / yongs su bsrung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po
362b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po med mi bzang stan las langs te tha gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba ra
362b7(rgyud 'bum): logs mthal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gser pod dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong /
363a1(rgyud 'bum): khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor tam/ bzang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsun
363a2(rgyud 'bum): pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por 'gyur ba gang la la zhig lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal po bgyid cing / rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan

363a4(rgyud 'bum): par bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod de/ rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos nyan pa'i chu bo'i chu chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po
363a5(rgyud 'bum): bani dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs chen
363a6(rgyud 'bum): pobopor yang bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi
363a7(rgyud 'bum): dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong dum dang lus bltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/
363b1(rgyud 'bum): yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
363b2(rgyud 'bum): po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba

363b5(rgyud 'bum): las yongs su thar bar bgyi'o/ / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang bzlog par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gror
363b6(rgyud 'bum): bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra za 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam ngas zla 'dab nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs
363b7(rgyud 'bum): yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyeng na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dang
364a1(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus/ dgra za 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na'ang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/
364a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam
364a3(rgyud 'bum): dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de dag rang gi yul du phyin na/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang bral ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan
364a4(rgyud 'bum): lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs su mchi ba'i slad du rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang na
364a5(rgyud 'bum): gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas
364a6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ der mchi bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de yul du zhugs pa las kyang de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o// brel
364a7(rgyud 'bum): bsna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ / bgegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de mchi bar yang mi nus na/ yul gzhig par bgyid pa lta ga la 'gyur/
364b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po khyed yang legs te/ khyed bskal pa
364b2(rgyud 'bum): grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang /

364b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khrug pa thams cad la sa yongs su thar par gyis shig/ pha rol gyi dmag tshegs rnams kyang zlog cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po dag mi 'thab pa dang
364b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshang mi 'dru ba dang / mi rtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir/ nam grong khyer brgyad khri
365a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi stong de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang / rang gi
365a2(rgyud 'bum): nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi bskyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyis las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang
365a3(rgyud 'bum): byuphyag gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol gyi gnod pa dang / nam 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na/ rgyal
365a4(rgyud 'bum): po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du mi 'thab/ mtshang mi 'dru/ mi rtsod/ mi 'gyed par
365a5(rgyud 'bum): rang rang gi yul dag dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/
365a6(rgyud 'bum): skye bo mang po dang mis gang bar 'gyur/ sa'ang mdangs can du 'gyur/ dus dang / bla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / lo khyud kor thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza'

365b1(rgyud 'bum): can rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ longs spyod che ba dang ser sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ 5
365b2(rgyud 'bum): cher bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ gser

366a1(rgyud 'bum): pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba zag khrig brgya stong du ma la'ang yo byad bsam
366a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis mi khyab pa rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / de nas mi'i rgyal po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang /

367a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / nad 'go ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i

367a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/ mi'i rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad du 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o// der mchis nas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag
367a4(rgyud 'bum): gdab cing / me tog gi sil ma sna tshogs bkram par bgyi'o// spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bshams par
367a5(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / phyogs der gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o// gos dri ma rab tu gda' ba
367a6(rgyud 'bum): gos gsar pa mdzes pa bgos nas/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag gi stan rab tu dma' ba gding bar bgyi ste/ stan de la mchis nas rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs
367a7(rgyud 'bum): par mi bgyi'o/ / der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o// rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis/ gser longam pa
367b1(rgyud 'bum): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'adi mnyan par bgyi'o/ / dge slong chos smra ba de la'ang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal
367b2(rgyud 'bum): bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang phan par blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu
367b3(rgyud 'bum): mo rnams la tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o/ / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la'ang tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// chos mnyan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor du stsal
367b4(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi'o/ / dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas bdag tshim par bgyi'o// dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po bde
367b5(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi'o/ / bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o// bdag dga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o//
367b6(rgyud 'bum): dedaskad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag de'i dus na mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar
367b7(rgyud 'bum): pogasar pa mdzes pa bgo bar bya'o/ / spud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan par bya'o// gdugs dkar po'ang gzung bar bya'o// rgyal po'i mthu chen po bzhi
368a1(rgyud 'bum): dang rgyal po'i bkod pa chen po bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la/ chos smra ba bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe
368a2(rgyud 'bum): nami'i rgyal pos der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag
368a3(rgyud 'bum): khrig brgya stong thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de skad du/ tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
368a4(rgyud 'bum): brgya stong phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba lha'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyis rgyal rigs lha'i rgya che ba brgya stong phrag du ma
368a5(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/
368a6(rgyud 'bum): grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa shin tu rgya che bar 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang / mi dang / lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang mi
368a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur/ chen po che chen po'i spobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang / blta na sdug pa
368b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams
368b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong nas mi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu bar bya/ dpag
368b3(rgyud 'bum): tshad brgya dang dpag tshad spong du'ang bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// 'di snyam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

368b6(rgyud 'bum): dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bya'o/ / deng bdag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya'o// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
368b7(rgyud 'bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dum mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis 'das pa dang / mo byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa
369a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
369a2(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par byas par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i
369a3(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag
