375a7(rgyud 'bum): btsum pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de dag nyid la kun tu srung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myong ba tshal bar 'gyur/
375b1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba thams cad bstabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshegs thams
375b2(rgyud 'bum): cad 'pham par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul thams cad yun ring du yongs su skyong 'tshal bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rang gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang /
375b3(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'or
375b4(rgyud 'bum): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyid/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang bgyid//
375b5(rgyud 'bum): bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang / chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di
375b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyid/ bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gis gzi brjid chen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan
375b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten pa dang / 'phri
376a1(rgyud 'bum): rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji skad bstan pa dag dang /
376a2(rgyud 'bum): drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can dag gi don gyi slad du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa bstan pa
376a3(rgyud 'bum): dag las ches mchog/ chos khyad par du 'phags pa/ gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong de dag dang /
376a4(rgyud 'bum): brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong thams cad pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs
376a5(rgyud 'bum): pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par bshad pa lags so/ / ji ltar na 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ji ltar sems
376a6(rgyud 'bum): can bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar rang gi yul kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul thams cad na gnod pa dang dgra ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /
376a7(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar pha rol gyi dam sa tshogs pa ma ste phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul de dag nand 'go ba ma mchis shing 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul thams cad ma
376b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / dza ltar ma'i rgya po de dag gis rang rang gi sgra pa rnams su chos kyi sngon mchen pa' bar bar bgyis shing snang bar bgyis par
376b2(rgyud 'bum): bdang / ji ltar lha'i khang khyim thams cad lha ga dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin
376b3(rgyud 'bum): brgya stong phrag du ma dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshim pa dang / rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi chen pos
376b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu chen po skyed par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid
376b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad lo legs shing nyams dga' la skye bo dang mis gang bar 'gyur ba dang
376b6(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sems can bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
376b7(rgyud 'bum): brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bang ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na blan med pa
377a1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur pa de dag thams cad de lta na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
377a2(rgyud 'bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag pas ches 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin rlabs dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig stong gi
377a3(rgyud 'bum): lha'i shes pa bas ches 'phags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams
377a4(rgyud 'bum): cad pas ches 'phags pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam
377a5(rgyud 'bum): pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ / mi'i rgyal po'i dgongs pa dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag 'dzam
377a6(rgyud 'bum): bu'i gling thams cad na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
377a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sangs rgyas kyis/ gser bod dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nye bar bstan/ yongs su brjod/ yang dag par rab tu bshad do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu de dang rkyen /
377b1(rgyud 'bum): mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par dgyi/ gus par rim gror bgyi/ gus par mchod par bgyi'o// da skad ces
377b2(rgyud 'bum): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas gdon mi za bar mi'i
377b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir spro ba cher gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dag dge
377b4(rgyud 'bum): slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chu gcig dang / de dag lha dang
377b5(rgyud 'bum): mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chang
377b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyad bzhis ci nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma bsrung ba dang / gnod pa med pa
377b7(rgyud 'bum): dang nang med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems bde bar 'gyur zhing / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur bar dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am
378a1(rgyud 'bum): da btsun pa/ dag rgya ma ma lda ba 'dun pa rnyen sum rgya bzung ba / yongasas bsgyus pa dang / rangs su gzung ba dang / yangs su bsku
378a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / di tshigs su 'gyur ba / na rgyal ba tshan pon mthos kyi dang / rgyal mchen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pa dang /
378a3(rgyud 'bum): popo chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo
378a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba btud nas/ de'i tshe mngon sum du tshul dang mthun pa'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba zla ba dri ma med pa'i sku// rgyal ba
378a5(rgyud 'bum): nyi me 'od zer stong gi 'od/ / rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan// rgyal ba me tog pad rtsa rdul med tshems// rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lha bu ste// rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur//
378a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yis gang // ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang // rgyal ba'i zhabs ni 'khor lor bris pa ste// khor yug mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong // phyag dang
378a7(rgyud 'bum): zhabs ni dra bas spras pa ste/ / zhabs kyi dra ba dang pa'i rgyal po bzhin// gser gyi ri bo lta bur rab tu gda'// rgyal ba dri med gser gyi ri dbang po// yon tan thams cad ri rab 'dra
378b1(rgyud 'bum): bste/ / sangs rgyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pazla ban+d+ha ba 'dra// nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste// sgyum sdig rgya lta bu chags med pa// rgyal
378b2(rgyud 'bum): ma med la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ stobs bcu dag gi gser 'od dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i
378b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po rab mchog 'di/ / 'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyis ni// brtson 'grus rab tu brtan pas bskyang bar bya// 'di ltar mdo sde'i dkon mchog zab mo 'di// sems can
378b4(rgyud 'bum): kun la bde ba sbyin byed pa/ / sems can rnams la phan dang bde ba'i phyir// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur// 'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi// 'jig rten dag
378b5(rgyud 'bum): na ngan song sdug de sngal dang / / sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi ni// sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o// gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling ni 'di na yang // 'dzam ze'i gling
378b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas rgyala'i po thams cad kyis/ / rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni// chos rnams kyis rmi yul dag bskyang bar bgyis// bang gis 'jas bu'i gling 'di bde ba dang //
378b7(rgyud 'bum): legs nyams kyang dkar bgyur zhing // 'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad dpan yang // sems canathams cad ba bar 'gyur bar dgyis// 'din mi yi dbang po gang rnams ni// yul la pa
379a1(rgyud 'bum): dang bdag bde dga' ba dang / / rgyal srid rnam par 'byor la dga' ba des// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya// pha rol dgra ni yang dag zad byed pa// pha rol
379a2(rgyud 'bum): dgra tshegs zlog pa dge byed pa/ / mchog tu 'jigs pas 'phongs pa sel byed pa// mchog tu dge byed mdo sde'i dbang po 'di// ji ltar rin chen shing ljon rab mdzes pa// yon tan kun 'byung
379a3(rgyud 'bum): khyim na yod pa ltar/ / rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po mchog 'di de ltar blta// ji ltar chu grang skom pa sel byed pa// tsha bas nyam thag tshe ni rnyed pa ltar/
379a4(rgyud 'bum): yon tan dag gis skosgom pa'i rgyal po la// mdo sde'i dbang po mchog 'di de bzhin no// mdo sde'i rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rin chen snod ni lag mthil yod pa ltar// mi yi dbang
379a5(rgyud 'bum): bo tshogs la gser 'od mchog/ mdo lnga'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no// 'di ni lha yi tshogs kyis mngon mchod pa// mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyag byas pa// 'jig rten skyong brdzu 'grub
379a6(rgyud 'bum): chen pog/ ba'i bo dag gis kun tu bskyengs pa yin// phyogs bcud gnasangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang // mdo rje'i dbang po 'di ni rtag tu dgongs// mde rje'i bang po 'don du shang ngan/
379a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs zhes brjod pa byin// gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dag tu yul yang srung bar byed// rab tu dga' zhing rab ta mgu sems kyis/
379b1(rgyud 'bum): mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par byed// 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par gyur pa yi// lha yi tshogs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas// mdo sde'i dbang
379b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni nyan par byed/ / chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yis ni// gzi brjid dang ni stobs dang brtson 'grus 'thob// gzi brjid chen po yis ni lha yi lus// shin tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel
379b3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis// bcom ldan 'das las tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta du 'di dag thos pa dang ngo mtshar du gyur// rmad du byung bar gyur/ dga' bar gyur te/ de dag
379b4(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi shugs kyis yul tsam zhig ngus nas mchi ma phyis te/ de dag lus 'phar yan lag 'dar zhing dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur nas/
379b5(rgyud 'bum): yang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man da ra bdag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor to// gtor mngon par gtor nas kyang stan las langs te/ gos brag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus
379b6(rgyud 'bum): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
379b7(rgyud 'bum): cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ rgyal po chen por rabang gnod sbyin lnga brgya lnga brgya dang chos smra ba de bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du/ rtag tu dge slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// gser
380a1(rgyud 'bum): 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o// / de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis gos phrag
380a2(rgyud 'bum): pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
380a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang / dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan pa'i slad du/ spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig/
380a4(rgyud 'bum): gi brjod pa kun tu gzhag par bgyi/ dge slong chos smra ba de la ye shes kyi snang ba chen po bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di las tshig gam yi ge gang yang rung ba dag cig yongs
380a5(rgyud 'bum): su nyams par gyur tam/ bskyud na bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang / tshig dang / yi ge de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgya stong dag
380a6(rgyud 'bum): la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can du
380a7(rgyud 'bum): mngag gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/ shes rab rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang
380b1(rgyud 'bum): tshe 'dil che phun sumatshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / srog la phan gdags pa dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / thabs sna tshogs
380b2(rgyud 'bum): tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / bskyud pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i
380b3(rgyud 'bum): slad du/ de la gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de dang / sems can chos nyan pa de dag gi don gyi slad du sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi las brjod par bgyi ste/ gza'
380b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / rgyu skar dang / skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / 'khrug glong dang / khrag khrug dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang /
380b5(rgyud 'bum): byang dang ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du stsal ba'i sman dang sngags ni 'di dag ste/ shu dag 'gi'u wang 'bu sug dang // sha myang sha mi shi rig
380b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang po'i lag dang skal ba che/ / dzAm shing tsa a ka ru// shi ri bai sta swa rtsi dang // ku gu pa ra sa shal la ki/ rdo rjeg lo margya spos dang // tsan dan dang ni ldong ros dang // 'gi'u wang bcas
380b7(rgyud 'bum): dang dun dang / / gur kum gla sgang yungs kar dang // spyi mo sug spel na lad// nag gi sar u shir// 'di dag cha ni mnyam bgyis nas// skar ma rgyal la btags par bgyi// phye ma la
381a1(rgyud 'bum): ni sngags tshig 'di/ / lan brgya mngon par gdab par bgyi// tad+yaH thA/ su kri ti/ ka ma la nI la/ dza na kar te/ aM ka ra Te/ in+ta dza li shaM ka ra dre/ pA sha de/ a
381a2(rgyud 'bum): brtaka se ke na ku/ ku Ta ku/ ka bi la ma ti/ shI la ma ti/ san d+hi d+hud+hu ma pa ti/ shi ri shi ri/ sat+ya s+thi ti swA hA/ lcibs dkyil 'khor bgyis nas ni// me tog sil ma bkram par bgyi/
381a3(rgyud 'bum): gser gyi snod dang dngul snod du// dang ra ba'i khu ba gzhag par bgyi// skyes bu go cha bgos pa ni// bzhi zhig der yang gzhag par bgyi// rab tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bzhi// bum pa thogs pa
381a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bgyi/ / rtag tu gu gul bdugs par bgyi// sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du stsal// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan bgyi// lha mo de ni legs par brgyan// bar bar dag tu me
381a5(rgyud 'bum): long gzhag/ mda' dang mdung rtse sna sprad gzhag/ de nas mtshams kyang gcad par bgyid// de yi 'og tu dgos pa brtsam// sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis// mtshams
381a6(rgyud 'bum): gcad pa yang brtsam par 'gyi/ / s+yAd ze dan/ a/ na ya ne/ hi le/ mi le/ gi le/ khi bi le swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su khrus bgyis nas/ sngags
381a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na/ khrus kyi zhi bar sbyor ro// tad+yathA/ sa ga Ne big Te/ big tab ti swAhA/ phyogs bzhi dgan gang gnas pa'i// rgya skar dag ni cha srungs shes
381b1(rgyud 'bum): btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / / phung po'i las kyi 'jigs 'byung dang // 'byung ba'i khams rnams 'khrug bgyid pa// 'jigs pa mi bzad zhi gyur cig/ tad+hathA/ sha ma
381b2(rgyud 'bum): bi sha me swA hA/ sa ga Te bi ga Te swA hA/ swa ga ra saM bud+d+ha ya swA hA/ skan+d+ha mA tA ye swA hA/ nI la kar+N+Na ya swAhA/ a pa ra dzi ta bi d+yA ya swAhA/ hi ma ba~M d+ha saM dud+d+hA ya swA hA/ in mi la dAk+ShA ya
381b3(rgyud 'bum): swAhA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ prad+d+ha ga Na na maHsa ra sA N+ye de byai sid+d+han+ta man+t+ra pA dA/ tA ra tu bi tsi ta~M bran+d+ha nu ma n+ya tu swA hA/ dge slong chos smra ba de bsrung ba dang / chos mnyan pa de dag dang / yi ger
381b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ba de dag gi don gyi slad du/ khrus kyi las 'dis bdag nyid der mchi bar bgyi'o// lha'i tshegs thams cad dang lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug
381b5(rgyud 'bum): khang der nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ / ji ltar dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi srog la phan gdags
381b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las byung ba thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
381b7(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar/ gza' dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / bcas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang /

388b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / lteng ka dang / 'di lta bu'i yo byad bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa/ sa las byung ba/ sa la brten pa 'di dag la spyod par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des sems
388b7(rgyud 'bum): can de dag thams cad kyis bdag la byas pa gzo bar bgyi'o/ / gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi/ bkur sting brgyad
389a1(rgyud 'bum): bla mar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe sems can de dag chos smra ba de'i gan du mchis pa'i slad du rigs tha dad
389a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / khyim tha dad pa dag nas byung ste mchis nas/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur la/ thos nas kyang rang gi ris dang / khyim dang / grong dang / grong
389a3(rgyud 'bum): rdal tha dad pa dag tu zhugs nas/ rang rang gi khyim na gnas pa dag phan tshun du 'di skad ces bdag cag gis de ring chos mnyan pa zab mo thos so// de ring bdag cag gis bsod nams kyi 'ung
389a4(rgyud 'bum): po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ngo / / bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dag mnyes par byas so// deng bdag cag gis
389a5(rgyud 'bum): chos mnyan pa 'dis sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar to/ / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul las yongs su thar to// dang bdag cag
389a6(rgyud 'bum): chos mnyan pa 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ tshe rabs brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mir skye ba yongs su bzung bar 'gyur zhes gtam zer bar 'gyur/ khyim tha dad pa na gnas par gyur pa de dag
389a7(rgyud 'bum): sems can gzhan dag la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na dpe gcig brjod dam/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na le'u gcig gam/ sngon
389b1(rgyud 'bum): byung ba gcig gam/ tha na byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig gam/ tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshig
389b2(rgyud 'bum): gcig gis sems can gzhan dag la thos par bgyid dam/ za na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan gzhan dag la rab tu ston tam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
389b3(rgyud 'bum): gang dang gang na sems can rnam pa tha dad ba de dag sa phyogs rnam pa tha dad pa de dag tu mdo sde'i gtan tshigs rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta bu 'di dag gcig la gcig rjod dam/ thos par bgyid ngam
389b4(rgyud 'bum): gtam rgyud rjod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs de dag thams cad shin tu mdangs dang ldan pa dang snum par 'gyur ro// sa phyogs de dang de dag tu sems can de dag thams cad
389b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyir/ sa'i bcud rnam pa sna tshogs dang / yo byad thams cad rgyas par skye bar 'gyur/ rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ shin tu rgyas par 'gyur/ sems can de dag thams cad
389b6(rgyud 'bum): kyang bde bar 'gyur ro/ / nor che ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / sbyin pa la mos par 'gyur/ dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dad par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang //

390a1(rgyud 'bum): tshig gcig nyan na/ de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shing 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rigs kyi nang du lha'i rigs gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar 'gyur ro// sa'i

390b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang /

394a1(rgyud 'bum): @#/ rgyal por 'gyur ba bshad par bya// lha dbang rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis// ma yi rum du 'jug 'gyur te// lha yis sngar ni byin brlabs nas// phyi nas mngal du

394a3(rgyud 'bum): cu rtsa gsum lha dbang gis/ / rgyal po'i skal ba byin nas ni// mi rnams kyi ni dbang por sprul// nyes par byas pa rnams 'gog pa// chos ma yin pa gzhig pa dang // sems can

394b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang / / yul 'khor der ni byi phyir byung // sum cu rtsa gsum khang pa na// lha yi dbang po 'khrug par 'gyur// yul na nyes byed gnas pa dag/ gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor ba/

394b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jig/ gang gi nor bsags yod pa yang // g.yo byed rnam pa mang po yis// phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur// bya ba gang gis rgyal po nyid// bya ba de ni mi byed pa// glang chen
394b4(rgyud 'bum): dbang pos rdzing bu bzhin/ / rang gi yul 'khor rnam par 'jig/ ma rungs pa yi rlung ldang zhing // ma rungs pa yi char pa 'bab// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // gza' dang rgyu skar ma rungs

395a1(rgyud 'bum): ni rnams par 'jig/ yul du chos min 'byung 'gyur zhing // mtshon chas kyang ni 'jig par 'gyur// g.yo rnams dang ni 'thab mo dang // nad kyang kun tu 'byung

395a3(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur/ / sdug pa'i chung ma dang yang 'bral// yang na bu mo 'chi bar 'gyur// skar mda' dag kyang lhung bar 'gyur// de bzhin nyi ma 'dra ba 'byung // pha rol
395a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi na dmag tshogs dang / / mu ge shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur// de yi glang po 'phangs pa dang // blon po 'phangs pa 'chi bar 'gyur// de yi 'og tu rnga mo ni// 'phangs pa dag kyang 'chi bar
395a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / khyim dang longs spyod nor rnams kyang // phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur// yul yul du ni mtshon cha yis// phan tshun dag tu 'debs par 'gyur// 'thab pa dag dang rtsod
395a6(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yo/ / yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// yul 'khor du ni gdon 'jug cing // mi bzad pa yi nad kyang 'byung // de yi 'og tu sbyin gnas kyang // chos dang ldan pa
395a7(rgyud 'bum): ma yin 'gyur/ / de yi 'khor dang blon po yang // chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur// chos dang mi ldan skye bo la// de yi 'og tu mchod byed 'gyur// chos dang ldan pa'i sem
395b1(rgyud 'bum): can la/ / rtag tu chad pas gcod par 'gyur// chos dang mi ldan skye bo bkur// chos ldan chad pas bcad pa na// der ni chu dang rgyu skar rlung // rnam gsum rnam par 'khrugs
395b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / chos min skye bo bzung bas na// dam chos ro yi snying po mdangs// sems can mdangs dang sa yi bcud// dngos po rnam gsum rnam par 'jig/ skye bo ngan pa
395b3(rgyud 'bum): rab bkur cing / / skye bo dam pa smad pas na// 'chi dang lce 'bab mu ge dang // rnam pa gsum ni der 'byung 'gyur// 'bras bu lo tog ro dang mdangs// de yi 'og tu med par 'gyur// sems
395b4(rgyud 'bum): can nad pa mang po dag/ yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dngar zhing che ba'i 'bras bu dag/ yul rnams la yang yod pa yang // kha ba dang ni tsha ba dang // chung ba dag ni nyid du 'gyur//
395b5(rgyud 'bum): dang dgod dang dga' ba dang // sdang chad dga' ba'i dngos po dang // dga' ba nyams ni mi dgar 'gyur// nyon mongs brgya yis rnam par 'khrugs// lo tog rnams dang 'bras bu ni// snum dngos
395b6(rgyud 'bum): khu ba zad pas na/ / lus dang khams dang dbang po la// de ltar tshim par mi 'gyur ro// sems can rnams ni mdog ngan zhing // mthu chung shin tu rid par 'gyur// kha zas mang po zos kyang
395b7(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / tshim par 'gyur ba ma yin no// stobs dang mthu nga brtson 'grus kyang // de yi 'og tu med par 'gyur// sems can brtson 'grus nyams pa dag/ yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur/
396a1(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs nad kyis gzir ba yi// sems can mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// srin po sna tshogs las gyur pa'i// gza' dang rgyu skar 'byung bar 'gyur// chos min
396a2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs la rab gnas te/ / rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pas// 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor na// khams gsum rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// gang tshe rgyal pos phyogs gnas te//
396a3(rgyud 'bum): nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe// 'di 'dra'i nyes pa du ma dag/ yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dgos pa gang phyir lha dbang gis// rgyal po byin gyis brlabs pa yi// rgyal po nyid
396a4(rgyud 'bum): ni mi byed cing / / nyes byed yal bar 'dor na ni// legs par byas pas sems can rnams// lha yi gnas su lhar yang skye// nyes par byas pas yi dgas dang // sems can dmyal
396a5(rgyud 'bum): dang dud 'gror skye/ / gang tshe rgyal po yul rnams na// nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe// sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams nas// nyes pa byas pas skur bar 'gyur// rgyal po nyid ni mi byed na//
396a6(rgyud 'bum): de ni bu yang ma yin la// lha yi rgyal po pa rnams kyis// gnas la nyes dang bcas par 'gyur// g.yo ni shin tu mi bzad pas// gang tshe yul 'khor 'jig 'gyur ba// de phyir lha yi/
396a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang po yis// mi gnas rgyal po byin gyis brlabs// nyes pa byas pa zhi ba'i phyir// legs par byed la dzad pa ste// tshe 'di la ni sems can la// rnam smin skyed pa rgyal po yin//
396b1(rgyud 'bum): legs byas dang ni nyes byas kyi// las ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras// rnam pa tha dad bstan pa'i phyir// byed pa gang yin rgyal por brjod// bdag gi don dang gzhan don dang // yul gyi
396b2(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi don gyi phyir/ / lha tshogs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs// lha rnams dag kyang rjes yi rang // phul 'khor rnams na skya bo ni// sdig can g.yon can gdul ba dang // yul gyi chos
396b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi don gyi phyir/ / srog dang rgyal srid rnams kyang ba dang // chos ma yin pa bzod byed cing // shes bzhin yal bar 'dor na ni// yul na 'jigs pa mi bzad pa// de 'dra gzhan ni long ma yin
396b4(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar g.yo rnams byung ba la/ / g.yo byed chad pas ma bcad na// yul du shin tu mi bzad pa'i// g.yo rnams phyir zhing 'byung bar 'gyur// glang chen rnams kyis rdzing chen bzhin// yul
396b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor de ni rnam par 'jig/ lha dbang rnams kyang khro bar 'gyur// lha yi gnas ni rnam par 'jig/ yul du dngos po thams cad ni// ma rungs par yang 'gyur bas na// de phyir sdig pa byed
396b6(rgyud 'bum): ba rnams/ / nyes pa'i rim bzhin gdul bar bya// chos kyis yul 'khor bskyang bar bya// chos ma yin pa spyad mi bya// srog kyang yongs su gtang bya zhing // nye mgon bya bar mi bya'o//
396b7(rgyud 'bum): skye bo gnyen dang skye bo gzhan// yul 'khor skye bo thams cad la// rgyal pos phyogs kyang gcig bya yi// phyogs su lhung bar gyur ta re// rgyal po chos dang ldan pa yis// grags pa 'jig
397a1(rgyud 'bum): rten gsum gang ste/ / sum cu rtsa gsum gnas rnams su// lnga yi dbang po dga' 'gyur te// 'dzam bu'i gling na nged kyi bu// 'di ltar chos ldan rgyal po yin// chos
397a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis yul 'khor der bstan nas/ / legs par byed la skye bo bkod// rgyal po de ni legs byed pas// skye bo dag ni 'dir 'gyed de// lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis// lha gnas gang bar byed snyam
397a3(rgyud 'bum): mo/ / chos kyis yul 'khor dar bstan pas// rgyal po rnams ni rab tu dga'// lha dbang rab tu dang gyur pas// mi yi rgyal po de la srung // nyi zla dang ni de bzhin du// rgyu skar legs par
397a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyu bar 'gyur/ / rlung yang dus su ldang 'gyur zhing // char pa'ang dus su 'bab par 'gyur// lha gnas rnams dang de bzhin du// yul 'khor rnams su lo legs byed// de lta bas na rgyal
397a5(rgyud 'bum): po yis/ / bdag gi khang pa'i srog gtang gi/ gang gis 'jig rten bde 'gyur la// dkon mchog chos ni mi gtang ste// yon tan rnams kyis gang brgyan pa// chos dang ldan pa bstan
397a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rang gi skye bos rtag dga' ba// rtag tu sdig pa rnam par spangs// chos kyis yul 'khor bskyang bar bya// chos kyang yang dag bstan par bya// legs par byed la sems can
397a7(rgyud 'bum): dgod/ / nyes byed las ni bzlog par bya// gang tshe sdig pa byed pa rnams// tshul bzhin 'dul bar byed pa'i tshe// yul 'khor du ni lo legs shing // rgyal po gzi brjid ldan par
397b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rgyal po grags dang ldan 'gyur zhing // skye dgu rnams kyang bde bar skyong // gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam
397b2(rgyud 'bum): tshig ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // gang tsha 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur// de tshe rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa rnams pa dang // gling bzhi rin chen gang bar
397b3(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa yang / / sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la ngas phul lo// chos kyi sku de yongs su btsal ba'i phyir// gang sngon yid du 'ong zhing 'phangs pa yi// dngos po de dag ngas ni ma btang med//
397b4(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa du mar 'phangs pa'i srog kyang btang // ji ltar sngon gyi bskal pa bsam yas na// rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bde bar gshegs// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde bar gshegs pa de'i//
397b5(rgyud 'bum): bstan la legs byung zhes bya'i rgyal po byung // de ni gling bzhi dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur// rgya mtshor thug pa'i sa la rab tu ston// rgyal dbang gsungs phyir rgyal po'i pho zang na// de tshe
397b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i dam pa gnyid kyis log/ rmi lam du ni sangs rgyas yon tan thos// chos spu rin chen sogs pa gnyid dkyil na// rnam par lhung nger mdo sde'i rgyal po 'idi// rab tu 'chad cing
397b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dug pa mthong bar gyur/ / rgyal po de ni gnyid kyis log las sar// de yi lus kun dga' bas khyab par gyur/ mgu nas rgyal po'i khab nas mngon byung ste// nyan thos dge 'dun
398a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi gnas su song / / rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams la mchod byed cing // 'phags pa'i dge 'dun 'di na rin chen sogs// yon tan ldan pa'i dge 'dun gang
398a2(rgyud 'bum): yod ces/ / chos smra rin chen sogs pa kun tu dris// de yi tshe na rin chen sogs pa ni// phug gzhan zhig gi nang du 'dug gyur te// mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni rnam sems la// kha ton byed
398a3(rgyud 'bum): cing bde bar rab tu 'dug/ dge slong chos smra rin chen sogs pa de// phun sum gzi brjid dpal gyis rab 'bar zhing // phug gzhan zhig gi nang du 'dug gyur pa// de yi tshe na rgyal po
398a4(rgyud 'bum): de la bstan/ / 'di na chos spu rin chen sogs pa 'di// rgyal po'i spyod yul zab mo 'dzin pa ste// gser 'od dam pa zhes ni bya ba yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rtag tu ston// rin chen
398a5(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i rkang la phyag 'tshal te/ / rgyal po legs par byung bas 'di skad smras// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal// zla ba nya ba'i zhal 'dra bshad du gsol// rgyal po legs
398a6(rgyud 'bum): par byung ba de nyid la/ / rin chen sogs pas khas ni blangs pas ni// stong gsum pa yi 'jig rten thams cad dri// lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur// de tshe mi yi dbang pos phyogs
398a7(rgyud 'bum): ni/ gtsang zhing mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa der// rin chen chu dang spos chus chag chag btab// me tog sil ma bkram ste khri bshams nas// rgyal pos khri de gdugs dang rgyal mtshan
398b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / dar yug stong phrag du mas legs par brgyan// rgyal pos khri der tsan dan dam pa dag/ rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang mngon par gtor// lha dang klu dang lha min mi'am ci// gnod
398b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin dbang dang mkha' lding lte 'bye ches/ / lha yi me tog man dar ba'i char// khrid la ni mngon par rab tu phab// chos 'dod lha ni bye ba khrag khrig stong // bsam gyis mi khyab gang dag lpags
398b3(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa/ / rin chen sogs pa mngon par byung ba na// sA la'i me tog dag gis mngon par 'thor// chos smra rin chen sogs pa de nyid kyang // shin tu lus bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos
398b4(rgyud 'bum): ta/ khri der nye bar song bar byas nas ni// thal mo sbyar ba byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// lha dbang dang ni lha dang lha mo rnams// bar snang 'dug nas me tog man da ra'i// char pa 'bebs shing
398b5(rgyud 'bum): sil snyan brgya stong phrag/ bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu sgrog par byed// rin chen sogs pa dge slong chos smra des// phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas bye ba stong // bsam gyis mi khyab
398b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dag dran byas nas/ / de ni mngon par 'dzegs te 'dug par gyur// sems can kun la snying brtse bskyed nas ni// snying rjes sems kyang yang dag bskyed byas te// rgyal po legs par byung ba
398b7(rgyud 'bum): de la ni/ / de yi tshe na mdo sde 'di bstan te// rgyal po thal mo sbyar byas 'dug nas su// tshig gcig gis ni rjes su yi rang ste// chos kyi shugs kyis mig nas mchi ma byung // de yi lus ni
399a1(rgyud 'bum): dga' bas khyab par gyur/ / mdo sde 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// de tshe rgyal po legs par byung ba yis// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rgyal po blangs// sems can rnams phyir
399a2(rgyud 'bum): smon lam btab pa ni/ / rin chen bdun dang ldan pa'i rgyan rnams dang // gang yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rnams// bde bar 'gyur ba'i nor ni chen po yi// char pa de ring 'dzam bu'i
399a3(rgyud 'bum): gling du phog/ / de yi tshe na rin chen sna bdun dang // dpung rgyan dang ni do shal rna cha mchog/ de bzhin zas dang skom dang gos rnams kyang // gling bzhi dag tu rab tu bab par gyur// rgyal po legs
399a4(rgyud 'bum): par byung bas 'dzam gling du/ / rin chen char pa bab pa de mthong nas// gling bzhi rin chen gang bar bcas pa ni// rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bstan la phul// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pang /
399a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po legs par byung zhes bya bar gyur// gling bzhi dag ni rin chen gang bcas kyi// sa 'di de tshe nga yis yongs su btang // gang gis rgyal po legs par byung de la// de tshe mdo sde 'di ni rab bstan
399a6(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / rin chen chos smra ba yi dge slong de// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs der gyur to// ngas ni gang tshe mdo sde 'di thos shing // tshig gcig gis ni rjes su yi rang ste// nga ni dge ba'i las ni
399a7(rgyud 'bum): de nyid dang / / chos mnyan pa dang rjes su yi rang dang // gser gyi mdog dang bsod nams brgya yi mtshan// blta na sdug cing mig tu mdog mdzes la// lha stong bye ba rab tu dga' byed pa// skye
399b1(rgyud 'bum): bo mthong na dga' lus rtag tu thob/ / bskal pa dag ni bye ba brgya stong phrag/ dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'khor los sgyur rgyal gyur// bskal pa brgya stong du ma mang por yang // ngas ni khams kyi rgyal por
399b2(rgyud 'bum): myong bar gyur/ / bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab brgya byin gyur// tshangs pa'i dbang po yid bzhin de bzhin no// gang dag tshad ni nam yang yod min pa'i// stobs bcu dpag med ngas ni mnyes par
399b3(rgyud 'bum): byas/ ngas gang mdo thos rjes su yi rang bar// bsod nams phung po de ltar tshad med mang // bsam pa ji bzhin ngas ni byang chub thob// chos sku dam pa yang ni ngas thob bo// gser 'od dam pa
399b4(rgyud 'bum): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ / legs par byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// // dpal ldan lha mo rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la ni//
399b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la// yo byad thams cad kyis mchod pa chen po shin tu rgyas shing / rgya cher bsam gyis mi khyab pa byed par
399b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod cing / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod yul zab mo yongs su shes par 'dod pa des gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i
399b7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kyang rung ste/ gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i phyogs der/ des gdon mi za bar g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis rna ba blags te
400a1(rgyud 'bum): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid 'khor la rgya cher brjod pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
400a2(rgyud 'bum): dag gsungs so/ / gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad la// bsam yas mchod pa byed 'dod cing // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ba// zab mo rab tu shes 'dod pas// gtsug lag khang ngam gnas
400a3(rgyud 'bum): khang ngam/ / gang na gser 'od dam pa yi// mdo sde dam pa 'di ston pa// sa phyogs der ni 'gro bar bya// mdo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste// yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yang yas// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho du
400a4(rgyud 'bum): ma las/ / sems can thams cad thar par byed// mdo sde yi ni thog ma dang // dbus dang de bzhin tha ma mthong // mdo sde'i dbang po rab zab ste// 'di la dpe ni yod ma yin// gang+ga dang ni sa rnams dang //
400a5(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho dang ni nam mkha' la// gnas pa'i rdul ni gang yang rung // dper bya bar ni mi nus so// chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa yis// de yi tshe na 'jug par bya// chos kyi bdag nyid mchod rten ni//
400a6(rgyud 'bum): zab mo rab brtan gang yin pa// mchod rten de yi dbus na ni// rgyal ba shAkya thub pa mthong // yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis su// mdo sde 'di ni rab tu ston// grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i//
400a7(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa bye ba ji snyed par// lha yi dang ni mi rnams kyi// bde ba dag ni rjes su myong // gang zhig mdo sde 'di nyan pa// de ltar bdag gi bsod nams kyi// phung po bsam yas sgrub mnyam du// de
400b1(rgyud 'bum): tshe des ni de ltar shes/ / mes gang 'obs kyis bskor ba yi// dpag tshad brgya dga' da' byed cing // tsher ba drag po bzod byas nas// mdo sde nyan par gang nus pa// gtsug lag khang ngam
400b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas khang du/ / zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni// sdig pa rnams ni med par 'gyur// rming na mtshan nyid thams cad dang // gza' dang rgyu skar gnod pa dang // byad dang gdon ni mi bzad kyang //
400b3(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni// thams cad gzhan du phyogs par 'gyur// klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis ni// rmi lam bstan pa ci 'dra bar// der ni pad+ma 'dra ba'i khri// de lta bur yang bsham
400b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / khri de la ni 'dug nas su// mdo sde 'di ni rab tu bstan// yi ger bris pa bklags par bya// de bzhi yongs su chud par bya// khri de las ni babs nas su// yul gzhan song bar
400b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur na yang / / khri de la ni yod pa yi// cho 'phrul rnams ni snang bar 'gyur// chos smra ba yi gzugs su yang // de na res 'ga' snang bar 'gyur// res 'ga' sangs rgyas gzugs su ste//
400b6(rgyud 'bum): res 'ga' byang chub sems dpa' yang // res 'ga' kun tu bzang po dang // de bzhin 'jam dpal gzugs su ste// res 'ga' byams pa'i gzugs su yang // khri de la ni snang bar 'gyur/
400b7(rgyud 'bum): res 'ga' 'od ni 'ba' zhig snang // res 'ga' lha rnams snang bar 'gyur// yud tsam zhig ni der snang nas// de nas mi snang bar yang 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong na bsngags par 'gyur//
401a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du yang grub par byed// 'bru dang bkra shis phun sum tshogs// mtshan ma sangs rgyas sprul pa yin// rgyal dang dpal dang grags par byed// phyir rgol ba yang
401a2(rgyud 'bum): zlog par byed/ / pha rol dgra tshogs rab tu 'joms// g.yul du dgra rnams phung bar byed// mya ngan thams cad zhi bar byed// sdig pa thams cad rab zhi byed// g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar
401a3(rgyud 'bum): byed/ 'dzam bu gling 'di thams cad du// grags pas rab tu gang bar 'gyur// de yi dgra rnams thams cad ni// shin tu pham pa nyid du 'gyur// rtag tu dgra ni choms par 'gyur//
401a4(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs// g.yul ngo'i rtse las rnam par rgyal// dgra dang bral zhing mchog tu dga'// tshangs dbang sum cu rtsa gsum dbang // de bzhin 'dzin rten skyong rnams
401a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // rgyal ba khyu mchog yang dag shes// klu yi dbang po ma dros dang // de bzhin du ni rgya mtsho dang // mi 'am ci dbang lha min dbang // de bzhin nam mkha'
401a6(rgyud 'bum): lding dbang po/ / de dag la ni sogs pa dang // lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang // chos kyi mchod rten bsam yas la// rtag tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur// zhe sar bcas pa'i sems can
401a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / mthong nas shin tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha yi dbang po mchog de dag/ thams cad 'di snyam sems par 'gyur// lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang // phan tshun du ni smra byed pa
401b1(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams dpal dang gzi brjid dag/ bsags pa de dag kun la ltos// dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa yi// mi rnams de dag 'dir lhags te// gang dag mdo sde zab mo 'di// nyan pa'i
401b2(rgyud 'bum): phyir ni 'dir lhags pa/ / dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas// chos kyi mchod rten gus dang bcas// de dag 'jig rten snying rje ldan// de dag sems can phan byed na// de dag zab mo'i chos
401b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi/ / dam pa chos kyi ro yi snod// chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa yis// de dag rab tu 'jug pa yin// gang dag gser 'od dam pa'i mdo// dge ba dam pa 'di nyan pa// de dag sngon
401b4(rgyud 'bum): chad sangs rgyas ni/ / brgya stong rnams la mchod pa yin// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni// mdo 'di nyan pa de dag la// lha dbang rgyal po de kun dang // dbyangs can dang ni de bzhin du//
401b5(rgyud 'bum): dpal dang rnam thos bu dang ni// de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams dang // gnod sbyin brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis// phyogs bzhi dag ni kun nas kyang //
401b6(rgyud 'bum): srung ba shin tu byed par 'gyur// dbang po zla ba gshin rje dang // rlung dang chu lha nyid dang ni// skem byed 'jug sel dbyangs can dang // sbyin sreg za dang skye dgu dang // stobs chen pha rol
401b7(rgyud 'bum): gnon byed pa/ / 'jig rten skyong ba de kun kyang // nyin mtshan g.yel ba med par ni// de dag rnams la srung bar byed// nor sbyin gnod sbyin dbang gnyis dang // sred med bu dang dbang
402a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag che/ / yang dag shes la sogs pa dang // gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // gnod sbyin brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis//
402a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs shing skrags pa thams cad ni// de dag la ni srung bar byed// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // gnod sbyin dog ni lnga brgya dang // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang // de
402a3(rgyud 'bum): dag la ni srung bar byed/ / gnod sbyin dbang po nor bu bzang // de bzhin gang ba bzang po dang // ji 'jigs dang ni 'brog gnas dang // dmar ser dang ni ser skya dang // gnod sbyin dbang
402a4(rgyud 'bum): po re re yang / / gnod sbyin lnga brgya dag gis ni// gang dag mdo sde 'di thos pa// de dag rnams la srung byed 'gyur// dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// rgyal ba khyu mchog rgyal po'i rgyal// nor
402a5(rgyud 'bum): bu'i mgul dang nges mgron dang / / de bzhin char pa'i bdag po dang // kham po che dang nag po dang // de bzhin gser 'dra'i skra dang ni// rdzas chen dang ni ra rkang dang // de bzhin skal ba
402a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang / / yur ba can dang chos skyong dang // spre'u de bzhin 'khri byad dang // khab kyi spu dang nyi bshes dang // de bzhin rin chen skra dang ni// yul chen can dang khyim med dang //
402a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i mchog dang tsan dan dang // mthu bo che dang gangs can dang // bde ba'i ri nyid de bzhin te// stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de kun kyang // gang dag
402b1(rgyud 'bum): mdo sde 'di dga' ba/ / de dag la ni srung bar byed// klu yi dbang po ma dros dang // de bzhin du ni rgya mtsho dang // e la'i 'dab dang btang bzung dang // dga' bo nye dga' gnyis ka dang /
402b2(rgyud 'bum): klu ni brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyang // 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad las// de dag la ni srung bar byed// stobs can sgra gcan mi gtong dang //
402b3(rgyud 'bum): thags zangs ris dang bde mchog dang // rab sim byed dang phrag rtsub dang // de bzhin lha min dbang gzhan dang // lha min brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis// /
402b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs skrag byung bar gyur pa las// de dag la ni srung bar 'gyur// 'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog ma ni// lnga brgya'i bu dang bcas pa yang // 'dug dang nyal dang ra ro'i tshe// de dag la ni srung
402b5(rgyud 'bum): bar byed/ / gdol pa mo dang gtum mo dang // de bzhin gnod sbyin gtum mo dang // mdung can dang ni so brtsegs dang // sems can kun gyi mdangs 'phrog ma// stobs chen pha rol gnon
402b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de kun kyang // phyogs bzhi dag ni kun nas su// de dag rnams la srung bar byed// dbyangs can dag la sogs pa rnams// lha mo bsam gyis mi khyab dang //
402b7(rgyud 'bum): dpal la sogs pa de bzhin du// lha mo dag ni thams cad dang // sa yi lha mo nyid dang ni// lo tog 'bras bu nags lha dang // kun dga' shing ljon mchod rten la// gnas pa dag dang rlung
403a1(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / / lha rnams de dag thams cad 'dir// rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis ni// gang dag mdo sde 'di dga' ba// de dag rnams la srung bar byed// tshe dang mdog
403a2(rgyud 'bum): dang stobs rnams la/ / sems can dag ni sbyor bar byed// dpal dang bsod nams gzi brjid kyis// phun sum tshogs pas rtag tu brgyan// gza' dang rgyu skar gnod pa dag/ de dag
403a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad zhi bar byed/ / rgung dang sdig dang mya ngan pa// de dag thams cad zhi bar byed// zab cing stobs chen ldan pa yi// sa yi lha mo nyid kyang ni// gser gyi 'od kyi dam pa yi// mdo sde'i
403a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang po'i ro yis tshom/ / dpag tshad dag ni brgya yi phrag/ stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad nas// rdo rje gnas la thug par du// sa yi bcud ni rab tu 'phel// dpag tshad brgyar ni tshang ba yi//
403a5(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu sa yi bcud song ste// de ni phyir yang log nas ni// sa yi steng dag snum par byed// mdo 'di mnyan pa'i stobs kyis ni// lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang // gser gyi 'od ni
403a6(rgyud 'bum): dam pa yi/ / mdo sde'i dbang po'i ros tshim 'gyur// mdang sa dang ldan par rab 'gyur zhing // de bzhin rab tu stobs ldan 'gyur// bde bar 'gyur zhing tshim par 'gyur// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di
403a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad na/ / 'bras bu lo tog nags lha rnams// sna tshogs ro yis tshim 'gyur zhing // shin tu rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// mdo 'di'i ro yis tshim gyur nas// 'bras bu rnams dang lo tog dang /
403b1(rgyud 'bum): me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'bras bu'i shing ljon sna tshogs kyang // kun nas rab tu skye bar byed// 'bras bu'i shing ljon thams cad dang // kun dga' dag dang nags tshal rnams// me tog
403b2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu chags byed cing / / sna tshogs dri ni rab tu 'byin// me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'bras bu sna tshogs ldan pa yi// rtswa dang nags tshal thams cad dag/ sa yi steng na skye bar byed
403b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad na/ / klu yi bu mo bsam mi khyab// rab tu dga' ba'i sems gyur nas// rdzing bu'i drung du nyer song ste// rdzing bu rnams ni thams cad du// ku mud dang pad+ma
403b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / ut+pal dang de bzhin du// pad+ma dkar po sna tshogs skyes// nam mkha' la ni du ba dang // sprin gyi dra ba med cing dag/ mun pa dang ni rdul med cing // phyogs rnams rab tu 'od
403b5(rgyud 'bum): gsal lo/ / nyi ma 'od zer stong ldan yang // 'od zer dra bas 'od kyang mdzes// snang ba dag ni zab mo yis// rab tu dga' bar 'char bar 'gyur// dbang po nyi ma lha yi bu//
403b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi ni// gzhal med khang na 'dug pa yang // mdo sde 'dis ni rab tu tshim// dbang po nyi ma rab dga' nas// 'dzam bu'i gling du 'char byed cing // 'od zer
403b7(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas dra ba yis/ / kun nas rab tu snang bar byed// de ni shar ba tsam gyis kyang // 'od zer dra ba rab gtong zhing // rdzing bu sna tshogs lebs pa yi// pad+ma dag ni kha yang 'byed/
404a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad du// me tog 'bras bu sman sna tshogs// yang dag yongs su smin byed cing // sa rnams thams cad tshim par byed// zla ba dang ni
404a2(rgyud 'bum): ma yang / / de tshe khyad 'phags snang bar 'gyur// rgyu skar yang dag 'byung 'gyur zhing // rlung yang de bzhin ldang bar 'gyur// 'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad du// kun tu lo yang legs
404a3(rgyud 'bum): gyur te/ / gang na mdo sde 'di yod pa// yul 'khor de ni khyad par 'phags// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas zhes bya ba kun tu bsrung ba'i
404a4(rgyud 'bum): le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
404a5(rgyud 'bum): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lnga'i bu stong phrag bcu po dag rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa ci 'dra ba dang / gang
404a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyis shing bsags pas skyes bu dam pa gsum po 'di dag byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob nas/ / da ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan pa'i slad
404a7(rgyud 'bum): du mchis na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog skyes bu dam pa 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bgrangs pa las 'das pa/ grangs ma mchis pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
404b1(rgyud 'bum): phrag du ma 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
404b2(rgyud 'bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ / bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
404b3(rgyud 'bum): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / / ci tsam na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
404b4(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos nub ste/ de'i bstan pa yongs ye thams cad du nub par gyur/
404b5(rgyud 'bum): pa na khye'u dngul gyi tog 'di de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshams sbyor zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa'i rgyal mtshan de nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
404b6(rgyud 'bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'dzam bu'i gsar gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / / ji tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
404b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas gser 'dzam bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i bstan pa yongs ye thams cad du nub pa'i bar du gyur pa na/ khye'u dngul gyi 'od 'di de bzhin gshegs
405a1(rgyud 'bum): ba de'i mtshams sbyor zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan de nyid du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
405a2(rgyud 'bum): stede bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo/
405a3(rgyud 'bum): sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser brgya'i 'od gser du snang ba'i snying po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes de dag thams cad/ bcom
405a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa'i lha'i bu stong
405a5(rgyud 'bum): phrag bcu po de dag ni de tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rlabs po cher yang ma gyur/ sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spad skad kyang mi gda'/ lag pa dang / rkang pa dang /
405a6(rgyud 'bum): mig dang / yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bu mo 'phangs pa dag sngon yongs su btang skad kyang mi gda'/ nor dang / 'bru dang / 'gron bu dang /
405a7(rgyud 'bum): gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / rin po che rnams sngon yongs su btang skad
405b1(rgyud 'bum): kyang mi gda'/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / khang khyim dang / gzhal med khang dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / rdzing bu dang
405b2(rgyud 'bum): lteng ka dag sngon yongs su btang skad kyang mi gda'/ glang po che dang / ba glang dang / rta po rgod dang / bran po dang / zan mo sna tshogs sngon yongs su btang skad kyang mi gda'
405b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs ma mchis pa phrag du ma de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ming du lung ma thob kyi bar
405b4(rgyud 'bum): du sngon bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs ma mchis pa du ma nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag grangs ma mchis pa du ma dag la mchod pa sna tshogs tha dad pa
405b5(rgyud 'bum): brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa phrag du ma dang / yo byad thams cad kyis mchod pa bgyid/ yongs su gtang bar bgyi ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang yongs su gtong la/ lag pa dang /
405b6(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa dang / mig dang / yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bu mo 'phangs pa yongs su gtang bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yongs su gtong / nor dang / 'bru dang / 'gron bu
405b7(rgyud 'bum): dang gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram yongs su gtang bar bgyi ba rnams yongs
406a1(rgyud 'bum): su gtong / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / khang khyim dang / gzhal med khang dang / kun dga' ra ba
406a2(rgyud 'bum): dang skyed mos tshal dang / rdzing bu dang / lteng ka dang / glang po che dang / ba glang dang / rta pho rgod dang / bran po dang / bran mo yongs su gtang bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yongs
406a3(rgyud 'bum): su gtong zhing / rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid/ rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag rdzogs nas bde ba brgya stong phrag mang po'ang
406a4(rgyud 'bum): myong bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa ci 'dra ba zhig gis 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu
406a5(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag bcu po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan pa'i slad du mchis pa 'di dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa du ma na//
406a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams sA la'i dbang po mthon pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de nyid du rigs dang rus gcig pa dang / ming gcig tu rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
406a7(rgyud 'bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ rab tu dang ba'i zhal ut+pa la'i dri brtsegs pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
406b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur zhes/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag
406b2(rgyud 'bum): bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi
406b3(rgyud 'bum): lha mo 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag gang byas shing bsags pas chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ da ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas 'dir lhags
406b4(rgyud 'bum): pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa yod/ de'i rgyu yod/ de'i byed pa yod de/ rigs kyi lha mo skyes bu dam pa 'di gsum gyis byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'di thos nas/ thos ma thag tu gser 'od
406b5(rgyud 'bum): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la shin tu ri mo byed cing dga' ba dang dang ba thob par gyur to/ / de tsam du bai DUR+Ya dri ma med pa ltar yongs su dag pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to// dri ma med pa
406b6(rgyud 'bum): shin tu rgya che zhing rgyas pa'i nam mkha' ltar zab pa sems rab tu dang ba dang ldan par gyur to/ / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su bzung ba dang ldan par gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo 'bar
406b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag de tsam du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu/ lhag par ri mor byed pa dang rab tu dang ba
407a1(rgyud 'bum): thob par gyur to/ / de tsam du bai DUR+Ya dri ma med pa ltar yongs su dag pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i phyir lung bstan pa'i sa rjes su thob bo// rigs kyi lha mo chos
407a2(rgyud 'bum): mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag da ltar bla na med
407a3(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i sa rjes su thob bo/ / rigs kyi lha mo sngon gyi smon lam de dag gang zhe na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/
407a4(rgyud 'bum): lha'i bu stong phrag bcu lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // rigs kyi lha mo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa/ rgyas
407a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde
407a6(rgyud 'bum): bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug tor can zhes
407a7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / / rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can de yongs su mya ngan las
407b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos nub par gyur te/ dam pa'i chos ltar bcos par gyur pa na/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba chos can/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos kyis rgyal srid skyong gi/
407b2(rgyud 'bum): chos ma yin pas ni ma yin te/ yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi pha ma lta bur gyur pa zhig byung ngo // rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lnga'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul du tshong
407b3(rgyud 'bum): dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya ba sman pa gso bar byed pa/ khams la mchog tu mkhas pa/ tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad kyi rgyud dang ldan pa zhig byung bar gyur to// kye rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i
407b4(rgyud 'bum): dus na tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya ba de'i tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ bstan
407b5(rgyud 'bum): bcos sna tshogs la mkhas pa/ bstan bcos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa/ yi ge dang / grangs dang / lag rtsis dang / rtsis rnams shin tu bslabs par gyur pa zhig byung ngo //
407b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od de'i yul de na/ sems can brgya stong phrag du mnad sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur cing / nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir to//
407b7(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ rtsub pa/ drag pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tsher ba rnams myong bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs de sems can nad sna tshogs
408a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag dum de dag gi don gyi phyir/ snying rje chen po'i sems skyes par gyur to// sems can brgya stong phrag du ma de dag
408a2(rgyud 'bum): ni nad sna tshogs kyis btab cing / nad sna tshogs kyis gzir te/ de ltar sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ rtsub pa/ drag pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tsher ba rnams myong la/ bdag gi pa tsheng dpon ral
408a3(rgyud 'bum): ba 'dzin sman pa gso bar byed pa/ khams la mchog tu mkhas pa/ tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad kyi rgyud dang ldan pa 'di ni rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs/ lam du zhugs/ na tshed rjes
408a4(rgyud 'bum): su thob pa/ / 'khar ba la rten cing 'dar cing / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su 'gro mi nus na/ sems
408a5(rgyud 'bum): can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag nad sna tshogs las yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid bdag gi pha ral pa 'dzin gyi gan du song
408a6(rgyud 'bum): la nad kyi phyir khams la mkhas par bya ba yongs su dris te/ khams la mkhas par bya ba dris pa des bdag grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang /
408a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i pho brang dang / 'khor rnams su 'gro bar bya'o// song nas kyang sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag du mngag nad sna tshogs las yongs
408b1(rgyud 'bum): su thar par bya'o snyam nas/ rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs rang gi pha ral pa 'dzin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rang gi pha ral pa 'dzin gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tsha
408b2(rgyud 'bum): tethal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis rang gi pha tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
408b3(rgyud 'bum): khams la mkhas par bya ba dris pa/ ji ltar dbang po 'jig 'gyur zhing // khams kyi rnams kyang yongs su 'gyur// gang gi dus na lus can la// nad kyi rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dus
408b4(rgyud 'bum): dang dus min zas zos pa/ / ji lta bar na bde bar 'gyur// gang gi lus kyi nang du ni// lus kyi mi la gnod mi 'gyur// rlung las gyur dang mkhris gyur dang // 'dus pa las gyur pad kan
408b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur/ rnga nad rnams zhi bar bgyi slad du// ji lta bur ni gso bar bgyi// gang gis mi la gnod 'gyur ba'i// rlung ni gang gi dus na g.yo// mkhris pa gang gi dus na g.yo// bad kan
408b6(rgyud 'bum): gang gi dus na g.yo/ / de nas tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin gyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis khams la mkhas par bya ba rnam pa bstan to// zla gsum dbyar te/
408b7(rgyud 'bum): zla gsum ston du shes// gsum ni dgu te gsum ni dpyid yin no// de ltar zla ba go rims 'di ste dus ni drug/ lo gcig la ni zla ba bcu gnyis 'dod// gsum gsum du ni tshogs rnams
409a1(rgyud 'bum): bsdus par shes/ / zla ba gnyis gnyis shing ni dus su bstan// zas dang skom ni de ltar 'jug par 'gyur// sman pa dang ni khams dang dus kyang bstan// dbang
409a2(rgyud 'bum): po dang ni khams rnams de dag kyang / / lo gcig nang gi tshigs tshigs yongs su 'gyur// dbang po dang ni yongs su 'gyur ba na// lus can rnams la sna tshogs nad rnams 'byung // de nyid la ni
409a3(rgyud 'bum): sman pas zla gsum bzhi/ / tshigs kyi bar dang dus drug rnams dang ni// khams drug mkhas par bya ba shes par bya// zas skom sman rnams go rims ji bzhin te// rlung gi shas che'i nad
409a4(rgyud 'bum): ni dbyar na ldang / / ston du gyur pa na ni mkhris pa g.yo// dgun gyi dus na de bzhin 'dus pa ste// bad kan shas che'i nad ni dpyid ldang ngo // dbyar ni snam dro la na tshwa skyur ba'i ro// ston ni dngar dang
409a5(rgyud 'bum): snum dang bsil bag go/ / dgun ni dang ra dang skyur dang snum pa ste// dpyid kyi dus na rtsub dro tsha ba'o// bad kan che ba zos ma thag tu ldang // mkhris pa che ba 'ju ba'i dus na ldang // rlung
409a6(rgyud 'bum): shas che ba zhu ma thag tu ldang / / khams gsum g.yo ba de ni de lta'o// rlung gi bdag nyid la ni bcud kyis gso// bkru sman gyis ni mabris pa bsal bar bya// 'dus pa la ni gsum dang
409a7(rgyud 'bum): mthun ldan pa/ / bang kan tshigs su bab na skyugs sman gdang // rlung shas tshe dang mkhris dang 'dus pa dang // bad kan shas che'i tshigs rnams shes par bya// dus gang khams dang lus ni gang
409b1(rgyud 'bum): yin pa/ / de yi sman dang bza' btung bsten par bya// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis khams la mkhas par bya ba 'di lta bu de tsam zhig yongs su dris pa des tshe'i rigs byed kyi yan lag brgyad
409b2(rgyud 'bum): po thams cad khong du chud par gyur to/ / rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na tsheng dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang /
409b3(rgyud 'bum): ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de thams cad du song nas/ sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag la
409b4(rgyud 'bum): kho bo ni sman pa'o zhes bdag nyid kyis khas 'ches te/ kho bos khyed rnams nad sna tshogs las yongs su thar par bya'o zhes dbugs phyung ngo // rigs kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis
409b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta bu'i tshig brjod pa de thos ma thag tu srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad rab tu dga' ba chen por skyes par gyur to/ / dbugs phyin pa rnyed nas kyang dga' ba dang / bde ba dang //
409b6(rgyud 'bum): yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag nad sna tshogs
409b7(rgyud 'bum): las yongs su thar te nad med par gyur to/ / nad med par gyur nas snga ma kho bzhin du mthu dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can nad sna tshogs
410a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag gi nang nas gang su dag nad drag pos btab pa de dag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs gal
410a2(rgyud 'bum): bder dong nas phyin pa dang / sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag la tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis sman dpyad gang ci bstan pa des//
410a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can de dag thams cad kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas so// nad med pa dang nad nyung bar gyur nas kyang snga ma kho bzhin du mthu dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur
410a4(rgyud 'bum): to/ rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams
410a5(rgyud 'bum): cad na/ sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis nad sna tshogs las yongs su thar par byas
410a6(rgyud 'bum): par gyur to/ / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ nad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // bam po lnga pa ste tha ma'o// /
410a7(rgyud 'bum): / rigs kyi lha mo gzhan yang rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul du tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis sems can thams cad kyi nad med par byas pas/ na ba nyung zhing snga mkho bzhin du spro ba dang
410b1(rgyud 'bum): stobs dang ldan pa'i lus su gyur to/ / rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na/ sems can thams cad dga' zhing rtse la dga' mgur spyod do// sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin/ bsod nams dag kyang
410b2(rgyud 'bum): byed de/ tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs la'ang tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs rgyal bar gyur cig/ rgyal bar gyur cig/ sman pa'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi nad gso ba mngon sum du byang chub sems
410b3(rgyud 'bum): dpar nges pa/ tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad pa thams cad rtogs pa zhes mngon par 'du byed do// rigs kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs de la/ chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba zhig yod de//
410b4(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi lha mo chu'i pad+ma'i snying po de la khye'u gnyis yod de/ gcig gi ming ni chu'i gos zhes bya/ gcig gi ming ni chu'i snying po zhes bya'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs khye'u
410b5(rgyud 'bum): de gnyis dang lhan cig tu mthar gyis grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su 'gro'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas dus
410b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin to/ / de nas 'brog dgon pa der sha za ba'i khyi dang / spung ki dang / wa dang / khA dang / bya dag gang na dgon pa na
410b7(rgyud 'bum): yod pa der rgyug pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i phyir sha za ba'i khyi dang spyang ki nas/ wa'i bar 'di dag phyogs 'dir rgyug snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te
411a1(rgyud 'bum): / bdag khyi dang / spyang ki dang / wa dang / bya rnams phyogs gang dang gang du rgyug pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs
411a2(rgyud 'bum): mthar gyis rgyu zhing song ste/ dgon pa na rdzi zhig yod pa der ga la ba der phyin to// rdzing chen po de na nya khri zhig gnas te/ des der nya khri phrag mang po zhig chu dang bral ba mthong nas/ de de la snying rje
411a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i sems skyes pa dang / de na lha mo zhig shing las lus phyed tsam phyung ba zhig mthong ste/ lha mo des tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu legs legs so//
411a4(rgyud 'bum): gang gi phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya ba khyod kyis nya 'di rnams la chu byin cig/ rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya ste/ gang chu 'bebs pa dang / gang chu sbyin pa'o// de bas na rang gi ming dang mthun
411a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bya ba byos shig/ chu 'bebs kyis slar smras pa/ lha mo nya 'di dag la ji skad cig mchis/ lha mos smras pa/ nya khri tham pa'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs mchog
411a6(rgyud 'bum): tu snying rje ba'i sems skyes so/ / rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing chen po na chu lhag ma cung zad tsam zhig lus te/ de nas nya khri zhig 'chi ba'i sgor zhugs shing / chu dang bral ba de
411a7(rgyud 'bum): dag rgyug cing rnam par rgyug go/ rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis phyogs bzhir brgyugs pa dang / nya khri bo de dag tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs phyogs gang du 'gro ba'i
411b1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs de logs su chu 'bebs la snying rje rje ltar lta'o/ / rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyis phyogs bzhir brgyugs te/ chu btsal yang der chu ma rnyed nas phyogs bzhir bltas pa
411b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / des ha cang yang thag mi ring ba zhig na shing ljon pa chen po mang zhig mthong nas/ shing ljon pa de dag la 'dzegs te shing gi yal ga rnams bcad nas/ shing gi yal ga de dag khyer te/
411b3(rgyud 'bum): rdzing chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / shing gi yal ga de rnams kyis nya khri po de dag la shin tu bsil ba'i grib ma byas so// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs rdzing der 'bebs
411b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i chu 'tshol te/ gang nas chu 'bab ces de phyogs bzhir brgyags kyang chu ma rnyed nas/ de myur ba myur bar chu'i rgyun de nyid kyi rjes su song ste/ rigs kyi lha mo dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing der chu 'bab pa zhes
411b5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i klung chen po de las/ der chu 'bab pa'i klung de'ang de'i tshe sdig pa can gyi sems can zhig gis nya khri bo de dag gi phyir/ ci nas kyang phyis nya de dag la chu 'bab par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyogs kyi
411b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yangs chen por klung de phab bo/ / de nas de mthong nas bsams pa/ klung 'di ni skye bo stong gis srol de nyid du dbab par mi nus na/ bdag gis lha dbab par ga la nus snyam nas der phyir log go/
411b7(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs rings pa rings par rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi rkang pa la mgo bos mchod de/ phyogs
412a1(rgyud 'bum): @#/ gcig tu 'dug nas/ de dag rgyas nas smras te/ bdag gis lha'i chabs 'og 'grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal thams cad du sems can gyi nad kyi rgyun ni bkum
412a2(rgyud 'bum): na gnas che ge mo zhes bgyi ba de na dgon pa na yod pa zhes bgyi ba'i rdzing zhig mchis pa de na nya khri zhig gnas pa de tsha ba dang bral nas gdugs kyis gdungs shing mchis te/ ji ltar mi rnams la btsal
412a3(rgyud 'bum): bltar/ ci nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de dag la'ang srog stsol bar 'tshal na/ lhas glang po che nyi shu zhig bdag la stsal du gsol/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis sman pa'i rgyal po chen
412a4(rgyud 'bum): po la glang po che nyi shu zhig byin cig ces blon po rnams la bsgo'o/ / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ sems can chen po glang po che'i lhas ga la ba der song la glang po che nyi shu khrid de/ sems can rnams
412a5(rgyud 'bum): la phan gdags pa dang bde bar gyis shig/ rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs rang gi bu chu'i gos dang / chu'i snying po dang lhan cig tu glang po che nyi shu khrid nas/ glang po che'i rdzi bo las
412a6(rgyud 'bum): b.lang gi rgyal pa brgya blangs te/ slar log nas chu ba'ab cas bya ba'i klung chen po gang du 'bab pa der song ste/ rkyal ba de dag chus bkang nas/ glang po che'i rgyab tu chu bkal te/ myur ba myur bar
412a7(rgyud 'bum): dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / chu de glang po che'i steng nas phab ste/ phyogs bzhi nas rdzing bu chus bkang nas phyogs bzhir 'gro ba dang / tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs
412b1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs gang du 'gro ba de logs su khri po de dag kyang rgyug go/ / de nas rigs kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i phyir mkhri bo 'di dag bdag gal ba der logs su
412b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyug snyam mo/ / de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ nya khro bo 'di dag ni bkres pa'i mes yongs su nyen nas bdag la bza' ba slong du nges kyis bdag gis kha zas sbyin par bya'o snyam nas/ rigs kyi
412b3(rgyud 'bum): lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyis/ rang gi bu chu'i gos la 'di skad ces smras so// bu glang po che thams cad kyi nang nas mgyogs pa'i mchog la zhon to/ bdag gi khyim du song la myur ba
412b4(rgyud 'bum): myur bar song ste/ mes po tshong dpon la/ kye mes po chu 'bebs kyi mchid nas khyim 'di na pha ma dang / spun dang / sring mo dang / zan pho dang / bran mo dang / las bgyid pa rnams kyi kha
412b5(rgyud 'bum): zas sbyar ba gang ci mchis pa thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ chu'i gos glang po che la zhon pa'i lag tu myur du rdzongs shig ces mchi'o// de skad gyis shig/ de nas khye'u chu'i gos glang po che la zhon
412b6(rgyud 'bum): nas myur ba myur bar rgyug cing rab tu brgyugs te/ rang gi khyim ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / de dag rgyus kyis zhib tu smras te/ de nas khye'u chu'i gos kyis sngar smos pa'i zas sbyar ba de
412b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad glang po che'i rgyab tu bkal nas glang po che de la zhon te/ dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing ga la ba der song ba dang / chu 'bebs kyis rang gi bu chu'i gos mthong nas dga' mgu ste bu las zas blangs
413a1(rgyud 'bum): nas/ phul te rdzing der gtor nas nya khri bo de dag tshim par byas te/ de 'di snyam du bdag gis dus gzhan zhig na/ dgon pa'i gnas shig na dge slong theg pa chen po klog pa las
413a2(rgyud 'bum): su 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan thos pa de bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye'o zhes thos kyis/ bdag gis nya de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i
413a3(rgyud 'bum): chos zab mo'ang bshad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can de'i mtshan yang bsgrags par bya'o snyam mo// de'i tshe na 'dzam bu'i gling de na sems
413a4(rgyud 'bum): can rnams kyi lta ba gnyis su gyur to/ / kha cig ni theg pa chen po la mngon par dad do// kha cig ni smod do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyis de'i tshe rdzing der rkang pa gnyis ka'i bus mo nub
413a5(rgyud 'bum): tsam du 'bogs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod pa de skad ched du brjod do// de
413a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ phyogs bcu dag na gang su dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ nga'i ming thos pa de dag de nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa
413a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig ces smon lamade skad btab bo/ / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyis/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de dag la chos 'di bshad
413b1(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung / 'di skyes pas 'di skye ba ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i
413b2(rgyud 'bum): rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen
413b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba
413b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag par 'gyur ba nas
413b5(rgyud 'bum): de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di 'ba' zhig kyang 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ / rigs kyi lha mo de ltar de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyis dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de
413b6(rgyud 'bum): dag la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di brjod nas/ rang gi bu chu'i gos dang / chu'i snying po dang lhan cig tu rang gi khyim du phyin pa'i bar du'o// de nas dus gzhan zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs
413b7(rgyud 'bum): dus sngon chen po zos nas chang gis ra ro ste ma la na nyal ba dang / de'i tshe de'i dus na ltas chen po byung bar gyur te/ mtshan mo de 'das pa dang nya khri po de dag 'chi ba'i dus su gyur nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
414a1(rgyud 'bum): @#/ rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so// skyes ma thag tu de dag 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis sems kyi rnam par rtog pa skyes te/ bdag cag dge ba'i las kyi rgyu gang gis sum cu
414a2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang 'dir skyes snyam mo/ / de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag 'dzam bu'i gling de na nya khrir gyur te/ bdag cag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa las tshong dpon/
414a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyis chu mang po dang / kha zas kyi mchog gis tshim par byas te/ bdag cag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i chos kyang bstan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
414a4(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan yang bsgrags pas/ dge ba'i chos kyi rgyud dang rkyen des bdag cag lha rnams kyi nang 'dir skyes kyis/ bdag cag tshed
414a5(rgyud 'bum): dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ de la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu khri po de dag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu
414a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bebs kyi khyim du lhags te/ de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs mal na nyal zhing 'dug pa de la/ lha'i bu de dag gis mu tig gi sa mo do khri ni mgo'i thad kar bzhag/ mu tig gi sa mo do khri ni
414a7(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa'i drung du bzhag/ mu tig gi se mo do khri ni g.yas logs su bzhag/ mu tig gi se mo do khri ni g.yon logs su bzhag ste/ pu sa mo nub tsam du me tog man da ra ba'i char chen po'ang
414b1(rgyud 'bum): phab lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang dkrol nas/ des 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyang gnyid sad/ tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyang gnyid sad do// de nas lha'i bu khri bo de dag kyang nam mkha'
414b2(rgyud 'bum): la dong sde/ lha'i bu de dag rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul gyi gnas dang / gnas gzhan du'ang me tog man da ra ba'i char pa 'bengs shing / dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing chen po ga la ba der dong nas/ de
