414b3(rgyud 'bum): dag gis rdzing chen po der me tog man nga ra ba'i char chen po phab ste/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas slar yang lha'i gnas su song ste/ de na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis dga' zhing rtse ste/
414b4(rgyud 'bum): dga' mgur spyod cing dpal dang skal ba bzang po dag kyang myong ngo // 'dzam bu'i gling du nam langs pa dang / rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis ltas de dag byung ba mthong nas skar mkhan dang blon po
414b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po rnams la smras pa/ ci'i phyir mdang sum ltas 'di dag byung / de dag gis smras pa/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyi khyim du mu tig gis mo
414b6(rgyud 'bum): dongo bzhi khri'i cher bab cing / lha'i me tog man da ra ba'i char yang bab bo zhes thos so// rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis blon po rnams la smras pa/ khyed deng la tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs
414b7(rgyud 'bum): la snyan pa'i tshigs gis bos shig/ de nas skar mkhan dang blon po chen po rnams chu 'bebs kyi khyim ga la ba der dong sde byin nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal
415a1(rgyud 'bum): bo lha'i dbang phyug 'od 'di khyod la 'bod do/ / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs blon po chen po rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od gal ba der song ba dang / rgyal
415a2(rgyud 'bum): bos smras pa/ du chu 'bebs mdang sum de 'dra ba'i ltas byung ba de ci'i lhas shes sam/ de nas tshong dben gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyis/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od la 'di skad ces smras so//
415a3(rgyud 'bum): lha bdag gis 'tshal te/ nya khri po de dag 'chi ba'i dus bgyis par nges so// rgyal pos smras pa/ ji ltar shes/ chu 'bebs kyis smras pa/ lha'i chu'i gos rdzing der nya khri po de dag
415a4(rgyud 'bum): gum mgum ltar stsal to/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar gyis shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyis khye'u chu'i gos la 'di skad ces smras so// bu song la dgon pa na
415a5(rgyud 'bum): yod pa'i rdzing bu'i nya khri po de dag shi 'am ma shi ltos shig/ de nas khye'u chu'i gos myur ba myur bar dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing chen po ga la ba der song ba dang / nya khri po de dag shi ba'i dus su gyur cing /
415a6(rgyud 'bum): me tog man da ra ba'i char chen po bab pa'ang mthong nas slar log ste pha la smras pa/ 'chi ba'i dus su gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyis khye'u chu'i gos las tshig de thos pa dang /
415a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ga la ba der song nas/ de dag rgyus nas zhib tu smras pa/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ nya khri bo de dag thams cad ni shi ba'i dus su gyur nas/ sum cu rtsa
415b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de dag dang bdag gi mthus mdang sum de lta bu'i dge ba'i ltas de dag byung ste/ bdag gi khyim du'ang mu tig gi se mo do bzhi khri dang / lha'i me tog man dar
415b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i char yang phab bo/ / de nas rgyal po dga' zhing mgu ste yid rang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// /
415b3(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shAkya lag na be con can de'i tshe
415b4(rgyud 'bum): de'i dus na rgyal po lnga'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya bar gyur to/ / rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi
415b5(rgyud 'bum): blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs zhes
415b6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyed sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na
415b7(rgyud 'bum): chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gnan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shAkya'i bu mo sa mtsho ma de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u rtsa
416a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bebs kyi chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/ / snga gcan zin ni de'i tshe nga'i dus na khye'u chu'i gos zhes bya bar gyur to// kun dga' bo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u
416a2(rgyud 'bum): chu'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/ / rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na nya khrir gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'bar ba'i khyad par
416a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri po 'di dag de'i tshe de'i dus na nya khri gyur te/ gang dag ngas chu dang zas kyi mchog gis tshim par byas shing / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
416a4(rgyud 'bum): zab mo'i chos kyang bstan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan yang bsgrags pa ste/ dge ba'i las kyi rgyu des nga'i
416a5(rgyud 'bum): gan du 'dir lhags te/ des na da lta bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// rab tu dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / gus par chos
416a6(rgyud 'bum): mnyan pas thams cad lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ming yang thob par gyur/ rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na shing gi lha mor gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o//
416a7(rgyud 'bum): re ci'i phyir se na/ rigs kyi lha mo khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na shing gi lha mor gyur te// rigs kyi lha mo rnam grangs 'dis na 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ ngas ji ltar sems can mang po byang chub tu
416b1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su smin par byas te/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i sa thob par gyur par rig par bya'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal ba
416b2(rgyud 'bum): las chu 'bebs kyis nya btul ba'i sngon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bdun pa'o/ / // rigs kyi lha mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan la phan pa'i phyir
416b3(rgyud 'bum): lus yongs su gtong ngo / / de ji lta zhe na/ dri ma med cing shin tu rgyas pa'i yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs brgya'i 'od zer sa dang lha yul rnam par 'phro ba/ thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang /
416b4(rgyud 'bum): stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor te/ yul lnga len gyi ljongs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas/ nags tshogs shig tu
416b5(rgyud 'bum): byon pa dang / der nges sngon zhing 'jam la mthing kar 'dug pa'i spang gi ngos me tog dri zhim pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sa phyogs shig gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang
416b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bos phyogs 'di ni mdzes pa ste/ 'di na gtam gyi gnas kyi mtshan ma yod kyis/ da de bzhin
416b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i gdamathings shig/ de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du gdan bting ngo // gdan bting nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gdan bting
417a1(rgyud 'bum): @lags na bcom ldan gtso bo mchog/ mi la mchog stsol dam pa srid bcings grol// bzhugs te mi la sman slad mthar bgyid kyi// bka' mchid dam pa bdud rtsi
417a2(rgyud 'bum): gsung du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs te/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed bya dka' bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rus
417a3(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams lta bar 'dod dam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// drang srong dam pa sems can mchog gi
417a4(rgyud 'bum): snying po la/ / bzod dang brtson 'grus che la zhi dang dul dga' zhing // blo gros dran dga' yon tan dpag med gnas gyur gyi// rus pa bdag cag blta ba'i dus lags de legs shod//
417a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong gi ri mo can dang / me tog ka ma la gsar du kha bye ba ltar 'jam pa'i phyag gis sa'i ngos la brdabs te bsnun ma thag tu
417a6(rgyud 'bum): sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul las byas pa'i mchod rten zhig de nas byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bkab
417a7(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mchod rten 'di bye zhig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas mchod rten phye ba dang / des der gser gyi 'phra can
417b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi nor bu dang mu tig gis khebs par g.yogs pa'i gser gyi za ma tog cig mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ga sar gyi
417b2(rgyud 'bum): za ma tog cig mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ za ma tog bdun po 'di dag thams cad phye zhig/ de bzhin du thams cad phye ba dang / des der rus pa'i kha
417b3(rgyud 'bum): dog kha ba dang me tog ku mu da dang 'dra ba dag cig mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rus pa dag cig gda' 'o// bcom ldan
417b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo skyes bu chen po'i rus pa rnams khyer te shog/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rus pa de dag blangs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
417b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das la phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rus pa rnams bsnams te/ dge 'dun gyi mdun du bzhag nas bka' stsal pa/ rus pa 'di dgayon tan mchog rab tshogs ldan blo gros
417b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ dul dang bsam gtan bzod par spro ba grags pa dam pa mchog/ phyir zhing byang chub 'di la rtag tu blo gros ldan byas shing // spro brtan mos dang blo gros rtag tu sbyin la dga' ba
417b7(rgyud 'bum): yin/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa'i rus pa tshul khrims dang yon tan gyis yongs su bsgos pa/ mchog
418a1(rgyud 'bum): tu mthong bar dka' ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa rnams la phyag tshol zhig/ de nas dge slong de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ 'dun pa'i yid kyis rus pa rnams
418a2(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten thams cad las
418a3(rgyud 'bum): mngon par 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa lags na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rus pa 'di dag la phyag bzhes/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe
418a4(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kun dga' bo rus pa 'di dag gisang 'di ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// /
418a5(rgyud 'bum): kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal po shing rta chen po zhes bya ba bzhon pa dang / stobs du ma dang ldan pa thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa zhig byung ste/ de la bu
418a6(rgyud 'bum): lha gzhon nu dang 'dra ba gsum zhig yod do/ / sgra chen po dang / lha chen po dang / sems can chen po'o// de nas rgyal po rtse ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba dang / gzhon nu de dag
418a7(rgyud 'bum): skyed mos tshal de'i yon tan la chags shing / me tog 'dod pas phan tshun rgyu zhing / nags stug po chen po bcu gnyis su zhugs so// de nas rgyal po'i bu ngag dong ba dang / gzhon nu'i
418b1(rgyud 'bum): rim gro pa rnams kyang rgyal bus bskrad nas phan tshun dong ste/ kun tu bsrungs pa'i skyed mos tshal chen po'i nags stug po bcu gnyis su zhugs so// de nas sgra chen pos/ nu bo gnyis la smras
418b2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ kho bo'i snying 'jigs pas non na/ 'dir bdag cag gcan gzan gyis gsad du 'ong gis tshur shog/ lha chen pos smras pa/ bdag la 'jigs pa ni ma mchis na/ skye bo sdug pa
418b3(rgyud 'bum): dang bral ba snyam bgyid pa'i snying du gyur to/ / sems can chen pos smras pa/ thub pas bsngags pa'i nags khrod dben pa 'dir// bdag ni mi 'jigs mya ngan ma mchis kyis// shin tu
418b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mchog don chen rnyed snyam ste/ / bdag gi snying 'dir rab tu dga' bar gyur// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag nags stug po bcu gnyis po de dag gi khrod du rgyu ba na/ stag mo bu byung nas zhag bdun
418b5(rgyud 'bum): len pa zhig pu lngas bskor ta/ bkres shing skom pas nyams dmad nas/ lus mchog tu nyam chung bar gyur pa de 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas sgra chen pos smras pa/ kye ma'o nyon
418b6(rgyud 'bum): mongs ma 'di bu byung nas zhag drug gam bdun zhig lon par gyur la/ da ltar zas ma rnyed pas yang ni na rang gi bu la za bar 'gyur/ yang na ni bkres pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// sems
418b7(rgyud 'bum): can chen pos smras pa/ nyon mongs ma 'di'i zas ci/ sgra chen pos smras pa/ 'di ltar gang sha gsar ba dang khrag dron mo yod na/ de ni stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / seng ge
419a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi zas yin no zhes zer ro/ / lha chen pos smras pa/ 'dir nyon mongs ma 'di bkres pa dang skom pa dang ldan pa'i lus su gyur pas/ srog gi lhag ma cung zad
419a2(rgyud 'bum): cig lus te/ rab tu nyam chung ba 'dis gnas 'dir zas skom tshel ni mi nus na/ 'di'i srog yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/ su zhig rang gi lus yongs su gtong bar byed cig gu/ sgra chen pos
419a3(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ kye rang gi lus yongs su gtang ba ni bya dka' ba'o// sems can chen pos smras pa/ bdag cag lta bu srog dang lus la mngon par chags pa/ blo chung ba rnams la ni tshul 'di
419a4(rgyud 'bum): bya dka' ba lags kyi/ gzhan lus yongs su gtong ba la zhugs pa/ gzhan la phan par brtson pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la ni dka' ba ma lags so// yang / snying brtse snying rje las
419a5(rgyud 'bum): byung 'phags pa'i sems can dag/ lha yul dang ni sa 'dir rang lus rnyed snya ma ste// gzhan gyi srog phyir mthun par dga' ba'i yid kyis ni// 'gyur ba med par 'dir na rnam pa brgya yis
419a6(rgyud 'bum): brtse/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de shin tu mi dga' ste/ stag mo de la mig mi 'dzums par ring zhig tu bltas nas song ngo // de nas sems can chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni bdag
419a7(rgyud 'bum): gi lus 'di yongs su gtang ba'i dus la bab bo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig cing 'gyes pa'i chos can mthar 'byed mtha' ngan pa// rnag can lus 'di zas dang skom dang mal na dang //
419b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhon pa 'os pa chen po dag gis rang bsrungs kyang // snga med rang gi rang bzhin mi 'dor byas don med// yang thams cad du mi gtsang bar gyur pas na de'i 'tshe ba med kyis/ da bdag gis
419b2(rgyud 'bum): de las bzang po la sbyar bar bya'o/ / de'i phyir bdag skye ba dang 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal ba'i gru bo che lta bur 'gyur ro// yang snying po med lus dbu ba 'dra la srin bu brgyas gang byas pa chud
419b3(rgyud 'bum): gzon pa/ / 'bras 'dra'i srid pa brgya ldan gcin dang phyi sa sa gang ba 'di btang ste// mya ngan med cing 'gyur med phung med dri med bsam gtan la sogs yon tan gyis// kun tu gang ba'i
419b4(rgyud 'bum): chos sku yon tan brgyas gang rdul dang bral ba thob par bya/ / de snying rje mchog dang ldan pa'i snying du gyur pas de ltar brtul nas khyed gnyis gshegs su gsol/ bdag ni rang gi bgyi ba zhig
419b5(rgyud 'bum): gi slad du/ nags stug po bcu gnyis su 'jug go zhes de gnyis bskrad do// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu sems can chen po nags 'a dab de nas slar log ste/ stag gi gnas su song nas/
419b6(rgyud 'bum): nags kyi yal ga la gos gzar te/ bdag ni 'gro la phan phyir byang chub mtshungs pa med bzhin zhi ba thob 'dod de// gzhan gyis gtang bar dka' ba'i lus ni blo gros 'gyur ba med pa'i
419b7(rgyud 'bum): snying rjes sprin/ / bdag gis skyon med byang chub rin med rgyal sras rnams kyis gnyer ba thob par shog/ bdag gis srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'jigs las 'jig rten gsum po bsgral
420a1(rgyud 'bum): @bar bya/ / zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas sems can chen po stag mo'i mdun du nyal ba dang / de nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la stag
420a2(rgyud 'bum): mos ci'ang ma byas so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kye ma'o 'di ni nyam chung bas mi nus so snyam nas langs te/ snying brtse ba'i blo gros kyis mtshon cha btsal na gang nas kyang mtshon ma
420a3(rgyud 'bum): rnyed nas/ des 'od ma'i yal ga lo brgya lon pa sra ba zhig blangs te/ bdag gi mgul ba bcad nas stag mo'i mdun du 'gyel to// byang chub sems dpa' 'gyel ma thag tu chu'i dbus
420a4(rgyud 'bum): su son pa'i gru rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin du sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ / nyi ma'ang sgra gcan gyis zin pa bzhin du 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes pa med do// lha'i spos dang phye ma dang
420a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dres pa'i me tog gi char yong bab bo/ / de nas lha zhig gis ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i yid kyis byang chub sems dpa' la bstod pa/ blo gros bzang po khyod 'dir ji ltar thugs rjes sems
420a6(rgyud 'bum): can rnams khyab ste/ / mi yi dbang po rab tu dgyes pas ji ltar sku 'dir btang bas na// skye ba dang ni 'chi ba'i don dang bral ba zhi pa gnas kyi mchog/ zhi ba gtsang ma khyod kyis 'dir ni tshigs
420a7(rgyud 'bum): med ring por mi thogs brnyes/ / de nas stag mo des byang chub sems dpa'i lus khrag gis spags pa la bltas nas yud tsam gyis sha dang khrag med par rus pa tsam zhig lus
420b1(rgyud 'bum): par byas so/ / de nas sgra chen pos sa g.yos pa de la bsams nas/ lha chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar phyogs bcu'i rgya mtsho'i mthar thug rgya mtshor bcas pa yi/
420b2(rgyud 'bum): sa 'dir rab tu g.yos shing nyi ma'ang 'od ni med gyur la// me tog char ba 'bab cing kho bo'i yid kyang 'khrugs pas na// de gzod bdag gi nu bos rang gi lus ni btang yang thag/ lha
420b3(rgyud 'bum): chen pos smras pa/ de ni ji ltar snying rje'i cho ga smras la// bkres dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal brgyas gtses pa// shin tu nyam chung rang gi bu la yang // za bar chas la lta bas
420b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag kyang dogs/ / de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis rab tu mya ngan gyis non nas// mchi mas mig gang ste lam de nyid nas slar log nas// stag mo'i drung du phyin pa dang /
420b5(rgyud 'bum): gos thams cad ni 'od ma'i yal ga la gzar/ rus pa rnams ni bye zhing bral/ khrag ni rdzab tu gyur/ skra ni phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'thor ba mthong ngo // mthong nas
420b6(rgyud 'bum): brgyal te rus pa'i steng du 'gyel nas ring zhig lon pa dang / 'du shes rnyed de langs nas lag pa bsgreng ste nyam thag pa'i sgra byung ngo // kye ma'o nu bo sdug pa dang ni rgyal po dang / de
420b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du ni bu la rab tu gdung ba'i ma/ / pad+ma 'dra ba mig ring khyod kyi sa gar bzhag ces// ma ni bdag cag la yang tha chung 'dra bar 'gyur// kye ma bdag cag gnyis ni sa phyogs
421a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid du/ / shin legs kyis gson na de lta ma yin no// sems can chen po med par gyur pas bdag cag la// pha ma dag gis ji ltar lto ba ster bar 'gyur//
421a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis kyis/ snying rje rje skad du rnam pa mang por ngus nas dong ngo // de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu'i rim gro pa rnams kyang gzhon nu 'tshol zhing phyogs dang phyogs
421a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshams su brgyugs pa dang / gcig gis gcig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang gzhon nu ga ra gzhon nu ga re zhes 'dri'o// de'i tshe btsun mo malan nyal ba'i rmi lam na/ sdug pa dang bral
421a4(rgyud 'bum): barmis pa 'di lta ste/ nu ma gnyis bcad pa dang / so phyung ba dang / thi ba'i phrug gu skrag pa gsum zhig rnyed pa las gcig khras khyer ba mthong ngo // de nas btsun mo sa
421a5(rgyud 'bum): g.yos pas snying dngas te/ mod las sad nas sems pa la zhugs te/ 'byung po'i rten ma rgya mtsho'i gos can 'di ni kun tu rab g.yo ci zhig gu// nyi ma 'od zer med par
421a6(rgyud 'bum): gyur pas nga yi snying la mya ngan 'gyur bar ston/ / nga yi lus ni num zhing mig kyang g.yol rang gi num bcad rmis pa// nga yi bu rnams nags khrod 'dir ni rtser dong ba la dge bar 'gyur ram kye//
421a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas de snyam bsams pa dang / bran mo'ang snying myos te 'ongs nas btsun mo la smras pa/ jo mo gzhon nu'i rim gro pa dag gzhon nu 'chol zhing mchis na/ rngo co stor ces gda' 'o// de skad
421b1(rgyud 'bum): ces zos ma thag tu btsun mo'i snying 'dar zhing mig dang gdong mchi mas gang ste/ rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa/ lha bdag gi bu sdug pa stor ces thos so// rgyal po'ang snying 'dar zhing shin
421b2(rgyud 'bum): tu myos te/ kyi hud bdag gi bu sdug pa dang bral ba lta zhes smra'o// de nas rgyal pos btsun mo dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir nga gzhon nu btsal ba la nan tan du byed kyis/ bzang mo mya ngan ma byed cig/ der
421b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu 'chol ba la zhugs pa na/ skye bo'i tshogs dag ro rod por gyur to// de nas ring por ma lon par rgyal pos rgyal bu gzhon nu gnyis rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang smras
421b4(rgyud 'bum): pa gzhon nu de dag ni 'ong na thams cad ni ma yin te/ kyi hud bu dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o// ji ltar bu dang bral bar gyur na yid ni mi bde ba// mi rnams bu rnyed pa ni dga'
421b5(rgyud 'bum): ba ma yin no/ / 'jig rten na ni gang dag bu med pa dang shi ba'am// mi rnams gang dag bu gson de dag bde ba yin nam ci// de nas btsun mo shin tu mya ngan gyis non nas/ rnga mo gnad du
421b6(rgyud 'bum): bsnun pa bzhin du shin tu mi bzad pa'i sgra phyung ngo / / de ltar bu dag gsum ni g.yog gi tshogs bcas te// me tog rnams kyis gang ba'i nags khrod zhugs pa las// bdag gi bu dge tha
421b7(rgyud 'bum): chung 'ongs par ma gyur na/ / bdag gi snying dang 'dra ba'i tha chung de ga re// de nas de gzhis lhags pa dang / rgyal pos bu la dris pa/ khye'u tha chung ga re zhes gzhon nu gnyis la dris pa
422a1(rgyud 'bum): dang de nas mya ngan gyis 'am thag cing mig mchi mas gang ste/ rkan dang / mchu dang / kha dang / so bskams nas cang mi zer ro// btsun
422a2(rgyud 'bum): mos spras pa/ kho mo'i bu sdug tha chung dag re// kho mo'i snying 'di gsal thug gyur cing // lus ni mi bzad rab tu gzir gyur te// kho mo'i dran pa nyams 'gyur myur du smos/ de
422a3(rgyud 'bum): nas gzhon nu de gnyis kyis ji ltar gyur pa de bzhin du smras so/ / de thos ma thag tu rgyal po dang btsun mo myos par gyur te/ myos pa sangs nas snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing phyogs der song ste/ de nas
422a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po dang btsun mos rus pa de dag sha dang / khrag dang / rgyas pa med cing / skra phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'thor ba mthong nas/ shing rlung gis btab pa bzhin du 'gyel to//
422a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas nye phan dang blon po dag gis de ltar gyur pa de mthong nas/ chu dang ri ma la ya'i tsan dan gyi lde gus rgyal po dang btsun mo'i lus bsil bar byas so// de nas ring zhig lon pa dang 'du
422a6(rgyud 'bum): shes rnyed de rgyal po langs te snying rje rje skad du 'dod pa/ kye ma bu sdug yid 'ong mthong dga' ba// 'chi bdag dbang du ci phyir myur du song // 'chi bdag ci phyir nga la sngar ma 'ongs// nga la sdug
422a7(rgyud 'bum): bsngal 'di las gzhan mi 'byung / / btsun mo'ang myos pa las sangs nas/ skra gzhig cing lag pa gnyis kyis drang brdungs te/ nya thang la phyung ba bzhin sa'i steng du 'gre ldog cing
422b1(rgyud 'bum): ma he be'u stor ba dang / rnga mo rnge'u stor ba bzhin du snying rje rje skad du du'o// kye ma sdug cing gces pa'i bu ni pad+ma 'di// su yis sa yi steng du bshig nas rab tu gtor// yid bong mig ldan
422b2(rgyud 'bum): zla 'dra'i bzhin can bdag gi bu/ / bdag gi dgra bo gang gis de ring sa 'dir bcom// kye ma sa 'dir bu mchog bsad mthong na// lus 'di ci phyir de ring zhig ma gyur// sdug bsngal 'di 'dra
422b3(rgyud 'bum): mthong yang ma gas pas/ / bdag gi snying 'di lcags ni yin yang dag/ de ring rmi lam du ni bdag gi nu ma 'ga' zhig gis ni ral gris bcad// so yang phyung bas de ring bdag gi bu sdug de
422b4(rgyud 'bum): ni myur du ma rungs gyur/ / bdag gis thib phrug gu gsum zhig rnyed pa gcig 'dir ji ltar khras khyer bzhin// bdag gi bu gsum dag gis bskor ba las kyang gcig ni de ring bachi bdag khyer//
422b5(rgyud 'bum): kye ma sdig pa can gyi rmi lam de yi 'bras bu grub pa 'di yin no// de nas rgyal po dang btsun mo snying rje rje skad du rnam pa mang por smra zhing rgyan thams cad bkrol nas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan
422b6(rgyud 'bum): cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas/ gzhon nu'i rus pa rnams phyogs 'dir bzhag go// kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu sems can chen po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan
422b7(rgyud 'bum): zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu sems can chen po zhes bya bar gyur to// kun dga' bo 'dod chags dang /
423a1(rgyud 'bum): zhe sdang dang / gti mug las yongs su ma grol ba de'i tshe yang / sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal la sangs 'gro ba thams cad la phan btags na/
423a2(rgyud 'bum): skyon thams cad dang bral te/ yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa da ltar lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ltar sems can re re'i phyir yang sems can dmyal ba rnams su bskal par gnas
423a3(rgyud 'bum): par spro zhing / skye ba'i 'khor ba las rnam par bsgral lo// sems can gyi snying pos shin tu bya dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs du mas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btags so// de nas bcom
423a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ / byang chub mchog 'di yongs su 'tshal ba na// bskal pa mang por ngas ni lus btang ste// ji ltar rgyal po
423a5(rgyud 'bum): dang ni rgyal bur gyur/ / de ltar des ni lus rnams yongasu btang // sngon gyi skye ba rnams ni rjes dran te// shing rta chen po zhes bya'i rgyal po byung // de la bu ni gtong ba che ldan la//
423a6(rgyud 'bum): sems can chen po zhes bya dam pa yod// de la phu bo dag ni gnyis yod do// ming ni sgra chen po dang lha chen po// dpung tshogs de dag nags tshal stug por dong // de dag stag mo
423a7(rgyud 'bum): bkres pas gzir ba mthong / / de la sems can mchog 'di snying rje skyes// stag mo 'di ni bkres skom gari rabs na// stag phrug de dag za bar 'gyur 'ong gis// de ltar
423b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag lus dag ni gtang bar bya'o/ / shing rta che bu sems can ches// stug mo bkres mthong stag drug rnams// thar bar bya phyir snying rje yis// ri ngos gzar nas mchongs pa
423b2(rgyud 'bum): dang sa ni ri dang bcas su g.yos/ / bya tshogs rnam mang rnam par 'thor// ri dgas tshogs skrag 'jig rten 'di// mun pas 'thibs por gnas par gyur// de yi phu'o
423b3(rgyud 'bum): sgra chen dang / / de bzhin lha chen de gnyis kyis// nags mchog chen po der bltas na// sems can chen po ma rnyed nas// shin tu mya ngan zug rngu'i snying // dran med
423b4(rgyud 'bum): nags kyi nang na rgyu/ / nu bo de ni yongs 'tshol zhing // gdong la mchi zag nags khrod rgyu// sgra chen de bzhin lha chen po// rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag gnyis// stag
423b5(rgyud 'bum): mo nyam chung gar nyal ba/ / der ni nye bar spong ba dang // stag mo dang ni stag phrug gi/ stag gi mtshul khrag chags mthong // skra dang rus pa cung zad cig/ sa la
423b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'thor ba mthong / / de yi khrag gi thigs pa ni// nyung zhig sa la yod par gyur// rgyal po'i bu ni de gnyis kyis// khrag chags pa yis de mthong // rab
423b7(rgyud 'bum): tu brgyal te sa de la/ / 'gyel nas yid ni nyams par gyur// lus rnams la ni rdul gyis gos// dran dbang nyams shing sems kyang myos// de dag gi ni 'khor
424a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang / / snying rngur ngu zhing mya ngan non// de dag chus ni rab 'thor zhing // lag pa bsgreng ste ngu zhing gnas// de ni 'gyel ma thag tu yang // btsun
424a2(rgyud 'bum): mo gces mchog skyed pa'i ma/ / bud med dag ni lnga brgya dang // pho brang nang na bde 'dug pa// nu sor gnyis ka'i rtse mo nas// 'o ma zag tu 'byung zhing 'dzag/ de yi lus dang
424a3(rgyud 'bum): yan lag kun/ / khab kyis gtsags pa bzhin du tsha// snying ni rab tu mya ngan gang // bu bral mya ngan drag mdas phog/ rgyal po'i gan du nyer song ste// mya ngan rab gdungs yid
424a4(rgyud 'bum): mi dga'/ / snying rje'i sgra yis rab ngu zhing // rgyal po shing rta cha la smras// mi dbang rgyal po bdag la gson// bdag lus mya ngan me yis 'tshig/ bdag gi nu sor rtse gnyis
424a5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ 'o ma khrag tu rab tu 'byung // bdag lus khab kyis gtsigs bzhin tsha// bdag gi snying yang gsal thug/ ji ltar sdug pa'i bu rnams ni// phyin chad mi mthong 'di
424a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dra'i ltas/ / bdag gis bu rnams de ltar 'tshal// thugs rjes mdzod de bdag srog stsol// de ring bdag gi rmi lam na// thi ba'i phrug gu gsum rnyed na// bdag
424a7(rgyud 'bum): gi thi ba phrag gu ni/ / sdug cing yid 'ong gang lags pa// der ni khra mchis bdag gi ni// thib phrug gu de khras 'tshal// bdag gi rmi lam de 'dra yi// mya ngan snying 'di
424b1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu zhugs/ / sems ni mya ngan rab gdungs pas// bdag ni ring por mi thogs 'gum// bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal// thugs rje ldan pa bdag srog sgrol// de
424b2(rgyud 'bum): skad smras nas btsun mo mchog/ brgyal nas sa der 'gyel bar gyur// dran pa'i dbang po rnam par nyams// sems kyang stor cing dran pa med// btsun mo'i 'khor tshegs
424b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyang / / snying rje'i skad kyis rab tu ngu// btsun mo dam pa brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel ba mthong nas ni// da ma thag tu rgyal dbang de// bu dang bral ba'i mya ngan non//
424b4(rgyud 'bum): blon po dang ni 'khor rnams kyang // gzhon nu rnams ni btsal phyir dong // grong khyer kun gyi skye bo dag/ tha dad khyim na byung zhing 'khod// ngu zhing gdong nas mchi ma zag/ lam kar
424b5(rgyud 'bum): spring stobs che de 'dri/ / gson nam 'on te shi 'am ci// sems can chen po de gar song // bdag cag de ring mthong zhig gam// yid 'ong sems can mthong re dga'// de ring
424b6(rgyud 'bum): mi snyan thos gyur cing / / yul 'dir mya ngan mi bzad rlung // sgra mi phyin cing sgyu mtha' yas// drag po'i sgra bcas ldan zhig gam// rgyal po shing rta che langs te// mya ngan non cing
424b7(rgyud 'bum): ngu bzhin du/ / btsun mo dam pa sar 'gyel la// bdag nyid chu la rgyun yang 'thor// ji srid dran rnyed ldan gyur pa// de srid du ni chu yis gtor// bdag bu gum ma ma gson
425a1(rgyud 'bum): zhig ces/ / zhum pa'i yid kyis 'dri bar byed// rgyal po shing rta chen po mis// btsun mo mchog la 'di skad smras// rnon po dag dang 'khor rnams
425a2(rgyud 'bum): kyang / gzhon nu rnams ni 'tshol phyir dong // khyod ni rab tu yid zhum zhing // rtag tu mya ngan snying ma byed// de ltar shing rta chen po yis// btsun mo dam pa spro bsrings te//
425a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po pho brang nas byung nas// mya ngan non cing ngu bzhin du// blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor te// yid ni rab zhum lus kyang zhan// srog chags brgya phrag mang po yang //
425a4(rgyud 'bum): ngu zhing mchi ma zag bzhin rgyug/ rgyal bu rnams ni btsal ba'i phyir// grong khyer gyi ni mchog nas byung // rgyal po byung ba mthong nas ni// rgyal po'i phyi bzhin kun tu 'brang //
425a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po shing rta chen po ni// grong khyer nas byung de ma thag/ sdug pa'i bu ni blta ba'i phyir// rgod pa'i mig gis phyogs su bltas// mgo bregs yan lag khrag sbags
425a6(rgyud 'bum): shing / lus la rdul gyis gos gyur la// gdong la mchi zag du bzhin du// 'ong ba'i mi zhig mthong nas ni// shing rta chen po'i snying la yang // rab tu mi bzad mya ngan
425a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / ngu zhing gdong la mchi ma zag/ lag pa bsgrengs te ngu zhing 'dug/ de nas blon po gzhan zhig gis// rgyang ring myur du rings par 'ongs// 'ongs nas mi dbang
425b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po ni/ / shing rta che la 'di skad smras// mi dbang thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ khyod sras yid du 'ong ba mchis// ring por mi thogs khyod kyi gan 'dir ni// sras mchog
425b2(rgyud 'bum): yid 'ong mchi ba khyod kyis gzigs/ / rgyal po yud tsam lam du zhugs pa dang // de nas blon po chen po gnyis pa 'ongs// rdul chags dri ma can gyi gos gyon cing // mchi
425b3(rgyud 'bum): ma'i gdong gis rgyal la 'di skad smras/ / rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras gnyis ni// mya ngan ma yis rab tu gdungs shing gnas// rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog gcig mi gdab//
425b4(rgyud 'bum): sems can chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin// stag mo bu byung ring por ma lon pa// rang gi bu rnams za bar 'dod pa mthong // de dag la ni gzhon nu sems can ches// snying rje
425b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po ldan pas sems bskyed nas/ / byang chub tu ni smon lam che btab pa// sems can thams cad bdag gis sgrol bar bya// byang chub zab mo rgya chen 'dod pa la// ma 'ongs
425b6(rgyud 'bum): dus na bdag gis reg par bya/ / sems can chen po ri ngos gzar nas mchongs// stag mo bkres pas non pa de langs te// yud tsam gyis ni lus la sha med byas// rgyal
425b7(rgyud 'bum): po'i bu ni rus pa nyi tshe lus/ / ma rungs pa yi tshig ni de thos nas// rgyal po shing rta chen po brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel nas sems kyang stor bar gyur// mya ngan me ni shin tu
426a1(rgyud 'bum): mi bzod 'bar/ / 'khor dang blon po snying rje'i skad kyis ni// du zhing mya ngan non bzhin de dag kyang // chur 'thor lag pa bsgrengs te rab tu ngu// blon po
426a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum pas rgyal la smras pa ni/ / bdag gis de ring gzhon nu gnyis po dag/ nags chen de na rab tu brgyal gyur cing // sa la 'gyel te sems kyang stor mthong nas// dran pa/
426a3(rgyud 'bum): rnyed de langs kyi bar du ni// bdag cag rnams kyis chab kyis rab tu gtor// phyogs bzhi dag ni kun nas 'bar ba mthong // yud tsam 'greng ste slar yangs la 'gyel//
426a4(rgyud 'bum): snying rje'i skad kyis smre sngags rab tu 'don// rtag par lag pa bsgrengs te gnas nas ni// nu bo de yi bsngags pa rab tu brjod// rgyal po de ni rab tu sems zhum zhing // du dang
426a5(rgyud 'bum): dral bas non nas sems kyang 'khrugs/ / mya ngan rab tu gdung zhing smre sngags 'don// rgyal po de ni 'di snyam yongs su sems// bdag bu sdug cing yid bang gcig pu ni// sems
426a6(rgyud 'bum): can chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin/ / bdag gi bu ni gnyis po de dag kyang // mya ngan me yis srog ni zad 'ong gis// 'di ltar bdag ni myur du deng song la// mthong na dga'
426a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i du dag blta bar byas/ / bzhon pa mgyogs pas rgyal po'i pho brang gi/ rgyal po'i khab tu myur du dkri bar bya// de dag rnams ni skyed pa'i ma yi snying // mya ngan me yis
426b1(rgyud 'bum): gas par 'gyur du 'ong / / bu gnyis mthong nas zhi ba 'thob 'gyur te// srog dang bral bar gyur pa ma yin no// rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor nas// glang chen
426b2(rgyud 'bum): zhon te bu rnams blta phyir song / / bu gnyis snying rje'i skad kyis rab ngu zhing // nu bo'i ming 'dod lam nas 'ongs pa mthong // rgyal pos bu de gnyis ni khrid nas su// rab tu ngu
426b3(rgyud 'bum): zhing khyim du song nas ni/ / de yis skyen par la gor myur du yang // btsun mo la ni rang gi bu rnams bstan// shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa nga // sngon gyi rgyal po shing rta chen po
426b4(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / bu ste sems can chen po mchog gyur cing // gang gis stag mo bde bar byas pa yin// rgyal po'i dbang po'i dam pa zas gtsang ni// shing rta cha zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur// /
426b5(rgyud 'bum): btsun mo'ang btsun mo dam pa sgyu mar gyur// sgra chen po ni byams par gyur pa yin// rgyal bu lha chen po yang de bzhin du// de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin// stag mor
426b6(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa skye dgu'i bdag me che/ / stag phrug rnams ni dge slong lnga por gyur// de nas rgyal po shing rta chen po dang btsun mos snying rje bar smre sngags rnam pa mang po bton nas rgyan thams cad
426b7(rgyud 'bum): bkrol te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas/ sems can chen po'i rus pa 'di dag sa phyogs 'di nyid du bzhag ste/ rin po che sna bdun
427a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi mchod rten 'di byas so/ / sems can chen po 'dis stag mo la lus yongs su btang nas/ lus yongs su btang ba 'dis phyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus
427a2(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa rnams su'ang sems can la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya'o zhes smon lam de skad btab bo/ / bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye
427a3(rgyud 'bum): dgu'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / mchod rten 'di 'dir bstan pa'i rgyu ni 'di yin no// rkyen ni 'di
427a4(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / mchod rten de yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sa de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// stag mo la lus yongs su
427a5(rgyud 'bum): btang ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bco brgyad pa'o/ / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas
427a6(rgyud 'bum): gdugs brtsegs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyags 'tshal
427a7(rgyud 'bum): tephyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshes sa pa gser dang
427b1(rgyud 'bum): rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / rgyal ba'i sku mdog bco ma'i gser 'dra ste// sku lus gser gyi mdog tu rnam
427b2(rgyud 'bum): par gda'/ / gser gyi ri dbang lta bu gser gyi mdog/ thub pa pad+ma dkar po gser mdog can// bzang po'i mtshan gyi mtshan gyis sku lus brgyan// dpe byad sna tshogs bzang pos
427b3(rgyud 'bum): sku lus spras/ / gse gyi 'od ltar mdzes pa rnam par 'bar// shin tu dri med zhi ba ri dbang 'dra// tshangs pa'i sgra dang sgra snyan tshangs pa'i dbyangs// seng ge'i sgra dang 'brug
427b4(rgyud 'bum): sgro bsgrags pa'i dbyangs/ / yan lag drug cu bsgrags sgra dri med sgra// rgyal dbyangs rma byA ka la bing ka'i sgra// shin tu dri med dri bral gzi 'od mdzes// rgyal ba bsod
427b5(rgyud 'bum): nams brgya yi mtshan gyis brgyan/ / mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho dri med dri bral mchog/ rgyal ba yon tan kun ldan ri rab 'dra// sems can rnams la phan par thugs brtse mchog
427b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dag na bde basbyin po'i mchog/ rgyal ba dam pa'i don rnams ston pa ste// mya ngan 'das pa'i dadi la 'dzud pa lags// 'chib med pa'i 'dob stsal bas/
427b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba bdud rtsi'i chos ni rab tu ston// 'ching ba med pa'i grong khyer 'dzud pa ste// bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas bde ba'i gnas// rgyal ba 'gro ba sdug bsngal thar par mdzod/
428a1(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni skye dgu sgrol// zhi ba'i lam la skye dgu rab tu 'dzud// skye dgu rnams la bde ba kun stsol ba// khyod la dpe ni bgyi bar mi nus te//
428a2(rgyud 'bum): ji snyed 'dren pa'i yon tan ye shes mtsho// srog chags kun la khyod kyi thugs rje dang // byams pa'i stobs dang thabs dang brtson 'grus dang // khyod kyi yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho las/
428a3(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por yang // yon tan thigs pa gcig tsam rab bstan par// lhar bcas 'gro ba'i nang na nus ma mchis// yon tan mtsho las yon tan thigs blangs te//
428a4(rgyud 'bum): de ltar bdag gis mdor bsdus cung zad bshad// bdag gi bsod nams gang bsags de yis ni// sems can de dag byang chub mchog reg shog/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
428a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang po'i rgyal po las/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog

442a2(rgyud 'bum): dag ni gtubs pa dang / / mgo bo bcad pa'i srin po rnams// skabs ni rab tu 'chol bar byed// sdig pa can rnams mdangs kyang 'phrog/ mi dag gi ni lus rnams la// rab tu phra
442a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gdon du snang / / spu yi bar dang gnad rnams dang // de bzhin rma yi kha rnams su// lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang // rig sngags zhags pas rab tu drangs// phyag 'tshul

442a6(rgyud 'bum): gang dag shin tu mthor 'phags dang // ri bo de dag kun la yang // lha dang drang srong gang gnas pa// de dag thams cad mi dga' zhing // 'jigs pa'i yid kyis mya ngan byed//

442b1(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'ang der phyin to/ / lha min bye ba phrag stong dang // lha min bye ba phrag brgya dang // de dag bu mo 'phrul ldan pa// mang po kun kyang thal mo sbyor// rab tu gnas dang rgya mtsho dang /

442b3(rgyud 'bum): mtsho chen po 'khrug byed dang / / stong phrag bye ba'i klu yi rnams// bye ba phrag brgya'i klu dag dang // de dag bu mo skal chen rnams// thal mo rab tu sbyor bar byed// nyi ma zla ba gnyis ka yang //

442b5(rgyud 'bum): spu can/ / gyad kyi yul na grags pa 'dzin// lnga 'dzin pa na skrag byed pa// rta skye ba na mig dmar gnas// srung bye ba na ser skya ste// sems pa na ni mig ser po// be'u la par bum pa'i lto//

442b7(rgyud 'bum): che/ chos skyong rab tu dkar ba dang // ser skya rab mdzes khyab 'jug dang // bum lto gsus pa zlum po dang // chu srin bden pa 'chang ba dang // lnga rgyal rgyal ba khyu mchog dang // gnod sbyin
443a1(rgyud 'bum): @chen po dbang phyug che/ / lag pa bzhi can stobs po che// bde dpa' rab tu 'dul ba ni// mthu bo che la stobs po che// gshin rje gshin rje'i pho nya dang // bdud rnams
443a2(rgyud 'bum): sde dang bcas pa dang / / gnod sbyin bye ba'i g.yog 'chang ba// gnod sbyin de ming 'phrog po yin// hA rA tI ni sngar bcas dang // ri yi bu mo gnod sbyin ma// gzi brjid chen mo 'jigs pa'i

448b1(rgyud 'bum): gos dang sham thabs mnabs nas lhung bzed bsnams te/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang thabs cig tu bya rgod phung po'i ro las shong du gshegs pa dang / de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
448b2(rgyud 'bum): pas lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas rol nas phul lo// phul nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to// lha rnams kyi
448b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yon rol nas phul lo// phul nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur
448b4(rgyud 'bum): to/ rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang re re zhing lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la snam logs nas phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug
448b5(rgyud 'bum): par gyur to/ / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas
448b6(rgyud 'bum): pas kyang so so nas lha'i gdugs dgra blangs te/ nyan thos rnams la phul nas rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to// de lta bu'i grags pa dang / bkur sti dang / brnyes par bya ba
448b7(rgyud 'bum): brnyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri las shod du babs te/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po gal bder gshegs pa dang / yangs
449a1(rgyud 'bum): pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das shin tu mdzes pa/ dad par 'os pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs ni ba/ dbang po dul ba/ thugs dul ba/ dul
449a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang ni gnas kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ dbang po dben zhing khugs pa/ glang po che ltar shin tu dul ba/ mtsho ltar dngas shing rnyog pa med la rnam par gsal ba/ skyes bu
449a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus shin tu brgyan pa/ shing sA la'i rgyal po ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par spras pa/ nyim
449a4(rgyud 'bum): ltar 'od zer gyi dra ba kun tu 'gyed pa/ mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na ri bo'i spol me'i phung po chen po rab tu 'bar ba dang 'dra zhing / bcom ldan 'das gser gyi ri bo chen po dam pa ltar lham me/ lhar na/
449a5(rgyud 'bum): lhang nger rgyang ring po nas gnas der gshegs pa mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur nas/ sems dad par gyur pa de dag bcom
449a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por lam gang nas gshegs pa'i lam de 'phyag cing chag chag 'debs/ byi dor byed/ me tog 'thor/ dar gyi lnga lding dang / dril bu dang / gdugs
449a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/ bdug spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
449b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i ri mo can/ me tog pad+ma'i snying po ltar 'jam pa/ sngon legs par spyad
449b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ gzhon sha chags shing 'jam pa/ nyi ma'i 'od zer bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ 'od zer brgya phrag mang po kun tu 'phro ba/ dri ma med pa'i phyag gis li
449b3(rgyud 'bum): tsa byi de dag gi mgo la byugs te bslang nas rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ / nga ni khyed rnams nyid la rjes su brtse bas nye bar bslang nas/ bla na med pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
449b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyis/ ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong
449b5(rgyud 'bum): khyer chen po'i nang du gshegs nas/ nam gyi gung thun la sgo skyes kyi gzhi zhabs kyis mnan nas phyogs bzhir gzigs te/ phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas na bza' bla gos
449b6(rgyud 'bum): bsigs te bka' stsal pa/ phyi ma'i dus na dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gang su'ang rung ba dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
449b7(rgyud 'bum): ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la mchod pa byed pa de dag dang / stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar par byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin
450a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing ston
450a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de dag la yams kyi nad dang / 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / kha
450a3(rgyud 'bum): mchu dang / gshegs dang / tha na phra ma dang / sdig pa mi dge pa'i sdug bsngal ba'i las kyis mi tshugs shing / 'tsho bar byed pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// de skad ces
450a4(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gsang
450a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bgyid pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sangs
450a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi phyag rgya de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa de'i phyir khyod kyis shin tu
450a7(rgyud 'bum): legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ / btsun pa de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang /
450b1(rgyud 'bum): de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// s+yang yaje na/ a tsa le/ ma tsa le/ sA ra matsa le/ za kri tI/ gaN+De/ pra kri ti/ nir+g+ho ShaM/ sa man+ta mu khe/ s+thi raM/
450b2(rgyud 'bum): s+thA ba re/ bi g+huSh+Ta shad+de/ pra ga la naM/ pA rad+hA ma/ swa ra ba Ne/ sA rang+ga ba te/ ba le ma hA ba le/ ma hA nir+N+Na se swA hA/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lus su gtogs pa dran pa dang /
450b3(rgyud 'bum): zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / ting nge 'dzin gsum dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi

450b6(rgyud 'bum): lagu bcu gnyis dang / rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang / dbugs dbyung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa rnam pa bcu drug dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
450b7(rgyud 'bum): yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te/ tshangs pa de ni stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar byed pa'i mdo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pas

451a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang po sgrub pa'o// 'jig rten skyong ba sgrub pa'o// dbang phyug sgrub pa'o// bden pa sgrub pa'o// lam sgrub pa'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sgrub pa'o// zla ba sgrub pa'o// nyi ma sgrub pa'o// gza' sgrub pa'o//

451a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dir ni dge bar shog/ mchog tu gang 'dod tshul bzhin rang bstan pa// ston pa'i rnal 'byor bla med rtag sgrub pa// rdo rje lta bu'i mi gnyis lam mthong ba// ting 'dzin de dang mnyam pa yang ma yin// de bas/
451b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ gang zag chen po brgyad pa rab bsngags shing // gang zag zung bzhir brjod pa de dag ni// drang srong chen po gang zag mtshungs med pa//

454a6(rgyud 'bum): tu g.yos/ phyogs bzhi'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po 'byung po sha la zab rnams kyis sgra skad drag po byung ba/ kye ma'o sdug bsngal/ kye mtho brlag/ bdag cag 'byung po'i tshigs ni phung ngo //

454b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis phyogs bzhir me lce'i phung po chen po bzhi mngon par sprul pa dang / de dag nam mkha' la kun tu rgyug go// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas nam mkha' lcags su

461a1(rgyud 'bum): ni zin gyur na/ / rims kyis btab cing 'khru bar 'gyur// mig 'phyang bas ni zin gyur na// skyigs bu dang nim pa 'byung // byis pa ji ltar skrag bgyid pa// de ma
461a2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ni brjod par bgyi/ / 'jam pa po ni ba lang gzugs// ri dgas rgyal po ri dgas 'dra// skem byed pa ni gzhon nu'i gzugs// brjod byed pa ni wa 'dra'o// khu tshur can ni bya rog
461a3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs/ / ma mo de ni ra yi gzugs// dzA mi ka ni rta yi gzugs// 'dod pa can ni rdo rje'i gzugs// nam gru khyi yi gzugs kyis te// srul po phag gi gzugs kyis so// ma dga'

519a6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongs su rdzogs/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni shin tu yongs su bzung / byang chub chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dpas
519a7(rgyud 'bum): ni brnyes/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sku ni rab tu 'bar/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par spras dbu'i gtsu
519b1(rgyud 'bum): ni sems can thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong / bdud kyi las thams cad la ni mkhas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa ni shes/ spyan rnam pa lnga ni mnga'/ rnam pa
519b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi mchog dang ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom// grags
519b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pas ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal/ bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med
519b4(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang /
519b5(rgyud 'bum): ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bya dka' ba'i spyod pa las ni phyir ma log/ sku ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan te/ rab tu mdzes
519b6(rgyud 'bum): shing rdo rje'i rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po rdo rje rin po che dang / mu tig dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma sgra 'byung ba/ rtsa ba'i drung na rdo rje rin po che'i stegs bu du ma shin tu

520a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an da rnyil dang / an dA rnyil chen po dang / mdun las kyi 'od zer chen po 'tsher bas snang bar byas te ku nas mdzes pa/ gdugs
520a2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba dang bcas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i shar bu du mas rnam par brgyan pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas rnam par brgyan pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas kun nas bskyabs pa/ dpag
520a3(rgyud 'bum): bsam gyi shing du mas brgyan par mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i khri ri rab tsam la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri bo'i rgyal po ltar dpal ni rab tu 'bar/ sa phyogs ni nyi ma stong pas lhag

520a5(rgyud 'bum): chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su
520a6(rgyud 'bum): dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas/ 'od zer gyi dra ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba bkye
520a7(rgyud 'bum): ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba nges stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par byas par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ngag seng ge'i khri
520b1(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang na nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma

520b4(rgyud 'bum): brtse'i phyir/ / nyes par byas dang gnod pa kun// rab 'joms so sor 'brang ba yi// gzungs 'di rab tu bshad par bya// 'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang // sdig pa kun ni zad par 'gyur// sems
520b5(rgyud 'bum): can kun la bde ba sbyin/ / nad do cog las grol bar byed// sems can kun la snying brtse bas// lus can ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang // de dag thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir// 'jig rten dag gi
520b6(rgyud 'bum): mgon pos gsungs/ / 'di yis bsrung bar byas na ni// lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug/ de bzhin lcang lo can dang ni// srin po'i gnas kyi sar yang 'gro// 'byung po klu dang sha za rnams// mi
520b7(rgyud 'bum): bzang 'jigs pa'i g.yul 'gyed par/ / 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang // dgra bo cog gis mi tshugs so// ming tsam bzung ste brjod byas kyang // skem byed brjed byed spro byed dang /
521a1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma dang sha za dang // gdon rnams rab tu rlag par 'gyur// so sor 'brang ba'i gzi brjid kyis// gzi chen mdangs rnams za ba dang // mi yi skye dgu
521a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams 'tshe ba/ / de dag thams cad rengs byed 'gyur// byang stems mi bzad gang yin dang // pha rol dmag tshogs phung bar byed// sngags kyi las kyis gnod mi 'gyur// rtsa ba'i las las rnam
521a3(rgyud 'bum): par grol/ / dug dang dug sbyar mes mi tshugs// mtshon dang chus kyang tshugs mi 'gyur// lce 'bab glog gis mi tshugs te// dus kyi rlung gis gnod mi 'gyur// rig pa'i rgyal mo'i gzi
521a4(rgyud 'bum): brjid kyis/ / dgra kun rab tu 'joms par 'gyur// nye bar 'tshe ba zlog par byed// nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de yi don rnams thams cad 'grub// rtag tu rgyal ba thob par 'gyur//
521a5(rgyud 'bum): gang gis rtag tu mgul pa 'am// lag par rig pa btags na ni// de yi dgos pa yod do cog/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang // sangs rgyas
521a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang rang 'dren dang / / de bzhin klu yi rgyal po dang // lha dbang rnams ni rtag tu srung // so sor 'brang ba'i gzungs 'dzin la// nyan thos sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rig pa'i lha mo rdzu
521a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul che/ / rtag tu srung ba byed par 'gyur// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams kyang // de la nyin dang mtshan rnams su// srung bar byed de the tsom med// brgya byin
521b1(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa dang / / tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen dang // dga' ba'i dbang po nag po che// smin drug bu dang tshogs kyi dbang // ma mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang // de bzhin bdud ris gzhan rnams

525b3(rgyud 'bum): la swA hA/ rab tu 'bar ba la swAhA/ sgom ma 'bar ba la swA hA/ rdo rje 'bar ba la swA hA/ me ste 'byar ba la swAhA/ kun tu babar ba la swA hUM/ nor bu bzang po la swAhA/ gang ba babang po
525b4(rgyud 'bum): la swA hA/ nag po la swA hA/ nag po chen po la swA hA/ ma mo'i tshogs la swA hA/ gnod sbyin mo rnams la swA hA/ srin mo rnams la swA hA/ yi dgas dang / sha za dang / mkha'
525b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma rnams la swA hA/ nam mkha'i ma mo rnams la swA hA/ rgya mtshor 'gro ba mo rnams la swA hA/ rgya mtsho na gnas pa rnams la swA hA/ mtshan mo rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ nyin mo rgyu ba rnams
525b6(rgyud 'bum): la swA hA/ dus gsum du rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ dus su rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ dus ma yin par rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ zas su mngal za ba rnams la swA hA/ mdangs 'phrog pa rnams la swA hA/
525b7(rgyud 'bum): mngal 'dzin pa rnams la swA hA/ hu lu hu lu swA hA/ oM swAhA/ saHswAhA/ b+h+yaHswAhA/ b+hu baHswA hA/ b+hud+d+he saswAhA/ tsi Ti tsi Ti swAH/ bi To bi Ti swAhA/ d+ha ra Ni swAhA/ d+hA
526a1(rgyud 'bum): swAdz+dza/ an+t+ra swAH/ te dzo su swAH/ tsa ma tsa'i swAhA/ sarba si li swAH/ rma ma ma mi swAt+ma/ dur+tha pran+d+ha swAH/ sir+b+ba sid+h+ya swAH/ maN+Dal ban+te swAH/
526a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin b+h+yaH/ da / d+hAHSh+Ta saHSh+Ta pang+gA/ nardzab sa / 5/ sa // s+t+wa~M/
526a3(rgyud 'bum): ban+d+ha r+dz+dzaSh+Ta/ mo hA la mo hiya skaMH/ maN+Di kr-i shr-id+hi sAH// sU r+ya bi shrad+d+he swAH/ n+da tsan+d+re pa ri TuHtsan+di sAH/ shod+ha ni sAhA/ rba shod+hi ni sAn+ti/ prA hib+h+yaHswahAM/
526a4(rgyud 'bum): nak+Sha tre b+h+yaHswA hA/ shi be b+h+yaHswAhA/ shIn+ti b+h+yaHswAh+ma/ puSh+Ti b+h+yaHsAhA/ sr-i s+yA ya ne b+h+yaHswAhA/ shi baM ka ri sA hA/ shaM ka ri swA hA/ shAn+ti ka ri swA hA/ puSh+Ti ka ri sA hA/ bal
526a5(rgyud 'bum): bar+d+ha ni swA hA/ ba la bar+d+ha na ka ri sAhA/ shrI kA ri swAhA/ shrI bar+d+ha ni swAt+ma/ shrI dzA li na~M swA hA/ mu tsi swAhA/ na mra tsi swA hA/ ma ru tsi swAhA/ baM ga dA ti swA hA/ oM/ bcom
526a6(rgyud 'bum): ldanas 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mchog dri ma dang bral ba/ bdag gi sdig pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag bde legs su gyur cig/ oM mu ni mu ni
526a7(rgyud 'bum): bi mu ni mu ni/ d+ha ri tsa ri tsa la ne/ b+ha ga ba ti/ d+ha ya bi ga te/ d+ha ya ha ra Ni/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ do d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bud+d+hi li bud+d+hi li/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya dzur+theswAhA/ oM mu ni mu ni mu ni
526b1(rgyud 'bum): ba re de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rig pa'i dbang bskur ba/ rdo rje'i go cha chen po'i phyag rgyas btab pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur du gsol/ sarba ta thA ga ta hrid ya/
526b2(rgyud 'bum): a d+hiSh+Thi te badz+re swA hA/ des na yang dus slar yang bram ze chen po de'i 'khor dang bcas pa 'dus pa der 'dug par gyur pa de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po la bos par gyur to// bram ze
526b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen po/ kun nas me lce'i 'phreng ba rnam par dag pas rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya dang / snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu
526b4(rgyud 'bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mos thos ma thag tu sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ / bram ze chen po rig pa 'di gang gi snying la gnas par gyur pa de'i lus rdo rjer rig par bya'o// de'i
526b5(rgyud 'bum): lus la mes mi tshugs so/ / ci mngon zhe na/ gang gi tshe grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas na/ gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po mngal du zhugs pa de'i tshe shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma bdag nyid
526b6(rgyud 'bum): me'i nang du mchongs pa dang / der pad+ma dag byung ste/ de'i tshe gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po ma'i mngal na gnas bzhin du rig pa 'di yid la byas so// rig pa 'di rjes su dran pa tsam gyis
526b7(rgyud 'bum): me de skad cig de nyid la bsil bar gyur to/ / de nas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma'i lus la mes ma reg go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyis byin gyis
527a1(rgyud 'bum): brlabs pa'o/ / bram ze chen po rgyu de na mes mi 'tshig go// dug gis kyang srog dang dpral bar mi nus so// de ci lta zhe na/ bram ze chen po gang gi tshe grong khyer chen po
527a2(rgyud 'bum): bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba na/ tshong dpon mdzod stobs can gyi bu rig pa smra bar gyur to// de'i rig pa'i stobs des klu'i rgyal po 'jog po bkug go/ bkug nas kyang bag med pa'i
527a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang gis bcings pas des khros nas de la bzung ba dang / de tshor ba mi bzad pa myong nas ji ltar yang bdag ni srog dang bral lo snyam du shes so// de nas smra ba can mang po bos kyang 'ga'
527a4(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis kyang dug las gso bar ma nus so/ / de nas grong khyer chen po bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba na dge bsnyen ma dri ma med par dag pa zhes bya ba snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhig gnas pa des rig
527a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di kha ton du shes so/ / de de'i gnas su song ste phyin pa dang / rig pa chen mo 'di brjod do// des de la lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis de dug med par byas shing de dran pa
527a6(rgyud 'bum): rnyed par byas te/ sdug bsngal chen po de las yongs su thar par byas nas/ rig pa chen mo'i snying po 'di cho ga ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu de'i snying la gnas par
527a7(rgyud 'bum): byas so/ / bram ze chen po gzhan yang ji ltar yongs su shes na/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba'i grangs su chud pa zhig grong khyer chen po wA rA NA si na sngon yongs su rgyu ba'i tshe//
527b1(rgyud 'bum): de'i shar phyogs kyi mtshams kyi stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/ grong khyer chen po wA rA NA si kun nas bskor nas gzhom par bshams
527b2(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas rgyal po chen po tshangs pas byin de la/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis grong khyer 'phrog la thug na/ thabs gang gis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
527b3(rgyud 'bum): de gzhom par bgyi bka' stsal du gsol zhes byas pa dang / rgyal pos khyed 'tsher 'gring chung ngur gyis shig/ rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba yod do// ngas des
527b4(rgyud 'bum): dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di pham par bya'o/ / thal ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang / blon po rnams kyis mgo btud de/ rgyal po chen po sdom bdag gis nam yang ma
527b5(rgyud 'bum): thos pa 'di ci zhig lags zhes smras pa dang / rgyal pos ngas des mngon sum du bya'o zhes bsgo'o// de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin spros chu sna tshogs kyis mgo bkrus te/ gos
527b6(rgyud 'bum): btsang ma bgos nas rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma chen mo 'di cho ga bzhin du bris te/ mgo'i gtsug gi sgra'i nang du bzhag nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di nyid kyis go cha byas te
527b7(rgyud 'bum): g.yul gyi nang du zhugs pa dang / gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad pham par byas te/ ji srid skyabs su dong ba srid du 'dis tshar bcad nas stobs kyis
528a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de gcig pu btang ngo / / bram ze chen po de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang phyag rgyas
528a2(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis brlabs pa/ mthu chen po 'di mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/ mngon sum du gyur to snyam du gzung bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs pa nyid du blta bar
528a3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na sems can tshe thung ba rnams dang / bsod nams chung ba rnams dang / longs spyod chung ba rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur bar blta'o// bram ze
528a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po gang la la zhig gis rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di cho ga bzhin du bris te lag pa'am mgul du btags na/ de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs
528a5(rgyud 'bum): par rig par bya'o/ / de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur rig par bya'o// de rdo rje'i lus yin par rig par bya'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi snying po can
528a6(rgyud 'bum): yin par rig par bya'o/ / de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan yin par rig par bya'o// de rdo rje chen po'i lus su rig par bya'o// de 'bar ba zod 'phro ba'i lus dang ldan par rig par
528a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de mi shigs pa'i go cha can du rig par bya'o// de dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms par rig par bya'o// de sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad 'joms par rig par bya'o// de sems can
528b1(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba'i 'gro ba rnams sbyong bar rig par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon yongs su shes pa yin te/ bram ze chen po phyogs gzhan zhig na dge slong ma dad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
528b2(rgyud 'bum): la bslabs pa 'dral ba/ ma byin par len pa/ bza' ba dang 'du ba'i sgo 'phrog pa/ dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs bzhi dang / tshogs kyi rdzas su gyur pa de thams cad gang zag gir byin
528b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis brlabs te za ba zhig/ dus gzhan zhig na nad tshabs chen pos btab pa dang / sdug bsngal chen po'i tshor ba myong ngo // nyon mongs te skyabs med dpung gnyen med nas ku co'i sgra chen po 'byin to//
528b4(rgyud 'bum): bram ze chen po de nas phyogs de na dge bsnyen zhig gnas pa des sgra de thos so// thos nas kyang dge slong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di bris te dge
528b5(rgyud 'bum): slong de'i mgul du btags so/ / rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo dge slong de'i mgul du btags ma thag tu tshor ba thams cad ni rab tu zhi/ nad thams cad las ni yongs su thar te sos par
528b6(rgyud 'bum): gyur nas/ de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag ste 'chi ba'i dus byas so// lus de bor ba dang sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so// de'i ro da'ang dge slong dag gis
528b7(rgyud 'bum): sgang bu zhig la bzhag go/ / rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo de'ang nga'i mgul du btags pa bzhin du gnas so// dge slong de mnar med pa der skyes ma thag tu sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag gi
529a1(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rab tu zhi nas/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad bde ba thams cad kyis tshim par gyur to// mtshams med pa'i me'i phung po
529a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zhi bar gyur to/ / de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag thams cad ngo mtshar skyes nas/ chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la nges pa'i tshig 'di dag rgyas par brjod do//
529a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can las las skyes pa yi// sdug bsngal mi bzad rab tu zhi// shin tu ngo mtshar 'di ni lha// sems dmyal nyam nga rnams na gdab// sems can lus la rtag gnas pa'i// me ma mur
529a4(rgyud 'bum): de rab tu zhi/ / sog le rnams kyis gshag ma mchis// spu gri'i sos kyang gcod mi bgyid// lcags sdong shal ma ri yang chag/ lcags zangs thams cad rab tu zhi// ral gri'i lo ma can nags
529a5(rgyud 'bum): na/ rnga las skyes lo ma gnod mi 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje khyod// mi rnams la ni chos kyis ston// rgyu 'di mi chung bdag cag la// khyod kyis brjod par mdzad pa'i rigs// de nas chos kyi bdag
529a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid can/ / chos nges chos kyi rgyal po des// snying rje'i bsam pa nyams rnams kyi// 'di 'dra'i tshig de thos gyur nas// myur du 'di ni ci yin smos// 'di ni ci 'dra yang smos shig/ de nas mi bzad
529a7(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje'i mi/ / gnod pa'i rgyun can de dag gis// chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la// 'di skad kyi ni chog smras so// mnar mang rab tu nyam nga bar// sems can chen po 'di skyes lha// gang gi ming
529b1(rgyud 'bum): ni mnar med pa/ / des na de ni nyam ngar brjod// gang gi sems can bde bgyis pa// rnam pa sna tshogs las la gzigs// 'di ni kun tu bde gyur na// slar yang lha yi gnas su mchi// chos kyi
529b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po gshin rjes kyang / / mthong nas ngo mtshar smras pa ni// 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba ste// 'di ni tshe rabs snga lus tshe// ji ltar sku gdung brgya mang pos// ston pa'i mchod rten mdzes pa ltar// so
529b3(rgyud 'bum): sor 'brang ba mgul btags pas/ / de yi lus ni de bzhin mdzes// de nas sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma de dag gis/ chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lha ji ltar na 'dis
529b4(rgyud 'bum): sor 'brang ba zhes bgyi/ chos kyi rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gis tshig rnams so sor dran// de ni ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// so sor 'brang bsgom pa yi// shes rab can de bde 'gror 'gro//
529b5(rgyud 'bum): sems can dmyal ba'i srung mkhyed// rab tu rgyas dang ldan par dong // der ni sgang bu mthon po la// lha rnams kyis ni bskor ba ltos// de mthong sems can thams cad la// byams pa'i sems su
529b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bar gyis/ / de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag de nyid kyi nub mo rgyas pa dang ldan par dong ngo // de tshe der ni de dag gis// rgyal po'i pho brang nye ba na// sgang bu de yi khor yug na// 'bar ba gcig gis gang
529b7(rgyud 'bum): bar mthong / / mi ro zhig gi mgul pa na// so sor 'brang ba btags pa'ang mthong // lha dang klu dang dri za dang // gnod sbyin srin po mi 'am cis// kun nas 'khor bar bskor nas ni// bla na med pa'i
530a1(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa byed/ / de la gnod sbyin de dag gis// so sor 'brang ba'i sgang zhes btags// de nas gnod sbyin de dag gis chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i nges pa de rtogs te/ slar log
530a2(rgyud 'bum): nas lha khyod kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin no zhes pa nas rgyas par brjod do/ / de skad ces smras ma thag tu tshig de smras pa'i tha ma la sems can chen po de sems can dmyal ba'i lus de bor nas/ sum cu
530a3(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ / rgyu des na sngon so sor 'brang ba'i lha'i bu zhes bya'o// bram ze chen po des na sngon chad yongs su shes so// de'i phyir so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di gdon mi za
530a4(rgyud 'bum): bar gzung bar bya'o/ / yi ger bri bar bya/ bklag par bya'o// cho ga bzhin du rtag tu lus la btags nas bcang bar bya ste/ de rtag tu sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa thams cad las yongs su thar par
530a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs skrag pa thams cad las rgal bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du mi khom pa brgyad rnams las yongs su thar ro// glog gis 'gyel bar byed mi nus so// glog gis ji ltar
530a6(rgyud 'bum): mi nus she na/ bram ze chen po sngon yongs su shes te/ grong khyer chen po'i mchog shing kun rdzib na/ tshong dpon chen po dri med dung zhes bya ba/ nor mang ba/ gser shin tu 'byor pa/ mdzod
530a7(rgyud 'bum): dang bang ba kun tu gang zhing phun sum tshogs pa zhig gnas te/ ded dpon zhes bya bar grags so// de nas ded dpon chen po des gru bo che de rnyed nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang / nya ming rnams
530b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis de'i gru de bzung nas/ rnam par gzhig par 'dod pa'i klu rnams kyang 'khrugs te 'brug sgra chen po sgrog go// glog dang skar mnga' yang gtong ngo // rdo rje'i lce 'bebasas par yang bshams so//
530b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas tshong ba de dag sdug bsngal chen pos sems non to// klu 'khrugs pa chen po de dang / glog dang / skar mnga' dang / rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa dang / nya ming de dag gis kyang gru bo che de bzung
530b3(rgyud 'bum): bar mthong nas ku co'i sgra chen po bton te/ de dag gis lha khyad par can rnams la gsol ba btab kyang 'ga' tsam yang de dag gi dpung gnyen du ma gyur to// de nas de dag tshong dpon sems rab tu brtan
530b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gan du song nas/ de dag gis snying rje rje skad du tshig 'di skad smras so// sems can chen po khyod kyis bdag cag bskyab cing 'jigs pa chen po las thar par mdzad du gsol/ de nas deng
530b5(rgyud 'bum): dpon chen po sems rab tu brtan pa blo gros chen po des/ tshong pa 'khrugs par gyur pa rnams la tshig 'di skad ces smras so// ma 'jigs ma 'jigs tshong pa rnams// khyed cag brtan par
530b6(rgyud 'bum): dengs shig dang / / khyed rnams sdug bsngal chen po yi// rgya mtsho che las ngas bsgral lo// de nas yid ni brtan gyur nas// tshong pa rnams kyis tshig 'di smras// sems can chen po 'di ci lags
530b7(rgyud 'bum): bgegs bral myur du bka' stsol cig/ blo gros chen po khyod kyi mthus// bdag cag ji srid 'tsho ba'i tshe// ye shes che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs// slong na khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi// de nas
531a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gron mang bdag po yis/ / de dag la ni tshig 'di rjod// ngal so sor 'brang ba yi// rig pa chen por grags pa yod// gnod byed thams cad sel bar byed// stobs
531a2(rgyud 'bum): chen pha rol gnon byed pa/ / des ni rab tu sdug bsngal ba'i// 'jigs pa che las ngas bsgral lo// de nas ded dpon chen pos de'i tshe rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma chen mo 'di bris nas rgyal
531a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags ma thag tu nya mid de dag thams cad kyis gru bo che de me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong ngo //
531a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas klu de dag byams pa'i yid kyis de dag gi drung du lhags nas mchod pa bya bar bshams so// nya mid de dag kyang rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di nyid kyi mthus tshig nas byer ta zhi
531a5(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur to/ / 'gron po phal po che de dag kyang klu chen po de dag gis rin po che'i gling chen por phyin par byas so// de ltar na ye shes dang ldan pa rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo ni de bzhin gshegs
531a6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ bram ze chen po rgyu des na 'di rig pa chen mo zhes grags so// 'di ni nges par rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te bcang bar bya'o// rlung dang / grang
531a7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang / glog dang / lce 'bab pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa las yongs su thar par byed
531b1(rgyud 'bum): de sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sha sbrang dang / byi ba dang / srog chags kyi rigs gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs lo tog ma rungs par byed pa thams cad mthu med cing rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// ri
531b2(rgyud 'bum): dgas dang / bya dang / gcan gzan gnod par sems pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / nags tshal dang / sman dang / lo tog
531b3(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rab tu bro zhing zhim pa dang 'jam par 'gyur ro// legs par yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// ha cang char che ba dang char dkon pa'i nyes pa rnams
531b4(rgyud 'bum): yongasu mi 'byung ngo / / char dus su 'bab cing dus ma yin par mi 'bab par 'gyur ro// yul de'i klu chen po gang yin pa de dag kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs so// yul gang
531b5(rgyud 'bum): na rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba 'di spyod pa'i yul der sems can de dag gis shes par bya ste/ spos sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis
531b6(rgyud 'bum): mchod cing bsti stang du byas la/ tshon sna tshogs kyis dkris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas glu dbyangs dang rol mo sil snyan byas te/ bskor ba byas nas lha rnams dang / brgya byin dang
531b7(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa la sogs pas sems can chen po de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// cho ga ji lta ji lta ba bzhin du bris na de lta de lta bur 'grub ste/
532a1(rgyud 'bum): @bu po 'dod na'ang khye'ur 'grub// mngal na 'dzin pa dam par 'gyur// mngal na bde bar skye ba dang // mngal nas bde bar btsas par 'gyur// mngal nas dus
532a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin skye ba dang / / dus bzhin rab tu btsas par 'gyur// cis mngon zhe na/ bram ze chen po snga ma bzhin du de nyon cig/ yul ma ga d+ha 'di nyid na rgyal po lag bkyang zhes bya ba de bu med par gyur
532a3(rgyud 'bum): to/ dza ci'i phyir lag brkyang zhes bya zhe na/ rgyal po de btsas ma thag tu lag pa brkyang nas ma'i nu zho la bzung ste/ nu no ngoms ngoms su 'thungs so// nu ma de gnyis la reg ma thag tu gas
532a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi kha dog tu gyur te/ dus kun tu nu zho 'phel bar gyur to// rgyu des na rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya bar btags par gyur to// gzhan yang gang gi tshe rgyal po de'i gan du skye bo slong mo pa 'ongs
532a5(rgyud 'bum): pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po de lag pa g.yas pa bar snang la brkyang ba dang / rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' de rgyu des sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis lha'i rin po che khyad par du 'phags pa
532a6(rgyud 'bum): gser dang / nor bu rnams kyis lag pa gang bar byed do// rgyal po des kyang skye bo slong mo pa lhags pa rnams la rab tu byin no// bsam pa tsam gyis slong mo pa thams cad la 'dod pa bzhin du bde ba
532a7(rgyud 'bum): phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byin to/ / bu bo 'dod pa'i phyir lha rnams la mchod pa dang bsti stang cher byas kyang bu po ma rnyed nas/ des sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi mchod rten rnams kyi mdun du
532b1(rgyud 'bum): bsti stang bya bar brtsams te/ mchod pa dang bsti stang chen po byas so// sbyin pa'ang byin to// bsnyen gnas la'ang nye bar gnas so// bsod nams chen po byas so// sbyin pa chen po de dag kyang mi
532b2(rgyud 'bum): zad par byin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bram ze chen po sngon byung ba yul ma ga d+ha 'di nyid na/ gyad yul zhes bya ba'i grong khyer gu ga'i tshong dus chen po'i mchog na/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen mang gi bstan pa la zhugs
532b3(rgyud 'bum): pa tshong dpon chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba chos sems pa'i sems can chen po zhig gnas pa de sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar bzhag nas/ rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba 'di nyid
532b4(rgyud 'bum): las brtsams te chos ston to/ / de nas mi dbul po zhig gis chos de thos nas tshong dpon chen po de la tshig 'di skad ces bdag jo bo'i khab tu gla bgyi'o// chos kyang nyan to// gang gi tshe bdag gis cung
532b5(rgyud 'bum): zad rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag chos la mchod pa bgyid do zhes smras nas/ de'i khyim na las byed cing chos kyang nyan to// dus gzhan zhig na de la tshong dpon des dI na ra gcig byin pa dang / des sems
532b6(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ rin po che snyim pas so sor 'brang ba chen mo la phul nas/ sbyin pa'i
532b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu chen po 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi dbul ba'i sdug bsngal kun gcod par gyur cig ces smon lam de skad kyang btab bo/ / rgyu des na sbyin pa de yongs su mi zad par gyur to//
533a1(rgyud 'bum): de ltar bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba rnam pa mang po rnam pa du ma byas te/ lha rnams kyang mchod pa nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du mchod pa dang / de'i tshe gnas
533a2(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rmi ltas su bstan te 'di skad du/ kye rgyal po chen po so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba kun nas me lce'i 'phreng ba rnam par dag pas rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya dang /
533a3(rgyud 'bum): snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs chen mo rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo cho ga las ji skad du 'byung ba bzhin du cho ga bzhin bris la btsun mo dam pa smyung ba byas la/ cho ga bzhin du lus la btags na khyod bu po

533b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis mchod pa/ 'dod pa thams cad du 'gro ba/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa so sor 'brang ba chen mo dkon mchog ces grags so// 'di ni rtag tu brgya byin gyi gtsug gi nor bu yin no// gang gi tshe lha'i
533b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams dang g.yul chen po 'gyed par 'dod pa de'i tshe/ 'di nyid kyis go cha byas nas spyi gtsug tu btags te/ lha ma yin thams cad pham par byas/ pha rol pham par byas

534a1(rgyud 'bum): dang gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can chen po de mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad kyang
534a2(rgyud 'bum): rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sred par byed par 'gyur ro// des gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gsang sngags chen po'i snying po 'di dag bris te/ rtag par rgyun du lus sam mgul du gdags

534a5(rgyud 'bum): / oM a mr-i ta ba re/ ba ra ba ra/ pra ba ra bi shud+d+ha hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM a mr-i ta bi lo ki ni gar+b+ha saM rak+Sha Ni/ A kaR+Sha Ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po'o// oM bi ma le
534a6(rgyud 'bum): bi pu le/ dza ya ba re/ a mr-i te/ hUM hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ oM b+ha ra b+ha ra saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ in+d+ri ya ba ya bi sho d+ha ni/ hUM hU~M phaT phaT ru ru tsa le pAh+ma/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o// oM ma Ni d+ha ri/

537b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba dang / / sems can rnams kyi dbul ba yi// rma rnams gso bar bya phyir ro// bsnyen gnas dag la gnas gyur nas// rgyu skar rgyal du shes pa la// sangs rgyas mchod la brtson byas te// byang chub phyir ni
