537b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chus bkrus te/ / bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa yi// gos gtsang rnams ni bgo bar bya// sa dang lci ba bsres pa yi// de yi 'og tu dkyil 'khor bya// bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag ste// lnga pa dkyil
537b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dbus su gzhag/ de la rin thang chen po yi// me tog bdug pa spos rnams gsol// tsan dan s+thi ka de bzhin du// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ sha kha ra dang lnga sbyar ba'i// 'dug pa cho ga bzhin du dbul/
537b7(rgyud 'bum): cho ga bzhin dus bzhin bya// lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// me tog 'bras bu sa bon dang // spos rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan// mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang // nas thug 'o drug la sogs pas/
538a1(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma'i bum pa dgang bar bya// mtshan ma shin tu bkra shis pa// phyogs bzhi rnams su gzhag par bya// lnga pa dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag/ spos kyis bkang ba'i phur bu
538a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / grwa bzhi dag tu gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'gram logs su// seng ljang phur bu bzhi btsugs la// tshon skud kha dog sna lnga yis// 'khor bar dam du dkri bar bya// gal te bdag
538a3(rgyud 'bum): 'grub 'dod na ni/ / bram ze de ltar byas nas bri// kha zas dkar po zos nas su// phan par 'dod pas bri bar bya// dar ram ras sam gro ga 'am// cing yang rung ba gzhan la bri// bud med dag la bu bdod/
538a4(rgyud 'bum): nadza gi wang gis ni legs par bri// dbus su khye'u zhig bris nas ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de bzhin rin chen gang ba'i snod// lag pa g.yon na thogs par bya// pad+ma rab
538a5(rgyud 'bum): tu rgyas gyur cing / / brgyan pa la ni de 'dug bya// nor bu do shal gser dag dang // rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// gdul bar shin tu dka' ba bris// grwa bzhin dag tu ri bo bri// gal te bde bar
538a6(rgyud 'bum): 'tsho 'dod na/ / rab tu bsgrims te de ltar bri// bye brag tu ni skyes pa rnams// gur kum gyis ni bri bar bya// de yi dgos pa 'dod pa rnams// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// pad+ma gnyis sam yang na gsum /
538a7(rgyud 'bum): babazhi 'am yang na lnga bris te// pad+ma la ni phyag rgya'i mtshan// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su dri// de bzhin du ni pad+ma rnams// ze bas kun tu 'khor bar bri// pad+ma 'dab ma rab rgyas la// sdong bu dar gyis
538b1(rgyud 'bum): bcings pa bri/ / pad+ma la ni rtse gsum pa// zur brgyad la ni ngar dpyangs bri// de bzhin pad+ma dgra star bcas// 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan par bris// pad+mar bcas pa'i ral gri bri// pad+ma de ni dkar por byas/
538b2(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i steng du dung yang bri// thams cad du yang rgyas par bya// kun tu cho ga'i mtshan ma rnams// mkhas pa dag gis bri bar bya// gang la gnod pa'i sems 'byung ba// byis pa'i gzugs rnams mi bri'o//
538b3(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// lha yi gzugs ni bri bar bya// dge slong phyir ni rdo rje 'chang // gnod sbyin bsdigs par brtson par bri// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyang // ngos bzhi rnams su bri bar bya//
538b4(rgyud 'bum): bram ze'i phyir ni dbang ldan no// rgyal rigs la ni dbang phyug che// dmangs rigs phyir ni rta ga zhi ba// khyab 'jug legs par bri bar bya// rje'u rigs phyir ni rnam thos bu// lha yi dbang phyug dbang po bris//
538b5(rgyud 'bum): khye'u'i phyir ni skye dgu'i bdag/ blo gros chen po dri bar bya// sngo bsangs mdog ni gang yin pa// de yi ched du khros pa bri// dkar mo'i phyir ni grags ldan pa// phun sum tshogs pa'i gzugasu bri// sbom mo'i
538b6(rgyud 'bum): phyir ni nor bu bzang / / rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya// skem mo'i phyir ni gang ba bzang // rang byung nga yis bstan pa bri// sbrum ma'i phyir ni nag po che// tshangs lha rnams kyang bri bar bya// gzhan yang ji ltar
538b7(rgyud 'bum): cho ga las/ / gong du bshad pa bzhin du bri// las kyi cho ga mthong nas ni// rab tu bsgrims te de bzhin bri// rtag tu mgul du btags na ni// de ni bde bar 'gyur ba yin// rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i pad+ma la/
539a1(rgyud 'bum): yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba bri// badz+ra'i snying por zhags pa dang // de bzhin 'khor lo'ang bri bar bya// pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje dang // pad+ma'i snying por thob bri// cho ga las ni 'byung ba bzhim
539a2(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i steng du mdung thung bri/ / cho ga las ni brjod pa bzhin// nor bu thams cad rtse mo 'bar// 'od zer 'phro bas rgyas pa dang // dar gyis bcings pa bri bar bya// klu mgo gdengs ka dgu yod la// nor bu
539a3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'bar ba dang / / de dag kun gyi snying khar yang // rdo rje gnas par bsgrims te bri// rgyal po rnams phyir stobs can dang // ded dpon mkhas pas rtag tu bri// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi
539a4(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyang bri/ / zla ba nyi ma rgyu skar bcas// sgra gcan mjug ring gza' brgyad bri// cho ga bzhin du nges bris la// blo gros ldan pa'i mis bsrel na// za ma dang ni ma ning yang // bu pho
539a5(rgyud 'bum): rnyed par 'gyur ba yin/ / 'dis ni thams cad 'grub par byed// shis shing sdig pa zhi bar byed// rang byung gi ni bka' bzhin du// gnas kyi dam pa thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di na'ang mchog/
539a6(rgyud 'bum): tu bde// 'jig rten pha rol shin tu bde// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas la sogs// lha gnas de yi gnas su 'gyur// 'dzam gling bzang zhing nyams dga' bar// khyad par can rigs grags pa
539a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / nga rgyal rigs khyad par 'phags pa dang // bram ze khyad par 'phags rnams su// bdag nyid chen po de skyes te// rtag tu rig dang bde bar 'gyur// so sor 'brang ma 'chang ba'i mis// bsod nams
539b1(rgyud 'bum): thob pa gang yin pa/ / sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyis// bsod nams phung po brjod mi nus// sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad// mtho ris sgo rnams rab tu phye// bde ba phun sum tshogs
539b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / blo gros chen por 'gyur ba yin// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpas kyang // rtag tu dbugs ni 'byin par 'gyur// lus kyi bde ba phun sum tshogs// stobs kyang che bar 'gyur ba yin//
539b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bas ji skad gsungs pa ltar// 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba yin// mi dang lha rnams dbugs 'byin te// gnod par sems pa sdug par byed// gang phyir rig pa legs bshad pa// de ni
539b4(rgyud 'bum): ring po mi thogs so/ / de ni mtshon gyis mi tshugs te// dug dang mes kyang tshugs mi 'gyur// dus min 'chi ba'i sdig pa yang // de las thag ni ring du 'gro// rnam pa kun tu nyan pa 'am/
539b5(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba dang ni reg pa'ang rung // 'byung po gdon dang rtsod pa dang // chu dang me yis 'jigs pa dang // gcan gzan sbrul dang seng ge dang // klu dang nang ni mi bzang rnams// gang la rig pa
539b6(rgyud 'bum): legs bshad pa/ / de la de dag kun mi 'byung // de dag sems can kun mchog 'gyur// bdud rnams kun gyis thams cad du// mchod par 'gyur ba'i 'os yin te// yang dag bshad kyis
539b7(rgyud 'bum): mnyan par byos/ / rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i cho ga dang po rdzogs so// // de nas sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir rig sngags 'chang bsrung
540a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshul gyi cho ga bshad par bya'o/ / srung ba'i cho ga gang zhig gis// dngos grub chen po 'grub 'gyur ba// gang dang gang du srung byas nas// don yod 'gyur te the tsom med
540a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs med rims kyis mi btab ste/ / gza' rnams thams cad zlog par byed// rgyu skar rnams kyang mthun par 'gyur// las kyi lu gu rgyud kyang gcod// bza' nyes pa dang sgomanyes dang /
540a3(rgyud 'bum): dgra tshogs kun gyis byas pa dang // gnong bar bltas dang bri nyes dang // byad dang gang yang mi bzad dang // phyi ma sngags kyis btab pa dang // dug 'thungs pa dang sbyar ba'i dug/ gang zhig
540a4(rgyud 'bum): srung ba 'chang de la/ / de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// gang zhig rig las 'gal byed pa// yan lag rnams la rnam par smin// so sor 'brang ba'i dmod bsdigs na// pha rol 'khor ni mi bzad
540a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'jigs pa chen po dgra yi rnams// de dag thams cad rab tu 'bros// sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' nges pas srung // nyan thos dka' thub chen po dang //
540a6(rgyud 'bum): rang sangs rgyas kyis srung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rnam pa mang po yi// lha klu rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams// 'di la rtag tu brtson byed pa// de la srung ba byed par 'gyur// rig pa yi ni rgyal mo 'di//
540a7(rgyud 'bum): thos pa tsam gyis mi mchog rnams// kun tu 'jigs pa med 'gyur zhes// thub pa yin ni de skad gsungs// rmi lam ngan dang ngan byas dang // gang yang nad 'gro mi bzad dang // nad kyis
540b1(rgyud 'bum): btab dang nad chen gyis/ / gang dag zin cing khrag skyugs dang // gzhan yang rnam pa mang po'i nad// 'bras dang shu bskom po dang // gang yang gnod pa mi bzad pas// mi yi skye dgu zin pa dang //
540b2(rgyud 'bum): mi rnams ma rungs bya ba'i phyir// mchog tu mi bzang gnod byed rnams// srung ba stobs chen ga la bar// de dag thams cad mi 'byung ngo // 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// bcings pa dag kyang grol
540b3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / so sor 'brang ba bris pas kyang // gal te dus kyi zhags pa yis// bzung nas gshin rje'i gnas khrid pa// de yi tshe ni rnam par 'phel// gang zhig tshe ni zad gyur tam// zhang//
540b4(rgyud 'bum): bdun na ni 'chi 'gyur ba// yi ge bris pa'i bar tsam gyis// 'tsho bar 'gyur te the tsom med// cho ga bzhin du bsrung ba byas// yang na thos pa tsam gyis kyang // kun tu dge ba thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa
540b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du bde bar 'tsho/ / gang dag sum cu rtsa gsum lha// stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang // bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya dang // brgya byin mdun nas 'gro ba kun// sems can de la srung ba'i phyir// phyi
540b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin 'brang zhing gnas par byed/ / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dang // lag na rdo rje stobs chen yang // rig pa'i rigs ni brgya dag dang // lhan cig rtag tu srung bar byed// zla ba yid bzang nyi ma dang //
540b7(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// nor bu bzang dang gshin rje dang // stobs kyi lha ni stobs chen dang // gang ba bzang po dpal chen dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang // lnga 'dzin pa dang lda
541a1(rgyud 'bum): rkyen dang / / sprin drug pu dang tshogs dbang dang // lha mo chen mo dpal can dang // rnam thos bung dang dbyangs can dang // dung can dang ni me tog so// de bzhin ral pa gcig
541a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / gnod sbyin chen mo dpal yon can// rtag tu srung ba byed par 'gyur// za ma rnams kyi bu yang skyeng// mngal na gnas pa bde bar byed// de ni ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar// 'di ni srung ba chen por 'gyur//
541a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs med 'tha' mo'i g.yul 'gyed par// dpa' bo rnams la rtag rgyal sbyin// chos la nges pa'i lha rnams la// 'dis ni gnang ba sbyin par byed// sdig pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// gus par byas
541a4(rgyud 'bum): ta bris na ni/ / de bzhin gshegs dang de bzhin du// byang chub sems dpa' lta bur 'gyur// de yi grags pa rnam par 'phel// bsod nams dang ni tshe yang 'phel// nor rnams dang ni 'bru dag kyang // 'byor
541a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te the tsom med/ / bde bar gnyid kyis log pa dang // bde bar rab tu sad par 'gyur// 'byung po'i tshigs rnams thams cad dang // dgra kun gyis kyang mi brdzi'o// g.yul 'gyed pa yi chen
541a6(rgyud 'bum): yang rig pa bsgrub par byas na ni/ / srung ba bla na med pa 'dis// rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur bar byed// bde bar rig pa sgrub byed cing // de la bgegs ni 'byung mi 'gyur// de yis bsam pa thams
541a7(rgyud 'bum): cad 'grub/ / dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa yin// skye ba dag ni thams cad du// de ni myur du dam tshig shes// rgyal ba'i yon tan 'dzin pa'i phyir// de ni ying brtan pos yin no// dkra shis thams cad
541b1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu rdzogs/ / bsams pa thams cad grub par byed// 'di ni bris pa tsam gyis kyang // bde ba thams cad 'byor par 'gyur// bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas// mtho ris su ni 'gro bar 'gyur// 'thab pa
541b2(rgyud 'bum): dang ni rtsod pa dang / / 'gyed pa mchog tu mi bzad par// 'jigs pa kun las sgrol 'gyur te// rgyal bas ji skad gsungs bzhin no// skye ba rnams su skye ba na// rtag tu skye dran the tsom med// rgyal po btsun mo
541b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bcas pa/ / 'di yi dbang du 'gyur ba yin// 'jig rten dge bar grags pa yin// rtag tu thun mong 'gyur ba yin// de ni kun la sdug par 'gyur// lha dang mi ni gang yang rung // nyin dang mtshan rnams
541b4(rgyud 'bum): rtag par yang / / de la srung ba byed par 'gyur// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs// sngags tshig 'di dag 'dir 'grub bo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dag
541b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs
541b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas bstan pa 'phel ba'i phyir// de la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas// sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir// de ni nga yis brjod par bya// rig
541b7(rgyud 'bum): ba gzi brjid chen mo 'di/ / stobs chen pha rol gnon pa ste// rdo rje gdan la thug pa yi// 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang // bdud dang bdud kyi rigs rnams dang // gza' dang log par 'dzin pa dang //
542a1(rgyud 'bum): pasregs rnams ji snyed gang yod pa// thams cad de yi mod la 'byed// tat+t+wan+ta/ oM gi ri gi ra~M/ ki ri Ni/ bA ri Ni/ gi rib ti/ guN+DA ba te/ AkA shab te/
542a2(rgyud 'bum): kA sha bi shud+d+he/ sarba pA pa bi gan+te/ A kA she/ ga gan ta le/ Ak+Sha sha bi tsA ri Ni/ dzA li ta shi ka re/ ma ni maug ti/ kha tsi ta/ mau li d+ha ri/ su kaM she/ su be shaM/ su bak+tA/
542a3(rgyud 'bum): sune t+ye/ su bar+Ne/ su bar+Na gau ri a tI ta/ a nA ga te/ pra t+yAd ban+ne/ na maHsan+ne ShaM bud+d+hA nan/ dz+wa li tA/ te dza swaM/ bud+d+he su prad+d+he/ b+ha ga wa ti/ su rak+Sha Ni/ suk+Sha mi/
542a4(rgyud 'bum): su prad+h+we/ sud me/ su n+te/ ba re ba ra de/ thA ga pa ti/ b+ha dra ba ti/ b+harbe su b+hartA/ bi ma le dza ya b+ha rbe/ pra tsan+ta/ tsa/ N+Di/ tsar+t+ti/ badz+ra tsaN+DaM/ ma hA tsaH/ gau raM/
542a5(rgyud 'bum): gad+ha ri/ gau raM/ tsar+t+ta li/ ma taM gi/ brtsa si/ prak+tA sI/ sum ti/ sha ri/ shA ba ri/ shaM ka rI/ dra mi Di/ nA mi Di/ rorni sarba ar+tha sAd+ha ni/ han hAnra/
542a6(rgyud 'bum): sarba shatrUM/ da ha ha ha/ sarba dun+d+ha/ pre ta bi shA tsa/ DA kiNI nAM/ ma nuSh+Ta/ a ma nuSh+mA Na Na tsa/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hrid ya na/ gdon ma rungs pa rnams kyi srog gzhom du gsol/ bcom
542a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ma bdag gi sdig pa thams cad gzhig tu gsol/ gzhog tu gsol/ thams cad du 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad las bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/
542b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs pa thams cad bcing du gsol/ r+tha kits+tshi nA sha n+ti// nr-i tud d+ha nI bA ra Ni/ mnani/ mad+hA ma na~M ni/ ba#/ dzardza dza/ naldan ni/ nid+hate/ b+ha
542b2(rgyud 'bum): bI ri Ni/ za ba ra sa ma re/ tsaN+Da le/ mA taM gi/ run+d+ha si/ sa ra si/ brtsa si/ su ma ti/ puHsi/ sha ba ri/ sha dA ri/ shaM ka ri/ dra mi Di/ drA ma Di/ ba ha ni/ @tsa
542b3(rgyud 'bum): nibA tsa ni/ marda ni/ sa ra le/ sa ra la/ sa ra laM b+he/ hi na ma dz+yod kriSh+Ta bi dA ri Ni/ bi d+hA ri Ni/ ma hi le/ ma hA ma hi le/ ni ga De/ ni ga Da/ b+hany+dze/ mat+te/ mat+ta/

542b5(rgyud 'bum): Di ni[:]ni mi ni mi ni min d+ha ri/ tri lo ka da ha ni/ tri lo ka dza na ni/ tri lo kA/ lo ka ka ri t+ye d+ha tu bya ba lo ki ne/ badz+ra pa ra shu/ pA sha/ mung+ga ra/ khang+ga/ tsakra/
542b6(rgyud 'bum): shang kha/ ts+tshat+ta/ tri shU la/ tsin+ta ma nI/ ma hA bi d+ya d+ha ri Ni/ bdag thams cad du gnas thams cad na gnas pa na ma rungs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i

543a1(rgyud 'bum): li ki li ki wi/ tsi'i tsa mi/ si li si mi/ ba ra ba ra/ bar de/ sar+b+batra dza ya/ lad+h+we swAhA/ sarbadA pa bid ri Ni swAH/ sarba byAd+hi hA ri Ni sAhA/
543a2(rgyud 'bum): s+yAm+b+ha ra Ni swA hA/ sarba sha t+yA b+ha ya ha ra Ni swA hA/ sAs+t+rIr+b+ha ba tu nAM swAhA/ shAn+ti ka ri swAhA/ baSh+Ti ka ri swA hA/ ba la bar+d+ha ni sAhA/ dza la tu/ dza ye dza ya bat+taM/ ka ma la~M bi ma le swAb+hA/
543a3(rgyud 'bum): oM bi pu le swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta mUr+Ne swA hA/ oM d+hA ra~M ma hA shAn+ti swA hA/ oM b+h+yaHswA hA/ oM b+hu baHswA hA/ oM swaHswA hA/ oM b+hA ra b+hA baHswaHswA hA/ oM b+hU ri badz+ra ba ti sarba ta thA ga ta hing
543a4(rgyud 'bum): ya saM pU ra NI/ A yuHsan+d+ha ra Ni/ ba le ba la/ ba la ba ti/ dza ya bi h+ye/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM ma Ni d+ha ri Ni bidz+ra ma hA pra ti sai re hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ bram ze chen po gang la la zhig
543a5(rgyud 'bum): gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi'i gzungs 'dis yongs su bsrung ba byas shing yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi
543a6(rgyud 'bum): dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / dbyug pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug sun dbyung ba dang / dug gzhom pa byas na/ de tshe yongs su zad pa las kyang rnam par 'phel te ring du
543a7(rgyud 'bum): bde bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / dran pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// skud pa tsam dang rdo rjes byabs pa tsam gyis dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / nang chen po las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// nga'o
543b1(rgyud 'bum): nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyun rings su na ba la'ang byabs pa tsam gyis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du kha ton du shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang
543b2(rgyud 'bum): stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// de'i sdig pa dang las kyi sgrib pa gdon mi za bar myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyang ma lus par yongs su zad par
543b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sem dpa' dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad kyang de'i lus la gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus snon
543b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / dga' ba chen po mang bar 'gyur ro// bram ze chen po tha na rig pa chen mo'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba ri dgas dang / bya'i rna lam du thos na'ang de dag
543b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur na/ so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i gzungs 'di la dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong
543b6(rgyud 'bum): ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i bu 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ de las
543b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan pa 'ga' zhig gis lan cig thos te/ thos nas kyang dad pa chen po dang / gus pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ 'chang ngam
544a1(rgyud 'bum): klog gam/ yid drag pos sgom mam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta ci smos te/ bram ze chen po de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnam pa brgyad
544a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa thams cad du 'byung du ma dogs shig/ de'i lus la nad chen po rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la mes mi tshugs/ dug gis ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ dug sbyar
544a3(rgyud 'bum): mas ma yin/ byad kyis ma yin/ g.yengs byed kyis ma yin/ sngags kyi las kyis ma yin/ phye ma'i sbyor bas ma yin/ yan lag na bar mi 'gyur/ rims kyis btab par
544a4(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur/ klad pa na ba dang / nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin bdun pa'i rims rnams de'i lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// dran
544a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du bde bar gnyid kyis log cing dran bzhin du bde bar sad par 'gyur ro/ / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'ang thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig gis chos dang ldan pa'i dbang phyug chen po
544a6(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ / de gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba de dang der skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyang byams par 'gyur ro// phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal
544a7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'gro ba thibs po kun dang / yi dgas su skye ba rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad la snang bar byed pa de
544b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du 'od zer gyis snang ba byed par 'gyur ro/ / ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi'i mthus sems can thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa de bzhin du chos kyi bdud rtsis sems can thams cad
544b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyud sems par byed par 'gyur ro/ / rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i mthus de la gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / skam
544b3(rgyud 'bum): byed dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa thams cad kyis gtse bar mi nus so//
544b4(rgyud 'bum): re dag 'ongs na 'ong rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di dran par bya'o// 'on kyang 'di lta ste/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di nyid kyi mthus ma rungs pa de dag thams
544b5(rgyud 'bum): cad rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang du 'gyur te/ bsgo ba bzhin du ngag nyan par 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // dgra'i tshogs thams cad dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i blon po
544b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyang 'gal bar byed par mi 'gyur ro// tha na gsang bar 'os pa zhig la gshed ma mi rnams kyis mtshon gdab par gnas na yang mtshon rnams rdal
544b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du dum bu dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro/ / de nyid kyi dus nade la chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de'i rngan pa'i stobs kyang cher 'gyur ro// 'di ni srin po 'joms pa'i mchog
545a1(rgyud 'bum): gtsang zhing sdig pa 'jig par byed/ / dpal du byed cing blo yang byed// yon tan thams cad rnam par 'phel// 'di ni bkra shis thams cad byed// bkra shis ma yin rnam par
545a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig/ rmi lam bzang po rmi bar byed// rmi lam ngan pa rnam par 'jig/ rig pa mthu stobs chen mo 'di// skyes pa bud med srung ba'i mchog/ 'brog dgon dang ni mya ngan las// rtag tu de yi mod
545a3(rgyud 'bum): la thar/ / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bka' bzhin du// 'dod pa dag ni kun kyang rnyed// lam las lam gol zhugs na yang // rig pa 'di ni rjes dran na// myur du lam dang bza' ba dang // btung
545a4(rgyud 'bum): ba mchog kyang rnyed par 'gyur/ / lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// mi dge mang po gang yang rung // tshe rabs snga mar ci byas pa// de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur// dran pa dang ni 'chang ba
545a5(rgyud 'bum): dang nga 'dzin dang yi ger 'dri ba dang / / tshig tu 'don tam klog pa dang // bzlas brjod byed dam gzhan ston na// de ni ring por mi thogs par// chos kun rtogs par khong du chud// de ltar chos kyi
545a6(rgyud 'bum): ro rnyed na/ / sdig pa rnams ni zad par 'gyur// yid kyis ci dang ci 'dod pa// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par byed// 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang // rgyal po dang ni me dang chu// glog
545a7(rgyud 'bum): dang de bzhin kun 'joms las/ / 'di ni de las skyob par 'gyur// rig pa 'bum du bzlas na ni// g.yul 'gyed pa dang rtsod pa dang // gang yang gcan gzan ma rungs pa// de dag thams cad
545b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bros par 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi// dngos grub mchog gi rig pa 'di// brjod na sgyid lug mi 'gyur bar// byang chub tshogs rnams rdzogs par byed// bdag dang gzhan
545b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi don sgrub phyir/ / gnas kyi rnam pa thams cad du// rig pa 'di la sbyor na ni// 'dod pa'i las rnams gang yin pa// sgrim mi dgos par rig 'di las// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// /
545b3(rgyud 'bum): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo ya tiSh+Than+ti da sha su dik+Shu oM ma ni badz+re hrid ya badz+ra mA rau si n+ya bi dA ri Ni ha na ha na sarba sha trUM rak+Sha rak+Sha mA badz+re badz+re badz+ra gar+b+he trA sa ya trA sa ya sarba mA ra b+ha ban ta ni hUM hUM phaT phaT sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha
545b4(rgyud 'bum): / ra swA hA/ bud+d+ha mai tri sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra kalpa a d+hiSh+Thi te sarba kar+m+ma a ba ra Na a t+ya pa na ya swA hA/ nad pa rnams ni gso bya ba// da ni rab tu bshad par bya// sa dang lci ba bsres pa yis// dkyil
545b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya/ / tshon gyi phye ma sna lnga yis// dkyil 'khor sdug gur bri bar bya// mkhas pa rnams kyis cho ga bzhin// bum pa gang ba bzhi yang gzhag/ de la me tog sil mas
545b6(rgyud 'bum): gtor/ / bdug pa mchog gi bdugs par bya// sems can chen po gdul ba'i phyir// gtor ma yini las kyang bya// snga ma bzhin du me tog spos// cho ga bzhin du 'di la mchod// dar gyis
545b7(rgyud 'bum): bcings pa'i mnga' bzhi yang / / dkyil 'khor grwa bzhir gzug par bya// de yi 'og tu nad pa yang // dri zhim spos kyis lus bskus te// gtsang ma'i gos rnams bskon nas ni// dkyil 'khor
546a1(rgyud 'bum): @dbus su gzhag par bya/ / de ni shar phyogs kha bstan te// rig pa 'di ni brjod par bya// lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas su// mkhas pas de la bsrung bar bya/
546a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas nad pa'i don gyi phyir// lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// rig pa 'di ni brjod byas nas// des ni nad kun zhi bar 'gyur// de nas gtor ma'i bum pa la// lan bdun legs par sngags
546a3(rgyud 'bum): kyis gda'/ / de nas bshos kyang sngags gdab ste// gtor ma me tog cho ga bzhin// de ltar lho phyogs ngos su ni// lan bdun kho nar gtor bar bya// nub phyogs su yang bdun nyid de// byang
546a4(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su yang de bzhin no/ / 'og dang ster du'ang lan bdun te// bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ba yin// rngam ze dam pa de lta bur// b+h+yas na sdug bsngal kun las grol// skyob pashAkya seng ge yis// srung
546a5(rgyud 'bum): ba 'di ni yang dag bshad/ / 'di ma gtogs par khams gsum na// srung ba'i rig sngags gzhan med do// de ni mi 'chi mi rgas so// nad kyis mi btab mi sdug min// sdug pa dang ni 'bral mi 'gyur// rig
546a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags pa'i ni bdag gi lus/ / shin tu bsgoms pa byas na ni// de la 'chi bdag tshogs kyis mchod// chos kyi rgyal po dam pa gshin rje yang // bus dang bcas pas de la mchod par 'gyur// skad cig
546a7(rgyud 'bum): nga yis sems dmyal 'di byos la/ / lha yi grong khyer song zhes smra bar 'gyur// de nas gzhal med khang pa rnam mang pos// rdzu 'phrul chen po lha gnas bzang por 'gro// de ltar der ni lha mi gnod sbyin dang / srin
546b1(rgyud 'bum): bo rnams kyis de la rtag mchod 'gyur/ / lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // bde sogs bdag po dbang po dang // 'phrog ma dang ni lngas rtsen dang // 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul che// zla ba nyi ma rgyu skar bcas// mchog tu
546b2(rgyud 'bum): mi bzad gza' rnams dang / / gang yang klu chen thams cad dang // lha dang de bzhin drang srong dang // lha min mkha' lding dri za dang // mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// srung phyir rtag tu 'brang bar byed// gang gis rig pa
546b3(rgyud 'bum): stobs chen mo/ / rdzu 'phrul chen mo bris nas ni// shes rab can gyi lag la gdags// mchod pa chen po thob par 'gyur// rtag tu phun sum tshogs par 'ong // 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo so sor 'brang
546b4(rgyud 'bum): chen mo'i bsrung ba'i cho ga'i brtag pa rdzogs so/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na miHdang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis
546b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o/ / slar yang yul dbus kyi rgya dpe gnyis dang bstun nas sngags rnams dag par bu ston lo ts+tsha chen pos bcos pa la phyi mo// //
546b6(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA shi ta ba nI ka su tra/ bod skad du/ bsil ba'i tshal chen po'i mdo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// ga

547a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag phyag 'tshal/ / de dag kun la skyabs su mchi// 'khor lo bskor ba bla med pa// mar me mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad pa// thams cad gnon la

547b1(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa/ / sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// gang la sangs rgyas gus mdzad pa'i// chos la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo// gang la phul na don che ba'i// dge 'dun la yang phyag 'tshal lo// nyan thos shes

550a7(rgyud 'bum): pa byed par sems pa yang dag par ma mthong ngo / / kye rgyal po chen po dag de lta mod kyi/ khyed kyi 'khor rnams nga'i 'khor la gnod pa byed par sems so// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang /
550b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol ba mchis te/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag
550b2(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid la zhu ba'i slad du bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis lags so// da ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan
550b3(rgyud 'bum): 'das dgon pa dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal 'di dag ni shin tu sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / klu dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gsang ba pa dang / 'byung po
550b4(rgyud 'bum): dang grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / srul po dang / sha za dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / skem byed dang / 'tshe rgyu dang / smyo byed dang / mi 'am ci dang /
550b5(rgyud 'bum): gyen du rgyu ba dang / rgyu ba dang / 'dun pa dang / ngan byed dang / gzi byin 'phrog pa dang / brjed byed dang / rims drag po dang / rims zhog gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis
550b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa sdang bar sems pa dang / glags lta ba dang / phan par mi sems pa dang / gnod par bgyid
550b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dag mchis so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag kyang de na gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni srod dang tho rangs la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas lags
551a1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin nam srin po nas/ gnod par bgyid pa'i bar gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni
551a2(rgyud 'bum): nyung zad cig mchis pa lags so/ / gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la ma dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni ches mang lags te/ de dag ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos srong dang blo
551a3(rgyud 'bum): rangs la mi nyal zhing sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa rnams la gnod par bgyid par sems lags te/ de dag dgag pa'i slad du gnod sbyin ma rungs pa ma dad pa rnams dad par bgyi ba dang / dang pa
551a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams slar zhing dad par bgyi ba dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams bde legs dang / bde bar gnas par bgyi ba dang / ma lus par shin tu nyam par gnog par 'gyur ba'i slad du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo
551a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'di bshad par 'tshal lo/ / mi ma yin pa sdang sems can// rgyal ba'i bstan la ma dad pa// de dag bdag gis bzlog par bya// rgyal chen rnams ni bdag la nyon// mdo chen 'di ni thos
551a6(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / mi rnams la ni gnod ma byed// gnod sbyin srin po klu rnams dang // nam mkha' lding dang gsang ba pa// phan par mi 'dod gang yang rung // de dag thams cad bzlog par bya//
551a7(rgyud 'bum): dang lha min rlung lha dang // lha mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba yi// gzhal med khang mdzes de dag ni// me dang 'dra bar 'od gsal zhing // nyi ma zla ba'i tshul 'dra ba// rin chen las byas shin tu snang /
551b1(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams byas pa dag gis gang // rab sdang gdon rnams rnam par spangs// mi la gnod byed gang yin pa'i// 'byung po grul dum srin po dang // yi dgas srul po de dag gis// rmad byung
551b2(rgyud 'bum): de dag mi mthong ste/ / gzi byin ldan pa'i lha rnams kyi// grong khyer du yang de mi 'gro// 'byung po chen po 'du ba na// der yang de dag 'dur mi dbang // stan nam yang na chu yang rung // zas dang skom yang
551b3(rgyud 'bum): mi dbang ngo / / lus ngan gyi ni pho brang du// nam yang de dag 'gro mi 'gyur// rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig/ 'byung po gang zhig mi nyan pa// de yi kha nas khrag dron dag/ myur du rab tu 'bab par 'gyur
551b4(rgyud 'bum): de yi brlab g.yas rol nas/ / pol mig dag kyang 'byung 'gyur te// de ni nad kyis 'chi 'gyur zhing // gnod sbyin gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur// 'jig rten skyong gis bshad pa yi// mdo las
551b5(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig 'gal byed pa/ / 'jigs pa thams cad de la 'ong // mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig/ gnod sbyin gang dag mi nyan pa// 'byung po srin po gang yin pa//
551b6(rgyud 'bum): ngan 'phreng lhag pa'i ngan 'phreng rnams// lcags las byas pa'i 'khor lo yi// mtshon cha spu gri'i so 'dra bas// gnod sbyin de dag brlag par bya// rgyal po chen po dpal dang ldan// go cha sra
551b7(rgyud 'bum): zhing mtshon rnol/ / stan rnams la ni 'khod pa dag/ shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus
552a1(rgyud 'bum): ngan po/ / de dag de na 'khod pa yi// nye 'khor gnod sbyin 'di rnams gnas// seng ge'i gzugs dang stag gi gzugs// mi sdug pa dag 'gro zhing rgyu// glang chan gzugs
552a2(rgyud 'bum): dang rna yi gzugs/ / kha cig ma de'i gzugs can la// dred mo dang ni wa yi gzugs// lug dang spyang ki phag rgod rnams// rna ba 'phyang dang rna bo che// rna ba gcig pa tha dad pa// sgra cher 'byin cing
552a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed pa/ / sa gzhi rab tu g.yo bar byed// bong bu dang ni rnga mo khyi// cha lugs gzhan yang nye 'khor 'khod// rgyal po chen po stobs po che// de dag phan tshun 'du ba na// lha yi shing rta bcas pa yis//
552a4(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' las ni 'gro bar byed// gnod sbyin dag ni bdag po yang // mi rnams la ni bde legs byed// s+ya ya the dan/ pa ka hu mu le/ pa kA hu mu le/ ha shi na/ ha shi na/ ban mu pha le/
552a5(rgyud 'bum): sa mu ha le/ u du ha le/ sa mu ha le/ pra sha ma mi/ rA kA sa/ a ma nu/ Shu ba rI ma/ yakrA ni/ ba rI mi/ pre ta ma bi hi/ tha du ma nuSh+Ta mA sa ba ta dA/ mUr+d+han spa tiSh+Tu ti/
552a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu// mi la non pa sder bcas pas// 'di smras nas ni tshub ma langs// de bzhin ri yang g.yos par gyur// rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu'i// rin chen shing rta bcas pa na/
552a7(rgyud 'bum): lha dang mi yi sgra skad grags// rgyal po chen po mchi ba ni// dbang po rnams kyang 'bar bar 'gyur// srin po 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs// de yi mdun na rgyug par bgyid// mi ma yin pa'i gzugs
552b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis/ / 'jigs shing skrag pa skyed par bgyid// che zhing gtum la mi bzad pa// drag cing mthong na mi sdug la// spu yang ring zhing sen mo ring // lag na ral gri tho ba thogs// so ni zangs can
552b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs par bgyid/ / sna chen rnga mo stag gi 'dra// drag cing lag pa khrag dmar ba// yan lag ma tshang byed tsam lus// mog ser lus kyang shin tu ser// dri ma can la lus skam pa// sgra brdzes
552b3(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyi mchu can la/ / mtshon cha tshabs cher 'debs par bgyid// rna ba gzhu 'dra gsus po che// sbrul gyi gzugs can be'u gzugs// phag gi gzugs can lto bo che// mgo bo tsha la lag ring ba//
552b4(rgyud 'bum): rna 'phyang ba la nu ma 'phyang // de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi// g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor// gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams// de dag ma ni lam log can// g.yog 'khor de dag lhan cig tu//
552b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchi// ge'u ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// zag cing rgod la gtum pa dang // mgo bo che la sgra ring ba// mi rnams dang ni ri dgas dang //
552b6(rgyud 'bum): bya rnams gzi byin 'phrog par bgyid// me 'bar za dang mang du za// mig gcig pa dang mig sar dang // sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang // chad pa mang pos bcad pa dang // mgo ma mchis dang mgo bcad
552b7(rgyud 'bum): dang radamus kyang skur la gnyer ma gdong / / mig la me 'bar rkang med pa// mi rnams 'jigs par bgyid pa ste// bel ka che la rgod bag can// de bzhin 'gro zhing rgyu bar bgyid// de 'dra'i gnod
553a1(rgyud 'bum): @sbyin mang po yi/ / g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor// gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams// de dag ma ni rkun ma lags// g.yog 'khor de dag lhan cig tu// bdag ni
553a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ / go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// bdag cag gi ni gnas rnams na// shing rta zhes bgyi srin mo mchis// de la bu po stobs ldan
553a3(rgyud 'bum): pa rnga stong phrag bcu yi grangs snyed mchis/ / de dag bdag gi g.yog lags te// de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis// go'u ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// bdag
553a4(rgyud 'bum): cag gi ni gnas rnams na/ / mgrin rings zhes bgyi srin mo mchis// srin mo shin tu gnag pa dang // srin mo nag mo zhes bgyi dang // srin mo rab gnag rnams mchis te// de dag go'u ta ma mthun par
553a5(rgyud 'bum): blta/ ra sa yi gnod sbyin bdag nyid che// de dgas steng gnas pa ste// g.yog 'khor de dag rnams kyis ni// yongs su bskor te 'dir mchis lags// de dag kun dang lhan cig tu// bdag ni phyag
553a6(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal slad du mchis/ / go'u ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// bdag gi mdun na rgyug pa yi// yi dgas gnod sbyin srin po rnams// lus chen shugs kyang drag po
553a7(rgyud 'bum): sternga so yang che la lnga po che/ / rna 'phyang 'jigs pa chen po ste// slom rna la rab tu 'phyang // yan lag drug pa so brtan pa// gur kum mdog can tho ba 'dra// so yang rtsub cing rno ba dang / mdung thung
553b1(rgyud 'bum): gsal shing 'jigs par bgyid/ / glang chen mgo dang bum rna can// mgo bo stag dang seng ge 'dra// lcags kyi so can lcags kyi sgra// gdon rnams rnam par skrag bgyid pa// lag na lcags kyi gtan
553b2(rgyud 'bum): bu thogs/ / lag na lcags kyi tho ba thogs// so rnon lag pa ring ba ste// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can lcags kyi chu// mgo bo che la smra g.yengs pa// gnag cing mig ser sna zhom pa// bum pa'i mgrin
553b3(rgyud 'bum): dang mig dmar dang / / mig gcig pa dang lto bo che// mchu 'phyangs pa dang lag gcig pa// rkang gcig pa dang rkang gnyis pa// kha med kha gnyis drag po ste// mi rnams rab tu 'jigs par bgyid//
553b4(rgyud 'bum): lag na 'khar ba dbyug pa thogs// mdung rtse gsum pa skrag cing 'jigs// skrag cing 'jigs par byed pa ste// gdon rnams rnam par skrag bgyid pa// skrag par bgyid cing smra bar bgyid// sems
553b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang 'khrul par bgyid pa ste/ / spro bar bgyid cing rmongs par bgyid// de nas gzi byin 'phrog par bgyid// de dag 'jig rten 'jigs pa ste// stobs po che la sten par dka'// stong phrag drug cu rtsa
553b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi po/ / rgyal po chen po'i mdun na rgyug/ de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi// g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor// gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams// de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis//
553b7(rgyud 'bum): go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// sa ga lngas rtsen zla ba dang // seng ge sde dang rab gnon dang // mal sbyin brtson drag po dang // gang po dang ni nor 'dzin dang //
554a1(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang // sna tshogs sde dang gtor ma le// yid bzhin rab 'byor bzhin bzang dang // 'dam bu can dang shin tu rgyal// 'dod pa thams cad 'byor
554a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / dbang po rgyal ba khyu mchog dang // nor bu bzang sras rdzogs bzang dang // 'dam bus mchog 'dam bus dga'// khab kyi spu can ring bzang dang // lag mchog skye dgu'i bdag po dang // 'dam
554a3(rgyud 'bum): bu'i rgyud dang mdung ring dang / / dig pa stobs can nor bu dang // 'jog po nag po chen po dang // la ba can dang dre'u dang gnyis// klu yi rgyal po sa srung bu// yan lag chen po rdzu 'phrul che// nam mkha' lding
554a4(rgyud 'bum): ni shugs chen ldan/ / 'dab chags kun gyi mchog gyur pa// bya yi gzugs kyis mchi bgyid cing // rgya mtsho kun tu 'khrug par bgyid// lha dang lha min dri za rnams// 'jigs par bgyid dang dge ba'ang
554a5(rgyud 'bum): rung rngam dad pa dang dad pa rnams/ / de dag thams cad 'dir mchis te// go'u ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// 'phrog ma zhes bgyi gnod sbyin mo// 'jigs par bgyid
554a6(rgyud 'bum): pa stobs chen mo/ / de yi bu ni lnga brgya rnams// 'jigs bgyid gnod sbyin mthu rtsal can// bdag nyid kyi ni g.yog lags te// de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis// go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos
554a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ / mag d+ha na thams cad mthong // ka shi ni ni pad+ma 'chang // yangs pa can na rgyal mchog gnas// gyad yul na ni grags 'dzin gnas// rgyal po'ikhab na ku bi ra// ser
554b1(rgyud 'bum): skya'i gnas na drag po ste/ / ta ma lan 'byor pa gnas// mi ti lan kun tu rgyal// ma mo chen mo 'di brgyad ni// gnod sbyin rnams kyi sde dpon mchog/ rdzu 'phrul chen po skal ba che// stobs chen de dag
554b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ni/ / yid dge dad pa'i sems dang ldan// rdzogs sangs rgyas la skyabs mchis pas// de dag dang ni 'dus nas kyang // rgyal po chen po stobs chen gyis// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas
554b3(rgyud 'bum): bstan la/ / mi rnams la ni snying brtse'i slad// gnod sbyin 'byung po yi dgas dang // sdang ba'i gdan rnams bzlog pa dang // mi ma yin rnams bzlog pa yi// srung ba 'di ni legs par bgyis// de nas
554b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po rnam thos bu/ / thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni// khon dang 'jigs pa kun 'das pa// rnam grol zag pa mi mnga' ba// go'u ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// khyod la lha
554b5(rgyud 'bum): dang grub pa dang / / bram ze thams cad phyag 'tshal te// gnod sbyin bye ba drug khri dang // bzhi stong dag kyang lhags nas ni// kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas// thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags// bdag
554b6(rgyud 'bum): ni rgyal po rnam thos bu/ / byang phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste// 'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du// gnod sbyin rgyu skar smyo byed dang // brjed byed dang ni mi 'am ci// skem byed dang ni rim drag dang // de bzhin
554b7(rgyud 'bum): rims nad zhag bzhi pa/ / de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyi// s+yad mthe dan/ u ha ham/ u ha hom/ ma hA hom/ ma hA u ha ham/ u ha ma hA ham/ sa la mu dzi/ i li mi li/
555a1(rgyud 'bum): @ki le mi le/ tsi ri ti/ tA b+hi/ utu b+hI/ di ti li ye/ ma tra ma li/ ma nin+da ye swA hA/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu lus ngan lcang lo can gyi bdag po phyogs skyong bar gyur
555a2(rgyud 'bum): cig gnod sbyin dang / rgyu skar dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang / mi 'am ci dang / gyen du rgyu dang / rgyu ba dang / 'dun pa dang / ngan byed dang / gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par gyur cig/ lha'i nang na lha'i

556a1(rgyud 'bum): skyong bar gyur cig/ grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / srul po dang / 'byung po dang / rgyu ba dang / gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par gyur cig/ lha'i nang nas lha'i

556b3(rgyud 'bum): nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing gros mthun pa dang / tshig mthun pa dang /
556b4(rgyud 'bum): skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i srung ba ste/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la yongs su khyab pa lags so// gnod sbyin
556b5(rgyud 'bum): dang srin po nas/ gnod pa bgyid pa'i bar du bzlog par bgyi ba dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / bde bar gnas par bgyid pa lags so//
556b6(rgyud 'bum): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye rgyal po chen po dag rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po bzung zin no// bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen
556b7(rgyud 'bum): bongs yongs su bzung zin no/ / kye rgyal po chen po dag gzhan yang ngas kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po la rjes su yi rang ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po brjod kyis/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la
557a1(rgyud 'bum): zung zhig dang ngas bshad do/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ltar mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag
557a2(rgyud 'bum): rin po che g.yas pas na bza' chos gos phye nas/ 'byung po'i tshogs de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ngas 'di bstan par bya'o// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la dbye bar bya'o// thams cad la go bar
557a3(rgyud 'bum): / bya'o// dzade nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rig sngags 'di bka' stsal to// s+yA da ya the dan/ hi lA hi lI/ b+hi si ni/ ba ke/ oM ha ra ye/ ta ma ni/ til

557a6(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs sangs rgyas/ / sems can kun la thugs brtsen// 'byung po kun 'jigs nyen pa yi// rig sngags 'di 'dra gsung bar mdzad// de nas kun mkhyen ston pa po// sems can kun la thugs brtse

557b1(rgyud 'bum): 'am ci/ / skem byed dang ni rims drag dang // de bzhin bram ze srin po dang // smyo byed rims nang zhag gsum pa// de bzhin zhag ni bzhi pa rnams// skrag cing rab tu 'dar gyur te// phyogs bcur rgyug pa

558a1(rgyud 'bum): @ya ma sur bi la/ ad d+ya bang h+ye/ nad d+ya bang h+ye/ ad d+ya ba ti/ ma rung bya/ ma rung d+ya ba ti/ ma rang d+ya ba la swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'byung po thams cad bzlog

562b1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / rgya gar skad du/ mahA man+ta a nud+hA ri sU tra/ bod skad du/ gsang sngags chen po rjes su 'dzin pa'i mdo/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag
562b2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dun nyan thos dang bcas pa/ yang dag par song ba
